Kwathi uJakobe eseqedile ukulaya amadodana akhe, waqoqela inyawo zakhe embhedeni, waphela, wabuthelwa ebantwini bakibo.
UJosefa wasewela phezu kobuso bukayise, wakhala inyembezi phezu kwakhe, wamanga.
UJosefa waselaya inceku zakhe abelaphi ukuthi baqhole uyise ngomuthi; labelaphi bamqhola uIsrayeli ngomuthi.
Zagcwaliseka kuye insuku ezingamatshumi amane, ngoba ngokunjalo zazigcwaliseka insuku zabaqholwe ngomuthi. LamaGibhithe amlilela insuku ezingamatshumi ayisikhombisa.
Kwathi sezidlulile insuku zokumkhalela, uJosefa wakhuluma lendlu kaFaro esithi: Uba-ke ngithole umusa emehlweni enu, ake likhulume endlebeni zikaFaro, lisithi:
Ubaba wangifungisa esithi: Khangela, ngiyafa; engcwabeni engazigebhela lona elizweni leKhanani, lapho ungingcwabe. Khathesi-ke, ake ngenyuke ngiyengcwaba ubaba, besengibuya.
UFaro wasesithi: Yenyuka uyengcwaba uyihlo njengokukufungisa kwakhe.
UJosefa wasesenyuka ukuyangcwaba uyise, kwenyuka kanye laye zonke izinceku zikaFaro, abadala bendlu yakhe, labo bonke abadala belizwe leGibhithe,
lendlu yonke kaJosefa, labafowabo, lendlu kayise; kuphela abantwana babo abancinyane lezimvu zabo lenkomo zabo bakutshiya elizweni leGosheni.
Kwasekusenyuka kanye laye konke izinqola labagadi bamabhiza, kwaba liviyo elinzima kakhulu.
Kwathi sebefike esizeni seAtadi, eliphetsheya kweJodani, balila khona, isililo esikhulu lesinzima kakhulu, bamenzela uyise isililo insuku eziyisikhombisa.
Kwathi abakhileyo belizwe, amaKhanani, bebona ukulila esizeni seAtadi, bathi: Lesi yisililo esinzima samaGibhithe. Ngakho basebesitha ibizo laso iAbeli-Mizirayimi, eliphetsheya kweJodani.
Amadodana akhe asemenzela njalo njengalokhu ewalayile;
ngoba amadodana akhe amthwalela elizweni leKhanani, lube yindawo yakhe yokungcwabela, kuEfroni umHethi, eqondane leMamre.
UJosefa wasebuyela eGibhithe, yena labafowabo labo bonke abenyuka laye ukuyangcwaba uyise, esemngcwabile uyise.
Kwathi abafowabo bakaJosefa sebebonile ukuthi uyise usefile bathi: Mhlawumbe uJosefa uzasizonda, ngoqotho asiphindisele ububi bonke esabenza kuye.
Basebenika isilayezelo kuJosefa besithi: Uyihlo walaya engakafi, esithi:

Lizakutsho kanje kuJosefa lithi: Ngiyakucela, akuxolele isiphambeko sabafowenu lesono sabo, ngoba bakwenzela okubi; khathesi-ke ake uxolele isiphambeko sezinceku zikaNkulunkulu kayihlo. UJosefa wasekhala inyembezi nxa bekhuluma kuye.
Labafowabo labo beza, bawa phansi phambi kwakhe, bathi: Khangela, siyizinceku zakho.
Kodwa uJosefa wathi kibo: Lingesabi, ngoba kanti ngisendaweni kaNkulunkulu yini?
Kodwa lina laceba okubi kimi, uNkulunkulu waceba ngokuhle, ukuze enze njengalamuhla, ukuze alondoloze abantu abanengi bephila.
Khathesi-ke lingesabi; mina ngizalondla lina labantwanyana benu. Wasebaduduza, wakhuluma labo ngomusa.
UJosefa wasehlala eGibhithe, yena lendlu kayise. Njalo uJosefa waphila iminyaka elikhulu letshumi.
UJosefa wasebona abantwana bakaEfrayimi abesizukulwana sesithathu; labantwana bakaMakiri indodana kaManase bazalelwa emadolweni kaJosefa.
UJosefa wasesithi kubafowabo: Ngiyafa, kodwa uNkulunkulu uzalihambela isibili.
UJosefa wafungisa amadodana kaIsrayeli esithi: UNkulunkulu uzalihambela isibili, njalo lizakwenyusa amathambo ami asuke lapha.
UJosefa wasesifa, eleminyaka elikhulu letshumi; basebemqhola ngomuthi, wafakwa ebhokisini eGibhithe.
La-ke ngamabizo amadodana kaIsrayeli afika eGibhithe loJakobe; afika, ileyo laleyo lomuzi wayo,
uRubeni, uSimeyoni, uLevi, loJuda,
uIsakari, uZebuluni, loBhenjamini,
uDani, loNafithali, uGadi, loAsheri.
Njalo yonke imiphefumulo eyaphuma ekhalweni lukaJakobe yayiyimiphefumulo engamatshumi ayisikhombisa. Kodwa uJosefa wayeseGibhithe.
UJosefa wasesifa labo bonke abafowabo, lalesosizukulwana sonke.
Njalo abantwana bakoIsrayeli bazalana, baba banengi, banda, baba lamandla kakhulukazi, ilizwe laze lagcwaliswa yibo.
Kwasekuvela inkosi entsha phezu kweGibhithe eyayingamazi uJosefa.
Yasisithi esizweni sayo: Khangela, isizwe sabantwana bakoIsrayeli sinengi, futhi silamandla kulathi.
Wozani, hlezi sande, njalo kuzakuthi lapho kusehla impi, laso sihlangane lezitha zethu, silwe simelene lathi, senyuke sisuke elizweni.
Ngakho bamisa phezu kwaso izinduna zesibhalo.
Kodwa kwathi ekusihlupheni kwaso kwang'khona sisanda, kwang'khona sisabalala.
Njalo amaGibhithe abasebenzisa abantwana bakoIsrayeli ngochuku,
aze enza impilo zabo zababa ngomsebenzi onzima, ngodaka langezitina, langawo wonke umsebenzi emasimini; ngomsebenzi wabo wonke, ababenza bawenza ngodlakela.
Inkosi yeGibhithe yasikhuluma lababelethisi amaHebherukazi, obizo lowokuqala lalinguShifira, lebizo lowesibili lalinguPhuwa,
yasisithi: Nxa libelethisa amaHebherukazi, lapho libabona ezihlalweni zokubeletha, uba kuyindodana, liyibulale; kodwa uba kuyindodakazi, iyekeleni iphila.
Kodwa ababelethisi babemesaba uNkulunkulu, kodwa babayekela abafana baphila.
Inkosi yeGibhithe yasibiza ababelethisi, yathi kubo: Liyenzeleni linto ukuthi liyekele abafana baphile?
Ababelethisi basebesithi kuFaro: Ngoba amaHebherukazi kawanjengabafazi bamaGibhithe; ngoba alamandla, umbelethisi engakafiki kuwo, asebelethile.
Ngalokhu uNkulunkulu wabenzela ababelethisi okuhle, labantu banda, baba lamandla kakhulu.
Kwasekusithi, ngoba ababelethisi bamesaba uNkulunkulu, wabakhela imizi.
UFaro waselaya isizwe sakhe sonke esithi: Yonke indodana ezalwayo liyiphosele emfuleni, kodwa yonke indodakazi liyiyekele iphile.
Kwasekusuka indoda yendlu yakoLevi, yathatha indodakazi yakoLevi.
Owesifazana wasethatha isisu, wazala indodana; eseyibonile ukuthi inhle, wayifihla inyanga ezintathu.
Kwathi engaselakuyifihla wayithathela isitsha semizi.
Udadewabo wasezimisa khatshana ukuze azi okuzakwenziwa kuye.
Kwasekusehla indodakazi kaFaro uku ya geza emfuleni; lamantombazana ayo ahamba eceleni komfula. Isibonile isitsha phakathi kwemihlanga, yathuma incekukazi yayo yasithatha.
Kwathi isivula, yabona umntwana, khangela-ke, umfanyana wakhala inyembezi. Yasimhawukela yathi: Lo ngomunye wabafana bamaHebheru.
Udadewabo wasesithi endodakazini kaFaro: Ngihambe yini ngiyekubizela umfazi omunyisayo kumaHebherukazi ukuze akumunyisele umfana?
Indodakazi kaFaro yasisithi kuye: Hamba. Intombi yasihamba, yabiza unina womfana.
Indodakazi kaFaro yasisithi kuye: Thatha uhambe lalo umntwana, ungimunyisele yena; njalo mina ngizakupha iholo lakho. Owesifazana wasemthatha umntwana, wammunyisa.
Umfana esekhulile, wamletha endodakazini kaFaro, wasesiba yindodana yayo. Yasisitha ibizo layo yathinguMozisi, yathi: Ngoba ngamkhupha emanzini.
Kwasekusithi ngalezonsuku, uMozisi esekhulile, waphuma waya kubafowabo; futhi wabona umGibhithe etshaya umHebheru kubafowabo.
Wathalaza ngapha langapha; esebonile ukuthi kakulamuntu, wamtshaya umGibhithe, wamfihla etshebetshebeni.
Waphuma langosuku lwesibili, khangela-ke, amaHebheru amabili esilwa; wasesithi kowonileyo: Umtshayelani umakhelwane wakho?
Wasesithi: Ngubani okubeke ube yisiphathamandla lomahluleli phezu kwethu? Wena uzimisele ukungibulala yini njengalokho ubulele umGibhithe? UMozisi wasesesaba wathi: Isibili udaba luyaziwa.
Kwathi uFaro eseluzwile udaba, wadinga ukumbulala uMozisi. Kodwa uMozisi wabalekela ubuso bukaFaro.
Njalo umpristi weMidiyani wayelamadodakazi ayisikhombisa; eza ukunathisa umhlambi kayise.
Kwasekufika abelusi, bawaxotsha; kodwa uMozisi wasukuma, wawasiza wanathisa umhlambi wawo.
Lapho efika kuRehuweli uyise, wathi: Kungani libuye masinyane kangaka lamuhla?
Asesithi: Indoda engumGibhithe isophulile esandleni sabelusi; futhi yasikhela lokusikhela, yanathisa umhlambi.
Wasesithi emadodakazini akhe: Kambe ingaphi? Kanti liyitshiyeleni indoda? Ibizeni, ukuze idle isinkwa.
UMozisi wasevuma ukuhlala lendoda; wasemnika uMozisi uZipora indodakazi yakhe.
Wasezala indodana; wayitha ibizo layo uGereshoma, ngoba wathi: Ngangingowemzini elizweni lemzini.
Kwasekusithi emva kwalezinsuku ezinengi.
UNkulunkulu wasesizwa ukububula kwabo.
UNkulunkulu wasebona abantwana bakoIsrayeli.
UMozisi wayeselusa-ke umhlambi kaJetro uyisezala, umpristi weMidiyani; waqhuba umhlambi waya ngaphambili kwenkangala, eHorebe.
Njalo ingilosi yeN yabonakala kuye; wasebona, khangela-ke, isihlahla sivutha umlilo, kodwa isihlahla sasingapheli.
UMozisi wasesithi: Ngizaphambuka-ke ngibone lo umbono omkhulu, ukuthi kungani isihlahla singatshi.
Kwathi isibonile ukuthi uphambukile ukuyabona, uNkulunkulu wambiza ephakathi kwesihlahla, wathi: Mozisi, Mozisi! Wasesithi: Khangela ngi lapha.
Wasesithi: Ungasondeli lapha; khupha amanyathela akho enyaweni zakho, ngoba indawo omi kuyo ingumhlabathi ongcwele.
Wathi futhi: NginguNkulunkulu kayihlo, uNkulunkulu kaAbrahama, uNkulunkulu kaIsaka, loNkulunkulu kaJakobe.
yasisithi: Isibili ngibonile ukuhlupheka kwesizwe sami esiseGibhithe; ngoba ngiyazazi insizi zabo;
njalo ngehlile.
Khathesi-ke, khangela, ukukhala kwabantwana bakoIsrayeli sekufikile kimi; njalo lami ngibonile ucindezelo amaGibhithe abacindezela ngalo.
Khathesi-ke, woza, ngizakuthuma kuFaro ukuze ukhuphe isizwe sami, abantwana bakoIsrayeli, eGibhithe.
Kodwa uMozisi wathi kuNkulunkulu: Ngingubani mina ukuthi ngiye kuFaro, lokuthi ngikhuphe abantwana bakoIsrayeli eGibhithe?
Wasesithi: Isibili ngizakuba lawe.
UMozisi wasesithi kuNkulunkulu: Khangela, nxa ngifika kubantwana bakoIsrayeli ngisithi kubo: UNkulunkulu waboyihlo ungithumile kini; bazakuthi kimi: Ungubani ibizo lakhe? Ngizathini kubo?
UNkulunkulu wasesithi kuMozisi: NGINGUYE ENGINGUYE. Wathi futhi: Uzakutsho njalo kubantwana bakoIsrayeli ukuthi: UNGINGUYE ungithumile kini.

UNkulunkulu wasesithi njalo kuMozisi: Uzakutsho njalo kubantwana bakoIsrayeli ukuthi: uNkulunkulu waboyihlo, uNkulunkulu kaAbrahama, uNkulunkulu kaIsaka, loNkulunkulu kaJakobe, njalo lesi yisikhumbuzo sami kusizukulwana kusiya kusizukulwana.
Hamba, ubuthanise abadala bakoIsrayeli, lalokho elikwenziwe eGibhithe;
futhi ngathi ngizalenyusa enhluphekweni yeGibhithe, ngilise elizweni lamaKhanani lelamaHethi lelamaAmori lelamaPerizi lelamaHivi lelamaJebusi, liye elizweni eligeleza uchago loluju.
Njalo bazalalela ilizwi lakho; khathesi-ke, ake usiyekele sihambe ummango wensuku ezintathu siye enkangala ukuze sihlabele uNkulunkulu wethu.
Kodwa mina ngiyazi ukuthi inkosi yeGibhithe kayiyikuliyekela lihambe, ngitsho langesandla esilamandla.
Ngakho ngizakwelula isandla sami.
Njalo ngizanika lesisizwe umusa emehlweni amaGibhithe. Kuzakuthi-ke mhla lisukayo, kaliyikusuka lingelalutho,

kodwa wonkeowesifazana uzacela kumakhelwane wakhe, lakuye ohlezihleziyo endlini yakhe, izinto zesiliva, lezinto zegolide, lemvunulo; lizazifaka emadodaneni enu lemadodakazini enu; lizawaphanga amaGibhithe.
UMozisi wasephendula wathi: Kodwa khangela, kabayikungikholwa, kabayikulilalela ilizwi lami; ngoba bazakuthi: kayibonakalanga kuwe.
yasisithi kuye: Kuyini lokho okusesandleni sakho? Wasesithi: Yintonga.
Yasisithi: Iphosele emhlabathini. Waseyiphosela emhlabathini, yasisiba yinyoka. UMozisi waseyibalekela.
yasisithi kuMozisi: Yelula isandla sakho, uyibambe ngomsila. Waselula isandla sakhe, wayithi xhaka; yasisiba yintonga esandleni sakhe,
ukuze bakholwe.
yasisithi njalo kuye: Ake ufake isandla sakho esifubeni sakho. Wasesifaka isandla sakhe esifubeni sakhe; esesikhuphile, khangela-ke, isandla sakhe sasesilobulephero njengeliqhwa elikhithikileyo.
Yasisithi: Buyisela isandla sakho esifubeni sakho. Wasesibuyisela isandla sakhe esifubeni sakhe; esesikhuphile esifubeni sakhe, khangela-ke, sasesiphenduke saba njengenyama yakhe.
Njalo kuzakuthi uba bengakukholwa, bengalaleli ilizwi lesibonakaliso sokuqala, bazakholwa ilizwi lesibonakaliso sokucina.

Kuzakuthi-ke, uba bengakholwa lalezizibonakaliso ezimbili, bengalaleli ilizwi lakho, uzakukha okwamanzi omfula, uwathele emhlabathini owomileyo; njalo kuzakuthi amanzi ozawakha emfuleni azakuba ligazi emhlabathini owomileyo.
UMozisi wasesithi eNni: Uxolo, Nkosi yami, kangisiso sikhulumi, ngitsho kusukela usukhulume lenceku yakho; ngoba kunzima emlonyeni wami njalo kunzima olimini.
yasisithi kuye: Ngubani owenzela umuntu umlomo? Kumbe ngubani owenza isimungulu, kumbe isacuthe, kumbe obonayo, kumbe isiphofu? Kakusimi yini iN?
Khathesi-ke hamba, njalo mina ngizakuba lomlomo wakho, ngikufundise lokho ozakukhuluma.
Kodwa wathi: Uxolo, Nkosi yami, akuthume ngesandla salowo ozamthuma.
Lwaseluvutha ulaka lweN kuMozisi, yasisithi: Angithi uAroni umLevi ngumnewenu? Ngiyazi ukuthi angakhuluma kuhle. Njalo khangela-ke, uzaphuma ukukuhlangabeza; nxa ekubona, uzathaba enhliziyweni yakhe.
Njalo uzakhuluma kuye; mina-ke ngizakuba lomlomo wakho lomlomo wakhe, ngizalifundisa lokho elizakwenza.
Yena-ke uzakhuluma esizweni esikhundleni sakho, kuzakuthi abe ngumlomo kuwe, wena ube njengoNkulunkulu kuye.
Njalo uzathatha lintonga esandleni sakho, ozakwenza izibonakaliso ngayo.
UMozisi wasehamba wabuyela kuJetro uyisezala, wathi kuye: Ake ungiyekele ngihambe, ngibuyele kubafowethu abaseGibhithe, ngibone ukuthi basaphila yini. UJetro wasesithi kuMozisi: Hamba ngokuthula.
yasisithi kuMozisi eMidiyani: Hamba, ubuyele eGibhithe; ngoba wonke amadoda asafa, ayedinga umphefumulo wakho.
UMozisi wasethatha umkakhe lamadodana akhe, wabakhwelisa phezu kukababhemi, wabuyela elizweni leGibhithe. UMozisi wasethatha intonga kaNkulunkulu esandleni sakhe.
yasisithi kuMozisi: Ekuhambeni kwakho ubuyela eGibhithe, bona ukuthi, zonke izimangaliso ukuze angasiyekeli isizwe sihambe.
Njalo uzakuthi kuFaro: Itsho njalo iN: Indodana yami, nguIsrayeli;
njalo sengithe kuwe: Yekela indodana yami ihambe ukuthi ingikhonze; kodwa walile ukuyiyekela ihambe, khangela, ngizabulala indodana yakho, izibulo lakho.
Kwasekusithi esendleleni, endlini yezihambi, yadinga ukumbulala.
UZipora wasethatha insengetshe, waquma ijwabu lendodana yakhe, walithintisa inyawo zakhe wathi: Isibili ungumyeni wegazi kimi.
Yasimyekela. Ngalesosikhathi wathi: Umyeni wegazi, ngenxa yokusoka.
yasisithi kuAroni: Hamba, uyehlangabeza uMozisi enkangala, wamanga.
UMozisi wasemtshela uAroni wonke amazwi eN eyayimthumile, lazo zonke izibonakaliso eyayimlaye zona.
OMozisi loAroni basebehamba, babuthanisa bonke abadala babantwana bakoIsrayeli.
UAroni wasekhuluma amazwi wonke eyayiwakhulume kuMozisi, wenza izibonakaliso phambi kwamehlo abantu.
Abantu basebekholwa.
Emva kwalokho-ke uMozisi loAroni bahamba bathi kuFaro: Itsho njalo uNkulunkulu wakoIsrayeli: Bayekele abantu bami bahambe, bangigcinele umkhosi enkangala.
Kodwa uFaro wathi: Ingubani ukuthi ngilalele ilizwi layo, ngiyekele uIsrayeli ahambe? Kangiyazi iN, futhi kangiyikumyekela uIsrayeli ahambe.
Basebesithi: UNkulunkulu wamaHebheru ngomatshayabhuqe wesifo kumbe ngenkemba.
Kodwa inkosi yeGibhithe yathi kubo: Kungani, Mozisi loAroni, lisusa abantu emisebenzini yabo? Yanini emithwalweni yenu!
UFaro wasesithi: Khangelani, abantu belizwe sebebanengi, kanti liyabaphumuza emithwalweni yabo.
Ngalolosuku uFaro waselaya abaqhubi besibhalo zaso, esithi:
Lingabe lisabanika abantu amahlanga okwenza izitina njengamandulo; kabahambe bona bayezibuthela amahlanga;
lenani lezitina abalenze mandulo lizabamisela lona, lingaphunguli kulo; ngoba bayavilapha; yikho bekhala besithi: Siyekeleni siyehlabela uNkulunkulu wethu.
Yenzani umsebenzi ube nzima kakhulu phezu kwamadoda, ukuze basebenze kuwo, bangalaleli amazwi enkohliso.
Abaqhubi besibhalo babantu baphuma, lezinduna zabo, bakhuluma ebantwini besithi: Utsho njalo uFaro: Kangiyikulinika amahlanga;
hambani lina, lizithathele amahlanga lapho elingawathola khona; kodwa umsebenzi wenu kakuyikuphungulwa lutho kuwo.
Abantu basebehlakazeka elizweni lonke leGibhithe ukuze babuthe izidindi zibe ngamahlanga.
Abaqhubi besibhalo ba ba haluzelisa besithi: Qedani imisebenzi yenu, umlandu wosuku ngosuku lwawo, njengamhla kulamahlanga.

Njalo izinduna zabantwana bakoIsrayeli, abaqhubi besibhalo bakaFaro abababekela zona, zatshaywa, kuthiwa: Kaliqedanga ngani umsebenzi wenu omisiweyo wokwenza izitina njengamandulo, layizolo lalamuhla?
Izinduna zabantwana bakoIsrayeli zasezisiza, zakhala kuFaro zathi: Wenzelani kanje ezincekwini zakho?
Amahlanga kawanikwa inceku zakho, kanti bathi kithi: Yenzani izitina. Khangela-ke, inceku zakho ziyatshaywa; kodwa icala ngelabantu bakho.
Kodwa wathi: Lina lingamavila, lingamavila; ngalokhu lithi: Siyekeleni siyehlabela iN.
Khathesi-ke hambani, lisebenze; kodwa amahlanga kaliyikuwanikwa, kanti lizaletha inani lezitina.
Izinduna zabantwana bakoIsrayeli zasezibona ukuthi zazisebubini, nxa kuthiwa: Kaliyikuphungula ezitineni zenu, umlandu wosuku ngosuku lwawo.
Zasezihlangana loMozisi loAroni ababemi ukubahlangabeza ekuphumeni kwabo kuFaro;
zasezisithi kubo: ilibone yahlulele; ngoba lenze iphunga lethu libe livumba emehlweni kaFaro lemehlweni enceku zakhe; linike inkemba esandleni sabo ukuze basibulale.
UMozisi wasebuyela eNni wathi: Nkosi, wenzeleni okubi kulesisizwe? Kungani ungithumile?
Ngoba selokhu ngaya kuFaro ukukhuluma ebizweni lakho, wenzile okubi kulesisizwe; futhi kawusikhululanga lokusikhulula isizwe sakho.
yasisithi kuMozisi: Khathesi uzabona engizakwenza kuFaro; ngoba ngesandla esilamandla uzabayekela bahambe.
UNkulunkulu wasekhuluma kuMozisi wathi kuye: NgiyiN;
njalo ngabonakala kuAbrahama, kuIsaka, lakuJakobe njengoNkulunkulu uSomandla.
Njalo lami ngamisa isivumelwano sami labo, ilizwe lobuhambuma babo, ababehlala kulo njengabezizwe.
Futhi lami ngizwile ukububula kwabantwana bakoIsrayeli, amaGibhithe abagcine ebugqilini; njalo ngikhumbule isivumelwano sami.
Ngakho-ke tshono kubantwana bakoIsrayeli ukuthi: NgiyiN KOSI.
Njalo ngizazithathela lina libe yisizwe;
njalo ngizalingenisa elizweni engaphakamisa isandla sami ngalo ukulinika uAbrahama, uIsaka loJakobe, ngilinike lona libe yilifa; mina, iN.
UMozisi wasekhuluma ngokunjalo kubantwana bakoIsrayeli; kodwa kabamlalelanga uMozisi ngenxa yokukhathazeka komoya langenxa yobugqili obunzima.
yasikhuluma kuMozisi isithi,
Ngena ukhulume kuFaro, inkosi yeGibhithe, ukuthi ayekele abantwana bakoIsrayeli basuke elizweni lakhe.
Kodwa uMozisi wakhuluma phambi kweN esithi: Khangela, abantwana bakoIsrayeli kabangilalelanga?
yasikhuluma kuMozisi lakuAroni yabapha umlayo ngabantwana bakoIsrayeli langoFaro inkosi yeGibhithe ukukhupha abantwana bakoIsrayeli elizweni leGibhithe.
Laba bazinhloko zezindlu zaboyise; amadodana kaRubeni, izibulo likaIsrayeli: OHanoki loPalu, oHezironi loKarimi; laba bazinsapho zikaRubeni.
Lamadodana kaSimeyoni: OJemuweli loJamini loOhadi loJakini loZohari loShawuli indodana yomKhananikazi; laba bazinsapho zikaSimeyoni.
Njalo la ngamabizo amadodana kaLevi ngezizukulwana zawo.
Amadodana kaGerishoni: OLibini loShimeyi ngezinsapho zawo.
Njalo amadodana kaKohathi: OAmramu loIzihari loHebroni loUziyeli; leminyaka yempilo kaKohathi yayiyiminyaka elikhulu lamatshumi amathathu lantathu.
Njalo amadodana kaMerari: OMahli loMushi. Laba bazinsapho zamaLevi ngezizukulwana zabo.
UAmramu wasethatha uJokebedi udadewaboyise, waba ngumka khe. Wasemzalela uAroni loMozisi. Leminyaka yempilo kaAmramu yayiyiminyaka elikhulu lamatshumi amathathu lesikhombisa.
Njalo amadodana kaIzihari: OKora loNefegi loZikiri.
Lamadodana kaUziyeli: OMishayeli loElizafani loSithiri.
UAroni wasezithathela uElisheba indodakazi kaAminadaba.
Njalo amadodana kaKora: OAsiri loElkana loAbhiyasafa; laba bazinsapho zabakoKora.
UEleyazare indodana kaAroni wasezithathela enye yamadodakazi kaPutiyeli, yaba ngumka khe. Yasimzalela uPhinehasi. Yizo lezi inhloko zaboyise bamaLevi ngezinsapho zazo.
Lo nguAroni loMozisi eyathi kubo.
Yibo labo ababekhuluma kuFaro inkosi yeGibhithe ukukhupha abantwana bakoIsrayeli eGibhithe; lo nguMozisi loAroni.
Kwasekusithi mhla ikhuluma kuMozisi elizweni leGibhithe,
yakhuluma kuMozisi isithi: Mina ngiyiN KOSI.
UMozisi wasesithi phambi kweN: Khangela, ngingowendebe ezingasokanga; ngakho uFaro angangizwa njani?
yasisithi kuMozisi: Bona, ngikwenze waba njengoNkulunkulu kuFaro.
Wena uzakhuluma konke engikulaya khona; loAroni umnewenu uzakhuluma kuFaro ukuthi ayekele abantwana bakoIsrayeli baphume elizweni lakhe.
Kodwa mina ngizakwenza inhliziyo kaFaro ibe lukhuni zami elizweni leGibhithe.
Kodwa uFaro kayikulilalela; njalo ngizabeka isandla sami phezu kweGibhithe, ngikhuphe amabutho ami, isizwe sami, abantwana bakoIsrayeli, elizweni leGibhithe, ngezigwebo ezinkulu.
Njalo amaGibhithe azakwazi ukuthi ngiyiN, lapho ngiselula isandla sami phezu kweGibhithe, ngikhuphe abantwana bakoIsrayeli phakathi kwawo.
OMozisi loAroni basebesenza njengoba yabalaya; benza njalo.
UMozisi wayeseleminyaka engamatshumi ayisificaminwembili, loAroni wayeleminyaka engamatshumi ayisificaminwembili lantathu lapho bekhuluma kuFaro.
yasikhuluma kuMozisi lakuAroni, isithi:
Nxa uFaro ekhuluma lani esithi: Zenzeleni isimangaliso.
UMozisi loAroni basebengena kuFaro, benza njalo njengoba ilayile; uAroni wasephosela phansi intonga yakhe phambi kukaFaro laphambi kwenceku zakhe, yasisiba yinyoka.
UFaro wasebiza laye izazi labo benza njalo ngamalumbo abo.
Ngoba ngulowo lalowo waphosela phansi intonga yakhe, zaba zinyoka; kodwa intonga kaAroni yaginya intonga zabo.
Kodwa inhliziyo kaFaro yaba lukhuni, okokuthi kabalalelanga, njengokutsho kweN.
yasisithi kuMozisi: Inhliziyo kaFaro inzima, uyala ukuyekela isizwe sihambe.
Yana kuFaro ekuseni; khangela, uzaphuma esiya emanzini, ume uqondane laye ekhunjini lomfula, lentonga eyaphenduka yaba yinyoka ithathe esandleni sakho.
Uzakuthi kuye: uNkulunkulu wamaHebheru ingithume kuwe isithi; kodwa khangela, kawulalelanga kuze kube khathesi.
Itsho njalo iN: Ngalokhu uzakwazi ukuthi ngiyiN KOSI.
Lenhlanzi ezisemfuleni zizakufa, lomfula ube levumba; lamaGibhithe azadinwa yikunatha amanzi emfuleni.

yasisithi kuMozisi: Tshono kuAroni uthi: Thatha intonga yakho, welule isandla sakho phezu kwamanzi eGibhithe, phezu kwemifula yabo, phezu kwezifula zabo, laphezu kweziziba zabo, laphezu kwamachibi wonke amanzi abo, ukuze abe ligazi. Kuzakuba legazi elizweni lonke leGibhithe, le zitsh eni ze zihlahla le za matshe.
UMozisi loAroni basebesenza njalo, njengokulaya kweN; wasephakamisa intonga, watshaya amanzi ayesemfuleni.
Lenhlanzi ezisemfuleni zafa; lomfula waba levumba, kwaze kwathi amaGibhithe ehluleka ukuwanatha amanzi emfuleni; njalo kwakulegazi elizweni lonke leGibhithe.
Labalumbi beGibhithe benza njalo ngamalumbo abo.
UFaro wasetshibilika waya endlini yakhe njalo kayibekanga inhliziyo yakhe lakulokhu.
LamaGibhithe wonke agebha amanzi okunatha inhlangothi zonke zomfula, ngoba babengelakunatha emanzini omfula.
Lensuku eziyisikhombisa zagcwaliseka emva kokuthi isitshaye umfula.
yasisithi kuMozisi: Yana kuFaro uthi kuye: Itsho njalo iN: Yekela abantu bami bahambe ukuze bangikhonze.
Uba-ke usala ukubayekela bahambe.

Njalo umfula uzanyakazela ngamaxoxo, azakhuphuka, angene endlini yakho, lekamelweni lakho lokulala, laphezu kombheda wakho, lendlini yenceku zakho, laphezu kwesizwe sakho, lemaziko akho, lemiganwini yakho yokuxovela ukudla;
lamaxoxo azakhuphukela kuwe, lesizweni sakho lezincekwini zakho zonke.
yasisithi kuMozisi: Tshono kuAroni uthi: Yelula isandla sakho ngentonga yakho phezu kwemifula, phezu kwezifula, laphezu kweziziba, wenze amaxoxo akhuphukele elizweni leGibhithe.
UAroni waseselula isandla sakhe phezu kwamanzi eGibhithe; lamaxoxo akhuphuka, asibekela ilizwe leGibhithe.
Labalumbi benza njalo ngamalumbo abo, benza amaxoxo akhuphukela elizweni leGibhithe.
UFaro wasebabiza oMozisi loAroni wathi: Ncengani ukuthi isuse amaxoxo kimi lesizweni sami; njalo ngizayekela isizwe sihambe ukuthi bahlabele iN.
UMozisi wasesithi kuFaro: Woba lodumo ngaphezu kwami. Ngizakuncengela nini lenceku zakho, lesizwe sakho, ukuchitha amaxoxo asuke kuwe lendlini zakho, asale emfuleni kuphela?
Wasesithi: Kusasa. Wathi-ke: Njengelizwi lakho, ukuze wazi ukuthi kakho onjengeN uNkulunkulu wethu.
Njalo amaxoxo azasuka kuwe lezindlini zakho lezincekwini zakho lesizweni sakho, asale emfuleni kuphela.
UMozisi loAroni basebephuma kuFaro. UMozisi wakhala eNni ngenxa yamaxoxo eyayiwabekile phezu kukaFaro.
yenza-ke njengelizwi likaMozisi; amaxoxo asesifa ephuma ezindlini, emagumeni lemasimini.
Basebewabuthelela inqwaba ngenqwaba; lelizwe laba levumba.
Kodwa uFaro ebona ukuthi sekungcono, ukuthi kabalalelanga, njengokutsho kweN.
yasisithi kuMozisi: Tshono kuAroni uthi: Yelula intonga yakho, utshaye uthuli lomhlaba, ukuze lube yimiyane elizweni lonke leGibhithe.
Basebesenza njalo; ngoba uAroni welula isandla sakhe; lonke uthuli lwaba yimiyane elizweni lonke leGibhithe.
Labalumbi benza njalo ngamalumbo abo ukuveza imiyane, kodwa babengeke. Ngakho imiyane yaba sebantwini lezifuyweni.
Labalumbi bathi kuFaro: Lokhu kungumunwe kaNkulunkulu, kazabezwa, njengokutsho kweN.
yasisithi kuMozisi: Vuka ekuseni kakhulu, uzimise phambi kukaFaro.

Ngoba uba ungasiyekeli isizwe sami sihambe, khangela ngizathumela umtshitshi wezibawu kuwe lezincekwini zakho lesizweni sakho lendlini zakho; lezindlu zamaGibhithe zizagcwala umtshitshi wezibawu futhi lomhlabathi ezikuwo.
Kodwa ngalolosuku ngizakwehlukanisa ilizwe leGosheni.
Njalo ngizamisa umehluko phakathi kwesizwe sami lesizwe sakho; kusasa kuzakuba lesibonakaliso lesi.
yasisenza njalo; kwasekufika umtshitshi onzima wezibawu endlini kaFaro lezindlini zezinceku zakhe lelizweni lonke leGibhithe; ilizwe lonakala ngenxa yomtshitshi wezibawu.
UFaro wasebabiza oMozisi loAroni, wathi: Hambani, lihlabele uNkulunkulu wenu kulelilizwe.
Kodwa uMozisi wathi: Kakulunganga ukwenza njalo, ngoba sizahlabela eNni uNkulunkulu wethu okunengekayo kwamaGibhithe?
Sizahamba ummango wensuku ezintathu enkangala, sihlabele-ke uNkulunkulu wethu njengoba izakutsho kithi.
UFaro wasesithi: Mina ngizaliyekela lihambe ukuthi lihlabele uNkulunkulu wenu enkangala; kodwa lingayi khatshana kakhulu; lingincengele.

UMozisi wasesithi: Khangela, ngiyasuka kuwe, ngizayincenga ukuze umtshitshi wezibawu usuke kuFaro, ezincekwini zakhe, lesizweni sakhe kusasa; kuphela uFaro angaphindi akhohlise ngokungayekeli isizwe sihambe, sihlabele iN.
UMozisi wasephuma kuFaro, wayincenga iN.
yasisenza njengelizwi likaMozisi; yasusa umtshitshi wezibawu kuFaro, ezincekwini zakhe lesizweni sakhe; kakusalanga lesisodwa.
Kodwa uFaro wenza inhliziyo yakhe yaba nzima langalesisikhathi, kayekelanga isizwe sihambe.
yasisithi kuMozisi: Yana kuFaro, ithi: Yekela abantu bami bahambe ukuthi bangikhonze.
Ngoba uba usala ukubayekela bahambe, ulokhu ubabambile,
khangela, isandla seN sizakuba phezu kwezifuyo zakho ezisegangeni, phezu kwamabhiza, phezu kwabobabhemi, phezu kwamakamela, phezu kwenkomo laphezu kwezimvu, umatshayabhuqe wesifo onzima kakhulu.
Kodwa izakwenza umehluko phakathi kwezifuyo zakoIsrayeli lezifuyo zeGibhithe, kuze kuthi kakuyikufa lutho kukho konke okwabantwana bakoIsrayeli.
yasimisa isikhathi esimisiweyo, isithi: Kusasa izakwenza linto elizweni.
yayenza-ke linto kusisa; lazo zonke izifuyo zeGibhithe zafa; kodwa kakufanga lesisodwa ezifuyweni zabantwana bakoIsrayeli.
UFaro wasethuma, khangela-ke, kakufanga ngitsho lesisodwa ezifuyweni zakoIsrayeli. Kodwa inhliziyo kaFaro yaba nzima, kasiyekelanga isizwe sihambe.
yasisithi kuMozisi lakuAroni: Zithatheleni izandla zenu ezigcweleyo zomlotha weziko, njalo uMozisi awutsahazele emazulwini phambi kwamehlo kaFaro.
Njalo uzakuba luthuli olucolekileyo phezu kwelizwe lonke leGibhithe, njalo luzakuba phezu kwabantu laphezu kwezifuyo lube lithumba eliphihlika amathuthuva elizweni lonke leGibhithe.
Basebethatha umlotha weziko, bema phambi kukaFaro; uMozisi wasewutsahazela emazulwini, waba lithumba eliphihlika amathuthuva ebantwini lezifuyweni.
Njalo abalumbi babengeme phambi kukaMozisi ngenxa yamathumba; ngoba amathumba ayephezu kwabalumbi laphezu kwawo wonke amaGibhithe.
Kodwa yayenza yaba lukhuni inhliziyo kaFaro, njalo kazabezwa, njengokutsho kweN kuMozisi.
yasisithi kuMozisi: Vuka ekuseni kakhulu, uzimise phambi kukaFaro uthi kuye.
Ngoba ngalesisikhathi ngizathumela zonke inhlupheko zami enhliziyweni yakho laphezu kwenceku zakho laphezu kwesizwe sakho, ukuze wazi ukuthi kakho onjengami emhlabeni wonke.
Ngoba khathesi ngizaselula isandla sami ukuze ngikutshaye lesizwe sakho ngomatshayabhuqe wesifo, ubusuchitheka usuke emhlabeni.
Kodwa isibili ngalokhu ngikumisile ukuze ngikutshengise amandla ami lokuze ibizo lami lilandiswe emhlabeni wonke.
Usaziphakamisa umelana labantu bami, ukuthi ungabayekeli bahambe yini?
Khangela, kusasa ngalesisikhathi ngizanisa isiqhotho esinzima kakhulu, esingazanga sibe khona esinjalo eGibhithe kusukela ngosuku lisekelwa kuze kube khathesi.
Khathesi-ke thuma, ubuthe izifuyo zakho lakho konke olakho ensimini; wonke umuntu layo yonke inyamazana okuficwa ensimini okungabuthelwanga ekhaya, nxa isiqhotho siwela phezu kwakho, kuzakufa.
Lowo olesabayo ilizwi leN phakathi kwenceku zikaFaro wenza izisebenzi zakhe lezifuyo zakhe zibalekele ezindlini;
kodwa lowo ongabekanga inhliziyo yakhe elizwini leN watshiya izisebenzi zakhe lezifuyo zakhe ensimini.

yasisithi kuMozisi: Yelulela isandla sakho emazulwini, ukuze kube khona isiqhotho elizweni lonke leGibhithe, phezu kwabantu laphezu kwezinyamazana laphezu kwemibhida yonke yensimu elizweni leGibhithe.
UMozisi waseselulela intonga yakhe emazulwini; yasiletha imidumo lesiqhotho; lomlilo wehlela emhlabeni; leN yanisa isiqhotho elizweni leGibhithe.
Kwasekusiba khona isiqhotho, lomlilo uzixubanise esiqhothweni; okunzima kakhulu; okungazanga kube khona okunjengakho elizweni lonke leGibhithe selokhu laba yisizwe.
Isiqhotho sasesitshaya elizweni lonke leGibhithe konke okusegangeni, kusukela ebantwini kusiya ezinyamazaneni; lesiqhotho satshaya wonke umbhida weganga, sephula sonke isihlahla seganga.
Kuphela elizweni leGosheni lapho ababekhona abantwana bakoIsrayeli kwakungekho isiqhotho.
UFaro wasethuma wabiza uMozisi loAroni, wathi kubo: Ngonile ngalesisikhathi.
Ncengani iN, ngoba sekwanele, ukuze kungabi lemidumo elamandla lesiqhotho; besengiliyekela lihambe, lingabe lisahlala.
UMozisi wasesithi kuye: Nxa sengiphumile emzini, ngizachaya izandla zami eNni.
Kodwa wena lenceku zakho, ngiyazi ukuthi kalikayesabi uNkulunkulu.
Kwasekutshaywa ifilakisi lebhali; ngoba ibhali yayisesikwetshini, lefilakisi yayisithela amaluba.
Kodwa ingqoloyi lespelite kakutshaywanga, ngoba kwakungakavuthwa.
UMozisi wasephuma emzini evela kuFaro, wachaya izandla zakhe eNni; kwasekusima imidumo lesiqhotho, lezulu kalabe li sa thululeka emhlabeni.
Kwathi uFaro esebonile ukuthi izulu lesiqhotho lemidumo sekumile, wengezelela ukona, wayenza yaba nzima inhliziyo yakhe, yena lenceku zakhe.
Njalo inhliziyo kaFaro yaba lukhuni, kazabayekela abantwana bakoIsrayeli bahambe, njengalokhu yayitshilo ngesandla sikaMozisi.
yasisithi kuMozisi: Yana kuFaro, ngoba mina ngenze inhliziyo yakhe yaba nzima lenhliziyo yenceku zakhe, ukuze ngenze lezizibonakaliso zami phambi kwakhe,
lokuthi ulandise endlebeni zendodana yakho lendodana yendodana yakho lezibonakaliso zami engizenze phakathi kwawo, ukuze lazi ukuthi ngiyiN.
UMozisi loAroni basebesiya kuFaro, bathi kuye: Itsho njalo iN, uNkulunkulu wamaHebheru, ithi: Koze kube nini usala ukuzithoba phambi kwami? Yekela isizwe sami sihambe, bangikhonze.
Ngoba uba usala ukuyekela isizwe sami sihambe, khangela, kusasa ngizaletha isikhonyane emngceleni wakho,
njalo sizasibekela ubuso bomhlaba ukuze ungawuboni umhlaba, sizakudla insalela yokwaphephayo, okwalisalelayo esiqhothweni, sidle sonke isihlahla esikhulela wena ensimini.

Sizagcwalisa izindlu zakho lezindlu zezinceku zakho zonke lezindlu zawo wonke amaGibhithe, oyihlo abangazanga basibone laboyise baboyihlo, kusukela ngosuku ababakhona emhlabeni kuze kube lamuhla. Wasetshibilika, waphuma kuFaro.
Lenceku zikaFaro zathi kuye: Koze kube nini lo esiba ngumjibila kithi? Yekela amadoda ahambe, akhonze uNkulunkulu wawo; kawukazi yini ukuthi iGibhithe isichithekile?
UMozisi loAroni babuyiselwa kuFaro; wasesithi kubo: Hambani likhonze uNkulunkulu wenu. Ngobani kanye labo abazahamba?
UMozisi wasesithi: Sizahamba labatsha bethu labadala bethu, lamadodana ethu lamadodakazi ethu, lezimvu zethu lenkomo zethu sizahamba, ngoba silomkhosi weN.
Wasesithi kubo: ibe lani ngokunjalo, njengoba ngizaliyekela lihambe labantwanyana benu! Bonani ngoba kulokubi phambi kwenu.
Kungabi njalo! Hambani khathesi, madoda, liyikhonze iN, ngoba yikho elikudingayo. Basebebaxotsha ebusweni bukaFaro.
yasisithi kuMozisi: Yelula isandla sakho phezu kwelizwe leGibhithe.
UMozisi waseyelula intonga yakhe phezu kwelizwe leGibhithe; yasiqhuba umoya wempumalanga elizweni, lonke lolosuku lobusuku bonke; kwasekusithi ekuseni, umoya wempumalanga wenyusa isikhonyane.
Isikhonyane sasesisenyukela phezu kwelizwe lonke leGibhithe.

Ngoba sasibekela ubuso belizwe lonke, kwaze kwafiphazwa ilizwe; sadla wonke umbhida welizwe laso sonke isithelo sezihlahla isiqhotho esasitshiyayo; kakusalanga lutho oluluhlaza esihlahleni, lombhida weganga, elizweni lonke leGibhithe.
UFaro wasephangisa ukubabiza oMozisi loAroni, wathi: Ngonile eNni uNkulunkulu wenu lakini.
Khathesi-ke ake lithethelele isono sami okwalesisikhathi kuphela, liyincenge uNkulunkulu wenu ukuthi isuse kimi lokhu ukufa kuphela.
Wasephuma kuFaro, wayincenga iN.
yasiphendula umoya wentshonalanga olamandla kakhulu owenyusa isikhonyane, wasiphosela oLwandle oluBomvu; kakusalanga sikhonyane lesisodwa kuwo wonke umngcele weGibhithe.
Kodwa yayenza lukhuni inhliziyo kaFaro, kazabayekela abantwana bakoIsrayeli bahambe.
yasisithi kuMozisi: Yelulela isandla sakho emazulwini, ukuze kube khona umnyama phezu kwelizwe leGibhithe, ngitsho umnyama ophumputhekayo.
UMozisi waseselulela isandla sakhe emazulwini; kwasekusiba khona umnyama wobumnyama elizweni lonke leGibhithe insuku ezintathu.
Kababonananga, futhi kakusukumanga muntu endaweni yakhe okwensuku ezintathu; kodwa kubo bonke abantwana bakoIsrayeli kwakukhona ukukhanya emizini yabo.
UFaro wasembiza uMozisi wathi: Hambani likhonze iN KOSI.
Kodwa uMozisi wathi: Lawe ubonika imihlatshelo leminikelo yokutshiswa ezandleni zethu, esizayenzela uNkulunkulu wethu.
Njalo lezifuyo zethu zizahamba kanye lathi, kakuyikusala emuva isondo; ngoba sizathatha kuzo ukukhonza uNkulunkulu wethu, ngoba kasikwazi esizakhonza ngakho size sifike khona.
Kodwa yenza lukhuni inhliziyo kaFaro, njalo kafunanga ukubayekela bahambe.
UFaro wasesithi kuye: Suka kimi, uziqaphele, ungaboni ubuso bami futhi; ngoba mhla ubona ubuso bami uzakufa.
UMozisi wasesithi: Ukhulume ngokuqonda, kangisayikubona futhi ubuso bakho.
yasisithi kuMozisi: Ngisezakwehlisela kuFaro lakulo iGibhithe inhlupheko eyodwa.
Ake ukhulume endlebeni zabantu, ukuthi bacele, ngulowo kumakhelwane wakhe, lalowo owesifazana kumakhelwane wakhe, izinto zesiliva lezinto zegolide.
yasinika abantu umusa emehlweni amaGibhithe. Futhi indoda uMozisi waba mkhulu kakhulu elizweni leGibhithe emehlweni enceku zikaFaro lemehlweni esizwe.
UMozisi wasesithi: Itsho njalo ithi: Phose phakathi kobusuku ngizaphuma ngiye phakathi kweGibhithe;

Lawo wonke amazibulo elizweni leGibhithe azakufa, kusukela kuzibulo likaFaro elizahlala esihlalweni sakhe sobukhosi, kuze kube kuzibulo lencekukazi engemva kwelitshe lokuchola, lamazibulo wonke ezifuyo.
Njalo kuzakuba khona isililo esikhulu elizweni lonke leGibhithe, esingazanga sibe khona esinjengaso, lesingayikuba khona futhi esinjengaso.
Kodwa ebantwaneni bakoIsrayeli inja kayiyikunyikinya ulimi lwayo.
Lazo zonke izinceku zakho lezi zizakwehlela kimi, zingikhothamele zisithi: Phuma wena lesizwe sonke esikulandelayo. Langemva kwalokho ngizaphuma. Wasephuma kuFaro ekuvutheni kolaka.
yasisithi kuMozisi: UFaro kayikulizwa.
OMozisi loAroni basebesenza zonke lezizimangaliso phambi kukaFaro, kodwa yenza inhliziyo kaFaro yaba lukhuni, kazabayekela abantwana bakoIsrayeli baphume elizweni lakhe.
yasikhuluma kuMozisi lakuAroni elizweni leGibhithe, isithi:
Le inyanga kayibe kini yinhloko yezinyanga, ibe kini ngeyokuqala yenyanga zomnyaka.
Khulumani kunhlangano yonke yakoIsrayeli lithi: Ngolwetshumi lwalinyanga bazazithathela ngulowo iwundlu, ngokwezindlu zaboyise, iwundlu ngendlu.
Uba-ke indlu incinyane kakhulu ewundlwini, kakuthi yena athathe lomakhelwane wakhe, oseduze lendlu yakhe, njengobunengi bemiphefumulo; ngulowo njengokudla kwakhe, lizabalela iwundlu.
Lizakuba lezinyane elingelasici, eliduna, elilomnyaka owodwa; lithatheni ezimvini loba ezimbuzini.
Njalo lizaligcina kuze kufike usuku lwetshumi lane lwaleyonyanga, njalo ibandla lonke lenhlangano yakoIsrayeli izalihlaba kusihlwa.
Bazathatha-ke okwegazi, bakufake emigubazini yomibili lekhothameni, ezindlini abazalidlela kuzo.
Njalo bazakudla inyama ngalobobusuku, yosiwe ngomlilo, lesinkwa esingelamvubelo, lemibhida ebabayo baza yi dla.
Lingadli okwalo kuluhlaza kumbe kuphekiwe lokuphekwa ngamanzi.
Njalo lingatshiyi lutho kulo kuze kube sekuseni, kodwa okusalayo kulo kuze kube sekuseni lizakutshisa ngomlilo.
Ngokunjalo-ke lizalidla, inkalo zenu zibotshiwe, izicathulo zenu zisenyaweni zenu, lendondolo zenu zisezandleni zenu; lizalidla ngokuphangisa; kuliphasika leN.
Ngoba ngizadabula phakathi kwelizwe leGibhithe ngalobubusuku.
Legazi lizakuba kini yisibonakaliso ezindlini lapho elikhona; nxa ngibona igazi ngizadlula phezu kwenu, njalo kungehleli kini inhlupheko yokuchitha, mhla ngitshaya ilizwe leGibhithe.
Njalo lolusuku luzakuba kini yisikhumbuzo.
Insuku eziyisikhombisa lizakudla isinkwa esingelamvubelo.

Njalo ngosuku lokuqala kuzakuba khona inhlangano ebiziweyo engcwele, langosuku lwesikhombisa lizakuba lenhlangano ebiziweyo engcwele; kungenziwa msebenzi ngazo, kuphela lokho wonke umphefumulo okudlayo, lokho kodwa kungenziwa yini.
Ngakho gcinani izinkwa ezingelamvubelo; ngoba ngalona lolosuku ngikhuphile amabutho enu elizweni leGibhithe.
Kweyokuqala, osukwini lwetshumi lane lwenyanga kusihlwa lizakudla isinkwa esingelamvubelo, kuze kufike usuku lwamatshumi amabili lanye lwenyanga kusihlwa.
Insuku eziyisikhombisa kakungaficwa imvubelo ezindlini zenu; ngoba wonke odla okuvutshelweyo lowomphefumulo uzaqunywa usuke kunhlangano yakoIsrayeli, loba engowemzini loba engowokuzalwa elizweni.
Lingadli lutho oluvutshelweyo; emizini yenu yonke lizakudla isinkwa esingelamvubelo.
UMozisi wasebiza bonke abadala bakoIsrayeli, wathi kubo: Hudulani lizithathele amawundlu ngokwensapho zenu, lihlabe iphasika,
lithathe ilixha lehisope ngegazi elisemganwini; lina-ke, kakungaphumi muntu endlini yakhe kuze kube sekuseni.
Ngoba izadabula ukutshaya amaGibhithe; nxa ibona igazi ekhothameni lemigubazini yomibili, izadlula phezu komnyango, ingavumeli umchithi ukuthi angene ezindlini zenu ukutshaya.
Njalo lizagcina le into, kube yisimiso kini lakubantwana benu kuze kube phakade.
Njalo kuzakuthi lapho lifika elizweni ezalinika lona njengokukhuluma kwayo, lizagcina linkonzo.
Kuzakuthi-ke lapho abantwana benu besithi kini: Iyini linkonzo elilayo?
Lizakuthi-ke: Lo ngumhlatshelo wephasika leN KOSI.
Abantwana bakoIsrayeli basebehamba, bayakwenza njengalokhu yayibalayile oMozisi loAroni, benza njalo.
Kwasekusithi phakathi kobusuku.
UFaro wasesukuma ebusuku, yena lenceku zakhe zonke lamaGibhithe wonke. Kwasekusiba khona isililo esikhulu eGibhithe, ngoba kwakungekho ndlu lapho okwakungelamufi khona.
Wasebiza oMozisi loAroni ebusuku, wathi: Sukumani, liphume phakathi kwabantu bami, lonke lina labantwana bakoIsrayeli, lihambe liyekhonza njengokutsho kwenu.
Thathani lani izimvu zenu lenkomo zenu njengokutsho kwenu, lihambe; futhi lingibusise lami.
Njalo amaGibhithe ayebakhuthaza abantu ebahaluzelisa ukuthi baphume elizweni, ngoba athi: Sonke sifile.
Abantu-ke bathatha inhlama yabo ingakavutshelwa, betshata imiganu yabo yokuxovela ibotshelwe ezembathweni zabo.
Abantwana bakoIsrayeli basebesenza njengelizwi likaMozisi; bacela kumaGibhithe izinto zesiliva lezinto zegolide lezigqoko.
yasibapha abantu umusa emehlweni amaGibhithe.
Abantwana bakoIsrayeli basebesuka eRamesesi, ngaphandle kwabantwana.
Kwasekusenyuka labo lexuku lenhlobonhlobo, lezimvu lezinkomo, lezifuyo ezinengi kakhulu.
Basebebhaka izinkwa ezingelamvubelo ngenhlama abayikhupha eGibhithe, ngoba ingavutshelwanga, ngoba baxotshwa eGibhithe, ngoba babengelakulibala, futhi bengazilungiselelanga umphako.
Isikhathi sokuhlala-ke kwabantwana bakoIsrayeli abasihlala eGibhithe sasiyiminyaka engamakhulu amane lamatshumi amathathu.
Kwasekusithi ekupheleni kweminyaka engamakhulu amane lamatshumi amathathu, kwathi ngalona lolosuku wonke amabutho eN aphuma elizweni leGibhithe.
Kuyibusuku bemilindo eNni ngokubakhupha elizweni leGibhithe; lobu yibusuku beN bemilindo yabo bonke abantwana bakoIsrayeli ezizukulwaneni zabo.
yasisithi kuMozisi loAroni: Lesi yisimiso sephasika. Kakho owezizwe ongalidla;
kodwa sonke isigqili sawo wonke umuntu, esathengwa ngemali, nxa usisokile, ngalesosikhathi sizakudla kulo.
Owezizwe loqatshiweyo bangadli kulo.
Lizadlelwa endlini yinye; ungakhupheli phandle kwendlu okwenyama, ungephuli thambo lalo.
Inhlangano yonke yakoIsrayeli izakwenza lokhu.
Uba owemzini ohlala lani njengowezizwe; kodwa kakho ongasokwanga ozalidla.
Umlayo munye uzakuba kowokuzalwa elizweni lakowemzini ohlala phakathi kwenu njengowezizwe.
Bonke abantwana bakoIsrayeli basebesenza njengalokhu yayibalayile oMozisi loAroni; benza njalo.
Kwasekusithi ngalona lolosuku yabakhupha abantwana bakoIsrayeli elizweni leGibhithe ngamabutho abo.
yasikhuluma kuMozisi isithi:
Ngingcwelisela lonke izibulo, elivula loba yisiphi isizalo phakathi kwabantwana bakoIsrayeli, elomuntu lelenyamazana, lingelami.
UMozisi wasesithi ebantwini: Khumbulani lolusuku eliphume ngalo eGibhithe, endlini yobugqili.
Ngalolusuku liyaphuma ngenyanga kaAbhibhi.
Njalo kuzakuthi lapho isikungenisile elizweni lamaKhanani lamaHethi lamaAmori lamaHivi lamaJebusi.
Insuku eziyisikhombisa uzakudla izinkwa ezingelamvubelo, langosuku lwesikhombisa kuzakuba khona umkhosi eNni.
Izinkwa ezingelamvubelo zizadliwa ngensuku eziyisikhombisa; njalo kakuyikubonwa kuwe okuvutshelweyo lemvubelo kayiyikubonwa kuwe kuwo wonke umngcele wakho.
Njalo uzatshela indodana yakho ngalolosuku usithi: Ngenxa yalokho eyakwenza kimi ekuphumeni kwami eGibhithe.
Futhi kuzakuba kuwe luphawu phezu kwesandla sakho phakathi laphakathi kwamehlo akho, ukuze umlayo weN ube semlonyeni wakho; ngoba ngesandla esilamandla ikukhuphile eGibhithe.
Ngakho uzagcina lesisimiso ngesikhathi saso esimisiweyo iminyaka ngeminyaka.
Njalo kuzakuthi lapho isikungenisile elizweni lamaKhanani, njengokufunga kwayo kuwe lakuboyihlo, isikunike lona,
uzakwehlukanisela konke okuvula isizalo; lalo lonke izibulo lomqegu wezifuyo olazo, amaduna azakuba ngaweN.
Lalo lonke izibulo likababhemi uzalihlenga ngewundlu.
Njalo kuzakuthi lapho indodana yakho ikubuza ngesikhathi esizayo isithi: Kuyini lokhu.
Ngoba kwathi uFaro ezenza lukhuni ukuthi asiyekele sihambe, yabulala lonke izibulo elizweni leGibhithe.
Njalo kuzakuba luphawu phezu kwesandla sakho lamafilakteriyu phakathi laphakathi kwamehlo akho, ngoba ngamandla esandla yasikhupha eGibhithe.

Kwasekusithi uFaro eseyekele abantu bahambe, uNkulunkulu kabakhokhelanga nge ndlela yelizwe lamaFilisti, lanxa yayiseduze; ngoba uNkulunkulu wathi: Hlezi abantu bazisole nxa bebona impi, babuyele eGibhithe.
Kodwa uNkulunkulu wababhodisa abantu ngendlela yenkangala yoLwandle oluBomvu. Abantwana bakoIsrayeli basebesenyuka besuka elizweni leGibhithe behlomile.

UMozisi wasethatha amathambo kaJosefa wahamba lawo, ngoba wayebafungisile lokubafungisa abantwana bakoIsrayeli esithi: Isibili uNkulunkulu uzalihambela; futhi kalibokwenyusa lapha amathambo ami lihambe lawo.
Basebesuka eSukothi, bamisa inkamba eEthama, ekucineni kwenkangala.
yasihamba phambi kwabo emini ngensika yeyezi ukubakhokhela endleleni, lebusuku ngensika yomlilo ukubakhanyisela, ukuze bahambe emini lebusuku.
Kayiyisusanga insika yeyezi emini, lensika yomlilo ebusuku, phambi kwabantu.
yasikhuluma kuMozisi isithi:
Tshela abantwana bakoIsrayeli ukuthi baphenduke, bamise inkamba phambi kwePi-Hahirothi, phambi kweBhali-Zefoni, maqondana layo limise inkamba elwandle.
Njalo uFaro uzakuthi ngabantwana bakoIsrayeli: Badidekile elizweni, inkangala ibavalele.
Njalo ngizayenza lukhuni inhliziyo kaFaro. Basebesenza njalo.

Kwathi sekubikiwe enkosini yeGibhithe ukuthi abantu babalekile, inhliziyo kaFaro lenhliziyo yenceku zakhe yaguquka mayelana labantu, basebesithi: Kuyini lokho esikwenzileyo, ukuthi siyekele uIsrayeli ahambe angasisebenzeli?
Wasebophela inqola yakhe, wathatha abantu bakhe laye.
Wasethatha inqola ezingamakhulu ayisithupha ezikhethiweyo lazo zonke inqola zeGibhithe lenduna eziphezu kwazo zonke.
yasiyenza lukhuni inhliziyo kaFaro inkosi yeGibhithe.
Kodwa amaGibhithe asexotshana labo, amabhiza wonke, izinqola zikaFaro, labagadi bakhe bamabhiza, lebutho lakhe, abafica bemise inkamba elwandle, eceleni kwePi-Hahirothi phambi kweBhali-Zefoni.
Kwathi uFaro esesondele, abantwana bakoIsrayeli baphakamisa amehlo abo, khangela-ke, amaGibhithe ehamba ebalandela, basebesesaba kakhulu. Abantwana bakoIsrayeli basebekhala eNni;
bathi kuMozisi ukuthi usithethe ukuze sifele enkangala? Kuyini lokhu okwenze kithi, ukusikhupha eGibhithe?
Kayisilo leli ilizwi esalikhuluma kuwe eGibhithe sisithi: Siyekele ukuthi sisebenzele amaGibhithe? Ngoba bekuzakuba ngcono kithi ukuthi sisebenzele amaGibhithe kulokuthi sifele enkangala.
UMozisi wasesithi ebantwini: Lingesabi; manini liqine, libone usindiso lweN ezalenzela lona lamuhla; ngoba amaGibhithe eliwabonayo lamuhla, kalisayikuwabona futhi kuze kube laphakade.
izalilwela.
yasisithi kuMozisi: Ukhalelani kimi? Tshela abantwana bakoIsrayeli ukuthi baqhubekele phambili.
Wena-ke, phakamisa intonga yakho, welulele isandla sakho phezu kolwandle uludabule, ukuze abantwana bakoIsrayeli bahambe phakathi kolwandle emhlabathini owomileyo.
Mina-ke, khangela, ngizayenza lukhuni inhliziyo yamaGibhithe.
Njalo amaGibhithe azakwazi ukuthi ngiysengidunyiswe ngoFaro, ngezinqola zakhe langabagadi bamabhiza bakhe.
Njalo ingilosi kaNkulunkulu eyayihamba phambi kwebutho lakoIsrayeli yasuka yayahamba ngemva kwabo; lensika yeyezi yasuka phambi kwabo, yema ngemva kwabo,
yasisiza phakathi kwebutho lamaGibhithe lebutho lakoIsrayeli. Njalo yayiliyezi lobumnyama, kodwa yakhanyisa ubusuku, okokuthi elinye kalisondelanga kwelinye ubusuku bonke.
UMozisi waseselulela isandla sakhe phezu kolwandle.
Abantwana bakoIsrayeli basebengena olwandle emhlabathini owomileyo; njalo amanzi aba ngumduli kubo ngakwesokunene sabo langakwesokhohlo sabo.
AmaGibhithe asexotshana labo, angena ngemva kwabo, wonke amabhiza kaFaro, inqola zakhe labagadi bamabhiza bakhe, phakathi kolwandle.
Kwasekusithi ngomlindo wokusa, yakhangela phansi ebuthweni lamaGibhithe isensikeni yomlilo leyeyezi, yalidunga ibutho lamaGibhithe;
yakhupha amavili ezinqola zawo ukuze zihambe nzima, aze athi amaGibhithe: Asibalekele ubuso bukaIsrayeli, ngoba iyabalwela imelene lamaGibhithe.
yasisithi kuMozisi: Yelulela isandla sakho phezu kolwandle ukuze amanzi abuyele phezu kwamaGibhithe, phezu kwenqola zawo laphezu kwabagadi bawo bamabhiza.
UMozisi waseselulela isandla sakhe phezu kolwandle.
Amanzi asebuyela.
Kodwa abantwana bakoIsrayeli bahamba phezu komhlabathi owomileyo phakathi kolwandle; njalo amanzi aba ngumduli kubo ngakwesokunene sabo langakwesokhohlo sabo.
Ngokunjalo yamsindisa uIsrayeli ngalolosuku esandleni samaGibhithe; njalo uIsrayeli wabona amaGibhithe efile ekhunjini lolwandle.
UIsrayeli wasebona amandla amakhulu eyawenzayo kumaGibhithe. Abantu basebeyesaba iN, bakholwa eNni, lakuMozisi inceku yayo.
Khona oMozisi labantwana bakoIsrayeli bahlabelela lelihubo eNni, ngoba iphakeme isibili. Ibhiza lomgadi walo ikuphosele olwandle.
ingamandla lehubo lami.
yindoda yempi.
Inqola zikaFaro lebutho lakhe ikuphosele olwandle.
Inziki zabasibekela.
Isandla sakho sokunene, N, sidunyisiwe ngamandla; isandla sakho sokunene, N, sisiphahlazile isitha.
Njalo ngobukhulu bokuphakama kwakho.
Langokuvuthela kwamakhala akho; izinziki zajiya enhliziyweni yolwandle.
Isitha sathi: Ngizaxotsha; isiloyiso sami sizasutha bona, ngizahwatsha inkemba yami, isandla sami sizababhubhisa.
Waphephetha ngomoya wakho, ulwandle lwabasibekela; batshona njengomnuso emanzini alamandla.
Ngubani onjengawe?
Welulile isandla sakho sokunene, umhlaba wabaginya.
Ukhokhele.
Izizwe zizwile, ziyathuthumela abahlali beFilisti.
Ngalesosikhathi izinduna.
Ukwethuka.
Uzabangenisa, ubahlanyele eziyimisileyo izandla zakho, Nkosi.
izabusa kuze kube phakade lanininini.
Ngoba ibhiza likaFaro, kodwa abantwana bakoIsrayeli bahamba emhlabathini owomileyo phakathi kolwandle.
UMiriyamu umprofethikazi.
UMiriyamu wasebaphendula, ngoba inqobe ngodumo. Ibhiza lomgadi walo ikuphosele olwandle.
UMozisi wasemkhokhela uIsrayeli eqhubeka esuka eLwandle oluBomvu, baphuma baya enkangala yeShuri; bahamba insuku ezintathu enkangala, kabatholanga manzi.
Kwathi lapho befika eMara babengelakuwanatha amanzi eMara, ngoba ayebaba; ngakho ibizo layo lathiwa yiMara.
Abantu basebekhonona bemelene loMozisi besithi: Sizanathani?
Wasekhala eNni,
yasisithi: Uba lilalela lokulalela ilizwi leN uNkulunkulu wenu.
Basebefika eElimi lapho okwakukhona imithombo elitshumi lambili yamanzi, lezihlahla zelala ezingamatshumi ayisikhombisa; basebemisa inkamba khona emanzini.

Basebesuka eElimi, lenhlangano yonke yabantwana bakoIsrayeli yafika enkangala yeSini, ephakathi kweElimi leSinayi, ngosuku lwetshumi lanhlanu lwenyanga yesibili emva kokuphuma kwabo elizweni leGibhithe.
Lenhlangano yonke yabantwana bakoIsrayeli yakhonona imelana loMozisi loAroni enkangala.

Abantwana bakoIsrayeli basebesithi kubo: Kungathi ngabe safa ngesandla seN elizweni leGibhithe lapho sasihlezi embizeni zenyama, lapho sadla isinkwa sasutha; ngoba lisikhuphele kulinkangala ukuze libulale lelibandla lonke ngendlala.
yasisithi kuMozisi: Khangela, ngizalinisela isinkwa sivela emazulwini ukuthi bazahamba ngomlayo wami yini kumbe hayi.
Kuzakuthi-ke ngosuku lwesithupha bazalungisa lokho abakulethileyo, njalo kuzabe kuphindwe kabili kulokho abakubuthayo insuku ngensuku.
UMozisi loAroni basebesithi kubo bonke abantwana bakoIsrayeli: Kusihlwa;
njalo kusisa, khona lizabona inkazimulo yeN KOSI?

UMozisi wasesithi: Lapho ilinika inyama yokudla kusihlwa, lesinkwa ekuseni, ukuze lisuthe, ku ngoba izwile ukukhonona kwenu elikukhonona limelene layo. Ngoba thina siyini? Ukukhonona kwenu kakumelananga lathi, kodwa kumelene leN.
UMozisi wasesithi kuAroni, ngoba izwile ukukhonona kwenu.
Kwasekusithi uAroni esakhuluma kunhlangano yonke yabantwana bakoIsrayeli, bakhangela ngasenkangala, khangela-ke, inkazimulo yeN yabonakala eyezini.
yasikhuluma kuMozisi isithi:
Sengizwile ukukhonona kwabantwana bakoIsrayeli, njalo lizakwazi ukuthi ngiyuNkulunkulu wenu.
Kwasekusithi ntambama kwenyuka izagwaca, zasibekela inkamba; lakusisa kwakulomlalela wamazolo uzingelezele inkamba.
Kwathi umlalela wamazolo usuwenyukile, khangela-ke, phezu kobuso benkangala into eyisigaqa encinyane, incinyane njengongqwaqwane emhlabathini.
Kwathi abantwana bakoIsrayeli be zi bona bathi omunye komunye: Kuyini lokhu? Ngoba babengazi ukuthi kuyini. UMozisi wasesithi kubo: Kuyisinkwa elinike sona ukuze lidle.
Le yinto elilaye ngayo yathi: Ngulowo lalowo kabuthe kuyo okulingene ukudla kwakhe, i-omeri ngekhanda, njengenani lemiphefumulo yenu, ngulowo uzathathela abasethenteni lakhe.
Abantwana bakoIsrayeli basebesenza njalo, babutha, omunye okunengi lomunye okulutshwana.
Sebelinganise nge-omeri.
UMozisi wasesithi kubo: Kakungabi lamuntu otshiya kukho kuze kube sekuseni.
Kodwa kabamlalelanga uMozisi; kodwa abanye batshiya kukho kwaze kwaba sekuseni, kwasekuphethuza impethu, kwaba levumba. Ngakho uMozisi wabathukuthelela.
Bakubutha ukusa ngokusa, ngulowo lalowo okulingene ukudla kwakhe; lapho ilanga selitshisa, kwancibilika.
Kwasekusithi ngosuku lwesithupha babutha isinkwa esiphindwe kabili, ama-omeri amabili ngamunye. Njalo zonke izinduna zenhlangano zeza zamtshela uMozisi.
Wasesithi kuzo: Lokhu yikho ekutshiloyo: Kusasa yikuphumula, isabatha elingcwele leN. Bhakani elizakubhaka, lipheke elizakupheka, konke lokho okuseleyo lizibekele kugcinwe kuze kube sekuseni.
Basebekubeka kwaze kwaba sekuseni njengokulaya kukaMozisi. Njalo kakubanga levumba, kwakungelampethu kukho.
UMozisi wasesithi: Dlanini lokhu lamuhla, ngoba lamuhla kulisabatha leN; lamuhla kaliyikukuthola egangeni.
Lizakubutha insuku eziyisithupha; kodwa ngosuku lwesikhombisa, isabatha, kakuyikuba khona kulo.
Kwasekusithi ngosuku lwesikhombisa abanye babantu baphuma ukubutha, kodwa kaba ku tholanga.
yasisithi kuMozisi: Koze kube nini lisala ukugcina imilayo yami lemithetho yami?
Bonani, ngoba ilinikile isabatha, ngakho ilinika ngosuku lwesithupha isinkwa sensuku ezimbili; hlalani kube ngulowo lalowo endaweni yakhe, kakungaphumi muntu endaweni yakhe ngosuku lwesikhombisa.
Ngakho abantu baphumula ngosuku lwesikhombisa.
Indlu yakoIsrayeli yasibiza ibizo lakho ngokuthiyimana.

UMozisi wasesithi: Le yinto elaye ngayo ukuthi: Gcwalisani i-omeri ngayo igcinelwe izizukulwana zenu, ukuze zibone isinkwa engalinika sona ukuthi lidle enkangala ekulikhupheni kwami elizweni leGibhithe.
UMozisi wasesithi kuAroni: Thatha inqayi eyodwa, ufake kuyo i-omeri eligcwele imana, uyibeke phambi kweN, igcinelwe izizukulwana zenu.
Njengokulaya kweN kuMozisi, uAroni wayibeka phambi kobufakazi ukuze igcinwe.
Abantwana bakoIsrayeli-ke badla imana iminyaka engamatshumi amane. Badla imana baze bafika emngceleni welizwe leKhanani.
I-omeri-ke ingokwetshumi kwe-efa.
Inhlangano yonke yabantwana bakoIsrayeli yasuka enkangala yeSini, ngamalombolombo abo, ngokomlayo weN, bamisa inkamba eRefidimi; kodwa kwakungelamanzi okunatha abantu.
Ngakho abantu bamsola uMozisi bathi: Sinike amanzi, sinathe?
Abantu basebesomela amanzi lapho, abantu bangunguna kuMozisi bathi: Wasenyuselani eGibhithe ukuze usibulale thina labantwana bethu lezifuyo zethu ngokoma?
UMozisi wasekhala eNni.
yasisithi kuMozisi: Dlula phambi kwabantu, uthathe kanye lawe kubadala bakoIsrayeli, lentonga yakho owatshaya, ithathe ngesandla sakho, uhambe.
Khangela, ngizakuma lapho phambi kwakho phezu kwedwala eHorebe; njalo uzatshaya idwala, kuphume-ke kulo amanzi ukuze abantu banathe. UMozisi wasesenza njalo phambi kwamehlo abadala bakoIsrayeli.
Wasebiza ibizo lendawo ngokuthiyiMasa lo kuthiyiMeriba ngenxa yokusola kwabantwana bakoIsrayeli langenxa yokuyilinga kwabo besithi: iphakathi kwethu yini loba hatshi?
Kwasekufika uAmaleki, walwa loIsrayeli eRefidimi.
UMozisi wasesithi kuJoshuwa.
UJoshuwa wasesenza njengokutsho kukaMozisi kuye, walwa loAmaleki. OMozisi, uAroni loHuri basebesenyukela engqongeni yoqaqa.
Kwasekusithi lapho uMozisi ephakamisa isandla sakhe, uIsrayeli waba lamandla; kodwa lapho wehlisa isandla sakhe, uAmaleki waba lamandla.

Kodwa izandla zikaMozisi zaba nzima, ngakho bathatha ilitshe, balibeka ngaphansi kwakhe, ukuthi ahlale kulo. OAroni loHuri basebesekela izandla zakhe, omunye engapha lomunye engale, ukuze izandla zakhe ziqine lize litshone ilanga.
UJoshuwa wasemchitha uAmaleki labantu bakhe ngobukhali benkemba.
yasisithi kuMozisi: Bhala.
UMozisi wasesakha ilathi, wabiza ibizo lalo ngokuthi: UJehova-nisi;
wathi: Ngoba isandla sisesehlalweni sobukhosi seN, izakuba lempi imelene loAmaleki kusukela kusizukulwana kusiya kusizukulwana.
Kwathi uJetro, uyisezala kaMozisi, esezwile konke uNkulunkulu ayemenzele khona uMozisi loIsrayeli isizwe sakhe, ukuthi yayimkhuphile uIsrayeli eGibhithe,
uJetro uyisezala kaMozisi wathatha uZipora umkaMozisi emva kokumbuyisela kwakhe,
kanye lamadodana akhe amabili; obizo lenye lalinguGereshoma, ngoba wathi: Ngangingowemzini elizweni lemzini;
lebizo lenye linguEliyezeri, ngoba uNkulunkulu kababa wayelusizo lwami, wangikhulula enkembeni kaFaro.
UJetro uyisezala kaMozisi wasesiza lamadodana akhe lomkakhe kuMozisi enkangala, entabeni kaNkulunkulu lapho ayemise khona inkamba.
Wasesithi kuMozisi: Mina, uyihlozala, uJetro, ngiza kuwe lomkakho lamadodana akhe amabili elaye.
UMozisi wasephuma ukumhlangabeza uyisezala. Basebebuzana impilakahle; bangena ethenteni.
UMozisi wasemlandisela uyisezala ngakho konke eyayikwenzile kuFaro lakumaGibhithe ngenxa kaIsrayeli, yonke inhlupheko eyabehlela endleleni, lokuthi yayibakhulule.
UJetro wasethokoza ngakho konke okuhle eyayikwenzele uIsrayeli, ukuthi yayimkhulule esandleni samaGibhithe.
UJetro wasesithi: Ibusisiwe elikhulule esandleni samaGibhithe lesandleni sikaFaro; eyakhulula lesisizwe ngaphansi kwesandla samaGibhithe.
Khathesi sengisazi ukuthi inkulu kulabo bonke onkulunkulu, ngoba endabeni.
UJetro uyisezala kaMozisi wasethathela uNkulunkulu umnikelo wokutshiswa lemihlatshelo; kwasekusiza uAroni labo bonke abadala bakoIsrayeli ukudla isinkwa loyisezala kaMozisi phambi kukaNkulunkulu.
Kwasekusithi kusisa uMozisi wahlala ukwahlulela abantu; njalo abantu bema phambi kukaMozisi kusukela ekuseni kwaze kwahlwa.
Kwathi lapho uyisezala kaMozisi esekubonile konke akwenzela abantu wathi: Iyini linto oyenza ebantwini? Uhlalelani wedwa, labantu bonke bemi kuwe kusukela ekuseni kuze kuhlwe?
UMozisi wasesithi kuyisezala: Ngoba abantu beza kimi ukubuza kuNkulunkulu.
Nxa belendaba.
Uyisezala kaMozisi wasesithi kuye: Into oyenzayo kayinhle.
Isibili uzazidlakaza, wena-ke lalababantu abalawe; ngoba linto inzima kakhulu kuwe, kawulakukwenza wedwa.
Khathesi lalela ilizwi lami; ngizakweluleka, njalo uNkulunkulu abe lawe,
ubafundise izimiso lemithetho.
Futhi wena ubone phakathi kwabo bonke abantu amadoda alamandla, uwabeke phezu kwabo, induna zezinkulungwane, induna zamakhulu, induna zamatshumi amahlanu, lenduna zamatshumi;
ukuthi zahlulele abantu ngaso sonke isikhathi.
Uba usenza linto, loNkulunkulu ekulawula, uzakuba lamandla okuma.
UMozisi waselilalela ilizwi likayisezala, wenza konke ayekutshilo.
UMozisi wasekhetha amadoda alamandla kuye wonke uIsrayeli, wawabeka inhloko phezu kwabantu, induna zezinkulungwane, induna zamakhulu, induna zamatshumi amahlanu lenduna zamatshumi.
Zasezibahlulela abantu ngaso sonke isikhathi; zaletha kuMozisi indaba ezinzima, kodwa lonke udaba oluncinyane zalwahlulela zona.
UMozisi wasemyekela wahamba uyisezala; waya elizweni lakibo.
Ngenyanga yesithathu emva kokuphuma kwabantwana bakoIsrayeli elizweni leGibhithe, ngalelolanga bafika enkangala yeSinayi.
Sebesukile eRefidimi.
UMozisi wasesenyukela kuNkulunkulu: Uzakutsho njalo kuyo indlu kaJakobe, ubatshele abantwana bakoIsrayeli uthi:
Lina libonile lokho engikwenze kumaGibhithe.
Ngakho-ke uba lilalela lokulalela ilizwi lami, ligcine isivumelwano sami;
njalo lizakuba ngumbuso wabapristi. Yiwo lamazwi ozawatsho kubantwana bakoIsrayeli.
UMozisi wasesiza wabiza abadala babantu, wabeka phambi kwabo wonke la amazwi emlaye wona.
Bonke abantu basebephendula kanyekanye bathi: Konke ekukhulumileyo sizakwenza. UMozisi wasebuyisela amazwi abantu eNni.
yasisithi kuMozisi: Khangela, ngizakuza kuwe eyezini elinzima. UMozisi wasebikela amazwi abantu.
yasisithi kuMozisi: Hamba uye ebantwini, ubangcwelise lamuhla lakusasa,
babe sebelungele usuku lwesithathu; ngoba ngosuku lwesithathu izakwehla phambi kwamehlo abantu bonke phezu kwentaba yeSinayi.
Uzabamisela abantu umngcele inhlangothi zonke uthi: Ziqapheleni ukukhwela entabeni, lokuthinta ewatheni layo. Wonke othinta intaba uzabulawa lokubulawa;

Kakulasandla esizayithinta, kodwa sibili uzakhandwa ngamatshe loba sibili uzatshokwa; loba inyamazana loba umuntu, kakuyikuphila. Lapho uphondo lwenqama lukhala isikhathi eside bazakwenyukela entabeni.
UMozisi wasesehla entabeni waya ebantwini, wangcwelisa abantu, njalo bawatsha izembatho zabo.
Wathi ebantwini: Lungelani usuku lwesithathu.
Kwasekusithi ngosuku lwesithathu sekusile, kwakulemidumo lemibane.
UMozisi wasebakhupha abantu enkambeni ukuyamhlangabeza uNkulunkulu; basebesima ngaphansi kwentaba.
Intaba yonke-ke yeSinayi yathunqa intuthu.
Kwathi ilizwi lophondo liqhubeka lisiba lamandla amakhulu.
yasisehlela entabeni yeSinayi, engqongeni yentaba; yambizela uMozisi engqongeni yentaba; uMozisi wenyuka-ke.
yasisithi kuMozisi: Yehla, ubaxwayise abantu hlezi bafohlele eNni ukubona, njalo abanengi babo bawe.
Labapristi labo abasondela eNni kabazingcwelise.
UMozisi wasesithi eNni: Abantu bangenyukele entabeni yeSinayi, ngoba wena usixwayisile usithi: Misa umngcele wentaba, uyingcwelise.
yasisithi kuye: Hamba wehle, ubuye wenyuke, wena loAroni elawe; kodwa abapristi labantu kabangafohli benyukele eNni, hlezi ibadumele.
UMozisi wasesehlela ebantwini, wabatshela.
UNkulunkulu wonke la amazwi esithi:
NgiyuNkulunkulu wakho eyakukhupha elizweni leGibhithe, endlini yobugqili.
Ungabi labanye onkulunkulu phambi kwami.
Ungazenzeli isithombe esibaziweyo loba yiwuphi umfanekiso wokusemazulwini phezulu, loba wokusemhlabeni phansi, loba wokusemanzini ngaphansi komhlaba;
ungakukhothameli, ungakukhonzi, kuze kube se sizukulwane ni sesithathu lesesine sabangizondayo,
kodwa ngibenzela umusa abayizinkulungwane zabangithandayo lezabagcina imilayo yami.
Ungaliphathi ngeze ibizo leN uNkulunkulu wakho; ngoba kayiyikumyekela engelacala ophatha ibizo layo ngeze.
Khumbula usuku lwesabatha, ukulugcina lube ngcwele.
Insuku eziyisithupha uzasebenza, uwenze wonke umsebenzi wakho;

kodwa usuku lwesikhombisa lulisabatha leN uNkulunkulu wakho; ungenzi loba yiwuphi umsebenzi ngalo, wena lendodana yakho lendodakazi yakho, inceku yakho lencekukazi yakho lezifuyo zakho lowemzini wakho ophakathi kwamasango akho.
Ngoba ngensuku eziyisithupha yenza amazulu lomhlaba lolwandle lakho konke okukukho, yasiphumula ngosuku lwesikhombisa; ngalokhu yalubusisa usuku lwesabatha, yalungcwelisa.
Hlonipha uyihlo lonyoko.
Ungabulali.
Ungafebi.
Ungebi.
Unganiki ubufakazi bamanga ngomakhelwane wakho.
Ungafisi indlu kamakhelwane wakho, ungafisi umkamakhelwane wakho, lenceku yakhe, lencekukazi yakhe, lenkabi yakhe, lobabhemi wakhe, njalo loba yini ekamakhelwane wakho.
Bonke abantu basebebona imidumo. Kwathi abantu bekubona bathuthumela, bema khatshana;
bathi kuMozisi: Khuluma wena lathi, njalo sizakuzwa.
UMozisi wasesithi ebantwini: Lingesabi, ukuze lingoni.
Abantu bema-ke khatshana; kodwa uMozisi wasondela emnyameni onzima lapho uNkulunkulu ayekhona.
yasisithi kuMozisi: Uzakutsho njalo kubantwana bakoIsrayeli uthi: Lina selibonile ukuthi ngikhulume lani ngisemazulwini.
Kaliyikwenza kanye lami onkulunkulu besiliva, njalo onkulunkulu begolide kaliyikuzenzela.

Ngenzela ilathi lenhlabathi, unikele phezu kwalo iminikelo yakho yokutshiswa leminikelo yakho yokuthula, izimvu zakho lenkabi zakho. Kuyo yonke indawo lapho engilenza ibizo lami ukuthi likhunjulwe khona.
Kodwa uba ungenzela ilathi lamatshe, uyalingcolisa.
Awuyikukhwela phezu kwelathi lami ngezikhwelo, ukuze ubunqunu bakho bungembulwa phezu kwalo.
Lezi yizahlulelo ozazibeka-ke phambi kwabo.
Uba uthenga isigqili esingumHebheru, sizasebenza iminyaka eyisithupha, kodwa ngowesikhombisa sizaphuma sikhululekile ngesihle.
Uba safika sisodwa, sizaphuma sisodwa; uba sithethe, umkaso uzaphuma laso.
Uba inkosi yaso yasinika umfazi, asizalele amadodana kumbe amadodakazi, umfazi labantwana bakhe bazakuba ngabenkosi yakhe, njalo sizaphuma sisodwa.
Kodwa uba isigqili sisitsho lokutsho ukuthi: Ngiyayithanda inkosi yami, umkami labantwana bami, kangiyikuphuma ngikhululekile;
inkosi yaso izasiletha kubahlulel, siyisebenzele-ke kuze kube nininini.
Njalo uba umuntu ethengisa indodakazi yakhe ukuze ibe yisigqilikazi.
Uba singayithokozisi inkosi yaso ezimisele sona, izasenza sihlengwe; kayiyikuba lamandla okusithengisa esizweni semzini, njengoba esiphethe ngenkohliso.
Kodwa uba esimisela indodana yayo, izakwenza kuso njengelungelo lamadodakazi.
Uba ezithathela omunye, ukudla kwaso, isigubuzelo saso lokuhlala kwaso ndawonye kayiyikukunciphisa.
Kodwa uba ingasenzeli lezizinto ezintathu, sizaphuma ngesihle ngaphandle kwemali.
Otshaya umuntu aze afe, uzabulawa lokubulawa.
Kodwa uba ebenga m cathamelanga.
Kodwa uba umuntu esukela umakhelwane wakhe ambulale ngobuqili.
Otshaya uyise kumbe unina, uzabulawa lokubulawa.
Loweba umuntu, uzabulawa lokubulawa.
Othuka uyise kumbe unina, uzabulawa lokubulawa.
Njalo nxa amadoda esilwa, enye itshaye enye ngelitshe kumbe ngenqindi, kodwa ingafi kodwa ilale embhedeni,
uba ilulama itotobe phandle ngodondolo lwayo, leyo e yi tshayileyo izakhululwa. Kodwa izahlawulela isikhathi sokungasebenzi kwayo, izayelaphisa lokuyelaphisa.
Uba-ke umuntu etshaya isigqili sakhe kumbe isigqilikazi sakhe ngenduku size sife ngaphansi kwesandla sakhe, sizaphindiselwa lokuphindiselwa.
Kanti nxa silulama usuku kumbe insuku ezimbili, kayikuphindiselwa, ngoba siyimali yakhe.
Njalo nxa amadoda esilwa, atshaye owesifazana okhulelweyo aze aphume umntwana wakhe, kodwa kungelangozi yokufa, izahlawuliswa lokuhlawuliswa, njengokubeka kwendoda yomfazi phezu kwayo, izahlawula.
Kodwa uba kulengozi yokufa, uzanika umphefumulo ngomphefumulo,
ilihlo ngelihlo, izinyo ngezinyo, isandla ngesandla, unyawo ngonyawo,
ukutshiswa ngokutshiswa, inxeba ngenxeba, umvimvinya ngomvimvinya.
Uba-ke umuntu etshaya ilihlo lesigqili sakhe kumbe ilihlo lesigqilikazi sakhe alibulale, uzasiyekela sihambe sikhululekile ngenxa yelihlo laso.
Uba-ke etshaya izinyo lesigqili kumbe izinyo lesigqilikazi likhumuke, uzasiyekela sihambe sikhululekile ngenxa yezinyo laso.
Njalo uba inkabi ihlaba owesilisa kumbe owesifazana abesesifa, inkabi izakhandwa lokukhandwa ngamatshe, lenyama yayo ingadliwa; kodwa umnininkabi uzayekelwa.
Kodwa uba inkabi ibijwayele ukuhlaba mandulo, njalo kufakaziwe kumniniyo, kodwa engayilondolozanga, ibisibulala owesilisa kumbe owesifazana, leyonkabi izakhandwa ngamatshe, lomniniyo laye abulawe.
Uba inhlawulo ibekwa phezu kwakhe, uzanika imbadalo yokuhlengwa komphefumulo wakhe, njengakho konke okubekwe phezu kwakhe.
Loba ihlaba indodana kumbe ihlaba indodakazi, kuzakwenziwa kuye njengomthetho lo.
Nxa inkabi ihlaba inceku kumbe incekukazi, uzanika amashekeli esiliva angamatshumi amathathu.
Njalo uba umuntu evula umgodi, loba uba umuntu egebha umgodi angawusibekeli, kuwele kuwo inkabi kumbe ubabhemi,
umninimgodi uzahlawula, abuyisele imali kumniniyo, kodwa efileyo izakuba ngeyakhe.
Njalo uba inkabi yomuntu ilimaza inkabi yomakhelwane wakhe ize ife, bazathengisa inkabi ephilayo, behlukaniselane imali yayo, behlukaniselane efileyo futhi.
Kumbe uba kusaziwa ukuthi inkabi ibijwayele ukuhlaba mandulo, kodwa umniniyo engayilondolozanga, uzabhadala lokubhadala inkabi ngenkabi, kodwa efileyo izakuba ngeyakhe.
Uba umuntu eseba inkabi loba imvu, ayihlabe kumbe ayithengise, uzahlawula inkabi ezinhlanu ngenkabi, lezimvu ezine ngemvu.
Uba isela lificwa lifohlela, litshaywe lize life.
Uba ilanga seliphumile phezu kwalo, ulecala legazi. Lifanele ukubhadala lokubhadala; uba lingelalutho, limele lithengiswe ngenxa yokweba kwalo.
Uba okwebiweyo kuficwa lokuficwa esandleni salo kuphila.
Nxa umuntu edlisa insimu kumbe isivini, angenise izifuyo zakhe zidle ensimini yomunye, uzabuyisela ngokuhle kwensimu yakhe langokuhle kwesivini sakhe.
Uba kuqhamuka umlilo, ulumathe emeveni kuze kutshe inqumbi yamabele loba amabele amileyo loba insimu, othungele umlilo uzahlawula lokuhlawula.
Uba umuntu enika umakhelwane wakhe imali loba impahla ukuze akulondoloze, njalo kwebiwe endlini yalowomuntu, uba isela litholwa lizabuyisela kuphindwe kabili.
Uba isela lingatholwa, umninindlu uzasondezwa kubahluleli ukuthi kafakanga yini isandla sakhe empahleni yomakhelwane wakhe.

Ngalo lonke udaba lwecala, ngenkabi, ngobabhemi, ngemvu, ngesembatho, ngakho konke okulahlekileyo, umuntu atsho ngakho ukuthi ngokwakhe, udaba lwabo bobabili luzakuza kubahluleli; lowo abahluleli abamlahlayo uzabuyisela kuphindwe kabili kumakhelwane wakhe.
Uba umuntu enikela kumakhelwane wakhe ubabhemi loba inkabi loba imvu kumbe isifuyo nje ukuthi akulondoloze, besekusifa loba kulimala kumbe kuthunjwe, kungelamuntu obonayo,
isifungo seN sizakuba phakathi kwabo bobabili, ukuthi kelulanga isandla empahleni kamakhelwane wakhe; njalo umniniyo uza s emukela, kayikubuyisela.
Kodwa uba yebiwe lokwebiwa kuye, uzamhlawula umniniyo.
Uba idatshuliwe lokudatshulwa, kayilethe ibe yibufakazi, kayikubuyisela edatshuliweyo.
Uba-ke umuntu eseboleka uluthokumakhelwane wakhe, beselulimala loba lusifa umninilo engelalo, uzahlawula lokuhlawula.
Uba umninilo elalo, kayikuhlawula; uba beluqatshiwe, lulande ukuqatshwa kwalo.
Uba-ke indoda iyenga intombi emsulwa engakhombanga, ilale layo, izayilobola lokuyilobola ibe ngumkayo.
Uba uyise esala lokwala ukumnika yona, uzabhadala imali njengelobolo lezintombi ezimsulwa.
Lingayekeli umthakathikazi ukuthi aphile.
Wonke olala lenyamazana uzabulawa lokubulawa.
Ohlabela onkulunkulu ngaphandle kweN kuphela uzatshabalaliswa.
Njalo ungamcindezeli owezizwe, ungamhluphi, ngoba lalingabezizwe elizweni leGibhithe.
Lingacindezeli lawuphi umfelokazi kumbe intandane.
Uba ubacindezela lokubacindezela, yebo, uba bekhala lokukhala kimi,
ulaka lwami luzavutha.
Uba useboleka abantu bami imali abangabayanga abalawe, ungaziphathi njengombolekisi kubo, ungabeki inzalo phezu kwabo.
Uba uthatha lokuthatha isembatho sikamakhelwane wakho sibe yisibambiso, sibuyisele kuye lingakatshoni ilanga;
ngoba siyisigubuzelo sakhe sodwa, siyisembatho sakhe esikhumbeni sakhe; uzalala phakathi kwani? Kuzakuthi-ke lapho ekhala kimi, ngizamuzwa.
Lingathuki onkulunkulu, lingaqalekisi induna yabantu bakini.
Lingaphuzisi isivuno senu esigcweleyo lomhluzi wenu wezithelo. Uzangipha izibulo emadodaneni akho.
Wenze njalo ngenkabi yakho la ngemvu yakho; ngosuku lwesificaminwembili unginike khona.
Lizakuba ngabantu abangcwele kimi.
Ungawuphathi umbiko wamanga.
Ungalandeli abanengi ngezinto ezimbi.
Lomyanga ungamzweli ecaleni lakhe.
Uba uhlangana lenkabi yesitha sakho loba ubabhemi waso kuduha, uzakubuyisela lokukubuyisela kuso.
Uba ubona ubabhemi walowo okuzondayo elele ngaphansi komthwalo wakhe, uyekele ukumkhulula, uzamkhulula lokumkhulula laye.
Kawuyikuphambula ukwahlulelwa komyanga wakho ecaleni lakhe.
Bana khatshana lendaba yamanga.
Njalo kawuyikwemukela isivalamlomo, ngoba isivalamlomo siphumputhekisa ababonayo, sonakalise amazwi abalungileyo.
Futhi kawuyikumcindezela owezizwe; ngoba lina liyayazi imizwa yowezizwe, ngoba lalingabezizwe elizweni leGibhithe.
Njalo iminyaka eyisithupha uzahlanyela isiqinti sakho, ubuthe isivuno saso.
Kodwa ngowesikhombisa uzasilalukisa sibe lifusi, ukuze abayanga besizwe sakho badle, lalokho okuseleyo inyamazana zeganga zikudle. Wenze njalo ngesivini sakho lemihlwathi yakho.
Insuku eziyisithupha uzakwenza umsebenzi wakho, njalo ngosuku lwesikhombisa uphumule, ukuze kuphumule inkabi yakho labobabhemi bakho, kuvuselele-ke indodana yencekukazi yakho lowezizweni.
Lezintweni zonke esengizitshilo kini qaphelani.
Kathathu.
Umkhosi wesinkwa esingelamvubelo uzawugcina.
Lomkhosi wesivuno, lapho usubuthile umsebenzi wakho ensimini.
Kathathu ngomnyaka bonke abesilisa bakho bazabonakala phambi kweNkosi uJehova.
Kawuyikunikela igazi lomhlatshelo wami kanye lesinkwa esilemvubelo. Lamafutha omkhosi wami angalali kuze kuse.
Ikhethelo lezithelo zokuqala zensimu yakho uzaliletha endlini yeN uNkulunkulu wakho.
Khangela, ngithuma ingilosi phambi kwakho ukuze ikulondoloze endleleni, ikuse endaweni engiyilungisileyo.
Uqaphele phambi kwayo, ulalele ilizwi layo; ungayicunuli; ngoba ibizo lami liphakathi kwayo.
Kodwa uba ulalela lokulalela ilizwi layo, wenze konke engikutshoyo, sengizakuba yisitha sezitha zakho, ngiphambane labaphambana lawe.
Ngoba ingilosi yami izahamba phambi kwakho. Njalo ngizababhubhisa.
Ungakhothameli onkulunkulu babo, ungabakhonzi, ungenzi njengemisebenzi yabo.
Lizakhonza-ke uNkulunkulu wenu.
Kakuyikuba khona okuphunzayo lokuyinyumba elizweni lakho.
Ngizathumela ukwesabeka kwami phambi kwakho, ngenze izitha zakho zonke zikunike isiphundu.
Ngizathumela olonyovu phambi kwakho abazaxotsha amaHivi, amaKhanani lamaHethi phambi kwakho.
Kangiyikubaxotsha phambi kwakho ngomnyaka owodwa, hlezi ilizwe libe ngamanxiwa, lenyamazana zeganga zikwandele.
Ngizabaxotsha phambi kwakho kancinyane kancinyane, uze wande, udle ilifa lelizwe.
Njalo ngizamisa imingcele yakho; uzabaxotsha phambi kwakho.
Ungenzi isivumelwano labo labonkulunkulu babo.
Kabayikuhlala elizweni lakho, hlezi bakwenze ukuthi wone kimi; uba ukhonza onkulunkulu babo, ngeqiniso kuzakuba yisifu kuwe.
Yasisithi kuMozisi: Yenyukela eNni, wena loAroni, uNadabi loAbihu, likhonze likhatshana.
Njalo uMozisi yedwa uzasondela eNkosini, kodwa bona kabayikusondela; labantu kabayikwenyuka laye.
UMozisi wasesiza wabatshela abantu wonke amazwi eN lokwahlulela konke; bonke abantu baphendula ngalizwi linye bathi: Wonke amazwi eN ewakhulumileyo sizawenza.
UMozisi wasebhala wonke amazwi eN KOSI.
Wathuma amajaha abantwana bakoIsrayeli, anikela iminikelo yokutshiswa, ahlabela iminikelo yokuthula yamajongosi.
UMozisi wasethatha ingxenye yegazi.
Wasethatha incwadi yesivumelwano, wayibala ezindlebeni zabantu. Basebesithi: Konke ekutshiloyo sizakwenza silalele.
UMozisi wasethatha igazi, walifafaza phezu kwabantu, wathi: Khangelani igazi lesivumelwano esenze lani mayelana lawo wonke la amazwi.
Basebesenyuka oMozisi loAroni, uNadabi loAbihu, labangamatshumi ayisikhombisa kubadala bakoIsrayeli,
basebebona uNkulunkulu wakoIsrayeli.
Kodwa kaselulanga isandla sakhe.
yasisithi kuMozisi: Yenyukela kimi entabeni, engikubhalileyo ukubafundisa.
Wasukuma-ke uMozisi, lenceku yakhe uJoshuwa.
Wasesithi ebadaleni: Silindeleni lapha size sibuye kini; khangelani-ke uAroni loHuri balani.
UMozisi wasesenyukela entabeni, leyezi lasibekela intaba.
Njalo inkazimulo yeN yahlala entabeni yeSinayi; leyezi layisibekela insuku eziyisithupha; yasimbiza uMozisi ngosuku lwesikhombisa iphakathi kweyezi.
Njalo ukubonakala kwenkazimulo yeN kwakunjengomlilo oqothulayo, engqongeni yentaba, emehlweni abantwana bakoIsrayeli.
UMozisi wasengena phakathi kweyezi, wenyukela entabeni; njalo uMozisi waba sentabeni insuku ezingamatshumi amane lobusuku obungamatshumi amane.
yasikhuluma kuMozisi isithi:
Khuluma kubantwana bakoIsrayeli.
Njalo yilo umnikelo ozawuthatha kubo: Igolide, lesiliva, lethusi,
lokuluhlaza okwesibhakabhaka, lokuyibubende, lokubomvu, lelembu elicolekileyo kakhulu, lo boyabembuzi,
lezikhumba eziphendulwe zababomvu zezinqama, lezikhumba zikamantswane, lesihlahla sesinga,
amafutha esibane,
amatshe athiwa ngama-onikse.
Njalo kabangenzele indawo engcwele.
Njengakho konke engizakutshengisa khona, isibonelo sethabhanekele, lesibonelo sempahla yalo yonke, lenze njalo-ke.
Njalo bazakwenza umtshokotsho ngesihlahla sesinga; ubude bawo bubezingalo ezimbili lengxenye, lobubanzi bawo yingalo lengxenye, lokuphakama kwawo yingalo lengxenye.
Uwuhuqe-ke ngegolide elicwengekileyo, uwuhuqe ngaphakathi langaphandle.
Uwubumbele ngokuncibilikisa futhi amasongo amane egolide, uwafake emagumbini omane awo, ukuze amasongo amabili abe kolunye uhlangothi lwawo, lamasongo amabili abe kolunye uhlangothi lwawo.
Njalo uzakwenza imijabo ngesihlahla sesinga, uyihuqe ngegolide,
uyifake imijabo emasongweni enhlangothini zomtshokotsho, ukuthwala umtshokotsho ngayo.
Imijabo izakuba semasongweni omtshokotsho, ayiyikukhutshwa kuwo.
Ubusufaka emtshokotshweni ubufakazi engizakunika bona.
Njalo uzakwenza isihlalo somusa ngegolide elicwengekileyo, ubude baso bubezingalo ezimbili lengxenye, ububanzi baso yingalo lengxenye.
Ubususenza amakherubhi amabili ngegolide, uzawenza ngomsebenzi okhandiweyo, avele emaphethelweni womabili esihlalo somusa.
Wenze elinye ikherubhi livele ephethelweni lwaloluhlangothi, lelinye ikherubhi livele ephethelweni lolunye uhlangothi, uzakwenza amakherubhi evela esihlalweni somusa emaphethelweni womabili aso.
Lamakherubhi azakwelula impiko zawongaphezulu, ambomboze isihlalo somusa ngempiko zawo, lobuso bawo bukhangelane; ubuso bamakherubhi buzakhangela isihlalo somusa.
Njalo uzasibeka isihlalo somusa ngaphezulu.
Ngizahlangana-ke lawe lapho aphezu komtshokotsho wobufakazi, konke engizakulaya khona kubantwana bakoIsrayeli.
Uzakwenza futhi itafula ngesihlahla sesinga; ubude balo bubezingalo ezimbili, lobubanzi balo yingalo, lokuphakama kwalo yingalo lengxenye.
Uzalihuqa-ke ngegolide elicwengekileyo, wenze kulo umqolo wegolide inhlangothi zonke.
Uzakwenza kulo inhlangothi zonke ibhanti elingangobubanzi besandla, ulenzele ibhanti lalo umqolo wegolide inhlangothi zonke.
Ulenzele futhi amasongo amane egolide, uwafake amasongo emagunjini amane asenyaweni zalo zozine.
Amasongo azakuba ngasebhantini ukuze abe zindawo zemijabo, ukuthwala itafula.
Njalo uzakwenza imijabo ngesihlahla sesinga, uyihuqe ngegolide, ukuze itafula lithwalwe ngayo;
wenze futhi imiganu yalo lenkezo zalo lezitsha zalo lenditshi zalo abathela ngazo, uzenze ngegolide elicwengekileyo.
Uzabeka-ke etafuleni izinkwa zokubukiswa phambi kwami njalonjalo.
Uzakwenza njalo uluthi lwesibane ngegolide elicwengekileyo; uluthi lwesibane luzakwenziwa ngomsebenzi okhandiweyo, isidindi salo, lezinti zalo, imbizana zalo, induku zalo, lamaluba alo, kuvele kulo.
Njalo izinti eziyisithupha zizaphuma enhlangothini zalo; izinti ezintathu zoluthi lwesibane kolunye uhlangothi, lezinti ezintathu zoluthi lwesibane kolunye uhlangothi.

Imbizana ezintathu ezenziwe zafanana lamaluba esihlahla se-alimondi kolunye uluthi, isiduku leluba; lembizana ezintathu ezenziwe zafanana lamaluba esihlahla se-alimondi kolunye uluthi, isiduku leluba; kube njalo ezintini eziyisithupha eziphuma oluthini lwesibane.
Oluthini lwesibane kube khona imbizana ezine ezenziwe zafanana lamaluba esihlahla se-alimondi, iziduku zalo lamaluba alo;

kube lesiduku ngaphansi kwezinti ezimbili ezivela kulo, lesiduku ngaphansi kwezinti ezimbili ezivela kulo, futhi isiduku ngaphansi kwezinti ezimbili ezivela kulo, njengezinti eziyisithupha eziphuma oluthini lwesibane.
Iziduku zazo lezinti zazo zizavela kulo, lonke lube ngumsebenzi munye okhandiweyo wegolide elicwengekileyo.
Uzakwenza futhi izibane zalo eziyisikhombisa, njalo bazalumathisa izibane zalo.
Njalo indlawu zalo lemiganu yalo yomlotha kuzakuba ligolide elicwengekileyo.
Kalwenziwe ngethalenta legolide elicwengekileyo, kanye lazo zonke lezizinto.
Nanzelela-ke ukuthi uzenze njengomfanekiso wazo, owatshengiswa wona entabeni.
Uzakwenza-ke ithabhanekele elenziwe ngentambo ephothiweyo lokuluhlaza okwesibhakabhaka lokuyibubende lokubomvu, ngamakherubhi; uzawenza enziwe ngumuntu oyingcitshi.
Ubude bekhetheni elilodwa bube zingalo ezingamatshumi amabili lesificaminwembili, lobubanzi bekhetheni elilodwa zingalo ezine; wonke amakhetheni alingane.
Amakhetheni amahlanu azahlanganiswa, elinye lelinye; lamakhetheni amahlanu azahlanganiswa, elinye lelinye.
Uzakwenza-ke izihitshela ngokuluhlaza okwesibhakabhaka emphethweni welinye ikhetheni, ekucineni kwenhlangano, njalo ngokufananayo wenze emphethweni wekhetheni ekucineni, kunhlangano yesibili.
Wenze izihitshela ezingamatshumi amahlanu kwelinye ikhetheni, lezihitshela ezingamatshumi amahlanu uzazenza emphethweni wekhetheni elikunhlangano yeyesibili; izihitshela zikhangelane.
Njalo wenze ingwegwe zegolide ezingamatshumi amahlanu, uhlanganise amakhetheni elinye lelinye ngengwegwe, ukuze kube lethabhanekele elilodwa.
Wenze futhi amakhetheni ngoboya bembuzi abe lithente phezu kwethabhanekele; uzalenza ngamakhetheni alitshumi lanye.
Ubude bekhetheni elilodwa zingalo ezingamatshumi amathathu, lobubanzi bekhetheni elilodwa zingalo ezine; amakhetheni alitshumi lanye alingane.
Njalo uzahlanganisa amakhetheni amahlanu abe wodwa, lamakhetheni ayisithupha abe wodwa; lekhetheni lesithupha uzalipheqa phambi kwethente ngaphambili.
Wenze-ke izihitshela ezingamatshumi amahlanu emphethweni wekhetheni, ekucineni kwenhlangano, lezihitshela ezingamatshumi amahlanu emphethweni wekhetheni elihlanganisa elesibili.
Wenze futhi ingwegwe zethusi ezingamatshumi amahlanu, uzifake ingwegwe ezihitsheleni, uhlanganise ithente libe linye.
Njalo okuseleyo okwedluleleyo kwamakhetheni ethente, ingxenye yekhetheni eseleyo, izalengela ehlangothini olungemuva kwethabhanekele.
Njalo ingalo ngapha lengalo langapha kulokho okuseleyo ebudeni bamakhetheni ethente, izalengela emaceleni ethabhanekele ngapha langapha ukulisibekela.
Uzalenzela ithente isembeso sezikhumba eziphendulwe zababomvu zezinqama, lesembeso sezikhumba zikamantswane phezulu.
Njalo uzakwenza amapulanka ethabhanekele ngesihlahla sesinga, ame,
ubude bamapulanka buzakuba zingalo ezilitshumi, lobubanzi bepulanka linye bube yingalo lengxenye yengalo.
Ipulanka elilodwa lizakuba lemisuka emibili, ihlanganisiwe omunye komunye; wenze njalo kuwo wonke amapulanka ethabhanekeleni.
Uzalenzela-ke ithabhanekele amapulanka, amapulanka angamatshumi amabili ehlangothini lweningizimu olukhangele eningizimu;
