Lalabo abafayo ngenhlupheko babeyizinkulungwane ezingamatshumi amabili lane.
yasikhuluma kuMozisi isithi:
UPhinehasi, indodana kaEleyazare indodana kaAroni umpristi, uphendule ulaka lwami lusuka ebantwaneni bakoIsrayeli.
Ngakho utsho: Khangela, ngiyamnika isivumelwano sami sokuthula.
Njalo uzakuba laso, lenzalo yakhe emva kwakhe, ngenxa yokuthi elobukhwele ngoNkulunkulu wakhe, wabenzela abantwana bakoIsrayeli inhlawulo yokuthula.
Lebizo lendoda yakoIsrayeli eyatshaywayo, eyatshaywa kanye lomMidiyanikazi, lalinguZimri indodana kaSalu, isiphathamandla sendlu kayise phakathi kwabakoSimeyoni.
Ibizo lowesifazana owatshaywayo, umMidiyanikazi, lalinguKozibi indodakazi kaZuri, owayeyinhloko yesizwe sendlu kayise eMidiyani.
yasikhuluma kuMozisi isithi:
Hluphani amaMidiyani, liwatshaye;
ngoba aliphethe njengezitha ngobuqili bawo.
Kwathi emva kwenhlupheko yakhuluma kuMozisi lakuEleyazare indodana kaAroni umpristi, isithi:
Thathani inani lonke lenhlangano yonke yabantwana bakoIsrayeli.
UMozisi loEleyazare umpristi basebekhuluma labo emagcekeni akoMowabi, eJodani eJeriko, besithi:
Babalekusukela koleminyaka engamatshumi amabili langaphezulu abaphuma elizweni leGibhithe.
URubeni, izibulo likaIsrayeli. Amadodana kaRubeni: UHanoki, okwavela kuyeusendo lwabakoHanoki; koPalu, usendo lwabakoPalu;
koHezironi, usendo lwabakoHezironi; koKarimi, usendo lwabakoKarimi.
Lezi zinsendo zabakoRubeni; lalabo ababalwayo babo babeyizinkulungwane ezingamatshumi amane lantathu lamakhulu ayisikhombisa lamatshumi amathathu.
Lamadodana kaPalu; uEliyabi.
Lamadodana kaEliyabi; oNemuweli loDathani loAbiramu. Yibo oDathani loAbiramu, ababizwa yinhlangano.
Lomhlaba wavula umlomo wawo, wabaginya loKora ekufeni kwaleloqembu.
Kodwa abantwana bakaKora kabafanga.
Amadodana kaSimeyoni ngensendo zawo: KoNemuweli, usendo lwabakoNemuweli; koJamini, usendo lwabakoJamini; koJakini, usendo lwabakoJakini;
koZera, usendo lwabakoZera; koShawuli, usendo lwabakoShawuli.
Lezi zinsendo zabakoSimeyoni; izinkulungwane ezingamatshumi amabili lambili lamakhulu amabili.
Amadodana kaGadi ngensendo zawo: KoZefoni, usendo lwabakoZefoni; koHagi, usendo lwabakoHagi; koShuni, usendo lwabakoShuni;
koOzini, usendo lwabakoOzini; koEri, usendo lwabakoEri;
koArodi, usendo lwabakoArodi; koAreli, usendo lwabakoAreli.
Lezi zinsendo zamadodana kaGadi, njengababaliweyo babo, inkulungwane ezingamatshumi amane lamakhulu amahlanu.
Amadodana kaJuda ayengoEri loOnani; oEri loOnani basebefela elizweni leKhanani.
Njalo amadodana kaJuda ngensendo zawo yila: KoShela, usendo lwabakoShela; koPerezi, usendo lwabakoPerezi; koZera, usendo lwabakoZera.
Lamadodana kaPerezi yila: KoHezironi, usendo lwabakoHezironi; koHamuli, usendo lwabakoHamuli.
Lezi zinsendo zikaJuda, njengababaliweyo babo, inkulungwane ezingamatshumi ayisikhombisa lesithupha lamakhulu amahlanu.
Amadodana kaIsakari ngensendo zawo: K oThola, usendo lwabakoThola; koPhuwa, usendo lwabakoPhuwa;
koJashubi, usendo lwabakoJashubi; koShimroni, usendo lwabakoShimroni.
Lezi zinsendo zikaIsakari, njengababaliweyo babo, inkulungwane ezingamatshumi ayisithupha lane lamakhulu amathathu.
Amadodana kaZebuluni ngensendo zawo: KoSeredi, usendo lwabakoSeredi; koEloni, usendo lwabakoEloni; koJaleli, usendo lwabakoJaleli.
Lezi zinsendo zabakoZebuloni, njengababaliweyo babo, inkulungwane ezingamatshumi ayisithupha lamakhulu amahlanu.
Amadodana kaJosefa ngensendo zawo ayengoManase loEfrayimi.
Amadodana kaManase: KoMakiri, usendo lwabakoMakiri; uMakiri wasezala uGileyadi; koGileyadi, usendo lwabakoGileyadi.
La ngamadodana kaGileyadi: K oIyezeri, usendo lwabakoIyezeri; koHeleki, usendo lwabakoHeleki;
la ko Asiriyeli, usendo lwabakoAsiriyeli; la ko Shekema, usendo lwabakoShekema;
la ko Shemida, usendo lwabakoShemida; la ko Heferi, usendo lwabakoHeferi.
Njalo uZelofehadi indodana kaHeferi wayengelamadodana, kodwa amadodakazi. Lamabizo amadodakazi kaZelofehadi ayengoMahla, loNowa, uHogila, uMilka, loTiriza.
Lezi zinsendo zikaManase, lababaliweyo babo, inkulungwane ezingamatshumi amahlanu lambili lamakhulu ayisikhombisa.
La ngamadodana kaEfrayimi ngensendo zawo: KoShuthela, usendo lwabakoShuthela; koBekeri, usendo lwabakoBekeri; koTahani, usendo lwabakoTahani.
Lala ngamadodana kaShuthela: KoErani, usendo lwabakoErani.
Lezi zinsendo zamadodana kaEfrayimi, njengababaliweyo babo, inkulungwane ezingamatshumi amathathu lambili lamakhulu amahlanu. La ngamadodana kaJosefa ngensendo zawo.
Amadodana kaBhenjamini ngensendo zawo: KoBhela, usendo lwabakoBhela; koAshibeli, usendo lwabakoAshibeli; koAhiramu, usendo lwabakoAhiramu;
koShefufamu, usendo lwabakoShefufamu; koHufamu, usendo lwabakoHufamu.
Lamadodana kaBhela ayenguAridi loNamani: KoAridi, usendo lwabakoAridi; koNamani, usendo lwabakoNamani.
La ngamadodana kaBhenjamini ngensendo zawo; lababaliweyo babo babeyizinkulungwane ezingamatshumi amane lanhlanu lamakhulu ayisithupha.
La ngamadodana kaDani ngensendo zawo: KoShuhamu, usendo lwabakoShuhamu. Lezi zinsendo zikaDani ngensendo zazo.
Zonke insendo zabakoShuhamu, njengababaliweyo babo, babeyizinkulungwane ezingamatshumi ayisithupha lane lamakhulu amane.
Amadodana kaAsheri ngensendo zawo: KoJimna, usendo lwabakoJimna; koIshivi, usendo lwabakoIshivi; koBeriya, usendo lwabakoBeriya.
Kumadodana kaBeriya: KoHeberi, usendo lwabakoHeberi; koMalikiyeli, usendo lwabakoMalikiyeli.
Lebizo lendodakazi kaAsheri lalinguSera.
Lezi zinsendo zamadodana kaAsheri, njengababaliweyo babo; inkulungwane ezingamatshumi amahlanu lantathu lamakhulu amane.
Amadodana kaNafithali ngensendo zawo: KoJazeli, usendo lwabakoJazeli; koGuni, usendo lwabakoGuni;
koJezeri, usendo lwabakoJezeri; koShilema, usendo lwabakoShilema.
Lezi zinsendo zikaNafithali ngensendo zazo; lababaliweyo babo babeyizinkulungwane ezingamatshumi amane lanhlanu lamakhulu amane.
Laba ngababaliweyo babantwana bakoIsrayeli, inkulungwane ezingamakhulu ayisithupha lanye lamakhulu ayisikhombisa lamatshumi amathathu.
yasikhuluma kuMozisi isithi:
Kulaba ilizwe lizakwehlukaniswa libe yilifa njengenani lamabizo.
Kwabanengi uzakwengeza ilifa labo, lakwabalutshwana uzanciphisa ilifa labo; ngulowo lalowo uzanikwa ilifa lakhe njengababaliweyo bakhe.
Loba kunjalo ilizwe lizakwehlukaniswa ngenkatho; ngokwamabizo ezizwe zaboyise bazalidla ilifa.
Ngokwenkatho ilifa lalo lizakwehlukaniswa phakathi kwabanengi labalutshwana.
Lalaba ngababalwayo bamaLevi ngensendo zawo; koGerishoni, usendo lwabakoGerishoni; koKohathi, usendo lwabakoKohathi; koMerari, usendo lwabakoMerari.
Laba zinsendo zabakoLevi; usendo lwabakoLibini, usendo lwabakoHebroni, usendo lwabakoMahli, usendo lwabakoMushi, usendo lwabakoKora. UKohathi wasezala uAmramu.
Lebizo lomkaAmramu lalinguJokebedi, indodakazi kaLevi, uninaowamzalela uLevi eGibhithe; njalo wamzalela uAmramu oAroni loMozisi loMiriyamu udadewabo.
UAroni wazalelwa uNadabi loAbihu, uEleyazare loIthamari.
Kodwa uNadabi loAbihu bafa lapho banikela umlilo ongejwayelekanga phambi kweN.
Lababalwayo babo babeyizinkulungwane ezingamatshumi amabili lantathu, bonke abesilisa kusukela kolenyanga kusiya phezulu.
Laba ngababalwa nguMozisi loEleyazare umpristi, ababala abantwana bakoIsrayeli emagcekeni akoMowabi eJodani eJeriko.
Kodwa phakathi kwalabo kwakungekho muntu wababalwayo nguMozisi loAroni umpristi, lapho bebala abantwana bakoIsrayeli enkangala yeSinayi;
ngoba yayithe ngabo: Bazakufa lokufa enkangala.

Kwasekusondela amadodakazi kaZelofehadi indodana kaHeferi indodana kaGileyadi indodana kaMakiri indodana kaManase owensendo zikaManase indodana kaJosefa; njalo la ngamabizo amadodakazi akhe: UMahla, uNowa, loHogila, loMilka, loTiriza.
Asesima phambi kukaMozisi, laphambi kukaEleyazare umpristi, laphambi kweziphathamandla, lenhlangano yonke, emnyango wethente lenhlangano, esithi:
Ubaba wafela enkangala, wayengelamadodana.
Kungani ibizo likababa likhutshwe phakathi kosendo lwakhe ngoba engelandodana? Siphe ilifa phakathi kwabafowabo bakababa.
UMozisi waseluletha udaba lwawo phambi kweN.
yasikhuluma kuMozisi isithi:
Amadodakazi kaZelofehadi akhulume iqiniso; uzawanika lokuwanika isabelo selifa phakathi kwabafowabo bakayise; uzadlulisela kuwo ilifa likayise.
Njalo uzakhuluma ebantwaneni bakoIsrayeli usithi: Uba indoda isifa, ingelandodana, lizadlulisela ilifa layo kundodakazi yayo.
Njalo uba ingelandodakazi, lizanika abafowabo ilifa layo.
Uba-ke ingelabafowabo, lizanika ilifa layo kubafowabo bakayise.
Njalo uba uyise engelabafowabo, lizanika ilifa layo esihlotsheni sayo esiseduze layo sosendo lwayo.
yasisithi kuMozisi: Yenyukela kule intaba yeAbarimi, ubone ilizwe engilinike abantwana bakoIsrayeli.
Lapho usulibonile, lawe uzabuthelwa ebantwini bakini, njengoAroni umnewenu wabuthwa;
njengokuba lavukela umlayo wami enkangala yeZini, ekuphikisaneni kwenhlangano eKadeshi enkangala yeZini.
UMozisi wasekhuluma eNni esithi:
IN, uNkulunkulu wemimoya yenyama yonke, kayimise indoda enhlanganweni,
engaphuma phambi kwabo, lengangena phambi kwabo, lengabakhokhela baphume, lengabangenisa.
yasisithi kuMozisi: Zithathele uJoshuwa indodana kaNuni, indoda okukuyo umoya,
uyimise phambi kukaEleyazare umpristi laphambi kwenhlangano yonke, uyilaye phambi kwamehlo abo,
ubusubeka okodumo lwakho phezu kwayo, ukuze inhlangano yonke yabantwana bakoIsrayeli ilalele.

Njalo izakuma phambi kukaEleyazare umpristi ozayibuzela njengokwesahlulelo sikaUrimi phambi kweN; ngomlomo wayo bazaphuma, langomlomo wayo bazangena, yona labantwana bonke bakoIsrayeli kanye layo, ngitsho inhlangano yonke.
UMozisi wasesenza njengokulaya kweN kuye. Wathatha uJoshuwa, wammisa phambi kukaEleyazare umpristi laphambi kwenhlangano yonke,
wabeka izandla zakhe phezu kwakhe, wamlaya, njengokukhuluma kweN ngesandla sikaMozisi.
yasikhuluma kuMozisi isithi:
Laya abantwana bakoIsrayeli uthi kubo: Umnikelo wami, isinkwa sami seminikelo eyenziwe ngomlilo, uqhatshi lwami olumnandi, lizakuqaphela ukukunikela kimi ngesikhathi sakho esimisiweyo.
Uzakuthi kibo: Lo ngumnikelo owenziwe ngomlilo elizawunikela eNni; amawundlu amabili alomnyaka owodwa, angelasici, insuku ngensuku, kube ngumnikelo wokutshiswa njalonjalo.
Elinye iwundlu uzalilungisa ekuseni, lelinye iwundlu ulinikele kusihlwa,
lokwetshumi kwe-efa lempuphu ecolekileyo.
Kungumnikelo wokutshiswa wezikhathi zonke owamiswa entabeni yeSinayi, ube luqhatshi olumnandi, umnikelo owenzelwe ngomlilo.
Lomnikelo wawo wokunathwayo uzakuba yingxenye yesine yehini ngewundlu linye; uzathululela eNni umnikelo wokunathwayo ongo wokunathwayo okulamandla endaweni engcwele.
Lelinye iwundlu uzalilungisa kusihlwa; njengomnikelo wokudla wekuseni, lanjengomnikelo wawo wokunathwayo uzalinikela, umnikelo owenziwe ngomlilo, oloqhatshi olumnandi eNni.
Langosuku lwesabatha amawundlu amabili, alomnyaka owodwa, angelasici, lengxenye ezimbili zetshumi lempuphu ecolekileyo, kube ngumnikelo wokudla, ixubene lamafutha, lomnikelo wawo wokunathwayo;
kungumnikelo wokutshiswa wamasabatha wonke, ngaphandle komnikelo wokutshiswa wezikhathi zonke, lomnikelo wawo wokunathwayo.
Ekuqaleni kwenyanga zenu lizanikela umnikelo wokutshiswa eNni, amajongosi amabili amathole enkomo, lenqama eyodwa, lamawundlu ayisikhombisa alomnyaka owodwa, angelasici,

lengxenye ezintathu zetshumi lempuphu ecolekileyo kube ngumnikelo wokudla, ixubene lamafutha, ngejongosi elilodwa; lokubili kwetshumi kwempuphu ecolekileyo kube ngumnikelo wokudla, ixubene lamafutha, ngenqama eyodwa,
njalo yilokho lalokho okwetshumi kwempuphu ecolekileyo kuxubene lamafutha kube ngumnikelo wokudla ngewundlu elilodwa; ngumnikelo wokutshiswa oloqhatshi olumnandi, umnikelo owenzelwe ngomlilo.

Leminikelo yayo yokunathwayo izakuba yingxenye yehini lewayini ngejongosi, lengxenye yesithathu yehini ngenqama, lengxenye yesine yehini ngewundlu. Lokhu kungumnikelo wokutshiswa wezinyanga zonke ngezinyanga zomnyaka.
Futhi kuzalungiswa izinyane lembuzi elilodwa libe ngumnikelo wesono eNni, ngaphandle komnikelo wokutshiswa ngezikhathi zonke, lomnikelo wawo wokunathwayo.
Futhi ngenyanga yokuqala ngosuku lwetshumi lane lwenyanga kuliphasika leN.
Langosuku lwetshumi lanhlanu lwenyanga le kuzakuba khona umkhosi; kuzadliwa isinkwa esingelamvubelo insuku eziyisikhombisa.
Ngosuku lokuqala kuzakuba khona inhlangano ebiziweyo engcwele; lingenzi lamsebenzi wezisebenzi,
kodwa lizanikela umnikelo owenziwe ngomlilo, umnikelo wokutshiswa eNni, amajongosi amabili amathole enkomo, lenqama eyodwa, lamawundlu ayisikhombisa alomnyaka owodwa; kuzakuba ngokungelasici kini.
Lomnikelo wakho wokudla kuzakuba yimpuphu ecolekileyo ixubene lamafutha; okuthathu kwetshumi lizakulungisa ngejongosi, lokubili kwetshumi ngenqama,
yilokho lalokho okwetshumi uzakulungiselela iwundlu elilodwa, kumawundlu ayisikhombisa;
lempongo eyodwa ibe ngumnikelo wesono, ukulenzela inhlawulo yokuthula.
Lizalungisa lokho ngaphandle komnikelo wokutshiswa wekuseni, ongowomnikelo wokutshiswa wezikhathi zonke.

Ngalindlela lizalungisa insuku zonke, okwensuku eziyisikhombisa, ukudla komnikelo owenziwe ngomlilo, uqhatshi olumnandi eNni; kuzanikelwa ngaphandle komnikelo wokutshiswa wezikhathi zonke, lomnikelo wawo wokunathwayo.
Langosuku lwesikhombisa lizakuba lenhlangano ebiziweyo engcwele; lingenzi lamsebenzi wezisebenzi.
Langosuku lwezithelo zokuqala, lapho liletha umnikelo wokudla omutsha eNni, emavikini enu, lizakuba lenhlangano ebiziweyo engcwele; lingenzi lamsebenzi wezisebenzi.
Kodwa lizanikela umnikelo wokutshiswa, kube luqhatshi olumnandi eNni; amajongosi amabili amathole enkomo, inqama eyodwa, amawundlu ayisikhombisa alomnyaka owodwa.
Lomnikelo wakho wokudla wempuphu ecolekileyo ixubene lamafutha, okuthathu kwetshumi ngejongosi elilodwa, lokubili kwetshumi ngenqama eyodwa,
yilokho lalokho okwetshumi ngewundlu elilodwa, kumawundlu ayisikhombisa;
izinyane lembuzi elilodwa, ukulenzela inhlawulo yokuthula.
Lizalungisa lokho ngaphandle komnikelo wokutshiswa ngezikhathi zonke, lomnikelo wakho wokudla (kube ngokungelasici kini) leminikelo yakho yokunathwayo.
Ngenyanga yesikhombisa, ngo sukulokuqala lwenyanga, lizakuba-ke lenhlangano ebiziweyo engcwele; lingenzi lamsebenzi wezisebenzi. Kuzakuba lusuku lokutshaywa kwempondo kini.
Njalo lizalungisa umnikelo wokutshiswa, kube luqhatshi olumnandi eNni, ijongosi elilodwa ithole lenkomo, inqama eyodwa, amawundlu ayisikhombisa alomnyaka owodwa, angelasici.
Lomnikelo wakho wokudla wempuphu ecolekileyo ixubene lamafutha, okuthathu kwetshumi ngejongosi, okubili kwetshumi ngenqama,
lokwetshumi okukodwa kumawundlu ayisikhombisa;
lezinyane lembuzi elilodwa libe ngumnikelo wesono, ukulenzela inhlawulo yokuthula;
ngaphandle komnikelo wokutshiswa wenyanga, lomnikelo wawo wokudla, leminikelo yayo yokunathwayo, ngokwesimiso sayo, kube luqhatshi olumnandi, umnikelo owenzelwe ngomlilo.
kodwa linikele umnikelo wokutshiswa eNni, kube luqhatshi olumnandi, ijongosi elilodwa ithole lenkomo, inqama eyodwa, amawundlu ayisikhombisa alomnyaka owodwa; azakuba ngangelasici kini.
Lomnikelo wakho wokudla wempuphu ecolekileyo ixubene lamafutha, okuthathu kwetshumi ngejongosi, okubili kwetshumi ngenqama eyodwa,
yilokho lalokho okwetshumi ngewundlu elilodwa, kumawundlu ayisikhombisa;
izinyane lembuzi elilodwa libe ngumnikelo wesono.
Langosuku lwetshumi lanhlanu lwenyanga yesikhombisa lizakuba lenhlangano ebiziweyo engcwele; lingenzi lamsebenzi wezisebenzi, liyigcinele umkhosi insuku eziyisikhombisa,

linikele umnikelo wokutshiswa, umnikelo owenziwe ngomlilo, ube luqhatshi olumnandi eNni, amajongosi alitshumi lantathu amathole enkomo, inqama ezimbili, amawundlu alitshumi lane alomnyaka owodwa, azakuba ngangelasici.
Lomnikelo wakho wokudla wempuphu ecolekileyo ixubene lamafutha, okuthathu kwetshumi ngejongosi elilodwa, kumajongosi alitshumi lantathu, okubili kwetshumi ngenqama eyodwa, kunqama ezimbili,
njalo yilokho lalokho okwetshumi ngewundlu elilodwa, kumawundlu alitshumi lane;
lezinyane lembuzi elilodwa libe ngumnikelo wesono, ngaphandle komnikelo wokutshiswa wezikhathi zonke, umnikelo wawo wokudla, lomnikelo wawo wokunathwayo.
Langosuku lwesibili: Amajongosi alitshumi lambili amathole enkomo, inqama ezimbili, amawundlu alitshumi lane alomnyaka owodwa, angelasici,
lomnikelo wakho wokudla leminikelo yakho yokunathwayo ngamajongosi, ngezinqama, langamawundlu, ngokwenani lakho, ngokwesimiso,
lezinyane lembuzi elilodwa libe ngumnikelo wesono, ngaphandle komnikelo wokutshiswa wezikhathi zonke, lomnikelo wawo wokudla, leminikelo yayo yokunathwayo.
Langosuku lwesithathu: Amajongosi alitshumi lanye, inqama ezimbili, amawundlu alitshumi lane alomnyaka owodwa, angelasici,
lomnikelo wakho wokudla leminikelo yakho yokunathwayo ngamajongosi, ngezinqama, langamawundlu, ngokwenani lakho, ngokwesimiso,
lempongo eyodwa ibe ngumnikelo wesono, ngaphandle komnikelo wokutshiswa wezikhathi zonke, lomnikelo wawo wokudla, lomnikelo wawo wokunathwayo.
Langosuku lwesine: Amajongosi alitshumi, inqama ezimbili, amawundlu alitshumi lane alomnyaka owodwa, angelasici,
umnikelo wakho wokudla leminikelo yakho yokunathwayo ngamajongosi, ngezinqama, langamawundlu, ngokwenani lakho, ngokwesimiso,
lezinyane lembuzi elilodwa libe ngumnikelo wesono, ngaphandle komnikelo wokutshiswa wezikhathi zonke, umnikelo wawo wokudla, lomnikelo wawo wokunathwayo.
Langosuku lwesihlanu: Amajongosi ayisificamunwemunye, inqama ezimbili, amawundlu alitshumi lane alomnyaka owodwa, angelasici,
lomnikelo wakho wokudla leminikelo yakho yokunathwayo ngamajongosi, ngezinqama, langamawundlu, ngokwenani lakho, ngokwesimiso,
lempongo eyodwa ibe ngumnikelo wesono, ngaphandle komnikelo wokutshiswa wezikhathi zonke, lomnikelo wawo wokudla, lomnikelo wawo wokunathwayo.
Langosuku lwesithupha: Amajongosi ayisificaminwembili, inqama ezimbili, amawundlu alitshumi lane alomnyaka owodwa, angelasici,
lomnikelo wakho wokudla leminikelo yakho yokunathwayo, ngamajongosi, ngezinqama, langamawundlu, ngokwenani lakho, ngokwesimiso,
lempongo eyodwa ibe ngumnikelo wesono, ngaphandle komnikelo wokutshiswa wezikhathi zonke, umnikelo wawo wokudla, lomnikelo wawo wokunathwayo.
Langosuku lwesikhombisa: Amajongosi ayisikhombisa, inqama ezimbili, amawundlu alitshumi lane alomnyaka owodwa, angelasici,
lomnikelo wakho wokudla leminikelo yakho yokunathwayo, ngamajongosi, ngezinqama, langamawundlu, ngokwenani lakho, ngokwesimiso,
lempongo eyodwa ibe ngumnikelo wesono, ngaphandle komnikelo wokutshiswa wezikhathi zonke, umnikelo wawo wokudla, lomnikelo wawo wokunathwayo.
Ngosuku lwesificaminwembili lizakuba lomhlangano omkhulu; lingenzi lamsebenzi wezisebenzi,
kodwa linikele umnikelo wokutshiswa, umnikelo owenziwe ngomlilo, uqhatshi olumnandi eNni: Ijongosi elilodwa, inqama eyodwa, amawundlu ayisikhombisa alomnyaka owodwa, angelasici,
umnikelo wakho wokudla, leminikelo yakho yokunathwayo, ngejongosi, ngenqama, langamawundlu, ngokwenani lakho, ngokwesimiso,
lempongo eyodwa ibe ngumnikelo wesono, ngaphandle komnikelo wokutshiswa wezikhathi zonke, lomnikelo wawo wokudla, lomnikelo wawo wokunathwayo.
Lezizinto lizazenzela emikhosini yenu emisiweyo.
UMozisi wasekhuluma ebantwaneni bakoIsrayeli njengakho konke emlaye ngakho uMozisi.
UMozisi wasekhuluma kunhloko zezizwe zabantwana bakoIsrayeli esithi: Yile into elaye ngayo:
Nxa indoda ithembisa isithembiso eNni.
Futhi nxa owesifazana ethembisa isithembiso eNni, azibophe ngesibopho, esesemzini kayise ebutsheni bakhe,

loyise esizwa isithembiso sakhe lesibopho sakhe abophe ngaso umphefumulo wakhe, loyise athule kuye, khona zonke izithembiso zakhe zizakuma, laso sonke isibopho abopha ngaso umphefumulo wakhe sizakuma.
Kodwa uba uyise emenqabela, ngosuku ezwa ngalo, kakuyikuma lesisodwa sezithembiso zakhe lezibopho zakhe abophe ngazo umphefumulo wakhe; leN izamthethelela, ngoba uyise emnqabele.
Uba-ke elendoda sibili, lezithembiso zakhe ziphezu kwakhe, kumbe ilizwi lokungananzeleli lomlomo wakhe, abophe ngalo umphefumulo wakhe,
lendoda yakhe ikuzwa, yathula kuye ngosuku ezwa ngalo, khona izithembiso zakhe zizakuma, lezibopho abophe ngazo umphefumulo wakhe zizakuma.
Kodwa uba indoda yakhe imenqabela ngosuku ekuzwa ngalo, iyasenza ize isithembiso esiphezu kwakhe, lelizwi lokungananzeleli lomlomo wakhe, abophe ngalo umphefumulo wakhe; leN izamthethelela.
Kodwa isithembiso somfelokazi loba esolahliweyo, konke abophe ngakho umphefumulo wakhe, kuzakuma phezu kwakhe.
Uba-ke ethembisile endlini yendoda yakhe, loba ebophe umphefumulo wakhe ngesibopho ngesifungo,
lendoda yakhe izwile, yathula kuye, ingamenqabelanga, khona zonke izithembiso zakhe zizakuma, laso sonke isibopho abophe ngaso umphefumulo wakhe sizakuma.

Kodwa uba indoda yakhe izenza ize sibili ngosuku izizwa, konke okuphuma endebeni zakhe mayelana lezithembiso zakhe lamayelana lesibopho somphefumulo wakhe kakuyikuma; indoda yakhe izenze ize; leN izamthethelela.
Sonke isithembiso laso sonke isifungo sesibopho ukuthobisa umphefumulo, indoda yakhe ingasiqinisa loba indoda yakhe isenze ize.
Kodwa uba indoda yakhe ithula lokumthulela insuku ngensuku, abeseqinisa zonke izithembiso zakhe kumbe zonke izibopho zakhe eziphezu kwakhe; iyaziqinisa, ngoba yathula kuye ngosuku lokuzwa kwayo.
Kodwa uba izenza ize sibili emva kokuzwa kwayo, izathwala ububi bakhe.
Lezi yizimiso eyamlaya zona uMozisi, phakathi kwendoda lomkayo, phakathi kukayise lendodakazi yakhe ebutsheni bayo emzini kayise.
yasikhuluma kuMozisi isithi:
Phindisela impindiselo yabantwana bakoIsrayeli kumaMidiyani.
UMozisi wakhuluma ebantwini esithi: Abanye benu kabahlomele impi ukuze bamelane lamaMidiyani, benze impindiselo yeN kumaMidiyani.
Thumelani empini abayinkulungwane kuleso lalesosizwe, kuzo zonke izizwe zakoIsrayeli.
Kwasekunikelwa kuvela ezinkulungwaneni zakoIsrayeli inkulungwane ngesizwe, inkulungwane ezilitshumi lambili zihlomele impi.
UMozisi wasezithumela empini, inkulungwane ngesizwe, zona loPhinehasi indodana kaEleyazare umpristi, ukuya empini, belempahla ezingcwele lempondo zokuhlaba umkhosi esandleni sakhe.
Basebesilwa bemelene lamaMidiyani, njengokulaya kweN kuMozisi, babulala bonke abesilisa.
Babulala njalo amakhosi eMidiyani, ngaphandle kwababuleweyo, oEvi loRekemi.
Abantwana bakoIsrayeli basebethumba abesifazana bamaMidiyani labantwanyana babo, baphanga inkomo zawo zonke, lezimvu zawo zonke, layo yonke inotho yawo.
Batshisa ngomlilo yonke imizi ayehlala kiyo, lazo zonke izinqaba zawo.
Bathatha yonke impango lakho konke okuthunjiweyo, kwabantu lokwezifuyo,
baletha abathunjiweyo lempango lokuthunjiweyo kuMozisi lakuEleyazare umpristi, lakunhlangano yabantwana bakoIsrayeli, enkambeni emagcekeni akoMowabi, aseJodani eJeriko.
UMozisi loEleyazare umpristi leziphathamandla zonke zenhlangano basebephuma ukubahlangabeza ngaphandle kwenkamba.
UMozisi wasethukuthelela induna zebutho, induna zezinkulungwane lenduna zamakhulu ezazivela ebuthweni lempi.
UMozisi wasesithi kuzo: Liyekele yini abesifazana bonke ukuthi baphile?
Khangelani, yilaba abenza abantwana bakoIsrayeli.
Ngakho-ke bulalani wonke owesilisa ebantwanyaneni, libulale wonke owesifazana owazi indoda ngokulala lendoda;
kodwa bonke abantwanyana abesifazana abangazanga indoda ngokulala layo, libayekele baphile, babe ngabenu.
Lina-ke, misani inkamba ngaphandle kwenkamba insuku eziyisikhombisa, loba ngubani obulele umuntu,
lihlambulule sonke isembatho, layo yonke into eyenziweyo ngesikhumba, lakho konke okwenziweyo ngoboya bembuzi, layo yonke into eyenziweyo ngesihlahla.
UEleyazare umpristi wasesithi kumadoda empi ayephume impi: Lesi yisimiso somlayo emlaye ngaso uMozisi:
Kuphela igolide, lesiliva, ithusi, insimbi, ithini, lomnuso,
yonke into engahlala emlilweni lizayidlulisa emlilweni, ihlambuluke; loba kunjalo izahlanjululwa. Lakho konke okungahlali emlilweni lizakudlulisa emanzini.
Njalo lizawatsha izembatho zenu ngosuku lwesikhombisa, lihlambuluke, lemva kwalokho lingene enkambeni.
yasikhuluma kuMozisi isithi:
Thatha inani lonke lempango lokuthunjiweyo, okwabantu lokwezifuyo, wena, loEleyazare umpristi, lenhloko zaboyise zenhlangano;
yehlukanisa impango ibe zingxenye ezimbili, phakathi kwabahlanganyela empini baphuma impi lenhlangano yonke.
Njalo thelisela umthelo emadodeni empi ayephumele impi, umphefumulo owodwa phakathi kwamakhulu amahlanu, owabantu, lowenkomo, lowabobabhemi, lowezimvu,
likuthathe kungxenye yawo eyodwa kwezimbili, njalo ukunike uEleyazare umpristi kube ngumnikelo wokuphakanyiswa weN.
Lengxenyeni eyodwa kwezimbili yabantwana bakoIsrayeli thatha isabelo esisodwa kwezingamatshumi amahlanu, esabantu, esezinkomo, esabobabhemi, lesezimvu, kuso sonke isifuyo.
UMozisi loEleyazare umpristi basebesenza njengokulaya kweN kuMozisi.
Lempango eyayisele lokuthunjiweyo abantu bempi abakuthumbayo yayiyizimvu ezizinkulungwane ezingamakhulu ayisithupha lamatshumi ayisikhombisa lanhlanu,
lenkomo ezizinkulungwane ezingamatshumi ayisikhombisa lambili,
labobabhemi abazinkulungwane ezingamatshumi ayisithupha lanye,
lemiphefumulo yabantu besifazana abangazanga ukulala lendoda, bonke abantu babeyizinkulungwane ezingamatshumi amathathu lambili.
Lengxenye, isabelo sababephumele impi, ngenani, yayiyizimvu ezizinkulungwane ezingamakhulu amathathu lamatshumi amathathu lesikhombisa lamakhulu amahlanu;
lomthelo eNni wezimvu wawungamakhulu ayisithupha lamatshumi ayisikhombisa lanhlanu.
Lenkomo zazizinkulungwane ezingamatshumi amathathu lesithupha; lomthelo wazo eNni wawungamatshumi ayisikhombisa lambili.
Labobabhemi babeyizinkulungwane ezingamatshumi amathathu lamakhulu amahlanu; lomthelo wabo eNni wawungamatshumi ayisithupha lanye.
Lemiphefumulo yabantu yayizinkulungwane ezilitshumi lesithupha; lomthelo wayo eNni wawungabantu abangamatshumi amathathu lambili.
UMozisi wasenika umthelo, umnikelo wokuphakanyiswa weN, kuEleyazare umpristi, njengalokho yamlaya uMozisi.
Lokwengxenye yabantwana bakoIsrayeli, uMozisi ayehlukanise ivela emadodeni ayelwe impi.
Lengxenye enge yenhlangano, eyezimvu, yayizinkulungwane ezingamakhulu amathathu lamatshumi amathathu lesikhombisa lamakhulu amahlanu,
lenkomo ezizinkulungwane ezingamatshumi amathathu lesithupha,
labobabhemi abazinkulungwane ezingamatshumi amathathu lamakhulu amahlanu,
lemiphefumulo yabantu abayizinkulungwane ezilitshumi lesithupha.

Lakuyo ingxenye yabantwana bakoIsrayeli uMozisi wathatha isabelo esisodwa kwezingatshumini amahlanu, esabantu lesezifuyo, wakunika amaLevi ayelondoloza imfanelo yethabhanekele leN, njengokulaya kweN kuMozisi.
Iziphathamandla ezaziphezu kwezinkulungwane zebutho, izinduna zezinkulungwane lezinduna zamakhulu, zasezisondela kuMozisi,
zathi kuMozisi: Izinceku zakho sezithethe inani lonke lamadoda empi ayengaphansi kwesandla sethu; njalo kakulamuntu ongekho kithi.
Ngakho silethile umnikelo weN, ngulowo lalowo awutholileyo, izinto zegolide, izigqizo.
UMozisi loEleyazare umpristi basebesemukela igolide kuzo, zonke izinto ezenziwe ngobungcitshi.

Lalo lonke igolide lomnikelo abalinikela eNni, livela ezinduneni zezinkulungwane lenduneni zamakhulu lalingamashekeli azinkulungwane ezilitshumi lesithupha lamakhulu ayisikhombisa lamatshumi amahlanu.
Amadoda empi ayethethe impango, yileyo laleyo engeyayo.
UMozisi loEleyazare umpristi basebesemukela igolide enduneni zezinkulungwane lezamakhulu, baliletha ethenteni lenhlangano, kube yisikhumbuzo kubantwana bakoIsrayeli phambi kweN.
Mayelana labantwana bakoRubeni labantwana bakoGadi, babelenkomo ezinengi, ezinengi kakhulu. Sebebone ilizwe leJazeri lelizwe leGileyadi, khangela-ke, indawo yayiyindawo yenkomo.
Ngakho abantwana bakoGadi labantwana bakoRubeni beza bakhuluma kuMozisi lakuEleyazare umpristi lakuziphathamandla zenhlangano, besithi:
IAtarothi leDiboni leBeyoni,
ilizwe eyalitshayayo phambi kwenhlangano yakoIsrayeli, liyilizwe lezinkomo; futhi izinceku zenu zilezinkomo.
Basebesithi: Nxa sithole umusa emehlweni akho, ilizwe leli kaliphiwe inceku zakho libe yimfuyo; ungasichaphisi iJodani.
UMozisi wasesithi ebantwaneni bakoGadi lebantwaneni bakoRubeni: Abafowenu bazakuya empini, lina-ke lihlale lapha yini?
Njalo lizadaniselani inhliziyo yabantwana bakoIsrayeli ukuze bangachaphi ukuya elizweni ebanike lona?
Benza njalo oyihlo mhla ngibathuma besuka eKadeshi-Bhaneya ukubona ilizwe.
Ekuhambeni kwabo ukuya esihotsheni seEshikoli, balibona ilizwe, badanisa inhliziyo yabantwana bakoIsrayeli ukuze bangangeni elizweni eyayibanike lona.
Ulaka lweN lwaseluvutha ngalolusuku, yasifunga isithi:
Isibili kakho kumadoda enyuka esuka eGibhithe, ngoba kabangilandelanga ngokupheleleyo;
ngaphandle kukaKalebi indodana kaJefune umKenizi.
Lolaka lweN lwamvuthela uIsrayeli, yasibazulisa enkangala iminyaka engamatshumi amane.
Khangelani-ke, selivukile esikhundleni saboyihlo, inzalo yabantu abonayo, ukwandisa futhi intukuthelo yeN evuthela uIsrayeli.
Uba liphenduka ekuyilandeleni, izaphinda njalo ibatshiye enkangala; njalo lizabhubhisa bonke lababantu.
Basebesondela kuye bathi: Sizakwakha lapha izibaya zezifuyo zethu, lemizi yabantwanyana bethu;
kodwa thina sizahloma, size sibafikise endaweni yabo, labantwanyana bethu bazahlala emizini evikelekileyo, ngenxa yabahlali belizwe.
Kasiyikubuyela emizini yethu, abantwana bakoIsrayeli baze badle, ngulowo lalowo ilifa lakhe.
Ngoba kasiyikudla ilifa kanye labo ngaphetsheya kweJodani langaphambili, ngoba ilifa lethu selehlele kithi nganeno kweJodani empumalanga.
UMozisi wasesithi kubo: Nxa lisenza linto, nxa lizahamba lihlomele impi phambi kweN,
beselichapha iJodani, wonke ohlomileyo kini, phambi kweN KOSI,
lelizwe lehliselwe phansi phambi kweN, khona emva kwalokho lizabuya, lingabi lacala eNni lakuIsrayeli; lalelilizwe lizakuba yilifa lenu phambi kweN.
Kodwa nxa lingenzi njalo, khangelani lizabe lonile eNni; ngakho yazini ukuthi isono senu sizalithola.
Zakheleni imizi yabantwanyana benu lezibaya zezimvu zenu, njalo yenzani lokho okuphume emlonyeni wenu.
Abantwana bakoGadi labantwana bakoRubeni basebekhuluma kuMozisi besithi: Izinceku zakho zizakwenza njengalokho inkosi yami ilaya.
Abantwanyana bethu, omkethu, izimvu zethu, lazo zonke izifuyo zethu kuzakuba lapho emizini yeGileyadi;
kodwa inceku zakho zizachapha, ngulowo lalowo ehlomele impi, phambi kukaJehova empini, njengokutsho kwenkosi yami.
UMozisi waselayezela ngabo kuEleyazare umpristi, loJoshuwa indodana kaNuni, lenhloko zaboyise zezizwe zabantwana bakoIsrayeli.

UMozisi wasesithi kubo: Nxa abantwana bakoGadi labantwana bakoRubeni bechapha lani iJodani, wonke ehlomele impi, phambi kweN, lelizwe lisehliselwa phansi phambi kwenu, khona lizabanika ilizwe leGileyadi libe yimfuyo.
Kodwa uba bengachaphi lani behlomile, bazakuba lemfuyo phakathi kwenu elizweni leKhanani.
Abantwana bakoGadi labantwana bakoRubeni basebephendula besithi: Lokhu esikutshilo kunceku zakho - sizakwenza njalo.
Thina sizachapha sihlomile phambi kweN siye elizweni leKhanani, ukuze imfuyo yelifa lethu ibe ngeyethu nganeno kweJodani.
Njalo uMozisi wabanika, kubantwana bakoGadi lakubantwana bakoRubeni lakungxenye yesizwe sakoManase, indodana kaJosefa.
Labantwana bakoGadi bakha iDiboni
leAtirothi-Shofani leJazeri leJogibeha,
leBeti-Nimra leBeti-Harani, imizi evikelweyo, lezibaya zezimvu.
Labantwana bakoRubeni bakha iHeshiboni
leNebo; basebebiza amabizo emizi abayakhayo nga manyeamabizo.
Labantwana bakoMakiri indodana kaManase baya eGileyadi, bayithumba, bawakhupha amaAmori emfuyweni yawo ayekuyo.
UMozisi wasenika uMakiri indodana kaManase iGileyadi, wasehlala kiyo.
LoJayiri indodana kaManase wayathumba imizana yayo.
LoNoba wayathumba iKenathi, lemizana yayo, wayibiza ngokuthi yiNoba ngebizo lakhe.
Lezi zinhambo zabantwana bakoIsrayeli abaphuma elizweni leGibhithe ngamabutho abo, ngesandla sikaMozisi loAroni.
UMozisi wasebhala ukuphuma kwabo ngezinhambo zabo ngokomlayo weN. Lalezi zinhambo zabo njengokuphuma kwabo.
Basebesuka eRamesesi,
lapho amaGibhithe engcwaba labo eyabatshayayo phakathi kwawo, wonke amazibulo.
Abantwana bakoIsrayeli basebesuka eRamesesi, bamisa inkamba eSukothi.
Basuka eSukothi, bamisa inkamba eEthama elisekucineni kwenkangala.
Basuka eEthama, babuyela ePi-Hahirothi.
Basuka ePi-Hahirothi, badabula phakathi kolwandle besiya enkangala.
Basuka eMara, bayafika eElimi; njalo eElimi kwakukhona imithombo yamanzi elitshumi lambili lezihlahla zelala ezingamatshumi ayisikhombisa; basebemisa inkamba lapho.
Basuka eElimi, bamisa inkamba eLwandle oluBomvu.
Basuka eLwandle oluBomvu, bamisa inkamba enkangala yeSini.
Basuka enkangala yeSini, bamisa inkamba eDofika.
Basuka eDofika, bamisa inkamba eAlushi.
Basuka eAlushi, bamisa inkamba eRefidimi lapho okwakungelamanzi khona okuthi abantu banathe.
Basebesuka eRefidimi, bamisa inkamba enkangala yeSinayi.
Basuka enkangala yeSinayi, bamisa inkamba eKibirothi-Hathava.
Basuka eKibirothi-Hathava, bamisa inkamba eHazerothi.
Basuka eHazerothi, bamisa inkamba eRithima.
Basuka eRithima, bamisa inkamba eRimoni-Perezi.
Basuka eRimoni-Perezi, bamisa inkamba eLibhina.
Basuka eLibhina, bamisa inkamba eRisa.
Basuka eRisa, bamisa inkamba eKehelatha.
Basuka eKehelatha, bamisa inkamba entabeni yeSheferi.
Basuka entabeni yeSheferi, bamisa inkamba eHarada.
Basuka eHarada, bamisa inkamba eMakelothi.
Basuka eMakelothi, bamisa inkamba eTahathi.
Basuka eTahathi, bamisa inkamba eTera.
Basuka eTera, bamisa inkamba eMithika.
Basuka eMithika, bamisa inkamba eHashimona.
Basuka eHashimona, bamisa inkamba eMoserothi.
Basuka eMoserothi, bamisa inkamba eBene-Jakani.
Basuka eBene-Jakani.
Basuka eHori-Hagidigadi, bamisa inkamba eJotibatha.
Basuka eJotibatha, bamisa inkamba eAbrona.
Basuka eAbrona, bamisa inkamba eEziyoni-Geberi.
Basuka eEziyoni-Geberi, bamisa inkamba enkangala yeZini, eyiKadeshi.
Basuka eKadeshi, bamisa inkamba entabeni yeHori ekucineni kwelizwe leEdoma.

UAroni umpristi wasesenyukela entabeni yeHori ngokomlayo weN, wafela khona, ngomnyaka wamatshumi amane emva kokuphuma kwabantwana bakoIsrayeli elizweni leGibhithe, ngenyanga yesihlanu, ngo sukulokuqala lwenyanga.
Njalo uAroni wayeleminyaka elikhulu lamatshumi amabili lantathu ekufeni kwakhe entabeni yeHori.
UmKhanani, inkosi yeAradi, owayehlala eningizimu elizweni leKhanani, wasesizwa ngokuza kwabantwana bakoIsrayeli.
Basebesuka entabeni yeHori, bamisa inkamba eZalimona.
Basuka eZalimona, bamisa inkamba ePunoni.
Basuka ePunoni, bamisa inkamba eObothi.
Basuka eObothi, bamisa inkamba eIye-Abarimi, emngceleni wakoMowabi.
Basuka eIyimi, bamisa inkamba eDiboni-Gadi.
Basuka eDiboni-Gadi, bamisa inkamba eAlimoni-Dibilathayimi.
Basuka eAlimoni-Dibilathayimi.
Basuka entabeni zeAbarimi, bamisa inkamba emagcekeni akoMowabi eJodani eJeriko;
bamisa inkamba eJodani kusukela eBeti-Jeshimothi kusiya eAbeli-Shithimi.
yasikhuluma kuMozisi emagcekeni akoMowabi, eJodani eJeriko, isithi:
Tshono ebantwaneni bakoIsrayeli uthi kubo: Lapho selichaphe iJodani laya elizweni leKhanani,
lizaxotsha,
lidle, lihlale kilo, ngoba ngilinike ilizwe ukuthi lidle ilifa lalo.

Njalo lizakudla ilifa lelizwe ngenkatho ngensendo zenu; kwabanengi lizakwengeza ilifa labo, lakwabalutshwana lizanciphisa ilifa labo. Lapho inkatho ezamphumela khona umuntu, kuzakuba ngokwakhe. Njengezizwe zaboyihlo lizakudla ilifa.
Kodwa nxa lingabakhuphi abakhileyo elizweni emfuyweni yabo phambi kwenu, balihluphe elizweni elihlala kilo.
Kuzakuthi-ke, ngizakwenza kini njengalokhu ebengicabanga ukukwenza kubo.
yasikhuluma kuMozisi isithi:
Laya abantwana bakoIsrayeli uthi kubo: Lapho lingena elizweni leKhanani, leli lizakuba yilizwe elizawela kini libe yilifa, ilizwe leKhanani, ngokwemingcele yalo.
Legumbi lenu leningizimu lizakuba kusukela enkangala yeZini, enhlangothini zeEdoma.
Umngcele wenu uzajika uvela eningizimu usiya emqansweni weAkirabimi, wedlulele eZini.
Lomngcele uzajika uvela eAzimoni uye esifuleni seGibhithe; lokuphuma kwawo kuzakuba selwandle.
Mayelana lomngcele wentshonalanga, ulwandle olukhulu luzakuba ngumngcele wenu; lona luzakuba ngumngcele wenu ngentshonalanga.
Lalokhu kuzakuba ngumngcele wenu wenyakatho: Kusukela elwandle olukhulu lizazidwebela intaba yeHori;
kusukela entabeni yeHori.
Lomngcele uzaphuma uye eZifroni, lokuphuma kwawo kuzakuba eHazari-Enani. Lo uzakuba ngumngcele wenu wenyakatho.
Njalo lizazidwebela umngcele wenu wempumalanga kusukela eHazari-Enani kusiya eShefamu;
lomngcele uzakwehla uvela eShefamu uye eRibila empumalanga kweAyini.
Umngcele uzakwehlela-ke eJodani, lokuphuma kwawo kuzakuba solwandle lwetshwayi. Leli lizakuba yilizwe lenu ngemingcele yalo inhlangothi zonke.
UMozisi waselaya abantwana bakoIsrayeli esithi: Leli yilizwe elizakudla ilifa lalo ngenkatho, elaye ngalo ukulinika izizwe eziyisificamunwemunye lengxenye yesizwe.
Ngoba isizwe sabantwana bakoRubeni ngezindlu zaboyise, lesizwe sabantwana bakoGadi ngezindlu zaboyise zemukele, lengxenye yesizwe sakoManase yemukele ilifa layo.
Izizwe ezimbili lengxenye yesizwe zemukele ilifa lazo nganeno kweJodani, eJeriko, empumalanga, lapho okuphuma khona ilanga.
yasikhuluma kuMozisi isithi:
La ngamabizo amadoda azalabela ilizwe libe yilifa: UEleyazare umpristi loJoshuwa indodana kaNuni.
Njalo lizathatha isiphathamandla kuleso lalesosizwe ukwehlukanisa ilizwe libe yilifa.
Lala ngamabizo amadoda: Esizweni sakoJuda, uKalebi indodana kaJefune.
Lesizweni sabantwana bakoSimeyoni, uShemuweli indodana kaAmihudi.
Esizweni sakoBhenjamini, uElidadi indodana kaKisiloni.
Lesizweni sabantwana bakoDani, isiphathamandla uBuki indodana kaJogili.
Ebantwaneni bakoJosefa, esizweni sabantwana bakoManase, isiphathamandla uHaniyeli indodana kaEfodi.
Lesizweni sabantwana bakoEfrayimi, isiphathamandla uKemuweli indodana kaShifitani.
Lesizweni sabantwana bakoZebuluni, isiphathamandla uElizafani indodana kaParinaki.
Lesizweni sabantwana bakoIsakari, isiphathamandla uPalitiyeli indodana kaAzani.
Lesizweni sabantwana bakoAsheri, isiphathamandla uAhiyudi indodana kaShelomi.
Lesizweni sabantwana bakoNafithali, isiphathamandla uPedaheli indodana kaAmihudi.
Yibo labo eyabalaya ukwehlukanisela abantwana bakoIsrayeli ilifa elizweni leKhanani.
yasikhuluma kuMozisi emagcekeni akoMowabi, eJodani eJeriko, isithi:
Laya abantwana bakoIsrayeli ukuthi banike amaLevi okwelifa lemfuyo yabo imizi yokuhlala inhlangothi zonke zawo.
Njalo azakuba lemizi yokuhlala, lamadlelo awo abe ngawenkomo zawo lawempahla zawo lawezifuyo zawo zonke.
Lamadlelo emizi elizawanika amaLevi azakuba kusukela emthangaleni womuzi langaphandle izingalo eziyinkulungwane inhlangothi zonke.

Njalo lizalinganisa ngaphandle komuzi ingalo ezizinkulungwane ezimbili ehlangothini lwempumalanga, lengalo ezizinkulungwane ezimbili ehlangothini lweningizimu, lengalo ezizinkulungwane ezimbili ehlangothini lwentshonalanga, lengalo ezizinkulungwane ezimbili ehlangothini lwenyakatho, lomuzi ube phakathi. Lokho kuzakuba ngamadlelo awo emizi.
Lemizi elizayinika amaLevi izakuba yimizi eyisithupha yokuphephela elizayinika, ukuze umbulali abalekele khona; langaphezu kwayo linike imizi engamatshumi amane lambili.
Yonke imizi elizayinika amaLevi izakuba ngamatshumi amane lesificaminwembili, yile lamadlelo ayo.
Lemizi elizayinika emfuyweni yabantwana bakoIsrayeli; koleminengi lithathe eminengi; ngulowo lalowo njengokwelifa lakhe azalidla, uzanika okwemizi yakhe kumaLevi.
yasikhuluma kuMozisi isithi:
Tshono ebantwaneni bakoIsrayeli uthi kibo: Lapho lichapha iJodani lingene elizweni leKhanani,
zimiseleni imizi ezakuba yimizi yenu yokuphephela, ukuze umbulali abalekele khona, otshaye umuntu kungeyisikho ngabomo.
Njalo izakuba yimizi yenu yokuphephela kumphindiseli, ukuthi umbulali angafi aze eme phambi kwenhlangano ukuthi ahlulelwe.
Lemizi elizayinika izakuba yimizi yenu eyisithupha yokuphephela.
Lizanika imizi emithathu nganeno kweJodani, linike imizi emithathu elizweni leKhanani, ibe yimizi yokuphephela.
Limizi eyisithupha izakuba ngeyokuphephela kwabantwana bakoIsrayeli, lakowemzini lakowezizweni phakathi kwabo, ukuze loba ngubani otshaya umuntu kungeyisikho ngabomo abalekele khona.
Njalo nxa emtshaya ngesikhali sensimbi afe, ungumbulali; umbulali kabulawe lokubulawa.
Njalo nxa emtshaya ngelitshe elisesandleni angafa ngalo, abesesifa, ungumbulali; umbulali kabulawe lokubulawa.
Kumbe ubaemtshaya ngesikhali sesigodo esisesandleni angafa ngaso, abesesifa, ungumbulali; umbulali kabulawe lokubulawa.
Umphindiseli wegazi, yena uzabulala umbulali; lapho ehlangana laye, yena uzambulala.
Njalo nxa emsunduza ngokuzonda, loba emjikijela ngokucathama, afe,
loba ngobutha emtshaya ngesandla sakhe, afe, lowo otshayayo kabulawe lokubulawa, ungumbulali; umphindiseli wegazi uzabulala umbulali lapho ehlangana laye.
Kodwa uba emsunduzile masinyane engelabutha, loba emjikijela loba ngasiphi isikhali,
kumbe loba ngaliphi ilitshe, angafa ngalo, enga m boni, aliwisele kuye, afe, lanxa engeyisiso isitha sakhe, futhi engadingi ububi bakhe,
inhlangano izakwahlulela phakathi komtshayi lomphindiseli wegazi ngokwezahlulelo lezi.
Lenhlangano izamophula umbulali esandleni somphindiseli wegazi; lenhlangano imbuyisele emzini wokuphephela kwakhe, lapho abebalekele khona, ahlale kuwo, aze afe umpristi omkhulu.
Kodwa uba umbulali ephuma nje umngcele womuzi wokuphephela kwakhe, abebalekele khona,
umphindiseli wegazi emfica ngaphandle komngcele womuzi wokuphephela kwakhe, umphindiseli wegazi uzabulala umbulali; kayikuba lecala legazi.
Ngoba ngabe uhlale emzini wokuphephela kwakhe, aze afe umpristi omkhulu; kodwa emva kokufa kompristi omkhulu umbulali uzabuyela elizweni lemfuyo yakhe.
Njalo lezizinto zizakuba ngumthetho wesahlulelo kini, ezizukulwaneni zenu, kuyo yonke imizi yenu.
Loba ngubani otshaya umuntu, ngomlomo wabafakazi umbulali uzabulawa; kodwa umfakazi oyedwa kayikufakaza ngomuntu ukuthi afe.
Futhi kaliyikuthatha inhlawulo ngempilo yombulali ocaleke ngokufa; ngoba uzabulawa lokubulawa.
Njalo kaliyikuthatha inhlawulo ngobalekele emzini wokuphephela kwakhe, ukuze abuyele ukuyahlala elizweni, aze afe umpristi.
Ngakho kaliyikungcolisa ilizwe.
Ngakho lingangcolisi ilizwe elihlala kilo, engihlala phakathi kwalo.

Kwasekusondela inhloko zaboyise zensendo zabantwana bakoGileyadi indodana kaMakiri indodana kaManase, abosendo lwabantwana bakoJosefa, zakhuluma phambi kukaMozisi laphambi kweziphathamandla, inhloko zaboyise babantwana bakoIsrayeli,
zathi: yalaya inkosi yami ukuthi iphe abantwana bakoIsrayeli ilizwe njengelifa ngenkatho.
Uba esendela kwenye yamadodana ezizwe zabantwana bakoIsrayeli, ilifa lawo lizasuswa elifeni labobaba.
Lalapho kuzakuba lijubili labantwana bakoIsrayeli.
UMozisi waselaya abantwana bakoIsrayeli ngokomlomo weN esithi: Isizwe sabantwana bakoJosefa sikhulume kuhle.
Le yinto eyilayileyo mayelana lamadodakazi kaZelofehadi isithi: Kawendele kulabo abahle emehlweni awo, kodwa kawendele osendweni lwesizwe sikayise.
Ngalokho ilifa labantwana bakoIsrayeli kalingabhodi lisuke esizweni liye esizweni, ngoba abantwana bakoIsrayeli bazanamathela, ngulowo lalowo elifeni lesizwe saboyise.
Layileyo laleyo indodakazi edla ilifa esizweni sabantwana bakoIsrayeli izakwendela komunye wosendo wesizwe sikayise, ukuze abantwana bakoIsrayeli badle ilifa, omunye lomunye ilifa laboyise.
Ngalokho ilifa kaliyikubhoda lisuke esizweni liye kwesinye isizwe, ngoba izizwe zabantwana bakoIsrayeli zizanamathela, ngulowo lalowo elifeni lakhe.
Njengokulaya kweN kuMozisi enza njalo amadodakazi kaZelofehadi;
ngoba uMahla, uTiriza, loHogila, loMilka, loNowa, amadodakazi kaZelofehadi, endela emadodaneni abafowabo bakayise.
Endela kunsendo zabantwana bakoManase indodana kaJosefa, lelifa lawo lahlala esizweni sosendo lukayise.
Le yimilayo lezahlulelo eyazilaya abantwana bakoIsrayeli ngesandla sikaMozisi emagcekeni akoMowabi eJodani eJeriko.
La ngamazwi uMozisi awakhuluma kuIsrayeli wonke nganeno kweJodani enkangala, egcekeni eliqondene leSufi, phakathi kweParani leTofeli leLabani.
Kulensuku ezilitshumi lanye kusukela eHorebe ngendlela yentaba yeSeyiri kusiya eKadeshi-Bhaneya.
Kwasekusithi ngomnyaka wamatshumi amane, ngenyanga yetshumi lanye, ngolokuqala lwenyanga, uMozisi wakhuluma kubantwana bakoIsrayeli njengakho konke eyamlaya ngakho kubo,
esemtshayile uSihoni inkosi yamaAmori owayehlala eAshitarothi eEdreyi.
Nganeno kweJodani, elizweni lakoMowabi, uMozisi waqala ukuchasisa lumlayo esithi:
uNkulunkulu wethu yakhuluma kithi eHorebe isithi: Selihlale isikhathi eseneleyo kulintaba.

Phendukani lisuke, liye entabeni yamaAmori, lendaweni ezakhelene lawo, egcekeni, entabeni, lesihotsheni, leningizimu, lekhunjini lolwandle, ilizwe lamaKhanani, leLebhanoni, kuze kube semfuleni omkhulu, umfula iYufrathi.
Bonani, ngibeke ilizwe phambi kwenu. Ngenani, lidle ilifa lelizwe eyalifungela oyihlo, oAbrahama, uIsaka, loJakobe, ukubanika lona lenzalo yabo emva kwabo.
Njalo ngakhuluma kini ngalesosikhathi ngisithi: Kangilakulithwala ngingedwa.
uNkulunkulu wenu ilandisile, khangelani-ke, lamuhla linjengenkanyezi zamazulu ngobunengi.
IN, uNkulunkulu waboyihlo, kayandise kini, njengoba linjalo, ngokuphindwe kankulungwane, ilibusise, njengokukhuluma kwayo kini.
Ngingedwa ngingathwala njani?
Zithatheleni amadoda ahlakaniphileyo, azwisisayo, laziwayo ezizweni zenu, ngiwabeke-ke abe zinhloko zenu.
Laselingiphendula lisithi: Ilizwi olikhulumileyo lilungile ukulenza.
Ngasengithatha inhloko zezizwe zenu, amadoda ahlakaniphileyo, aziwayo, ngawabeka aba zinhloko phezu kwenu, induna zezinkulungwane, lenduna zamakhulu, lenduna zamatshumi amahlanu, lenduna zamatshumi.
Ngasengilaya abahluleli benu ngalesosikhathi ngisithi: Zwanini oku phakathi kwabafowenu, lahlulele ngokulunga phakathi komuntu lomfowabo lowezizweni oku ye.
Lingakhangeli ubuso ekwahluleleni, zwanini omncinyane njengomkhulu; lingesabi ubuso bomuntu.
Langalesosikhathi ngalilaya zonke izinto elifanele ukuzenza.
Sasesisuka eHorebe, sahamba kuyo yonke leyonkangala enkulu leyesabekayo elayibonayo ngendlela yentaba yamaAmori, njengokusilaya kweN uNkulunkulu wethu.
Ngasengisithi kini: Selifikile entabeni yamaAmori uNkulunkulu wethu ezasinika yona.
Bona, uNkulunkulu wakho ilinikile ilizwe phambi kwakho; yenyuka udle ilifa lalo, njengokutsho kweN uNkulunkulu waboyihlo kuwe; ungesabi, ungadideki.
Laselisondela kimi lonke lathi: Asithume amadoda phambi kwethu ukuze asihlolele ilizwe, abuyise ilizwi kithi, indlela esizakwenyuka ngayo, lemizi esizangena kuyo.
Lendaba yayinhle emehlweni ami; ngakho ngathatha kini amadoda alitshumi lambili, indodanye ngesizwe.
Wona aphenduka, enyukela entabeni aze afika esihotsheni seEshikoli, asihlola.
Asethatha okwezithelo zelizwe esandleni sabo, azehlisela kithi; abuyisa ilizwi kithi athi: Ilizwe lihle uNkulunkulu wethu esinika lona.
Kanti kalifunanga ukwenyuka, kodwa lavukela umlomo weN uNkulunkulu wenu,
langunguna emathenteni enu lathi.
Sizakwenyukela ngaphi? Abafowethu benze inhliziyo yethu iphele amandla.
Ngasengisithi kini: Lingatshaywa luvalo, libesabe.
uNkulunkulu wenu ehamba phambi kwenu, yona izalilwela njengakho konke eyalenzela khona eGibhithe phambi kwamehlo enu,
lenkangala, lapho obone khona ukuthi uNkulunkulu wakho yakuthwala njengendoda ithwala indodana yayo, endleleni yonke elahamba ngayo laze lafika kulindawo.
Kodwa ngalelilizwi kalikholwanga uNkulunkulu wenu
eyahamba phambi kwenu endleleni.
Kwathi isizwile ilizwi lamazwi enu, yathukuthela yafunga yathi:
Isibili kakho kulamadoda alesisizukulwana esibi ozabona ilizwe elihle engafunga ukulinika oyihlo,
ngaphandle kukaKalebi indodana kaJefune; yena uzalibona. Njalo ngizanika kuye ilizwe anyathela kulo, lakubantwana bakhe, ngoba ulandele ngokupheleleyo.
Lami yangithukuthelela ngenxa yenu, isithi: Lawe kawuyikungena khona.
UJoshuwa indodana kaNuni.
Labantwanyana benu elalisithi bazakuba yimpango, labantwana benu.
Kodwa lina ziphendukeleni, lisuke liye enkangala, indlela yoLwandle oluBomvu.

Laseliphendula lisithi kimi: Sonile eNni; thina sizakwenyuka siyekulwa, njengakho konke uNkulunkulu wethu eyasilaya khona. Selihlomile, ngulowo lalowo isikhali sakhe sempi, lacabanga ukuthi kulula ukwenyukela entabeni.
yasisithi kimi: Tshono kubo: Lingenyuki, lingalwi, ngoba kangikho phakathi kwenu, hlezi litshaywe phambi kwezitha zenu.
Ngasengikhuluma kini, kodwa kalilalelanga, lavukela umlomo weN, laqholoza lenyukela entabeni.
Kwathi amaAmori ayehlala entabeni leyo aphuma ukumelana lani, alixotsha.
Laselibuya, lakhala inyembezi phambi kweN, kodwa kayilizwanga ilizwi lenu, kayibekanga indlebe kini.
Laselihlala eKadeshi insuku ezinengi, njengensuku elahlala ngazo.
Sasesiphenduka, sasuka saya enkangala, indlela yoLwandle oluBomvu, njengokutsho kweN kimi; njalo sayibhoda intaba yeSeyiri insuku ezinengi.
yasikhuluma kimi isithi:
Selibhode intaba le okweneleyo; phendukelani lina enyakatho.
Balaye-ke abantu usithi: Lidabula umngcele wabafowenu, abantwana bakaEsawu. Njalo bazalesaba, ngakho lizinanzelele kakhulu,
lingalwi labo; ngoba kangiyikulinika okwelizwe labo, lelingangokunyathela kwangaphansi konyawo.
Lizathenga ukudla kubo ngemali ukuze lidle, lithenge kubo lamanzi ngemali ukuze linathe.
Ngoba uNkulunkulu wakho ikubusisile emsebenzini wonke wesandla sakho; iyazi ukuhamba kwakho kulinkangala enkulu. Le iminyaka engamatshumi amane uNkulunkulu wakho ibilawe, kawuswelanga lutho.
Uba sisedlula sisuka kubafowethu, abantwana bakaEsawu abahlala eSeyiri, saphenduka, sadlula ngendlela yenkangala yakoMowabi.
yasisithi kimi: Ungahlukuluzi uMowabi, ungalwi labo empini; ngoba kangiyikukunika okwelizwe labo kube yilifa.
Kwakuhlala khona endulo amaEmi, abantu abakhulu, labanengi, labade;
babebalwa njenge ziqhwaga labo njengamaAnaki, kodwa amaMowabi ababiza ngokuthi ngamaEmi.
LamaHori ayehlala eSeyiri endulo.
Khathesi, sukumani lina lichaphe isifula iZeredi. Ngakho sachapha isifula iZeredi.
Lensuku esahamba ngazo sisuka eKadeshi-Bhaneya.
Ngoba isibili isandla seN sasimelene lawo, ukuwachitha esuka phakathi kwenkamba, aze aphela.
Kwasekusithi lapho wonke amadoda empi esephelile esifa esuka phakathi kwabantu,
yasikhuluma kimi isithi:
Lamuhla uzakwedlula iAri, umngcele wakoMowabi,
lapho ususondele maqondana labantwana bakoAmoni, ungabahlukuluzi, ungalwi labo, ngoba kangiyikukunika okwelizwe labantwana bakoAmoni kube yilifa.
Lalelo labalwa njengelizwe leziqhwaga. Iziqhwaga zahlala kulo endulo, kodwa amaAmoni bazibiza ngokuthi ngamaZamuzumu;
abantu abakhulu, labanengi, labade, njengamaAnaki; kodwa yabachitha phambi kwabo, babakhupha emfuyweni yabo, bahlala endaweni yabo,
njengalokho eyakwenzela abantwana bakaEsawu, ababehlala eSeyiri, lapho yawachitha amaHori esuka phambi kwabo, bawakhupha emfuyweni yabo, bahlala endaweni yawo kuze kube lamuhla.
LamaAvi, ayehlala eHazerimi.
Sukumani, lisuke.
Lamuhla ngizaqalisa ukufaka uvalo ngawe lokwesabeka kwakho phezu kobuso bezizwe, ngaphansi kwamazulu wonke, ezizakuzwa umbiko ngawe, zithuthumele, ziqhaqhazele ngenxa yakho.
Ngasengithuma izithunywa zisuka enkangala yeKedemothi kuSihoni inkosi yeHeshiboni, zilamazwi okuthula, zisithi:
; ngizahamba ngomgwaqo kuphela, ngingaphambukeli ngakwesokunene loba ngakwesokhohlo.
Uzangithengisela ukudla ngemali ukuze ngidle, ungiphe amanzi ngemali ukuze nginathe; kuphela ngizadabula ngenyawo zami,
njengalokhu abantwana bakaEsawu abahlala eSeyiri lamaMowabi ahlala eAri benza kimi, ngize ngichaphe iJodani, ngingene elizweni uNkulunkulu wethu esinika lona.
Kodwa uSihoni inkosi yeHeshiboni kasivumelanga ukuthi sidlule kuye.
yathi kimi: Bona, sengiqalisile ukunikela phambi kwakho uSihoni lelizwe lakhe; qalisa ukudla ilifa, ukuze udle ilifa lelizwe lakhe.
Kwasekuphuma uSihoni ukumelana lathi, yena labantu bakhe bonke, ukulwa eJahazi.
uNkulunkulu wethu yasimnikela phambi kwethu.
Ngalesosikhathi sasesithumba yonke imizi yakhe, satshabalalisa wonke umuzi, abesilisa labesifazana labantwanyana; kasitshiyanga insali;
sazithumbela izifuyo kuphela, lempango yemizi esayithumbayo.
Kusukela eAroweri esekhunjini lwesifula iArinoni, lomuzi osesifuleni, kuze kube seGileyadi kwakungekho muzi owawuphakeme kakhulu kithi.
Kuphela kawusondelanga elizweni labantwana bakoAmoni, endaweni yonke yesifula iJaboki, lemizini esezintabeni.
Sasesiphenduka sisenyuka ngendlela yeBashani. UOgi inkosi yeBashani wasephuma ukumelana lathi, yena labantu bakhe bonke.
Kodwa yathi kimi: Ungamesabi, ngoba ngizamnikela labantu bakhe bonke lelizwe lakhe esandleni sakho; njalo uzakwenza kuye njengokwenza kwakho kuSihoni inkosi yamaAmori owayehlala eHeshiboni.
Ngakho uNkulunkulu wethu yanikela esandleni sethu loOgi inkosi yeBashani labo bonke abantu bakhe; sasesimtshaya, kakwaze kwasala lansali kuye.
Sasesithumba yonke imizi yakhe ngalesosikhathi; kwakungelamuzi esingawuthathanga kibo; imizi engamatshumi ayisithupha, isabelo sonke seArigobi, umbuso kaOgi eBashani.
Yonke limizi yayivikelwe ngemithangala ephakemeyo, amasango lemigoqo, ngaphandle kwemizana eminengi kakhulu engelamithangala.
Sasesiyitshabalalisa.
Kodwa zonke izifuyo lempango yemizi, saziphangela.
Ngalesosikhathi sasesithatha esandleni samakhosi amabili amaAmori ilizwe, elalinganeno kweJodani, kusukela esifuleni iArinoni kuze kube sentabeni yeHermoni.
(AmaSidoni ayibiza iHermoni.)
Yonke imizi yemagcekeni, leGileyadi yonke, leBashani yonke, imizi yombuso kaOgi eBashani.
Ngoba nguOgi kuphela, inkosi yeBashani, owasalayo kunsali yeziqhwaga.
Lalelilizwe sadla ilifa lalo ngalesosikhathi; kusukela eAroweri, elisesifuleni seArinoni, lengxenye yentaba yeGileyadi.
Lokuseleyo kweGileyadi leBashani yonke, umbuso kaOgi, ngakunika kungxenye yesizwe sakoManase.
UJayiri indodana kaManase wathatha isabelo sonke seArigobi.
Ngasengimnika uMakiri iGileyadi.
LakwabakoRubeni lakwabakoGadi nganika kusukela eGileyadi ngitsho kuze kufike esifuleni seArinoni, phakathi laphakathi kwesifula, lomngcele, njalo kuze kube sesifuleni iJaboki.
Lamagceke, leJodani, lomngcele, kusukela eKinerethi, ngaphansi kweAshidodi-Pisiga ngasempumalanga.
Ngasengililaya ngalesosikhathi ngisithi: uNkulunkulu wenu ilinikile lelilizwe libe yilifa lenu. Lizachapha lihlomile phambi kwabafowenu, abantwana bakoIsrayeli, wonke amadodana angamaqhawe.
Kuphela omkenu labantwanyana benu lezifuyo zenu - ngiyazi ukuthi lilezifuyo ezinengi - kuzahlala emizini yenu engilinike yona,
ize ibanike ukuphumula abafowenu njengani, baze bathi labo badle ilifa lelizwe uNkulunkulu wenu ebaphe lona, ngaphetsheya kweJodani; beselibuyela, ngulowo lalowo elifeni lakhe, engilinike lona.
Njalo ngamlaya uJoshuwa ngalesosikhathi ngisithi: Amehlo akho abonile konke uNkulunkulu wenu ekwenze kulawomakhosi amabili; izakwenza njalo kuyo yonke imibuso ozakwedlulela kuyo.
Lingabesabi, ngoba uNkulunkulu wenu, yona izalilwela.
Ngasengiyincenga ngalesosikhathi ngisithi:
Nkosi Jehova, wena usuqalile ukutshengisa inceku yakho ubukhulu bakho lesandla sakho esilamandla?
Ngicela ngichaphe, ngibone ilizwe elihle elingaphetsheya kweJodani, leyontaba enhle.
Kodwa yangithukuthelela ngenxa yenu, kayingizwanga.
Yenyukela engqongeni yePisiga, uphakamisele amehlo akho ngentshonalanga langenyakatho langeningizimu langempumalanga, ukhangele ngamehlo akho; ngoba kawuyikuchapha le iJodani.
Kodwa laya uJoshuwa.
Sasesihlala esigodini maqondana leBeti-Peyori.
Khathesi-ke, Israyeli, zwana izimiso lezahlulelo engilifundisa zona, ukuzenza, ukuze liphile, lingene lidle ilifa lelizwe uNkulunkulu waboyihlo elinika lona.
Kaliyikwengezelela elizwini engililaya lona, lingaphunguli luthokulo, ukuze ligcine imilayo yeN uNkulunkulu wenu engililaya yona.
Amehlo enu abonile eyakwenzayo ngenxa kaBhali-Peyori; ngoba wonke umuntu owalandela uBhali-Peyori, uNkulunkulu wenu yambhubhisa phakathi kwenu;
kodwa lina elanamathela eNni uNkulunkulu wenu liyaphila lonke lamuhla.
Bonani, ngilifundisile izimiso lezahlulelo, njengokungilaya kweN uNkulunkulu wami, ukuthi lenze njalo phakathi kwelizwe eliya kulo ukudla ilifa lalo.
Ngakho zigcineni, lizenze; ngoba lokhu kuyinhlakanipho yenu lokuqedisisa kwenu emehlweni ezizwe.
Ngoba yisiphi isizwe esikhulu?
Futhi yisiphi isizwe esikhulu esilezimiso lezahlulelo ezilungileyo njengalumlayo wonke engiwubeka phambi kwenu lamuhla?
Kuphela ziqaphele, ugcine kakhulu umphefumulo wakho, hlezi ukhohlwe izinto amehlo akho azibonileyo, njalo hlezi zisuke enhliziyweni yakho, zonke izinsuku zempilo yakho,

ukuthingosuku owema ngalo phambi kweN uNkulunkulu wakho eHorebe, lapho yathi kimi: Ngibuthanisela abantu ngibe sengibazwisa amazwi ami, ukuze bafunde ukungesaba zonke izinsuku abazaziphila emhlabeni, bafundise njalo abantwana babo.
Laselisondela, lema ngaphansi kwentaba, lentaba yayivutha umlilo kwaze kwaba phakathi kwamazulu, lo mnyama, amayezi, lomnyama onzima.
yasikhuluma kini iphakathi komlilo.
Yamemezela kini isivumelwano sayo, eyalilaya ukuthi lisenze.
yasingilaya ngalesosikhathi ukuthi ngilifundise izimiso lezahlulelo, ukuze lizenze elizweni elidlulela kulo ukudla ilifa lalo.
Ngakho-ke qaphelani kakhulu,
hlezi lizone, lizenzele isithombe esibaziweyo,
isifanekiso saloba yiyiphi inyamazana esemhlabeni,
isifanekiso saloba yikuphi okuhuquzelayo emhlabeni.
Futhi hlezi uphakamisele amehlo akho emazulwini, lapho ubona ilanga lenyanga lezinkanyezi, uNkulunkulu wakho ekwabele izizwe zonke ngaphansi kwamazulu wonke.
Kodwa lina yalithatha, yalikhupha esithandweni sensimbi, eGibhithe.
Futhi yangithukuthelela ngenxa yenu, yafunga ukuthi kangiyikuchapha iJodani, lokuthi kangiyikungena kulelolizwe elihle uNkulunkulu wakho ekunika lona libe yilifa.
Ngoba ngizafela kulelilizwe.
Ziqapheleni, lizenzele isithombe esibaziweyo, umfanekiso waloba yikuphi uNkulunkulu wakho ekwenqabele khona.
Ngoba uNkulunkulu wakho ingumlilo oqothulayo.
Lapho uzala abantwana labantwana babantwana, njalo selihlale elizweni isikhathi eside, uba lisonakala, lenze isithombe esibaziweyo, umfanekiso waloba yikuphi,

ngibiza amazulu lomhlaba lamuhla ukuze kufakaze kumelene lani ukuthi lizabhubha lokubhubha masinyane lisuka elizweni elichapha iJodani ukuya kilo ukuze libe yilifa lenu; kaliyikwelula insuku zenu phezu kwalo, ngoba lizabhujiswa lokubhujiswa.
Njalo izalichithachitha phakathi kwezizwe.
Lapho lizakhonza onkulunkulu, umsebenzi wezandla zabantu, izigodo lamatshe.
Kodwa lilapho liyidinge uNkulunkulu wakho, uzayithola uba uyidinga ngenhliziyo yakho yonke langomphefumulo wakho wonke.
Lapho usekuhluphekeni, lezizinto zonke zikwehlela, ekupheleni kwezinsuku;
ngoba uNkulunkulu wakho inguNkulunkulu olomusa, kayiyikukutshiya, kayiyikukubhubhisa, kayiyikukhohlwa isivumelwano saboyihlo, eyasifunga kubo.
Ngoba buza-ke ngensuku zamandulo ezazingaphambi kwakho, kusukela osukwini uNkulunkulu adala ngalo umuntu emhlabeni?
Abantu bakebezwa yini ilizwi likaNkulunkulu likhuluma livela phakathi komlilo, njengalokhu ulizwile wena, waphila?
Futhi uNkulunkulu wakewazama yini ukuyazithathela isizwe phakathi kwesizwe, ngezilingo, njengakho konke uNkulunkulu wenu eyalenzela khona eGibhithe phambi kwamehlo akho?
Wena wakutshengiswa, ukuze wazi ukuthi uJehova unguNkulunkulu; kakho omunye ngaphandle kwakhe.
Esemazulwini wakuzwisa ilizwi lakhe ukukufundisa; lemhlabeni wakutshengisa umlilo wakhe omkhulu, lamazwi akhe wawezwa evela phakathi komlilo.
Njalo ngoba wabathanda oyihlo, wakhetha inzalo yabo emva kwabo, wakukhupha eGibhithe ebusweni bakhe ngamandla akhe amakhulu,
ukuxotsha elifeni izizwe ezinkulu lezilamandla kulawe phambi kwakho, ukukungenisa, ukukupha ilizwe lazo, libe yilifa, njengalamuhla.
Ngakho yazi lamuhla, ukukhumbule enhliziyweni yakho ukuthi inguNkulunkulu emazulwini phezulu, lemhlabeni phansi.
Ngakho uzagcina izimiso zakhe lemilayo yakhe engikulaya yona lamuhla.
Khona uMozisi wehlukanisa imizi emithathu nganeno kweJodani ngasempumalanga,
ukuthi abalekele kuyo umbulali obulele umakhelwane wakhe kungeyisikho ngabomo;
iBezeri enkangala; leRamothi eGileyadi, elabakoGadi; leGolani eBashani, elabakoManase.
Njalo yilo umlayo uMozisi awubeka phambi kwabantwana bakoIsrayeli.
Lobu yibufakazi lezimiso lezahlulelo uMozisi akukhuluma ebantwaneni bakoIsrayeli ekuphumeni kwabo eGibhithe,
nganeno kweJodani, esigodini maqondana leBeti-Peyori, elizweni likaSihoni inkosi yamaAmori.
Basebesidla ilifa lelizwe lakhe lelizwe likaOgi inkosi yeBashani, amakhosi amabili amaAmori, ayenganeno kweJodani ngasempumalanga,
kusukela eAroweri esekhunjini lwesifula seArinoni,
lamagceke wonke nganeno kweJodani ngasempumalanga, kuze kube selwandle lwamagceke.
UMozisi wasebiza uIsrayeli wonke, wathi kubo: Zwana, Israyeli, izimiso lezahlulelo engizikhuluma endlebeni zenu lamuhla, ukuze lizifunde, linanzelele ukuzenza.
uNkulunkulu wethu yenza isivumelwano lathi eHorebe.
kayisenzanga lesisivumelwano labobaba, kodwa lathi, thina sonke esilapha siphila lamuhla.
yakhuluma lani ubuso lobuso entabeni, iphakathi komlilo,
(ngema phakathi kweN lani ngalesosikhathi, ukulazisa ilizwi leN KOSI isithi:
NgiyuNkulunkulu wakho, eyakukhupha elizweni leGibhithe, endlini yobugqili.
Ungabi labanye onkulunkulu phambi kwami.
Ungazenzeli isithombe esibaziweyo, loba yiwuphi umfanekiso wokusemazulwini phezulu loba wokusemhlabeni phansi, loba wokusemanzini ngaphansi komhlaba.

Ungakukhothameli, ungakukhonzi; ngoba mina iN, uNkulunkulu wakho, nginguNkulunkulu olobukhwele, ngiphindisela ububi baboyise phezu kwabantwana, kuze kube se sizukulwane ni sesithathu lesesine sabangizondayo,
njalo ngibenzela umusa abayizinkulungwane zabangithandayo lezabagcina imilayo yami.
Ungaliphathi ngeze ibizo leN uNkulunkulu wakho; ngoba kayiyikumyekela engelacala ophatha ibizo layo ngeze.
Gcina usuku lwesabatha, ukulungcwelisa, njengokukulaya kweN uNkulunkulu wakho.
Insuku eziyisithupha uzasebenza, uwenze wonke umsebenzi wakho;

kodwa usuku lwesikhombisa lulisabatha leN uNkulunkulu wakho; ungenzi loba yiwuphi umsebenzi ngalo, wena lendodana yakho lendodakazi yakho lenceku yakho lencekukazi yakho lenkabi yakho lobabhemi wakho loba yisiphi sezifuyo zakho, lowemzini wakho ophakathi kwamasango akho, ukuze iphumule inceku yakho lencekukazi yakho, njengawe.
Njalo ukhumbule ukuthi wawuyinceku elizweni leGibhithe. Ngakho uNkulunkulu wakho yakulaya ukuthi ugcine usuku lwesabatha.
Hlonipha uyihlo lonyoko, njengokukulaya kweN uNkulunkulu wakho, ukuze insuku zakho zelulwe, lokuthi kukulungele elizweni uNkulunkulu wakho ekunika lona.
Ungabulali.
Njalo ungafebi.
Njalo ungebi.
Njalo unganiki ubufakazi bamanga ngomakhelwane wakho.
Njalo ungafisi umkamakhelwane wakho; ungahawukeli indlu kamakhelwane wakho, insimu yakhe, lenceku yakhe, lencekukazi yakhe, inkabi yakhe, lobabhemi wakhe, njalo loba yini ekamakhelwane wakho.
Amazwi la yawakhuluma ebandleni lenu lonke entabeni, iphakathi komlilo, eyezini, lemnyameni onzima, ngelizwi elikhulu; njalo kayengezelelanga. Yawabhala ezibhebheni ezimbili zamatshe, yanginika zona.
Kwasekusithi lilizwa ilizwi livela phakathi komnyama, lentaba ivutha umlilo, lasondela kimi, zonke inhloko zezizwe zenu, labadala benu,
lathi: Khangela, uNkulunkulu wethu isitshengisile inkazimulo yayo lobukhulu bayo.
Ngakho-ke sizafelani? Ngoba lumlilo omkhulu uzasiqothula. Uba siphinda silizwa ilizwi leN uNkulunkulu wethu futhi, sizakufa-ke.
Ngoba ngubani enyameni yonke owezwa ilizwi likaNkulunkulu ophilayo likhuluma livela phakathi komlilo, njengathi, waphila?
Sondela wena, uzwe konke uNkulunkulu wethu ezakutsho, usitshele wena konke uNkulunkulu wethu ezakutsho kuwe, sizakuzwa, sikwenze.
yasisizwa ilizwi lamazwi enu ekukhulumeni kwenu kimi; yasisithi kimi: Ngizwile ilizwi lamazwi alababantu abawakhulume kuwe; kulungile konke abakukhulumileyo.
O kungathi bangaba lenhliziyo enjalo yokungesaba, bagcine yonke imilayo yami, insuku zonke!
Hamba uthi kibo: Zibuyeleleni emathenteni enu.
Kodwa wena, mana lapha phansi kwami, ke ngikhulume kuwe yonke imilayo lezimiso lezahlulelo ozabafundisa zona, ukuze bazenze elizweni engibanika lona ukuthi badle ilifa lalo.
Ngakho qaphelani ukuthi lenze njengokulilaya kweN uNkulunkulu wenu; lingaphambukeli ngakwesokunene langakwesokhohlo.
Lizahamba endleleni yonke uNkulunkulu wenu elilaye yona, ukuze liphile.
Lale yimilayo, izimiso, lezahlulelo uNkulunkulu wenu elaya ukulifundisa, ukuthi lizenze elizweni elichaphela kulo ukuthi lidle ilifa lalo,
ukuze uyesabe uNkulunkulu wakho, ukugcina zonke izimiso zayo lemithetho yayo engikulaya yona, wena lendodana yakho lendodana yendodana yakho, zonke izinsuku zempilo yakho.
Ngakho zwana, Israyeli, unanzelele ukuzenza, ukuze kukulungele, ukuze wande kakhulu.
Zwana, Israyeli, uNkulunkulu wethu, yyinye.
Njalo wothanda uNkulunkulu wakho ngenhliziyo yakho yonke
Njalo amazwi la engikulaya ngawo lamuhla azakuba senhliziyweni yakho;
njalo uzawafundisa abantwana bakho ngokukhuthala, uzakhuluma ngawo lapho uhlezi endlini yakho, lalapho uhamba endleleni, lalapho ulala, lalapho uvuka.
Uzawabophela esandleni sakho abe luphawu, njalo abe ngamafilakteriyu phakathi laphakathi kwamehlo akho.
Njalo uzawabhala emigubazini yendlu yakho, lemasangweni akho.
Kuzakuthi lapho uNkulunkulu wakho ikungenisa elizweni eyafunga kuboyihlo, kuAbrahama, kuIsaka lakuJakobe, ukukunika imizi emikhulu lemihle, ongayakhanga,
lezindlu ezigcwele zonke izinto ezinhle, ongazigcwalisanga, lemithombo eyagejwayo ongayigebhanga, izivini lezihlahla zemihlwathi ongazihlanyelanga, lapho udlile wasutha,
ziqaphele, hlezi uyikhohlwe eyakukhupha elizweni leGibhithe, endlini yobugqili.
Uzayesaba uNkulunkulu wakho, uyikhonze.
Lingalandeli abanye onkulunkulu.
Ngoba uNkulunkulu wakho inguNkulunkulu olobukhwele phakathi kwakho.
Lingayilingi uNkulunkulu wenu.
Ligcine lokugcina imilayo yeN uNkulunkulu wenu, lobufakazi bayo, lezimiso zayo, ekulaye zona.
Njalo wenze okuqondileyo lokulungileyo emehlweni eN, ukuze kukulungele, lokuthi ungene udle ilifa lelizwe elihle, eyalifungela oyihlo,
ukuxotsha zonke izitha zakho phambi kwakho, njengalokhu ikhulumile.
Lapho indodana yakho ikubuza esikhathini esizayo isithi: Buyini ubufakazi lezimiso lezahlulelo uNkulunkulu wethu elilaye zona?
Khona uzakuthi endodaneni yakho: Sasiyizigqili zikaFaro eGibhithe, leN yasikhupha eGibhithe ngesandla esilamandla.
Njalo yenza izibonakaliso lezimangaliso ezinkulu lezimbi eGibhithe, phezu kukaFaro laphezu kwendlu yakhe yonke, phambi kwamehlo ethu.
Yasikhupha khona ukuze isingenise, ukusinika ilizwe eyalifungela obaba.
yasisilaya ukwenza zonke lezizimiso, ukwesaba uNkulunkulu wethu.
Kuzakuba yikulunga kithi, uba sinanzelela ukwenza limilayo yonke phambi kweN uNkulunkulu wethu, njengokusilaya kwayo.
Lapho uNkulunkulu wakho isikungenisa elizweni oya kulo ukudla ilifa lalo, ixotshe izizwe ezinengi phambi kwakho,
lapho uNkulunkulu wakho izinikela phambi kwakho.
Ungathathani lazo, unganiki indodakazi yakho kundodana yakhe, njalo indodakazi yakhe ungayithatheli indodana yakho.
Ngoba izaphambula indodana yakho ekungilandeleni, ukuze bakhonze abanye onkulunkulu; ngakho ulaka lweN luzalivuthela, lukubhubhise masinyane.
Kodwa-ke lizakwenza njalo kuzo; lizadiliza amalathi azo, ligamule izixuku zabo, litshise ngomlilo izithombe zazo ezibaziweyo.
Ngoba uyisizwe esingcwele eNni uNkulunkulu wakho.
kayehliselanga uthando lwayo phezu kwenu, kumbe ilikhethe, ngenxa yokuthi lalibanengi kulaziphi izizwe; ngoba lalibalutshwana kulazo zonke izizwe;
kodwa kungenxa yokuthi yalithanda.
Ngakho yazi ukuthi uNkulunkulu wakho inguNkulunkulu, uNkulunkulu othembekileyo,
lophindisela abamzondayo ebusweni babo, ukubabhubhisa.
Ngakho uzagcina imilayo lezimiso lezahlulelo engikulaya zona lamuhla ukuzenza.
Kuzakuthi ngoba lisizwa lezizahlulelo, lizigcine, lizenze.
Njalo izakuthanda, ikubusise, ikwandise.
Uzabusiswa kulazo zonke izizwe; kakuyikuba khona phakathi kwakho owesilisa ongazaliyo lowesifazana oyinyumba, loba phakathi kwezifuyo zakho.
LeN izasusa kuwe wonke umkhuhlane; kayiyikukwehlisela lasinye sezifo ezimbi zeGibhithe ozaziyo, kodwa izazehlisela phezu kwabo bonke abakuzondayo.
Njalo uzabaqothula bonke abantu ezabanikela kuwe uNkulunkulu wakho.
Nxa uzakuthi enhliziyweni yakho: Izizwe lezi zinengi kulami; ngingazixotsha njani elifeni lazo?
Ungazesabi,

izilingo ezinkulu ilihlo lakho elazibonayo, lezibonakaliso, lezimangaliso, lesandla esilamandla, lengalo eyeluliweyo, uNkulunkulu wakho eyakukhupha ngakho. uNkulunkulu wakho izakwenza njalo kuzo zonke izizwe ozesabayo.
Futhi-ke uNkulunkulu wakho izathumela olonyovu phakathi kwazo, zize zibhujiswe eziseleyo lezicatshele ubuso bakho.
Kaliyikutshaywa luvalo ngazo.
uNkulunkulu wakho izazingcothula lezizizwe phambi kwakho kancinyane kancinyane; ungeziqede masinyane, hlezi izilo zeganga zikwandele.
Kodwa uNkulunkulu wakho izazinikela phambi kwakho, iziphazamise ngokuphazamiseka okukhulu, zize zichithwe.
Izanikela ezandleni zakho amakhosi azo.
Izithombe ezibaziweyo zabonkulunkulu bazo lizazitshisa ngomlilo.
Njalo ungasingenisi isinengiso endlini yakho, hlezi ube yinto eqalekisiweyo njengaso; usenyanye lokusenyanya, unengwe lokunengwa yiso, ngoba siyinto eqalekisiweyo.
Yonke imithetho engikulaya yona lamuhla lizananzelela ukuyenza, ukuze liphile, lande, lingene lidle ilifa lelizwe, eyalifungela oyihlo.
Njalo uzakhumbula indlela yonke uNkulunkulu wakho ekukhokhele ngayo liminyaka engamatshumi amane enkangala, ukuze ikuthobise.
Yasikuthobisa, yakulambisa.
Izembatho zakho kaziguganga phezu kwakho, lonyawo lwakho kaluvuvukanga, le iminyaka engamatshumi amane.
Ngakho yazi enhliziyweni yakho ukuthi njengendoda ilaya indodana yayo, uNkulunkulu wakho iyakulaya.
Ngakho uzagcina imithetho yeN uNkulunkulu wakho, ukuhamba endleleni zayo, lokuyesaba.
Ngoba uNkulunkulu wakho ikungenisa elizweni elihle, ilizwe lezifula zamanzi, lemithombo lokujula okugobhoza ezihotsheni lezintabeni;
ilizwe lengqoloyi, lebhali, lezivini, lemikhiwa, lezithelo zepomegranati, ilizwe lezihlahla zemihlwathi zamafutha, loluju,
ilizwe ozakudla kulo isinkwa kungekho ukusilela, ongayikuswela lutho kulo; ilizwe elilamatshe ayinsimbi, lelilezintaba elingagebha kuzo ithusi.
Usudlile wasutha, uzabusisa uNkulunkulu wakho ngelizwe elihle ekunike lona.
Ziqaphele hlezi ukhohlwe uNkulunkulu wakho ngokungagcini imilayo yayo lezahlulelo zayo lezimiso zayo, engikulaya zona lamuhla.
Hlezi lapho usudlile wasutha, usuwakhe izindlu ezinhle wahlala kuzo,
sekwandile inkomo zakho lezimvu zakho, lesiliva legolide kwakho sekwandile, lakho konke olakho sekwandile,
inhliziyo yakho ibisiziphakamisa,
eyakukhokhela enkangala enkulu leyesabekayo,
eyakudlisa imana enkangala, oyihlo ababengayazi, ukuze ikuthobise, lokuze ikuhlole,
ubususithi enhliziyweni yakho: Amandla ami lokuqina kwesandla sami kungizuzele linotho.
Kodwa uzakhumbula uNkulunkulu wakho, ngoba yiyo ekunika amandla okuzuza inotho.
Kuzakuthi-ke, nxa ukhohlwa lokukhohlwa uNkulunkulu wakho, ulandele abanye onkulunkulu, ubakhonze, ubakhothamele.
Njengezizwe ezichithileyo phambi kwenu, ngokunjalo lizabhubha, ngoba lingalilalelanga ilizwi leN uNkulunkulu wenu.
Zwana, Israyeli; uzachapha iJodani lamuhla, ukungenela ukudla ilifa lezizwe.
Abantu abakhulu labade, abantwana bamaAnaki wena obaziyo, wena osuzwile ngabo kuthiwa: Ngubani ongema phambi kwabantwana bakaAnaki?
Ngakho yazi lamuhla ukuthi yuNkulunkulu wakho echapha phambi kwakho.
Ungakhulumi enhliziyweni yakho, lapho uNkulunkulu wakho isibaxotshile phambi kwakho, usithi: Ngenxa yokulunga kwami ingingenise ukudla ilifa lelizwe leli.
Kakungenxa yokulunga kwakho kumbe ngenxa yobuqotho benhliziyo yakho ukuthi ungene ukudla ilifa lelizwe lazo.
Yazi-ke ukuthi kakungenxa yokulunga kwakho ukuthi uNkulunkulu wakho ikunika lelilizwe elihle ukuthi udle ilifa lalo; ngoba uyisizwe esilentamo elukhuni.
Khumbula, ungakhohlwa, ukuthi wayithukuthelisa uNkulunkulu wakho enkangala; kusukela osukwini owaphuma ngalo elizweni leGibhithe laze lafika kulindawo, beliyivukela iN.
LeHorebe layithukuthelisa iN, yaze yalithukuthelela ukulichitha.
Sengenyukele entabeni ukwemukela izibhebhe zamatshe, izibhebhe zesivumelwano eyasenza lani.
yasinginika lezozibhebhe ezimbili zamatshe zilotshwe ngomunwe kaNkulunkulu, laphezu kwazo kulotshiwengokwamazwi wonke eyayiwakhulume lani entabeni, iphakathi komlilo.
Kwasekusithi ekupheleni kwensuku ezingamatshumi amane lobusuku obungamatshumi amane, yangipha izibhebhe ezimbili zamatshe, izibhebhe zesivumelwano.
yasisithi kimi: Sukuma wehle ngokuphangisa usuke lapha, ngoba abantu bakho owabakhupha eGibhithe bonakalisile.
yasikhuluma kimi isithi: Ngibabonile lababantu.
Ngiyekela ukuze ngibabhubhise.
Ngasengiphenduka ngisehla entabeni.
Ngasengibona, khangelani-ke, lalonile eNni uNkulunkulu wenu, lalizenzele ithole elibunjwe ngokuncibilikisa, laliphambukile ngokuphangisa endleleni eyayililayile.
Ngasengibamba izibhebhe zombili, ngazilahla ezandleni zami zombili, ngazibulala phambi kwamehlo enu.
Ngasengiziwisela phansi phambi kweN KOSI.
Ngoba ngangisesaba ukuthukuthela lolaka eyayilithukuthelela ngakho ukulibhubhisa; kodwa yangizwa langalesosikhathi.
yasimthukuthelela kakhulu uAroni ukuze imbhubhise; kodwa ngamkhulekela loAroni ngalesosikhathi.
Ngasengithatha isono senu, ithole elalilenzile, ngalitshisa ngomlilo, ngalichoboza, ngalicholisisa laze laba lincinyane njengothuli; ngaphosa uthuli lwalo esifuleni esasisehla entabeni.
LeTabera laliyithukuthelisa iN.
Lalapho yalithuma lisuka eKadeshi-Bhaneya.
Lalivele liyivukele kusukela osukwini engalazi ngalo.
Ngasengiziwisela phansi phambi kweN insuku ezingamatshumi amane lobusuku obungamatshumi amane, engaziwisela phansi ngazo, ngoba yayithe izalichitha.
Ngasengikhuleka eNni ngathi: Nkosi Jehova, ungabachithi abantu bakho lelifa lakho, obahlenge ngobukhulu bakho, owabakhupha eGibhithe ngesandla esilamandla.
Khumbula inceku zakho, uAbrahama, uIsaka, loJakobe; ungakhangeli inkani yalababantu lobubi babo lesono sabo,
hlezi ilizwe owasikhupha kilo lithi: Ngenxa yokuthi yayingelamandla okubangenisa elizweni eyabathembisa lona, langenxa yokuthi ibazonda, yabakhupha ukuze ibabulalele enkangala.
Kube kanti bangabantu bakho lelifa lakho, owabakhupha ngamandla akho amakhulu langengalo yakho eyeluliweyo.
Ngalesosikhathi yathi kimi: Zibazele izibhebhe ezimbili zamatshe njengezakuqala, wenyukele kimi entabeni.
Ngizabhala-ke phezu kwezibhebhe amazwi ayesezibhebheni zakuqala owazibulalayo, uzibeke emtshokotshweni.
Ngasengisenza umtshokotsho ngesihlahla sesinga.
Yasibhala ezibhebheni njengokubhala kwakuqala, imilayo elitshumi; njalo yanginika zona.
Ngasengiphenduka ngisehla entabeni.
Abantwana bakoIsrayeli basebesuka eBeyerothi-Bene-Jakani; indodana yakhe uEleyazare wasebenza njengompristi esikhundleni sakhe.
Besuka lapho, baya eGudigoda; basuka eGudigoda, baya eJotibatha, ilizwe lezifula zamanzi.
Ngalesosikhathi yehlukanisa isizwe sakoLevi.
Ngalokhu uLevi kalasabelo lelifa kanye labafowabo; iyilifa lakhe, njengokuthembisa kweN uNkulunkulu wakho kuye.
Mina ngasengihlala entabeni njengensuku zendulo, insuku ezingamatshumi amane lobusuku obungamatshumi amane.
yasisithi kimi: Sukuma, uhambe phambi kwabantu, ukuze bangene badle ilifa lelizwe engafunga kuboyise ukubanika lona.
Khathesi-ke, Israyeli, kuyini uNkulunkulu wakho ekufuna kuwe,
ukugcina imilayo yeN lezimiso zayo engikulaya zona lamuhla, ukuthi kukulungele?
Khangela, amazulu, lezulu lamazulu ngaweN uNkulunkulu wakho.
Kuphela yehlisela uthando lwayo phezu kwaboyihlo, ukubathanda, yakhetha inzalo yabo emva kwabo, ngitsholina phakathi kwazo zonke izizwe, njengalamuhla.
Ngakho sokani ijwabu lenhliziyo yenu.
Ngoba uNkulunkulu wenu inguNkulunkulu wabonkulunkulu.
Eyenza isahlulelo sentandane lomfelokazi, njalo ethanda owezizweni ngokumnika ukudla lezembatho.
Ngakho lizamthanda owezizweni, ngoba lalingabezizweni elizweni leGibhithe.
Uzayesaba uNkulunkulu wakho, uyikhonze.
Iludumo lwakho, njalo inguNkulunkulu wakho.
Oyihlo behlela eGibhithe belabantu abangamatshumi ayisikhombisa.
Ngakho wothanda uNkulunkulu wakho.
Yazini lamuhla, ngoba kangikhulumi ebantwaneni benu abangakwaziyo labangakubonanga ukulaya kweN uNkulunkulu wenu,
lezibonakaliso zayo lezenzo zayo eyazenza phakathi kweGibhithe kuFaro inkosi yeGibhithe, lelizweni lakhe lonke,
lalokho eyakwenza ebuthweni leGibhithe, emabhizeni ayo lenqoleni zayo, lokuthi yenza amanzi oLwandle oluBomvu abakhukhule lapho bexotshana lani, lokuthi yababhubhisa, kuze kube lamuhla,
lalokho eyakwenza kini enkangala laze lafika kulindawo,
lalokho eyakwenza kuDathani lakuAbiramu amadodana kaEliyabi indodana kaRubeni, ukuthi umhlaba wakhamisa umlomo wawo wabaginya bona labezindlu zabo, lamathente abo.
Kodwa amehlo enu abonile zonke izenzo ezinkulu zeN eyazenzayo.
Ngakho lizagcina yonke imithetho engikulaya yona lamuhla, ukuze libe lamandla lingene lidle ilifa lelizwe, elichaphela kulo ukuyakudla ilifa lalo,
lokuthi lelule izinsuku elizweni.
Ngoba ilizwe ongena kilo ukudla ilifa lalo kalinjengelizwe leGibhithe eliphuma kilo, lapho owahlanyela khona inhlanyelo yakho, wayithelela ngonyawo lwakho, njengesivande semibhida;
kodwa ilizwe elichaphela kilo ukudla ilifa lalo liyilizwe lamaqaqa lezigodi, linatha amanzi ngezulu lamazulu;
ilizwe uNkulunkulu wakho elikhathalelayo; amehlo eN uNkulunkulu wakho aphezu kwalo njalo, kusukela ekuqaleni komnyaka kuze kube sekupheleni komnyaka.
Kuzakuthi-ke, uba lilalela lokulalela imithetho yami engililaya yona lamuhla, ukuthanda uNkulunkulu wenu, lokuyikhonza ngenhliziyo yenu yonke langomphefumulo wenu wonke,
ngizanika izulu lelizwe lenu ngesikhathi salo.
Ngizanika izifuyo zakho utshani edlelweni lakho.
Ziqapheleni, hlezi inhliziyo yenu ikhohliseke, liphambuke,
ukuze ulaka lweN lulivuthele.
Ngakho lizabeka lamazwi ami enhliziyweni yenu lemphefumulweni wenu.
Lizawafundisa abantwana benu, ukhulume ngawo lapho uhlezi endlini yakho, lalapho uhamba endleleni, lalapho ulala, lalapho uvuka.
Liwabhale emigubazini yendlu yakho lemasangweni akho,
ukuze zande insuku zenu lensuku zabantwana benu, elizweni eyalifungela oyihlo ukubanika lona.
Ngoba uba ligcina lokugcina yonke imithetho le engililaya ukuthi liyenze, ukuthanda uNkulunkulu wenu, ukuhamba ngendlela zayo zonke,
khona izaxotsha elifeni zonke lezizizwe zisuke phambi kwenu.
Yonke indawo lapho ingaphansi yonyawo lwenu ezanyathela khona izakuba ngeyenu.
Kakulamuntu ozakuma phambi kwenu.
Khangelani, lamuhla ngiyabeka phambi kwenu isibusiso lesiqalekiso;
isibusiso, uba lilalela imithetho yeN uNkulunkulu wenu engililaya yona lamuhla;
lesiqalekiso, uba lingalaleli imithetho yeN uNkulunkulu wenu, kodwa liphambuka endleleni engililaya yona lamuhla.
Kuzakuthi lapho uNkulunkulu wakho esekungenisile elizweni oya kulo ukudla ilifa lalo, uzabeka isibusiso phezu kwentaba yeGerizimi, lesiqalekiso phezu kwentaba yeEbhali.
Angithi zona ziphetsheya kweJodani emva kwendlela yekutshoneni kwelanga, elizweni lamaKhanani ahlala emagcekeni maqondana leGiligali, eduze lezihlahla zama-okhi?
Ngoba lizachapha iJodani ukuze lingene lidle ilifa lelizwe uNkulunkulu wenu elinika lona. Lizakudla ilifa lalo, lihlale kilo,
linanzelele ukwenza zonke izimiso lezahlulelo engizibeka phambi kwenu lamuhla.
Lezi yizimiso lezahlulelo elizananzelela ukuzenza elizweni iN, uNkulunkulu waboyihlo, ekunika lona ukuthi udle ilifa lalo.
Lizadiliza lokudiliza zonke indawo lapho izizwe elizazixotsha elifeni lazo ezazikhonzela khona onkulunkulu bazo, entabeni eziphakemeyo lemaqaqeni langaphansi kwaso sonke isihlahla esiluhlaza;
lizadiliza amalathi azo, libulale insika zazo eziyizithombe, litshise izixuku zazo ngomlilo.
Lingenzi njalo eNni uNkulunkulu wenu.
Kodwa endaweni uNkulunkulu wenu ezayikhetha phakathi kwazo zonke izizwe zenu ukubeka ibizo layo khona, lizadinga kundawo yayo yokuhlala; njalo uzakuya khona,
lilethe khona iminikelo yenu yokutshiswa, lemihlatshelo yenu, lokwetshumi kwenu, lomnikelo wokuphakanyiswa wesandla senu, lezithembiso zenu, leminikelo yenu yesihle;
lidle khona phambi kweN uNkulunkulu wenu.
Kaliyikwenza njengakho konke esikwenzayo lapha lamuhla, ngulowo lalowo loba yikuphi okulungileyo emehlweni akhe.
Ngoba kalikafiki ekuphumuleni lelifeni, uNkulunkulu wakho ekunika lona.
Lapho selichaphile iJodani, selihlezi elizweni uNkulunkulu wenu elinika lona libe yilifa lenu, isiliphumuzile ezitheni zenu zonke inhlangothi zonke, selihlezi livikelekile,

khona kuzakuba lendawo uNkulunkulu wenu ezayikhetha ukwenza ibizo layo lihlale lapho; lizaletha lapho konke engililaya khona, iminikelo yenu yokutshiswa, lemihlatshelo yenu, lokwetshumi kwenu, lomnikelo wokuphakanyiswa wesandla senu, lezithembiso zenu zonke ezikhethekileyo elizazithembisa eNni.
Njalo lizathaba phambi kweN uNkulunkulu wenu, lina lamadodana enu lamadodakazi enu, lenceku zenu lencekukazi zenu, lomLevi ophakathi kwamasango enu.
Ziqaphele ukuthi unganikeli iminikelo yakho yokutshiswa kuyo yonke indawo oyibonayo;
kodwa endaweni ezayikhetha kwesinye sezizwe zakho, lapho uzanikela iminikelo yakho yokutshiswa, lalapho uzakwenza konke engikulaya khona.
Kanti ungahlaba udle inyama, phakathi kwawo wonke amasango akho, njengaso sonke isifiso somphefumulo wakho, njengokwesibusiso seN uNkulunkulu wakho, ekunike sona.
Kuphela lingadli igazi; lizalichithela emhlabathini njengamanzi.
