Awulakudlela emasangweni akho okwetshumi kwamabele akho leyewayini lakho elitsha, leyamafutha akho, loba amazibulo enkomo zakho lawezimvu zakho, loba yikuphi kwesithembiso sakho osithembisileyo, loba iminikelo yakho yesihle, loba umnikelo wokuphakanyiswa wesandla sakho.

Kodwa phambi kweN uNkulunkulu wakho uzadlela lokho endaweni uNkulunkulu wakho ezayikhetha, wena lendodana yakho lendodakazi yakho, lenceku yakho lencekukazi yakho, lomLevi ophakathi kwamasango akho; njalo uzathaba phambi kweN uNkulunkulu wakho.
Ziqaphele ukuthi ungamkhohlwa umLevi zonke izinsuku zakho elizweni lakho.
Lapho uNkulunkulu wakho iqhelisa umngcele wakho, njengokukhuluma kwayo kuwe, njalo uzakuthi: Ngizakudla inyama, ngoba umphefumulo wakho ukhanuka ukudla inyama.

Uba indawo uNkulunkulu wakho ezayikhetha ukubeka ibizo layo khona ikhatshana lawe, uzahlaba enkomeni zakho loba ezimvini zakho ekunike zona, njengokukulaya kwami, uzakudlela phakathi kwamasango akho, njengokwesifiso sonke somphefumulo wakho.
Ngitsho, njengalokhu kudliwa umziki lendluzele, ngokunjalo uzazidla; ongahlambulukanga lohlambulukileyo angazidla ngokufananayo.
Kuphela qaphela ukuthi ungadli igazi.
Ungalidli, uzalichithela emhlabathini njengamanzi.
Ungalidli, ukuze kukulungele labantwana bakho emva kwakho.
Kuphela izinto ezingcwele olazo.
Ulungise iminikelo yakho yokutshiswa, inyama legazi, phezu kwelathi leN uNkulunkulu wakho. Legazi lemihlatshelo yakho lizathululelwa phezu kwelathi leN uNkulunkulu wakho, lenyama ungayidla.
Qaphela uzwe wonke amazwi la engikulaya wona, ukuze kukulungele labantwana bakho emva kwakho kuze kube nininini, lapho usenza okulungileyo lokuqondileyo emehlweni eN uNkulunkulu wakho.
Lapho uNkulunkulu wakho izaquma izizwe zisuke phambi kwakho lapho oya khona ukudla ilifa lazo, lapho usudle ilifa lazo wahlala elizweni lazo,
ziqaphele ukuthi ungathiywa uzilandele, emva kokuchithwa kwazo phambi kwakho, lokuthi ungabuzi ngonkulunkulu bazo usithi: Izizwe lezi zazikhonza njani onkulunkulu bazo? Lami ngizakwenza njalo.

Kawuyikwenza njalo eNni uNkulunkulu wakho; ngoba konke okunengekayo eNni, ekuzondayo, zikwenzile kubonkulunkulu bazo; ngoba ngitsho amadodana azo lamadodakazi azo zibatshisile ngomlilo kubonkulunkulu bazo.
Yonke into engililaya ngayo, qaphelani ukuyenza; ungengezeleli kuyo, futhi ungaphunguli kuyo.
Uba kuvela phakathi kwakho umprofethi kumbe umphuphi wamaphupho,
lesibonakaliso loba isimangaliso akhulume ngaso kuwe senzakale, esithi: Asilandele abanye onkulunkulu ongabazanga, sibakhonze;
ungalaleli amazwi alowomprofethi loba lowomphuphi wamaphupho; ngoba uNkulunkulu wenu iyalilinga ukuze yazi ukuthi liyayithanda yini uNkulunkulu wenu ngenhliziyo yenu yonke langomphefumulo wenu wonke.
uNkulunkulu wenu lizayilandela, yona liyesabe, imithetho yayo liyigcine, ilizwi layo lililalele, yona liyikhonze.
Lalowomprofethi loba lowomphuphi wamaphupho kabulawe, ngoba ukhulume ukuhlamukela uNkulunkulu wenu, eyalikhupha elizweni leGibhithe, yakuhlenga endlini yobugqili.
Uba umfowenu, indodana kanyoko, loba indodana yakho, loba indodakazi yakho,
babonkulunkulu babantu abalizingelezeleyo, abaseduze lawe loba abakhatshana lawe, kusukela ko munyeumkhawulo womhlaba kuze kufike ko munyeumkhawulo womhlaba,
ungamvumeli, ungamlaleli,
kodwa umbulale lokumbulala; isandla sakho sizakuba ngesokuqala phezu kwakhe ukumbulala, lemva kwalokho isandla sabantu bonke.
Njalo mkhande ngamatshe aze afe.
LoIsrayeli wonke uzakuzwa, esabe, angabe esenza ububi obunjengalobo phakathi kwakho.
Uba usizwa komunye wemizi yakho, uNkulunkulu wakho ekunika yona, ukuthi uhlale khona, kuthiwa:
Kuphumile amadoda, abantwana bakaBheliyali, phakathi kwakho, afuqa aphambula abakhileyo bomuzi wawo esithi: Asihambe siyekhonza abanye onkulunkulu elingabazanga;
khona uzabuza, uhlolisise, udingisise; khangela, uba kuliqiniso, leyonto iqinisekile, lesisinengiso senziwe phakathi kwakho,
uzatshaya lokubatshaya abakhileyo balowomuzi ngobukhali benkemba, uwutshabalalise, lakho konke okukuwo lezifuyo zawo, ngobukhali benkemba.
Uzabuthela yonke impango yawo phakathi komdanga wawo, utshise ngomlilo umuzi lempango yawo yonke uphele du, eNni uNkulunkulu wakho.
Kunganamatheli lutho kwalokho okuqalekisiweyo esandleni sakho, ukuze iphenduke ekuvutheni kwentukuthelo yayo, ikuphe umusa, ibe lobubele kuwe, ikwandise,
uba ulalela ilizwi leN uNkulunkulu wakho, ukugcina yonke imithetho yayo engikulaya yona lamuhla, ukwenza okulungileyo emehlweni eN uNkulunkulu wakho.
Lingabantwana beN uNkulunkulu wenu.
Ngoba uyisizwe esingcwele eNni uNkulunkulu wakho; leN ikukhethile.
Ungadli loba yikuphi okunengekayo.
Yilezi inyamazana elingazidla: Inkabi, imvu, lembuzi,
indluzele,
layo yonke inyamazana edabula isondo, edabula okudabukileyo kube zinklagu ezimbili, eyetshisayo phakathi kwezinyamazana; leyo lingayidla.
Kodwa lezi kaliyikuzidla kuzo ezetshisayo, lakuzo ezidabula isondo elidabukileyo: Ikamela lomvundla lembila, ngoba ziyetshisa kodwa kazidabulanga isondo; zingcolile kini.
Lengulube, ngoba idabula isondo kodwa kayetshisi; ingcolile kini. Lingadli okwenyama yazo, lingathinti izidumbu zazo.
Lezi lingazidla kuzo zonke ezisemanzini: Zonke ezilempiko lamaxolo lingazidla.
Kodwa loba yikuphi okungelampiko lamaxolo lingakudli; kungcolile kini.
Zonke inyoni ezihlambulukileyo lingazidla.
Kodwa yilezi elingayikudla kuzo: Ukhozi lelinqe lengqungqulu edla inhlanzi,
lomzwazwa, lohelwane,
lalo lonke iwabayi ngohlobo lwalo,
lesikhova, lomandukulo, lenkanku, lokhozi ngohlobo lwalo,
isikhova esincinyane, lesikhova esikhulu, lesikhova esimhlophe,
lewunkwe, lelinqe elikhulu, letshayamanzi,
lengabuzane, lehemu ngohlobo lwalo, lemvenduna, lolulwane.
Lazo zonke izibungu ezilempiko zingcolile kini.
Zonke izinyoni ezihlambulukileyo lingazidla.
Lingabokudla langcuba; ungayinika owemzini ophakathi kwamasango akho ukuthi ayidle, loba uyithengise kowezizwe.
Uzanikela ngoqotho okwetshumi kwesithelo sonke senhlanyelo yakho, insimu ekuthelayo iminyaka ngeminyaka.
Njalo uzakudla phambi kweN uNkulunkulu wakho, endaweni ezayikhetha ukuthi ibeke ibizo layo khona, okwetshumi kwamabele akho, okwewayini lakho elitsha, lokwamafutha akho.
Uba-ke indlela inde kakhulu kuwe, uze wehluleke ukukuthwala, ngoba ikhatshana kakhulu lawe indawo uNkulunkulu wakho ezayikhetha ukuthi ibeke ibizo layo khona, lapho uNkulunkulu wakho ikubusisile,
uzakuguqula-ke kube yimali, ubophele imali esandleni sakho, uye endaweni uNkulunkulu wakho ezayikhetha,

uthenge ngaleyomali loba kuyini umphefumulo wakho okufisayo, izinkabi loba izimvu loba iwayini loba okunathwayo okulamandla, loba kuyini umphefumulo wakho okufisayo; udle khona phambi kweN uNkulunkulu wakho, uthabe wena lendlu yakho.
LomLevi ophakathi kwamasango akho, ungamdeli.
Ekupheleni kweminyaka emithathu uzakhupha konke okwetshumi kwezithelo zakho ngalowomnyaka, ukugcine phakathi kwamasango akho.
LomLevi.
Ekupheleni kweminyaka yonke eyisikhombisa uzakwenza inkululeko.
Njalo le yindlela yenkululeko: Wonke umkweledisi oweboleka umakhelwane wakhe uzakhulula isikwelede; kayiku si bamba ngamandla kumakhelwane wakhe kumbe kumfowabo, ngoba kumenyezelwe inkululeko eNni.
Kowezizweni uza si bamba ngamandla; kodwa lokho okwakho okukumfowenu isandla sakho sizakukhulula;
ukuze kungabi lomyanga phakathi kwakho; ngoba izakubusisa lokukubusisa elizweni uNkulunkulu wakho ekunika lona ukuthi libe yilifa ukudla ilifa lalo,
kuphela uba ulalela lokulalela ilizwi leN uNkulunkulu wakho, ugcine ukuyenza limithetho yonke engikulaya yona lamuhla.
Ngoba uNkulunkulu wakho izakubusisa njengokuthembisa kwayo kuwe. Njalo uzakweboleka izizwe ezinengi, kodwa wena kawuyikweboleka kuzo.

Uba kukhona phakathi kwakho umyanga ongomunye wabafowenu, kwelinye lamasango akho, elizweni lakho, uNkulunkulu wakho ekunika lona, ungenzi lukhuni inhliziyo yakho, ungamvaleli umfowenu ongumyanga isandla sakho,
kodwa uzamvulela lokumvulela isandla sakho, umeboleke lokumeboleka okwanela ukuswela kwakhe, lokho akuswelayo.
Ziqaphele hlezi kube khona ilizwi enhliziyweni yakho embi lisithi: Umnyaka wesikhombisa, umnyaka wenkululeko useduze; lelihlo lakho libe libi limelane lomfowenu ongumyanga, ukuze ungamniki.
Umnike lokumnika, lenhliziyo yakho ingadani nxa umnika.
Ngoba umyanga kayikuphela phakathi kwelizwe.
Uba umfowenu, umHebheru loba umHebherukazi, ethengiswa kuwe, akusebenzele iminyaka eyisithupha, ngakho ngomnyaka wesikhombisa uzamyekela ukuthi ahambe ekhululekile asuke kuwe.
Lalapho umyekela ukuthi ahambe ekhululekile esuka kuwe, ungamyekeli ukuthi ahambe engaphathanga lutho;
uzamnakekela lokumnakekela ezimvini zakho, lokwebala lokubhulela lakho, lokwesikhamelo sakho sewayini; ku lokho uNkulunkulu wakho ekubusise ngakho uzamupha.
Njalo uzakhumbula ukuthi wawuyisigqili elizweni leGibhithe, lokuthi uNkulunkulu wakho yakuhlenga. Ngalokho ngiyakulaya linto lamuhla.
Kodwa kuzakuthi, uba esithi kuwe: Kangiyikusuka kuwe, ngoba ethanda wena lendlu yakho, ngoba kulungile kuye elawe,
uzathatha usungulo, ubhobozele indlebe yakhe ngaloesivalweni, ukuze abe yisigqili sakho laphakade. Lakuso isigqilikazi sakho wenze njalo.

Kakungabi lukhuni emehlweni akho nxa umyekela ehamba ekhululekile kuwe; ngoba ngokuphindwe kabili kweholo lesiqatshwa ukusebenzele iminyaka eyisithupha. Ngakho uNkulunkulu wakho izakubusisa kukho konke okwenzayo.
Wonke amazibulo azazalwa enkomeni zakho lezimvini zakho, amaduna, uzawangcwelisela uNkulunkulu wakho.
Phambi kweN uNkulunkulu wakho uzalidla, umnyaka ngomnyaka, endaweni ezayikhetha, wena lendlu yakho.
Kodwa uba kulesici kulo, liqhula, loba liyisiphofu, loba lilasiphi isici esibi, ungalihlabeli uNkulunkulu wakho.
Uzalidla phakathi kwamasango akho, ongahlambulukanga lohlambulukileyo bazalidlabendawonye, njengomziki lanjengendluzele.
Kuphela igazi lalo ungalidli; ulichithele emhlabathini njengamanzi.
Gcina inyanga kaAbhibhi, wenzele uNkulunkulu wakho iphasika.
Ngakho uzahlabela uNkulunkulu wakho iphasika, lezimvu lenkomo.

Ungadli lalo isinkwa esilemvubelo. Insuku eziyisikhombisa uzakudla lalo isinkwa esingelamvubelo, isinkwa senhlupheko, ngoba waphuma elizweni leGibhithe ngokuphangisa, ukuze ukhumbule usuku lokuphuma kwakho elizweni leGibhithe zonke izinsuku zempilo yakho.
Njalo kakungabonwa kuwe imvubelo emingceleni yonke yakho insuku eziyisikhombisa; futhi okwenyama oyihlaba kusihlwa.
Awulakuhlaba iphasika phakathi kwaloba yiliphi lamasango akho, uNkulunkulu wakho ekunika wona,
kodwa endaweni uNkulunkulu wakho ezayikhetha ukuhlalisa ibizo layo khona, lapho uzahlabela iphasika kusihlwa, ekutshoneni kwelanga, ngesikhathi esimisiweyo sokuphuma kwakho eGibhithe.
Njalo uzalipheka, ulidlele endaweni uNkulunkulu wakho ezayikhetha. Lekuseni uzaphenduka uye emathenteni akho.
Insuku eziyisithupha uzakudla isinkwa esingelamvubelo.
Uzazibalela amaviki ayisikhombisa amileyo uzaqala ukubala amaviki ayisikhombisa.
Khona uzagcinela uNkulunkulu wakho umkhosi wamaviki, umnikelo wesihle wesandla sakho, ozawunikela, njengalokhu uNkulunkulu wakho ikubusisile.

Njalo uzathokoza phambi kweN uNkulunkulu wakho, wena lendodana yakho lendodakazi yakho, lenceku yakho lencekukazi yakho, lomLevi ophakathi kwamasango akho, lowezizweni, lentandane, lomfelokazi, abaphakathi kwakho, endaweni uNkulunkulu wakho ezayikhetha ukuhlalisa ibizo layo khona.
Uzakhumbula-ke ukuthi wawuyisigqili eGibhithe. Njalo uzagcina njalo wenze lezizimiso.
Umkhosi wamadumba uzazigcinela wona insuku eziyisikhombisa, ekubutheleni kwakho ebaleni lakho lokubhulela lesikhamelweni sakho sewayini.
Njalo uzathaba emkhosini wakho, wena lendodana yakho lendodakazi yakho, lenceku yakho lencekukazi yakho, lomLevi, lowezizweni, lentandane, lomfelokazi, abaphakathi kwamasango akho.

Insuku eziyisikhombisa uzayigcinela uNkulunkulu wakho umkhosi, endaweni ezayikhetha; ngoba uNkulunkulu wakho izakubusisa kuzo zonke izithelo zakho lemsebenzini wonke wezandla zakho. Ngakho uzathokoza ngoqotho.
Kathathu ngomnyaka wonke owesilisa wakho uzabonakala phambi kweN uNkulunkulu wakho endaweni ezayikhetha, ngomkhosi wesinkwa esingelamvubelo, langomkhosi wamaviki, langomkhosi wamadumba;
ngulowo lalowo ngokwesipho sesandla sakhe, njengesibusiso seN uNkulunkulu wakho, ekunike sona.
Abahluleli.
Ungaphambuli isahlulelo.
Ukulunga, ukulunga uzakunxwanela, ukuze uphile, udle ilifa lelizwe uNkulunkulu wakho ekunika lona.
Ungazihlanyeleli isixuku saloba yisiphi isihlahla eduze kwelathi leN uNkulunkulu wakho.
Njalo ungazimiseli insika eyisithombe, uNkulunkulu wakho eyizondayo.
Ungahlabeli uNkulunkulu wakho inkabi kumbe imvu okukuyo isici, loba yiyiphi into embi, ngoba kuyisinengiso eNni uNkulunkulu wakho.
Uba kutholakala phakathi kwakho, loba phakathi kwaliphi lamasango akho, uNkulunkulu wakho ekunika wona, owesilisa loba owesifazana owenza okubi emehlweni eN uNkulunkulu wakho,
abesesiyakhonza abanye onkulunkulu, abakhothamele, loba ilanga kumbe inyanga, kumbe enye yebutho lamazulu,
ube usukubikelwa, ukuzwe, uzakubuzisisa, khangela-ke, kuliqiniso, indaba iqinisekile, lesosinengiso senziwe koIsrayeli,
uzayikhupha leyondoda kumbe lowo owesifazana, abenze leyonto embi, emasangweni akho, leyondoda kumbe lowo owesifazana, ubakhande ngamatshe baze bafe.
Ngomlomo wabafakazi ababili loba wabafakazi abathathu ofanele ukufa uzabulawa; kayikubulawa ngomlomo womfakazi oyedwa.
Isandla sabafakazi sizakuba ngesokuqala phezu kwakhe ukumbulala, lemva kwalokho isandla sabo bonke abantu.
Uba kulodaba olulukhuni kakhulu kuwe ekwahluleleni,
uze kubapristi abangamaLevi.
Njalo uzakwenza njengokwesinqumo abazakutshela sona kuleyondawo ezayikhetha; njalo unanzelele ukwenza njengakho konke abazakufundisa khona.
Njengokomthetho abazakufundisa wona, lanjengokwesahlulelo abazakutshela sona, uzakwenza. Kawuyikuphambuka kusinqumo abazakutshela sona, uye ngakwesokunene kumbe ngakwesokhohlo.
Lendoda eyenza ngokuziqhenya ukuze ingalaleli umpristi.
Njalo bonke abantu bazakuzwa, besabe, bangaphindi ukuziqhenya.
Lapho usufikile elizweni uNkulunkulu wakho ekunika lona ukuthi udle ilifa lalo, uhlale kilo, ubususithi: Ngizazimisela inkosi njengazo zonke izizwe ezingizingelezeleyo;
umbeke lokumbeka abe yinkosi phezu kwakho, yena uNkulunkulu wakho ezamkhetha; kawulakumbeka owezizweni phezu kwakho ongesumfowenu.
Kodwa angazandiseli amabhiza.
Futhi angazandiseli abafazi, ukuze inhliziyo yakhe ingaphambuki; njalo angazandiseli kakhulu isiliva legolide.
Kuzakuthi esehlala esihlalweni sobukhosi sombuso wakhe, uzazibhalela impinda yalumlayo egwalweni.
Njalo luzakuba laye, njalo abale kulo insuku zonke zempilo yakhe,
ukuze inhliziyo yakhe ingaziphakamisi phezu kwabafowabo, lokuze angaphambuki emthethweni ayengakwesokunene loba ngakwesokhohlo.
Abapristi, amaLevi, isizwe sonke sakoLevi, kasiyikuba lesabelo lelifa kanye loIsrayeli.
Ngakho kabayikuba lelifa phakathi kwabafowabo; iyilifa labo, njengokukhuluma kwayo kibo.
Lalokhu kuzakuba lilungelo labapristi elivela ebantwini, kulabo abahlaba umhlatshelo, loba inkabi loba imvu; njalo bazanika umpristi umkhono lemihlathi yomibili lolusu.
Okokuqala kwamabele akho, yewayini lakho elitsha, leyamafutha akho, lengqabutho yoboya bezimvu zakho, uzamupha yona.
Ngoba uNkulunkulu wakho imkhethile kuzo zonke izizwe zakho, ukuthi eme akhonze ebizweni leN, yena lamadodana akhe, zonke izinsuku.
Uba-ke umLevi esiza evela loba kukuliphi lamasango akho kuIsrayeli wonke lapho ahlala khona njengowezizwe, eze,
khona ezakhonza ebizweni leN uNkulunkulu wakhe.
Azakudla izabelo ezilinganayo, ngaphandle kwezinto zakhe ezathengiswayo zaboyise.
Lapho usufikile elizweni uNkulunkulu wakho ekunika lona, ungafundi ukwenza ngokwezinengiso zalezozizwe.
Kakuyikutholakala phakathi kwakho owenza indodana yakhe lendodakazi yakhe idabule emlilweni,
lophosayo.
Ngoba wonke owenza lezizinto uyisinengiso eNni. Langenxa yalezizinengiso uNkulunkulu wakho iyabaxotsha elifeni phambi kwakho.
Uzakuba ngopheleleyo eNni uNkulunkulu wakho.
Ngoba izizwe lezi, ozakudla ilifa lazo, zalalela abachasisa ngemibono; kodwa wena, uNkulunkulu wakho kayikuvumelanga okunjalo.
uNkulunkulu wakho izakuvusela uMprofethi ophuma phakathi kwakho kubafowenu onjengami; yena limlalele.
Njengakho konke owakucelayo eNni uNkulunkulu wakho eHorebe ngosuku lokuhlangana.
yasisithi kimi: Benze kuhle kwabakukhulumileyo.
Ngizabavusela uMprofethi ophuma phakathi kwabafowabo onjengawe.
Kuzakuthi-ke loba ngubani ongayikulalela amazwi ami azawakhuluma ebizweni lami, ngizakubuza kuye.
Kodwa umprofethi oziqhenya.
Njalo uba usithi enhliziyweni yakho: Sizakwazi njani ilizwi engalikhulumanga?
Lapho umprofethi ekhuluma ebizweni leN KOSI.
Lapho uNkulunkulu wakho isiqumile izizwe, olizwe lazo uNkulunkulu wakho ekunike lona, osusidla ilifa lazo, osuhlala emizini yazo lezindlini zazo,
imizi emithathu uzazehlukanisela yona phakathi kwelizwe uNkulunkulu wakho ekunika lona ukudla ilifa lalo.
Uzazilungisela indlela, wehlukanise umngcele welizwe lakho uNkulunkulu wakho ekunika lona ukudla ilifa lalo, ube lezigaba ezintathu, ukuze wonke umbulali abalekele khona.
Lalolu ludaba lombulali ongabalekela khona ukuze aphile: Lowo otshaya umakhelwane wakhe kungeyisikho ngabomo, obengamzondi mandulo,

njengongena egangeni lomakhelwane wakhe ukuyagamula izihlahla, lesandla sakhe sitshaya ngehloka ukugamula isihlahla, lensimbi ikhumuke emphinini, imtshaye umakhelwane wakhe aze afe, yena uzabalekela komunye waleyomizi ukuze aphile.
Hlezi umphindiseli wegazi axotshane lombulali, inhliziyo yakhe isatshisa, amfice ngoba indlela inde, amtshaye ambulale, lanxa bekungelasigwebo sokufa kuye, ngoba ebengamzondi mandulo.
Ngalokhu ngiyalilaya ngisithi: Uzazehlukanisela imizi emithathu.
Uba-ke uNkulunkulu wakho,

uba ugcina yonke limithetho ukuyenza engikulaya yona lamuhla, ukuthanda uNkulunkulu wakho, lokuhamba endleleni zayo izinsuku zonke, khona uzazengezelelela eminye imizi emithathu ngaphandle kwaleyo emithathu.
Ukuze kungachithwa igazi elingelacala phakathi kwelizwe lakho uNkulunkulu wakho ekunika lona ukuba yilifa, ube lecala legazi phezu kwakho.
Kodwa uba umuntu elenzondo kumakhelwane wakhe, amcathamele, amvukele, amtshaye okokufa aze afe, abalekele komunye walimizi,
khona abadala bomuzi wakhe bazathumela bamthathe lapho, bamnikele esandleni somphindiseli wegazi ukuthi afe.
Ilihlo lakho lingamhawukeli.
Ungatshedisi isikhonkwane somngcele womakhelwane wakho abendulo abasibethelayo elifeni lakho, ozakudla ilifa lalo elizweni uNkulunkulu wakho ekunika lona ukudla ilifa lalo.
Umfakazi oyedwa kayikusukumela umuntu loba ngabuphi ububi loba ngasiphi isono, loba kusiphi isono one ngaso. Ngomlomo wabafakazi ababili kumbe ngomlomo wabafakazi abathathu udaba lungaqiniswa.
Uba kusukuma umfakazi wamanga amelane lomuntu emfakazela ngokubi,
khona abantu bobabili, abalokuxabana, bazakuma phambi kweN, phambi kwabapristi labahluleli abazakuba bekhona ngalezonsuku.
Labahluleli bazachwayisisa; khangela-ke umfakazi ngumfakazi wamanga, ufakaze amanga ngomfowabo,
khona lizakwenza kuye lokho abehlose ukukwenza kumfowabo.
Lalabo abaseleyo bazakuzwa, besabe, kusukela lapho bangabe besenza ububi obunjengalobu phakathi kwakho.
Lelihlo lakho lingabi lesihawu.
Lapho uphuma impi ukumelana lezitha zakho, ube usubona amabhiza lezinqola, labantu abanengi kulawe, ungabesabi.
Njalo kuzakuthi, nxa selisondela empini, umpristi asondele akhulume labantu,
athi kubo: Zwana, Israyeli! Selisondela empini lamuhla limelana lezitha zenu; inhliziyo yenu kayingapheli amandla; lingesabi, lingathuthumeli, lingatshaywa luvalo ngenxa yobukhona babo;
ngoba uNkulunkulu wenu nguye ohamba lani, ukulilwela ezitheni zenu, ukulisindisa.
Lenduna zizakhuluma labantu zithi: Ngubani umuntu owakhe indlu entsha.
Ngubani-ke umuntu ohlanyele isivini, ongadlanga okwaso? Kahambe abuyele endlini yakhe, hlezi afele empini, lomunye umuntu adle okwaso.
Ngubani-ke umuntu ogane umfazi, engakamthathi? Kahambe abuyele endlini yakhe, hlezi afele empini, lomunye umuntu amthathe.
Lezinduna zizakhuluma futhi labantu, zithi.
Kuzakuthi-ke lapho izinduna seziqedile ukukhuluma labantu, bazabeka izinduna zebutho ephondo lwabantu.
Ekusondeleni kwakho emzini ukulwa umelene lawo, uzamemezela ukuthula kuwo.
Kuzakuthi-ke, uba ukuphendula ngokuthula, ukuvulela, khona bonke abantu abaficwa kuwo bazakuba yizibhalwa kuwe, bakusebenzele.
Kodwa uba ungenzi ukuthula lawe, kodwa usilwa lawe, uzawuvimbezela.
Nxa uNkulunkulu wakho iwunikela esandleni sakho, uzatshaya wonke owesilisa wawo ngobukhali benkemba.
Kodwa abesifazana labantwanyana, lezifuyo, lakho konke okusemzini, impango yonke yawo, uzaziphangela yona; uzakudla impango yezitha zakho uNkulunkulu wakho ekunike yona.
Uzakwenza njalo kuyo yonke imizi ekhatshana kakhulu lawe, engeyisiyo yemizi yalezizizwe.
Kodwa emizini yalababantu uNkulunkulu wakho ekunika yona ukuba yilifa, kawuyikutshiya lutho luphila oluphefumulayo;
kodwa uzabatshabalalisa lokubatshabalalisa: AmaHethi lamaAmori, amaKhanani lamaPerizi, amaHivi lamaJebusi, njengokukulaya kwayo uNkulunkulu wakho.
Ukuze bangalifundisi ukwenza njengazo zonke izinengiso zabo, abazenze kubonkulunkulu babo.
Lapho uvimbezela umuzi isikhathi eside, usilwa lawo ukuwuthumba, ungoni izihlahla zawo ngokuzigamula ngehloka, ngoba ungadla okwazo, kodwa ungazigamuli) ukuza phambi kwakho ekuvimbezeleni.
Kuphela izihlahla elizaziyo ukuthi kayisizo izihlahla zokudla, yilezo ongazichitha lokuzigamula ukuze wakhe inqaba yokuvimbezela maqondana lomuzi olwa impi lawe, uze wehlele phansi.
Uba kutholakala obuleweyo elizweni uNkulunkulu wakho ekunika lona ukudla ilifa lalo, elele egangeni, kungaziwa ukuthi ngubani omtshayileyo,
abadala bakho labahluleli bakho bazaphuma, balinganise ukuya emizini ezingelezele obuleweyo.
Kuzakuthi-ke umuzi oseduze lobuleweyo, abadala balowomuzi bazathatha ithokazi enkomeni, okungasetshenzwanga ngalo, elingadonsanga ejogweni.
Labadala balowomuzi balehlisele ithokazi esigodini esilamanzi angacitshiyo, esingalinywanga lesingahlanyelwanga, bephule intamo yethokazi lapho esigodini.
Abapristi, amadodana kaLevi, bazasondela-ke; ngoba uNkulunkulu wakho ibakhethile ukuyikhonza lokubusisa ebizweni leN KOSI.
Labo bonke abadala balowomuzi oseduze lobuleweyo bazagezela izandla zabo phezu kwethokazi elephulwe intamo esigodini,
baphendule bathi: Izandla zethu kazichithanga leligazi, lamehlo ethu kawakubonanga.
Benzele inhlawulo yokuthula abantu bakho uIsrayeli owamhlengayo, N, ungabeki igazi elingelacala phakathi kwesizwe sakho uIsrayeli. Legazi bazalithethelelwa.
Ngalokhu wena uzakhupha igazi elingelacala phakathi kwakho nxa usenza okulungileyo emehlweni eN.
Lapho uphuma impi ukumelana lezitha zakho, uNkulunkulu wakho isizinikele esandleni sakho, usuthumbe abathunjwa bazo,
ubusubona phakathi kwabathunjiweyo owesifazana omuhle, umfise, ukuthi ungamthatha abe ngumkakho,
uzamngenisa phakathi komuzi wakho, njalo aphuce ikhanda lakhe, aqume inzipho zakhe,
akhulule izembatho zokuthunjwa kwakhe, ahlale emzini wakho abeselilela uyise lonina inyanga yonke. Emva kwalokho ubusungena kuye, ube yindoda yakhe, laye abe ngumkakho.
Kuzakuthi-ke, uba ungathokozi ngaye, uzamyekela ahambe njengokuthanda kwakhe; kodwa ungamthengisi lokumthengisa ngemali, ungamphathi njengesigqili.
Uba indoda ilabafazi ababili, omunye eyintandokazi lomunye eyisaliwakazi, njalo bamzalele abantwana, intandokazi lesaliwakazi, uba izibulo libe yindodana yesaliwakazi,
kuzakuthi, mhla esenza amadodana akhe ukuthi adle ilifa lalokho alakho, kangayenzi indodana yentandokazi ibe lizibulo phambi kwendodana yesaliwakazi, elizibulo.
Kodwa izibulo indodana yesaliwakazi uzalivuma ngokulinika isabelo esiphindwe kabili sakho konke okuficwayo kuye, ngoba liyikuqala kwamandla akhe.
Uba indoda ilendodana elenkani lengezwayo, engalaleli ilizwi likayise kumbe ilizwi likanina, sebeyijezisile, njalo ingabalaleli,
khona uyise lonina bazayibamba, bayikhuphele ebadaleni bomuzi wayo, lesangweni lendawo yayo,
bathi ebadaleni bomuzi wayo: Lindodana yethu ilenkani, kayizwa, kayilaleli ilizwi lethu; iyisiminzi lesidakwa.
Khona wonke amadoda omuzi wayo azayikhanda ngamatshe ize ife; ngalokho uzakhupha ububi phakathi kwakho.
Njalo uba kuzakuba lesono emuntwini esifanele ukufa, abulawe, uzamphanyeka esihlahleni.
Isidumbu sakhe singahlali esihlahleni ubusuku bonke, kodwa lizamngcwaba lokumngcwaba ngalolosuku.
Awuyikubona inkabi yomfowenu.
Njalo uba umfowenu engekho eduze lawe, loba ungamazi, uzayiletha-ke phakathi komuzi wakho; njalo izakuba kuwe, umfowenu aze ayidinge, ubusuyibuyisela kuye.
Wenze njalo langobabhemi wakhe, wenze njalo langesembatho sakhe, wenze njalo langayo yonke into elahlekileyo yomfowenu, ayilahlileyo, oyitholileyo; awulakuyicatshela.
Awuyikubona ubabhemi womfowenu loba inkabi yakhe kusiwa endleleni, ukucatshele; uzakuphakamisa lokukuphakamisa kanye laye.
Owesifazana angagqoki okwendoda, lendoda ingagqoki isigqoko sowesifazana; ngoba wonke owenza lezizinto uyisinengiso eNni uNkulunkulu wakho.
Uba kungaba lesidleke senyoni phambi kwakho endleleni loba kusiphi isihlahla loba phansi, amaphuphu kumbe amaqanda, unina efukamele amaphuphu loba amaqanda, ungathathi unina lamaphuphu;
uzayekela lokuyekela unina ukuze ahambe, uzithathele amaphuphu, ukuze kukulungele, njalo welule insuku.
Nxa usakha indlu entsha, uzakwenzela uphahla lwakho uthango, ukuze ungayehliseli indlu yakho icala legazi, uba umuntu esiwa awe kulo.
Ungahlanyeli inhlobo ezimbili esivinini sakho, hlezi isivuno esigcweleyo senhlanyelo yakho oyihlanyeleyo lesithelo sesivini singcoliswe.
Ungalimi ngenkabi lobabhemi ndawonye.
Ungagqoki isigqoko esixubene.
Uzazenzela.
Uba indoda ithatha umfazi, ingene kuye, ibisimzonda,
imbeke icala elilehlazo, imgcone ngebizo elibi, ithi: Ngathatha lowesifazana; lapho ngisondela kuye kangitholanga ubuntombi kuye.
Uyise wentombi lonina bazathatha baveze ubufakazi bobuntombi bentombi ebadaleni bomuzi esangweni.
Loyise wentombi uzakuthi ebadaleni: Ngendisela indodakazi yami kulindoda; yasiyizonda;
khangelani-ke, ibeke icala elilehlazo, isithi: Kangitholanga ubuntombi endodakazini yakho. Kanti lobu yibufakazi bobuntombi bendodakazi yami. Besebesendlala ilembu phambi kwabadala bomuzi.
Abadala balowomuzi babesebethatha leyondoda bayijezise;
bamhlawulise inhlamvu zesiliva ezilikhulu, bazinike uyise wentombi, ngoba iveze ibizo elibi phezu kwentombi emsulwa yakoIsrayeli. Njalo izakuba ngumkayo; kayilakuyilahla zonke izinsuku zayo.
Kodwa uba linto iliqiniso; ubufakazi bobuntombi kabutholakalanga entombini,
intombi bazayikhuphela emnyango wendlu kayise.
Uba indoda ificwa ilele lomfazi owendele endodeni, labo bobabili bazakufa-ke, indoda ebilele lomfazi, lalowomfazi.
Uba kulentombazana eyintombi emsulwa egane indoda, njalo indoda iyithole phakathi komuzi, ilale layo,
lizabakhuphela esangweni lalowomuzi bobabili, libakhande ngamatshe baze bafe; intombi ngoba ingahlabanga umkhosi phakathi komuzi, lendoda ngoba ithobise umkamakhelwane wakhe.
Kodwa uba indoda ifica intombi eganileyo egangeni, indoda iyibambe, ilale layo, ngakho indoda kuphela elele layo izakufa.
Kodwa lingenzi lutho entombini; kakulasono sokufa entombini; ngoba njengendoda evukela umakhelwane wakhe imbulale, injalo lindaba.
Ngoba iyifice egangeni; intombi eganileyo ibihlabe umkhosi, njalo bekungelamuntu wokuyisindisa.
Uba indoda ifice intombazana eyintombi emsulwa engagananga, iyibambe, ilale layo, babesebeficwa,
khona indoda ebilele layo izanika uyise wentombi inhlamvu zesiliva ezingamatshumi amahlanu, njalo ibe ngumkayo, ngoba eyithobisile; kayilakuyilahla zonke izinsuku zayo.
Indoda kayingathathi umkayise.
Olimele emasendeni, loba oqunywe amaphambili, angangeni ebandleni leN.
Ozelwe ngobufebe angangeni ebandleni leN; ngitsho isizukulwana sakhe setshumi kasiyikungena ebandleni leN.
UmAmoni lomMowabi kangangeni ebandleni leN; ngitsho isizukulwana sabo setshumi kasiyikungena ebandleni leN, kuze kube laphakade;
ngenxa yokuthi kabalihlangabezanga endleleni ngesinkwa langamanzi ekuphumeni kwenu eGibhithe.
Kodwa uNkulunkulu wakho kayifunanga ukuzwa uBalami; kodwa uNkulunkulu wakho yaphendula isiqalekiso saba yisibusiso kuwe, ngoba uNkulunkulu wakho yakuthanda.
Kawuyikudinga ukuthula kwabo lokuhle kwabo zonke izinsuku zakho, kuze kube laphakade.
Unganengwa ngumEdoma, ngoba ungumfowenu; unganengwa ngumGibhithe.
Abantwana abazalwa yibo, besizukulwana sesithathu sabo, bangangena ebandleni leN.
Lapho inkamba iphuma ukuyamelana lezitha zakho, uzazigcina kuyo yonke into embi.
Uba ekhona phakathi kwenu umuntu ongahlambulukanga ngenxa yokungcola okwehla ebusuku, uzaphumela ngaphandle kwenkamba, angangeni phakathi kwenkamba.
Kodwa kuzakuthi sekuzakuhlwa uzageza ngamanzi, lalapho ilanga selitshonile angene aye phakathi kwenkamba.
Njalo uzakuba lendawo ngaphandle kwenkamba lapho ozaphumela khona ukuya ngaphandle,
ube lesikhonkwane ezikhalini zakho; njalo kuzakuthi usuye ngaphandle, ugebhe ngaso, uphenduke ugqibele okuphume kuwe.
Ngoba uNkulunkulu wakho iyahamba phakathi kwenkamba yakho, ukukukhulula.
Unganikeli enkosini yaso isigqili esibalekele kuwe sisuka enkosini yaso;
sizahlala lawe phakathi kwakho, endaweni esizayikhetha, kwelinye lamasango akho, lapho okusilungele khona; ungasicindezeli.
Kakungabi khona iwule elethempeli phakathi kwamadodakazi akoIsrayeli.
Ungalethi iholo lewule lemali yenja endlini yeN uNkulunkulu wakho ngokwaloba yisiphi isithembiso; ngoba lokho kokubili kuyisinengiso eNni uNkulunkulu wakho.
Ungeboleki umfowenu ngenzalo, inzalo yemali, inzalo yokudla, inzalo yaloba yiyiphi into ebolekwa ngenzalo.
Ungeboleka owezizweni ngenzalo, kodwa ungeboleki umfowenu ngenzalo.
Nxa uthembisa isithembiso eNni uNkulunkulu wakho, ungaphuzi ukusikhokha; ngoba uNkulunkulu wakho izasibiza lokusibiza kuwe; njalo kuzakuba yisono kuwe.
Kodwa uba uyekela ukuthembisa, kakuyikuba yisono kuwe.
Lokho okuphuma endebeni zakho uzakugcina ukwenze; njengokuthembisa kwakho eNni uNkulunkulu wakho, umnikelo wesihle owukhulume ngomlomo wakho.
Nxa ungena esivinini somakhelwane wakho, ungadla izithelo zevini njengokuthanda kwakho usuthe; kodwa ungafaki luthoesitsheni sakho.
Nxa ungena emabeleni amileyo kamakhelwane wakho.
Uba indoda ithatha umfazi, imgane, kuzakuthi nxa engatholi umusa emehlweni ayo, ngoba ifice kuye into elihlazo, kayimbhalele incwadi yesehlukaniso, ifake esandleni sakhe, imkhuphe endlini yayo.
Nxa esephumile endlini yayo, angahamba, ayekuba ngowenye indoda.
Uba lindoda elandelayo imzonda, imbhalele incwadi yesehlukaniso, i yi fake esandleni sakhe, imkhiphe endlini yayo; loba lindoda elandelayo isifa ebimthethe waba ngumkayo,

indoda yakhe yokuqala eyamkhiphayo ingemthathe futhi abe ngumkayo, emva kokuba esengcolisiwe; ngoba kuyisinengiso phambi kweN. Ngakho kawuyikwenza ilizwe lone uNkulunkulu wakho ekunika lona ukuba yilifa.
Nxa indoda ithethe umfazi omutsha kayiyikuphuma impi, futhi kayiyikuphathiswa laloba yiwuphi umsebenzi; izakuba sekhaya ikhululekile umnyaka owodwa.
Kakungabi khona ozathatha ilitshe lokucholela loba imbokodo ukuze kube yisibambiso; ngoba uthatha impilo ibe yisibambiso.
Uba umuntu eficwa eseba umuntu kubafowabo ebantwaneni bakoIsrayeli.
Qaphela esifeni sobulephero, ukunanzelelisisa wenze njengakho konke abapristi abangamaLevi abakufundisa khona; njengalokhu ngabalaya, nanzelelani ukukwenza.
Khumbula lokho uNkulunkulu wakho eyakwenza kuMiriyamu endleleni ekuphumeni kwenu eGibhithe.
Nxa useboleka umakhelwane wakho ulutho, ungangeni endlini yakhe ukuthi uthathe isibambiso sakhe.
Uzakuma phandle, lomuntu omebolekayo akukhuphele isibambiso phandle.
Njalo uba umuntu engumyanga, ungalali lesibambiso sakhe;
uzabuyisela lokubuyisela isibambiso kuye lapho ilanga litshona, ukuze alale ngesembatho sakhe.
Ungacindezeli inceku eqatshiweyo engumyanga leswelayo, ingowabafowenu loba ingowezizweni oselizweni lakini phakathi kwamasango akho.
Uzanika iholo layo ngosuku lwayo, lelanga kalingatshoni phezu kwalo, ngoba ingumyanga, ibeke inhliziyo yayo kulo.
Oyise kabayikubulawa ngenxa yabantwana, labantwana kabayikubulawa ngenxa yaboyise; ngulowo lalowo uzabulawa ngenxa yesakhe isono.
Ungaphambuli isahlulelo sowemzini le ntandane;
kodwa ukhumbule ukuthi wawuyisigqili eGibhithe, leN uNkulunkulu wakho yakuhlenga khona; ngakho ngiyakulaya ukuthi wenze lolulutho.
Nxa uvuna isivuno sakho ensimini yakho.
Nxa uvuthuza isihlahla sakho somhlwathi, ungayihlola izingatsha emva kwakho; kuzakuba ngokowemzini lokwentandane lokomfelokazi.
Nxa usuvunile izithelo zesivini sakho, ungakhothozi emva kwakho; kuzakuba ngokowemzini lokwentandane lokomfelokazi.
Uzakhumbula ukuthi wawuyisigqili elizweni leGibhithe; ngakho ngiyakulaya ukwenza lolulutho.
Uba kukhona ukuxabana phakathi kwabantu, baye esahlulelweni, ukuthi babahlulele.
Kuzakuthi-ke uba olecala efanele ukutshaywa, umahluleli uzamlalisa phansi, atshaywe phambi kwakhe, njengokulingene icala lakhe, ngokwenani.
Angatshaywa imivimvinyaengamatshumi amane, angengezeleli, hlezi nxa esedlule ukumtshaya okwedlula le ngemivimvinya eminengi, kuze kuthi umfowenu ayangeke emehlweni akho.
Ungayifaki isayeke inkabi nxa ibhula.

Uba izelamani zihlala ndawonye, lomunye wazo esifa, engelandodana, umfazi wofileyo kangendeli kowemzini ongaphandle; umfowabo wendoda yakhe uzangena kuye, amthathe abe ngumkakhe, enze kuye imfanelo yomfowabo wendoda.
Kuzakuthi-ke izibulo alizalayo lizakuma ebizweni lomfowabo ofileyo.

Uba umuntu engathandi ukuthatha umkamfowabo, umkamfowabo uzakwenyukela esangweni kubadala athi: Umfowabo wendoda yami uyala ukuvusela umfowabo ibizo koIsrayeli; kafuni ukwenza kimi imfanelo yomfowabo wendoda.
Abadala bomuzi wakhe bazambiza-ke, bakhulume laye. Uba eqinisa esithi: Kangithandi ukumthatha;
umkamfowabo uzasondela-ke kuye phambi kwamehlo abadala, akhuphe inyathela lakhe enyaweni lwakhe.
Lebizo lakhe lizakuthiwa koIsrayeli: Indlu yolenyathela elakhutshwayo.
Nxa amadoda esilwa, omunye lomunye, kusondele umfazi wenye ukuthi ayikhulule indoda yakhe esandleni soyitshayayo, elule isandla sakhe ayibambe ngamaphambili,
usiqume isandla sakhe, ilihlo lakho lingabi lasihawu.
Ungabi lamatshe okulinganisa, elikhulu lelincinyane.
Ungabi lama-efa ehlukeneyo endlini yakho, esikhulu lesincinyane.
Woba lelitshe lokulinganisa elipheleleyo lelilungileyo, woba le-efa epheleleyo lelungileyo, ukuze insuku zakho zelulwe elizweni uNkulunkulu wakho ekunika lona.
Ngoba wonke owenza izinto ezinje, wonke owenza ukungalungi, uyisinengiso eNni uNkulunkulu wakho.
Khumbula lokho uAmaleki akwenza kuwe,
ukuthi wakuhlangabeza endleleni, watshaya phakathi kwakho ababebuthakathaka emva kwakho.
Ngakho kuzakuthi, nxa uNkulunkulu wakho isikuphumuzile kuzo zonke izitha zakho inhlangothi zonke, elizweni uNkulunkulu wakho ekunika lona libe yilifa ukudla ilifa lalo.
Kuzakuthi-ke lapho usufikile elizweni uNkulunkulu wakho ekunika lona libe yilifa, udle ilifa lalo, uhlale kulo,
uthathe okokuqala kwezithelo zonke zomhlabathi ozakuletha kuvela elizweni lakho uNkulunkulu wakho ekunika lona.
Uzakuya kumpristi ozakuba ekhona ngalezonsuku uthi kuye: Ngiyabika lamuhla eNni uNkulunkulu wakho ukuthi sengifikile elizweni eyalifungela obaba ukusinika lona.
Njalo umpristi uzathatha isitsha esandleni sakho, asibeke phambi kwelathi leN uNkulunkulu wakho.
Khona uzaphendula uthi phambi kweN uNkulunkulu wakho: Ubaba wayengumSiriya.
Kodwa amaGibhithe asiphatha kubi, asihlupha, asethwesa ubugqili obunzima.
Sasesikhala eNni uNkulunkulu wabobaba; yalizwa ilizwi lethu, yabona inhlupheko yethu, lokutshikatshika kwethu, locindezelo lwethu;
yasikhupha eGibhithe;
yasiletha kulindawo, yasinika lelilizwe, ilizwe eligeleza uchago loluju.
Khathesi-ke, khangela, ngilethile ukuqala kwezithelo zomhlabathi, N, onginike khona. Njalo uzakubeka phambi kweN uNkulunkulu wakho, ukhonze phambi kweN uNkulunkulu wakho;
uthokoze ngakho konke okuhle uNkulunkulu wakho ekunike khona labendlu yakho, wena lomLevi lowemzini ophakathi kwakho.
Lapho usuqedile ukunika okwetshumi, konke okwetshumi kwezithelo zakho ngomnyaka wesithathu,

uzakuthi phambi kweN uNkulunkulu wakho: Sengikhuphile endlini yamiinto engcwele, lami njalo ngakunika umLevi, lowemzini, intandane, lomfelokazi, njengayo yonke imilayo yakho ongilaye yona; kangeqanga okwemilayo yakho, futhi kangi yi khohlwanga.
Kangidlanga kukho ekulileni kwami, kangisuselanga kukho ukungcola, kangikunikelanga okwakho kofileyo; ngililalele ilizwi leN uNkulunkulu wami, ngenzile njengakho konke ongilaye khona.
Khangela phansi usendaweni yakho yokuhlala engcwele usemazulwini, ubusise abantu bakho uIsrayeli lomhlaba osinike wona, njengokufunga kwakho kubobaba.
Lamuhla uNkulunkulu wakho iyakulaya ukuthi wenze lezizimiso lezahlulelo; ngakho uzazigcina uzenze ngenhliziyo yakho yonke langomphefumulo wakho wonke.
Lamuhla uvumile obala ukuthi inguNkulunkulu wakho, lokuthi uzahamba endleleni zayo, ugcine izimiso zayo lemilayo yayo lezahlulelo zayo, ulalele ilizwi layo.
Futhi ivumile obala lamuhla ukuthi uzakuba yisizwe sayo esikhethekileyo njengokukuthembisa kwayo, lokuthi ugcine yonke imilayo yayo,
ukuze ikuphakamise phezu kwezizwe zonke ezenzileyo, ekubongweni, lebizweni, lenhlonipheni.
UMozisi labadala bakoIsrayeli basebelaya abantu besithi: Gcina yonke imithetho engililaya yona lamuhla.
Kuzakuthi-ke mhla lichapha iJodani lisiya elizweni uNkulunkulu wakho ekunika lona, uzazimisela amatshe amakhulu, uwahuqe ngekalaga,
ubhale kuwo wonke amazwi alumlayo nxa usuchaphile, ukuze ungene elizweni uNkulunkulu wakho ekunika lona.
Kuzakuthi-ke selichaphile iJodani, limise lamatshe engililaya ngawo lamuhla, entabeni yeEbhali, liwahuqe ngekalaga.
Wakhele khona uNkulunkulu wakho ilathi, ilathi lamatshe. Ungasebenzisi insimbi phezu kwawo.
Wakhele uNkulunkulu wakho ilathi ngamatshe apheleleyo. Unikele phezu kwalo iminikelo yokutshiswa eNni uNkulunkulu wakho,
uhlabe iminikelo yokuthula, udle lapho, uthokoze phambi kweN uNkulunkulu wakho.
Futhi ubhale phezu kwamatshe wonke amazwi alumlayo, kukhanye kuhle.
UMozisi labapristi abangamaLevi basebekhuluma kuIsrayeli wonke besithi: Thula ulalele, Israyeli; lamuhla usuyisizwe seN uNkulunkulu wakho.
Ngakho uzalalela ilizwi leN uNkulunkulu wakho, wenze imilayo yayo lezimiso zayo engikulaya zona lamuhla.
UMozisi wasebalaya abantu ngalolosuku esithi:
Laba bazakuma entabeni yeGerizimi ukubusisa abantu nxa selichaphe iJodani: OSimeyoni, loLevi, loJuda, loIsakari, loJosefa, loBhenjamini.
Lalaba bazakuma entabeni yeEbhali phezu kwesiqalekiso: ORubeni, uGadi, loAsheri, loZebuluni, uDani, loNafithali.
LamaLevi azaphendula athi kuwo wonke amadoda akoIsrayeli ngelizwi eliphakemeyo:
Kaqalekiswe umuntu owenza isithombe esibaziweyo lesibunjwe ngokuncibilikisa, isinengiso eNni, umsebenzi wezandla zomuntu oyingcitshi, asibeke ensitha.
Kaqalekiswe odelela uyise lonina. Labo bonke abantu bazakuthi: Ameni.
Kaqalekiswe otshedisa isikhonkwane somngcele kamakhelwane wakhe. Labo bonke abantu bazakuthi: Ameni.
Kaqalekiswe oduhisa isiphofu endleleni. Labo bonke abantu bazakuthi: Ameni.
Kaqalekiswe ophambula isahlulelo sowemzini, intandane, lomfelokazi. Labo bonke abantu bazakuthi: Ameni.
Kaqalekiswe olala lomkayise. Labo bonke abantu bazakuthi: Ameni.
Kaqalekiswe olala laloba yiyiphi inyamazana. Labo bonke abantu bazakuthi: Ameni.
Kaqalekiswe olala lodadewabo, indodakazi kayise loba indodakazi kanina. Labo bonke abantu bazakuthi: Ameni.
Kaqalekiswe olala loninazala. Labo bonke abantu bazakuthi: Ameni.
Kaqalekiswe otshaya umakhelwane wakhe ensitha. Labo bonke abantu bazakuthi: Ameni.
Kaqalekiswe owemukela isivalamlomo sokutshaya umuntu, igazi elingelacala. Labo bonke abantu bazakuthi: Ameni.
Kaqalekiswe ongaqinisi amazwi alumlayo ukuwenza. Labo bonke abantu bazakuthi: Ameni.
Kuzakuthi-ke, uba ulalela lokulalela ilizwi leN uNkulunkulu wakho, ukugcina ukwenza yonke imilayo yayo engikulaya yona lamuhla.
Lalezizibusiso zonke zizakuza phezu kwakho, zikufice, nxa ulalela ilizwi leN uNkulunkulu wakho.
Uzabusiswa emzini, ubusiswe futhi ensimini.
Sizabusiswa isithelo sesizalo sakho, lesithelo somhlaba wakho, lenzalo yezifuyo zakho.
Kuzabusiswa isitsha sakho, lomganu wakho wokuxovela izinkwa.
Uzabusiswa ekungeneni kwakho, ubusiswe ekuphumeni kwakho.
izakwenza izitha zakho ezikuvukelayo zitshaywe phambi kwakho; zizaphuma ukumelana lawe ngandlelanye, zibaleke phambi kwakho ngezindlela eziyisikhombisa.
izalaya isibusiso phezu kwakho, eziphaleni zakho.
izazimisela wena ube yisizwe esingcwele, njengokufunga kwayo kuwe, uba ugcina imilayo yeN uNkulunkulu wakho, uhambe endleleni zayo.
Labo bonke abantu basemhlabeni bazabona ukuthi ibizo leN libizwa phezu kwakho.
LeN izakwandisela okuhle, esithelweni sesizalo sakho, lenzalweni yezifuyo zakho, lesithelweni somhlaba wakho, elizweni eyafungela oyihlo ukukunika lona.
izakuvulela okuligugu kwayo okulungileyo, amazulu, ukunika izulu elizweni lakho ngesikhathi salo.
izakwenza ube yinhloko, ungabi ngumsila; uzakuba ngaphezulu kuphela, ungabi ngaphansi, uba ulalela imilayo yeN uNkulunkulu wakho engikulaya yona lamuhla ukuyigcina lokuyenza.
Ungaphambuki lakwelilodwa lamazwi engililaya wona lamuhla, ukuya ngakwesokunene langakwesokhohlo, ukulandela abanye onkulunkulu ukubakhonza.
Kodwa kuzakuthi, uba ungalaleli ilizwi leN uNkulunkulu wakho, ukugcina ukwenza yonke imilayo yayo lezimiso zayo engikulaya zona lamuhla, leziziqalekiso zonke zize phezu kwakho.
Uzaqalekiswa emzini, uqalekiswe futhi ensimini.
Kuzaqalekiswa isitsha sakho lomganu wakho wokuxovela izinkwa.
Kuzaqalekiswa isithelo sesizalo sakho, lesithelo somhlaba wakho, umqegu wenkomo zakho, lamazinyane ezimvu zakho.
Uzaqalekiswa ekungeneni kwakho, uqalekiswe ekuphumeni kwakho.
izathumela phakathi kwakho isiqalekiso.
izanamathelisa kuwe umatshayabhuqe wesifo, aze akuqede usuke elizweni oya kulo ukudla ilifa lalo.
izakutshaya ngesifo esicakisayo; njalo kuzakuxotsha uze ubhubhe.
Lesibhakabhaka sakho esiphezu kwekhanda lakho sizakuba lithusi, lomhlaba ongaphansi kwakho ube yinsimbi.
izakwenza izulu lelizwe lakho libe lubhuqu lothuli, kwehlele phezu kwakho kuvela emazulwini, uze ubhujiswe.
izakwenza utshaywe phambi kwezitha zakho; uzaphuma umelane lazo ngandlelanye, njalo uzabaleka phambi kwazo ngezindlela eziyisikhombisa.
Lesidumbu sakho sizakuba yikudla kwenyoni zonke zamazulu lokwezinyamazana zomhlaba.
izakutshaya ngamathumba eGibhithe.
izakutshaya ngobuhlanya langobuphofu.
Njalo uzaphumputha emini njengesiphofu siphumputha emnyameni, ungenzi indlela zakho ziphumelele; ucindezelwe kuphela, uphangwe insuku zonke, kungabi khona osindisayo.
Uzagana umfazi, kodwa enye indoda ilale laye.

Inkabi yakho izahlatshwa phambi kwamehlo akho, ungadli okwayo; ubabhemi wakho athathwe ngodlakela phambi kobuso bakho, angabuyiselwa kuwe; izimvu zakho zizanikwa izitha zakho, kungabi khona okusindiselayo.
Amadodana akho lamadodakazi akho azanikelwa kwesinye isizwe, lamehlo akho azakhangela abalangathe usuku lonke.
Isithelo somhlaba wakho, lomsebenzi wakho wonke, isizwe ongasaziyo sizakudla. Uzacindezelwa kuphela, uchotshozwe insuku zonke,
uze uhlanye ngenxa yokubona kwamehlo akho ozakubona.
izakutshaya emadolweni lemilenzeni ngamathumba amabi angelakwelatshwa, kusukela kungaphansi yonyawo lwakho kuze kube senkanda yakho.
izakusa wena lenkosi yakho owayibeka phezu kwakho esizweni ongasaziyo wena laboyihlo.
Uzakuba yinto eyesabekayo, lapho ezakusa khona.
Uzaphuma lenhlanyelo enengi uye ensimini, kodwa ubuthelele okulutshwana.
Uzahlanyela izivini, uzisebenze, kodwa kawuyikunatha iwayini, kawuyikubutha lutho, ngoba imihogoyi izazidla.
Uzakuba lezihlahla zemihlwathi phakathi kwemingcele yakho yonke, kodwa kawuyikugcoba ngamafutha, ngoba imihlwathi izawohloka.
Uzazala amadodana lamadodakazi, kodwa kawayikuba ngawakho, ngoba azakuya ekuthunjweni.
Zonke izihlahla zakho lezithelo zomhlaba wakho zizakuba ngezesikhonyane.
Owemzini ophakathi kwakho uzaphakama phezu kwakho aqonge phezulu, wena-ke uzakwehlela phansi phansi.
Yena uzakweboleka, kodwa wena ungameboleki.
Lazo zonke leziziqalekiso zizakwehlela, zixotshane lawe, zikufice, uze ubhujiswe, ngoba ungalilalelanga ilizwi leN uNkulunkulu wakho, ukugcina imilayo yayo lezimiso zayo eyakulaya zona.
Njalo zizakuba phezu kwakho ukuba yisibonakaliso lokuba yisimangaliso, laphezu kwenzalo yakho kuze kube nininini.
Njengoba ungayikhonzanga,
ngakho uzakhonza izitha zakho ezazithuma ukumelana lawe, endlaleni, lekomeni, lekuhambenize, lekusweleni konke. Njalo izabeka ijogwe lensimbi entanyeni yakho, ize ikubhubhise.
izakuvusela isizwe esivela khatshana, emkhawulweni womhlaba,
isizwe esilobuso obesabekayo, esingemukeli ubuso bomdala, esingelamusa komutsha.
Sizakudla isithelo sezifuyo zakho lesithelo somhlaba wakho, uze ubhujiswe; okungayikukutshiyela amabele, iwayini elitsha, lamafutha, umqegu wenkomo zakho, lamazinyane ezimvu zakho, size sikuchithe.

Sizakuvimbezela emasangweni akho wonke, ize idilike imiduli yakho ephakemeyo lebiyelwe ngemithangala obuthembela kuyo, elizweni lonke lakho; njalo sizakuvimbezela emasangweni akho wonke elizweni lonke lakho uNkulunkulu wakho ekunike lona.
Njalo uzakudla isithelo sesizalo sakho, inyama yamadodana leyamadodakazi akho, uNkulunkulu wakho ekunike wona.
Indoda ebuthakathaka phakathi kwakho letotoziweyo kakhulu, ilihlo layo lizakuba libi kumfowabo;
ukuze inganiki lamunye wabo okwenyama yabantwana bayo ebadlayo, ngoba ingasalelwanga lutho ekuvinjezelweni lekucindezelweni, izitha zakho ezizakucindezela ngakho emasangweni akho wonke.
Owesifazana obuthakathaka lototoziweyo phakathi kwakho ongazamanga ukubeka ingaphansi yonyawo lwakhe emhlabathini ngenxa yokutotozwa lobuthakathaka,
lakumnakwabo ophuma phakathi kwenyawo zakhe, lebantwaneni azabazala.
Uba ungayikugcina ukwenza wonke amazwi alumlayo abhaliweyo egwalweni lolu, ukwesaba lelibizo elilodumo lelesabekayo, uNkulunkulu wakho,
izakwenza-ke inhlupheko zakho zimangalise, lenhlupheko zenzalo yakho, inhlupheko ezinkulu leziqhubekayo, lemikhuhlane emibi leqhubekayo.
Njalo izabuyisela kuwe zonke izifo zeGibhithe owawuzesaba, zizanamathela kuwe,
lawo wonke umkhuhlane layo yonke inhlupheko engabhalwanga egwalweni lwalumlayo, izakwehlisela zona uze ubhujiswe.
Njalo lizasala lilabantu abalutshwana.
Kuzakuthi-ke, njengalokhu yathokoza ngani ukulenzela okuhle lokulandisa.
izakuhlakazela-ke phakathi kwezizwe zonke, kusukela komunye umkhawulo womhlaba kuze kube komunye umkhawulo womhlaba.
Laphakathi kwalezozizwe kawuyikuphumula, lengaphansi yonyawo lwakho kayiyikuba lendawo yokuphumula.
Lempilo yakho izahlala isevalweni phambi kwakho; uzatshaywa luvalo ebusuku lemini, ungabi lethemba lempilo yakho.
Ekuseni uzakuthi: Kungathi kungahlwa! Lakusihlwa uzakuthi: Kungathi kungasa! ngenxa yokwesaba kwenhliziyo ozakwesaba ngakho.
LeN izakubuyisela eGibhithe ngemikhumbi, ngendlela engatsho ngayo kuwe ukuthi.
La ngamazwi esivumelwano eyamlaya uMozisi ukusenza labantwana bakoIsrayeli elizweni lakoMowabi, ngaphandle kwesivumelwano eyayisenze labo eHorebe.
UMozisi wasebiza uIsrayeli wonke, wathi kubo: Lina libonile konke eyakwenza phambi kwamehlo enu elizweni leGibhithe, kuFaro lakuzo zonke inceku zakhe lakulo lonke ilizwe lakhe,
izilingo ezinkulu amehlo akho azibonileyo, izibonakaliso lalezozimangaliso ezinkulu.
Kodwa kayilinikanga inhliziyo yokuqedisisa lamehlo okubona lendlebe zokuzwa kuze kube lamuhla.
Ngilihambise iminyaka engamatshumi amane enkangala;
kalidlanga sinkwa, kalinathanga iwayini lokunathwayo okulamandla, ukuze lazi ukuthi ngiyuNkulunkulu wenu.
Ekufikeni kwenu kulindawo, uSihoni inkosi yeHeshiboni loOgi inkosi yeBashani baphuma ukumelana lathi empini, kodwa sabatshaya,
sathatha ilizwe labo, salinika laba yilifa kwabakoRubeni lakwabakoGadi lakungxenye yesizwe sakoManase.
Ngakho gcinani amazwi alesisivumelwano liwenze.
Lina lonke limi phambi kweN uNkulunkulu wenu lamuhla, inhloko zenu, izizwe zenu, abadala benu, lezinduna zenu, wonke amadoda akoIsrayeli,
abantwanyana benu, omkenu, lowemzini ophakathi kwenkamba yakho, kusukela kumgamuli wenkuni zakho kuze kube kumukhi wamanzi akho,
ukwedlulela esivumelwaneni seN uNkulunkulu wakho lesifungweni sayo, uNkulunkulu wakho esenza lawe lamuhla,
ukuze ikumise lamuhla ube yisizwe sayo, lokuthi yona ibe nguNkulunkulu wakho.
Njalo kangisenzi lani lodwa lesisivumelwano,
kodwa lalowo olapha lathi, omiyo lamuhla phambi kweN uNkulunkulu wethu, njalo lalowo ongekho lapha lathi lamuhla.
Ngoba lina liyazi ukuthi sahlala njani elizweni leGibhithe, lokuthi sadabula njani phakathi kwezizwe eladabula kuzo;
njalo libonile izinengiso zazo, lezithombe zazo, isigodo lelitshe, isiliva legolide, ezazilazo.

Hlezi kube khona phakathi kwenu indoda kumbe owesifazana kumbe usapho kumbe isizwe, onhliziyo yakhe iphambuka lamuhla isuka eNni uNkulunkulu wethu ukuyakhonza onkulunkulu balezizizwe. Hlezi kube khona phakathi kwenu impande ethela izithelo ezilobuhlungu.
Njalo kuzakuthi nxa esizwa amazwi alesisiqalekiso, azibusise enhliziyweni yakhe esithi: Ngizakuba lokuthula lanxa ngihamba ebuqholweni benhliziyo yami; ukuze kuqedwe okumanzi kanye lokomileyo.
kayiyikuvuma ukumthethelela, kodwa khona intukuthelo yeN KOSI
LeN izayehlukanisela ububi iyikhuphe kuzo zonke izizwe zakoIsrayeli, njengazo zonke iziqalekiso zesivumelwano ezibhaliweyo egwalweni lwalumlayo.
Khona sizakuthi isizukulwana esizayo, abantwana benu, abazavela emva kwenu, lowezizwe ovela elizweni elikhatshana, lapho bebona inhlupheko zalelilizwe lezifo eligulise ngazo,
ilizwe lonke lalo lizakuba yisibabule letshwayi lokutshiswa, alihlanyelwanga, kalimilisi, kakulalatshani obumila kulo,
lazo zonke izizwe zizakuthi?
Khona bazakuthi: Ngoba batshiyile isivumelwano seN uNkulunkulu waboyise, eyasenza labo ekubakhupheni kwayo elizweni leGibhithe.
Bahamba bakhonza abanye onkulunkulu babakhothamela, onkulunkulu abangabaziyo, eyayingababelanga.
Lentukuthelo yeN yalivuthela lelilizwe, ukwehlisela kulo zonke iziqalekiso ezibhaliweyo egwalweni lolu.
Njalo yabasiphuna elizweni labo ngentukuthelo langolaka langenzondo enkulu, yabaphosela kwelinye ilizwe njengalamuhla.
Imfihlo ngezeN uNkulunkulu wethu, kodwa izinto ezembuliweyo zingezethu lezabantwana bethu kuze kube nininini, ukwenza wonke amazwi alumlayo.
Kuzakuthi-ke,
uzabuyela eNni uNkulunkulu wakho, ulalele ilizwi layo, njengakho konke engikulaya khona lamuhla, wena labantwana bakho, ngenhliziyo yakho yonke langomphefumulo wakho wonke,
khona uNkulunkulu wakho izabuyisa ukuthunjwa kwakho, ikuhawukele.
Lanxa abaxotshiweyo bakho besemkhawulweni wamazulu, ulapho uNkulunkulu wakho izakubutha, ulapho-ke ikuthathe.
LeN uNkulunkulu wakho izakungenisa elizweni oyihlo abalifuyayo, njalo uzalifuya, ikwenzele okuhle, ikwandise kulaboyihlo.
LeN uNkulunkulu wakho izasoka inhliziyo yakho lenhliziyo yenzalo yakho, ukuthanda uNkulunkulu wakho ngenhliziyo yakho yonke langomphefumulo wakho wonke, ukuze uphile.
LeN uNkulunkulu wakho izakwehlisela zonke leziziqalekiso ezitheni zakho lakwabakuzondayo ababekuzingela.
Wena-ke uzabuya ulalele ilizwi leN, wenze yonke imilayo yayo engikulaya yona lamuhla.
Njalo uNkulunkulu wakho izakwandisa kuwo wonke umsebenzi wesandla sakho, esithelweni sesizalo sakho, lesithelweni sezifuyo zakho, lesithelweni somhlaba wakho, ukuthi kulunge,

uba uzalalela ilizwi leN uNkulunkulu wakho, ukugcina imilayo yayo lezimiso zayo ezibhalwe kulolugwalo lomlayo, uba uphendukela eNni uNkulunkulu wakho ngenhliziyo yakho yonke langomphefumulo wakho wonke.
Ngoba lumlayo engikulaya wona lamuhla kawufihlwanga kuwe, futhi kawukhatshana lawe.
Kawukho emazulwini ukuthi uthi: Ngubani ozasenyukelela emazulwini, asithathele wona ukuze siwuzwe siwenze?
Futhi kawungaphetsheya kolwandle ukuthi uthi: Ngubani ozasichaphela aye ngaphetsheya kolwandle, asithathele wona ukuze siwuzwe siwenze?
Kodwa ilizwi liseduze kakhulu lawe, emlonyeni wakho lenhliziyweni yakho ukulenza.
Bona, ngibekile phambi kwakho lamuhla impilo lokulunga, lokufa lobubi.

Ngoba ngiyakulaya lamuhla ukuthanda uNkulunkulu wakho, lokuhamba endleleni zayo, lokugcina imilayo yayo lezimiso zayo lezahlulelo zayo, ukuze uphile wande; leN uNkulunkulu wakho izakubusisa elizweni oya kulo ukudla ilifa lalo.
Kodwa uba inhliziyo yakho iphenduka ukuze ungalaleli,
ngiyalitshela lamuhla ukuthi lizabhubha lokubhubha.
Lamuhla ngiyabiza amazulu lomhlaba ukufakaza ngani,
ukuthanda uNkulunkulu wakho, ukulalela ilizwi layo, lokunamathela kuyo.
UMozisi wasehamba wakhuluma lamazwi kuIsrayeli wonke,
wathi kubo: Ngileminyaka elikhulu lamatshumi amabili lamuhla.
uNkulunkulu wakho, yona izachapha phambi kwakho, yona izachitha lezizizwe zisuke phambi kwakho, ukuze udle ilifa lazo. UJoshuwa, yena uzachapha phambi kwakho.
LeN izakwenza kuzo.
izazinikela-ke phambi kwenu, ukuze lenze kuzo njengokwemilayo yonke engililaye yona.
Qinani, lime isibindi.
UMozisi wasembiza uJoshuwa, wathi kuye phambi kwamehlo kaIsrayeli wonke: Qina, ume isibindi; ngoba wena uzangena lalababantu elizweni eyalifungela oyise ukubanika lona; uzabenza badle ilifa lalo.
Njalo iN, yiyo ehamba phambi kwakho; yona izakuba lawe.
UMozisi wasewubhala lumlayo, wawunika abapristi, amadodana kaLevi.
UMozisi wasebalaya esithi: Ekupheleni kweminyaka eyisikhombisa, ngesikhathi esimisiweyo somnyaka wenkululeko,
lapho uIsrayeli wonke esefike ukubonakala phambi kweN uNkulunkulu wakho endaweni ezayikhetha.
Buthanisa abantu, abesilisa labesifazana labantwana, lowemzini wakho ophakathi kwamasango akho, ukuze bezwe, lokuze bafunde, bayesabe uNkulunkulu wenu, bagcine ukwenza wonke amazwi alumlayo.
Labantwana babo abangaziyo.
yasisithi kuMozisi: Khangela, insuku zakho zokufa sezisondele.
yasibonakala ethenteni ensikeni yeyezi; lensika yeyezi yema phezu komnyango wethente.
yasisithi kuMozisi: Khangela, uzalala laboyihlo; lalababantu bazasukuma.
Lentukuthelo yami izabavuthela ngalolosuku, ngibatshiye?
Lami ngizafihla lokufihla ubuso bami ngalolosuku ngenxa yobubi bonke ababenzileyo, ngoba bephendukele kwabanye onkulunkulu.
Ngakho-ke zibhaleleni lingoma, uyifundise abantwana bakoIsrayeli; uyifake emlonyeni wabo ukuze lingoma ibe yibufakazi kimi obumelene labantwana bakoIsrayeli.
Lapho sengibangenisile elizweni engalifungela oyise, eligeleza uchago loluju, sebedlile basutha.
Kuzakuthi-ke, nxa sebehlelwe ngokubi okunengi lezinhlupheko, lingoma izaphendula phambi kobuso babo ibe yibufakazi; ngoba kayiyikukhohlakala emlonyeni wenzalo yabo.
UMozisi wasebhala lingoma ngalolosuku, wayifundisa abantwana bakoIsrayeli.
Yasilaya uJoshuwa indodana kaNuni yathi.
Kwasekusithi uMozisi eseqedile ukubhala amazwi alumlayo egwalweni, aze aphela,
uMozisi walaya amaLevi ayethwala umtshokotsho wesivumelwano seN esithi:
Thathani lolugwalo lomlayo, lilubeke eceleni komtshokotsho wesivumelwano seN uNkulunkulu wenu, ukuze lube khona.
Ngoba mina ngiyazi umvukela wakho, lentamo yakho elukhuni; khangelani, ngisaphila lani lamuhla?
Buthanisani kimi bonke abadala bezizwe zenu lenduna zenu ukuze ngikhulume lamazwi endlebeni zabo.
Ngoba ngiyazi ukuthi emva kokufa kwami lizakona lokona, liphambuke endleleni engililaye yona.
UMozisi wasekhuluma amazwi alingoma endlebeni zebandla lonke lakoIsrayeli, aze aphela.
Bekani indlebe, mazulu, ngizakhuluma, njalo zwana, mhlaba, amazwi omlomo wami.
Imfundiso yami.
Ngoba ngizamemezela ibizo leN. Mnikeni ubukhulu uNkulunkulu wethu.
U liDwala, umsebenzi wakhe uphelele.
Bonile kuye, kabasibo abantwana bakhe, isici ngesabo, bayisizukulwana esigobileyo.
Lingahlawula lokho eNni yini, bantu abayizithutha labangahlakaniphanga?
Khumbula insuku zendulo, unakane iminyaka yesizukulwana ngesizukulwana. Buza uyihlo, uzakulandisela, abadala bakho, bazakutshela.
Lapho oPhezukonke enika izizwe ilifa.
Ngoba isabelo seN ngabantu bayo, uJakobe uyinkatho yelifa layo.
Wamfica elizweni eliyinkangala.
Njengokhozi olunyakazisa isidleke salo,
yodwa yamkhokhela, njalo kwakungekho layo unkulunkulu wabezizwe.
Yamgadisa endaweni eziphakemeyo zomhlaba, ukuze adle izithelo zensimu,
izankefu zenkomo, lochago lwembuzi, kanye lamafutha amawundlu, lezinqama zohlobo lweBashani, lezimpongo, kanye lamahwahwa ezinso zengqoloyi.
Kodwa uJeshuruni wazimuka.
Bambangela ubukhwele ngokwezizwe, bamthukuthelisa ngezinengiso.
Bahlabela amadimoni, hatshi uNkulunkulu, onkulunkulu ababengabazi, abatsha abavela eduze, oyihlo abangabesabanga.
IDwala elakuzalayo ulikhohliwe, wamkhohlwa uNkulunkulu owakuzalayo.
Kwathi ikubona, yanengwa yibo.
Yasisithi: Ngizabafihlela ubuso bami, ngibone ukuthi ukuphela kwabo kuzakuba yini.
Bona bangenze ngaba lobukhwele ngokungesuye uNkulunkulu.
Ngoba umlilo usubasiwe entukuthelweni yami, uyavutha kuze kube sesihogweni esingaphansi kakhulu.
Ngizabuthelela ububi phezu kwabo, ngiqedele imitshoko yami kubo.
Bazamunywa yindlala, baqedwe yikutshisa lencithakalo ebabayo; njalo ngizathumela phakathi kwabo amazinyo ezilo.
Ngaphandle inkemba izabenza bafelwe, ngokunjalo uvalo ezindlini ezingaphakathi, ijaha lalo lentombi emsulwa, omunyayo kanye lendoda eyimpunga.
Ngathi: Ngizabahlakaza, ngenze ukukhunjulwa kwabo kuphele phakathi kwabantu;
uba bengingesabi intukuthelo yesitha, hlezi abazondi babo bahlanekele.
Ngoba bayisizwe esingelakwelulekwa, njalo kakukho ukuqedisisa kubo.
Kwangathi ngabe bebehlakaniphile, bebengaqedisisa lokhu!
Oyedwa angaxotsha njani abayinkulungwane, lababili babalekise abayizinkulungwane ezilitshumi?
Ngoba idwala labo kalinjengeDwala lethu.
Ngoba ivini labo livela evinini leSodoma, lemasimini eGomora.
Iwayini labo liyibuhlungu bemigobho.
Lokho kakubekiwe kimi yini, kunanyekiwe emagugwini ami?
Ngeyami impindiselo lokubuyisela, ngesikhathi sokutshelela konyawo lwabo.
Ngoba izabahlulela abantu bayo.
Khona izakuthi: Bangaphi onkulunkulu babo, idwala ababephephela kulo,
abadla amafutha emihlatshelo yabo, banatha iwayini lomnikelo wabo wokuthululwa? Kabavuke, balisize, babe yisivikelo senu.
Bonani khathesi ukuthi mina, nginguye, njalo kakho unkulunkulu olami.
Ngoba ngiphakamisela isandla sami emazulwini, ngithi: Ngiyaphila kuze kube phakade,
nxa ngilola inkemba yami ephazimayo, lesandla sami sibambelela ekwahluleleni, ngizabuyisela impindiselo ezitheni zami, ngibavuze abangizondayo.
Ngizadakisa imitshoko yami ngegazi, lenkemba yami izakudla inyama, ngegazi labagwaziweyo labathunjiweyo.
Thokozani zizwe, bantu bayo.
UMozisi wasesiza, wakhuluma wonke amazwi alingoma endlebeni zabantu, yena loHoseya indodana kaNuni.
UMozisi eseqedile ukukhuluma wonke lamazwi kuIsrayeli wonke,
wathi kubo: Bekani inhliziyo yenu kuwo wonke amazwi engiwafakaza phakathi kwenu lamuhla, ukuthi libalaye abantwana benu bagcine ukuwenza wonke amazwi alumlayo.
Ngoba kakusiyo into eyize kini, ngoba kuyimpilo yenu; ngalinto lizakwelula izinsuku elizweni elichapha iJodani ukuya kulo ukudla ilifa lalo.
yasikhuluma kuMozisi ngalona lolosuku isithi:
Yenyukela kule intaba yeAbarimi, intaba yeNebo, eselizweni lakoMowabi emaqondana leJeriko, ubone ilizwe leKhanani engilinika abantwana bakoIsrayeli ukuba yilifa,
ufele entabeni owenyukela kuyo, ubuthelwe ebantwini bakini.
Ngenxa yokuthi laphambana lami phakathi kwabantwana bakoIsrayeli emanzini eMeriba-Kadeshi enkangala yeZini; ngoba kalingingcwelisanga phakathi kwabantwana bakoIsrayeli.
Ngoba unganeno uzalibona ilizwe, kodwa kawuyikungena khona, elizweni engilinika abantwana bakoIsrayeli.
Lalesi yisibusiso.
Wasesithi: yavela eSinayi, yenyukela kubo ivela eSeyiri,.
Yebo, yathanda abantu.
UMozisi wasilaya umlayo.
Yaba yinkosi, lapho inhloko zabantu zibuthene, ndawonye lezizwe zakoIsrayeli.
URubeni kaphile, angafi.
Lalokhu ngokukaJuda, wasesithi: Zwana, N, ilizwi likaJuda, umlethe kubantu bakhe, izandla zakhe kazimlwele, njalo kawube ngumsizi ezitheni zakhe.
LakuLevi wathi: IThumimi yakho leUrimi yakho;
eyathi kuyise lakunina: Kangimbonanga.
Bazamfundisa uJakobe izahlulelo zakho, loIsrayeli umlayo wakho.
Busisa, N, amandla akhe, wemukele umsebenzi wezandla zakhe; tshaya inkalo zalabo abamvukelayo lezabamzondayo, ukuze bangasukumi.
KuBhenjamini wathi: Othandwayo weN uzahlala evikelekile ngakiyo; izamsibekela usuku lonke, uzahlala phakathi kwamahlombe ayo.
LakuJosefa wathi: Ilizwe lakhe kalibusiswe yiN, ngokuhlekazi kwamazulu, langokujula okulele ngaphansi,
langokuhlekazi kwezithelo zelanga, langokuhlekazi kwezinto ezivezwa zinyanga,
langekhethelo lentaba ezindala, langokuhlekazi kwamaqaqa aphakade,
langokuhlekazi komhlaba lokugcwala kwawo.
Ulobukhosi bezibulo benkunzi yakhe.
LakuZebuluni wathi: Thokoza, Zebuluni, ekuphumeni kwakho, lawe Isakari, emathenteni akho.
Bazabizela izizwe entabeni.
LakuGadi wathi: Kabusiswe owandisa uGadi. Uhlala njengesilwane, uklebhula ingalo, yebo inkanda.
Wazinakekela ngekhethelo.
LakuDani wathi: UDani ngumdlwane wesilwane.
LakuNafithali wathi: Nafithali, eneliswa ngomusa, ugcwele isibusiso seN KOSI.
LakuAsheri wathi: UAsheri kabusiswe ngabantwana, abe ngowemukelekayo kubafowabo.
Insimbi lethusi kuzakubayizicathulo zakho, lanjengensuku zakho azakuba njaloamandla akho.
Kakho onjengoNkulunkulu.
UNkulunkulu waphakade uyisiphephelo, langaphansi kulengalo ezingelakuphela. Uxotsha isitha phambi kwakho, athi: Bhubhisa.
Ngakho uIsrayeli uzahlala evikelekile.
Ubusisiwe wena, Israyeli.
UMozisi wasesenyuka esuka emagcekeni akoMowabi, esiya entabeni yeNebo, engqongeni yePisiga, emaqondana leJeriko,
layo yonke iNafithali, lelizwe lakoEfrayimi, leManase, lelizwe lonke lakoJuda, kwaze kwaba selwandle lokucina,
leningizimu, legceke lesigodi seJeriko.
yasisithi kuye: Leli yilizwe engalifungela uAbrahama, uIsaka, loJakobe ngisithi: Ngizalinika inzalo yakho.
UMozisi inceku yeN wasefela khona elizweni lakoMowabi njengokomlayo weN.
Yasimngcwaba esigodini elizweni lakoMowabi maqondana leBeti-Peyori.
Njalo uMozisi wayeleminyaka elikhulu lamatshumi amabili ekufeni kwakhe.
Abantwana bakoIsrayeli basebemlilela uMozisi emagcekeni akoMowabi insuku ezingamatshumi amathathu; zaphela-ke insuku zokukhala zokumlilela uMozisi.
Njalo uJoshuwa indodana kaNuni wayegcwele umoya wokuhlakanipha.
Kakusavelanga-ke umprofethi koIsrayeli onjengoMozisi,
ngazo zonke izibonakaliso lezimangaliso eyamthuma ukuthi azenze elizweni leGibhithe, kuFaro lakuzo zonke inceku zakhe lelizweni lakhe lonke,
langaso sonke lesosandla esilamandla uMozisi akwenzayo phambi kwamehlo kaIsrayeli wonke.
Kwasekusithi emva kokufa kukaMozisi inceku yeN, yakhuluma kuJoshuwa indodana kaNuni, inceku kaMozisi, isithi:
UMozisi inceku yami usefile; ngakho-ke sukuma uchaphe le iJodani, wena labo bonke lababantu, liye elizweni engilinika bona, ebantwaneni bakoIsrayeli.
Yonke indawo lapho ingaphansi yonyawo lwenu ezanyathela khona ngilinike yona.
Kusukela enkangala, ilizwe lonke lamaHethi, njalo kufike elwandle olukhulu lapho okutshona khona ilanga, kuzakuba ngumngcele wenu.
Kakulamuntu ozakuma phambi kwakho zonke izinsuku zempilo yakho.
Qina, ume isibindi, ngoba wena uzakwenza lababantu badle ilifa lelizwe engalifungela oyise ukubanika lona.
Kuphela qina, ube lesibindi esikhulu.

Ugwalo lwalumlayo lungasuki emlonyeni wakho, kodwa uzindle kuwo emini lebusuku, ukuze uqaphele ukwenza njengakho konke okubhaliweyo kulo, ngoba khona uzakwenza indlela yakho iphumelele, ubusuphumelela.
Kangikulayanga yini? Qina, ume isibindi.
UJoshuwa waselaya izinduna zabantu, esithi:

Dabulani phakathi kwenkamba lilaye abantu lithi: Zilungiseleni umphako, ngoba kusesezinsuku ezintathu lizachapha le iJodani, ukuze lingene lidle ilifa lelizwe uNkulunkulu wenu elinika lona ukuthi lidle ilifa lalo.
UJoshuwa wasekhuluma kwabakoRubeni labakoGadi lengxenye yesizwe sakoManase esithi:
Khumbulani ilizwi uMozisi inceku yeN alilaya ngalo esithi: uNkulunkulu wenu iyaliphumuza, ilinika lelilizwe.
Omkenu, abantwanyana benu, lezifuyo zenu kuzahlala elizweni uMozisi alinika lona nganeno kweJodani; kodwa lina lizachapha lihlomile phambi kwabafowenu, wonke amaqhawe alamandla, libasize,
ize iphumuze abafowenu njengani, labo njalo badle ilifa lelizwe uNkulunkulu wenu ebanika lona.
Basebemphendula uJoshuwa besithi: Konke osilaya khona sizakwenza, laloba ngaphi lapho ozasithuma khona sizahamba.
Njengakho konke esamlalela uMozisi ngakho, ngokunjalo sizakulalela. Kuphela uNkulunkulu wakho ibe lawe njengoba yayiloMozisi.
Wonke umuntu ozavukela umlomo wakho, angalaleli amazwi akho, kukho konke omlaya khona, uzabulawa.
UJoshuwa indodana kaNuni wasethuma eseShithimi amadoda amabili aba zinhloli ensitha, esithi: Hambani libone ilizwe, leJeriko, alala khona.
Kwatshelwa inkosi yeJeriko kwathiwa: Khangela, kufike lapha ebusuku amadoda abantwana bakoIsrayeli ukuhlola ilizwe.
Inkosi yeJeriko yasithumela kuRahabi isithi: Khupha lawo amadoda afikele kuwe, angena endlini yakho, ngoba azehlola ilizwe lonke.
Kodwa owesifazana wayethethe lawomadoda amabili, wawafihla, wakhuluma kanje: Afikile kimi amadoda, kodwa bengingazi lapha avela khona.
Kwasekusithi sekuzavalwa isango lapho sekumnyama amadoda aphuma. Kangikwazi lapho amadoda aye khona; axhumeni ngokuphangisa liwalandele, ngoba lizawafica.
Kodwa yena wayewenyusele ephahleni, wawafihla phakathi kwamahlanga efilakisi ayechayelwe yena ephahleni.
Amadoda asewaxhuma ngendlela yeJodani aze afika emazibukweni; bavala amasango emva kokuphuma kwabawaxhumayo bewalandela.
Kwathi wona engakalali, yena wenyukela kuwo ephahleni
wasesithi emadodeni: Ngiyazi ukuthi ilinikile ilizwe, lokuthi ukwesabeka kwenu kuwele phezu kwethu, lokuthi bonke abakhileyo elizweni bayancibilika ngenxa yobukhona benu.
Ngoba sizwile ukuthi yomisa amanzi oLwandle oluBomvu phambi kwenu ekuphumeni kwenu eGibhithe.
Sathi sikuzwa lokho.
Ngakho-ke ake lifunge kimi ngeN, ngoba ngilenzele umusa, lani-ke lizayenzela umusa indlu kababa,
ukuthi ligcine bephila ubaba lomama, labanewethu labodadewethu, lakho konke abalakho, likhulule impilo yethu ekufeni.
Lamadoda athi kuye: Umphefumulo wethu ufe esikhundleni senu, uba ungavezi obala loludaba lwethu. Njalo kuzakuthi lapho isisinikile ilizwe, sizakwenzela umusa leqiniso.
Wasewehlisa ngentambo ewindini, ngoba indlu yakhe yayisemdulini womuzi, wayehlala phezu komduli.
Wasesithi kuwo: Yanini entabeni, hlezi abaxhumi bahlangane lani, licatshe khona insuku ezintathu, baze babuye abaxhumi, lemva kwalokho lihambe ngendlela yenu.
Amadoda asesithi kuye: Thina sizakhululeka esifungweni sakho lesi osifungise sona.
Khangela, ekufikeni kwethu elizweni uzabophela lintambo yomnxeba.

Kuzakuthi-ke, loba ngubani ophumela phandle kweminyango yendlu yakho, igazi lakhe lizakuba phezu kwekhanda lakhe, thina-ke sizakuba singelacala. Njalo loba ngubani ozakuba lawe endlini, igazi lakhe lizakuba sekhanda lethu, uba isandla sisiba phezu kwakhe.
Kodwa uba uluveza obala loludaba lwethu, sizakhululeka esifungweni sakho osifungise sona.
Wasesithi: Njengamazwi enu, kakube njalo. Wasewayekela ehamba, ahamba, wabophela intambo ebomvu ewindini.
Asehamba afika entabeni, ahlala khona insuku ezintathu, baze babuya abaxhumi, ngoba abaxhumi bawadinga endleleni yonke, kodwa kabawatholanga.
Ngakho amadoda womabili aphenduka asesehla entabeni, achapha, afika kuJoshuwa indodana kaNuni.
Athi kuJoshuwa: Isibili ilinikele esandleni sethu ilizwe lonke, futhi-ke bonke abakhileyo belizwe bancibilikile ngenxa yobukhona bethu.
UJoshuwa wasevuka ekuseni kakhulu, basuka eShithimi, bafika eJodani, yena labo bonke abantwana bakoIsrayeli; basebelala khona bengakachaphi.
Kwasekusithi ekupheleni kwensuku ezintathu
zalaya abantu zisithi: Nxa libona umtshokotsho wesivumelwano seN uNkulunkulu wenu, labapristi, amaLevi, bewuthwele, lina-ke lisuke endaweni yenu liwulandele.

Kodwa kuzakuba khona ibanga phakathi kwenu lawo, phose ingalo eziyizinkulungwane ezimbili ngesilinganiso; lingasondeli kuwo; ukuze lazi indlela elizahamba ngayo, ngoba kalidlulanga ngalindlela mandulo.
UJoshuwa wasesithi ebantwini: Zingcweliseni, ngoba kusasa izakwenza izimangaliso phakathi kwenu.
UJoshuwa wasekhuluma kubapristi esithi: Phakamisani umtshokotsho wesivumelwano, ledlule phambi kwabantu. Basebewuphakamisa umtshokotsho wesivumelwano, bahamba phambi kwabantu.
yasisithi kuJoshuwa: Lamuhla ngizaqala ukukukhulisa emehlweni kaIsrayeli wonke.
Wena-ke uzalaya abapristi abathwele umtshokotsho wesivumelwano uthi: Nxa selifikile ekhunjini lwamanzi eJodani.
UJoshuwa wasesithi ebantwaneni bakoIsrayeli: Sondelani lapha, lizwe amazwi eN uNkulunkulu wenu.
UJoshuwa wasesithi: Ngalokhu lizakwazi ukuthi uNkulunkulu ophilayo uphakathi kwenu.
Khangelani, umtshokotsho wesivumelwano seNkosi yomhlaba wonke uzachapha phambi kwenu eJodani.
Ngakho-ke zithatheleni amadoda alitshumi lambili ezizweni zakoIsrayeli.
Kuzakuthi-ke lapho ingaphansi yenyawo zabapristi abathwele umtshokotsho weN KOSI.
Kwasekusithi abantu besuka emathenteni abo ukuchapha iJodani, abapristi bathwala umtshokotsho wesivumelwano phambi kwabantu.
Lalapho abathwele umtshokotsho befika eJodani, lenyawo zabapristi abathwele umtshokotsho zigxanyuzwa ephethelweni lamanzi),
amanzi ehlayo evela phezulu ema, aphakama aba yinqwaba eyodwa, khatshana kakhulu lomuzi iAdamu, oseceleni kweZarethani.

Labapristi abathwele umtshokotsho wesivumelwano seN bema emhlabathini owomileyo phakathi kweJodani beqinile, loIsrayeli wonke wachapha emhlabathini owomileyo, isizwe sonke saze saqeda ukuchapha iJodani.
Kwasekusithi lapho isizwe sonke sesiqede ukuchapha iJodani, yakhuluma kuJoshuwa isithi:
Zithathele amadoda alitshumi lambili ebantwini, indoda ibenye kuleso lalesosizwe,
uwalaye uthi: Zithatheleni okuvela lapha phakathi kweJodani kuleyondawo, lapho obekumi khona inyawo zabapristi ziqinile.
UJoshuwa wasebiza amadoda alitshumi lambili ayewalungisile ebantwaneni bakoIsrayeli, indoda yabanye kuleso lalesosizwe.

UJoshuwa wasesithi kuwo: Dlulani phambi komtshokotsho weN uNkulunkulu wenu, lingene phakathi kweJodani, lizithathele, lowo lalowo, ilitshe elilodwa, ale tshate ehlombe, njengokwenani lezizwe zabantwana bakoIsrayeli,
ukuze lokhu kube yisiboniso phakathi kwenu. Nxa abantwana benu bebuza kusasa besithi: Ayini lamatshe kini?
Lizabatshela-ke: Ngoba amanzi eJodani aqunywa phambi komtshotsho wesivumelwano seN. Lapho uchapha iJodani, amanzi eJodani aqunywa.

Labantwana bakoIsrayeli benza njalo njengokulaya kukaJoshuwa, bathatha amatshe alitshumi lambili phakathi kweJodani, njengokutsho kweN kuJoshuwa, ngokwenani lezizwe zabantwana bakoIsrayeli; bawathwala bachapha lawo, baya endaweni lapho abalala khona, bawabeka khona.
UJoshuwa wasemisa amatshe alitshumi lambili phakathi kweJodani endaweni lapho inyawo zabapristi ababethwele umtshokotsho wesivumelwano ezazimi khona. Njalo asekhona lapho kuze kube lamuhla.

Ngoba abapristi ababethwele umtshokotsho bema phakathi kweJodani kwaze kwaphela yonke into eyayimlaye yona uJoshuwa ukuyitshela abantu, njengakho konke uMozisi ayekulaye uJoshuwa. Labantu baphangisa bachapha.
Kwasekusithi bonke abantu sebeqedile ukuchapha, umtshokotsho weN wachapha, labapristi phambi kwabantu.
Njalo abantwana bakoRubeni labantwana bakoGadi lengxenye yesizwe sakoManase bachapha behlomile phambi kwabantwana bakoIsrayeli.
Phose izinkulungwane ezingamatshumi amane behlomele impi, bachapha phambi kweN ukuya empini, emagcekeni eJeriko.
Ngalolosuku yamkhulisa uJoshuwa emehlweni kaIsrayeli wonke, njalo bamesaba njengalokhu babemesaba uMozisi insuku zonke zempilo yakhe.
yasikhuluma kuJoshuwa isithi:
Laya abapristi abathwala umtshokotsho wobufakazi ukuthi bakhuphuke eJodani.
UJoshuwa wasebalaya abapristi esithi: Khuphukani eJodani.

Kwasekusithi lapho abapristi ababethwele umtshokotsho wesivumelwano seN sebekhuphukile phakathi kweJodani, l engaphansi yenyawo zabapristi isiphakanyiselwe emhlabathini owomileyo, amanzi eJodani abuyela endaweni yawo, ahamba njengamandulo aphuphuma enkunjini zonke zayo.
Labantu bakhuphuka besuka eJodani ngolwetshumi lwenyanga yokuqala, bamisa inkamba eGiligali ephethelweni lempumalanga yeJeriko.
Lalawomatshe alitshumi lambili abawathatha eJodani uJoshuwa wawamisa eGiligali.
Wakhuluma kubantwana bakoIsrayeli esithi: Nxa abantwana benu bebuza kusasa kuboyise besithi: Ayini lamatshe?
Lizabazisa-ke abantwana benu lisithi: UIsrayeli wayichapha le iJodani emhlabathini owomileyo.
Ngoba uNkulunkulu wenu yenza amanzi eJodani atsha phambi kwenu laze lachapha, njengokwenza kweN uNkulunkulu wenu kuLwandle oluBomvu eyalomisa phambi kwethu saze sachapha,
ukuze zonke izizwe zomhlaba zazi isandla seN KOSI.
Kwasekusithi lapho wonke amakhosi amaAmori ayenganeno kweJodani ngentshonalanga lawo wonke amakhosi amaKhanani ayengaselwandle.
Ngalesosikhathi yathi kuJoshuwa: Zenzele ingqamu zensengetshe, ubasoke futhi abantwana bakoIsrayeli okwesibili.
UJoshuwa wasezenzela ingqamu zensengetshe, wabasoka abantwana bakoIsrayeli oqaqeni lwamajwabu.
Njalo yilesisizatho uJoshuwa a ba sokela sona; bonke abantu abaphuma eGibhithe, abesilisa, amadoda wonke empi, afela enkangala endleleni esephumile eGibhithe.
Ngoba bonke abantu abaphumayo babesokiwe, kodwa bonke abantu ababezalelwe enkangala endleleni sebephumile eGibhithe babengabasokanga.
Ngoba abantwana bakoIsrayeli bahamba enkangala iminyaka engamatshumi amane saze sabhubha isizwe sonke samadoda empi ayephume eGibhithe, ngoba engalilalelanga ilizwi leN KOSI.
Labantwana bawo yabavusa esikhundleni sawo; bona uJoshuwa wabasoka, ngoba babengasokwanga, ngoba babengabasokanga endleleni.
Kwasekusithi sebeqedile ukusoka isizwe sonke, bahlala endaweni yabo enkambeni baze baphola.
yasisithi kuJoshuwa: Lamuhla ngigiqile ngasusa kini ihlazo leGibhithe.
Abantwana bakoIsrayeli basebemisa inkamba eGiligali, bagcina iphasika ngosuku lwetshumi lane lwenyanga kusihlwa emagcekeni eJeriko.
Basebesidla izithelo zelizwe, ngekuseni eyalandela iphasika, izinkwa ezingelamvubelo lamabele akhanzingiweyo, ngalona lolosuku.
Imana yacina ngelanga elalandela abadla ngalo izithelo zelizwe; labantwana bakoIsrayeli kabasabanga lemana, kodwa badla izithelo zelizwe leKhanani ngalowomnyaka.
Kwasekusithi uJoshuwa eseJeriko, waphakamisa amehlo akhe wabona, khangela-ke, indoda imi maqondana laye. UJoshuwa wasesiya kuyo wathi kuyo: Ungowakithi yini, kumbe ungowezitha zethu?
Wasesithi: Hatshi; kodwa ngiyinduna yebutho leN; sengibuyile. UJoshuwa wasesithi mbo ngobuso bakhe emhlabathini, wakhonza esithi kuye: INkosi yami ithini encekwini yayo?
Induna yebutho leN yasisithi kuJoshuwa: Khulula inyathela lakho enyaweni lwakho, ngoba indawo omi kiyo ingcwele. UJoshuwa wasesenza njalo.
IJeriko yayivaliwe-ke ngci ngenxa yabantwana bakoIsrayeli. Kakho owaphumayo, njalo kakho owangenayo.
yasisithi kuJoshuwa: Bona, nginikele esandleni sakho iJeriko lenkosi yayo lamaqhawe.
Lizawubhoda-ke umuzi, wonke amadoda empi, awubhode umuzi kanye. Uzakwenza njalo insuku eziyisithupha.
Labapristi abayisikhombisa bazathwala impondo.

Kuzakuthi-ke lapho bekhalisa uphondo lwenqama isikhathi eside, nxa lisizwa ukukhala kophondo, abantu bonke bazamemeza ngokuklabalala okukhulu, lomduli womuzi uzadilikela phansi; labantu bazakwenyuka, ngulowo lalowo maqondana laye.
Ngakho uJoshuwa indodana kaNuni wabiza abapristi wathi kibo: Thwalani umtshokotsho wesivumelwano, labapristi abayisikhombisa bathwale impondo zezinqama eziyisikhombisa phambi komtshokotsho weN.
Wasesithi ebantwini: Dlulani liwuzingelezele umuzi, lohlomileyo kadlule phambi komtshokotsho weN.
Kwasekusithi uJoshuwa esekhulume ebantwini, abapristi abayisikhombisa bethwele impondo eziyisikhombisa zenqama bakhokhela phambi kweN, bavuthela impondo, lomtshokotsho wesivumelwano seN wabalandela.
Abahlomileyo basebehamba phambi kwabapristi ababevuthela izimpondo, lesigaba sasemuva salandela umtshokotsho, bahamba bevuthela izimpondo.
UJoshuwa wayelaye-ke abantu esithi: Lingamemezi, loba lizwakalise ilizwi lenu; kungaphumi lizwi emlonyeni wenu kuze kube lusuku engizalitshela ngalo ukuthi limemeze; beselimemeza.
Ngakho umtshokotsho weN wawubhoda umuzi, uzingelezela kanye; basebesiza enkambeni, balala enkambeni ebusuku.
UJoshuwa wasevuka ekuseni kakhulu, labapristi bathwala umtshokotsho weN.

Labapristi abayisikhombisa bephethe impondo zezinqama eziyisikhombisa phambi komtshokotsho weN baqhubeka behamba, bevuthela izimpondo, labahlomileyo bahamba phambi kwabo, lesigaba sasemuva salandela umtshokotsho weN, bahamba bevuthela izimpondo.
Langosuku lwesibili bawuzingelezela umuzi kanye, babuyela enkambeni. Benza njalo insuku eziyisithupha.
Kwasekusithi ngosuku lwesikhombisa bavuka ngovivi emadabukakusa, bawubhoda umuzi kasikhombisa ngendlela efananayo. Kuphela ngalolosuku bawubhoda umuzi kasikhombisa.
Kwasekusithi ngesikhathi sesikhombisa, abapristi bavuthela impondo, uJoshuwa wasesithi ebantwini: Memezani, ngoba ilinikile umuzi.
Kodwa umuzi wona lakho konke okukuwo kuzakwehlukaniselwa eNni; nguRahabi iwule kuphela ozaphila, yena labo bonke alabo endlini yakhe, ngoba wafihla izithunywa esazithumayo.
Kodwa lina sibili zigcineni kokuqalekisiweyo, hlezi lizenze abaqalekisiweyo nxa lithatha kokuqalekisiweyo, lenze inkamba yakoIsrayeli ibe yinto eqalekisiweyo.
Kodwa sonke isiliva legolide, lezitsha zethusi lezensimbi, kungcwele eNni. Kuzakuza endlini yokuligugu kweN.

Abantu basebememeza, kwavuthelwa izimpondo. Kwasekusithi abantu besizwa ukukhala kwempondo, abantu bamemeza ngokuklabalala okukhulu, umduli wadilikela phansi, labantu benyukela emzini, ngulowo lalowo maqondana laye, bawuthumba umuzi.
Batshabalalisa konke okusemzini, kusukela kowesilisa kusiya kowesifazana, kusukela komutsha kusiya komdala, kuze kube senkabini lemvini lobabhemi, ngobukhali benkemba.
Lakulawomadoda amabili ayeyehlola ilizwe uJoshuwa wathi: Ngenani endlini yowesifazana oliwule, likhuphe kuyo owesifazana lakho konke alakho, njengokufunga kwenu kuye.
Lamajaha izinhloli angena akhupha uRahabi loyise lonina labanewabo lakho konke ayelakho; akhupha zonke izihlobo zakhe, azibeka ngaphandle kwenkamba yakoIsrayeli.
Basebewutshisa umuzi ngomlilo lakho konke okwakukiwo; kuphela isiliva legolide lezitsha zethusi lezensimbi bakufaka kokuligugu kwendlu yeN.
Ngakho uRahabi iwule, lendlu kayise, labo bonke ayelabo, uJoshuwa wabayekela bephila; wahlala phakathi koIsrayeli kuze kube lamuhla, ngoba wafihla izithunywa uJoshuwa ayezithume ukuhlola iJeriko.
UJoshuwa wa ba fungisa esithi.
Ngokunjalo yaba loJoshuwa.

Kodwa abantwana bakoIsrayeli baphambuka ngesiphambeko ngokuqalekisiweyo. Ngoba uAkani indodana kaKarmi indodana kaZabidi indodana kaZera owesizwe sakoJuda wathatha kokuqalekisiweyo; ulaka lweN lwaselubavuthela abantwana bakoIsrayeli.
UJoshuwa wasethuma abantu besuka eJeriko besiya eAyi eliseduze leBeti-Aveni.

Basebebuyela kuJoshuwa bathi kuye: Kakungenyuki bonke abantu; kakwenyuke phose amadoda azinkulungwane ezimbili loba phose amadoda azinkulungwane ezintathu ukutshaya iAyi. Ungadinisi bonke abantu ngo kuya khona, ngoba balutshwana.
Kwasekusenyukela khona abavela ebantwini amadoda aphosa abe zinkulungwane ezintathu; abaleka phambi kwamadoda eAyi.
Lamadoda eAyi atshaya phose amadoda angamatshumi amathathu lesithupha, axotshana lawo phambi kwesango aze afika eShebarimi, awatshayela ekwehleni. Ngakho inhliziyo yabantu yancibilika yaba ngamanzi.
UJoshuwa wasedabula izigqoko zakhe, wathi mbo ngobuso emhlabathini phambi komtshokotsho weN kwaze kwahlwa, yena labadala bakoIsrayeli.
UJoshuwa wasesithi: Maye Nkosi Jehova! Ubachaphiseleni lokubachaphisa lababantu iJodani ukusinikela esandleni samaAmori ukusibhubhisa? Kungathi ngabe seneliswa sahlala ngaphetsheya kweJodani!
O Nkosi, ngizakuthini, emva kokuthi uIsrayeli esephendule intamo ezitheni zakhe?
Ngoba amaKhanani labo bonke abakhileyo elizweni bazakuzwa, basihanqe, baliqume ibizo lethu lisuke emhlabeni?
yasisithi kuJoshuwa: Sukuma wena, uweleni kanje ngobuso bakho?
UIsrayeli wonile; njalo baseqile isivumelwano sami engabalaya sona.
Ngalokho abantwana bakoIsrayeli babengelakuma phambi kwezitha zabo.
Sukuma, ngcwelisa abantu, uthi: Zingcweliseleleni ikusasa.
Ngakho ekuseni lizasondezwa ngezizwe zenu; kuzakuthi-ke isizwe ezasibamba sizasondela ngensendo, losendo ezalubamba luzasondela ngezindlu, lendlu ezayibamba izasondela ngabantu.
Kuzakuthi-ke lowo ozabanjwa lokuqalekisiweyo uzatshiswa ngomlilo, yena lakho konke alakho.
UJoshuwa wasevuka ekuseni kakhulu, wenza uIsrayeli wasondela ngezizwe zakhe; lesizwe sakoJuda sabanjwa;
wasesenza usendo lwakoJuda lusondele, wabamba usendo lwakoZera; wenza usendo lwakoZera lusondele ngabantu; uZabidi wasebanjwa;
wasesenza indlu yakhe isondele ngabantu; uAkani.
UJoshuwa wasesithi kuAkani: Ndodana yami, ake unike udumo, uNkulunkulu wakoIsrayeli.
UAkani wasephendula uJoshuwa wathi: Isibili mina ngonile eNni, uNkulunkulu wakoIsrayeli. Ngokunje langokunje ngikwenzile.

Kwathi ngibona phakathi kwempango isembatho seBhabhiloni esihle esisodwa, lamashekeli esiliva angamakhulu amabili, lolimi lwegolide olulodwa osisindo salo singamashekeli angamatshumi amahlanu, ngakuhawukela, ngakuthatha, khangela-ke, kuthukuziwe emhlabathini phakathi kwethente lami, lesiliva singaphansi kwakho.
