UJoshuwa wasethuma izithunywa, zagijima zaya ethenteni, khangela-ke, kwakufihliwe ethenteni lakhe, lesiliva singaphansi kwakho.
Bakukhupha phakathi kwethente, bakuletha kuJoshuwa lebantwaneni bonke bakoIsrayeli, bakuthululela phambi kweN.

UJoshuwa loIsrayeli wonke ekanye laye basebemthatha uAkani indodana kaZera, lesiliva, lesembatho, lolimi lwegolide, lamadodana akhe, lamadodakazi akhe, lenkabi zakhe, labobabhemi bakhe, lezimvu zakhe, lethente lakhe, lakho konke ayelakho, bakwenyusela esihotsheni seAkori.
UJoshuwa wasesithi: Usihlupheleni? izakuhlupha lamuhla.
Bamisa phezu kwakhe inqwaba enkulu yamatshe kuze kube lamuhla.
yasisithi kuJoshuwa: Ungesabi, ungatshaywa luvalo; thatha kanye lawe bonke abantu bempi, usukume wenyukele eAyi.
Uzakwenza-ke eAyi lenkosini yayo njengokwenza kwakho eJeriko lenkosini yayo.
UJoshuwa wasesukuma labo bonke abantu bempi ukwenyukela eAyi; uJoshuwa wasekhetha amaqhawe alamandla ayizinkulungwane ezingamatshumi amathathu, wawathuma ebusuku.
Wawalaya esithi: Bonani, lizawucathamela umuzi ngemva komuzi. Lingabi khatshana kakhulu lomuzi, kodwa lungani lonke.
Mina-ke labo bonke abantu abalami sizasondela emzini. Kuzakuthi-ke lapho bephuma ukumelana lathi njengakuqala sibaleke phambi kwabo.
Njalo bazaphuma emva kwethu size sibadonse basuke emzini. Ngoba bazakuthi: Bayabaleka phambi kwethu njengakuqala. Ngakho sizabaleka phambi kwabo.
Lina-ke lizasukuma ekucathameni, liwuthumbe umuzi; ngoba uNkulunkulu wenu izawunikela esandleni senu.
Kuzakuthi-ke seliwuthumbile umuzi, liwutshise umuzi ngomlilo, lizakwenza njengokwelizwi leN. Bonani, ngililayile.
UJoshuwa wasebathuma, baya ekucathameni, bahlala phakathi kweBhetheli leAyi, entshonalanga kweAyi, kodwa uJoshuwa walala phakathi kwabantu ngalobobusuku.
UJoshuwa wasevuka ekuseni kakhulu, wabala abantu, wenyuka, yena labadala bakoIsrayeli, phambi kwabantu, waya eAyi.
Labo bonke abantu bempi ababelaye benyuka, basondela, beza maqondana lomuzi, bamisa inkamba enyakatho kweAyi. Njalo kwakulesihotsha phakathi kwabo leAyi.
Wasethatha phose amadoda azinkulungwane ezinhlanu, wawacathamisa phakathi kweBhetheli leAyi entshonalanga komuzi.
Lapho sebemisa abantu, lonke ibutho elalisenyakatho komuzi, labacathami ngasentshonalanga komuzi, uJoshuwa waya phakathi kwesihotsha ngalobobusuku.

Kwasekusithi inkosi yeAyi i ku bona, aphangisa avuka ngovivi; lamadoda omuzi aphuma impi emelane loIsrayeli, yona labantu bayo bonke, ngesikhathi esimisiweyo, phambi kwamagceke; kodwa yona yayingazi ukuthi kukhona abayicathameleyo emva komuzi.
UJoshuwa loIsrayeli basebetshaywa phambi kwawo, babaleka ngendlela yenkangala.
Kwasekubizwa bonke abantu ababesemzini ukuxotshana labo. Nxa bexotshana loJoshuwa badonswa basuka emzini.
Njalo kakusalanga muntu eAyi kumbe eBhetheli, abangaphumanga ukulandela uIsrayeli; bawutshiya umuzi ukhamisile, baxotshana loIsrayeli.
yasisithi kuJoshuwa: Yelulela umkhonto osesandleni sakho eAyi, ngoba ngizayinikela esandleni sakho. UJoshuwa waseselulela umkhonto osesandleni sakhe emzini.
Abacathemeyo basebesukuma masinyane endaweni yabo; bagijima esanda ukwelula isandla sakhe, bangena emzini, bawuthumba, baphangisa, bawutshisa umuzi ngomlilo.

Kwathi lapho amadoda eAyi enyemukula abona, khangela-ke, intuthu yomuzi yenyukela emazulwini, njalo ayengelandawo yokubalekela ngapha langapha, ngoba abantu ababebalekele enkangala baphendukela aba ba xotshayo.
Kwathi uJoshuwa loIsrayeli wonke bebona ukuthi abacathemeyo sebewuthumbile umuzi lokuthi intuthu yomuzi yenyuka, baphenduka batshaya amadoda eAyi.
Lalaba baphuma emzini ukumelana lawo, aze aba phakathi kukaIsrayeli, abanye ngapha labanye ngale; basebewatshaya, kakwaze kwasala muntu kuwo, owasilayo kumbe owaphunyukayo.
Kodwa inkosi yeAyi bayibamba iphila, bayisondeza kuJoshuwa.

Kwasekusithi lapho uIsrayeli eseqedile ukubulala bonke abahlali beAyi egangeni, enkangala lapho ababebaxotshele khona, babewile bonke ngobukhali benkemba, baze baqedwa, uIsrayeli wonke wabuyela eAyi, bayitshaya ngobukhali benkemba.
Kwasekusithi, bonke abawayo mhlalokho, kusukela kwabesilisa kusiya kwabesifazana, babeyizinkulungwane ezilitshumi lambili, bonke abantu beAyi.
Njalo uJoshuwa kasifinyezanga isandla sakhe ayelule umkhonto ngaso baze batshabalalisa bonke abahlali beAyi.
Kuphela izifuyo lempango yalowomuzi uIsrayeli waziphangela, njengelizwi leN eyalilaya uJoshuwa.
UJoshuwa waseyitshisa iAyi, wayimisa yaba yinqwaba phakade, unxiwa, kuze kube lamuhla.
Lenkosi yeAyi wayiphanyeka esihlahleni kwaze kwaba yisikhathi santambama.
Khona uJoshuwa wayakhela uNkulunkulu kaIsrayeli ilathi entabeni yeEbhali.
Njengokulaya kukaMozisi inceku yeN kubantwana bakoIsrayeli, njengalokhu ubhalwe egwalweni lomlayo kaMozisi, ilathi lamatshe apheleleyo, okungazange kusetshenziswe nsimbi phezu kwalo.
Wasebhala lapho ematsheni impinda yomlayo kaMozisi, ayibhala phambi kwabantwana bakoIsrayeli.
UIsrayeli wonke-ke, labadala babo, lezinduna, labahluleli babo, bema ngapha langapha komtshokotsho, beqondene labapristi, amaLevi.
Langemva kwalokho wamemezela wonke amazwi omlayo, njengakho konke okubhaliweyo egwalweni lomlayo.
Akwabakho ilizwi kukho konke uMozisi akulayayo uJoshuwa angalimemezelanga phambi kwebandla lonke lakoIsrayeli labesifazana labantwanyana.
Kwasekusithi lapho wonke amakhosi ayenganeno kweJodani, entabeni, lesihotsheni,
abuthana ndawonye ukulwa loJoshuwa loIsrayeli nganhliziyonye.
Kwathi abahlali beGibeyoni,
labo basebesenza ngobuqili; bahamba bazenza izithunywa, bathwalisa obabhemi babo amasaka agugileyo lemigodla yewayini egugileyo ledabukileyo lebekelweyo,
lamanyathela agugileyo labekelweyo enyaweni zabo.
Basebesiya kuJoshuwa enkambeni eGiligali, bathi kuye lemadodeni akoIsrayeli: Sivela elizweni elikhatshana, ngakho-ke yenzani isivumelwano lathi.
Kodwa amadoda akoIsrayeli athi kumaHivi?
Asesithi kuJoshuwa: Sizinceku zakho. UJoshuwa wasesithi kiwo: Lingobani? Njalo livela ngaphi?
Asesithi kuye: Izinceku zakho zivela elizweni elikhatshana kakhulu, ngenxa yebizo leN uNkulunkulu wakho,
lakho konke eyakwenza emakhosini amabili amaAmori ayengaphetsheya kweJodani, uSihoni inkosi yeHeshiboni, loOgi inkosi yeBashani, eyayiseAshitarothi.

Ngakho abadala bethu labo bonke abakhileyo elizweni lakithi bakhuluma kithi besithi: Thathani umphako wendlela esandleni senu, lihambe liyehlangana labo, lithi kibo: Sizinceku zenu; ngakho-ke yenzani isivumelwano lathi.
Lesisinkwa sethu sasithatha sitshisa singumphako wethu ezindlini zethu mhla siphumayo sisiza kini; kodwa khathesi, khangela, sesomile sakhunta.
Lalimigodla yewayini esayigcwalisayo yayimitsha; kodwa khangela, isidabukile. Lalezizigqoko zethu lamanyathela ethu sekugugiswe luhambo olude kakhulu.
Ngakho amadoda athatha kokomphako wabo, engabuzanga umlomo weN.
UJoshuwa wasesenza ukuthula labo, wenza isivumelwano labo sokubayekela baphile, lezinduna zenhlangano zafunga kibo.
Kwasekusithi ekupheleni kwensuku ezintathu emva kokuthi sebenzile isivumelwano labo, bezwa ukuthi bangomakhelwane babo, lokuthi babehlala phakathi kwabo.
Abantwana bakoIsrayeli basebesuka bafika emizini yabo ngosuku lwesithathu. Njalo imizi yabo yayiyiGibeyoni leKefira leBherothi.
Njalo abantwana bakoIsrayeli kababatshayanga ngoba izinduna zebandla zazibafungele ngeN, uNkulunkulu kaIsrayeli; inhlangano yonke yasingungunela izinduna.
Kodwa zonke izinduna zathi enhlanganweni yonke: Thina sifungile kibo ngeN, uNkulunkulu kaIsrayeli, ngakho-ke kasilakubathinta.
Sizakwenza lokhu kibo, sibayekele baphile, ukuze kungabi khona ulaka phezu kwethu.
Lezinduna zathi kubo: Bayekeleni baphile, kodwa kababe ngabagamuli benkuni labakhi bamanzi enhlanganweni yonke.
UJoshuwa wasebabiza, wakhuluma labo esithi: Lisikhohliseleni, lisithi: Sikhatshana kakhulu lani?
Ngakho-ke liqalekisiwe.

Basebephendula uJoshuwa bathi: Ngoba kwatshelwa lokutshelwa ezincekwini zakho ukuthi uNkulunkulu wakho yalaya uMozisi inceku yayo ukulinika ilizwe lonke lokuchitha bonke abakhileyo belizwe phambi kwenu.
Khathesi-ke, khangela, sesisesandleni sakho; yenza njengokulungileyo lanjengokuqondileyo emehlweni akho u ku kwenza kithi.
Ngakho wenza njalo kubo, wabophula esandleni sabantwana bakoIsrayeli, ukuze bangababulali.
UJoshuwa wasebenza ngalolosuku baba ngabagamuli benkuni labakhi bamanzi benhlangano, labelathi leN, kuze kube lamuhla.
Kwasekusithi lapho uAdonizedeki inkosi yeJerusalema esezwile ukuthi uJoshuwa uyithumbile iAyi, wayitshabalalisa, njengalokho akwenza eJeriko lenkosini yayo,
besaba kakhulu, ngoba iGibeyoni yayingumuzi omkhulu njengomunye wemizi yenkosi, langoba yayinkulu kuleAyi, lamadoda ayo wonke engamaqhawe.
Ngakho uAdonizedeki inkosi yeJerusalema yathumela kuHohamu inkosi yeHebroni, esithi:
Yenyukelani kimi lingisize, ukuze siyitshaye iGibeyoni; ngoba yenzile ukuthula loJoshuwa labantwana bakoIsrayeli.

Ngakho amakhosi amahlanu amaAmori, inkosi yeJerusalema, inkosi yeHebroni, inkosi yeJarimuthi, inkosi yeLakishi, inkosi yeEgiloni, ahlangana enyuka, wona lamabutho awo wonke, amisa inkamba maqondana leGibeyoni, alwa layo.

Amadoda eGibeyoni asethumela kuJoshuwa enkambeni yeGiligali esithi: Isandla sakho singatshiyi izinceku zakho; yenyukela kithi masinyane usisindise usisize, ngoba amakhosi wonke amaAmori ahlala ezintabeni asesihlanganyele.
Ngakho uJoshuwa wenyuka esuka eGiligali, yena labo bonke abantu bempi kanye laye, lawo wonke amaqhawe alamandla.
yasisithi kuJoshuwa: Ungabesabi, ngoba ngibanikele esandleni sakho; kakulamuntu wabo ozakuma phambi kwakho.
UJoshuwa wasebajuma, enyuke ubusuku bonke esuka eGiligali.
yabasanganisa phambi kukaIsrayeli, yabatshaya ngokutshaya okukhulu eGibeyoni.
Kwasekusithi besabaleka phambi kukaIsrayeli ekwehleni kweBhethi-Horoni.
Ngalesosikhathi uJoshuwa wakhuluma eNni mhla inikela amaAmori phambi kwabantwana bakoIsrayeli, wathi phambi kwamehlo kaIsrayeli: Langa, mana eGibeyoni.

Lelanga lathi mpo lenyanga yema, abantu baze baziphindisela ezitheni zabo. Lokhu kakubhaliwe yini egwalweni lukaJashari? Ngakho ilanga lema phakathi komkhathi, kalaze laphangisa ukutshona phose okosuku olupheleleyo.
Kaluzanga lube khona usuku olunjalo ngaphambi kwalo loba emva kwalo lapho eyalizwa khona ilizwi lomuntu.
UJoshuwa wasebuyela enkambeni eGiligali loIsrayeli wonke kanye laye.
Kodwa lawomakhosi amahlanu abaleka, acatsha ebhalwini eMakeda.
Kwasekubikwa kuJoshuwa ukuthi: Amakhosi amahlanu atholwe ecatshile ebhalwini eMakeda.
UJoshuwa wasesithi: Giqelani amatshe amakhulu emlonyeni wobhalu, limise amadoda kulo ukuwalinda.
Kodwa lina lingami; xotshanani lezitha zenu, lizitshaye ngemuva kwazo, lingaziyekeli zingene emizini yazo, ngoba uNkulunkulu wenu izinikele esandleni senu.
Kwasekusithi lapho uJoshuwa labantwana bakoIsrayeli sebeqedile ukuzitshaya ngokutshaya okukhulukazi zaze zaqedwa, insali eyasalayo yazo yangena emizini evikelweyo.
Labantu bonke babuyela enkambeni kuJoshuwa eMakeda ngokuthula; kakho owanyikinya ulimi lwakhe emelana labantwana bakoIsrayeli.
UJoshuwa wasesithi: Vulani umlomo wobhalu, likhuphele kimi lawomakhosi amahlanu evela ebhalwini.
Basebesenza njalo, bawakhuphela kuye lawomakhosi amahlanu evela ebhalwini: Inkosi yeJerusalema, inkosi yeHebroni, inkosi yeJarimuthi, inkosi yeLakishi, inkosi yeEgiloni.

Kwasekusithi sebewakhuphele kuJoshuwa lawomakhosi, uJoshuwa wabiza wonke amadoda akoIsrayeli, wathi ezinduneni zamadoda empi ezazihambe laye: Sondelani, libeke inyawo zenu entanyeni zalamakhosi. Zasezisondela, zabeka inyawo zazo entanyeni zawo.
UJoshuwa wasesithi kuzo: Lingesabi lingatshaywa luvalo.
Emva kwalokho uJoshuwa wasewatshaya wawabulala, wawalengisa ezihlahleni ezinhlanu; njalo ayelenga ezihlahleni kwaze kwahlwa.

Kwasekusithi ngesikhathi sokutshona kwelanga uJoshuwa walaya ukuthi bawethule ezihlahleni, bawaphosele ebhalwini ayecatshe khona; basebefaka amatshe amakhulu emlonyeni wobhalu, akhonakuze kube yilona lolusuku.
UJoshuwa wathumba layo iMakeda ngalolosuku, wayitshaya ngobukhali benkemba, watshabalalisa lenkosi yayo, bona, layo yonke imiphefumulo eyayikiyo, katshiyanga insali.
UJoshuwa, loIsrayeli wonke laye, wasedlula esuka eMakeda waya eLibhina, walwa emelene leLibhina.

yasiyinikela layo lenkosi yayo esandleni sikaIsrayeli; waseyitshaya ngobukhali benkemba lemiphefumulo yonke eyayikiyo; katshiyanga insali kiyo; wenza enkosini yayo njengalokho akwenza enkosini yeJeriko.
UJoshuwa wasesedlula esuka eLibhina, loIsrayeli wonke kanye laye, waya eLakishi, wamisa inkamba maqondana layo, walwa emelene layo.
yasiyinikela iLakishi esandleni sikaIsrayeli; waseyithumba ngosuku lwesibili, wayitshaya ngobukhali benkemba layo yonke imiphefumulo eyayikiyo, njengakho konke akwenza eLibhina.
Ngalesosikhathi uHoramu inkosi yeGezeri wenyuka ukusiza iLakishi; kodwa uJoshuwa wamtshaya labantu bakhe, kwaze kwathi kamtshiyelanga insali.
UJoshuwa wasesedlula esuka eLakishi, loIsrayeli wonke kanye laye, baya eEgiloni, bamisa inkamba maqondana layo, balwa bemelene layo.
Bayithumba ngalolosuku, bayitshaya ngobukhali benkemba, lemiphefumulo yonke eyayikiyo bayitshabalalisa ngalolosuku, njengakho konke akwenza eLakishi.
UJoshuwa wasesenyuka esuka eEgiloni loIsrayeli wonke kanye laye, baya eHebroni, balwa bemelene layo,

bayithumba, bayitshaya ngobukhali benkemba, lenkosi yayo lemizi yayo yonke lawo wonke umphefumulo owawukiyo; katshiyanga insali, njengakho konke akwenza eEgiloni, wawutshabalalisa lawo wonke umphefumulo owawukiyo.
UJoshuwa wasebuyela eDebiri loIsrayeli wonke kanye laye, balwa bemelene layo,

bayithumba lenkosi yayo layo yonke imizi yayo, bayitshaya ngobukhali benkemba, batshabalalisa wonke umphefumulo owawukiyo; katshiyanga insali. Njengokwenza kwakhe eHebroni wenza njalo eDebiri lenkosini yayo, lanjengokwenza kwakhe eLibhina lenkosini yayo.
Ngakho uJoshuwa walitshaya ilizwe lonke lezintaba leleningizimu lelesihotsha lelamawatha lawo wonke amakhosi abo.
UJoshuwa wasebatshaya kusukela eKadeshi-Bhaneya.
UJoshuwa wasethumba wonke lamakhosi lelizwe lawo ngasikhathi sinye, ngoba uNkulunkulu kaIsrayeli yamlwela uIsrayeli.
UJoshuwa wasebuyela, loIsrayeli wonke kanye laye, enkambeni eGiligali.
Kwasekusithi lapho uJabini,
lemakhosini ayengenyakatho ezintabeni, lemagcekeni, eningizimu kweKinerothi,
amaKhanani empumalanga lentshonalanga, lamaAmori lamaHethi lamaPerizi lamaJebusi entabeni.
Asephuma, wona lawo wonke amabutho awo kanye lawo, abantu abanengi, njengetshebetshebe elisekhunjini lolwandle ngobunengi, lamabhiza lenqola okunengi kakhulu.
Wonke lamakhosi asehlangana, eza amisa inkamba ndawonye emanzini eMeroma, ukulwa emelene loIsrayeli.
yasisithi kuJoshuwa: Ungesabi ngenxa yabo, ngoba kusasa phose ngalesisikhathi ngizawanikela wonke esebulewe phambi kukaIsrayeli.
UJoshuwa wasesiza, labo bonke abantu bempi kanye laye, bemelene lawo emanzini eMeroma bawajuma, bawadumela.

yasiwanikela esandleni sikaIsrayeli, owawatshaya waxotshana lawo kwaze kwaba seSidoni enkulu, kwaze kwaba seMisirefothi-Mayimi, kwaze kwaba sesihotsheni seMizipa empumalanga. Bawatshaya, kabaze batshiya insali kubo.
UJoshuwa wasesenza kiwo njengokutsho kweN kuye; waquma imisipha yamabhiza awo, watshisa inqola zawo ngomlilo.
UJoshuwa wasebuya ngalesosikhathi, wathumba iHazori, watshaya inkosi yayo ngenkemba. Ngoba kuqala iHazori yayiyinhloko yayo yonke leyomibuso.
Batshaya yonke imiphefumulo eyayikiyo ngobukhali benkemba, bayitshabalalisa; kakusalanga lokukodwa okuphefumulayo; wasetshisa iHazori ngomlilo.
Yonke-ke imizi yalawomakhosi lamakhosi ayo wonke uJoshuwa wakuthumba, wakutshaya ngobukhali benkemba, wakutshabalalisa, njengokulaya kukaMozisi inceku yeN.
Kuphela imizi yonke eyayimi emadundulwini ayo uIsrayeli kayitshisanga, ngaphandle kweHazori kuphela uJoshuwa ayitshisayo.
Layo yonke impango yalimizi lezifuyo abantwana bakoIsrayeli baziphangela. Kuphela bonke abantu babatshaya ngobukhali benkemba baze babachitha; kabatshiyanga loyedwa ophefumulayo.
Njengalokhu yayimlayile uMozisi inceku yayo.
Ngakho uJoshuwa walithatha lelolizwe lonke, izintaba, leningizimu yonke,
kusukela entabeni yeHalaki. Wawathumba wonke amakhosi abo, wawatshaya wawabulala.
UJoshuwa wayilwa-ke impi insuku ezinengi lawo wonke lawomakhosi.
Kakubanga lamuzi owenza ukuthula labantwana bakoIsrayeli ngaphandle kwamaHivi abahlali beGibeyoni; bayithatha yonke ngempi.
Ngoba kwakuvela eNni ukwenza lukhuni inhliziyo zabo ukuze bahlangabezane loIsrayeli empini, ukuze abatshabalalise.
UJoshuwa wasesiza ngalesosikhathi, waquma amaAnaki asuke ezintabeni, eAnabi, lentabeni zonke zakoJuda, lakuzo zonke intaba zakoIsrayeli; uJoshuwa wawatshabalalisa lemizi yawo.
Kakusalanga amaAnaki elizweni labantwana bakoIsrayeli; kuphela eGaza.
UJoshuwa wasethatha ilizwe lonke njengakho konke eyakukhuluma kuMozisi.
Lala ngamakhosi elizwe abantwana bakoIsrayeli abawatshayayo, badla ilifa lelizwe lawo ngaphetsheya kweJodani ngempumalanga, kusukela esifuleni seArinoni:
USihoni inkosi yamaAmori owayehlala eHeshiboni,
lamagceke kuze kufike elwandle lweKinerothi, kuze kube selwandle lwamagceke, uLwandle lweTshwayi, empumalanga;
lomngcele kaOgi inkosi yeBashani,
wabusa entabeni yeHermoni.
UMozisi inceku yeN labantwana bakoIsrayeli babatshaya.
Lala ngamakhosi elizwe uJoshuwa labantwana bakoIsrayeli abawatshayayo nganeno kweJodani entshonalanga, kusukela eBhali-Gadi esihotsheni seLebhanoni kusiya entabeni elugwadule:
Ezintabeni, lezihotsheni, lemagcekeni, lemawatheni, lenkangala, leningizimu.
Inkosi yeJeriko, eyodwa;
inkosi yeJerusalema, eyodwa; inkosi yeHebroni, eyodwa;
inkosi yeEgiloni, eyodwa;
inkosi yeDebiri, eyodwa;
inkosi yeHorma, eyodwa;
inkosi yeLibhina, eyodwa;
inkosi yeMakeda, eyodwa;
inkosi yeTapuwa, eyodwa;
inkosi yeAfeki, eyodwa; inkosi yeLasharoni, eyodwa;
inkosi yeMadoni, eyodwa;
inkosi yeShimironi-Meroni, eyodwa;
inkosi yeThahanakhi, eyodwa;
inkosi yeKedeshi, eyodwa;
inkosi yeDori emngceleni weDori, eyodwa;
inkosi yeTiriza, eyodwa; wonke amakhosi angamatshumi amathathu lanye.
UJoshuwa wayesemdala eleminyaka eminengi. yasisithi kuye: Usumdala, uleminyaka eminengi, kusasele ilizwe elikhulu kakhulu ukudla ilifa lalo.
Yileli ilizwe eliseleyo,
kusukela eShihori eliphambi kweGibhithe, kusiya emngceleni weEkhironi enyakatho, elibalelwa kumaKhanani,
kusukela eningizimu, ilizwe lonke lamaKhanani, leMeyara elingelamaSidoni, kuze kufike eAfeki,
lelizwe lamaGebali, leLebhanoni lonke, kusiya empumalanga.
Bonke abakhileyo ezintabeni, kusukela eLebhanoni kusiya eMisirefothi-Mayimi, wonke amaSidoni.
Ngakho-ke yehlukanisa ilizwe leli libe yilifa ezizweni eziyisificamunwemunye lengxenye yesizwe sakoManase.
Kanye labo abakoRubeni labakoGadi bemukela ilifa labo, uMozisi owabanika lona, ngaphetsheya kweJodani ngempumalanga, njengalokho uMozisi inceku yeN wabanika:
Kusukela eAroweri esekhunjini lwesifula seArinoni, lomuzi ophakathi kwesifula,
lemizi yonke kaSihoni inkosi yamaAmori owabusa eHeshiboni, kuze kube semngceleni wabantwana bakoAmoni,
leGileyadi,
umbuso wonke kaOgi eBashani owabusa eAshitarothi leEdreyi. UMozisi wayebatshaye-ke wabaxotsha elifeni labo.
Kodwa abantwana bakoIsrayeli kabawaxotshanga elifeni amaGeshuri lamaMahakathi; kodwa amaGeshuri lamaMahakathi ahlala phakathi kukaIsrayeli kuze kube lamuhla.
Kuphela esizweni sakoLevi kanikanga ilifa; iminikelo yeN uNkulunkulu kaIsrayeli eyenziwe ngomlilo iyilifa laso.
UMozisi wasenika isizwe sabantwana bakoRubeni ngokwensendo zabo.
Lomngcele waso wasukela eAroweri,
iHeshiboni, lemizi yayo yonke esemagcekeni leBamothi-Bhali leBeti-Bhali-Meyoni,
leJahaza,
leKiriyathayimi,
leBeti-Peyori,
lemizi yonke yamagceke, lombuso wonke kaSihoni inkosi yamaAmori, owayebusa eHeshiboni.
LoBalami indodana kaPeyori, ovumisayo, abantwana bakoIsrayeli bambulala ngenkemba phakathi kwababuleweyo babo.
Lomngcele wabantwana bakoRubeni wawuyiJodani lomngcele wayo. Lokhu kwakuyilifa labantwana bakoRubeni ngokwensendo zabo, imizi lemizana yayo.
UMozisi wasenika isizwe sakoGadi, kubantwana bakoGadi ngokwensendo zabo.
Lomngcele wabo wawuyiJazeri,
njalo kusukela eHeshiboni kusiya eRamathi-Mizipa leBetonimi;
lesigodini, iBeti-Harama.
Leli yilifa labantwana bakoGadi ngokwensendo zabo, imizi lemizana yabo.
UMozisi wasenika ingxenye yesizwe sakoManase ilifa; njalo yayingeyengxenye yesizwe sabantwana bakoManase ngokwensendo zabo.
Lomngcele wabo wasukela eMahanayimi, iBashani lonke, umbuso wonke kaOgi inkosi yeBashani, layo yonke imizana yeJayiri eseBashani, imizi engamatshumi ayisithupha.
Lengxenye yeGileyadi, leAshitarothi, leEdreyi, imizi yombuso kaOgi eBashani, yayingeyabantwana bakoMakiri indodana kaManase.
La yiwo uMozisi awanika aba yilifa emagcekeni akoMowabi ngaphetsheya kweJodani eJeriko empumalanga.
Kodwa esizweni sakoLevi uMozisi kanikanga ilifa.
Lala ngamazweabantwana bakoIsrayeli abawadla abe yilifa elizweni leKhanani, uEleyazare umpristi loJoshuwa indodana kaNuni lenhloko zaboyise bezizwe zabantwana bakoIsrayeli ababanika wona aba yilifa,
ngenkatho yelifa labo, njengokulaya kweN ngesandla sikaMozisi, ngezizwe eziyisificamunwemunye lengxenye yesizwe.
Ngoba uMozisi wayesenike ilifa izizwe ezimbili lengxenye yesizwe ngaphetsheya kweJodani; kodwa kumaLevi kanikanga ilifa phakathi kwazo.
Ngoba abantwana bakoJosefa babeyizizwe ezimbili, uManase loEfrayimi.
Njengokulaya kweN kuMozisi, abantwana bakoIsrayeli benza njalo, balaba ilizwe.
Khona abantwana bakoJuda basondela kuJoshuwa eGiligali; uKalebi indodana kaJefune umKenizi wasesithi kuye.
Ngangileminyaka engamatshumi amane lapho uMozisi inceku yeN ingithuma ngisuka eKadeshi-Bhaneya ukuhlola ilizwe. Ngasengibuyisela kuye umbiko njengokusenhliziyweni yami.
Kodwa abazalwane bami ababenyuke lami.
UMozisi wasefunga mhlalokho esithi: Isibili umhlaba.
Khathesi-ke khangela, ingilondoloze ngiphila njengokutsho kwayo okwale iminyaka engamatshumi amane lanhlanu, kusukela esikhathini eyakhuluma ngaso lelilizwi kuMozisi, uIsrayeli esahamba enkangala.
Ngisaqinile lalamuhla njengasosukwini uMozisi angithuma ngalo.

Ngakho-ke nginika lintaba eyakhuluma ngayo ngalolosuku, ngoba wena wezwa mhlalokho ukuthi amaAnaki ayekhona lapho lemizi emikhulu ebiyelwe ngemithangala. Aluba ilami, ngizawaxotsha elifeni, njengokutsho kweN.
UJoshuwa wasembusisa.
Ngalokho-ke iHebroni yaba ngekaKalebi indodana kaJefune umKenizi yaba yilifa kuze kube lamuhla, ngoba wayilandela ngokupheleleyo iN, uNkulunkulu kaIsrayeli.
Lebizo leHebroni kuqala laliyiKiriyathi-Arba, owayengumuntu omkhulu phakathi kwamaAnaki.
Lenkatho yesizwe sabantwana bakoJuda ngokwensendo zabo yayisemngceleni weEdoma.
Lomngcele wabo weningizimu wawusuka ephethelweni loLwandle lweTshwayi, kusukela ethekwini elikhangela eningizimu.
Waphuma waya eningizimu emqansweni weAkirabimi, wedlulela eZini, wenyuka usuka eningizimu kusiya eKadeshi-Bhaneya, wedlulele eHezironi, wenyukele eAdari, uphendukele eKarika,
wedlulele eAzimoni, uphumele esifuleni seGibhithe; lokuphuma komngcele kwakuselwandle. Lo uzakuba ngumngcele wenu eningizimu.
Njalo umngcele wempumalanga wawuluLwandle lweTshwayi, kusiya ephethelweni leJodani. Lomngcele ehlangothini lwenyakatho wasukela ethekwini lolwandle, kusukela ephethelweni leJodani.
Lomngcele wenyukela eBeti-Hogila.
Lomngcele wenyukela eDebiri.
Lomngcele wenyuka ngesihotsha sendodana kaHinomu.
Lomngcele wagoba usuka engqongeni yentaba kuze kube semthonjeni wamanzi eNefitowa.
Lomngcele wabhoda usuka eBhahala ngentshonalanga waya entabeni yeSeyiri, wedlulele eceleni kwentaba yeJeyarimi, eyiKesaloni, wehlele eBeti-Shemeshi.
Lomngcele waphuma uye eceleni kweEkhironi enyakatho, waphumela eJabineli; lokuphuma komngcele kwakuselwandle.
Lomngcele wentshonalanga wawululwandle olukhulu lokhumbi. Lo ngumngcele wabantwana bakoJuda inhlangothi zonke ngokwensendo zabo.
Wasemupha uKalebi indodana kaJefune isabelo phakathi kwabantwana bakoJuda, ngokomlayo weN kuJoshuwa, iKiriyathi-Arba, uyise kaAnaki, eyiHebroni.
UKalebi wasexotsha elifeni amadodana amathathu kaAnaki asuke lapho, uSheshayi loAhimani loTalimayi, abantwana bakaAnaki.
Wasesenyuka esuka lapho waya kwabahlali beDebiri. Lebizo leDebiri kuqala laliyiKiriyathi-Seferi.
UKalebi wasesithi: Lowo otshaya iKiriyathi-Seferi, ayithumbe, ngizamupha uAkisa indodakazi yami abe ngumka khe.
UOthiniyeli indodana kaKenazi, umnawakhe kaKalebi, waseyithumba; wasemnika uAkisa indodakazi yakhe ukuba ngumka khe.
Kwasekusithi ekufikeni kwakhe wamkhuthaza ukuthi acele kuyise insimu; wasesehla kubabhemi, uKalebi wasesithi kuye: Ukhala ngani?
Wasesithi: Ngipha isibusiso.
Leli yilifa lesizwe sabantwana bakoJuda ngokwensendo zabo.
Lemizi esukela ekucineni kwesizwe sabantwana bakoJuda kusiya emngceleni weEdoma yile: IKabhiseyeli leJaguri
leKina leDimona leAdada
leKedeshi leHazori leIthinani,
iZifi
leHazori-Hadatha leKeriyothi, iHezironi okuyiHazori,
iAmama leShema leMolada
leHazari-Gada leHeshimoni leBeti-Peleti
leHazari-Shuwali,
iBhahala
leElitoladi
leZikilagi leMadimana leSansana
leLebayothi leShilihimi.
Esihotsheni: IEshitawoli leAshina
leZanowa leEni-Ganimi, iTapuwa leEnama,
iJarimuthi
leShaharayimi leGederothayimi; imizi elitshumi lane lemizana yayo.
IZenani leHadasha leMigidali-Gadi
leDileyani leMizipa leJokhitheyeli,
iLakishi
leKhabhoni leLahimasa leKitilishi
leGederothi, iBeti-Dagoni, leNahama, leMakeda; imizi elitshumi lesithupha lemizana yayo.
ILibhina
leJifitha leAshina leNezibhi
leKeyila; imizi eyisificamunwemunye lemizana yayo.
IEkhironi.
Kusukela eEkhironi kusiya elwandle, yonke eseceleni kweAshidodi lemizana yayo:
IAshidodi, imizi yayo lemizana yayo.
Lezintabeni: IShamiri leJatiri
leDana leKiriyathi-Sana okuyiDebiri,
leAnabi leEshithemo leAnimi
leGosheni; imizi elitshumi lanye lemizana yayo.
IArabi leDuma leEshani
leJanimi leBeti-Tapuwa leAfeka
leHumta leKiriyathi-Arba, okuyiHebroni, leZiyori; imizi eyisificamunwemunye lemizana yayo.
IMayoni
leJizereyeli leJokideyama leZanoya,
iKayini, iGibeya leTimina; imizi elitshumi lemizana yayo.
IHalihuli, iBeti-Zuri leGedori
leMarathi leBeti-Anothi leElitekoni; imizi eyisithupha lemizana yayo.
iKiriyathi-Bhali, okuyiKiriyathi-Jeyarimi, leRaba; imizi emibili lemizana yayo.
Enkangala: IBeti-Araba, iMidini leSekaka
leNibishani, lomuzi wetshwayi, leEngedi; imizi eyisithupha lemizana yayo.
Kodwa amaJebusi, abahlali beJerusalema, abantwana bakoJuda babengelakho ukuwaxotsha elifeni; ngakho amaJebusi ahlala labantwana bakoJuda eJerusalema kuze kube lamuhla.
Kwasekuphuma inkatho yabantwana bakoJosefa kusukela eJodani eJeriko, kusiya emanzini eJeriko ngempumalanga, inkangala isenyuka isuka eJeriko entabeni yeBhetheli;
yasiphuma eBhetheli isiya eLuzi,
yehlela entshonalanga emngceleni wamaJafilethi, isiya emngceleni weBhethi-Horoni ngaphansi; lokuphuma kwayo kwakuselwandle.
Ngakho abantwana bakoJosefa, uManase loEfrayimi, balidla ilifa.
Lomngcele wabantwana bakoEfrayimi ngokwensendo zabo wawu nje: Ngitsho umngcele welifa labo empumalanga wawuyiAtarothi-Adari.
Umngcele wasuphumela elwandle, eMikimethathi enyakatho, wedlula empumalanga usiya eJanowa;
wasusehla usuka eJanowa usiya eAtarothi leNahara, wagudla iJeriko, waphumela eJodani.
Kusukela eTapuwa umngcele waya entshonalanga, lokuphuma kwawo waba selwandle. Leli yilifa lesizwe sabantwana bakoEfrayimi ngokwensendo zabo.
Lemizi eyayehlukaniselwe abantwana bakoEfrayimi yayiphakathi kwelifa labantwana bakoManase, yonke imizi lemizana yayo.
Kodwa kabawaxotshanga elifeni amaKhanani ayehlala eGezeri.
Kwasekusiba lenkatho yesizwe sakoManase, ngoba wayelizibulo likaJosefa.
Yayikhona njalo eyabaseleyo babantwana bakoManase ngokwensendo zabo. Laba ngabantwana besilisa bakaManase indodana kaJosefa ngokwensendo zabo.

Kodwa uZelofehadi indodana kaHeferi indodana kaGileyadi indodana kaMakiri indodana kaManase wayengelamadodana, kodwa amadodakazi. Lala ngamabizo amadodakazi akhe: OMahla loNowa, uHogila, uMilka loTiriza.
Asesondela phambi kukaEleyazare umpristi laphambi kukaJoshuwa indodana kaNuni. Ngakho wawanika ngokomlayo weN ilifa phakathi kwabafowabo bakayise.
Ngakho kwawela inkatho ezilitshumi kuManase.
Ngoba amadodakazi kaManase adla ilifa phakathi kwamadodana akhe. Lelizwe leGileyadi laba ngelabaseleyo bamadodana akoManase.
Umngcele wakoManase wasusukela eAsheri usiya eMikimethathi.
UManase waba lelizwe leTapuwa, kodwa iTapuwa emngceleni kaManase yayingeyabantwana bakoEfrayimi.
Lomngcele wehlela esifuleni iKana eningizimu kwesifula. Imizi le ngeyakoEfrayimi phakathi kwemizi yakoManase. Lomngcele wakoManase usenyakatho kwesifula, lokuphuma kwawo kuselwandle.
Eningizimu lalingelakoEfrayimi, lenyakatho lalingelakoManase, lolwandle lungumngcele wakhe. LeAsheri bahlangana enyakatho, leIsakari empumalanga.
Ngoba koIsakari loAsheri uManase: Amadundulu amathathu.
Kodwa abantwana bakoManase babengelakho ukuxotsha elifeni leyomizi, kodwa amaKhanani ayefuna ukuhlala kulelolizwe.
Kodwa kwathi lapho abantwana bakoIsrayeli sebelamandla bawasebenzisa amaKhanani njengezibhalwa, kodwa kabawaxotshanga lokuwaxotsha elifeni.
Abantwana bakoJosefa?
UJoshuwa wasesithi kubo: Uba uyisizwe esikhulu, wena yenyukela eguswini.
Abantwana bakoJosefa basebesithi: Intaba kayisanelanga, njalo kulenqola zensimbi.
UJoshuwa wasekhuluma kundlu kaJosefa, kuEfrayimi lakuManase esithi: Uyisizwe esikhulu, futhi ulamandla amakhulu; kawuyikuba lenkatho eyodwa,
kodwa intaba izakuba ngeyakho; ngoba iligusu, uzalicenta, lokuphuma kwalo kube ngokwakho, ngoba uzawaxotsha elifeni amaKhanani, lanxa elenqola zensimbi, lanxa elamandla.
Inhlangano yonke-ke yabantwana bakoIsrayeli yabuthana eShilo, yamisa khona ithente lenhlangano. Lelizwe lalehliselwe phansi phambi kwabo.
Kwasekusele phakathi kwabantwana bakoIsrayeli izizwe eziyisikhombisa ezazingabelwanga ilifa lazo.
UJoshuwa wasesithi kubantwana bakoIsrayeli: Koze kube nini lidonda ukuyakudla ilifa lelizwe uNkulunkulu waboyihlo elinike lona?
Zinikeni amadoda amathathu ngesizwe, ngiwathume, asukume ahambe adabule ilizwe, alibhale ngokwelifa lazo, abuye kimi.
Azalehlukanisa libe yizabelo eziyisikhombisa; uJuda bahlale emngceleni wabo enyakatho.
Lani lizabhala ilizwe ngezigaba eziyisikhombisa, beseliletha kimi lapha, ukuthi ngiliphosele inkatho lapha phambi kweN uNkulunkulu wethu.
Ngoba amaLevi kawalasabelo phakathi kwenu loRubeni lengxenye yesizwe sakoManase sebethethe ilifa labo ngaphetsheya kweJodani empumalanga, uMozisi inceku yeN eyabanika lona.
Asesuka amadoda ahamba. UJoshuwa wawalaya ahambayo ukubhala ilizwe esithi: Hambani lidabule ilizwe lilibhale, libuyele kimi, ukuze ngiliphosele inkatho lapha phambi kweN eShilo.
Ngakho amadoda ahamba adabula phakathi kwelizwe, alibhala ngemizi ngezigaba eziyisikhombisa egwalweni; asebuya kuJoshuwa enkambeni eShilo.
UJoshuwa wasebaphosela inkatho eShilo phambi kweN; uJoshuwa wasebabela lapho ilizwe abantwana bakoIsrayeli ngokwezigaba zabo.
Inkatho yesizwe sabantwana bakoBhenjamini yavela ngokwensendo zabo. Lomngcele wenkatho yabo waphuma phakathi kwabantwana bakoJuda labantwana bakoJosefa.
Lomngcele wabo ngenyakatho wasukela eJodani.
Lomngcele wedlula usuka lapho waya eLuzi, ewatheni leLuzi, eyiBhetheli engaphansi.
Umngcele wagoba-ke, waphenduka waya eceleni lentshonalanga ngeningizimu, kusukela entabeni emaqondana leBhethi-Horoni, umuzi wabantwana bakoJuda. Lolu luhlangothi lwentshonalanga.
Lohlangothi lweningizimu lusephethelweni leKiriyathi-Jeyarimi; lomngcele waphuma waya entshonalanga, waphuma waya emthonjeni wamanzi weNefitowa.
Umngcele wasusehla usiya ephethelweni lentaba emaqondana lesihotsha sendodana kaHinomu esisesihotsheni seziqhwaga enyakatho;
wagoba usukela enyakatho waphuma eEni-Shemeshi;
wadlulela ewatheni maqondana leAraba enyakatho, wehlela eAraba.
Umngcele wasusedlulela ewatheni leBeti-Hogila enyakatho, lokuphuma komngcele kwakusethekwini loLwandle lweTshwayi enyakatho, ephethelweni leJodani ngeningizimu. Lo ngumngcele weningizimu.
LeJodani ingumngcele walo ehlangothini lwempumalanga. Leli yilifa labantwana bakoBhenjamini ngemingcele yalo inhlangothi zonke, ngokwensendo zabo.
Lemizi yesizwe sabantwana bakoBhenjamini ngokwensendo zabo yile: IJeriko leEmeki-Kezizi
leBeti-Araba
leAvimi lePara leOfira
leKefari-Amoni leOfini leGeba; imizi elitshumi lambili lemizana yayo.
IGibeyoni
leMizipa leMoza
leRekemi leIripheyeli leTarala
leZela; imizi elitshumi lane lemizana yayo. Leli yilifa labantwana bakoBhenjamini ngokwensendo zabo.
Inkatho yesibili yasivela yaya kuSimeyoni, eyesizwe sabantwana bakoSimeyoni, ngokwensendo zabo. Lelifa labo laliphakathi kwelifa labantwana bakoJuda.
Elifeni leMolada
leHazari-Shuwali
leElitoladi
leZikilagi leBeti-Marikabothi leHazari-Susa
leBeti-Lebawothi leSharuheni; imizi elitshumi lantathu lemizana yayo.
IEni; imizi emine lemizana yayo.
Layo yonke imizana ezingelezele imizi le, kuze kufike eBahalathi-Beri. Leli yilifa lesizwe sabantwana bakoSimeyoni ngokwensendo zabo.
Ilifa labantwana bakoSimeyoni lavela enkathweni yabantwana bakoJuda; ngoba isigaba sabantwana bakoJuda sasisikhulu kakhulu kibo; ngakho abantwana bakoSimeyoni badla ilifa phakathi kwelifa labo.
Inkatho yesithathu yasivela yaya kubantwana bakoZebuluni ngokwensendo zabo. Lomngcele welifa labo wafika eSaridi.
Umngcele wabo-ke wenyukela entshonalanga leMarala, wafinyelela eDabeshethi wafinyelela esifuleni;
waphenduka uvela eSaridi usiya empumalanga lapho okuphuma khona ilanga emngceleni weKisilothi-Thabhori, wenyukela eJafiya;
ususuka lapho wedlulela empumalanga, endaweni yokuphuma kwelanga, usiya eGitha leItha-Kazini, waphumela eRimoni, uphendukela eNeya.
Lomngcele wayizingelezela enyakatho eHanathoni; lokuphuma kwawo kwaba sesihotsheni seJifitaheli.
LeKatathi leNahalali.
Leli yilifa labantwana bakoZebuluni ngokwensendo zabo: Imizi le lemizana yayo.
Inkatho yesine yavela yaya kubantwana bakoIsakari ngokwensendo zabo.
Umngcele wabo-ke wawuyiJizereyeli
leHafarayimi leShiyoni leAnaharathi
leRabithi leKishiyoni leAbezi
leRemethi leEni-Ganimi leEni-Hada leBeti-Pazezi.
Lomngcele wafinyelela eThabhori; lokuphuma komngcele wabo kwakuseJodani; imizi elitshumi lesithupha lemizana yayo.
Leli yilifa lesizwe sabantwana bakoIsakari ngokwensendo zabo, imizi lemizana yayo.
Inkatho yesihlanu yasivela yaya esizweni sabantwana bakoAsheri ngokwensendo zabo.
Umngcele wabo-ke wawuyiHelkathi
leAlameleki leAmadi leMishali entshonalanga leShihori-Libhinathi,
waphendukela lapho okuphuma khona ilanga usiya eBeti-Dagoni, wafinyelela eZebuluni lesihotsha seJifitaheli kwesokhohlo,
leEbroni leRehobi.
Umngcele wasuphendukela eRama, waya emzini obiyelweyo weTire; lomngcele waphendukela eHosa; lokuphuma kwawo kwakuselwandle, uvela esigabeni usiya eAkizibi
leUma leAfeki.
Leli yilifa lesizwe sabantwana bakoAsheri ngokwensendo zabo, imizi le lemizana yayo.
Inkatho yesithupha yavela yaya kubantwana bakoNafithali, eyabantwana bakoNafithali ngokwensendo zabo.
Umngcele wabo wasusuka eHelefi, esihlahleni se-okhi eZahananimi leAdami-Nekebi leJabineli, kwaze kwaba seLakumi; lokuphuma kwawo wawuseJodani.
Umngcele wasuphendukela entshonalanga, waphuma lapho waya eHukoki, wafinyelela eZebuluni ngeningizimu, leAsheri wafinyelela entshonalanga, leJuda eJodani lapho okuphuma khona ilanga.
Njalo imizi ebiyelweyo yile: IZidimi, iZeri, leHamathi,
leAdama, leRama, leHazori,
leKedeshi, leEdreyi, leEni-Hazori,
leYironi, leMigidali-Eli.
Leli yilifa lesizwe sabantwana bakoNafithali ngokwensendo zabo, imizi lemizana yayo.
Inkatho yesikhombisa yavela yaya esizweni sabantwana bakoDani ngokwensendo zabo.
Lomngcele welifa labo wawuyiZora leIri-Shemeshi
leShahalabini leJithila
leEloni leTiminatha
leEliteke leGibethoni
leJehudi leBene-Beraki leGathi-Rimoni
leMe-Jarkoni leRakoni kanye lomngcele oqondene leJafo.
Lomngcele wabantwana bakoDani wavela umncinyane kakhulukubo; sebeyithumbile bayitshaya ngobukhali benkemba, badla ilifa layo, bahlala kiyo, bayibiza iLeshema ngokuthiyiDani, ngebizo likaDani uyise.
Leli yilifa lesizwe sabantwana bakoDani ngokwensendo zabo, imizi le lemizana yayo.
Kwathi sebeqedile ukwaba ilizwe libe yilifa ngokwemingcele yalo, abantwana bakoIsrayeli bamnika uJoshuwa indodana kaNuni ilifa phakathi kwabo.
Ngokomlayo weN bamnika umuzi awucelayo, iThiminathi-Sera entabeni yakoEfrayimi, wasesakha umuzi, wahlala kiwo.
La ngamafa uEleyazare umpristi loJoshuwa indodana kaNuni lenhloko zaboyise zezizwe zabantwana bakoIsrayeli phambi kweN, emnyango wethente lenhlangano. Baqeda-ke ukulaba ilizwe.
yasikhuluma kuJoshuwa isithi:
Khuluma kubantwana bakoIsrayeli uthi: Zikhetheleni imizi yokuphephela engakhuluma ngayo kini ngesandla sikaMozisi,
ukuze umbulali obulala umuntu kungeyisikho ngabomo abalekele khona. Njalo izakuba yisiphephelo kini kumphindiseli wegazi.
Nxa ebalekela komunye walimizi uzakuma emnyango wesango lomuzi, akhulume udaba lwakhe ezindlebeni zabadala balowomuzi; babesebememukela kubo emzini, bamnike indawo ukuthi ahlale labo.
Uba-ke umphindiseli wegazi exotshana laye, kabayikunikela, ebengamzondi mandulo.
Uzahlala kulowomuzi aze eme phambi kwenhlangano kusenzelwa ukwahlulelwa oyabe ekhona ngalezonsuku. Umbulali usengabuyela eze emzini wakibo lendlini yakhe, aye emzini abaleke khona.
Basebengcwelisa iKedeshi okuyiHebroni entabeni yakoJuda.
Langaphetsheya kweJodani eJeriko empumalanga banika iBezeri.
Le yimizi eyayimiselwe bonke abantwana bakoIsrayeli lowezizwe ohlala njengowezizwe phakathi kwabo.
Kwasekusondela inhloko zaboyise bamaLevi kuEleyazare umpristi lakuJoshuwa indodana kaNuni lakuzo inhloko zaboyise bezizwe zabantwana bakoIsrayeli,
bakhuluma kubo eShilo, lamadlelo ayo ezifuyo zethu.
Ngakho abantwana bakoIsrayeli banika amaLevi okwelifa labo ngokomlayo weN, limizi lamadlelo ayo.
Kwasekuvela inkatho yensendo zamaKohathi. Abantwana bakoAroni umpristi lesizweni sakoSimeyoni lesizweni sakoBhenjamini, basebesiba lemizi elitshumi lantathu.
Labaseleyo kubantwana bakaKohathi, ngenkatho ensendweni zesizwe sakoEfrayimi lesizweni sakoDani lengxenyeni eyodwa kwezimbili yesizwe sakoManase, baba lemizi elitshumi.

Labantwana bakoGerishoni, ngenkatho ensendweni zesizwe sakoIsakari lesizweni sakoAsheri lesizweni sakoNafithali lengxenyeni eyodwa kwezimbili yesizwe sakoManase eBashani, baba lemizi elitshumi lantathu.
Abantwana bakoMerari ngokwensendo zabo, esizweni sakoRubeni lesizweni sakoGadi lesizweni sakoZebuluni, baba lemizi elitshumi lambili.
Labantwana bakoIsrayeli banika amaLevi le imizi lamadlelo ayo ngenkatho, njengokulaya kweN ngesandla sikaMozisi.
Basebenika esizweni sabantwana bakoJuda lesizweni sabantwana bakoSimeyoni le imizi, eqanjwa ngebizo,
eyayingeyabantwana bakoAroni, bevela kunsendo zamaKohathi ebantwaneni bakoLevi, ngoba baba lenkatho yokuqala.
Basebebanika lamadlelo inhlangothi zayo zonke.
Kodwa insimu yomuzi lemizana yawo bakunika uKalebi indodana kaJefune ukuba ngeyakhe.
Ngakho banika abantwana bakoAroni umpristi umuzi wokuphephela wombulali, iHebroni lamadlelo ayo,
leJatiri lamadlelo ayo,
leHoloni lamadlelo ayo, leDebiri lamadlelo ayo,
leAyini lamadlelo ayo, leJuta.
Lesizweni sakoBhenjamini: IGibeyoni lamadlelo ayo, iGeba lamadlelo ayo,
iAnathothi lamadlelo ayo, leAlimoni lamadlelo ayo: Imizi emine.
Yonke imizi yabantwana bakoAroni, abapristi, yayilemizi elitshumi lantathu lamadlelo ayo.
Lensendo zabantwana bakoKohathi, amaLevi, asalayo ebantwaneni bakoKohathi, baba lemizi yenkatho yabo esizweni sakoEfrayimi.
Basebebanika umuzi wokuphephela umbulali, iShekema lamadlelo ayo,
leKibizayimi lamadlelo ayo, leBhethi-Horoni lamadlelo ayo: Imizi emine.
Lesizweni sakoDani iEliteke lamadlelo ayo,
iAjaloni lamadlelo ayo: Imizi emine.
Lengxenyeni eyodwa kwezimbili yesizwe sakoManase, iThahanakhi lamadlelo ayo: Imizi emibili.
Yonke imizi yensendo zabantwana bakoKohathi abaseleyo yayilitshumi lamadlelo ayo.
Lakubantwana bakoGerishoni lamadlelo ayo: Imizi emibili.
Lesizweni sakoIsakari, iKishiyoni lamadlelo ayo,
iJarimuthi lamadlelo ayo: Imizi emine.
Lesizweni sakoAsheri, iMishali lamadlelo ayo, iAbidoni lamadlelo ayo,
iHelkathi lamadlelo ayo: Imizi emine.
Lesizweni sakoNafithali, iKedeshi lamadlelo ayo: Imizi emithathu.
Yonke imizi yamaGerishoni ngokwensendo zawo yayiyimizi elitshumi lantathu lamadlelo ayo.
Lensendo zabantwana bakoMerari esizweni sakoZebuluni lamadlelo ayo, leKarita lamadlelo ayo,
iDimina lamadlelo ayo, iNahalali lamadlelo ayo: Imizi emine.
Lesizweni sakoRubeni, iBezeri lamadlelo ayo,
iKedemothi lamadlelo ayo: Imizi emine.
Lesizweni sakoGadi, iRamothi eGileyadi lamadlelo ayo,
iHeshiboni lamadlelo ayo: Imizi emine isiyonke.
Yonke imizi yayingeyabantwana bakoMerari, ngokwensendo zabo, abaseleyo ensendweni zamaLevi. Lenkatho yabo yayiyimizi elitshumi lambili.
Yonke imizi yamaLevi phakathi kwelifa labantwana bakoIsrayeli yayiyimizi engamatshumi amane lesificaminwembili lamadlelo ayo.
Le imizi, lowo lalowo wawulamadlelo awo inhlangothi zawo zonke. Kwakunjalo kuleyo yonke imizi.
yasinika uIsrayeli ilizwe lonke eyafunga ukubanika lona oyise; basebesidla ilifa lalo bahlala kulo.
yasibanika ukuphumula inhlangothi zonke.
Kakwehlulekanga lalutho lwayo yonke into enhle eyayikhuluma kuyo indlu kaIsrayeli; konke kwenzeka.
Ngalesosikhathi uJoshuwa wabiza abakoRubeni labakoGadi lengxenye yesizwe sabakoManase,
wathi kubo: Lina ligcinile konke uMozisi inceku yeN eyalilaya khona, lalilalela ilizwi lami kukho konke engalilaya khona.
Kalibatshiyanga abafowenu kulezinsuku ezinengi, kuze kube lamuhla; kodwa ligcinile imfanelo yomlayo weN uNkulunkulu wenu.
Khathesi-ke, uNkulunkulu wenu ibanikile abafowenu ukuphumula.
Kuphela liqaphelisise ukwenza umlayo lomthetho kuyo, lokuyikhonza ngenhliziyo yenu yonke langomphefumulo wenu wonke.
Wasebabusisa uJoshuwa ebayekela behamba, baya emathenteni abo.

Njalo kungxenye yesizwe sakoManase uMozisi wayeyinike indawoeBashani; kodwa kungxenye yayo uJoshuwa wayinika indawolabafowabo nganeno kweJodani entshonalanga. Njalo-ke nxa uJoshuwa ebayekela behamba besiya emathenteni abo, wababusisa.
Wakhuluma labo esithi: Buyelani emathenteni enu lilenotho impango yezitha zenu labafowenu.

Abantwana bakoRubeni labantwana bakoGadi lengxenye yesizwe sakoManase basebebuyela, besuka ebantwaneni bakoIsrayeli bephuma eShilo, elizweni lelifa labo ababelizuzile, ngokomlayo weN ngesandla sikaMozisi.
Kwathi sebefikile emingceleni yeJodani eselizweni leKhanani, abantwana bakoRubeni labantwana bakoGadi lengxenye yesizwe sakoManase bakha khona ilathi ngaseJodani, ilathi elikhulu ngokubonakala.

Kwathi abantwana bakoIsrayeli besizwa kuthiwa: Khangelani, abantwana bakoRubeni labantwana bakoGadi lengxenye yesizwe sakoManase bakhile ilathi maqondana lelizwe leKhanani emingceleni eJodani ehlangothini lwabantwana bakoIsrayeli.
Kwathi abantwana bakoIsrayeli be ku zwa, inhlangano yonke yabantwana bakoIsrayeli yabuthana eShilo ukwenyukela kubo empini.
Abantwana bakoIsrayeli basebethuma kubantwana bakoRubeni umpristi,
lezinduna ezilitshumi laye, induna eyodwa ngendlu ngayinye yaboyise ivela kuzo zonke izizwe zakoIsrayeli; ngayinye yayiyinhloko yendlu yaboyise, kunkulungwane zakoIsrayeli.
Basebefika kubantwana bakoRubeni lakubantwana bakoGadi lengxenyeni eyodwa kwezimbili yesizwe sakoManase elizweni leGileyadi, bakhuluma labo besithi:
Itsho njalo inhlangano yonke yeN: Kuyisiphambeko bani eseliphambeke ngaso limelane loNkulunkulu kaIsrayeli, liphambuka lamuhla ekuyilandeleni iN, ekuzakheleni ilathi, ukuze lihlamukele lamuhla?
Ngabe isiphambeko sePeyori sincinyane kakhulu kithi yini, esingahlanjululwanga kuso kuze kube lamuhla, lanxa inhlupheko yayiphakathi kwenhlangano yeN,
ukuze lina liphenduke lamuhla ekuyilandeleni iN? Kuzakuthi uba lina liyihlamuka yakoIsrayeli.

Kodwa ngeqiniso, uba ilizwe lemfuyo yenu lingcolile, chaphelani lina elizweni lemfuyo yeN lapho ithabhanekele leN elihlala khona njalo lingasihlamukeli ekuzakheleni kwenu ilathi ngaphandle kwelathi leN uNkulunkulu wethu.
UAkani indodana kaZera kaphambekanga yini ngesiphambeko entweni eqalekisiweyo, kwasekusiba lolaka phezu kwenhlangano yonke yakoIsrayeli? Leyondoda kayibhubhanga-ke yodwa esiphambekweni sayo.
Abantwana bakoRubeni labantwana bakoGadi lengxenye yesizwe sakoManase basebephendula bathi kunhloko zezinkulungwane zakoIsrayeli:
UNkulunkulu wabonkulunkulu, loIsrayeli kakwazi; uba bekungokuhlamuka kumbe uba ngokuphambuka eNni, lingasisindisi lamuhla,
ukuthi sizakhele ilathi ukuphambuka ekuyilandeleni iN, loba sinikelele phezu kwalo umnikelo wokutshiswa loba umnikelo wokudla, loba ukwenza phezu kwalo iminikelo yokuthula, uqobo kayikudinge.
Kodwa ngeqiniso sikwenze ngokunqineka nga lolu daba sisithi: Kusasa abantwana benu bazakhuluma kubantwana bethu bathi: Lilani leN uNkulunkulu kaIsrayeli?

Ngoba iyenzile iJodani yaba ngumngcele phakathi kwethu lani, linabantwana bakoRubeni labantwana bakoGadi, kalilasabelo eNni. Ngalokho abantwana benu benze abantwana bethu ukuthi bayekele ukuyesaba iN.
Ngakho sathi: Kasizilungiseleni khathesi ukwakha ilathi, lingabi ngelomnikelo wokutshiswa, njalo lingabi ngelomhlatshelo,
kodwa libe yibufakazi langemihlatshelo yethu langeminikelo yethu yokuthula, ukuze abantwana benu bangathi ebantwaneni bethu kusasa: Kalilasabelo eNni.

Sasesisithi: Kuzakuthi-ke, nxa bekhuluma lokhukithi lesizukulwaneni sethu kusasa, sizakuthi: Bonani umfanekiso welathi leN obaba abalakhayo, kungeyisilo lomnikelo wokutshiswa lingeyisilo lomhlatshelo, kodwa liyibufakazi phakathi kwethu lani.

Kakube khatshana lathi ukuthi siyihlamuke iN, lokuthi siphenduke lamuhla ekuyilandeleni iN, ukwakha ilathi lomnikelo wokutshiswa lelomnikelo wokudla lelomhlatshelo, ngaphandle kwelathi leN uNkulunkulu wethu eliphambi kwethabhanekele layo.

Kwathi uPhinehasi umpristi lenduna zenhlangano lenhloko zezinkulungwane zakoIsrayeli ezazilaye bewezwa amazwi abantwana bakoRubeni labantwana bakoGadi labantwana bakoManase abawakhulumayo, kwakukuhle emehlweni abo.

UPhinehasi indodana kaEleyazare umpristi wasesithi kubantwana bakoRubeni lakubantwana bakoGadi lakubantwana bakoManase: Lamuhla siyazi ukuthi iphakathi kwethu, ngoba kaliphambekanga lesisiphambeko eNni; khathesi likhulule abantwana bakoIsrayeli esandleni seN.

UPhinehasi indodana kaEleyazare umpristi lezinduna basebebuyela bevela ebantwaneni bakoRubeni lebantwaneni bakoGadi elizweni leGileyadi, besiya elizweni leKhanani ebantwaneni bakoIsrayeli, babuyisela ilizwi kubo.

Lodaba lwaluluhle emehlweni abantwana bakoIsrayeli; abantwana bakoIsrayeli bambusisa uNkulunkulu, kabasakhulumanga ngo kwenyukela kubo empini ukuchitha ilizwe abantwana bakoRubeni labantwana bakoGadi ababehlala kulo.
Abantwana bakoRubeni labantwana bakoGadi balibiza ilathi ngokuthi: Liyibufakazi phakathi kwethu bokuthi inguNkulunkulu.
Kwasekusithi emva kwensuku ezinengi emva kokuthi isimphumuzile elensuku ezinengi,
uJoshuwa wabiza uIsrayeli wonke, wathi kubo: Mina sengimdala ngilensuku ezinengi.
Lina selibonile konke uNkulunkulu wenu ekwenzileyo kulezizizwe zonke ngenxa yenu, ngoba uNkulunkulu wenu yiyo elilweleyo.
Bonani, ngilabele ngenkatholapho okutshona khona ilanga.
uNkulunkulu wenu izazixotsha-ke.
Ngakho qinani kakhulu ukugcina lokwenza konke okubhaliweyo egwalweni lomlayo kaMozisi,
ukuze lingangeni kulezi izizwe, lingabakhonzi, lingakhothami kubo,
kodwa linamathele eNni uNkulunkulu wenu njengoba lenzile kuze kube lamuhla.
Ngoba ixotshile elifeni phambi kwenu izizwe ezinkulu lezilamandla kuze kube lamuhla.
Umuntu oyedwa kini uzaxotsha inkulungwane.
Ngakho ziqaphelisiseni ukuthanda uNkulunkulu wenu.
Ngoba uba libuyela lokubuyela, lingene kuzo, lazo kini,

yazini lokwazi ukuthi uNkulunkulu wenu kayiyikuqhubeka ngokuzixotsha elifeni lezizizwe phambi kwenu, zibe luswazi enhlangothini zenu, lameva emehlweni enu, lize libhubhe liphele kulelilizwe elihle, uNkulunkulu wenu elinike lona.
Khangelani-ke, ngihamba lamuhla ngendlela yomhlaba wonke; wonke ezile kini, akukho lelizwi elilodwa elehlulekayo kuwo.

Kuzakuthi-ke, njengalokhu zonke izinto ezinhle uNkulunkulu wenu eyazikhuluma kini sezilehlele, ngokunjalo izalehlisela zonke izinto ezimbi, ize ilibhubhise liphele kulelilizwe elihle uNkulunkulu wenu elinike lona.

Uba liseqa isivumelwano seN uNkulunkulu wenu eyalilaya sona, lisuke liyekhonza abanye onkulunkulu, likhothame kibo, khona ulaka lweN luzalivuthela, libhubhe masinyane liphele kulelilizwe elihle elinike lona.
UJoshuwa wasebuthanisa zonke izizwe zakoIsrayeli eShekema.
UJoshuwa wasesithi kubo bonke abantu: Itsho njalo iN, uNkulunkulu kaIsrayeli: Endulo oyihlo babehlala ngaphetsheya komfula, uTera uyise kaAbrahama loyise kaNahori, babekhonza abanye onkulunkulu.
Ngasengimthatha uyihlo uAbrahama ngimsusa ngaphetsheya komfula.
LakuIsaka nganika uJakobe loEsawu.
Ngasengithuma uMozisi loAroni, njengalokho engakwenzayo phakathi kwayo; lemva kwalokho ngalikhupha.
Ngasengibakhupha oyihlo eGibhithe.
Kwathi bekhala eNni.
Ngasengililetha elizweni lamaAmori ayehlala ngaphetsheya kweJodani, asesilwa lani, ngawanikela esandleni senu, lalidla ilifa lelizwe lawo, ngawachitha phambi kwenu.
UBalaki indodana kaZipori.
Kodwa kangithandanga ukulalela uBalami, ngasengilikhulula esandleni sakhe.
Lachapha iJodani, amaAmori, lamaPerizi, lamaKhanani, lamaHethi, lamaGirigashi, amaHivi, lamaJebusi; ngawanikela esandleni senu.
Ngathuma olonyovu phambi kwenu njalo hatshi ngedandili lakho.
Ngasengilinika ilizwe elingalisebenzelanga, lemizi elingayakhanga, lihlala kiyo. Lidla okwezivini lezivande zemihlwathi elingakuhlanyelanga.
Khathesi-ke yesabeni iN KOSI, njalo likhonze iN.
Uba-ke kukubi emehlweni enu ukuyikhonza iN, zikhetheleni lamuhla lowo elizamkhonza.
Basebephendula abantu besithi: Kakube khatshana lathi ukuthi sitshiye iN, sikhonze abanye onkulunkulu.

Ngoba uNkulunkulu wethu iyiyo eyasenyusayo labobaba sivela elizweni leGibhithe, endlini yobugqili, eyenza phambi kwamehlo ethu lezizibonakaliso ezinkulu, yasilondoloza endleleni yonke esahamba kiyo, laphakathi kwabo bonke abantu esedlule phakathi kwabo.
yasixotsha phambi kwethu zonke izizwe, lamaAmori ayehlala elizweni. Thina lathi sizayikhonza iN, ngoba inguNkulunkulu wethu.
UJoshuwa wasesithi ebantwini: Kalilakuyikhonza iN KOSI.
Uba liyitshiya iN KOSI, iliqede, emva kokuthi ilenzele okuhle.
Abantu basebesithi kuJoshuwa: Hatshi, kodwa sizayikhonza iN.
UJoshuwa wasesithi ebantwini: Lingabafakazi ngani ukuthi lina lizikhethele ukuyikhonza. Basebesithi: Si ngabafakazi.
Khathesi-ke, susani onkulunkulu abezizwe abaphakathi kwenu, lithobele inhliziyo yenu eNni, uNkulunkulu kaIsrayeli.
Abantu basebesithi kuJoshuwa: uNkulunkulu wethu sizayikhonza, lelizwi layo sililalele.
Ngakho uJoshuwa wasebenzela abantu isivumelwano ngalolosuku eShekema.
UJoshuwa wasebhala lawomazwi egwalweni lomlayo kaNkulunkulu elingasendlini engcwele yeN.
UJoshuwa wasesithi ebantwini bonke: Khangelani, lelilitshe lizakuba yibufakazi ngathi.
UJoshuwa wasebayekela abantu ukuthi bahambe, ngulowo lalowo waya elifeni lakhe.
Kwasekusithi emva kwalezizinto uJoshuwa indodana kaNuni, inceku yeN, wafa eleminyaka elikhulu letshumi.
Basebemngcwabela emngceleni welifa lakhe eThiminathi-Sera.
Njalo uIsrayeli wayikhonza zonke izinsuku zikaJoshuwa lazo zonke izinsuku zabadala abelula insuku emva kukaJoshuwa, njalo ababewazi wonke umsebenzi weN eyawenzela uIsrayeli.
Lamathambo kaJosefa ngenhlamvu zesiliva ezilikhulu; saba-ke yilifa labantwana bakoJosefa.
UEleyazare indodana kaAroni wasesifa, bamngcwaba eqaqeni lukaPhinehasi indodana yakhe.
Kwasekusithi emva kokufa kukaJoshuwa abantwana bakoIsrayeli babuza iN KOSI ukulwa emelene labo?
yasisithi: UJuda uzakwenyuka; khangelani, ngilinikele ilizwe esandleni sakhe.
UJuda wasesithi kuSimeyoni umfowabo: Yenyuka lami enkathweni yami ukuze silwe simelene lamaKhanani; lami-ke ngizahamba lawe enkathweni yakho. USimeyoni wasehamba laye.
UJuda wasesenyuka, njalo yanikela amaKhanani lamaPerizi esandleni sabo; bawatshaya eBezeki, amadoda azinkulungwane ezilitshumi.
Basebefica uAdoni-Bezeki eBezeki, balwa bemelene laye, bawatshaya amaKhanani lamaPerizi.
Kodwa uAdoni-Bezeki wabaleka, baxotshana laye, bambamba, baquma izithupha zezandla zakhe lamazwane akhe amakhulu.

UAdoni-Bezeki wasesithi: Amakhosi angamatshumi ayisikhombisa aqunywe izithupha zezandla zawo lezenyawo zawo ayedobha ngaphansi kwetafula lami. Njengokwenza kwami, ngokunjalo uNkulunkulu ungiphindisele. Basebemusa eJerusalema, wafela khona.
Abantwana bakoJuda balwa-ke bemelene leJerusalema, bayithumba, bayitshaya ngobukhali benkemba, lomuzi bawuthungela ngomlilo.
Emva kwalokho-ke abantwana bakoJuda behla ukuyakulwa bemelene lamaKhanani ayehlala entabeni leningizimu lesihotsheni.
UJuda wasehamba wamelana lamaKhanani ayehlala eHebroni loAhimani loTalimayi.
Basuka lapho baya bamelana labahlali beDebiri. Lebizo leDebiri kuqala kwakuyiKiriyathi-Seferi.
UKalebi wasesithi: Ozatshaya iKiriyathi-Seferi, ayithumbe, ngizamnika uAkisa indodakazi yami ibe ngumka khe.
UOthiniyeli indodana kaKenazi umfowabo kaKalebi, owayemncane kulaye, waseyithumba; wasemnika uAkisa indodakazi yakhe ukuba ngumka khe.
Kwasekusithi ekufikeni kwakhe wamkhuthaza ukuthi acele kuyise insimu; wasesehla kubabhemi, uKalebi wasesithi kuye: Ulani?
Wasesithi kuye: Ngipha isibusiso. Njengoba ungiphe ilizwe leningizimu, ngipha njalo imithombo yamanzi. UKalebi wasemnika imithombo engaphezulu lemithombo engaphansi.
Abantwana bomKeni.
UJuda wasehamba loSimeyoni umfowabo.
UJuda wasethumba iGaza lomngcele wayo.
yasisiba loJuda.
Basebenika uKalebi iHebroni, njengokutsho kukaMozisi; wasexotsha elifeni esuka lapho amadodana amathathu kaAnaki.
Kodwa abantwana bakoBhenjamini kabawaxotshanga elifeni amaJebusi ayehlala eJerusalema.
Lendlu kaJosefa, labo benyukela eBhetheli; njalo yayilabo.
Indlu kaJosefa yasithuma inhloli eBhetheli.
Abalindi basebebona umuntu ephuma emzini, bathi kuye: Akusitshengise indlela yokungena emzini, besesikwenzela umusa.
Esebatshengise indlela yokungena emzini, bawutshaya umuzi ngobukhali benkemba, kodwa lowomuntu losapho lwakhe lonke babayekela bahamba.
Lowomuntu wasesiya elizweni lamaHethi, wakha umuzi, wabiza ibizo lawo ngokuthiyiLuzi; yilelo ibizo lawo kuze kube lamuhla.

UManase kaxotshanga-ke iBeti-Sheyani lemizana yayo, leThahanakhi lemizana yayo, labahlali beDori lemizana yayo, labahlali beIbileyamu lemizana yayo, labahlali beMegido lemizana yayo; kodwa amaKhanani afuna ukuhlala kulelolizwe.
Kwasekusithi uIsrayeli eselamandla wawamisa amaKhanani kusibhalo, kodwa kawaxotshanga lokuwaxotsha elifeni.
UEfrayimi kawaxotshanga-ke elifeni amaKhanani ayehlala eGezeri.
UZebuluni kabaxotshanga elifeni abahlali beKitroni labahlali beNahaloli, kodwa amaKhanani ahlala phakathi kwabo, aba yizibhalwa.
UAsheri kabaxotshanga elifeni abahlali beAko labahlali beSidoni;
kodwa abakoAsheri bahlala phakathi kwamaKhanani abahlali belizwe, ngoba kabawaxotshanga elifeni.
UNafithali kabaxotshanga elifeni abahlali beBeti-Shemeshi.
AmaAmori asebafuqela abantwana bakoDani entabeni, ngoba kawabavumelanga ukwehlela esigodini.
Kodwa amaAmori ayefuna ukuhlala entabeni yeHeresi, kodwa isandla sendlu kaJosefa saba nzima, aba yizibhalwa.
Umngcele wamaAmori wawusukela emqansweni weAkirabimi, uvela edwaleni usiya phezulu.
Ingilosi yeN yasisenyuka isuka eGiligali isiya eBokimi lani kuze kube sephakadeni.
Lani-ke kaliyikwenza isivumelwano labahlali balelilizwe. Kuyini lokhu elikwenzileyo?
Ngakho lami ngathi: Kangiyikuzixotsha elifeni phambi kwenu, kodwa zizakuba njengamevaenhlangothini.
Kwasekusithi lapho ingilosi yeN isikhulume lamazwi kubo bonke abantwana bakoIsrayeli, abantu baphakamisa ilizwi labo bakhala inyembezi.
Basebebiza ibizo laleyondawo ngokuthiyiBokimi, bayihlabela lapho.
Kwathi uJoshuwa esebayekele abantu bahamba, abantwana bakoIsrayeli bahamba, ngulowo lalowo waya elifeni lakhe ukudla ilifa lelizwe.
Abantu basebeyikhonza kuzo zonke izinsuku zikaJoshuwa, lazo zonke izinsuku zabadala abasala bephila emva kukaJoshuwa, ababewubonile wonke umsebenzi omkhulu weN eyayiwenzele uIsrayeli.
UJoshuwa indodana kaNuni, inceku yeN, wafa-ke, eleminyaka elikhulu letshumi.
Basebemngcwabela emngceleni welifa lakhe eThiminathi-Heresi entabeni yakoEfrayimi, enyakatho kwentaba iGahashi.
Njalo lalesosizukulwana sabuthelwa kuboyise. Kwasekusukuma esinye isizukulwana emva kwabo esasingayazi njalo lomsebenzi eyayiwenzele uIsrayeli.
Abantwana bakoIsrayeli basebesenza okubi emehlweni eN, bakhonza oBhali.
Batshiya iN KOSI iN.
Bayidela iN, bakhonza uBhali laboAshitarothi.
Ngakho ulaka lweN lwavutha kuIsrayeli.
Loba bephuma besiya ngaphi, isandla seN samelana labo ngokubi, njengokutsho kweN lanjengokufunga kweN kibo, njalo bacindezeleka kakhulu.
yasimisa abahluleli ababophula esandleni salabo ababaphangayo.
Kanti kababalalelanga labahluleli babo, kodwa baphinga ngokulandela abanye onkulunkulu, belalela imilayo yeN. Bona kabenzanga njalo.
Lalapho ibamisela abahluleli, yayilomahluleli.

Kwasekusithi ekufeni kukamahluleli, babuyela emuva baxhwala okwedlula oyise, ngokulandela abanye onkulunkulu, ngokubakhonza langokubakhothamela; kabalahlanga okwemisebenzi yabo lokwendlela yabo yenkani.
Ngakho ulaka lweN lwavutha kuIsrayeli, kasilalelanga ilizwi lami,
lami kangisayikuxotsha loba ngubani elifeni phambi kwabo ezizweni uJoshuwa azitshiya ekufeni kwakhe,
ukuze ngihlole ngazo uIsrayeli ukuthi bazagcina yini indlela yeN ukuhamba kuyo njengaboyise ba yi gcina, kumbe hatshi.
Ngakho yaziyekela lezozizwe, ukuze ingazixotshi elifeni masinyane, njalo kayizinikelanga esandleni sikaJoshuwa.
Lalezi yizizwe eyazitshiyayo ukuze ihlole uIsrayeli ngazo, bonke abangazazanga zonke izimpi zeKhanani;
kuphela ukuze izizukulwana zabantwana bakoIsrayeli zazi, ukuzifundisa impi, kuphela abangazazanga phambili:
Amakhosi amahlanu amaFilisti, kusukela entabeni yeBhali-Hermoni kuze kube sekungeneni kweHamathi.
Zazingezokuhlola uIsrayeli ngazo ukwazi ukuthi bazayilalela yini imilayo yeN eyabalaya yona oyise ngesandla sikaMozisi.
Abantwana bakoIsrayeli bahlala-ke phakathi kwamaKhanani, amaHethi, lamaAmori, lamaPerizi, lamaHivi, lamaJebusi.
Basebethatha amadodakazi awo ukuba ngomkabo, lamadodakazi abo bawanika amadodana awo, bakhonza onkulunkulu bawo.
Abantwana bakoIsrayeli basebesenza okubi emehlweni eN KOSI.
Ngakho ulaka lweN lwavutha kuIsrayeli inkosi yeMesopotamiya. Abantwana bakoIsrayeli basebeyisebenzela inkosi uKushani-Rishathayimi iminyaka eyisificaminwembili.
Kwathi abantwana bakoIsrayeli bekhala eNni umfowabo kaKalebi ongumnawakhe.
Njalo uMoya weN wayephezu kwakhe, wahlulela uIsrayeli, waphuma impi, yanikela esandleni sakhe uKushani-Rishathayimi inkosi yeSiriya, lesandla sakhe saba lamandla phezu kukaKushani-Rishathayimi.
Lelizwe laba lokuthula iminyaka engamatshumi amane. UOthiniyeli indodana kaKenazi wasesifa.
Abantwana bakoIsrayeli basebebuya besenza okubi emehlweni eN KOSI, ngenxa yokuthi babenzile okubi emehlweni eN.
Wasezibuthela abantwana bakoAmoni.
Abantwana bakoIsrayeli basebesebenzela uEgiloni inkosi yakoMowabi iminyaka elitshumi leyisificaminwembili.
Kwathi abantwana bakoIsrayeli bekhala eNni.
UEhudi wasezenzela inkemba ebukhali inhlangothi ezimbili, ubude bayo buyingalo, wayibophela ngaphansi kwezigqoko zakhe ethangazini lakhe lokunene.
Wasondeza isipho kuEgiloni inkosi yakoMowabi. Njalo uEgiloni wayengumuntu okhulupheleyo kakhulu.
Kwasekusithi eseqedile ukusondeza isipho, wasephelekezela abantu ababethwele isipho.
Kodwa yena wabuyela emuva ezithombeni ezibaziweyo ezaziseGiligali, wathi: Nkosi, ngilendaba eyimfihlo kuwe. Yasisithi: Thula. Bonke ababemi laye basebephuma.
UEhudi wasesiza kuye ehlezi endlini ephezulu epholileyo eyayingeyakhe yedwa. UEhudi wathi: Ngilendaba kaNkulunkulu kuwe. Wasesukuma esihlalweni.
UEhudi waseselula isandla sakhe sokhohlo, wathatha inkemba ethangazini lakhe lokunene, wayithela esiswini sakhe,
kwaze kwangena lesilanda emva kobukhali, amahwahwa agubuzela ubukhali, ngoba kayingcothulanga inkemba esiswini sakhe, kwasekuphuma umswane.
UEhudi wasephuma ekhulusini, wavala iminyango yendlu ephezulu emva kwakhe.
Yena esephumile, kwafika izinceku zakhe; kwathi zibona, khangela-ke, iminyango yendlu ephezulu yayikhiyiwe, zathi: Sibili wembese inyawo zakhe endlini epholileyo.
Njalo zalinda zaze zaba lenhloni; khangela-ke kavulanga iminyango yendlu ephezulu; ngakho zathatha isihluthulelo zavula, khangela-ke, inkosi yazo yayiwele phansi ifile.
UEhudi wasephunyuka zisalibele, waphunyuka waya eSeyira.
Kwasekusithi ekufikeni kwakhe wavuthela uphondo. Abantwana bakoIsrayeli basebesehla laye ezintabeni, yena ephambi kwabo.
Wasesithi kibo: Landelani emva kwami, ngoba inikele izitha zenu amaMowabi esandleni senu, kabavumelanga muntu ukuchapha.
Basebebulala amaMowabi ngalesosikhathi angaba zinkulungwane ezilitshumi, amadoda wonke aqatha lawo wonke amadoda alamandla, njalo kakuphunyukanga muntu.
Ngalokho uMowabi wehliselwa phansi mhlalokho ngaphansi kwesandla sikaIsrayeli. Lelizwe laba lokuthula iminyaka engamatshumi ayisificaminwembili.
Lemva kwakhe kwaba loShamigari indodana kaAnathi, owatshaya amaFilisti amadoda angamakhulu ayisithupha ngocijo lwenkabi; laye wasemkhulula uIsrayeli.
Abantwana bakoIsrayeli basebebuya besenza okubi emehlweni eN esefile uEhudi.
yasibathengisa labezizwe.
Abantwana bakoIsrayeli basebekhala eNni iminyaka engamatshumi amabili.
UDebora umfazi owayengumprofethikazi umkaLapidothi yena wahlulela uIsrayeli ngalesosikhathi.
Wayehlala ngaphansi kwesihlahla selala sikaDebora phakathi kweRama. Abantwana bakoIsrayeli basebesenyukela kuye ukwahlulelwa.
Wasethuma wabiza uBaraki indodana kaAbinowama eKedeshi, uzithathele amadoda azinkulungwane ezilitshumi ebantwaneni bakoNafithali lebantwaneni bakoZebuluni?
Njalo ngizadonsela kuwe esifuleni iKishoni uSisera.
UBaraki wasesithi kuye: Uba uhamba lami, ngizahamba; kodwa uba ungahambi lami, kangiyikuhamba.
Wasesithi: Ngizahamba lokuhamba lawe, kodwa udumo kaluyikuba ngolwakho ngendlela ohamba ngayo, ngoba izathengisa uSisera esandleni sowesifazana. Wasesukuma uDebora, wahamba loBaraki waya eKedeshi.
UBaraki wasebizela oZebuluni loNafithali, loDebora wenyuka laye.
UHeberi umKeni eseduze leKedeshi.
Basebebikela uSisera ukuthi uBaraki indodana kaAbinowama usenyukele entabeni yeThabhori.
USisera wasebiza zonke izinqola zakhe, inqola ezingamakhulu ayisificamunwemunye zensimbi, labo bonke abantu ababelaye, kusukela eHaroshethi labezizwe kuze kufike esifuleni iKishoni.
UDebora wasesithi kuBaraki: Vuka! Ngoba yilo lolusuku enikele ngalo uSisera esandleni sakho lamadoda azinkulungwane ezilitshumi ngemva kwakhe.
yasimsanganisa uSisera lazo zonke izinqola lebutho lonke ngobukhali benkemba phambi kukaBaraki, kwaze kwathi uSisera wehla enqoleni wabaleka ngenyawo zakhe.
UBaraki wasexotshana lezinqola lebutho, waze wafika eHaroshethi labezizwe; ibutho lonke likaSisera laselisiwa ngobukhali benkemba; kakusalanga loyedwa.
Kodwa uSisera wabaleka ngenyawo zakhe waya ethenteni likaJayeli umkaHeberi umKeni, ngoba kwakulokuthula phakathi kukaJabini inkosi yeHazori lendlu kaHeberi umKeni.
UJayeli wasephuma ukuhlangabeza uSisera, wathi kuye: Phambuka, nkosi yami, phambukela kimi, ungesabi. Wasephambukela kuye ethenteni, wamembesa ngengubo.
Wasesithi kuye: Akunginathise amanzi amalutshwana ngoba ngomile. Wasesibukula igula lochago, wamnathisa, wamembesa.
Wasesithi kuye: Mana emnyango wethente; kuzakuthi-ke, uba kufika umuntu kuwe ekubuza esithi: Kulomuntu lapha yini? Uzakuthi: Kakulamuntu.

Kodwa uJayeli umkaHeberi wathatha isikhonkwane sethente, wafaka isando esandleni sakhe, wamnyenyela, wabethela isikhonkwane enhlafunweni yakhe sangena emhlabathini, ngoba yena wayelele ubuthongo obukhulu, ediniwe, wasesifa.

Khangela-ke, uBaraki waxotsha uSisera; uJayeli wasephuma ukumhlangabeza wathi kuye: Woza, ngizakutshengisa umuntu omdingayo. Wasengena e thente ni lakhe, khangela-ke, uSisera wayelele efile, lesikhonkwane sasisenhlafunweni yakhe.
Ngakho ngalolosuku uNkulunkulu wamehlisela phansi uJabini inkosi yeKhanani phambi kwabantwana bakoIsrayeli.
Isandla sabantwana bakoIsrayeli saqhubeka-ke saba nzima phezu kukaJabini inkosi yeKhanani, baze bamchitha uJabini inkosi yeKhanani.
UDebora loBaraki indodana kaAbinowama basebehlabela ngalolosuku besithi:
Ngenxa yokuphindisela kwezimpindiselo koIsrayeli, busisani iN!
Zwanini makhosi, libeke indlebe ziphathamandla, mina, mina ngizahlabela eNni, ngihubele iN, uNkulunkulu kaIsrayeli.
N, ekuphumeni kwakho eSeyiri, lamazulu athonta, lamayezi athontisa amanzi.
Izintaba zageleza phambi kweN KOSI le phambi kweN, uNkulunkulu kaIsrayeli.
Ensukwini zikaShamigari indodana kaAnathi, lababehamba ezindledlaneni bahamba ngezindlela ezimazombazombe.
Izakhamizi zemakhaya zaphela koIsrayeli, zaphela, ngaze ngasukuma mina Debora, ngasukuma, unina koIsrayeli.
Wakhetha onkulunkulu abatsha phakathi kwabazinkulungwane ezingamatshumi amane koIsrayeli?
Inhliziyo yami ikubanikimithetho bakoIsrayeli, abazinikela ngokuzithandela phakathi kwabantu. Busisani iN!
Bagadi babobabhemi abamhlophe, labahambi endleleni, khulumani.
Elizwini labatshoki, phakathi kwezindawo zokukha amanzi. Ngalesosikhathi abantu beN behlela emasangweni.
Vuka, ndodana kaAbinowama.
Khona yayenza insali yabusa phezu kwezinduna ebantwini; yangenza ngabusa phezu kwabalamandla.
Kuvela koEfrayimi, lakoZebuluni abadonsa ngentonga yombhali.
Leziphathamandla zakoIsakari zaziloDebora; la njengo Isakari, waba njalo uBaraki; wathunjwa esigodini ngenyawo zakhe. Ekwehlukaneni kukaRubeni izinqumo zenhliziyo zazizinkulu.
Wahlalelani phakathi kwezibaya? Izifunda zakoRubeni zaba lokuhlolwa okukhulu kwenhliziyo.
UGileyadi wahlala ngaphetsheya kweJodani, wahlala ethekwini.
UZebuluni uyisizwe esadela umphefumulo waso kwaze kwaba sekufeni, loNafithali, emiqolweni yensimu.
Amakhosi afika alwa; khona amakhosi eKhanani alwa eThahanakhi.
Zisemazulwini zalwa, inkanyezi zisendleleni zazo zalwa loSisera.
Isifula iKishoni sabakhukhula, isifula sendulo, isifula iKishoni. Mphefumulo wami, unyathela ngamandla!
Khona atshaya phansi amasondo amabhiza, ngokumatha, ukumatha kwabalamandla bakhe.
Qalekisani iMerozi, kutsho ingilosi yeN, qalekisani ngokuqalekisa abakhileyo kuyo, ngoba kabezanga, kuncedo lweN, lamaqhawe.
Uzabusiswa phezu kwabesifazana uJayeli umkaHeberi umKeni; ubusisiwe phezu kwabesifazana ethenteni.
Wacela amanzi, wa m nika uchago, waletha amasi ngomganu wobukhosi.
Welulela isandla sakhe esikhonkwaneni, lesandla sakhe sokunene esandweni sezisebenzi, wamtshaya uSisera, wachoboza ikhanda lakhe, wahlaba wabhoboza inhlafuno yakhe.
Phakathi laphakathi kwenyawo zakhe wakhothama wawa walala; phakathi laphakathi kwenyawo zakhe wakhothama wawa, lapho akhothamela khona, wawa lapho efile echithekile.
Unina kaSisera walunguza ngewindi? Kungani ephuzile amavili ezinqola zakhe?
Izihlakaniphi zamakhosazana akhe zaphendula, yebo yena wazibuyisela impendulo yakhe wathi:

Kabatholanga yini bayaba impango, intombazana, amantombazana amabili kuleyo laleyondoda, impango yamalembu aconjiweyo kaSisera, impango yamalembu aconjiweyo afekethisiweyo ngenalithi, amalembu amabili aconjiweyo afekethisiweyo ngenalithi, awentamo zomphangi?
Ngokunjalo kazibhubhe zonke izitha zakho.
Abantwana bakoIsrayeli basebesenza okubi emehlweni eN KOSI iminyaka eyisikhombisa.
Lesandla sikaMidiyani saba lamandla phezu kukaIsrayeli. Ngenxa kaMidiyani, lezinqaba.
Kwasekusithi uIsrayeli esehlanyele, enyuka amaMidiyani, benyuka bamelana labo,
bamisa inkamba maqondana labo, bachitha izithelo zelizwe, njalo kabatshiyanga okondlayo koIsrayeli loba imvu loba inkabi loba ubabhemi.
Ngoba bona benyuka lezifuyo zabo lamathente abo, bafika njengokugcwala kwentethe ngobunengi, okokuthi bona lamakamela abo babengelanani; basebengena elizweni ukulichitha.
UIsrayeli wasesiba ngumyanga kakhulu ngenxa yamaMidiyani, labantwana bakoIsrayeli bakhala eNni.
Kwasekusithi lapho abantwana bakoIsrayeli bekhala eNni,
yathuma umprofethi kubantwana bakoIsrayeli, owathi kibo: Itsho njalo iN, uNkulunkulu wakoIsrayeli: Mina ngalenyusa lisuka eGibhithe ngalikhupha endlini yobugqili,
ngalihluthuna esandleni samaGibhithe, lesandleni sabo bonke abalicindezelayo, ngabaxotsha phambi kwenu, ngalinika ilizwe labo,
ngathi kini: NgiyuNkulunkulu wenu; lingesabi onkulunkulu bamaAmori elihlala elizweni lawo. Kodwa kalililalelanga ilizwi lami.
Kwasekufika ingilosi yeN, yahlala ngaphansi kwesihlahla se-okhi esiseOfira, esasingesikaJowashi umAbiyezeri.
Ingilosi yeN yasibonakala kuye, qhawe elilamandla.
UGidiyoni wasesithi kuyo: Hawu Nkosi yami, uba ilathi, kungani konke lokhu kusehlele.
yasiphendukela kuye yathi: Hamba ngalamandla akho?
Wasesithi kuyo: Hawu Nkosi yami, ngizamkhulula ngani uIsrayeli? Khangela, usendo lwami lungumyanga koManase, njalo ngingomncinyane endlini kababa.
yasisithi kuye: Ngoba ngizakuba lawe njengendodanye.
Wasesithi kuyo: Uba khathesi ngithole umusa emehlweni akho sokuthi nguwe okhuluma lami.
Ake ungasuki lapha, ngize ngibuye kuwe, ngikhuphe isipho sami, ngisibeke phambi kwakho. Yasisithi: Mina ngizahlala uze uphenduke.

UGidiyoni wasengena, walungisa izinyane lembuzi, lezinkwa ezingelamvubelo nge-efa lempuphu, inyama wayifaka esitsheni, lomhluzi wawufaka embizeni, wakukhuphela kuyo ngaphansi kwesihlahla se-okhi, wakusondeza.
Ingilosi kaNkulunkulu yasisithi kuye: Thatha inyama lezinkwa ezingelamvubelo, ukubeke phezu kwalelidwala. Wasesenza njalo.

Ingilosi yeN yasiselula isihloko somqwayi owawusesandleni sayo, yathinta inyama lezinkwa ezingelamvubelo; kwasekusenyuka umlilo uphuma edwaleni, wadla inyama lezinkwa ezingelamvubelo. Lengilosi yeN yasuka emehlweni akhe.
UGidiyoni wasebona ukuthi yayiyingilosi yeN KOSI.
Kodwa yathi kuye: Ukuthula kakube kuwe, ungesabi, kawuyikufa.
UGidiyoni waseyakhela ilathi lapho, walibiza ngokuthi uJehova-shalomi. Kuze kube lamuhla lisesekhona eOfira lamaAbiyezeri.

Kwasekusithi ngalobobusuku yathi kuye: Thatha ijongosi lenkunzi engekayihlo, ngitsho ijongosi lesibili elileminyaka eyisikhombisa, udilize ilathi likaBhali elingelikayihlo, lesixuku esiphansi kwalo usigamule;
wakhele uNkulunkulu wakho ilathi phezu kwengqonga yalinqaba, njengokwejwayelekileyo; ubusuthatha ijongosi lesibili, unikele umnikelo wokutshiswa ngenkuni zesixuku ozasigamula.
UGidiyoni wasethatha amadoda alitshumi ezincekwini zakhe, wenza njengokutsho kweN kuye; kodwa kwathi ngenxa yokuthi wayesesaba indlu kayise lamadoda omuzi ukukwenza emini, wakwenza ebusuku.
Lapho amadoda omuzi evuka ekuseni kakhulu, khangela, ilathi likaBhali lalidiliziwe, lesixuku esasiphansi kwalo sesiganyuliwe, lejongosi lesibili lanikelwa phezu kwelathi elaselakhiwe.
Basebesithi omunye komunye: Ngubani owenze loludaba? Nxa sebedingile bebuza bathi: UGidiyoni indodana kaJowashi wenze loludaba.
Amadoda omuzi asesithi kuJowashi: Khupha indodana yakho ukuze ife, ngoba idilizile ilathi likaBhali, langoba igamule isixuku esasiphansi kwalo.
Kodwa uJowashi wathi kubo bonke ababemi ngakuye: Lina lizamlwela uBhali yini, kumbe lina limsindise? Omlwelayo uzabulawa kusesekuseni. Uba engunkulunkulu, kazilwele, ngoba ilathi lakhe lidiliziwe.
Ngakho ngalolosuku wambiza ngokuthinguJerubali, esithi: UBhali kalwe laye, ngoba ulidilizile ilathi lakhe.
Lawo wonke amaMidiyani lamaAmaleki labantwana bempumalanga.
LoMoya weN wembesa uGidiyoni, lamaAbiyezeri abizwa emva kwakhe.
Wasethuma izithunywa kuye wonke uManase, labo futhi babizwa emva kwakhe. Wasethuma izithunywa koAsheri lakoZebuluni lakoNafithali; basebesiza ukubahlangabeza.
UGidiyoni wasesithi kuNkulunkulu: Uba uzasindisa uIsrayeli ngesandla sami njengokutsho kwakho,

khangela, ngizabeka uboya bezimvu obugundiweyo ebaleni lokubhulela; uba amazolo ezakuba phezu koboya obugundiweyo kuphela, lokoma emhlabathini wonke, ngizakwazi-ke ukuthi uzamsindisa uIsrayeli ngesandla sami, njengokutsho kwakho.
Kwasekusiba njalo. Lapho evuka ngovivi kusisa, wacindezela uboya obugundiweyo, wakhama amazolo eboyeni obugundiweyo, umganu ogcwele amanzi.

UGidiyoni wasesithi kuNkulunkulu: Ulaka lwakho lungangivutheli, ngizakhuluma khathesi kuphela; ake ngihlole khathesi kuphela ngoboya obugundiweyo; ake kube lokoma eboyeni obugundiweyo kuphela, lemhlabathini wonke kakube lamazolo.
UNkulunkulu wasesenza njalo ngalobobusuku; ngoba kwaba lokoma eboyeni obugundiweyo kuphela, kodwa emhlabathini wonke kwaba lamazolo.
UJerubali.
yasisithi kuGidiyoni: Abantu abalawe banengi kakhulu ukuthi nginikele amaMidiyani esandleni sabo, hlezi uIsrayeli azidumise emelene lami, esithi: Isandla sami singisindisile.

Ngakho khathesi memezela-ke endlebeni zabantu usithi: Loba ngubani owesabayo kaphenduke asuke masinyane entabeni yeGileyadi. Ngakho kwaphenduka ebantwini abazinkulungwane ezingamatshumi amabili lambili, lenkulungwane ezilitshumi zasala.

yasisithi kuGidiyoni: Abantu basesebanengi kakhulu; behlisele emanzini, ngizakuhlolela bona khona; kuzakuthi-ke lowo engizakuthi ngaye kuwe: Lo uzahamba lawe, yena uzahamba lawe; kodwa loba ngubani engizakuthi ngaye kuwe: Lo kayikuhamba lawe, yena kayikuhamba.
Wasebehlisela abantu emanzini. yasisithi kuGidiyoni: Wonke oxhapha emanzini ngolimi lwakhe njengenja ixhapha, uzambeka yedwa, laye wonke oguqa ngamadolo akhe ukunatha.
Lenani lalabo abaxhaphayo ngesandla sabo besisa emlonyeni wabo babengamadoda angamakhulu amathathu, kodwa bonke abaseleyo babantu baguqa ngamadolo abo ukunatha amanzi.
yasisithi kuGidiyoni: Ngamadoda angamakhulu amathathu axhaphileyo ngizalisindisa, nginikele amaMidiyani esandleni sakho; bayekele-ke bonke abantu bahambe, ngulowo lalowo endaweni yakhe.

Ngakho abantu bathatha umphako esandleni sabo, lempondo zabo. Wasewayekela wonke amadoda akoIsrayeli ahamba, ngulowo ethenteni lakhe, kodwa wagcina amadoda angamakhulu amathathu. Lenkamba yamaMidiyani yaba ngaphansi kwakhe esigodini.
Kwasekusithi ngalobobusuku.
Kodwa uba usesaba ukwehla, yehla wena loPura inceku yakho uye enkambeni.
Uzakuzwa abakukhulumayo; lemva kwalokho izandla zakho zizaqiniswa ukuze wehlele enkambeni. Wasesehla yena loPura ijaha lakhe, baya ephethelweni labangamatshumi amahlanu ababesenkambeni.
Njalo amaMidiyani lamaAmaleki labo bonke abantwana bempumalanga.

Kwathi uGidiyoni efika, khangela umuntu elandisela umngane wakhe iphupho, wathi: Khangela, ngiphuphe iphupho, khangela-ke, iqebelengwana lesinkwa sebhali ligiqikela enkambeni yamaMidiyani, lafika ethenteni, lalitshaya lawa laligenqula lakhangela phezulu, okokuthi ithente lawa.
Umngane wakhe wasephendula wathi: Lokhu kakusilutho ngaphandle kwenkemba kaGidiyoni indodana kaJowashi, indoda yakoIsrayeli. UNkulunkulu unikele esandleni sakhe iMidiyani lenkamba yonke.
Kwasekusithi uGidiyoni esezwe ukulandiswa kwephupho lengcazelo yalo, wakhonza, wabuyela enkambeni yakoIsrayeli, wathi: Vukani, ngoba inikele esandleni senu inkamba yamaMidiyani.
Wasesehlukanisa amadoda angamakhulu amathathu, aba yizigaba ezintathu, wanika impondo esandleni sawo wonke, lenqayi ezingelalutho, lezihlanti phakathi kwezinqayi.
Wasesithi kuwo: Ngikhangelani, lenze njalo. Khangelani-ke, nxa ngifika ephethelweni lenkamba, kuzakuthi njengokwenza kwami lenze njalo.
Nxa ngivuthela impondo, mina labo bonke abalami, lapho lani lizavuthela izimpondo, lihanqe inkamba yonke, lithi: OweN lokaGidiyoni!

Ngakho uGidiyoni lamadoda alikhulu ayelaye bafika ephethelweni lenkamba ekuqaleni komlindo wobusuku waphakathi, sebesanda ukumisa nje abalindi; basebevuthela impondo, babulala izinqayi ezazisesandleni sabo.
Lezigaba ezintathu zavuthela izimpondo, zabulala izinqayi, zaphatha esandleni sazo sekhohlo izihlanti lesandleni sazo sokunene impondo zokuvuthelwa, zamemeza zisithi: Inkemba yeN lekaGidiyoni!
Zasezisima yamemeza yabaleka.
Lapho abangamakhulu amathathu bevuthela impondo eduze kweTabathi.
Lamadoda akoIsrayeli abizelwa ndawonye lakoAsheri lakoManase wonke, axotshana lamaMidiyani.
UGidiyoni wasethuma izithunywa kuyo yonke intaba yakoEfrayimi.
Athumba iziphathamandla ezimbili eMidiyani, loZebi ambulala esikhamelweni sewayini seZebi, axotshana lamaMidiyani; aletha amakhanda aboOrebi loZebi kuGidiyoni ngaphetsheya kweJodani.
Amadoda akoEfrayimi asesithi kuye: Iyini linto oyenze kithi ukuthi awusibizanga nxa usiya ukulwa lamaMidiyani? Amsola ngamandla.
Wasesithi kiwo: Ngenzeni khathesi njengani? Ukudojwa kwezithelo eziseleyo koEfrayimi kakukuhle yini kulesivuno sevini sakoAbiyezeri?
UNkulunkulu unikele esandleni senu iziphathamandla zeMidiyani lapho ekhuluma lelilizwi.
Lapho uGidiyoni efika eJodani wachapha, yena lamadoda angamakhulu amathathu ayelaye, bediniwe kodwa bexotsha.
Wasesithi emadodeni eSukothi amaqebelengwana ezinkwa, ngoba badiniwe, ngixotshana loZeba loZalimuna amakhosi eMidiyani.
Lenduna zeSukothi zathi: Intende yesandla sikaZeba loZalimuna isisesandleni sakho yini, ukuthi siphe ibutho lakho isinkwa?
UGidiyoni wasesithi: Ngakho nxa isinikele uZeba loZalimuna esandleni sami, ngizabhula inyama yenu ngameva enkangala langokhula oluhlabayo.
Wasesenyuka lapho waya ePenuweli, wakhuluma labo ngokufananayo; lamadoda ePenuweli amphendula njengamadoda eSukothi abephendulile.
Wasekhuluma futhi emadodeni ePenuweli esithi: Ekubuyeni kwami ngokuthula.

Njalo uZeba loZalimuna babeseKarikori lenkamba yabo ilabo, phose inkulungwane ezilitshumi lanhlanu, bonke ababesele ebuthweni, ngoba ababewile babengamadoda azinkulungwane ezilikhulu lamatshumi amabili abahwatsha inkemba.
UGidiyoni wasesenyuka ngendlela yabahlala emathenteni empumalanga kweNoba leJogibeha.
UZeba loZalimuna basebebaleka, wasexotshana labo, wathumba amakhosi amabili eMidiyani, uZeba loZalimuna, wethusa inkamba yonke.
Lapho uGidiyoni indodana kaJowashi esebuya evela empini phambi kokuphuma kwelanga,
wabamba ijaha emadodeni eSukothi, walibuza; laselimbhalela iziphathamandla zeSukothi labadala bayo, amadoda angamatshumi ayisikhombisa lesikhombisa.

Wasefika emadodeni eSukothi, wathi: Khangelani oZeba loZalimuna elalingiklolodela ngabo lisithi: Intende yesandla sikaZeba loZalimuna isisesandleni sakho yini, ukuthi siphe amadoda akho asediniwe isinkwa?
Wasethatha abadala bomuzi, lameva enkangala lokhula oluhlabayo, wenza amadoda eSukothi aqedisise ngawo.
Lomphotshongo wePenuweli wawudiliza, wabulala amadoda omuzi.
Wasesithi kuZeba lakuZalimuna: Ngamadoda anjani elawabulala eThabhori? Basebesithi: Njengawe babenjalo, ngulowo njengesimo sendodana yenkosi.
Wasesithi: Babengabafowethu, abantwana bakamama. Kuphila kukaJehova, uba belibayekele baphila, bengingayikulibulala.
Wasesithi kuJetheri izibulo lakhe: Sukuma ubabulale. Kodwa umfana kayihwatshanga inkemba yakhe, ngoba wayesesaba ngoba esesengumfana.

UZeba loZalimuna basebesithi: Sukuma wena uwele phezu kwethu, ngoba njengoba injalo indoda, anjaloamandla ayo. Wasesukuma uGidiyoni wabulala uZeba loZalimuna. Wasethatha izinyangana ezazisentanyeni zamakamela abo.
Amadoda akoIsrayeli asesithi kuGidiyoni: Sibuse, wena-ke, lendodana yakho, lendodana yendodana yakho, ngoba usisindisile esandleni samaMidiyani.
Kodwa uGidiyoni wathi kibo: Mina kangiyikulibusa, lendodana yami kayiyikulibusa; izalibusa.
UGidiyoni wasesithi kibo: Ake ngicele isicelo kini; nginikani ngamunye icici lempango.
Basebesithi: Sizanika lokunika. Basebesendlala isembatho, baphosela lapho ngamunye icici lempango yakhe.
Lesisindo samacici egolide ayewacelile sasingama shekeliegolide ayinkulungwane lamakhulu ayisikhombisa, ngaphandle kwezinyangana.
UGidiyoni wasesenza i-efodi lendlu yakhe.
Ngokunjalo amaMidiyani ehliselwa phansi phambi kwabantwana bakoIsrayeli, kawaphindanga aphakamisa ikhanda lawo. Lelizwe laba lokuthula iminyaka engamatshumi amane ensukwini zikaGidiyoni.
UJerubali indodana kaJowashi wayahlala-ke endlini yakhe.
Njalo uGidiyoni wayelamadodana angamatshumi ayisikhombisa aphuma okhalweni lwakhe, ngoba wayelabafazi abanengi.
Lomfazi wakhe omncane owayeseShekema laye wamzalela indodana, wayitha ibizo lokuthinguAbhimeleki.
UGidiyoni indodana kaJowashi wasesifa eseluphele kuhle.
Kwasekusithi lapho uGidiyoni esefile waba ngunkulunkulu.
Njalo abantwana bakoIsrayeli kabayikhumbulanga uNkulunkulu wabo eyabophula esandleni sezitha zabo zonke inhlangothi zonke.
Kabenzanga umusa endlini kaJerubali, ong uGidiyoni, njengakho konke okuhle akwenza kuIsrayeli.
UAbhimeleki indodana kaJerubali wasesiya eShekema kubafowabo bakanina, wakhuluma kibo lakusendo lonke lwendlu kayise kanina, esithi:
Ake likhulume endlebeni zabo bonke abahlali beShekema.
Labafowabo bakanina bamkhulumela ezindlebeni zabo bonke abahlali beShekema wonke la amazwi.
Bamnika inhlamvu zesiliva ezingamatshumi ayisikhombisa ezavela endlini kaBhali-Berithi abamlandelayo.
Wasesiya endlini kayise eOfira, amadoda angamatshumi ayisikhombisa, phezu kwedwala elilodwa; kodwa uJothamu indodana elicinathunjana kaJerubali wasala, ngoba wacatsha.
Labo bonke abahlali beShekema.
Lapho bemtshela uJothamu, wayakuma phezu kwengqonga yentaba yeGerizimi ukuze uNkulunkulu alizwe.
Izihlahla zahamba lokuhamba ukuzigcobela inkosi.
Kodwa isihlahla somhlwathi sathi kuzo: Kambe ngizatshiya amafutha ami abadumisa ngawo uNkulunkulu labantu ngami, ukuze ngiyezunguza phezu kwezihlahla?
