Kuze kube lamuhla benza njengemikhuba yakuqala. Kabayesabi iN, kabenzi njengezimiso zabo lanjengezimiselo zabo lanjengomlayo lanjengomthetho eyakulaya abantwana bakaJakobe, owamutha ibizo elithi uIsrayeli.
eyenza isivumelwano labo, yabalaya isithi: Kaliyikwesaba abanye onkulunkulu, lingabakhothameli, lingabasebenzeli, lingabahlabeli.
Kodwa eyalenyusa elizweni leGibhithe ngamandla amakhulu langengalo eyeluliweyo, yona lizayesaba njalo yona lizayikhothamela njalo yona lizayihlabela.
Lezimiso lezimiselo lomlayo lomthetho eyalibhalela khona, lizaqaphelisa ukukwenza zonke izinsuku, lingesabi abanye onkulunkulu.
Lesivumelwano engasenza lani lingasikhohlwa, lingesabi abanye onkulunkulu.
Kodwa uNkulunkulu wenu lizayesaba; yona-ke izalikhulula esandleni sezitha zenu zonke.
Loba kunjalo kabalalelanga, kodwa benza njengomkhuba wabo wakuqala.
Lezizizwe zayesaba-ke iN, kodwa zakhonza izithombe zazo ezibaziweyo; bobabili abantwana bazo labantwana babantwana bazo, njengokwenza kwaboyise benza la bo kuze kube lamuhla.
Kwasekusithi ngomnyaka wesithathu kaHosheya indodana kaEla.
Wayeleminyaka engamatshumi amabili lanhlanu lapho esiba yinkosi; wabusa iminyaka engamatshumi amabili lesificamunwemunye eJerusalema. Lebizo likanina lalinguAbhi indodakazi kaZekhariya.
Wasesenza okulungileyo emehlweni eN njengakho konke uDavida uyise akwenzayo.
Yena wasusa indawo eziphakemeyo, wabhidliza insika eziyizithombe; wayibiza ngokuthinguNehushitani.
Wathembela eNni, uNkulunkulu kaIsrayeli.
Ngoba wanamathela eNni, kaphambukanga ekuyilandeleni, kodwa wagcina imilayo yayo eyayilaya uMozisi.
LeN yaba laye.
Yena watshaya amaFilisti waze wafika eGaza lemingcele yayo.

Kwasekusithi ngomnyaka wesine wenkosi uHezekhiya, owawungumnyaka wesikhombisa kaHosheya indodana kaEla, inkosi yakoIsrayeli, uShalimaneseri inkosi yeAsiriya wenyuka wamelana leSamariya, wayivimbezela.
Basebeyithumba ekupheleni kweminyaka emithathu. Ngomnyaka wesithupha kaHezekhiya, owawungumnyaka wesificamunwemunye kaHosheya inkosi yakoIsrayeli, iSamariya yathunjwa.
Inkosi yeAsiriya yathumbela uIsrayeli eAsiriya, yababeka eHala leHabori umfula weGozani, lemizi niyamaMede.
Ngoba bengalilalelanga ilizwi leN uNkulunkulu wabo.
Langomnyaka wetshumi lane wenkosi uHezekhiya, uSenakheribi inkosi yeAsiriya wenyuka wamelana layo yonke imizi yakoJuda ebiyelweyo, wayithumba.
UHezekhiya inkosi yakoJuda wasethumela enkosini yeAsiriya eLakishi.
UHezekhiya wase m nika sonke isiliva esatholakala endlini kaJehova lenothweni yendlu yenkosi.
Ngalesosikhathi uHezekhiya waquma igolide e zivalw enizethempeli leN, l e migubazi niuHezekhiya inkosi yakoJuda ayekunamathisele, walinika inkosi yeAsiriya.
Inkosi yeAsiriya.
Sebebize inkosi, kwaphumela kibo uEliyakhimi indodana kaHilikhiya owayengumphathi wendlu.
URabi-Shake wasesithi kibo: Khulumani khathesi kuHezekhiya: Itsho njalo inkosi enkulu, inkosi yeAsiriya ithi: Yisibindi bani lesi, othembela kuso?
Uthi, kodwa yilizwi lendebe nje: Kulecebo lamandla empi. Usuthembe bani ukuthi ungivukele?

Khangela-ke, wena uthembele odondolweni lomhlanga owephukileyo, oluy iGibhithe, uba umuntu eseyama phezu kwalo, luzangena esandleni sakhe lusihlabe. Unjalo uFaro inkosi yeGibhithe kubo bonke abathembela kuye.

Kodwa uba lisithi kimi: ENni uNkulunkulu wethu siyathemba; angithi yiyo elezindawo zayo eziphakemeyo lamalathi ayo uHezekhiya awasusileyo, wathi kuJuda leJerusalema: Phambi kwalelilathi lizakhonza eJerusalema?
Ngakho-ke, akunike isibambiso enkosini yami, inkosi yeAsiriya, njalo ngizakunika amabhiza azinkulungwane ezimbili, uba wena ulakho ukunika abagadi bawo.
Pho, uzabuyisela emuva njani ubuso benduna eyodwa yabancinyane nje benceku zenkosi yami; wena-ke uthembele eGibhithe ngezinqola labagadi bamabhiza?
Kambe ngenyukile yini ukumelana lalindawo ngingelaJehova ukuyichitha? UJehova uthe kimi: Yenyuka umelane lalelilizwe, ulichithe.
UEliyakhimi indodana kaHilikhiya loShebina loJowa basebesithi kuRabi-Shake: Akukhulume lenceku zakho ngesiSiriya, ngoba siyasizwa; ungakhulumi lathi ngesiJuda endlebeni zabantu abasemdulini.

Kodwa uRabi-Shake wathi kubo: Inkosi yami ingithumile yini enkosini yakho lakuwe ukukhuluma lamazwi? Kakusebantwini yini abahlezi phezu komduli ukuze badle ubulongwe babo, banathe umchamo wabo kanye lani?
URabi-Shake wasesima wamemeza ngelizwi elikhulu ngesiJuda, wakhuluma esithi: Zwanini ilizwi lenkosi enkulu, inkosi yeAsiriya.
Itsho njalo inkosi: UHezekhiya, ngoba kayikuba lakho ukulikhulula esandleni sayo.
Njalo uHezekhiya angalenzi lithembele eNni esithi: izasikhulula lokusikhulula, lalumuzi kawuyikunikelwa esandleni senkosi yeAsiriya.

Lingamlaleli uHezekhiya, ngoba itsho njalo inkosi yeAsiriya: Yenzani isivumelwano sokuthula lami, liphume lize kimi; dlanini-ke, ngulowo lalowo okw evini lakhe langulowo lalowo ok omkhiwa wakhe, linathe, ngulowo lalowo amanzi omthombo wakhe;

ngize ngifike ngilithathe ngilise elizweni elifanana lelizwe lakini, ilizwe lamabele lewayini elitsha, ilizwe lesinkwa lezivini, ukuze liphile lingafi. Lingamlaleli uHezekhiya ngoba eliyenga esithi: izasikhulula.
Onkulunkulu bezizwe sebake bawakhulula yini ngulowo lalowo ilizwe lakhe esandleni senkosi yeAsiriya?
Bangaphi onkulunkulu? Bangaphi onkulunkulu beSefavayimi, beHena, leIva? Kambe bayikhulule yini iSamariya esandleni sami?
Ngobani kubo bonke onkulunkulu balawomazwe abakhulule ilizwe labo esandleni sami, ukuthi ikhulule iJerusalema esandleni sami?
Kodwa abantu bathula, kabaze bamphendula lalizwi, ngoba umlayo wenkosi wawuyikuthi: Lingamphenduli.
UEliyakhimi indodana kaHilikhiya.
Kwasekusithi lapho inkosi uHezekhiya isizwile, yadabula izigqoko zayo.
Yasithuma uEliyakhimi owayephezu kwendlu, loShebina umabhalane, labadala babapristi, bembeswe ngamasaka.
Basebesithi kuye: Utsho njalo uHezekhiya: Lolusuku lusuku lohlupho lolokusolwa lolokweyiswa; ngoba abantwana sebefikile emlonyeni wesizalo, kanti kakulamandla okubeletha.
Mhlawumbe uNkulunkulu wakho izakuzwa wonke amazwi kaRabi-Shake.
Izinceku zenkosi uHezekhiya zasezifika kuIsaya.
UIsaya wasesithi kuzo: Lizakutsho njalo enkosini yenu: Utsho njalo uJehova: Ungesabi amazwi owezwileyo inceku zenkosi yeAsiriya ezingithuke ngawo.
Khangela, ngizafaka.
URabi-Shake wasebuyela, wafica inkosi yeAsiriya isilwa imelene leLibhina.
Kwathi isizwa ngoTirihaka kuthiwa: Khangela, uphumile uku ya kulwa emelene lawe, yabuya yathuma izithunywa kuHezekhiya, isithi:
Lizakhuluma kanje kuHezekhiya inkosi yakoJuda, lithi: UNkulunkulu wakho omthembileyo.
Khangela, wena usuzwile ukuthi amakhosi eAsiriya enzeni kuwo wonke amazwe, ngokuwatshabalalisa. Wena-ke uzakhululwa yini?
Onkulunkulu bezizwe bazikhululile yini, obaba abazichithayo?
Ingaphi inkosi yeHamathi, lenkosi yomuzi weSefavayimi, iHena, leIva?
UHezekhiya waseyemukela incwadi esandleni sezithunywa, wayibala, wasesenyukela endlini yeN, uHezekhiya wayichaya phambi kweN.
UHezekhiya wasekhuleka phambi kweN KOSI.
N, thoba indlebe yakho, uzwe.
Qiniso, N, amakhosi eAsiriya azichithile izizwe lelizwe lazo,
aphosela onkulunkulu bazo emlilweni; ngoba babengeyisibo onkulunkulu, kodwa umsebenzi wezandla zabantu, izigodo lamatshe; ngakho bababhubhisa.
Ngakho-ke, N Nkulunkulu wethu, ngicela usisindise esandleni sakhe, ukuze yonke imibuso yomhlaba yazi ukuthi wena uyuNkulunkulu, wena wedwa.
UIsaya indodana kaAmozi wasethumela kuHezekhiya esithi: Itsho njalo iN, uNkulunkulu wakoIsrayeli: Lokho okukhuleke kimi mayelana loSenakheribi inkosi yeAsiriya ngikuzwile.
Yileli ilizwi elikhulume mayelana laye: Intombi emsulwa, indodakazi yeZiyoni, iyakudelela, iyakuklolodela.
Ngubani omeyisileyo.
Ngesandla sezithunywa zakho uyeyisile iNkosi.
Mina ngagebha nganatha amanzi angaziwayo, langengaphansi yenyawo zami ngomisa yonke imifula yezindawo ezivinjelweyo.
Kawuzwanga yini ukuthi ngakwenza endulo.
Ngakho abahlali bayo babelesandla esifitshane, besaba babe lenhloni, baba njengo tshani beganga lemibhida eluhlaza.
Kodwa ngiyakwazi ukuhlala kwakho lokuphuma kwakho lokungena kwakho lokungithukuthelela kwakho.
Ngenxa yokungithukuthelela kwakho, lokuthi umsindo wakho wenyukele endlebeni zami, ngizafaka umkhala wami emakhaleni akho, letomu lami endebeni zakho.
Lokhu-ke kuzakuba yisibonakaliso kuwe, langomnyaka wesibili umkhukhuzela, kuthi ngomnyaka wesithathu lihlanyele livune, lihlanyele izivini lidle izithelo zazo.
Lokuphephileyo kwendlu yakoJuda okuseleyo kuzaphinda kugxumeke impande phansi, kuthele izithelo ngaphezulu.
Ngoba kuzaphuma eJerusalema insali, lokuphephileyo entabeni yeZiyoni. Ukutshiseka kweN yamabandla kuzakwenza lokhu.
Ngakho utsho njalo uJehova ngenkosi yeAsiriya: Kayiyikungena kulumuzi, kayiyikutshoka umtshoko khona, kayiyikuza phambi kwawo ile sihlangu, kayiyikubuthelela idundulu maqondana lawo.
Ngendlela eyeza ngayo, ngayo izabuyela, kayiyikungena kulo umuzi, itsho iN.
Ngoba ngizawuvikela lumuzi ukuwusindisa.
Kwasekusithi ngalobobusuku.
Ngakho uSenakheribi inkosi yeAsiriya wasuka wahamba wabuyela, wahlala eNineve.
Kwasekusithi ekhonza endlini kaNisiroki unkulunkulu wakhe, oAdrameleki loSharezeri.
Ngalezonsuku uHezekhiya wagula okokufa. UIsaya indodana kaAmozi umprofethi wasefika kuye wathi kuye: Itsho njalo iN: Laya indlu yakho, ngoba uzakufa, kawuyikuphila.
Wasephendulela ubuso bakhe emdulini, wakhuleka eNni esithi:
Ngiyakuncenga N, ake ukhumbule ukuthi ngihambe phambi kwakho ngobuqotho.
Kwasekusithi uIsaya engakaphumi egumeni elingaphakathi, ilizwi leN lafika kuye lisithi:
Buyela uthi kuHezekhiya umbusi wabantu bami; khangela, ngizakusilisa; ngosuku lwesithathu uzakwenyukela endlini yeN.
Njalo ngizakwengezelela iminyaka elitshumi lanhlanu ensukwini zakho; ngikukhulule wena lalumuzi esandleni senkosi yeAsiriya; ngiwuvikele lumuzi ngenxa yami langenxa yenceku yami uDavida.
UIsaya wasesithi: Thathani isigaqa somkhiwa.
UHezekhiya wasesithi kuIsaya: Yisiphi isibonakaliso sokuthi izangisilisa, lokuthi ngizakwenyukela endlini yeN ngosuku lwesithathu?
UIsaya wasesithi: Lesi yisibonakaliso kuwe esivela eNni esokuthi izayenza into eyikhulumileyo: Isithunzi sizakuya phambili izinyathelo ezilitshumi, loba siye emuva izinyathelo ezilitshumi yini?
UHezekhiya wasesithi: Kulula.
UIsaya umprofethi wasekhala eNni, yasibuyisela emuva isithunzi, ngezinyathelo esasehle ngazo esikhwelweni sikaAhazi, izinyathelo ezilitshumi emuva.
Ngalesosikhathi uMerodaki-Baladani indodana kaBaladani, inkosi yeBhabhiloni, wathumela izincwadi lesipho kuHezekhiya, ngoba wayezwile ukuthi uHezekhiya ubekade egula.

UHezekhiya wabalalela, wabatshengisa yonke indlu yakhe yezinto eziligugu, isiliva legolide lamakha lamafutha amahle lendlu yezikhali zakhe, lakho konke okwakutholakala endlini yakhe yokuligugu; kakulalutho endlini yakhe lembusweni wonke wakhe uHezekhiya angabatshengisanga lona.
UIsaya umprofethi wasesiza enkosini uHezekhiya wathi kiyo: Batheni lababantu? Futhi bebevela ngaphi besiza kuwe? UHezekhiya wasesithi: Bebevela elizweni elikhatshana, eBhabhiloni.
Wasesithi: Baboneni endlini yakho? UHezekhiya wasesithi: Babone konke okusendlini yami; kakulalutho phakathi kokuligugu kwami engingabatshengisanga khona.
UIsaya wasesithi kuHezekhiya: Zwana ilizwi leN.
Khangela, insuku ziyeza lapho konke okusendlini yakho lalokho oyihlo abakubekelelayo kuze kube lamuhla kuzathwalelwa eBhabhiloni; kakuyikusala lutho, itsho iN.
Njalo bazathatha emadodaneni akho azaphuma kuwe, ozawazala, abe ngabathenwa esigodlweni senkosi yeBhabhiloni.
UHezekhiya wasesithi kuIsaya: Lihle ilizwi leN olikhulumileyo. Wasesithi: Kaku njaloyini, uba kuzakuba khona ukuthula lokuvikeleka ensukwini zami?
Ezinye-ke zezindaba zikaHezekhiya, lawo wonke amandla akhe?
UHezekhiya waselala laboyise. UManase indodana yakhe wasesiba yinkosi esikhundleni sakhe.
UManase wayeleminyaka elitshumi lambili lapho esiba yinkosi; wabusa iminyaka engamatshumi amahlanu lanhlanu eJerusalema. Lebizo likanina lalinguHefiziba.
Wasesenza okubi emehlweni eN njengokwamanyala ezizwe eyazixotsha elifeni phambi kwabantwana bakoIsrayeli.
Ngoba wabuya wakha indawo eziphakemeyo uyise uHezekhiya ayezichithile.
Wasesakha amalathi endlini yeN KOSI.
Wasesakhela ibutho lonke lamazulu amalathi.
Wasedabulisa indodana yakhe emlilweni.

Wasemisa isithombe esibaziweyo sesixuku ayesenzile endlini, eyakhuluma ngayo kuDavida lakuSolomoni indodana yakhe yathi: Kulindlu, leJerusalema engiyikhethe kuzo zonke izizwe zakoIsrayeli, ngizabeka ibizo lami kuze kube nininini.

Kangisayikuzulisa unyawo lukaIsrayeli luphume futhi elizweni engalinika oyise, kuphela uba bezananzelela ukwenza njengakho konke engabalaya khona langokomlayo wonke inceku yami uMozisi eyabalaya wona.
Kodwa kabalalelanga; uManase wasebaphambukisa ukuthi benze okubi okwedlula izizwe eyazichitha phambi kwabantwana bakoIsrayeli.
yasikhuluma ngezinceku zayo abaprofethi isithi:
Ngenxa yokuthi uManase inkosi yakoJuda wenzile lamanyala.
Ngakho itsho njalo iN, uNkulunkulu kaIsrayeli: Khangela, ngiletha okubi phezu kweJerusalema loJuda kuthi laye wonke ozwayo indlebe zakhe zombili zizakhenceza ngakho.
Ngizakwelula phezu kweJerusalema intambo yeSamariya, lentambo yokulinganisa yendlu kaAhabi, ngiyesule iJerusalema njengowesula umganu, awesule awumbokothe.
Njalo ngizatshiya insali yelifa lami, ngibanikele esandleni sezitha zabo, babe ngokubanjiweyo lempango kwezitha zabo zonke,
ngenxa yokuthi benzile okubi emehlweni ami, bayangithukuthelisa, kusukela osukwini oyise abaphuma ngalo eGibhithe ngitsho kuze kube lamuhla.

Futhi-ke uManase uchithile igazi elinengi kakhulu elingelacala waze wayigcwalisa iJerusalema kusukela ekuqaleni kuze kube sekucineni, ngaphandle kwesono sakhe enza ngaso uJuda ukuthi one, ukwenza okubi emehlweni eN.
Ezinye-ke zezindaba zikaManase, lakho konke akwenzayo, lesono sakhe asonayo, kakubhalwanga yini egwalweni lwemilando yamakhosi akoJuda?
UManase waselala laboyise, wangcwatshelwa esivandeni sendlu yakhe. UAmoni indodana yakhe wasesiba yinkosi esikhundleni sakhe.
UAmoni wayeleminyaka engamatshumi amabili lambili lapho esiba yinkosi; wabusa iminyaka emibili eJerusalema.
Wasesenza okubi emehlweni eN njengokwenza kukaManase uyise.
Wahamba ngendlela yonke uyise ahamba ngayo, wakhonza izithombe uyise azikhonzayo, wakhothama kuzo.
Wayidela iN, uNkulunkulu waboyise, kahambanga ngendlela yeN.
Izinceku zikaAmoni zasezimenzela ugobe, zabulala inkosi endlini yayo.
Kodwa abantu belizwe babatshaya bonke labo ababenzele inkosi uAmoni ugobe; abantu belizwe basebebeka uJosiya indodana yakhe ukuba yinkosi esikhundleni sakhe.
Ezinye-ke zezindaba zikaAmoni azenzayo kazibhalwanga yini egwalweni lwemilando yamakhosi akoJuda?
Wasengcwatshelwa engcwabeni lakhe esivandeni sikaUza. UJosiya indodana yakhe wasesiba yinkosi esikhundleni sakhe.
UJosiya wayeleminyaka eyisificaminwembili lapho esiba yinkosi; wabusa iminyaka engamatshumi amathathu lanye eJerusalema.
Wasesenza okulungileyo emehlweni eN, wahamba ngayo yonke indlela kaDavida uyise, kaze aphambukela ngakwesokunene langakwesokhohlo.
Kwasekusithi ngomnyaka wetshumi lesificaminwembili wenkosi uJosiya, inkosi yathuma uShafani indodana kaAzaliya indodana kaMeshulamu, umabhalane, endlini yeN, esithi:
Yenyukela kuHilikhiya umpristi omkhulu.
Kabayinikele esandleni sabenzi bomsebenzi abamiswe phezu kwendlu yeN, kabayinike abenzi bomsebenzi osendlini yeN, ukulungisa izikhala zendlu,
kubabazi, lakubakhi, lakubabazi bamatshe, lokuthenga amapulanka lamatshe abaziweyo ukulungisa indlu.
Kodwa akubalelwananga labo imali eyayinikelwe esandleni sabo ngoba benza ngokuthembeka.
UHilikhiya umpristi omkhulu wasesithi kuShafani umabhalane: Sengifice ugwalo lomlayo endlini yeN. UHilikhiya wasenika uShafani ugwalo, waselufunda.
UShafani umabhalane wasefika enkosini, wabuyisela ilizwi enkosini wathi: Izinceku zakho seziyithulule imali eficwe endlini, zayinikela esandleni sabenzi bomsebenzi abamiswe phezu kwendlu yeN.
UShafani umabhalane wasebika enkosini esithi: UHilikhiya umpristi unginike ugwalo. UShafani waselufunda phambi kwenkosi.
Kwasekusithi inkosi isizwile amazwi ogwalo lomlayo, yadabula izigqoko zayo.
Inkosi yasilaya uHilikhiya umpristi loAhikhamu indodana kaShafani loAkhibhori indodana kaMikhaya loShafani umabhalane loAsaya inceku yenkosi, isithi:

Hambani liyengibuzela eNni mina labantu loJuda wonke mayelana lamazwi alolugwalo oluficiweyo; ngoba yinkulu intukuthelo yeN esesiyibaselwe, ngoba obaba kabawalalelanga amazwi alolugwalo, ukwenza konke okubhaliweyo mayelana lathi.

Ngakho uHilikhiya umpristi loAhikhamu loAkhibhori loShafani loAsaya baya kuHulida umprofethikazi umkaShaluma indodana kaTikiva indodana kaHarihasi, umgcini wezigqoko. Wayehlala-ke eJerusalema esiGabeni seSibili. Basebekhuluma laye.
Wasesithi kibo: Itsho njalo iN, uNkulunkulu kaIsrayeli: Mtsheleni lowomuntu olithume kimi:
Itsho njalo iN: Khangela, ngizakwehlisela okubi kulindawo laphezu kwabakhileyo bayo, wonke amazwi ogwalo inkosi yakoJuda elufundileyo.
Ngenxa yokuthi bangidelile, batshisela abanye onkulunkulu impepha.
Kodwa enkosini yakoJuda elithumileyo ukubuza eNni, lizakutsho njalo kuyo: Itsho njalo iN, uNkulunkulu kaIsrayeli: Mayelana l amazwi eliwezwileyo:
Ngoba inhliziyo yakho ibithambile.
Ngakho, khangela, ngizakubuthela kuboyihlo, njalo uzabuthelwa engcwabeni lakho ngokuthula, lamehlo akho kawayikubona bonke ububi engizabehlisela phezu kwalindawo. Basebebuyisela ilizwi enkosini.
Inkosi yasithumela, basebebuthanisa kuye bonke abadala bakoJuda labeJerusalema.

Inkosi yasisenyukela endlini kaJehova, lawo wonke amadoda akoJuda labo bonke abahlali beJerusalema kanye laye, labapristi labaprofethi, labo bonke abantu kusukela komncinyane kusiya komkhulu, yasifunda endlebeni zabo wonke amazwi ogwalo lwesivumelwano.
Inkosi yema-ke ngasensikeni, yenza isivumelwano phambi kweN KOSI.
Inkosi yasilaya uHilikhiya umpristi omkhulu, wathwalela umlotha wazo eBhetheli.

Wasesusa abapristi bezithombe amakhosi akoJuda ayebabekile ukuthi batshise impepha endaweni eziphakemeyo, emizini yakoJuda, lendawo ezizingelezele iJerusalema, lalabo ababetshisa impepha kuBhali, elangeni, lenyangeni, lezinkanyezini, lebuthweni lonke lamazulu.
Wakhupha isixuku endlini yeN, ngaphandle kweJerusalema.
Wadiliza izindlu zezinkotshana ezazingasendlini yeN KOSI.

Wakhupha bonke abapristi emizini yakoJuda, wangcolisa indawo eziphakemeyo lapho abapristi ababetshisela khona impepha, kusukela eGeba. Wadiliza indawo eziphakemeyo zamasango ezisekungeneni kwesango likaJoshuwa umbusi womuzi, ezazingakwesokhohlo somuntu esangweni lomuzi.
Loba kunjalo abapristi bendawo eziphakemeyo kabenyukelanga elathini leN eJerusalema, kodwa badla izinkwa ezingelamvubelo phakathi kwabafowabo.
Wasengcolisa iTofethi.
Wasesusa amabhiza amakhosi akoJuda ayewanikele elangeni ekungeneni kwendlu yeN KOSI.
Lamalathi ayesephahleni lwendlu kaAhazi.
Lendawo eziphakemeyo, ezaziphambi kweJerusalema, ezazingakwesokunene sentaba yokubola, uSolomoni inkosi yakoIsrayeli eyayizakhele uAshitarothi isinengiso samaSidoni, inkosi yazingcolisa.
Wasephahlaza insika eziyizithombe, wagamula izixuku, wagcwalisa izindawo zazo ngamathambo abantu.

Lelathi lalo elaliseBhetheli, lendawo ephakemeyo, ayenzayo uJerobhowamu indodana kaNebati, kokubili lelolathi lendawo ephakemeyo wakudiliza, watshisa indawo ephakemeyo, wayichoboza yaba luthuli, watshisa isixuku.

Lapho uJosiya ephenduka wabona amangcwaba ayelapho entabeni, wathuma wasekhupha amathambo emangcwabeni, wawatshisela phezu kwelathi, walingcolisa, njengelizwi leN umuntu kaNkulunkulu ayelimemezele, owamemezela lamazwi.
Wasesithi: Yisikhumbuzo sani lesiyana engisibonayo.
Wasesithi: Myekeleni, kakungabi lamuntu othinta amathambo akhe. Basebewayekela amathambo akhe kanye lamathambo omprofethi owavela eSamariya.
Njalo lazo zonke izindlu zezindawo eziphakemeyo ezisemizini yeSamariya, amakhosi akoIsrayeli ayezenzile ukuthukuthelisa, uJosiya wazisusa, wenza kizo njengayo yonke imisebenzi ayeyenze eBhetheli.
Wasebulala bonke abapristi bezindawo eziphakemeyo.
Inkosi yasilaya bonke abantu isithi: Gcinani iphasika eNni uNkulunkulu wenu.
Ngoba kwakungagcinwanga elinjengaleli iphasika kusukela ensukwini zabehluleli abehlulela uIsrayeli, kumbe kuzo zonke izinsuku zamakhosi akoIsrayeli, kumbe zamakhosi akoJuda.
Kodwa ngomnyaka wetshumi lesificaminwembili wenkosi uJosiya lagcinwa leliphasika eNni eJerusalema.
Ngaphezu kwalokho-ke abalamadlozi.
Langaphambi kwakhe kakubanga khona inkosi eyafanana laye eyaphendukela eNni ngenhliziyo yayo yonke langomphefumulo wayo wonke.
Kanti kayiphendukanga ekuvutheni kolaka lwayo olukhulu, olaka lwayo eyavuthela ngalo uJuda, ngenxa yazo zonke intukutheliso uManase ayithukuthelisa ngazo.
yasisithi: Ngizamsusa loJuda phambi kwami, njengoba ngasusa uIsrayeli.
Ezinye-ke zezindaba zikaJosiya, lakho konke akwenzayo, kakubhalwanga yini egwalweni lwemilando yamakhosi akoJuda?
Ensukwini zakhe uFaro Neko inkosi yeGibhithe wenyuka wamelana lenkosi yeAsiriya emfuleni iYufrathi. Inkosi uJosiya yasisiyahlangabezana laye; wayibulalela eMegido eseyibonile.

Inceku zakhe zasezimthwala efile ngenqola, zisuka eMegido, zamusa eJerusalema, zamngcwaba engcwabeni lakhe. Abantu belizwe basebethatha uJehowahazi indodana kaJosiya, bamgcoba, bambeka waba yinkosi esikhundleni sikayise.
UJehowahazi wayeleminyaka engamatshumi amabili lantathu lapho esiba yinkosi; wabusa inyanga ezintathu eJerusalema. Lebizo likanina lalinguHamuthali.
Wasesenza okubi emehlweni eN njengakho konke oyise abakwenzayo.
UFaro Neko wasembopha eRibila.

UFaro Neko wasebeka uEliyakhimi indodana kaJosiya ukuthi abe yinkosi esikhundleni sikaJosiya uyise, waphendula ibizo lakhe wathinguJehoyakhimi. Wasethatha uJehowahazi; wasesiza eGibhithe, wafela khona.

UJehoyakhimi wasemnika uFaro isiliva legolide, kodwa wathelisa ilizwe ukuze anike leyomali njengokomlayo kaFaro. Wakhuphisa abantu belizwe isiliva legolide, ngulowo lalowo ngokomthelo wakhe, yokunika uFaro Neko.
UJehoyakhimi wayeleminyaka engamatshumi amabili lanhlanu lapho esiba yinkosi; wabusa iminyaka elitshumi lanye eJerusalema. Lebizo likanina lalinguZebida indodakazi kaPhedaya weRuma.
Wasesenza okubi emehlweni eN njengakho konke oyise abakwenzayo.
Ngensuku zakhe uNebhukadinezari inkosi yeBhabhiloni wenyuka.
yasithuma ukumelana laye.
Sibili ngokomlayo weN lokhokwehlela koJuda ukubasusa ebusweni bayo ngenxa yezono zikaManase, njengakho konke akwenzayo,
njalo la nge gazi elingelacala alichithayo; ngoba wagcwalisa iJerusalema ngegazi elingelacala, engavumanga ukulithethelela.
Ezinye-ke zezindaba zikaJehoyakhimi, lakho konke akwenzayo, kakubhalwanga yini egwalweni lwemilando yamakhosi akoJuda?
UJehoyakhimi waselala laboyise. UJehoyakhini indodana yakhe wasesiba yinkosi esikhundleni sakhe.
Inkosi yeGibhithe kayisaphindanga futhi ukuphuma elizweni layo, ngoba inkosi yeBhabhiloni yayithethe kusukela emfuleni weGibhithe kusiya emfuleni iYufrathi, konke okwakungokwenkosi yeGibhithe.
UJehoyakhini wayeleminyaka elitshumi lesificaminwembili lapho esiba yinkosi; wabusa inyanga ezintathu eJerusalema. Lebizo likanina lalinguNehushita indodakazi kaElinathani weJerusalema.
Wasesenza okubi emehlweni eN njengokwenza konke kukayise.
Ngalesosikhathi izinceku zikaNebhukadinezari inkosi yeBhabhiloni zenyukela eJerusalema, umuzi wasungena ekuvinjezelweni.
UNebhukadinezari inkosi yeBhabhiloni wasefika wamelana lomuzi, izinceku zakhe zisawuvimbezela.

UJehoyakhini inkosi yakoJuda wasephuma waya enkosini yeBhabhiloni, yena lonina lenceku zakhe lenduna zakhe labathenwa bakhe. Inkosi yeBhabhiloni yasimthatha ngomnyaka wesificaminwembili wokubusa kwakhe.
Yasikhupha lapho wonke amagugu endlu kaJehova lamagugu endlu yenkosi.
Yasithumba iJerusalema yonke, leziphathamandla zonke, lawo wonke amaqhawe alamandla.
Yasimthumbela uJehoyakhini eBhabhiloni.
Lawo wonke amadoda angamaqhawe.
Inkosi yeBhabhiloni.
UZedekhiya wayeleminyaka engamatshumi amabili lanye lapho esiba yinkosi; wabusa iminyaka elitshumi lanye eJerusalema.
Wasesenza okubi emehlweni eN njengokwenza konke kukaJehoyakhimi.
Ngoba ngenxa yentukuthelo yeN lokhu kwenzeka eJerusalema lakoJuda yaze yabaxotsha phambi kwayo. UZedekhiya waseyivukela inkosi yeBhabhiloni.
Kwasekusithi ngomnyaka wesificamunwemunye wokubusa kwakhe.
Umuzi wangena ekuvinjezelweni kwaze kwaba ngumnyaka wetshumi lanye wenkosi uZedekhiya.
Ngolwesificamunwemunye lwenyanga yesine.
Umuzi wasufohlelwa.
Ibutho lamaKhaladiya laselixotshana lenkosi, layifica emagcekeni eJeriko; ibutho layo lonke laselihlakazeka lisuka kuyo.
Aseyibamba inkosi, ayenyusela enkosini yeBhabhiloni, akhuluma ukwahlulela kwayo.
Abulala amadodana kaZedekhiya phambi kwamehlo akhe, akhupha amehlo kaZedekhiya.
Langenyanga yesihlanu) kwafika uNebuzaradani induna yabalindi, inceku yenkosi yeBhabhiloni, eJerusalema.
Wasetshisa indlu kaJehova lendlu yenkosi; layo yonke indlu yesikhulu wayitshisa ngomlilo.
Lebutho lonke lamaKhaladiya elalilenduna yabalindi.
Njalo insali yabantu ababesele emzini, labahlamuki ababehlamukele enkosini yeBhabhiloni, lensali yexuku, uNebuzaradani induna yabalindi yabathumba.
Kodwa induna yabalindi yatshiya ebayangeni belizwe ukuba ngabaphathi bezivini labalimi.
Lensika zethusi ezazisendlini yeN KOSI, athwalela ithusi lakho eBhabhiloni.
Lezimbiza.
Lezitsha zokuthwala umlilo.
Insika zombili.

Ubude bensika eyodwa babuzingalo ezilitshumi lesificaminwembili, lesiduku phezu kwayo sasilithusi, lomsebenzi ophothiweyo, lamapomegranati phezu kwesiduku inhlangothi zonke, konke kungokwethusi. Lensika yesibili yayilokunje, ilomsebenzi ophothiweyo.
Induna yabalindi yasithatha uSeraya umpristi oyinhloko loZefaniya umpristi wesibili, labalindi bombundu womnyango abathathu.

Lemzini yasithatha induna eyayimiswe phezu kwamadoda empi, lamadoda amahlanu ayesebusweni benkosi ayeficwe emzini, lomabhalane omkhulu webutho eyayibuthela abantu belizwe emabuthweni, lamadoda angamatshumi ayisithupha abantu belizwe ayeficwe phakathi komuzi.
UNebuzaradani induna yabalindi wasebathatha laba wabasa enkosini yeBhabhiloni eRibila.
Inkosi yeBhabhiloni yasibatshaya yababulalela eRibila elizweni leHamathi. Ngokunjalo uJuda wathunjwa esuswa elizweni lakhe.
Abantu abasala-ke elizweni lakoJuda, uNebhukadinezari inkosi yeBhabhiloni owayebatshiyile, wabeka phezu kwabo uGedaliya.
Kwathi zonke induna zamabutho, zona labantu bazo, sezizwile ukuthi inkosi yeBhabhiloni ibeke uGedaliya abe ngumbusi, zona labantu bazo.
UGedaliya wasefunga kuzo lakubantu bazo wathi kuzo: Lingesabi ukubazinceku zamaKhaladiya; hlalani elizweni, likhonze inkosi yeBhabhiloni, njalo kuzakuba kuhle kini.

Kodwa kwathi ngenyanga yesikhombisa, kwafika uIshmayeli indodana kaNethaniya indodana kaElishama, owenzalo yesikhosini, lamadoda alitshumi elaye, basebemtshaya uGedaliya waze wafa, lamaJuda lamaKhaladiya ayelaye eMizipa.
Abantu bonke-ke, kusukela komncinyane kuze kuye komkhulu, lenduna zamabutho, basebesuka baya eGibhithe, ngoba besaba amaKhaladiya.
Kwasekusithi ngomnyaka wamatshumi amathathu lesikhombisa.
Wasekhuluma kuhle laye, wamisa isihlalo sakhe sobukhosi phezu kwesihlalo sobukhosi samakhosi ayelaye eBhabhiloni.
Wasentshintsha izigqoko zokubotshwa kwakhe; wasesidla isinkwa njalonjalo phambi kwakhe insuku zonke zempilo yakhe.
Lesabelo esimiyo, isabelo esimiyo esiqhubekayo sanikwa yena yinkosi, into yosuku ngosuku lwayo, zonke izinsuku zempilo yakhe.
UAdamu, uSeti, uEnosi,
uKenani, uMahalaleli, uJaredi,
uEnoki, uMethusela, uLameki,
uNowa, uShemu, uHamu, loJafethi.
Amadodana kaJafethi: OGomeri loMagogi.
Lamadodana kaGomeri: OAshikenazi loRifathi loTogarma.
Lamadodana kaJavani: OElisha loTarshishi, amaKiti lamaDodani.
Amadodana kaHamu: OKushi loMizirayimi, uPuti loKhanani.
Lamadodana kaKushi: OSeba loHavila loSabitha loRahama loSabitheka. Lamadodana kaRahama: OShebha loDedani.
UKushi wasezala uNimrodi; yena waqala ukuba liqhawe emhlabeni.
UMizirayimi wasezala amaLudi lamaAnami lamaLehabi lamaNafethuhi
lamaPatrusi lamaKaseluhi (okwaphuma kiwo amaFilisti), lamaKafitori.
UKhanani wasezala uSidoni izibulo lakhe, loHethi,
lomJebusi lomAmori lomGirigashi
lomHivi lomArki lomSini
lomArvadi lomZemari lomHamathi.
Amadodana kaShemu: OElamu loAshuri loArpakishadi loLudi loAramu.
UArpakishadi wasezala uShela; uShela wasezala uEberi.
UEberi wasezalelwa amadodana amabili. Ibizo lenye lalinguPelegi, ngoba ensukwini zayo umhlaba wadatshulwa; lebizo lomfowabo lalinguJokithani.
UJokithani wasezala oAlimodadi loShelefi loHazamavethi loJera
loHadoramu loUzali loDikila
loEbhali loAbhimayeli loShebha
loOfiri loHavila loJobabi. Bonke labo babengamadodana kaJokithani.
UShemu,
uEberi, uPelegi, uRewu,
uSerugi, uNahori, uTera,
uAbrama; onguAbrahama.
Amadodana kaAbrahama: OIsaka.
Laba yizizukulwana zabo: Izibulo likaIshmayeli, loKedari, loAdibeli, loMibisama,
uMishima, loDuma, uMasa, uHadadi, loTema,
uJeturi, uNafishi, loKedema; la ngamadodana kaIshmayeli.
Njalo amadodana kaKetura, umfazi omncinyane kaAbrahama.
Lamadodana kaMidiyani.
UAbrahama wasezala uIsaka.
Amadodana kaEsawu: OElifazi, uRehuweli, loJewushi, loJalamu, loKora.
Amadodana kaElifazi: OThemani, loOmari, uZefi, loGatama, uKenazi, loTimina, loAmaleki.
Amadodana kaRehuweli: ONahathi, uZera, uShama, loMiza.
Lamadodana kaSeyiri: OLotani loShobhali loZibeyoni loAna loDishoni loEzeri loDishani.
Lamadodana kaLotani: OHori loHomama; lodadewabo kaLotani wayenguTimina.
Amadodana kaShobhali: OAliyani, loManahathi, loEbhali, uShefi, loOnama. Lamadodana kaZibeyoni: OAya loAna.
Amadodana kaAna: UDishoni. Lamadodana kaDishoni: OHamrani loEshibhani loJitirani loKerani.
Amadodana kaEzeri: OBilihani loZahavana. Amadodana kaDishani: OUzi loArani.
Njalo la ngamakhosi abusa elizweni leEdoma, kungakabusi inkosi phezu kwabantwana bakoIsrayeli: UBhela indodana kaBeyori; lebizo lomuzi wakhe laliyiDinihaba.
UBhela wasesifa, uJobabi indodana kaZera weBhozira wasesiba yinkosi esikhundleni sakhe.
UJobabi wasesifa, uHushama owelizweni lamaThemani wasesiba yinkosi esikhundleni sakhe.
UHushama wasesifa, uHadadi indodana kaBedadi, owatshaya amaMidiyani emagcekeni akoMowabi, wasesiba yinkosi esikhundleni sakhe; lebizo lomuzi wakhe laliyiAvithi.
UHadadi wasesifa, uSamila weMasireka wasesiba yinkosi esikhundleni sakhe.
USamila wasesifa, uShawuli weRehobothi emfuleni wasesiba yinkosi esikhundleni sakhe.
UShawuli wasesifa, uBhali-Hanani indodana kaAkhibhori wasesiba yinkosi esikhundleni sakhe.
UBhali-Hanani wasesifa, uHadadi wasesiba yinkosi esikhundleni sakhe; lebizo lomuzi wakhe laliyiPhayi; lebizo lomkakhe lalinguMehethabheli indodakazi kaMatiredi indodakazi kaMezahabhi.
UHadadi wasesifa. Lezinduna zeEdoma zaziyi lezi: Induna uTimina, induna uAliya, induna uJethethi,
induna uAholibama, induna uEla, induna uPinoni,
induna uKenazi, induna uThemani, induna uMibhizari,
induna uMagidiyeli, induna uIrama; lezi yizinduna zeEdoma.
La ngamadodana kaIsrayeli: ORubeni, uSimeyoni, uLevi, loJuda, uIsakari, loZebuluni,
uDani, uJosefa, loBhenjamini, uNafithali, uGadi, loAsheri.
Amadodana kaJuda: OEri loOnani loShela.
UTamari, umalokozana wakhe, wasemzalela uPerezi loZera. Wonke amadodana kaJuda ayemahlanu.
Amadodana kaPerezi: OHezironi loHamuli.
Njalo amadodana kaZera: OZimri loEthani loDara; wonke ayemahlanu.
Njalo amadodana kaKarimi.
Njalo amadodana kaEthani: UAzariya.
Njalo amadodana kaHezironi awazalelwayo: OJerameli loKalebi.
URamu wasezala uAminadaba.
UNahishoni wasezala uSalima; uSalima wasezala uBhowazi;
uBhowazi wasezala uObedi; uObedi wasezala uJese.
UJese wasezala izibulo lakhe uEliyabi,
uNethaneli owesine, uRadayi owesihlanu,
uOzema owesithupha, uDavida owesikhombisa.
Odadewabo babengoZeruya loAbigayili. Lamadodana kaZeruya: OAbishayi loJowabi loAsaheli; abathathu.
UAbigayili wasezala uAmasa; loyise kaAmasa wayenguJetheri umIshmayeli.
UKalebi indodana kaHezironi wasezala kuAzuba umka khelakuJeriyothi; lala ngamadodana akhe: OJesheri loShobabi loAridoni.
UAzuba esefile uKalebi wazithathela uEfrathi owamzalela uHuri.
UHuri wasezala uUri.
Emva kwalokho uHezironi wasengena kundodakazi kaMakiri uyise kaGileyadi; wayithatha eseleminyaka engamatshumi ayisithupha. Yasimzalela uSegubi.
USegubi wasezala uJayiri owayelemizi engamatshumi amabili lantathu elizweni leGileyadi.
Wasethatha kibo iGeshuri leAramu kanye lemizana yeJayiri, kanye leKenathi lemizana yayo; imizi engamatshumi ayisithupha. Bonke labo babengamadodana kaMakiri uyise kaGileyadi.
Lemva kokufa kukaHezironi eKalebi-Efratha.
Njalo amadodana kaJerameli izibulo likaHezironi ayengoRamu izibulo, loBuna, loOreni, loOzema, uAhiya.
UJerameli laye wayelomunye umfazi obizo lakhe lalinguAthara; wayengunina kaOnama.
Njalo amadodana kaRamu izibulo likaJerameli ayengoMahazi loJamini loEkeri.
Lamadodana kaOnama ayengoShamayi loJada. Lamadodana kaShamayi: ONadabi loAbhishuri.
Lebizo lomkaAbhishuri lalinguAbihayili, owamzalela oAhibani loMolidi.
Njalo amadodana kaNadabi: OSeledi loAphayimi; kodwa uSeledi wafa engelabantwana.
Njalo amadodana kaAphayimi: UIshi. Lamadodana kaIshi: USheshani. Lamadodana kaSheshani: UAhilayi.
Njalo amadodana kaJada umfowabo kaShamayi: OJetheri loJonathani; kodwa uJetheri wafa engelabantwana.
Njalo amadodana kaJonathani: OPelethi loZaza. Laba babengabantwana bakaJerameli.
Njalo uSheshani wayengelamadodana, kodwa amadodakazi; njalo uSheshani wayelenceku, umGibhithe, obizo layo lalinguJariha.
USheshani wasenika uJariha inceku yakhe indodakazi yakhe yaba ngumka khe; yasimzalela uAthayi.
UAthayi wasezala uNathani, uNathani wasezala uZabadi,
uZabadi wasezala uEfilali, uEfilali wasezala uObedi,
uObedi wasezala uJehu, uJehu wasezala uAzariya,
uAzariya wasezala uHelezi, uHelezi wasezala uEleyasa,
uEleyasa wasezala uSisimayi, uSisimayi wasezala uShaluma,
uShaluma wasezala uJekamiya, uJekamiya wasezala uElishama.
Njalo amadodana kaKalebi umfowabo kaJerameli.
Njalo amadodana kaHebroni: OKora loTapuwa loRekemi loShema.
UShema wasezala uRahama uyise kaJorikeyamu; uRekemi wasezala uShamayi.
Lendodana kaShamayi: UMawoni.
UEfa umfazi omncinyane kaKalebi wasezala oHarani loMoza loGazezi; uHarani wasezala uGazezi.
Njalo amadodana kaJahidayi: ORegema loJothamu loGeshani loPeleti loEfa loShahafi.
UMahaka umfazi omncinyane kaKalebi wazala oSheberi loTirihana.
Wasezala uShahafi uyise kaMadimana.
Laba babengabantwana bakaKalebi, indodana kaHuri,
uSalima uyise kaBhethelehema, uHarefi uyise kaBeti-Gaderi.
UShobhali uyise kaKiriyathi-Jeyarimi wayelamadodana: UHarowe, ingxenye yamaMenuhothi.
Njalo insendo zikaKiriyathi-Jeyarimi: AmaIthiri.
Amadodana kaSalima.
Lensendo zababhali ababehlala eJabezi.
Njalo la ayengamadodana kaDavida awazalelwa eHebroni: Izibulo nguAmnoni kuAhinowama umJizereyelikazi; eyesibili nguDaniyeli kuAbigayili umKharmelikazi;
eyesithathu nguAbisalomu indodana kaMahaka indodakazi kaTalimayi inkosi yeGeshuri; eyesine nguAdonija indodana kaHagithi;
eyesihlanu nguShefathiya kuAbithali; eyesithupha nguIthereyamu kuEgila umkakhe.
Abayisithupha bazalelwa yena eHebroni, lapho abusa khona iminyaka eyisikhombisa lezinyanga eziyisithupha.
Lalaba bazalelwa yena eJerusalema: OShimeya loShobabi loNathani, bo bane, kuBathishuwa indodakazi kaAmiyeli;
loIbihari loElishama loElifelethi
loNoga loNefegi loJafiya
loElishama loEliyada loElifelethi, abayisificamunwemunye.
Bonke babengamadodana kaDavida, ngaphandle kwamadodana abafazi abancane, loTamari udadewabo.
Lendodana kaSolomoni yayinguRehobhowamu,
uJoramu indodana yakhe,
uAmaziya indodana yakhe,
uAhazi indodana yakhe,
uAmoni indodana yakhe.
Njalo amadodana kaJosiya: Izibulo uJohanani, eyesibili uJehoyakhimi, eyesithathu uZedekhiya, eyesine uShaluma.
Lamadodana kaJehoyakhimi: UJekoniya indodana yakhe, uZedekhiya indodana yakhe.
Njalo amadodana kaJekoniya: UAsiri, uSheyalitiyeli indodana yakhe,
loMalikiramu, loPhedaya, loShenazari, uJekamiya, uHoshama, loNedabiya.
Njalo amadodana kaPhedaya: OZerubhabheli loShimeyi. Lamadodana kaZerubhabheli: OMeshulamu, loHananiya, loShelomithi udadewabo;
loHashuba, loOheli, loBerekiya, loHasadiya, uJushabi-Hesedi, amahlanu.
Lamadodana kaHananiya: OPelatiya loJeshaya; amadodana kaRefaya, amadodana kaArinani, amadodana kaObhadiya, amadodana kaShekaniya.
Lamadodana kaShekaniya: UShemaya. Lamadodana kaShemaya: OHathushi loIgali loBariya loNeyariya loShafati, ayisithupha.
Njalo amadodana kaNeyariya: OEliyohenayi loHizikiya loAzirikamu, amathathu.
Njalo amadodana kaEliyohenayi: OHodaviya loEliyashibi loPelaya loAkubi loJohanani loDelaya loAnani, ayisikhombisa.
Amadodana kaJuda.
UReyaya indodana kaShobhali wasezala uJahathi; uJahathi wasezala uAhumayi loLahadi. Laba babezinsendo zamaZorathi.
Laba babengabakayise kaEtamu: OJizereyeli loIshma loIdibhashi; lebizo likadadewabo lalinguHazeleliponi.
LoPenuweli uyise kaGedori.
Njalo uAshuri uyise kaThekhowa wayelabafazi ababili, oHela loNahara.
UNahara wasemzalela uAhuzama loHeferi loTemeni loHahashitari. Laba babengamadodana kaNahara.
Lamadodana kaHela: OZerethi loIzohari loEthinani.
UKhozi wasezala uAnubi loZobeba, lensendo zikaAhariheli indodana kaHarumi.
Njalo uJabezi.

UJabezi wasebiza uNkulunkulu kaIsrayeli esithi: Kungathi ungangibusisa lokungibusisa, uqhelise umngcele wami, lesandla sakho sibe lami, ungivikele ebubini ukuze bungangidabuli! UNkulunkulu wenza kwenzakala lokho akucelayo.
UKelubi umfowabo kuShuha wasezala uMehiri, onguyise kaEshitoni.
UEshitoni wasezala uBeti-Rafa loPhaseya loTehina uyise kaIri-Nahashi. Laba babengabantu bakaReka.
Lamadodana kaKenazi loSeraya. Lamadodana kaOthiniyeli: UHathathi.
UMeyonothayi wasezala uOfira. USeraya wasezala uJowabi uyise wesigodi seHarashi, ngoba babezingcitshi.
Lamadodana kaKalebi indodana kaJefune: OIru, uEla, loNahamu; lamadodana kaEla, ngitsho uKenazi.
Lamadodana kaJehaleleli: OZifi, loZifa, uTiriya, loAsareli.
Lamadodana kaEzra: OJetheri loMeredi loEferi loJaloni. Wasezala oMiriyamu loShamayi loIshiba uyise kaEshithemowa.
Umkakhe umJudakazi wasezala uJeredi uyise kaGedori. Lalabo babengamadodana kaBithiya indodakazi kaFaro, uMeredi amthathayo.
Lamadodana omkaHodiya, udadewabo kaNahama, uyise kaKeyila umGarmi.
Njalo amadodana kaShimoni: OAmnoni, loRina, uBheni-Hanani, loThiloni. Lamadodana kaIshi: OZohethi loBheni-Zohethi.
Amadodana kaShela indodana kaJuda,
loJokimi, lamadoda akoKhozeba, loJowashi, loSarafi ababebusa amaMowabi, loJashubi-Lehema. Lalezizindaba zindala.
Labo babengababumbi, labakhileyo ezilimeni lezintangweni; bahlala lapho lenkosi emsebenzini wayo.
Amadodana kaSimeyoni: ONemuweli, loJamini, loJaribi, uZera, uShawuli,
uShaluma indodana yakhe, uMibhisamu indodana yakhe, uMishima indodana yakhe.
Lamadodana kaMishima: UHamuweli indodana yakhe, uZakuri indodana yakhe, uShimeyi indodana yakhe.
Njalo uShimeyi wayelamadodana alitshumi lesithupha lamadodakazi ayisithupha; kodwa abafowabo babengelabantwana abanengi, losendo lonke lwabo kalwandanga njengabantwana bakoJuda.
Basebehlala eBherishebha leMolada leHazari-Shuwali
leBiliha
leBethuweli leZikilagi
leBeti-Marikabothi leHazari-Susimi leBeti-Biri. Le yayiyimizi yabo kwaze kwaba sekubuseni kukaDavida.
Lemizana yabo: IEtamu, leAyini, leTokeni, leAshani, imizi emihlanu,
layo yonke imizana yayo, eyayiyizingelezele leyomizi, kuze kube seBahali. Lezi zindawo zabo zokuhlala, njalo baba lombhalo wosendo lwabo.
LoMeshobabi loJamileki loJosha indodana kaAmaziya,
loJoweli loJehu indodana kaJoshibhiya indodana kaSeraya indodana kaAsiyeli,
loEliyohenayi loJahakoba loJeshohaya loAsaya loAdiyeli loJesimiyeli loBhenaya,
loZiza indodana kaShifi indodana kaAloni indodana kaJedaya indodana kaShimiri indodana kaShemaya.
Laba abaqanjwe ngamabizo babeyizikhulu ensendweni zabo, lezindlu zaboyise.
Basebesiya ekungeneni kweGedori, baya ngempumalanga kwesihotsha, ukudingela imihlambi yabo idlelo.
Bafica idlelo elivundileyo lelihle, lommango obanzi emaceleni; ngoba aba koHamu babehlala khona endulo.
Lalabo ababebhalwe ngamabizo bafika ensukwini zikaHezekhiya inkosi yakoJuda.
Kwasekuphuma kubo, ebantwaneni bakoSimeyoni, amadoda angamakhulu amahlanu, aya entabeni yeSeyiri. LoPelatiya loNeyariya loRefaya loUziyeli amadodana kaIshi babezinhloko zabo.
Basebetshaya insali yabaphephayo bamaAmaleki, bahlala khona kuze kube lamuhla.
Njalo amadodana kaRubeni, izibulo likaIsrayeli (ngoba wayelezibulo; futhi wayengabhalwanga njengezibulo;
ngoba uJuda wayelamandla kulabafowabo, lowayengumbusi wavela kuye, kodwa ubuzibulo babungobukaJosefa).
Amadodana kaRubeni, izibulo likaIsrayeli: OHanoki, loPalu, uHezironi, loKarmi.
Amadodana kaJoweli: UShemaya indodana yakhe, uGogi indodana yakhe, uShimeyi indodana yakhe,
uMika indodana yakhe, uReyaya indodana yakhe, uBhali indodana yakhe,
uBehera indodana yakhe, uTiligathi-Pilineseri inkosi yeAsiriya eyamthumbayo; wayeyisiphathamandla sabakoRubeni.
Njalo abafowabo ngensendo zabo, lapho bebhalwa ngokwezizukulwana zabo, bayizinhloko: OJeyiyeli, loZekhariya,
loBhela indodana kaAzazi indodana kaShema indodana kaJoweli, owayehlala eAroweri.
Langempumalanga wahlala kwaze kwaba sekungeneni kwenkangala kusukela emfuleni iYufrathi, ngoba izifuyo zabo zasezandile elizweni leGileyadi.
Ensukwini zikaSawuli balawula-ke impi lamaHagari, awa ngesandla sabo; bahlala emathenteni awo elizweni lonke lempumalanga yeGileyadi.
Labantwana bakoGadi bahlala maqondana labo elizweni leBashani kwaze kwaba seSaleka.
UJoweli inhloko, loShafamu owesibili, loJanayi loShafati eBashani.
Labafowabo ngendlu yaboyise: OMikayeli loMeshulamu loShebha loJorayi loJakani loZiya loEberi, beyisikhombisa.
Laba babengamadodana kaAbihayili indodana kaHuri indodana kaJarowa indodana kaGileyadi indodana kaMikayeli indodana kaJeshishayi indodana kaJahido indodana kaBuzi.
UAhi indodana kaAbidiyeli indodana kaGuni wayeyinhloko yendlu yaboyise.
Basebehlala eGileyadi, eBashani, lemizaneni yayo, lakuwo wonke amadlelo eSharoni, kwaze kwaba sekuphumeni kwawo.
Bonke laba babhalwa ngezizukulwana zabo ezinsukwini zikaJothamu inkosi yakoJuda.
Amadodana kaRubeni labakoGadi lengxenye yesizwe sakoManase, emadodeni angamaqhawe, athwala isihlangu lenkemba, anyathela idandili, lezingcitshi empini.
Basebelawula impi lamaHagari.
Bancediswa bemelene labo, amaHagari asenikelwa esandleni sabo, labo bonke ababelawo; ngoba bakhala kuNkulunkulu besempini, wasencengeka ngabo.

Bathumba izifuyo zabo, amakamela azinkulungwane ezingamatshumi amahlanu, lezimvu ezizinkulungwane ezingamakhulu amabili lamatshumi amahlanu, labobabhemi abazinkulungwane ezimbili, lemiphefumulo yabantu ezinkulungwane ezilikhulu.
Ngoba kwawa abanengi ababuleweyo, ngoba impi yayingekaNkulunkulu. Basebehlala ezindaweni zabo.
Abantwana bengxenye yesizwe sakoManase basebehlala elizweni; kusukela eBashani kusiya eBhali-Hermoni leSeniri.
Lalezi zinhloko zendlu yaboyise, ngitsho oEferi loIshi loEliyeli loAziriyeli loJeremiya loHodaviya loJahidiyeli, amadoda angamaqhawe alamandla, amadoda alamabizo, inhloko zendlu yaboyise.
Kodwa bona kuNkulunkulu waboyise, baphinga ngo kulandela onkulunkulu babantu balelolizwe, uNkulunkulu abachithayo phambi kwabo.
Ngakho uNkulunkulu kaIsrayeli wavusa umoya kaPhuli inkosi yeAsiriya, kuze kube lamuhla.
Amadodana kaLevi: OGerishoni, uKohathi, loMerari.
Lamadodana kaKohathi: OAmramu, uIzihari, loHebroni, loUziyeli.
Labantwana bakaAmramu: OAroni loMozisi loMiriyamu. Lamadodana kaAroni: ONadabi, loAbihu, uEleyazare, loIthamari.
UEleyazare;
uAbishuwa wasezala uBuki; uBuki wasezala uUzi;
uUzi wasezala uZerahiya; uZerahiya wasezala uMerayothi;
uMerayothi wazala uAmariya; uAmariya wasezala uAhitubi;
uAhitubi wasezala uZadoki;
uAhimahazi wasezala uAzariya; uAzariya wasezala uJohanani;
uJohanani (nguye owasebenza njengompristi endlini uSolomoni ayakha eJerusalema);
uAzariya wasezala uAmariya; uAmariya wasezala uAhitubi;
uAhitubi wasezala uZadoki; uZadoki wasezala uShaluma;
uShaluma wasezala uHilikhiya;
uAzariya wasezala uSeraya.
UJehozadaki laye wahamba lapho yathumba uJuda leJerusalema ngesandla sikaNebhukadinezari.
Amadodana kaLevi: OGerishoni, uKohathi, loMerari.
Lala ngamabizo amadodana kaGerishoni: OLibini loShimeyi.
Njalo amadodana kaKohathi.
Amadodana kaMerari. Lalezi zinsendo zamaLevi njengokwaboyise.
KoGerishoni: ULibini indodana yakhe, uJahathi indodana yakhe, uZima indodana yakhe,
uJowa indodana yakhe, uIdo indodana yakhe, uZera indodana yakhe, uJeyatherayi indodana yakhe.
Amadodana kaKohathi,
uElkana indodana yakhe, loEbiyasafi indodana yakhe, loAsiri indodana yakhe,
uTahathi indodana yakhe, uUriyeli indodana yakhe, uUziya indodana yakhe, loShawuli indodana yakhe.
Njalo amadodana kaElkana: OAmasayi loAhimothi.
UElkana; amadodana kaElkana: UZofayi indodana yakhe, loNahathi indodana yakhe,
uEliyabi indodana yakhe, uJerohamu indodana yakhe, uElkana indodana yakhe.
Amadodana kaSamuweli: Izibulo uVashini, loAbhiya.
Amadodana kaMerari: UMahli, uLibini indodana yakhe, uShimeyi indodana yakhe, uUza indodana yakhe,
uShimeya indodana yakhe, uHagiya indodana yakhe, uAsaya indodana yakhe.
Lalaba yibo uDavida abamisayo phezu kwenkonzo yengoma endlini yeN umtshokotsho usuphumule.
Njalo babekhonza phambi kwethabhanekele lethente lenhlangano ngengoma, uSolomoni waze wakha indlu yeN eJerusalema. Bema ngokwesimiso sabo enkonzweni yabo.
Lalaba yibo abema lamadodana abo: Kumadodana amaKohathi: UHemani umhlabeleli indodana kaJoweli
indodana kaElkana indodana kaJerohamu indodana kaEliyeli indodana kaTowa
indodana kaZufi indodana kaElkana indodana kaMahathi indodana kaAmasayi
indodana kaElkana indodana kaJoweli indodana kaAzariya indodana kaZefaniya
indodana kaTahathi indodana kaAsiri indodana kaEbhiyasafi indodana kaKora
indodana kaIzihari indodana kaKohathi indodana kaLevi indodana kaIsrayeli.
Lomfowabo uAsafi
indodana kaMikayeli indodana kaBahaseya indodana kaMalikiya
indodana kaEthini indodana kaZera indodana kaAdaya
indodana kaEthani indodana kaZima indodana kaShimeyi
indodana kaJahathi indodana kaGerishoni indodana kaLevi.
Lamadodana kaMerari, abafowabo, ema indodana kaAbidi indodana kaMaluki
indodana kaHashabhiya indodana kaAmaziya indodana kaHilikhiya
indodana kaAmizi indodana kaBani indodana kaShemeri
indodana kaMahli indodana kaMushi indodana kaMerari indodana kaLevi.
Labafowabo, amaLevi, bamiswa kuyo yonke inkonzo yethabhanekele lendlu kaNkulunkulu.
Kodwa uAroni lamadodana akhe banikela phezu kwelathi lomnikelo wokutshiswa.
Lala ngamadodana kaAroni: OEleyazare indodana yakhe, uPhinehasi indodana yakhe, uAbishuwa indodana yakhe,
uBuki indodana yakhe, uUzi indodana yakhe, uZerahiya indodana yakhe,
uMerayothi indodana yakhe, uAmariya indodana yakhe, uAhitubi indodana yakhe,
uZadoki indodana yakhe, uAhimahazi indodana yakhe.
Lezi-ke zindawo zawo zokuhlala ezinqabeni zawo emingceleni yawo, zamadodana kaAroni, zezinsendo zamaKohathi.
Basebewanika iHebroni elizweni lakoJuda, lamadlelo ayo ayizingelezeleyo.
Kodwa insimu yomuzi lemizana yawo bakunika uKalebi indodana kaJefune.
Basebenika amadodana kaAroni imizi yokuphephela: IHebroni, leLibhina lamadlelo ayo, leJathiri, leEshithemowa lamadlelo ayo,
leHileni lamadlelo ayo, iDebiri lamadlelo ayo,
leAshani lamadlelo ayo, leBeti-Shemeshi lamadlelo ayo.
Lesizweni sakoBhenjamini: IGeba lamadlelo ayo, leAlemethi lamadlelo ayo.
Lamadodana kaKohathi, aseleyo.
Njalo amadodana kaGerishoni, ngensendo zawo, esizweni sakoIsakari lesizweni sakoAsheri lesizweni sakoNafithali lesizweni sakoManase eBashani, aba lemizi elitshumi lantathu.
Amadodana kaMerari, ngensendo zawo, esizweni sakoRubeni lesizweni sakoGadi lesizweni sakoZebuluni, aba lemizi elitshumi lambili, ngenkatho.
Abantwana bakoIsrayeli basebenika amaLevi limizi kanye lamadlelo ayo.
Basebenika le imizi ngenkatho esizweni sabantwana bakoJuda lesizweni sabantwana bakoSimeyoni lesizweni sabantwana bakoBhenjamini.
Le zinyezensendo zamadodana kaKohathi zaba lemizi yemingcele yazo esizweni sakoEfrayimi.
Basebewanika imizi yokuphephela, iShekema lamadlelo ayo entabeni yakoEfrayimi, leGezeri lamadlelo ayo,
leJokimeyamu lamadlelo ayo, leBhethi-Horoni lamadlelo ayo,
leAjaloni lamadlelo ayo, leGathi-Rimoni lamadlelo ayo.
Lengxenyeni eyodwa kwezimbili yesizwe sakoManase: IAneri lamadlelo ayo.
Amadodana kaGerishoni ensendweni zengxenye yesizwe sakoManase aba leGolani eBashani lamadlelo ayo.
Lesizweni sakoIsakari: IKedeshi lamadlelo ayo,
leRamothi lamadlelo ayo.
Lesizweni sakoAsheri: IMashali lamadlelo ayo, leAbidoni lamadlelo ayo,
leHukoki lamadlelo ayo, leRehobi lamadlelo ayo.
Lesizweni sakoNafithali: IKedeshi eGalili lamadlelo ayo, leHamoni lamadlelo ayo.
Njalo;
langaphetsheya kweJodani, eJeriko, ngempumalanga kweJodani, esizweni sakoRubeni: IBezeri enkangala lamadlelo ayo,
leKedemothi lamadlelo ayo, leMefahathi lamadlelo ayo;
lesizweni sakoGadi: IRamothi eGileyadi lamadlelo ayo, leMahanayimi lamadlelo ayo,
leHeshiboni lamadlelo ayo.
Lemadodaneni kaIsakari: OThola, loPhuwa, uJashubi, loShimroni; bebane.
Njalo amadodana kaThola: OUzi, loRefaya, loJeriyeli, loJahimayi, loIbisamu, loShemuweli, izinhloko zendlu yaboyise.
Lamadodana kaUzi: UIzrahiya. Lamadodana kaIzrahiya: OMikayeli, loObhadiya, loJoweli, uIshiya, bebahlanu; beyizinhloko bonke.
Kanye labo-ke, ngensendo zabo, ngendlu yaboyise, kwakukhona amaviyo ebutho lempi, izinkulungwane ezingamatshumi amathathu lesithupha, ngoba babelabafazi labantwana abanengi.
Labafowabo, phakathi kwensendo zonke zakoIsakari, amaqhawe alamandla, izinkulungwane ezingamatshumi ayisificaminwembili lesikhombisa, bebhalwe bonke ngezizukulwana.
AmadodanakaBhenjamini: OBhela, loBekeri loJediyayeli, bebathathu.

Lamadodana kaBhela: OEziboni, loUzi, loUziyeli, loJerimothi, loIri, bebahlanu; izinhloko zendlu zaboyise, amaqhawe alamandla; bebhalwe ngezizukulwana, babeyizinkulungwane ezingamatshumi amabili lambili lamatshumi amathathu lane.
Njalo amadodana kaBekeri: OZemira, loJowashi, loEliyezeri, loEliyohenayi, loOmri, loJeremothi, loAbhiya, loAnathothi; bonke laba babengamadodana kaBekeri.
Bebhalwe ngensendo ngezizukulwana zabo, izinhloko zezindlu zaboyise, amaqhawe alamandla, babezinkulungwane ezingamatshumi amabili lamakhulu amabili.
Njalo amadodana kaJediyayeli: UBilihani. Lamadodana kaBilihani: OJewushi, loBhenjamini, loEhudi, loKenahana, loZethani, loTarshishi, loAhishahari.
Bonke laba babengamadodana kaJediyayeli, ngezinhloko zaboyise, amaqhawe alamandla; babeyizinkulungwane ezilitshumi lesikhombisa lamakhulu amabili, angaphuma ebuthweni ukuya empini.
LoShupimi loHupimi babengamadodana kaIri, lo Hushimi amadodana kaAheri.
Amadodana kaNafithali: OJahaziyeli, loGuni, loJezeri, loShaluma, amadodana kuBiliha.
Amadodana kaManase.
UMakiri wathatha udadewabo kaHupimi loShupimi, waba ngumka khe, obizo lakhe nguMahaka.
UMahaka umkaMakiri wasezala indodana, wayitha ibizo wathinguPereshi; lebizo lomfowabo lalinguShereshi, lamadodana akhe ayengoUlamu loRakema.
Njalo amadodana kaUlamu: UBedani. La ayengamadodana kaGileyadi indodana kaMakiri indodana kaManase.
Udadewabo uHamolekethi wasezala oIshodi loAbiyezeri loMahla.
Lamadodana kaShemida ayengoAhiyani loShekema loLikhi loAniyamu.
Njalo amadodana kaEfrayimi: OShuthela, loBeredi indodana yakhe, loTahathi indodana yakhe, loEleyada indodana yakhe, loTahathi indodana yakhe,
loZabadi indodana yakhe, loShuthela indodana yakhe, loEzeri loEleyadi, amadoda eGathi azalelwa kulelolizwe abababulalayo, ngoba behlela ukuthatha izifuyo zabo.
UEfrayimi uyise walila insuku ezinengi; abafowabo basebesiza uku za mduduza.
Wasengena kumkakhe; wathatha isisu, wazala indodana; waseyitha ibizo wathinguBeriya, ngoba wayesebubini endlini yakhe.
Lendodakazi yakhe yayinguShera, owakha iBethi-Horoni engaphansi lengaphezulu, leUzeni-Shera.
Njalo uRefa wayeyindodana yakhe, loReshefi, loTela indodana yakhe, loTahani indodana yakhe,
uLadani indodana yakhe, uAmihudi indodana yakhe, uElishama indodana yakhe,
uNoni indodana yakhe, uJoshuwa indodana yakhe.
Lemfuyo yawo lendawo zawo zokuhlala kwakuyiBhetheli lemizana yayo, leShekema lemizana yayo, kwaze kwaba seAya lemizana yayo.
Lasemingceleni yabantwana bakoManase, iBeti-Sheyani lemizana yayo, iThahanakhi lemizana yayo, iMegido lemizana yayo, iDori lemizana yayo. Kule kwahlala abantwana bakoJosefa indodana kaIsrayeli.
Abantwana bakaAsheri: OImina, loBeriya, loSera udadewabo.
Njalo amadodana kaBeriya: OHeberi, loMalikiyeli onguyise kaBirizayithi.
UHeberi wasezala oJafilethi loShomeri loHothamu loShuwa udadewabo.
Lamadodana kaJafilethi: OPasaki loBimihali loAshivathi; la ngamadodana kaJafilethi.
Lamadodana kaShemeri: OAhi, loRohiga, uJehuba, loAramu.
Njalo amadodana kaHelemu umfowabo: OZofa loImina loSheleshi loAmali.
Njalo amadodana kaZofa: OSuwa, loHarineferi, loShuwali, loBeri, loImra,
uBezeri, loHodi, loShama, loShilisha, loIthirani, loBehera.
Njalo amadodana kaJetheri: OJefune loPisipa loAra.
Njalo amadodana kaUla: OAra loHaniyeli loRiziya.

Bonke laba babengabantwana bakaAsheri, izinhloko zendlu yaboyise, abakhethiweyo, amaqhawe alamandla, izinhloko zeziphathamandla. Basebebhalwa ngezizukulwana ebuthweni empini; inani labo lalingamadoda azinkulungwane ezingamatshumi amabili lesithupha.
UBhenjamini wasezala uBhela izibulo lakhe, uAshibeli owesibili,
uNoha owesine, loRafa owesihlanu.
Njalo uBhela wayelamadodana: OAdari loGera loAbhihudi
loAbishuwa loNamani
loGera loShefufani loHuramu.
Lala ngamadodana kaEhudi; lezi zinhloko zaboyise zabahlali beGeba;
loNamani; yena wabathumba; wasezala oUza loAhihudi.
UShaharayimi wasezala abantwanaelizweni lakoMowabi, esebaxotshile; oHushimi loBahara babengomkakhe.
Wasezala kuHodeshi umkakhe oJobabi loZibiya loMesha loMalikamu
loJewuzi loSakiya loMirima. Laba babengamadodana akhe, izinhloko zaboyise.
KuHushimi wasezala oAbitubi loEliphahali.
Amadodana kaEliphahali: OEberi, loMishamu, loShemedi owakha iOno,
loBeriya, loShema,
loAhiyo, uShashaki, loJeremothi,
loZebhadiya, loAradi, loEderi,
loMikayeli, loIshipa, loJoha, amadodana kaBeriya.
LoZebhadiya, loMeshulamu, loHiziki, loHeberi,
loIshmerayi, loIziliya, loJobabi, amadodana kaEliphahali.
LoJakimi, loZikiri, loZabidi,
loEliyenayi, loZilethayi, loEliyeli,
loAdaya, loBeraya, loShimirathi, amadodana kaShimeyi.
LoIshipani, loEberi, loEliyeli,
loAbidoni, loZikiri, loHanani,
loHananiya, loElamu, loAnithothiya,
loIfideya, loPenuweli, amadodana kaShashaki.
LoShamisherayi, loShekariya, loAthaliya,
loJahareshiya, loEliya, loZikiri, amadodana kaJerohamu.
Laba babezinhloko zaboyise, izinhloko ngezizukulwana zabo; laba bahlala eJerusalema.
EGibeyoni.
Lendodana yakhe, izibulo lakhe, nguAbhidoni, loZuri, loKishi, loBhali, loNadabi,
loGedori, loAhiyo, loZekeri.
UMikilothi wasezala uShimeya. Lalaba babehlala maqondana labafowabo eJerusalema, kanye labafowabo.
UNeri.
Njalo indodana kaJonathani yayinguMeribi-Bhali; uMeribi-Bhali wasezala uMika.
Njalo amadodana kaMika: OPithoni loMeleki loTareya loAhazi.
UAhazi wasezala uJehoyada; uJehoyada wasezala oAlemethi loAzimavethi loZimri; uZimri wasezala uMoza;
uMoza wasezala uBineya; uRafa wayey indodana yakhe, uEleyasa indodana yakhe, uAzeli indodana yakhe.
Njalo uAzeli wayelamadodana ayisithupha; lala ngamabizo awo: OAzirikamu, uBhokeru, loIshmayeli, loSheyariya, loObhadiya, loHanani. Wonke la ngamadodana kaAzeli.
Njalo amadodana kaEsheki umfowabo: OUlamu izibulo lakhe, uJewushi eyesibili, loElifeleti eyesithathu.
Njalo amadodana kaUlamu ayengamadoda, amaqhawe alamandla, anyathela idandili, elamadodana amanengi lamadodana amadodana, ikhulu lamatshumi amahlanu. Bonke laba babengabantwana bakoBhenjamini.
UIsrayeli wonke wasebalwa ngezizukulwana; khangela-ke, zibhaliwe egwalweni lwamakhosi akoIsrayeli.
Njalo abahlali bokuqala ababeselizweni labo emizini yabo kwakunguIsrayeli, abapristi, amaLevi.
Njalo eJerusalema kwahlala ababantwana bakoJuda lababantwana bakoBhenjamini lababantwana bakoEfrayimi loManase:
U-Uthayi indodana kaAmihudi indodana kaOmri indodana kaImri indodana kaBani, wabantwana bakaPerezi indodana kaJuda.
LakumaShiloni: UAsaya izibulo, lamadodana akhe.
Lakumadodana kaZera: UJeyuweli labafowabo, amakhulu ayisithupha lamatshumi ayisificamunwemunye.
Lakumadodana akoBhenjamini: USalu indodana kaMeshulamu indodana kaHodaviya indodana kaHasenuwa;
loIbineya indodana kaJerohamu, loEla indodana kaUzi indodana kaMikiri, loMeshulamu indodana kaShefathiya indodana kaRehuweli indodana kaIbiniya;
labafowabo ngezizukulwana zabo, amakhulu ayisificamunwemunye lamatshumi amahlanu lesithupha.
Lakubapristi: OJedaya, loJehoyaribi, loJakini,
loAzariya indodana kaHilikhiya indodana kaMeshulamu,
loAdaya,
labafowabo, izinhloko zendlu yaboyise, inkulungwane lamakhulu ayisikhombisa lamatshumi ayisithupha, abalamandla ngobungcwethi emsebenzini wenkonzo yendlu kaNkulunkulu.
LakumaLevi: UShemaya indodana kaHashubi indodana kaAzirikamu indodana kaHashabhiya, owamadodana kaMerari,
loBakibakari, uHereshi, loGalali,
loObhadiya.
Labagcini bamasango oShaluma loAkubi loTalimoni loAhimani; lomfowabo uShaluma wayeyinhloko;
njalo kuze kube lesisikhathi, babesangweni lenkosi ngempumalanga, laba babengabagcini bamasango enkambeni yabantwana bakoLevi.
UShaluma indodana kaKore indodana kaEbiyasafi indodana kaKora, labafowabo, abendlu kayise.
UPhinehasi indodana kaEleyazare wayengumbusi phezu kwabo ngaphambili; yayilaye.
UZekhariya indodana kaMeshelemiya wayengumgcinisango emnyango wethente lenhlangano.
Bonke labo abakhethwayo babangabagcinimasango emibundwini, babengamakhulu amabili letshumi lambili.
Ngakho bona lamadodana abo baphatha amasango endlini yeN, indlu yethente, ngemilindo.
Abalindi bamasango babekhona emimoyeni yomine, empumalanga, entshonalanga, enyakatho, leningizimu.
Labafowabo ababesemizini yabo.
Ngoba amaLevi la, abagcini bamasango abakhulu bobane, babesesikhundleni, babephethe amakamelo bephezu kwezindlu zenotho zendlu kaNkulunkulu.
Njalo babehlala ebusuku bezingelezele indlu kaNkulunkulu, ngoba umlindo wawuphezu kwabo, njalo bephethe ukuvulwa kwayo, ngitsho ikuseni ngekuseni.
Njalo abanyebabo babephethe izitsha zenkonzo, ngoba ngenani bazingenisa, langenani bazikhupha.
L abanyebabo babemiswe phezu kwezitsha, laphezu kwazo zonke izitsha ezingcwele, laphezu kwempuphu ecolekileyo lewayini lamafutha lempepha lamakha.
Abanyeemadodaneni abapristi babehlanganisa-ke amafutha amakha.
LoMathithiya kumaLevi, owayelizibulo likaShaluma umKora, wayephathiswe umsebenzi wamaqebelengwana abhakwe emapanini.
L abanyebabantwana bamaKohathi kubafowabo babephethe isinkwa sokubukiswa uku si lungisa isabatha ngesabatha.
Lalaba ngabahlabeleli, izinhloko zaboyise bamaLevi.
Laba bazinhloko zaboyise bamaLevi, izinhloko ngezizukulwana zabo; laba bahlala eJerusalema.
EGibeyoni kwakuhlala-ke uyise kaGibeyoni, uJehiyeli; lebizo lomkakhe lalinguMahaka.
Lendodana yakhe elizibulo uAbidoni, loZuri loKishi loBhali loNeri loNadabi
loGedori loAhiyo loZekhariya loMikilothi.
UMikilothi wasezala uShimeyamu; laba labo bahlala eJerusalema maqondana labafowabo kanye labafowabo.
UNeri wasezala uKishi; uKishi wasezala uSawuli; uSawuli wasezala oJonathani loMaliki-Shuwa loAbinadaba loEshibhali.
Njalo indodana kaJonathani yayinguMeribi-Bhali; uMeribi-Bhali wasezala uMika.
Njalo amadodana kaMika: OPithoni loMeleki loTareya.
UAhazi wasezala uJara; uJara wasezala oAlemethi loAzimavethi loZimri. UZimri wasezala uMoza.
UMoza wasezala uBineya, loRefaya indodana yakhe, uEleyasa indodana yakhe, uAzeli indodana yakhe.
Njalo uAzeli wayelamadodana ayisithupha; lala ngamabizo awo: OAzirikamu, uBhokeru, loIshmayeli, loSheyariya, loObhadiya, loHanani. La ayengamadodana kaAzeli.
AmaFilisti asesilwa emelene loIsrayeli; lamadoda akoIsrayeli abaleka phambi kwamaFilisti, awa abulawa entabeni yeGilibowa.
AmaFilisti asenamathela ngemva kukaSawuli langemva kwamadodana akhe; amaFilisti atshaya uJonathani loAbinadaba loMaliki-Shuwa, amadodana kaSawuli.
Impi yasisiba nzima imelene loSawuli; abatshoka ngamadandili basebemfica; waselinyazwa ngabatshoki.

USawuli wasesithi kumthwali wezikhali zakhe: Hwatsha inkemba yakho, ungigwaze ngayo, hlezi laba abangasokanga bafike, badlale kubi ngami. Kodwa umthwali wezikhali zakhe kavumanga, ngoba wesaba kakhulu. USawuli wasethatha inkemba, wa zi wisela phezu kwayo.
Lapho umthwali wezikhali zakhe ebona ukuthi uSawuli u se file, laye wa zi wisela phezu kwenkemba, wafa.
Wafa-ke uSawuli, lamadodana akhe amathathu, lendlu yakhe yonke; bafa ndawonye.
Kwathi wonke amadoda akoIsrayeli ayesesigodini ebona ukuthi abalekile, lokuthi uSawuli lamadodana akhe bafile, atshiya imizi yawo, abaleka; amaFilisti asefika, ahlala kiyo.
Kwasekusithi kusisa lapho amaFilisti efika ukuhlubula ababuleweyo, afica uSawuli lamadodana akhe bewile entabeni yeGilibowa.
Amhlubula, athatha ikhanda lakhe lezikhali zakhe, athumela elizweni lamaFilisti inhlangothi zonke, ukumemezela imibiko ezithombeni zawo lebantwini.
Asebeka izikhali zakhe endlini yabonkulunkulu bawo, abethela ukhakhayi lwakhe endlini kaDagoni.
Kwathi iJabeshi-Gileyadi yonke isizwile konke amaFilisti akwenze kuSawuli,
wonke amaqhawe asuka, athatha isidumbu sikaSawuli lezidumbu zamadodana akhe, aziletha eJabeshi, angcwaba amathambo abo ngaphansi kwesihlahla se-okhi eJabeshi, azila ukudla insuku eziyisikhombisa.
Ngakho uSawuli wafa ngenxa yesiphambeko sakhe aphambuka ngaso emelene leN, emelene lelizwi leN ayengaligcinanga,
njalo kakudinganga eNni.
UIsrayeli wonke wasebuthana kuDavida eHebroni esithi: Khangela, thina silithambo lakho lenyama yakho.

Ngitsho mandulo, ngitsho uSawuli eyinkosi, nguwe owakhupha lowangenisa uIsrayeli; uNkulunkulu wakho yasisithi kuwe: Wena uzakwelusa abantu bami uIsrayeli, njalo wena uzakuba ngumbusi phezu kwabantu bami uIsrayeli.

Kwasekufika bonke abadala bakoIsrayeli enkosini eHebroni. UDavida wasesenza isivumelwano labo eHebroni phambi kweN. Basebemgcoba uDavida ukuba yinkosi phezu kukaIsrayeli, njengelizwi leN ngesandla sikaSamuweli.
UDavida loIsrayeli wonke basebesiya eJerusalema, eyiJebusi, ngoba lapho kwakulamaJebusi, abahlali balelolizwe.
Abahlali beJebusi basebesithi kuDavida: Kawuyikungena lapha. Kodwa uDavida wayithumba inqaba yeZiyoni, engumuzi kaDavida.
UDavida wasesithi: Loba ngubani ozatshaya amaJebusi kuqala uzakuba yinhloko lenduna. Ngakho uJowabi indodana kaZeruya wenyuka kuqala, waba yinhloko.
UDavida wasehlala enqabeni; ngalokho-ke bayibiza ngokuthingumuzi kaDavida.
Wasewakha umuzi inhlangothi zonke, kusukela eMilo waze wawuhlanganisa. UJowabi wasevuselela okuseleyo komuzi.
UDavida wasesiya eqhubeka esiba mkhulu, ngoba yamabandla yayilaye.
Lalezi zinhloko zamaqhawe uDavida ayelazo, ezaziqinisa kanye laye embusweni wakhe, loIsrayeli wonke, ukumenza inkosi.
Laleli linani lamaqhawe uDavida ayelawo: UJashobeyamu indodana yomHakimoni.
Lemva kwakhe kwakuloEleyazare indodana kaDodo umAhohi; wayephakathi kwamaqhawe amathathu.
Yena wayeloDavida ePasi-Damimi lapho amaFilisti ayebuthanele impi khona. Lesiqinti sensimu sasigcwele ibhali; abantu basebebaleka phambi kwamaFilisti.
Bona bazimisa phakathi kwesiqinti, basikhulula, batshaya amaFilisti, yasisindisa ngokukhulula okukhulu.
Abathathu ezinduneni ezingamatshumi amathathu basebesehlela edwaleni kuDavida, ebhalwini lweAdulamu; lebutho lamaFilisti lalimise inkamba esihotsheni seRefayimi.
UDavida ngalesosikhathi wayesenqabeni, lebutho lenqaba lamaFilisti ngalesosikhathi laliseBhethelehema.
UDavida waselangatha wathi: Hawu, kungathi omunye ubenganginathisa amanzi omthombo weBhethelehema osesangweni!
Labo abathathu bafohlela enkambeni yamaFilisti, bakha amanzi emthonjeni weBhethelehema owawusesangweni, bawathwala bawaletha kuDavida; kodwa uDavida kafunanga ukuwanatha, kodwa wawathululela iN.

Wasesithi: Kakube khatshana lami, ngoNkulunkulu wami, ukwenza lokho. Nginganatha yini igazi lalamadoda abeke impilo yawo engozini? Ngoba ngokubeka impilo yawo engozini, awalethile. Ngakho kafunanga ukuwanatha. Lezizinto azenza lawomaqhawe amathathu.
UAbishayi umfowabo kaJowabi, yena-ke wayeyinhloko yabathathu. Yena ephakamisa umkhonto wakhe emelene labangamakhulu amathathu wababulala; wasesiba lebizo phakathi kwabathathu.
Kwabathathu wayehlonitshwa kulababili, wasesiba yinduna yabo; kodwa kafinyelelanga kwabathathu abokuqala.

UBhenaya indodana kaJehoyada, indodana yeqhawe leKabhiseyeli, wayemkhulu ngezenzo: Nguye owatshaya abakoMowabi ababili ababenjengezilwane; futhi yena wehla wabulala isilwane phakathi komgodi mhla weliqhwa elikhithikileyo.

Yena wasetshaya indoda engumGibhithe, umuntu omude, ozingalo ezinhlanu. Lesandleni somGibhithe kwakulomkhonto onjengogodo lomeluki; kodwa wehlela kuye ngenduku, wahluthuna umkhonto esandleni somGibhithe, wambulala ngowakhe umkhonto.
Lezizinto wazenza uBhenaya indodana kaJehoyada, waba lebizo phakathi kwamaqhawe amathathu.
Khangela, wahlonitshwa phakathi kwabangamatshumi amathathu, kodwa kafinyelelanga kwabathathu. UDavida wasembeka phezu kwabalindi bakhe.
Lamaqhawe amabutho: OAsaheli umfowabo kaJowabi, uElihanani indodana kaDodo weBhethelehema,
uShamothi umHarodi, uHelezi umPheloni,
uIra indodana kaIkheshi umThekhowa, uAbiyezeri umAnathothi,
uSibekayi umHushathi, uIlayi umAhohi,
uMaharayi umNetofa, uHelebi indodana kaBahana umNetofa,
uIthayi indodana kaRibayi weGibeya yabantwana bakoBhenjamini, uBhenaya umPirathoni,
uHurayi wezifula zeGahashi, uAbiyeli umArba,
uAzimavethi umBaharumi, uEliyabha umShahaliboni,
amadodana kaHashema umGizoni, uJonathani indodana kaShage umHarari,
uAhiyamu indodana kaSakari umHarari, uElifali indodana kaUri,
uHeferi umMekera,
uHeziro umKharmeli, uNaharayi indodana kaEzibayi,
uJoweli umfowabo kaNathani, uMibhari indodana kaHagiri,
uZeleki umAmoni, uNaharayi umBherothi, umthwali wezikhali zikaJowabi indodana kaZeruya,
uIra umIthiri, uGarebi umIthiri,
uUriya umHethi, uZabadi indodana kaAhilayi,
uAdina indodana kaShiza umRubeni, inhloko kwabakoRubeni, labangamatshumi amathathu belaye,
uHanani indodana kaMahaka, loJoshafati umMithini,
uUziya umAshiterathi,
uJediyayeli indodana kaShimri, loJoha umfowabo umTizi,
uEliyeli umMahavi, loJeribayi loJoshaviya amadodana kaElinahamu, loIthima umMowabi,
loEliyeli, loObedi, loJahasiyeli umMezobaya.
Laba-ke yilabo abeza kuDavida eZikilagi, lapho esavalelwe ngenxa kaSawuli indodana kaKishi; njalo babephakathi kwamaqhawe, abasizi bempi.
Behlomile ngamadandili.
Inhloko yayinguAhiyezeri, loJowashi, amadodana kaShemaha umGibeya,
loIshmaya umGibeyoni,
uEluzayi, loJerimothi, loBeyaliya, loShemariya, loShefathiya umHarufi,
uElkana, loIshiya, loAzareli, loJowezeri, loJashobeyamu, amaKora,
loJowela, loZebhadiya, amadodana kaJehoramu weGedori.
LakwabakoGadi bazehlukanisela kuDavida enqabeni enkangala, amaqhawe alamandla, amadoda ebutho empi, ephatha isihlangu esikhulu lomkhonto, obuso bawo babuyibuso bezilwane.
UEzeri wayeyinhloko, uObhadiya owesibili, uEliyabi owesithathu,
uMishimana owesine, uJeremiya owesihlanu,
uAthayi owesithupha, uEliyeli owesikhombisa,
uJohanani owesificaminwembili, uElizabadi owesificamunwemunye,
uJeremiya owetshumi, uMakibanayi owetshumi lanye.
Laba babengabamadodana akoGadi, izinhloko zebutho; omunye wabancinyane wayephethe ikhulu, lomkhulu wayephethe inkulungwane.
Laba yibo abachapha iJodani ngenyanga yokuqala lapho yayigcwele iphuphuma inkumbi zonke zayo, baxotsha bonke ababese zigodini ngempumalanga langentshonalanga.
Basebefika bevela ebantwaneni bakoBhenjamini labakoJuda enqabeni kuDavida.
UDavida wasephuma ukubahlangabeza, waphendula wathi kibo: Uba lisiza kimi ngokuthula ukungisiza, ngilenhliziyo ehlangene lani.
UMoya wasesehlela kuAmasayi inhloko yezinduna! UDavida wasebemukela, wabenza induna zeviyo.

Abavela koManase bahlamukela kuDavida ekufikeni kwakhe lamaFilisti emelene loSawuli empini. Kodwa kababasizanga, ngoba ababusi bamaFilisti bamxotsha ngecebo besithi: Ngamakhanda ethu uzahlamukela enkosini yakhe uSawuli.
Ekuyeni kwakhe eZikilagi kwabalekela kuye abavela koManase: OAdina loJozabadi loJediyayeli loMikhayeli loJozabadi loElihu loZilethayi, inhloko zezinkulungwane ababengabakoManase.
Bona basebesiza kanye loDavida bemelene leviyo elihlaselayo, ngoba bonke babengamaqhawe alamandla, bezinduna ebuthweni.
Ngoba ngesikhathi insuku ngensuku beza kuDavida ukumnceda baze babe libutho elikhulu njengebutho likaNkulunkulu.
Lala ngamanani ezinhloko ezazihlomele impi.
Abantwana bakoJuda bethwele isihlangu esikhulu lomkhonto babeyizinkulungwane eziyisithupha lamakhulu ayisificaminwembili, behlomele impi.
Ebantwaneni bakoSimeyoni, amaqhawe alamandla empi, izinkulungwane eziyisikhombisa lekhulu.
Ebantwaneni bakoLevi, izinkulungwane ezine lamakhulu ayisithupha.
LoJehoyada wayeyisiphathamandla sabakoAroni; kanye laye kwakulezinkulungwane ezintathu lamakhulu ayisikhombisa.
LoZadoki ijaha, iqhawe elilamandla; lendlini kayise izinduna ezingamatshumi amabili.
Lebantwaneni bakoBhenjamini, abafowabo bakaSawuli, izinkulungwane ezintathu; ngoba kuze kube khathesi ubunengi babo bagcina uthembeko endlini kaSawuli.
Lebantwaneni bakoEfrayimi, izinkulungwane ezingamatshumi amabili lamakhulu ayisificaminwembili, amaqhawe alamandla, amadoda alamabizo endlini yaboyise.
Lengxenyeni eyodwa kwezimbili yesizwe sakoManase, izinkulungwane ezilitshumi leyisificaminwembili, ababeqanjwe ngamabizo ukuthi beze babeke uDavida abe yinkosi.
Lebantwaneni bakoIsakari, ababelokwazi beqedisisa izikhathi ukwazi ukuthi uIsrayeli ufanele enzeni, izinhloko zabo zazingamakhulu amabili, labafowabo bonke babesemlayweni wazo.
KoZebuluni, abaphuma impi, behlela impi ngazo zonke izikhali zempi, izinkulungwane ezingamatshumi amahlanu, ukugcina iviyo kungengenhliziyombili.
LakoNafithali, izinduna eziyinkulungwane, labayizinkulungwane ezingamatshumi amathathu lesikhombisa kanye lazo, belesihlangu esikhulu lomkhonto.
LakwabakoDani, abahlela impi, izinkulungwane ezingamatshumi amabili lesificaminwembili lamakhulu ayisithupha.
LakoAsheri.
Lababevela ngaphetsheya kweJodani, kwabakoRubeni labakoGadi lengxenye yesizwe sakoManase, belezikhali zonke zempi ukuyakulwa, izinkulungwane ezilikhulu lamatshumi amabili.

Wonke lamadoda empi, angagcina iviyo, afika eHebroni ngenhliziyo epheleleyo ukubeka uDavida abe yinkosi phezu kukaIsrayeli wonke; njalo loIsrayeli wonke oseleyo wayenhliziyonye ukubeka uDavida abe yinkosi.
Njalo baba lapho loDavida insuku ezintathu besidla benatha, ngoba abafowabo babebalungisele.
Futhi lababeseduze labo kuze kube koIsakari lakoZebuluni lakoNafithali baletha isinkwa ngabobabhemi langamakamela langezimbongolo langezinkabi.
UDavida wasecebisana lezinduna zezinkulungwane lezamakhulu laye wonke umphathi.

UDavida wasesithi ebandleni lonke lakoIsrayeli: Uba kulungile kini, njalo kuvela eNni uNkulunkulu wethu, kasisabalale sithumele kubafowethu abaseleyo emazweni wonke akoIsrayeli lakubapristi lamaLevi alabo emizini, emadlelweni, ukuze babuthane kithi.
Besesibuyisa kithi umtshokotsho wesivumelwano sikaNkulunkulu wethu, ngoba kasiwudinganga ensukwini zikaSawuli.
Ibandla lonke laselisithi kwenziwe njalo, ngoba udaba lwalulungile emehlweni abo bonke abantu.
UDavida wasebuthanisa uIsrayeli wonke.
UDavida loIsrayeli wonke basebesenyukela.
Basebewuthwala umtshokotsho kaNkulunkulu ngenqola entsha bewususa endlini kaAbinadaba; njalo oUza loAhiyo babetshayela leyonqola.
UDavida loIsrayeli wonke babedlala-ke phambi kukaNkulunkulu ngamandla wonke, langengoma, langamachacho.
Lapho befika ebaleni lokubhulela likaKidoni, uUza welula isandla sakhe ukubamba umtshokotsho, ngoba inkabi zakhubeka.
Ulaka lweN lwaselumvuthela uUza, yamtshaya, ngenxa yokuthi welulela isandla sakhe emtshokotshweni; wasefela khonapho phambi kukaNkulunkulu.
UDavida wasethukuthela ngoba imfohlele ngokufohla uUza; waseyibiza leyondawo ngokuthiyiPerezi-Uza, kuze kube lamuhla.
UDavida wasemesaba uNkulunkulu ngalolosuku, esithi: Ngizawuletha njani kimi umtshokotsho kaNkulunkulu?
Ngakho uDavida kawulethanga umtshokotsho kuye emzini kaDavida, kodwa wawuphambulela endlini kaObedi-Edoma umGithi.
Ngakho umtshokotsho kaNkulunkulu wahlala kwabendlu kaObedi-Edoma endlini yakhe inyanga ezintathu. yasibusisa indlu kaObedi-Edoma lakho konke ayelakho.
UHiramu inkosi yeTire wasethuma izithunywa kuDavida, lezigodo zemisedari lababazi bamatshe lababazi bezigodo ukumakhela indlu.
UDavida wasesazi ukuthi yayimmisile ukuthi abe yinkosi phezu kukaIsrayeli, ngoba umbuso wakhe wawuphakanyiselwe phezulu ngenxa yabantu bayo uIsrayeli.
UDavida wasethatha abanye abafazi eJerusalema; uDavida wasezala amanye amadodana lamadodakazi.
Lala ngamabizo abantwana aba labo eJerusalema: OShamuwa, loShobabi, uNathani, loSolomoni,
loIbihari, loElishuwa, loEliphaleti,
loNoga, loNefegi, loJafiya,
loElishama, loBeyeliyada, loElifaleti.
AmaFilisti esezwile ukuthi uDavida ugcotshiwe ukuthi abe yinkosi phezu kukaIsrayeli wonke, wonke amaFilisti enyuka ukudinga uDavida; uDavida ekuzwa waphuma uku ya melana lawo.
AmaFilisti asefika azisabalalisa esihotsheni seRefayimi.
UDavida wasebuza kuNkulunkulu esithi: Ngenyukele yini kumaFilisti? Uzawanikela esandleni sami yini? yasisithi kuye: Yenyuka, ngoba ngizawanikela esandleni sakho.

Basebesenyukela eBhali-Perazimi, uDavida wawatshaya lapho; uDavida wasesithi: UNkulunkulu ufohlele ezitheni zami ngesandla sami njengokufohla kwamanzi. Ngenxa yalokhu babiza leyondawo ngokuthiyiBhali-Perazimi.
Asetshiya onkulunkulu bawo lapho, uDavida wasesithi kabatshiswe ngomlilo.
AmaFilisti asebuya ezisabalalisa esihotsheni futhi.
Lapho uDavida ebuza futhi kuNkulunkulu, uNkulunkulu wathi kuye: Ungenyukeli ngemva kwawo, agombolozele usuka kiwo, uze kuwo maqondana lezihlahla zebhalisamu.
Kuzakuthi-ke lapho usizwa umsindo wokuhamba ezihlokweni zezihlahla zebhalisamu, ubusuphumela empini, ngoba uNkulunkulu uzabe esephume phambi kwakho ukutshaya ibutho lamaFilisti.
Ngakho uDavida wenza njengoba uNkulunkulu emlayile; basebetshaya ibutho lamaFilisti kusukela eGibeyoni kwaze kwaba seGezeri.
Njalo ibizo likaDavida laphumela kuwo wonke amazwe.
Wasezenzela izindlu emzini kaDavida, walungisela umtshokotsho kaNkulunkulu indawo, wawumisela ithente.
Ngalesosikhathi uDavida wathi: Kakho ongathwala umtshokotsho kaNkulunkulu ngaphandle kwamaLevi, ngoba yiwo eyawakhethela ukuthwala umtshokotsho kaNkulunkulu, lokuyikhonza kuze kube nininini.
UDavida wasebuthanisa uIsrayeli wonke eJerusalema.
UDavida wasebuthanisa amadodana kaAroni lamaLevi.
Kumadodana kaKohathi, uUriyeli induna, labafowabo, ikhulu lamatshumi amabili.
Kumadodana kaMerari, uAsaya induna, labafowabo, amakhulu amabili lamatshumi amabili.
Kumadodana kaGerishoni, uJoweli induna, labafowabo, ikhulu lamatshumi amathathu.
Kumadodana kaElizafani, uShemaya induna, labafowabo, amakhulu amabili.
Kumadodana kaHebroni, uEliyeli induna, labafowabo, amatshumi ayisificaminwembili.
Kumadodana kaUziyeli, uAminadaba induna, labafowabo, ikhulu letshumi lambili.
UDavida wasebiza oZadoki.
Wasesithi kubo: Lizinhloko zaboyise bamaLevi; zingcweliseni lina labafowenu ukuze lenyuse umtshokotsho weN uNkulunkulu kaIsrayeli.
Ngoba lina lalingekho kuqala.
Ngakho abapristi lamaLevi bazingcwelisa ukwenyusa umtshokotsho weN uNkulunkulu kaIsrayeli.
Abantwana bamaLevi basebethwala umtshokotsho kaNkulunkulu, njengokulaya kukaMozisi ngokwelizwi leN KOSI.
UDavida wasesithi ezinduneni zamaLevi zimise abafowabo, abahlabeleli, lezinto zokuhlabelela.
AmaLevi asemisa uHemani indodana kaJoweli.

Njalo kanye labo abafowabo besigaba sesibili: OZekhariya, uBeni, loJahaziyeli, loShemiramothi, loJehiyeli, loUni, uEliyabi, loBhenaya, loMahaseya, loMathithiya, loElifelehu, loMikineya, loObedi-Edoma, loJeyiyeli, abalindi bamasango.
Abahlabeleli oHemani, uAsafi, loEthani bazizwakalisa-ke ngensimbi ezincencethayo zethusi.
LoZekhariya loAziyeli loShemiramothi loJehiyeli loUni loEliyabi loMahaseya loBhenaya belezigubhu zezintambo.
LoMathithiya loElifelehu loMikineya loObedi-Edoma loJeyiyeli loAzaziya.
LoKenaniya induna yamaLevi emthwalweni, wafundisa ngokuhlabelela ngoba wayeyingcitshi.
LoBerekiya loElkana babengabagcini bamasango omtshokotsho.

LoShebaniya loJoshafati loNethaneli loAmasayi loZekhariya loBhenaya loEliyezeri abapristi bakhalisa izimpondo phambi komtshokotsho kaNkulunkulu. LoObedi-Edoma loJehiya babengabagcinimasango bomtshokotsho.
Kwasekusithi uDavida labadala bakoIsrayeli lenduna zezinkulungwane bahamba ukwenyusa umtshokotsho wesivumelwano seN uvela endlini kaObedi-Edoma ngentokozo.
Kwasekusithi uNkulunkulu ewasiza amaLevi ayewuthwele umtshokotsho wesivumelwano seN, banikela umhlatshelo wamajongosi ayisikhombisa lenqama eziyisikhombisa.

Njalo uDavida wayegqoke isembatho selembu elicolekileyo kakhulu, lawo wonke amaLevi ayewuthwele umtshokotsho labahlabeleli loKenaniya induna yomthwalo wabahlabeleli; uDavida-ke wayegqoke i-efodi yelembu elicolekileyo.
Ngakho uIsrayeli wonke wawenyusa umtshokotsho wesivumelwano seN ngokumemeza langokukhala kophondo lwenqama.
Kwasekusithi lapho umtshokotsho wesivumelwano seN ufika emzini kaDavida, uMikhali indodakazi kaSawuli walunguza ngewindi wabona inkosi uDavida esina edlala, wamdelela enhliziyweni yakhe.
Basebewuletha umtshokotsho kaNkulunkulu, bawumisa phakathi kwethente uDavida ayelimisele wona; basebenikela iminikelo yokutshiswa leminikelo yokuthula phambi kukaNkulunkulu.
UDavida eseqedile ukunikela umnikelo wokutshiswa leminikelo yokuthula wababusisa abantu ebizweni leN.
Wasesabela wonke umuntu wakoIsrayeli kusukela kowesilisa kuze kube kowesifazana, kwaba ngulowo lalowo isinkwa esisodwa, leqatha lenyama, lesinkwa sezithelo zevini ezonyisiweyo.
Wasemisa izikhonzi kumaLevi phambi komtshokotsho weN, ngitsho ukukhumbula lokubonga lokudumisa iN, uNkulunkulu kaIsrayeli.
UAsafi inhloko;
loBhenaya loJahaziyeli abapristi ngezimpondo njalonjalo phambi komtshokotsho wesivumelwano sikaNkulunkulu.
Ngalesosikhathi ngalolosuku uDavida wanika kuqala lesisihlabeleloukudumisa iN KOSI:
Bongani iN KOSI.
Hlabelelani kuyo, liyihubele amahubo, lilandise ngezenzo zayo ezimangalisayo.
Zincomeni ebizweni layo elingcwele, kayithokoze inhliziyo yabo abadinga iN.
Dingani lamandla ayo, lidinge ubuso bayo njalonjalo.
Khumbulani izimangaliso zayo eyazenzayo,
nzalo kaIsrayeli inceku yayo, bantwana bakaJakobe, abakhethiweyo bayo.
IyuNkulunkulu wethu; izahlulelo zayo zisemhlabeni wonke.
Khumbulani isivumelwano sayo kuze kube nininini, ilizwi e yalilaya kuzinkulungwane zezizukulwana,
eyasenza loAbrahama,
eyasiqinisa lakuJakobe saba yisimiso, kuIsrayeli saba yisivumelwano esilaphakade,
isithi: Ngizakunika ilizwe leKhanani, inkatho yelifa lakho.
Lapho lalibalutshwana ngenani, yebo libalutshwana.
Basebezula besuka esizweni besiya esizweni, besuka embusweni besiya kwabanye abantu.
Kayivumelanga muntu ukubacindezela:
Lingathinti abagcotshiweyo bami, lingoni abaprofethi bami.
Hlabelelani eNni, mhlaba wonke, litshumayele insuku ngensuku usindiso lwayo.
Landisani udumo lwayo phakathi kwezizwe, izimangaliso zayo phakathi kwabantu bonke.
Ngoba yinkulu iN, ifanele ukudunyiswa kakhulu.
Ngoba bonke onkulunkulu bezizwe bayizithombe.
Udumo lenkazimulo kuphambi kwayo, amandla lentokozo kusendaweni yayo.
Inikeni iN, zizukulwana zezizwe, inikeni udumo lamandla.
Inikeni udumo lwebizo layo.
Lithuthumele phambi kwayo, mhlaba wonke; njalo umhlaba uzaqiniswa, kawuyikunyikinyeka.
Kawathokoze amazulu, lomhlaba ujabule.
Kaluhlokome ulwandle lokugcwala kwalo, iganga kalithabe lakho konke okukulo.
Khona zizahlabelela ngentokozo izihlahla zehlathi phambi kweN, ngoba iyeza ukwahlulela umhlaba.
Bongani ngoba ilungile, ngoba umusa wayo umikuze kube phakade.
Lithi futhi: Sisindise, Nkulunkulu wosindiso lwethu, usibuthe usikhulule ezizweni, ukuze sibonge ibizo lakho elingcwele, sizincome kudumo lwakho.
Kayibusiswe iN, uNkulunkulu kaIsrayeli, kusukela phakade kuze kube phakade.
Wasetshiya lapho phambi komtshokotsho wesivumelwano seN oAsafi labafowabo ukukhonza phambi komtshokotsho njalonjalo.
LoObedi-Edoma kanye labafowabo, abangamatshumi ayisithupha lesificaminwembili; uObedi-Edoma indodana kaJeduthuni loHosa babengabagcini bamasango.
LoZadoki umpristi labafowabo abapristi,
ukuze banikele iminikelo yokutshiswa eNni phezu kwelathi lomnikelo wokutshiswa.
Njalo kanye labo oHemani.
Njalo kanye labo oHemani.
Basebehamba bonke abantu, ngulowo lalowo waya endlini yakhe. UDavida wasebuyela ukubusisa indlu yakhe.
Kwasekusithi uDavida esehlezi endlini yakhe, uDavida wathi kuNathani umprofethi: Khangela, mina ngihlala endlini yemisedari, kodwa umtshokotsho wesivumelwano seN ungaphansi kwamakhetheni.
UNathani wasesithi kuDavida: Yenza konke okusenhliziyweni yakho, ngoba uNkulunkulu ulawe.
Kodwa kwathi ngabona lobobusuku ilizwi likaNkulunkulu lafika kuNathani, lisithi:
Hamba utshele uDavida inceku yami: Itsho njalo iN: Wena kawuyikungakhela indlu yokuhlala.
Ngoba kangihlalanga endlini kusukela osukwini engenyusa ngalo uIsrayeli kuze kube lamuhla, kodwa ngasuka ethenteni ngaya ethenteni njalo ngasuka ethabhanekeleni ngaya kwelinye.
