Ngasengibabuthanisa ngasemfuleni oya eAhava.
Ngasengithuma kuEliyezeri, kuAriyeli, kuShemaya, lakuElinathani, lakuJaribi, lakuElinathani, lakuNathani, lakuZekhariya,

ngasengibalayela kuIdo, inhloko endaweni iKasifiya, ngafaka amazwi emlonyweni wabo ukuthi bathi kuIdo, l abafowabo, amaNethini endaweni iKasifiya, ukuthi basilethele izikhonzi zendlu kaNkulunkulu wethu.
Basebesilethela ngokwesandla esihle sikaNkulunkulu wethu phezu kwethu umuntu oqedisisayo;
loHashabhiya;
lakumaNethini.
Ngasengimemezela ukuzila ukudla khona.
Ngoba ngaba lenhloni ukucela enkosini ibutho labagadi bamabhiza ukusinceda ezitheni endleleni; ngoba sasiyitshelile inkosi sisithi: Isandla sikaNkulunkulu wethu siphezu kwabo bonke.
Ngakho sazila ukudla sadinga kuNkulunkulu wethu ngenxa yalokhu; wasencengeka ngathi.
Ngasengisehlukanisa abalitshumi lambili kunhloko zabapristi, oSherebiya.
Ngasengibalinganisela isiliva legolide lezitsha;
ngasengilinganisa esandleni sabo amathalenta esiliva angamakhulu ayisithupha lamatshumi amahlanu, lamathalenta alikhulu ezitsha zesiliva, lamathalenta egolide alikhulu,
lemiganu yegolide engamatshumi amabili.
Ngasengisithi kibo: Lingcwele eNni.
Kulondolozeni likugcine lize likulinganise phambi kwenduna yabapristi lamaLevi lenhloko zaboyise bakoIsrayeli eJerusalema, emakamelweni endlu yeN.
Abapristi lamaLevi basebesemukela isisindo sesiliva legolide lezitsha, ukuze bakuse eJerusalema, endlini kaNkulunkulu wethu.
Sasuka-ke emfuleni iAhava.
Safika-ke eJerusalema, sahlala khona insuku ezintathu.
Kwathi ngosuku lwesine isiliva legolide lezitsha kwalinganiswa endlini kaNkulunkulu wethu,
ngenani ngesisindo sakho konke; laso sonke isisindo sabhalwa ngalesosikhathi.
Abantwana bokuthunjwa ababebuyile ekuthunjweni banikela iminikelo yokutshiswa kuNkulunkulu kaIsrayeli.
Basebenika imithetho yenkosi.
Kwathi ekupheleni kwalezizinto, iziphathamandla zasondela kimi zisithi: Abantu bakoIsrayeli labapristi lamaLevi kabazehlukanisanga lezizwe zamazwe.
Ngoba bazithathele emadodakazini azo bona lamadodana abo.
Kwathi ngisizwa loludaba ngadabula isembatho sami lebhatshi lami, ngangcothula okwenwele zekhanda lami lendevu zami.
Kwasekubuthana kimi wonke othuthumela ngamazwi kaNkulunkulu kaIsrayeli ngenxa yesiphambeko sabathunjwa.
Kwathi ngomnikelo wakusihlwa ngasukuma ekuthotshisweni kwami, lekudabuleni kwami isembatho sami lebhatshi lami, ngaguqa ngamadolo ami,
ngathi: Nkulunkulu wami, ngilenhloni, ngiyangekile ukuphakamisela ubuso bami kuwe, Nkulunkulu wami, ngoba ububi bethu bandile ngaphezu kwekhanda.
Kusukela ensukwini zabobaba besiphakathi kwecala elikhulu kuze kube lamuhla.
Khathesi-ke ngokwesikhatshana umusa wenziwe yuNkulunkulu wethu, ukusitshiyela ukuphepha, lokusinika isikhonkwane endaweni yayo engcwele.
Ngoba siyizigqili, kanti ebugqilini bethu uNkulunkulu wethu kasitshiyanga.
Khathesi-ke, Nkulunkulu wethu, sizakuthini emva kwalokhu? Ngoba siyitshiyile imilayo yakho,

owasilaya yona ngesandla senceku zakho abaprofethi, usithi: Ilizwe elingena kulo ukudla ilifa lalo liyilizwe elingcolileyo ngokungcola kwezizwe zamazwe, ngokunengekayo kwazo eziligcwalise ngakho kusukela ephethelweni kusiya ephethelweni, ngokungcola kwazo.
Ngakho-ke linganiki amadodana azo amadodakazi enu, futhi lingathatheli amadodana enu amadodakazi azo.
Lemva kwakho konke okusehleleyo ngenxa yezenzo zethu ezimbi langenxa yecala lethu elikhulu;
sizayephula futhi yini imilayo yakho, sithathane lesizwe salezizinengiso?
N, Nkulunkulu kaIsrayeli, ulungile.
Kwathi uEzra esakhuleka esavuma, kwabuthana kuye ibandla elikhulu kakhulu lamadoda labesifazana labantwana, livela kuIsrayeli, ngoba abantu bakhala inyembezi ngokukhala okukhulu.
UShekaniya indodana kaJehiyeli, sathatha abafazi bezizweni abavela ezizweni zelizwe; kodwa khathesi kukhona ithemba koIsrayeli mayelana lalokhu.
Ngakho-ke asenze isivumelwano loNkulunkulu wethu ukuze sikhuphe bonke abafazi lokuzelwe yibo ngokweseluleko senkosi yami lesabathuthumela emlayweni kaNkulunkulu wethu.
Sukuma, ngoba udaba luphezu kwakho, lathi silawe. Qina, wenze.
Wasesukuma uEzra, wafungisa induna zabapristi, amaLevi, loIsrayeli wonke, ukuthi benze ngokwalelilizwi. Basebefunga.
UEzra wasesukuma esuka phambi kwendlu kaNkulunkulu.
Basebesenza isimemezelo sedlule koJuda leJerusalema kubo bonke abantwana bokuthunjwa ukuthi babuthane eJerusalema,
lokuthi loba ngubani ongafikanga ngensuku ezintathu, ngokweseluleko seziphathamandla labadala, impahla yakhe yonke izadliwa, yena ehlukaniswe lebandla labathunjiweyo.

Wonke amadoda akoJuda loBhenjamini asebuthana eJerusalema ngensuku ezintathu. Kwakuyinyanga yesificamunwemunye ngolwamatshumi amabili lwenyanga. Bonke abantu basebehlala egumeni lendlu kaNkulunkulu beqhaqhazela ngenxa yaloludaba langenxa yezulu elikhulu.
UEzra umpristi wasukuma wathi kibo: Lina liphambukile lathatha abafazi bezizweni, ukwandisa isiphambeko sikaIsrayeli.
Ngakho-ke yenzani uvumo eNni uNkulunkulu waboyihlo, lenze intando yayo.
Ibandla lonke laseliphendula lathi ngelizwi elikhulu: Njengamazwi akho, ngokunjalo kuphezu kwethu ukuthi sikwenze.
Kodwa abantu banengi, njalo kuyisikhathi sezulu elinengi, njalo singeme phandle. Futhi kakusimsebenzi wosuku olulodwa njalo hatshi owezimbili, ngoba sibanengi esiphambukileyo kuloludaba.
Ake zime iziphathamandla zethu zebandla lonke, labo bonke abasemizini yethu abathethe abafazi bezizweni beze ngezikhathi ezimisiweyo, njalo kanye labo abadala bomuzi ngomuzi labahluleli bawo.
NgoJonathani indodana kaAsaheli loJahazeya indodana kaTikiva kuphela abamelana lalokho; loMeshulamu.

Abantwana bokuthunjwa besebesenza njalo. UEzra umpristi, amadoda, inhloko zaboyise ngendlu yaboyise, labo bonke ngamabizo, basebesehlukaniswa; basebehlala ngosuku lokuqala lwenyanga yetshumi ukuhlola loludaba.
Basebeqeda lawo wonke amadoda ayethethe abafazi bezizweni kwaze kwaba lusuku lokuqala lwenyanga yokuqala.
Kwasekutholakala phakathi kwamadodana abapristi ayethethe abafazi bezizweni: Emadodaneni kaJeshuwa indodana kaJozadaki labafowabo: OMahaseya loEliyezeri loJaribi loGedaliya.
Basebenika isandla sabo ukuthi bazakhupha abafazi babo.
Lemadodaneni kaImeri: OHanani loZebhadiya.
Lemadodaneni kaHarimi loJehiyeli loUziya.
Lemadodaneni kaPashuri.
LakumaLevi: OJozabadi.
Lakubahlabeleli: UEliyashibi. Lakubalindimasango: OShaluma loTelema loUri.
LakuIsrayeli: Emadodaneni kaParoshi loBhenaya.
Lemadodaneni kaElamu: OMathaniya, uZekhariya, loJehiyeli, loAbidi, loJeremothi, loEliya.
Lemadodaneni kaZathu: OEliyowenayi, uEliyashibi, uMathaniya, loJeremothi, loZabadi, loAziza.
Lemadodaneni kaBebayi.
Lemadodaneni kaBani, loAdaya, uJashubi, loSheyali, loRamothi.
Lemadodaneni kaPahathi-Mowabi, uMathaniya, uBhezaleli, loBinuwi, loManase.
Lamadodana kaHarimi, uShemaya, uShimeyoni,
uBhenjamini, uShemariya.
Emadodaneni kaHashuma: OMathenayi, uMathatha, uZabadi, uElifeleti, uJeremayi, uManase, uShimeyi.
Emadodaneni kaBani: OMahadayi, uAmramu, loUweli,
uBhenaya, uBedeya, uKeluhi,
uVaniya, uMeremothi, uEliyashibi,
uMathaniya, uMathenayi, loJahasa,
loBani, loBinuwi, uShimeyi,
loShelemiya, loNathani, loAdaya,
uMakinadebayi, uShashayi, uSharayi,
uAzareli, uShelemiya, uShemariya,
uShaluma, uAmariya, uJosefa.
Lemadodaneni kaNebo.
Bonke laba babethethe abafazi bezizweni; njalo kwakukhona phakathi kwabo abafazi ababezele abantwana.
Amazwi kaNehemiya indodana kaHakaliya,
uHanani omunye wabafowethu wafika yena lamadoda avela koJuda. Ngasengibabuza mayelana lamaJuda ayephunyukile asala ekuthunjweni, langeJerusalema.
Basebesithi kimi: Labo abasalayo abasala ekuthunjweni lapho esabelweni baphakathi kokuhlupheka okukhulu lehlazo, lomduli weJerusalema wadilika.
Kwasekusithi sengizwe lamazwi ngahlala phansi ngakhala inyembezi, ngalila okw ezinsuku, ngizila ukudla, ngikhuleka phambi kukaNkulunkulu wamazulu.
Ngathi: Ngiyancenga, N, Nkulunkulu wamazulu, Nkulunkulu omkhulu lowesabekayo,
indlebe yakho ake ilalele;
senze kubi lokwenza kubi kuwe, kasigcinanga imilayo lezimiso lezahlulelo.
Ake ukhumbule ilizwi owalaya ngalo uMozisi inceku yakho usithi: Ubalina liphambuka, mina ngizalichithachitha phakathi kwezizwe;
uba lina liphendukela kimi, lilondoloza imilayo yami, liyenze.
Laba-ke bazinceku zakho labantu bakho owabahlenga ngamandla akho amakhulu langesandla sakho esiqinileyo.
Ngiyacela, Nkosi, indlebe yakho ake ilalele umkhuleko wenceku yakho.
Kwasekusithi ngenyanga kaNisani. Njalo ngangingakaze ngidane phambi kwayo.
Inkosi yasisithi kimi: Kungani ubuso bakho budanile lokhu ungaguli,
ngathi enkosini: Kayiphile inkosi kuze kube nininini?
Inkosi yasisithi kimi: Kuyini okudingayo? Ngasengikhuleka kuNkulunkulu wamazulu.
Ngathi enkosini: Uba kukuhle enkosini, njalo uba inceku yakho ithole umusa phambi kwakho, ngicelaukuthi ungithume koJuda emzini wamangcwaba abobaba, ukuze ngiwakhe.

Inkosi yasisithi kimi, lendlovukazi ihlezi eceleni kwayo: Uhambo lwakho luzakuba ngolwesikhathi esingakanani, ubuye nini? Ngakho kwaba kuhle phambi kwenkosi ukuthi ingithume; ngasengiyinika isikhathi esimisiweyo.
Ngasengisithi enkosini: Uba kulungile enkosini kayinginike izincwadi eziya kubabusi bangaphetsheya komfula ukuze bangivumele ukudlula, ngize ngifike koJuda;
lencwadi eya kuAsafi, umphathi wegusu inkosi elalo.
Ngasengifika kubabusi ngaphetsheya komfula, ngabanika incwadi zenkosi. Inkosi yayithume-ke lami induna zebutho labagadi bamabhiza.
Lapho uSanibhalathi.
Ngafika-ke eJerusalema, ngaba lapho insuku ezintathu.

Ngasengisukuma ebusuku, mina lamadoda amalutshwana elami; kangitshelanga muntu lokho uNkulunkulu wami ayekufake enhliziyweni yami ukuthi ngikwenzele iJerusalema. Futhi kwakungelanyamazana kanye lami ngaphandle kwenyamazana engangiyigadile.
Ngasengiphuma ebusuku ngesango lesigodi, ngaqonda emthonjeni womgobho.
Ngasengisedlulela esangweni lomthombo; kodwa kwakungelandawo yenyamazana ukwedlula ngaphansi kwami.
Ngasengisenyuka ngesifula ebusuku ngihlola umduli, ngabuyela.
Lababusi babengazi lapho engangiye khona lokuthi ngenzani. Kuze kube khathesi-ke ngangingatshelanga amaJuda labapristi leziphathamandla.
Ngasengisithi kibo: Liyabona inhlupheko esikiyo ukuthi iJerusalema ilunxiwa.
Ngasengibatshela isandla sikaNkulunkulu wami esasisihle phezu kwami, futhi lamazwi enkosi eyayiwakhulume kimi. Basebesithi: Asisukumeni, sakhe.
Lapho uSanibhalathi umHoroni loTobiya inceku, umAmoni, loGeshema umArabhiya?
Ngasengibabuyisela impendulo ngathi kibo: UNkulunkulu wamazulu yena uzasiphumelelisa; lathi inceku zakhe sizasukuma sakhe; kodwa lina kalilasabelo lelungelo lesikhumbuzo eJerusalema.
Kwasekusukuma eEliyashibi umpristi omkhulu labafowabo abapristi.
Leceleni kwakhe kwakha amadoda eJeriko.
Lesango lenhlanzi.
Leceleni kwawo kwalungisa uMeremothi;
leceleni kwabo kwalungisa amaThekhowa.
Lesango elidala balilungisa oJoyada.
Eceleni kwabo-ke kwalungisa uMelatiya umGibeyoni loJadoni umMeronothi.
Eceleni kwakhe kwalungisa uUziyeli indodana kaHarihaya, wabakhandi begolide.
Eceleni kwabo-ke kwalungisa uRefaya indodana kaHuri, umbusi wengxenye yesigaba seJerusalema.
Eceleni kwabo-ke kwalungisa uJedaya indodana kaHarumafi lamaqondana lendlu yakhe; leceleni kwakhe kwalungisa uHathushi.
Isilinganiso sesibili basilungisa oMalikiya.
Leceleni kwakhe kwalungisa uShaluma indodana kaHaloheshi.
Isango lesigodi walilungisa.
Lesango lomquba.
Lesango lomthombo.
Ngemva kwakhe kwalungisa uNehemiya indodana kaAzibuki, umbusi wengxenye yesigaba seBeti-Zuri.
Ngemva kwakhe kwalungisa amaLevi, uRehuma indodana kaBani, esigabeni sakhe.
Ngemva kwakhe kwalungisa abafowabo, uBavayi indodana kaHenadadi.
Njalo kwalungisa eceleni kwakhe uEzeri.
Ngemva kwakhe kwalungisa ngesivuvu uBharukhi.
Ngemva kwakhe uMeremothi indodana kaUriya indodana kaHakozi.
Langemva kwakhe kwalungisa abapristi, amadoda endawo ezigombolozeleyo.
Ngemva kwakhe kwalungisa oBhenjamini.
Ngemva kwakhe uBinuwi.
UPalali indodana kaUzayi, maqondana lengonsi.
AmaNethini.
Ngemva kwakhe abeThekhowa balungisa esinye isilinganiso maqondana lomphotshongo omkhulu othutshayo, njalo kwaze kwaba semdulini weOfeli.
Kusukela phezu kwesango lamabhiza kwalungisa abapristi, ngulowo maqondana lendlu yakhe.
Ngemva kwakhe kwalungisa uZadoki indodana kaImeri maqondana lendlu yakhe.
Ngemva kwakhe kwalungisa oHananiya.
Ngemva kwakhe kwalungisa uMalikiya, njalo kusiya endlini yengonsi engaphezulu.
Njalo phakathi laphakathi kwendlu yengonsi engaphezulu kuze kube sesangweni lezimvu.
Kwasekusithi uSanibhalathi esezwile ukuthi siyawakha umduli.

Wasekhuluma phambi kwabafowabo lebutho leSamariya wathi: La amaJuda abuthakathaka enzani? Azaziqinisa yini? Azahlaba yini? Azaqeda ngosuku yini? Azavuselela amatshe yini ezinqwabeni zengcekeza, ezitshileyo?
LoTobiya umAmoni wayelaye.
Zwana, Nkulunkulu wethu, ngoba siyeyiswa;
ungaligubuzeli icala labo.
Sawakha-ke umduli, waze wahlangana wonke umduli kuze kube yingxenye yawo, ngoba abantu babelenhliziyo yokusebenza.
Kodwa kwathi oSanibhalathi loTobiya lamaArabhiya.
Basebesenza ugobe bonke ndawonye ukuthi beze balwe leJerusalema, lokuthi badunge phakathi kwayo.
Kodwa sakhuleka kuNkulunkulu wethu, sabeka abalindi ukumelana labo emini lebusuku, ngenxa yabo.
Kodwa uJuda wathi: Amandla abathwali bomthwalo adedile, lezibi zinengi, ngakho thina kasilakho ukwakha umduli.
Lezitha zethu zathi: Kabayikwazi, kabayikubona, size singene phakathi kwabo sibabulale, siwumise umsebenzi.
Kwasekusithi amaJuda ayehlala duze lazo esefika.
Ngasengimisa endaweni eziphansi kakhulu ngemva komduli endaweni ezisobala, ngamisa abantu ngensapho belezinkemba zabo, imikhonto yabo, lamadandili abo.
Ngasengikhangela ngasukuma ngathi kuzikhulu lakubabusi lakwabanye abantu: Lingabesabi. Khumbulani iNkosi.
Kwasekusithi izitha zethu sezizwile ukuthi sekusaziwa yithi lokuthi uNkulunkulu ufubisile icebo labo, sabuyela sonke emdulini, wonke emsebenzini wakhe.
Kwasekusithi kusukela mhlalokho ingxenye yezisebenzi zami yayisebenza emsebenzini, lengxenye yazo yabamba imikhonto, izihlangu, lamadandili. Lababusi babengemuva kwendlu yonke yakoJuda
Ababesakha emdulini, lababethwala imithwalo, ababelayitshela, ngesinye sezandla zakhe wayesebenza emsebenzini, lesinye sibambelele isikhali.
Labakhi, ngulowo wayebhince inkemba yakhe ekhalweni lwakhe, besakha. Lovuthela uphondo wayeseceleni kwami.
Ngasengisithi kuzikhulu lakubabusi lakwabanye abantu: Umsebenzi mkhulu futhi ubanzi; lathi sehlukene phezu komduli, omunye ukhatshana lomunye.
Endaweni elizakuzwa khona ukukhala kophondo, lizabuthana lapho kithi; uNkulunkulu wethu uzasilwela.
Ngokunjalo sasebenza emsebenzini; ingxenye yabo yayibambe imikhonto kusukela emadabukakusa kuze kuphume izinkanyezi.
Langalesosikhathi ngathi ebantwini: Ngulowo lenceku yakhe kabalale phakathi kweJerusalema ukuze babe ngabalindi bethu ebusuku, lemini emsebenzini.
Ngakho kakho, mina, labafowethu, lenceku zami, lamadoda omlindo abangemva kwami, kakho kithi owakhulula izigqoko zethu, ngulowo wazikhululela uku zi hlanza.
Kwasekusiba khona ukukhala okukhulu kwabantu labomkabo.
Ngoba kwaba khona abathi: Thina, amadodana ethu lamadodakazi ethu sibanengi; ngakho sithethe amabele ukuze sidle siphile.
Njalo kwaba khona abathi: Sibambisa amasimu ethu lezivini zethu lezindlu zethu ukuze sithenge amabele endlaleni.
Njalo kwaba khona abathi: Seboleke imali yomthelo wenkosi ng amasimu ethu lezivini zethu.
Khathesi-ke, inyama yethu injengenyama yabafowethu; kukhona-ke emadodakazini ethu asehliselwe phansi, njalo isandla sethu kasilamandla, ngoba abanye balamasimu ethu lezivini zethu.
Ngathukuthela kakhulu nxa ngisizwa ukukhala kwabo lalamazwi.
Inhliziyo yami isicabangile phakathi kwami, ngasengilwisana lezikhulu lababusi, ngathi kubo: Libhadalisa inzuzo, ngulowo kumfowabo. Ngabamisela umhlangano omkhulu.
Ngasengisithi kibo: Thina ngamandla akithi sihlenge abafowethu amaJuda ababethengiswe ezizweni; lani selizathengisa abafowethu, kumbe bazathengiswa kithi yini? Basebethula, kabatholanga mpendulo.
Ngasengisithi: Into eliyenzayo kayilunganga. Belingehambe yini ngokwesaba uNkulunkulu wethu?
Ngitsho lami, abafowethu, lenceku zami, besikweledisa imali lamabele. Asiyekeleni inzuzo lezi.
Ake libabuyisele lalamuhla amasimu abo, izivini zabo, izihlahla zabo zemihlwathi, lezindlu zabo, lokwekhulu kwemali lokwamabele lokwewayini elitsha lokwamafutha elibabhadalisa khona.
Basebesithi: Sizabuyisela, singabizi lutho kubo. Sizakwenza njalo njengokutsho kwakho. Ngasengibiza abapristi, ngabafungisa.
Ngasengithintitha ithangazi lami.
Futhi kusukela ngosuku angilaya ngalo ukuthi ngibe ngumbusi wabo elizweni lakoJuda.
Kodwa ababusi bamandulo ababengaphambi kwami babathwalisa nzima abantu, bethatha kibo isinkwa lewayini, emva kwalokhu amashekeli esiliva angamatshumi amane; lenceku zabo zabusa nzima phezu kwabantu.
Phezu kwalokho-ke ngaqina emsebenzini walumduli, njalo kasithenganga insimu; lenceku zami zonke zabuthana lapho emsebenzini.
Lamadoda alikhulu lamatshumi amahlanu kumaJuda lakubabusi, lalabo abeza kithi bevela ezizweni ezisihanqileyo, babesetafuleni lami.

Lalokhu okwakulungiselwe usuku olulodwa kwakuyinkabi eyodwa, izimvu ezikhethiweyo eziyisithupha, lezinyoni zazilungiselwe mina, njalo phakathi kwensuku ezilitshumi okwalo lonke iwayini ngobunengi, ngoba ubugqili babunzima phezu kwalababantu.
Ngikhumbule, Nkulunkulu wami, ngokuhle, konke engikwenzele lababantu.
Kwasekusithi oSanibhalathi,
oSanibhalathi loGeshema bathuma kimi besithi: Woza sihlangane ndawonye emizini. Kodwa babecabange ukwenza okubi kimi.
Ngasengithuma izithunywa kubo ngisithi: Ngenza umsebenzi omkhulu, ngakho kangilakho ukwehla. Kungani umsebenzi uzakuma, ngiwutshiye, ngehlele kini?
Basebethuma kimi kane ngaleyondlela, ngabaphendula ngaleyondlela.
Ngakho uSanibhalathi wathuma kimi inceku yakhe ngaleyondlela ngokwesihlanu ilencwadi evulekileyo esandleni sayo.
Kwakubhalwe kuyo ukuthi: Kuzwakele ezizweni, loGashimu uthi: Wena lamaJuda linakana ukuhlamuka; ngenxa yalokho wakha umduli, ukuze wena ube yinkosi yabo, njengalamazwi.
Futhi umisile labaprofethi ukuze bamemezele ngawe eJerusalema, besithi: Kukhona inkosi koJuda. Khathesi-ke kuzazwakala enkosini njengalamazwi. Ngakho-ke woza, sicebisane.
Ngasengithuma kuye ngisithi: Kazikho izinto ezinjengalezo ozitshoyo, kodwa uyazibumba zivela enhliziyweni yakho.
Ngoba bonke basethusa besithi: Izandla zabo zizadangala emsebenzini, ukuthi ungenziwa. Ngakho-ke qinisa izandla zami.

Mina sengingenile endlini kaShemaya indodana kaDelaya indodana kaMehethabheli owayezivalele, wasesithi: Asihlangane endlini kaNkulunkulu phakathi kwethempeli, sivale iminyango yethempeli, ngoba bayeza ukukubulala, yebo, bayeza ebusuku ukukubulala.
Kodwa ngathi: Kambe umuntu onjengami angabaleka? Pho, nguwuphi umuntu onjengami ongangena ethempelini aphile? Kangiyikungena.
Ngasenginanzelela, khangela-ke, uNkulunkulu wayengamthumanga, kodwa wakhuluma isiprofetho esimelene lami ngoba oTobiya loSanibhalathi babemqatshile.
Ngakho wayeqatshiwe ukuze ngesabe, ngenze njalo, ngone, ukuze babe lebizo elibi ngami, ukuze bangigcone.
Khumbula, Nkulunkulu wami, uTobiya loSanibhalathi njengokwale imisebenzi yakhe.
Waphela-ke umduli ngolwamatshumi amabili lanhlanu kaEluli ngensuku ezingamatshumi amahlanu lambili.
Kwasekusithi zonke izitha zethu zisizwa, lazo zonke izizwe ezisizingelezeleyo zibona, zawa kakhulu emehlweni azo.
Njalo ngalezonsuku izikhulu zakoJuda zandisa incwadi zazo eziya kuTobiya, lezikaTobiya zeza kuzo.
Ngoba abanengi koJuda babefungile kuye.
Njalo babekhuluma izenzo zakhe ezinhle phambi kwami, lamazwi ami bewakhuphela kuye. UTobiya wathumela incwadi zokungethusa.
Kwasekusithi umduli usuwakhiwe, sengimisile izivalo, abalindi bamasango labahlabeleli lamaLevi sebebekiwe,
ngalaya uHanani umfowethu.

Ngasengisithi kibo: Amasango eJerusalema kangavulwa lize litshise ilanga; besemi kabavale izivalo banxibe. Njalo umise abalindi kubahlali beJerusalema, ngulowo lalowo emlindweni wakhe, njalo ngulowo maqondana lendlu yakhe.
Njalo umuzi wawubanzi inhlangothi zombili, umkhulu, kodwa abantu babebalutshwana phakathi kwawo, izindlu zingakakhiwa.

UNkulunkulu wami wasenika enhliziyweni yami ukuthi ngibuthanise izikhulu lababusi labantu ukuthi babhalwe ngezizukulwana. Ngasengithola ugwalo lwezizukulwana zalabo abenyuka kuqala, ngathola kubhalwe kulo:
Laba ngabantwana besabelo abenyuka bevela ekuthunjweni kwabathunjiweyo uNebhukadinezari inkosi yeBhabhiloni abathumbayo; basebebuyela eJerusalema lakoJuda, ngulowo lalowo emzini wakibo,
abafika loZerubhabheli, uJeshuwa, uNehemiya, uAzariya, uRahamiya, uNahamani, uModekhayi, uBilishani, uMisiperethi, uBigivayi, uNehuma, uBahana. Inani lamadoda esizwe sakoIsrayeli:
Abantwana bakoParoshi: Izinkulungwane ezimbili lekhulu lamatshumi ayisikhombisa lambili.
Abantwana bakoShefathiya: Amakhulu amathathu lamatshumi ayisikhombisa lambili.
Abantwana bakoAra: Amakhulu ayisithupha lamatshumi amahlanu lambili.
Abantwana bakoPahathi-Mowabi, babantwana bakoJeshuwa loJowabi: Izinkulungwane ezimbili lamakhulu ayisificaminwembili letshumi lesificaminwembili.
Abantwana bakoElamu: Inkulungwane lamakhulu amabili lamatshumi amahlanu lane.
Abantwana bakoZathu: Amakhulu ayisificaminwembili lamatshumi amane lanhlanu.
Abantwana bakoZakayi: Amakhulu ayisikhombisa lamatshumi ayisithupha.
Abantwana bakoBinuwi: Amakhulu ayisithupha lamatshumi amane lesificaminwembili.
Abantwana bakoBebayi: Amakhulu ayisithupha lamatshumi amabili lesificaminwembili.
Abantwana bakoAzigadi: Izinkulungwane ezimbili lamakhulu amathathu lamatshumi amabili lambili.
Abantwana bakoAdonikamu: Amakhulu ayisithupha lamatshumi ayisithupha lesikhombisa.
Abantwana bakoBigivayi: Izinkulungwane ezimbili lamatshumi ayisithupha lesikhombisa.
Abantwana bakoAdini: Amakhulu ayisithupha lamatshumi amahlanu lanhlanu.
Abantwana bakoAteri, bakoHezekhiya: Amatshumi ayisificamunwemunye lesificaminwembili.
Abantwana bakoHashuma: Amakhulu amathathu lamatshumi amabili lesificaminwembili.
Abantwana bakoBezayi: Amakhulu amathathu lamatshumi amabili lane.
Abantwana bakoHarifi: Ikhulu letshumi lambili.
Abantwana bakoGibeyoni: Amatshumi ayisificamunwemunye lanhlanu.
Amadoda eBhethelehema leNetofa: Ikhulu lamatshumi ayisificaminwembili lesificaminwembili.
Amadoda eAnathothi: Ikhulu lamatshumi amabili lesificaminwembili.
Amadoda eBeti-Azimavethi: Amatshumi amane lambili.
Amadoda eKiriyathi-Jeyarimi, iKefira, leBherothi: Amakhulu ayisikhombisa lamatshumi amane lantathu.
Amadoda eRama leGeba: Amakhulu ayisithupha lamatshumi amabili lanye.
Amadoda eMikimasi: Ikhulu lamatshumi amabili lambili.
Amadoda eBhetheli leAyi: Ikhulu lamatshumi amabili lantathu.
Amadoda enye iNebo: Amatshumi amahlanu lambili.
Abantwana benye iElamu: Inkulungwane lamakhulu amabili lamatshumi amahlanu lane.
Abantwana beHarimi: Amakhulu amathathu lamatshumi amabili.
Abantwana beJeriko: Amakhulu amathathu lamatshumi amane lanhlanu.
Abantwana beLodi, iHadidi, leOno: Amakhulu ayisikhombisa lamatshumi amabili lanye.
Abantwana beSenaha: Izinkulungwane ezintathu lamakhulu ayisificamunwemunye lamatshumi amathathu.
Abapristi. Abantwana bakoJedaya, bendlu kaJeshuwa: Amakhulu ayisificamunwemunye lamatshumi ayisikhombisa lantathu.
Abantwana bakoImeri: Inkulungwane lamatshumi amahlanu lambili.
Abantwana bakoPashuri: Inkulungwane lamakhulu amabili lamatshumi amane lesikhombisa.
Abantwana bakoHarimi: Inkulungwane letshumi lesikhombisa.
AmaLevi. Abantwana bakoJeshuwa, bakoKadimiyeli, babantwana bakoHodeva: Amatshumi ayisikhombisa lane.
Abahlabeleli. Abantwana bakoAsafi: Ikhulu lamatshumi amane lesificaminwembili.
Abalindimasango. Abantwana bakoShaluma, abantwana bakoAteri, abantwana bakoTalimoni, abantwana bakoAkubi, abantwana bakoHatita, abantwana bakoShobayi: Ikhulu lamatshumi amathathu lesificaminwembili.
AmaNethini. Abantwana bakoZiha, abantwana bakoHasufa, abantwana bakoTabhawothi,
abantwana bakoKerosi, abantwana bakoSiya, abantwana bakoPadoni,
abantwana bakoLebana, abantwana bakoHagaba, abantwana bakoShalimayi,
abantwana bakoHanani, abantwana bakoGideli, abantwana bakoGahari,
abantwana bakoReyaya, abantwana bakoRezini, abantwana bakoNekoda,
abantwana bakoGazama, abantwana bakoUza, abantwana bakoPhaseya,
abantwana bakoBhesayi, abantwana bakoMewunimi, abantwana bakoNefushesimi,
abantwana abakoBakibuki, abantwana bakoHakufa, abantwana bakoHarihuri,
abantwana bakoBazilithi, abantwana bakoMehida, abantwana bakoHarisha,
abantwana bakoBarkosi, abantwana bakoSisera, abantwana bakoThama,
abantwana bakoNeziya, abantwana bakoHatifa.
Abantwana benceku zikaSolomoni. Abantwana bakoSotayi, abantwana bakoSoferethi, abantwana bakoPerida,
abantwana bakoJahala, abantwana bakoDarkoni, abantwana bakoGideli,
abantwana bakoShefathiya, abantwana bakoHathili, abantwana bakoPokerethi kaHazebayimi, abantwana bakoAmoni.
Wonke amaNethini labantwana benceku zikaSolomoni: Amakhulu amathathu lamatshumi ayisificamunwemunye lambili.
Laba ngabenyuka bevela eTeli-Mela, iTeli-Harisha, iKerubi, iAdoni, leImeri, kodwa babengelakutshengisa indlu yaboyise lenzalo yabo, uba bavela koIsrayeli yini.
Abantwana bakoDelaya, abantwana bakoTobiya, abantwana bakoNekoda: Amakhulu ayisithupha lamatshumi amane lambili.
Lakubapristi: Abantwana bakoHabaya, abantwana bakoHakozi, abantwana bakoBarizilayi, owayethethe emadodakazini kaBarizilayi umGileyadi ukuba ngumka khe, wasebizwa ngebizo lawo.
Laba badinga ukubhalwa kwabo oluhlwini lwababhaliweyo ngezizukulwana, kodwa kakutholakalanga; basebekhutshwa ebupristini njengabangcolileyo.
Umbusi wasesithi kubo bangadli okwezingcwelengcwele, kuze kusukume umpristi oleUrimi leThumimi.
Ibandla lonke lindawonye lalizinkulungwane ezingamatshumi amane lambili lamakhulu amathathu lamatshumi ayisithupha,

ngaphandle kwenceku zabo lencekukazi zabo; lezi zazizinkulungwane eziyisikhombisa lamakhulu amathathu lamatshumi amathathu lesikhombisa; njalo babelabahlabeleli labahlabelelikazi abangamakhulu amabili lamatshumi amane lanhlanu.
Amabhiza abo, amakhulu ayisikhombisa lamatshumi amathathu lesithupha; imbongolo zabo, amakhulu amabili lamatshumi amane lanhlanu;
amakamela, amakhulu amane lamatshumi amathathu lanhlanu; obabhemi, inkulungwane eziyisithupha lamakhulu ayisikhombisa lamatshumi amabili.
Ezinye-ke zenhloko zaboyise zanikela emsebenzini. Umbusi wanikela kokuligugu inhlamvu zegolide eziyinkulungwane, izigqoko zabapristi ezingamakhulu amahlanu lamatshumi amathathu.
L ezinyezezinhloko zaboyise zanikela kokuligugu komsebenzi inhlamvu zegolide ezizinkulungwane ezingamatshumi amabili lamamane esiliva azinkulungwane ezilikhulu letshumi.

Lalokho abaseleyo babantu abakunikelayo kwakuzinhlamvu zegolide ezizinkulungwane ezingamatshumi amabili lamamane esiliva azinkulungwane ezilikhulu lezigqoko zabapristi ezingamatshumi ayisithupha lesikhombisa.

Abapristi lamaLevi labalindimasango labahlabeleli la banyebabantu lamaNethini loIsrayeli wonke basebehlala emizini yabo. Kwathi inyanga yesikhombisa isifikile, abantwana bakoIsrayeli babesemizini yabo.
Bonke abantu basebebuthana njengamuntu munye.
UEzra umpristi wasewuletha umlayo phambi kwebandla, kusukela kowesilisa kusiya kowesifazana.
Wasebala kuwo phambi kwegceke.
UEzra umbhali wasesima phezu kwendawo ephakemeyo yamapulanka ababeyenzele loludaba. Leceleni kwakhe kwakumi oMathithiya loShema.
UEzra wasevula ugwalo phambi kwamehlo abo bonke abantu; ngoba wayengaphezu kwabantu bonke; lapho eluvula, bonke abantu basukuma.
UEzra waseyibusisa iN, uNkulunkulu omkhulu.
OJeshuwa.
Basebebala egwalweni, emlayweni kaNkulunkulu, ngokucacileyo, bechasisa, be b enza ba zwisise ekubaleni.
UNehemiya owayengumbusi, lompristi uEzra umbhali, lamaLevi ayefundisa abantu.

Wasesithi kibo: Hambani, lidle okunonileyo, linathe okumnandi, lithumele izabelo kongalungiselwanga lutho; ngoba lolusuku lungcwele eNkosini yethu, njalo lingadabuki, ngoba intokozo yeN ingamandla enu.
AmaLevi asebathulisa bonke abantu esithi: Thulani, ngoba lolusuku lungcwele, lingadabuki.
Bonke abantu basebehamba uku ya kudla, lokunatha, lokuthumela izabelo.
Langosuku lwesibili kwabuthana inhloko zaboyise zabo bonke abantu, abapristi, lamaLevi, kuEzra umbhali, ukuze baqedisise amazwi omlayo.
Basebethola kubhaliwe emlayweni eyayiwulayile ngesandla sikaMozisi ukuthi abantwana bakoIsrayeli bahlale emadumbeni ngomkhosi ngenyanga yesikhombisa,
lokuthi bazwakalise bedlulise isimemezelo kuyo yonke imizi yabo.
Basebephuma abantu, baziletha, bazenzela amadumba, ngulowo lalowo ephahleni lwakhe, lemagumeni abo, lemagumeni endlu kaNkulunkulu.

Ibandla lonke lalabo ababebuyile ekuthunjweni basebesenza amadumba, bahlala emadumbeni. Ngoba kusukela ensukwini zikaJoshuwa indodana kaNuni kwaze kwaba yilolosuku abantwana bakoIsrayeli babengenzanga njalo.

Njalo usuku ngosuku kusukela osukwini lokuqala kwaze kwaba lusuku lokucina wabala egwalweni lomlayo kaNkulunkulu. Bawenza-ke umkhosi insuku eziyisikhombisa; kwathi ngosuku lwesificaminwembili kwaba lenhlangano enzulu, njengesimiso.
Ngosuku lwamatshumi amabili lane lwaleyonyanga.
Inzalo yakoIsrayeli yasizehlukanisa labo bonke abezizweni; basebesima bavuma izono zabo lobubi baboyise.
Basebesukuma endaweni yabo yokuma.
Lezikhwelweni zamaLevi kwakumi oJeshuwa, uKenani; bamemeza ngelizwi elikhulu eNni uNkulunkulu wabo.
AmaLevi, oJeshuwa.
Nguwe oywena wedwa.
Wena uyuNkulunkulu, owakhetha uAbrama wamkhupha eUri yamaKhaladiya;
wafica inhliziyo yakhe ithembekile phambi kwakho.
Wabona ukuhlupheka kwabobaba eGibhithe,
wenza izibonakaliso lezimangaliso kuFaro lakuzo zonke inceku zakhe lakubo bonke abantu belizwe lakhe.
Wehlukanisa ulwandle phambi kwabo ukuze bachaphe phakathi kolwandle emhlabathini owomileyo.
Wasubakhokhela ngensika yeyezi emini langensika yomlilo ebusuku ukubakhanyisela indlela abazahamba ngayo.
Wehlela phezu kwentaba yeSinayi, wakhuluma labo usemazulwini,
wabazisa isabatha lakho elingcwele, wabalaya imilayo, lezimiso, lomthetho, ngesandla sikaMozisi inceku yakho.
Wabanika isinkwa esivela emazulwini ekulambeni kwabo.
Kodwa bona labobaba baziphatha ngokuzigqaja.
Yebo, bala ukulalela, kabakhumbulanga izimangaliso zakho owazenza kubo.
Lalapho sebezenzele ithole elibunjwe ngokuncibilikisa bathi: Lo nguNkulunkulu wakho, owakwenyusa eGibhithe,
kodwa wena ngezihawu zakho ezinengi kawubatshiyanga enkangala.
Wabanika umoya wakho omuhle ukubafundisa.
Yebo, iminyaka engamatshumi amane wabondla enkangala, kabaswelanga lutho.
Wasebanika imibuso lezizwe, wababela kwaze kwaba semagumbini.
Wandisa abantwana babo njengenkanyezi zamazulu, wabangenisa elizweni owawutshele oyise ukuthi bazangena badle ilifa lalo.
Sebengenile abantwana babo badla ilifa lelizwe.
Basebethumba imizi ebiyelweyo, lelizwe elivundileyo.
Kube kanti kabalalelanga, bakuvukela wena.
Ngakho wabanikela esandleni sezitha zabo ezabahluphayo.
Kodwa sebephumulile benza okubi futhi phambi kwakho; ngakho wabatshiya esandleni sezitha zabo zaze zababusa; sebebuyile bakhala kuwe, wena wezwa usemazulwini.
Wafakaza umelene labo ukuze ubenze babuyele emlayweni wakho; kube kanti bona baziphatha ngokuzigqaja, kabayilalelanga imilayo yakho.
Wababekezelela iminyaka eminengi, wafakaza umelene labo ngomoya wakho.
Kanti ngezisa zakho ezinengi.
Ngakho khathesi, Nkulunkulu wethu, uNkulunkulu omkhulu, olamandla lowesabekayo.
Kodwa ubulungile mayelana lakho konke okusehleleyo, ngoba wenzile ngokuqonda.
Lamakhosi ethu, iziphathamandla zethu, abapristi bethu, labobaba bethu kabawenzanga umlayo wakho, kabalalelanga imithetho yakho lezifakazelo zakho owazifakaza umelene labo.
Ngoba bona kabakukhonzanga embusweni wabo.
Khangela, siyizigqili lamuhla, yebo, ilizwe owalinika obaba ukuthi badle isithelo salo lokuhle kwalo, khangela, siyizigqili kulo.
Njalo isivuno salo lisandisela amakhosi owabeke phezu kwethu ngenxa yezono zethu; njalo abusa phezu kwemizimba yethu laphezu kwezifuyo zethu ngokwentando yawo; sesisesizini olukhulu.
Langenxa yakho konke lokhu senza isivumelwanoesiqinileyo, sisibhala; iziphathamandla zethu, amaLevi ethu, abapristi bethu, basebefaka uphawu phezu kwaso.
Ekufakeni-ke uphawu kwakuloNehemiya umbusi indodana kaHakaliya, loZedekhiya,
uSeraya,
uPashuri,
uHathushi, uShebaniya, uMaluki,
uHarimi,
uDaniyeli,
uMeshulamu, uAbhiya,
uMahaziya, uBiligayi; laba babengabapristi.
LamaLevi: Ngitsho uJeshuwa indodana kaAzaniya,
labafowabo, oShebaniya,
uMika, uRehobi,
uZakuri,
uHodiya, uBeninu.
Inhloko zabantu: OParoshi,
uBuni,
uAdonija, uBigivayi,
uAteri, uAzuri,
uHodiya, uHashuma,
uHarafi, uAnathothi, uNebayi,
uMagipiyashi,
uMeshezabeli,
uPelatiya, uHanani,
uHosheya, uHananiya,
uHaloheshi, uPiliha, uShobeki,
uRehuma,
uAhiya, uHanani, uAnani,
uMaluki.
Labantu abaseleyo, abapristi, amaLevi,
babambelela kubafowabo, izikhulu zabo, bangena kusiqalekiso lesifungo, lokuyigcina lokuyenza yonke imilayo kaJehova iNkosi yethu, lezahlulelo zayo lezimiso zayo.
Lokuthi kasiyikunika amadodakazi ethu ebantwini belizwe loba singathatheli amadodana ethu amadodakazi abo.
Uba abantu belizwe beletha izimpahla loba yiwaphi amabele ukukuthengisa ngosuku lwesabatha, kasiyikuthenga kibo ngesabatha langosuku olungcwele.
Futhi sizazimisela imilayo yokubeka phezu kwethu ingxenye yesithathu yeshekeli emnyakeni ibe ngeyomsebenzi wendlu kaNkulunkulu wethu,
eyesinkwa sokubukiswa.
Sasesisenza inkatho yokuphosa.
Lokuletha izithelo zokuqala zomhlabathi wethu lezithelo zokuqala zesithelo sonke sesihlahla sonke umnyaka ngomnyaka endlini yeN;
lokuletha amazibulo amadodana ethu lawezifuyo zethu, njengokubhalwe emlayweni, lamazibulo ezinkomo zethu lawezimvu zethu, endlini kaNkulunkulu wethu, kubapristi abasebenza endlini kaNkulunkulu wethu;
lokokuqala.
Umpristi-ke indodana kaAroni uzakuba kanye lamaLevi lapho amaLevi esemukela okwetshumi. LamaLevi azakwenyusa okwetshumi kokwetshumi endlini kaNkulunkulu wethu.
Ngoba abantwana bakoIsrayeli labantwana bamaLevi bazaletha umnikelo wamabele.
Ngakho ababusi babantu bahlala eJerusalema, lengxenye eziyisificamunwemunye kweminyeimizi.
Abantu basebebusisa wonke amadoda azinikela ngesihle uku ya hlala eJerusalema.
Lezi-ke zinhloko zesabelo ezahlala eJerusalema. Kodwa emizini yakoJuda bahlala, ngulowo kumfuyo yakhe, emizini yabo: UIsrayeli, abapristi, lamaLevi, lamaNethini.

EJerusalema kwahlala-ke abanyebabantwana bakoJuda lababantwana bakoBhenjamini. Ebantwaneni bakoJuda: OAthaya indodana kaUziya indodana kaZekhariya indodana kaAmariya indodana kaShefathiya indodana kaMahalaleli, owabantwana bakoPerezi,
loMahaseya indodana kaBharukhi.
Wonke amadodana kaPerezi ayehlala eJerusalema ayengamakhulu amane lamatshumi ayisithupha lesificaminwembili, amadoda alamandla.
Lala ngamadodana kaBhenjamini: USalu indodana kaMeshulamu indodana kaJowedi indodana kaPhedaya indodana kaKolaya indodana kaMahaseya indodana kaIthiyeli indodana kaJeshaya,
langemva kwakhe oGabayi, uSalayi, amakhulu ayisificamunwemunye lamatshumi amabili lesificaminwembili.
LoJoweli indodana kaZikiri wayengumboni phezu kwabo, loJuda indodana kaHasenuwa engowesibili phezu komuzi.
Kubapristi,
uSeraya indodana kaHilikhiya indodana kaMeshulamu indodana kaZadoki indodana kaMerayothi indodana kaAhitubi, umphathi wendlu kaNkulunkulu,
labafowabo ababesenza umsebenzi wendlu babengamakhulu ayisificaminwembili lamatshumi amabili lambili; loAdaya indodana kaJerohamu,
labafowabo, inhloko zaboyise, babengamakhulu amabili lamatshumi amane lambili; loAmashayi indodana kaAzareli indodana kaAhizayi indodana kaMeshilemothi indodana kaImeri,
labafowabo, amaqhawe alamandla, ikhulu lamatshumi amabili lesificaminwembili; lomboni phezu kwabo wayenguZabidiyeli indodana y omunyewabakhulu.
LakumaLevi;
loShabethayi;
loMathaniya indodana kaGalali indodana kaJeduthuni.
Wonke amaLevi emzini ongcwele ayengamakhulu amabili lamatshumi ayisificaminwembili lane.
Labalindimasango, oAkubi, uTalimoni, labafowabo ababelinda amasango babelikhulu lamatshumi ayisikhombisa lambili.
Lensali yakoIsrayeli, ababapristi, amaLevi, babesemizini yonke yakoJuda, ngulowo elifeni lakhe.
LamaNethini ayehlala eOfeli.
Njalo umboni wamaLevi eJerusalema wayenguUzi indodana kaBani. Owamadodana kaAsafi, abahlabeleli babeqondene lomsebenzi wendlu kaNkulunkulu.
Ngoba kwakungumlayo wenkosi ngabo.
Njalo uPethahiya indodana kaMeshezabeli.
Lemizaneni lamasimu ayo, kwahlala abanyebabantwana bakoJuda eKiriyathi-Arba,
laseJeshuwa, laseMolada,
laseHazari-Shuwali,
laseZikilagi,
laseEni-Rimoni,
iZanowa.
Labantwana bakoBhenjamini kusukela eGeba babeseMikimashi, leAyija,
iAnathothi, iAnaniya,
iHazori,
iHadidi, iNebalati,
iLodi.
LakumaLevi kwakulezigaba zakoJuda lo Bhenjamini.
Lalaba ngabapristi lamaLevi,
uAmariya, uMaluki, uHathushi,
uShekaniya, uRehuma, uMeremothi,
uIdo, uGinethoyi, uAbhiya,
uMijamini, uMahadiya, uBiliga,
uShemaya,
uSalu, uAmoki, uHilikhiya, uJedaya.
LamaLevi: OJeshuwa.
LoBakibukiya loUni, abafowabo, babeqondene labo emilindweni.
UJeshuwa wasezala uJoyakimi,
uJoyada wasezala uJonathani.
Lensukwini zikaJoyakimi abapristi, inhloko zaboyise, babengo: OkaSeraya nguMeraya; okaJeremiya nguHananiya;
okaEzra nguMeshulamu; okaAmariya nguJehohanani;
okaMeliku nguJonathani; okaShebaniya nguJosefa;
okaHarimi nguAdina; okaMerayothi nguHelikayi;
okaIdo nguZekhariya; okaGinethoni nguMeshulamu;
okaAbhiya nguZikiri; okaMiniyamini, okaMowadiya nguPilitayi;
okaBiliga nguShamuwa; okaShemaya nguJehonathani;
lokaJoyaribi nguMathenayi; okaJedaya nguUzi;
okaSalayi nguKalayi; okaAmoki nguEberi;
okaHilikhiya nguHashabhiya; okaJedaya nguNethaneli.
AmaLevi ensukwini zikaEliyashibi loJaduwa, babhalwa baba zinhloko zaboyise, labapristi kwaze kwaba ngumbuso kaDariyusi umPerisiya.
Amadodana kaLevi, inhloko zaboyise, abhalwa egwalweni lwemilando, kwaze kwaba sensukwini zikaJohanani indodana kaEliyashibi.
Lenhloko zamaLevi: OHashabhiya.
OMathaniya, babengabalindimasango belinda umlindo eziphaleni zamasango.
Labo babekhona ensukwini zikaJoyakimi indodana kaJeshuwa indodana kaJozadaki.
Lekwehlukaniselweni komduli weJerusalema.
Amadodana abahlabeleli asebuthana, njalo evela emagcekeni azingelezele iJerusalema,
leBeti-Giligali, ngoba abahlabeleli babezakhele imizi ezingelezele iJerusalema.
Labapristi lamaLevi bazihlambulula, bahlambulula labantu lamasango lomduli.
Ngasengisenza iziphathamandla zakoJuda zenyukele emdulini, ngamisa amaxuku amakhulu amabili okubonga lezindwendwe, elinye kwesokunene.
Lemva kwawo kwahamba oHoshaya, lengxenye yeziphathamandla zakoJuda,
loAzariya,
uJuda, loBhenjamini, loShemaya.
Lakumadodana abapristi elezimpondo indodana kaAsafi,
labafowabo, oShemaya, loAzareli, uMilalayi, uGilalayi, uMahayi, uNethaneli, loJuda, uHanani, belezinto zokuhlabelela zikaDavida, loEzra umbhali ephambi kwabo.
Langasesangweni lomthombo.
Lexuku lesibili lokubonga lahamba maqondana lalo, lami ngililandela, lengxenye yabantu phezu komduli,
njalo kusukela ngaphezu kwesango lakoEfrayimi.
Womabili amaxuku okubonga asesima endlini kaNkulunkulu, lami, lengxenye yababusi ilami.
Labapristi: OEliyakhimi, uMahaseya, uMiniyamini, uMikhaya, belezimpondo,
loMahaseya. Abahlabeleli basebezizwakalisa, loJezerahiya umboni.

Basebehlaba mhlalokho imihlatshelo emikhulu, bathokoza, ngoba uNkulunkulu wabenza bathokoza ngentokozo enkulu; labesifazana labantwana labo bathokoza; kwaze kwathi intokozo yeJerusalema yezwakala khatshana.
Ngalolosuku kwamiswa-ke.
Abahlabeleli labalindimasango basebegcina imfanelo kaNkulunkulu wabo, lemfanelo yokuhlambulula, njengomlayo kaDavida l oSolomoni indodana yakhe.
Ngoba ensukwini zamandulo zikaDavida loAsafi kwakulezinhloko zabahlabeleli lezingoma zokudumisa lokubonga kuNkulunkulu.
LoIsrayeli wonke ensukwini zikaZerubhabheli.
Ngalolosuku babala egwalweni lukaMozisi endlebeni zabantu;
ngoba bengahlangabezanga abantwana bakoIsrayeli ngesinkwa langamanzi, kodwa baqatsha bemelene labo uBalami, ukubaqalekisa.
Kwasekusithi sebewuzwile umlayo behlukanisa koIsrayeli.
Ngaphambi kwalokho-ke uEliyashibi umpristi owayemiswe phezu kwekamelo likaNkulunkulu wethu.

Wayemlungisele ikamelo elikhulu lapho ababekade befaka khona umnikelo wokudla, impepha, lezitsha, lokwetshumi kwamabele, iwayini elitsha, lamafutha, okwakulayelwe amaLevi labahlabeleli labalindimasango, lomnikelo wabapristi.
Kodwa kukho konke lokhu ngangingekho eJerusalema, ngoba ngomnyaka wamatshumi amathathu lambili kaAthakisekisi; lekupheleni kwezinsuku ngacela imvumo enkosini,
ngeza eJerusalema, ngaqedisisa ngokubi uEliyashibi.
Kwasekusiba kubi kakhulu kimi; ngakho ngaphosela phandle zonke impahla zendlu kaTobiya phandle kwekamelo.
Ngasengilaya, bahlambulula amakamelo.
Ngasengisazi ukuthi izabelo zamaLevi zazinganikwanga.
Ngasengiphikisana lababusi? Ngababuthanisa, ngabamisa endaweni yabo.
Khona wonke uJuda waletha okwetshumi kwamabele lewayini elitsha lamafutha eziphaleni.
Ngasengibeka abagciniziphala phezu kweziphala; njalo kwakuphezu kwabo ukwabela abafowabo.
Ngikhumbule, Nkulunkulu wami, mayelana lalokho, ungayicitshi imisebenzi yami yomusa engiyenzele indlu kaNkulunkulu wami lezinkonzo zayo.
Ngalezonsuku ngabona koJuda abanyathela izikhamelo zewayini ngesabatha.
LabeTire bahlala kuyo, beletha inhlanzi lempahla yonke ethengiswayo, bakuthengisa ngesabatha kubantwana bakoJuda laseJerusalema.
Khona ngaphikisana lezikhulu zakoJuda, ngathi kuzo: Iyini le into embi eliyenzayo lingcolisa usuku lwesabatha?
Kabenzanga njalo yini oyihlo, loNkulunkulu wethu wehlisela phezu kwethu bonke lobububi laphezu kwalumuzi? Kanti lina landisa ulaka phezu kukaIsrayeli ngokungcolisa isabatha.

Kwasekusithi lapho amasango eJerusalema eseqala ukuba mnyama mandulo kwesabatha, ngalaya ukuthi iminyango kayivalwe, njalo ngalaya ukuthi bangayivuli kuze kube ngemva kwesabatha. Ngabeka ezinyezenceku zami emasangweni ukuzekungangeni mthwalo ngosuku lwesabatha.
Ngakho abathengi labathengisi bempahla yonke balala ngaphandle kweJerusalema kanye loba kabili.
Khona ngafakaza ngimelene labo ngathi kibo: Lilalelani maqondana lomduli? Uba likwenza futhi, ngizalidumela ngesandla. Kusukela kulesosikhathi kababuyanga ngesabatha.
Ngasengitshela amaLevi ukuthi azihlambulule.
Futhi, ngalezonsuku ngabona amaJuda ayethethe abafazi.
Labantwana babo, ingxenye babekhuluma isiAshidodi njalo bengelakukhuluma isiJuda, kodwa ngokolimi lwezizwe ngezizwe.

Ngasengiphikisana lawo, ngawaqalekisa, ngatshaya amanye awo, ngawangcothula inwele: Kaliyikunika amadodakazi enu kumadodana abo, njalo kaliyikuthathela amadodana enu emadodakazini abo, kumbe lina ngokwenu.
USolomoni inkosi yakoIsrayeli konanga yini ngalezozinto.
Pho, sizalilalela yini ukwenza bonke lobobubi obukhulu, ngokona kuNkulunkulu wethu ngokuthatha abafazi bezizweni?
L enyeyamadodana kaJehoyada; ngakho ngayixotsha yasuka kimi.
Bakhumbule, Nkulunkulu wami, ngoba bangcolisile ubupristi.
Ngokunjalo ngabahlambulula kubo bonke abezizweni, ngamisa imfanelo kubapristi lakumaLevi, ngulowo lalowo emsebenzini wakhe,
leyomnikelo wenkuni.
Kwasekusithi ngensuku zikaAhasuwerusi,
ngalezonsuku lapho inkosi uAhasuwerusi wahlala esihlalweni sobukhosi sombuso wakhe,
ngomnyaka wesithathu wokubusa kwakhe wenzela iziphathamandla zakhe lenceku zakhe zonke idili,
lapho etshengisa inotho yenkazimulo yombuso wakhe lobugugu bobuhle bobukhulu bakhe insuku ezinengi, insuku ezilikhulu lamatshumi ayisificaminwembili.

Kwathi lezonsuku sezigcwalisekile, inkosi yenzela bonke abantu abatholakala eShushani isigodlo idili, kusukela komkhulu kusiya komncinyane, insuku eziyisikhombisa, egumeni lesivande sesigodlo senkosi.
Kwakulamalembu amhlophe, amalembu acolekileyo, laluhlaza okwesibhakabhaka, ebotshelwe ngentambo zelembu elicolekileyo kakhulu leziyibubende emasongweni esiliva.
Basebenathisa ngezitsha zegolide, lezitsha zaziyizitsha ezehlukeneyo, lewayini lesikhosini laba linengi njengokwesandla senkosi.
Lokunatha kwakungokomthetho, kungekho obamba ngamandla; ngoba ngokunjalo inkosi yayilayile kwabakhulu bonke bendlu yayo ukuthi benze njengokufisa komuntu lomuntu.
UVashiti indlovukazi laye wenzela abesifazana idili endlini yesikhosini inkosi uAhasuwerusi ayelayo.
Ngosuku lwesikhombisa, inhliziyo yenkosi isithokozile ngewayini, abathenwa abayisikhombisa ababesebenza phambi kwenkosi uAhasuwerusi,
ukuthi balethe uVashiti indlovukazi phambi kwenkosi elomqhele wesikhosini, ukutshengisa abantu leziphathamandla ubuhle bakhe, ngoba wayekhangeleka kuhle.
Kodwa indlovukazi uVashiti yala ukubuya ngelizwi lenkosi elalingesandla sabathenwa. Ngakho inkosi yathukuthela kakhulu, lolaka lwayo lwavutha phakathi kwayo.
Inkosi yasisithi kwabahlakaniphileyo,
lalabo ababeseduze layo babengoKarishena, uShethari, uAdimatha, uTarshishi, uMeresi, uMarisena, uMemukani:
Ngokomthetho kungenziwani ngendlovukazi uVashiti ngenxa yokuthi kayenzanga ilizwi lenkosi uAhasuwerusi ngesandla sabathenwa?

UMemukani wasesithi phambi kwenkosi leziphathamandla: UVashiti indlovukazi wonile kungeyisikho enkosini kuphela, kodwa la kuziphathamandla zonke lebantwini bonke abasezabelweni zonke zenkosi uAhasuwerusi.

Ngoba isenzo sendlovukazi sizaphumela kubo bonke abesifazana, kuze kuthi badelele omkabo emehlweni abo, nxa besithi: Inkosi uAhasuwerusi watshela ukuthi kulethwe uVashiti indlovukazi phambi kwayo, kodwa kayizanga.
Yebo mhlalokho amakhosikazi ePerisiya leMede ezwe isenzo sendlovukazi azakuthi kuzo zonke iziphathamandla zenkosi, kube khona ukudelela lokuthukuthela okwedlulisayo.

Uba kulungile enkosini kakuphume umthetho wesikhosini kuyo, kakubhalwe emithethweni yamaPerisiya lamaMede, ongeguqulwe, ukuthi uVashiti kayikungena phambi kwenkosi uAhasuwerusi; inkosi inike-ke ubukhosikazi bakhe komunye onjengaye ongcono kulaye.
Usuzwakele umthetho wenkosi ezawenza embusweni wayo wonke (ngoba mkhulu) bonke abesifazana bazanika inhlonipho kubomkabo.
Njalo indaba yayilungile emehlweni enkosi leziphathamandla; inkosi yasisenza njengokwelizwi likaMemukani.

Yasithumela izincwadi kuzo zonke izabelo zenkosi, kusabelo lesabelo njengombhalo waso, lakubo abantu labantu njengokolimi lwabo, ukuthi ileyo laleyondoda ibe ngumbusi endlini yayo, ikhulume njengokolimi lwabantu bakibo.
Emva kwalezizinto, ulaka lwenkosi uAhasuwerusi seludedile, wamkhumbula uVashiti, lalokho ayekwenzile, lalokho okwaqunywa ngaye.
Izinceku zenkosi ezaziyisebenzela zasezisithi: Kakudingelwe inkosi amantombazana, izintombi ezikhangeleka kuhle.

Inkosi imise-ke ababonisi kuzo zonke izabelo zombuso, ukuze babuthanise wonke amantombazana, izintombi ezikhangeleka kuhle, eShushani isigodlo, endlini yabesifazana, esandleni sikaHegayi, umthenwa wenkosi, umlondolozi wabesifazana, lokunika okokuqhola kwawo.
Kuthi intombazana enhle emehlweni enkosi ibe yindlovukazi esikhundleni sikaVashiti. Indaba yayilungile-ke emehlweni enkosi, yenza njalo.
Kwakukhona indoda engumJuda eShushani isigodlo, obizo layo lalinguModekhayi indodana kaJayiri indodana kaShimeyi,
owayethunjwe eJerusalema kanye labathunjwa ababethunjwe loJekoniya inkosi yakoJuda, uNebhukadinezari inkosi yeBhabhiloni owayebathumbile.

Njalo wayesondla uHadasa, onguEsta, umntakamalumakhe, ngoba wayengelayise kumbe unina; njalo intombi yayiyinhle ngesimo njalo ikhangeleka kuhle; ekufeni-ke kukayise lonina uModekhayi wayithatha yaba yindodakazi yakhe.

Kwasekusithi sekuzwakele ilizwi lenkosi lomthetho wayo, lapho sekubuthaniswe izintombi ezinengi eShushani isigodlo esandleni sikaHegayi, uEsta laye wathathwa wasiwa endlini yenkosi esandleni sikaHegayi, umlondolozi wabesifazana.
Lentombi yayiyinhle emehlweni akhe, yazuza umusa phambi kwakhe.
UEsta wayengakhulumanga abantu bakwabo lomhlobo wakhe, ngoba uModekhayi wayemlayile ukuthi angakukhulumi.
Langalo lonke usuku ngosuku uModekhayi wayehambahamba phambi kweguma lendlu yabesifazana ukwazi impilakahle kaEsta lokuthi kuyini okuzakwenzeka kuye.

Lekufikeni kwezopha lentombi ngentombi ukungena enkosini uAhasuwerusi ekucineni sekwenziwe kuye njengomthetho wabesifazana, inyanga ezilitshumi lambili, ngoba ngokunjalo kwagcwaliseka insuku zamakha awo, inyanga eziyisithupha ngamafutha emure, lenyanga eziyisithupha ngamakha okuqhola, lang amanyeamakha abesifazana.
Ngalokho-ke intombi yangena enkosini; loba kuyini ekutshoyo izakunikwa ukuthi ihambe lakho isuka endlini yabesifazana isiya endlini yenkosi.

Ntambama yangena, lekuseni ibuyele endlini yesibili yabesifazana, esandleni sikaShashigazi umthenwa wenkosi umlondolozi wabafazi abancinyane; kayingenanga futhi enkosini ngaphandle kokuthi inkosi ithokoze ngayo, ibizwe ngebizo.

Kwathi selifikile izopho likaEsta, indodakazi kaAbihayili umalumakhe kaModekhayi owayemthethe waba yindodakazi yakhe, lokuthi angene enkosini, kacelanga lutho ngaphandle kwalokho uHegayi umthenwa wenkosi umlondolozi wabesifazana akutshoyo. UEsta wayesemukela-ke umusa emehlweni abo bonke abambonayo.
Ngokunjalo uEsta wasiwa enkosini uAhasuwerusi endlini yayo yesikhosini ngenyanga yetshumi, eyinyanga kaTebethi, ngomnyaka wesikhombisa wokubusa kwayo.

Inkosi yasimthanda uEsta okwedlula bonke abesifazana, wemukela umusa lesihe phambi kwayo okwedlula zonke intombi, yasibeka umqhele wobukhosi ekhanda lakhe, yamenza indlovukazi esikhundleni sikaVashiti.
Inkosi yasisenzela zonke iziphathamandla zayo lenceku zayo idili elikhulu, idili likaEsta. Yenzela izabelo ikhefu.
Kwathi intombi sezibuthanisiwe okwesibili.
UEsta wayengakhulumanga umhlobo wakhe labantu bakibo, njengoba uModekhayi wamlaya.
Ngalezozinsuku uModekhayi ehlezi esangweni lenkosi, oBigithani loTereshi abathenwa ababili benkosi, abalindi bombundu, bathukuthela, badinga ukuyithela isandla inkosi uAhasuwerusi.
Njalo udaba lwaziwa kuModekhayi, waselutshela uEsta indlovukazi; njalo uEsta wayitshela inkosi ebizweni likaModekhayi.
Lolodaba seluhlolwa, lwatholakala lunjalo; ngakho bobabili baphanyekwa esihlahleni. Kwasekubhalwa egwalweni lwemilando phambi kwenkosi.
Emva kwalezizindaba inkosi uAhasuwerusi yamkhulisa uHamani indodana kaHamedatha.
Ngakho zonke inceku zenkosi ezazisesangweni lenkosi zakhothama zamkhonza uHamani, ngoba inkosi yayilaye ngokunjalo ngaye. Kodwa uModekhayi kakhothamanga kakhonzanga.
Izinceku zenkosi ezazisesangweni lenkosi?
Kwasekusithi zikhuluma laye insuku ngensuku, kodwa engazizwanga, zamtshela uHamani ukuze zibone ukuthi amazwi kaModekhayi azakuma yini; ngoba wayezitshelile ukuthi ungumJuda.
UHamani esebonile ukuthi uModekhayi kakhothamanga njalo kakhonzanga kuye.

Wesedelela emehlweni akhe ukumthela isandla uModekhayi yedwa, ngoba babemtshelile abantu bakibo kaModekhayi, ngakho uHamani wadinga ukuchitha wonke amaJuda, ayesembusweni wonke kaAhasuwerusi, abantu bakibo kaModekhayi.
Ngenyanga yokuqala, eyinyanga uNisani.

UHamani wasesithi enkosini uAhasuwerusi: Kukhona abantu abathile abahlakazeke basabalala phakathi kwabantu ezabelweni zonke zombuso wakho; lemilayo yabo, lemilayo yenkosi kabayenzi; ngakho kakufanelanga enkosini ukuthi ibayekele bahlale.
Uba kulungile enkosini, kakubhalwe ukuthi bachithwe, njalo ngizalinganisa amathalenta esiliva azinkulungwane ezilitshumi ezandleni zabenzi bomsebenzi, ukuze afakwe kokuligugu kwenkosi.
Inkosi yasikhupha indandatho yophawu lwayo esandleni sayo, yayinika uHamani indodana kaHamedatha, isitha samaJuda.
Inkosi yasisithi kuHamani: Isiliva usinikiwe, labantu, ukwenza ngabo njengokuhle emehlweni akho.
Kwasekubizwa ababhali benkosi, kwananyathiselwa ngendandatho yophawu lwenkosi.
Incwadi zathunyelwa ngesandla sezigijimi.
Ikhophi yombhalo yokuthi umlayo unikwe kuso sonke isabelo ngesabelo yayisobala kubo bonke abantu ukuze balungele lolosuku.
Izigijimi zaphuma ziphangisiswa yilizwi lenkosi.
UModekhayi esekwazile konke okwenziweyo, uModekhayi wadabula izigqoko zakhe, waphuma wangena phakathi komuzi, wakhala ukukhala okukhulu lokubabayo,
weza waze waba phambi kwesango lenkosi, ngoba kwakungekho ongangena esangweni lenkosi egqoke isaka.

Lakuso sonke isabelo lesabelo, indawo lapho ilizwi lenkosi lomthetho okwakufika khona, kwaba lokulila okukhulu kumaJuda, lokuzila ukudla, lokukhala inyembezi, lokulila; amanengi alala emasakeni lemlotheni.
Kwasekufika amantombazana kaEsta labathenwa bakhe bamtshela; indlovukazi yasidabuka kakhulu, yathumela izembatho zokugqokisa uModekhayi, lokususa kuye isaka lakhe, kodwa kazemukelanga.
UEsta wasebiza uHathaki omunyewabathenwa benkosi eyayimmisele yena, wamlaya ngoModekhayi ukuthi azi ukuthi kuyini lokuthi kungani.
UHathaki wasephuma waya kuModekhayi egcekeni lomuzi elaliphambi kwesango lenkosi.
UModekhayi wamtshela konke okwenzeke kuye, lengcazelo yemali uHamani athi uzayilinganisela kokuligugu kwenkosi ngamaJuda ukuwachitha.

Wasemnika ikhophi yombhalo womthetho eyanikwa eShushani ukuwachitha ukuthi ayitshengise uEsta, lokuthi amtshele, lokuthi amlaye ukuthi angene enkosini, ukumncengela, lokucelela abantu bakibo phambi kwakhe.
UHathaki wasesiza wamtshela uEsta amazwi kaModekhayi.
UEsta wasekhuluma loHathaki, wamnika umlayo usiya kuModekhayi wokuthi:

Zonke inceku zenkosi labantu bezabelo zenkosi bayakwazi ukuthi, loba ngubani, owesilisa loba owesifazana, ongena esiya enkosini egumeni elingaphakathi, engabizwanga, kulomthetho owodwa ngaye woku m bulala, ngaphandle kokuthi inkosi imelulele intonga yobukhosi yegolide, ukuze aphile; kodwa mina kangibizwanga ukungena enkosini lezinsuku ezingamatshumi amathathu.
Basebemtshela uModekhayi amazwi kaEsta.
UModekhayi wasesithi ephendula uEsta: Ungacabangi engqondweni yakho ukuthi uzaphepha endlini yenkosi okwedlula wonke amaJuda.

Ngoba uba uthula lokuthula ngalesisikhathi, usizo lenkululeko kuzamela amaJuda kuvela kwenye indawo, kodwa wena lendlu kayihlo lizabhubha. Ngubani kambe owaziyo ukuthi ufikile embusweni ngenxa yesikhathi esinje?
UEsta wasesithi ephendula uModekhayi:

Hamba ubuthanise wonke amaJuda atholakala eShushani, lingizilele ukudla, lingadli linganathi insuku ezintathu ubusuku lemini; lami lamantombazana ami sizazila ukudla ngokufananayo; ngokunjalo-ke ngizangena enkosini, okunganjengokomthetho.
UModekhayi waseqhubeka wenza njengakho konke uEsta amlaye khona.
Kwasekusithi ngosuku lwesithathu uEsta wagqoka ezobundlovukazi.
Kwasekusithi inkosi ibona uEsta indlovukazi emi egumeni, wazuza umusa emehlweni ayo.
Inkosi yasisithi kuye: Ulani, ndlovukazi Esta? Lesicelo sakho siyini? Uzasinikwa ngitsho kuze kube yingxenye yombuso.
UEsta wasesithi: Uba kukuhle enkosini, kayize inkosi loHamani edilini engiyenzele lona.
Inkosi yasisithi: Phangisisani uHamani ukuthi enze ilizwi likaEsta. Ngakho yeza inkosi loHamani edilini uEsta ayelenzile.
Inkosi yasisithi kuEsta edilini lewayini.
UEsta wasephendula wathi: Isicelo sami lesifiso sami yilokhu:

Uba ngithole umusa emehlweni enkosi, futhi uba kukuhle enkosini ukupha isicelo sami lokwenza isifiso sami, inkosi loHamani kabeze edilini engizalenzela bona. Kusasa-ke ngizakwenza njengokwelizwi lenkosi.
UHamani wasephuma mhlalokho ethokoza elenhliziyo enhle.
Kodwa uHamani wazithinta, wafika endlini yakhe; wasethuma walanda abangane bakhe.
UHamani wasebalandisela udumo lwenotho yakhe, lobunengi bamadodana akhe.
UHamani wasesithi: Yebo, uEsta indlovukazi kangenisanga muntu kanye lenkosi edilini alenzileyo ngaphandle kwami; njalo lakusasa nginxuselwe kuye lenkosi.
Kanti konke lokhu kakungenelisi ngalutho ngaso sonke isikhathi ngibona uModekhayi umJuda ehlezi esangweni lenkosi.

UZereshi umkakhe labo bonke abangane bakhe basebesithi kuye: Kakwenziwe ugodo ubude obuzingalo ezingamatshumi amahlanu; kusasa-ke uthi enkosini kabalengise uModekhayi kulo, ubusungena lenkosi edilini uthokozile. Njalo loludaba lwalulungile phambi kukaHamani, waselwenza ugodo.
Ngalobobusuku ubuthongo benkosi babaleka; yasisithi kakulethwe ugwalo lwezikhumbuzo lwemilando; yasibalwa phambi kwenkosi.
Kwasekutholakala kubhaliwe ukuthi uModekhayi wabika ngoBigithana loTereshi, abathenwa ababili benkosi, abalindi bombundu, ababedinge ukwelulela isandla enkosini uAhasuwerusi.
Inkosi yasisithi: Dumo? Izinceku zenkosi ezaziyikhonza zasezisithi: Kakwenziwanga lutho kuye.
Inkosi yasisithi: Ngubani osegumeni? UHamani wayesengene egumeni elingaphandle lendlu yenkosi.
Izinceku zenkosi zasezisithi kuyo: Khangela, uHamani umi egumeni. Inkosi yasisithi: Kangene.
UHamani wasengena; inkosi yasisithi kuye: Kwenziweni kumuntu inkosi ethokoza kudumo lwakhe? UHamani wasesithi enhliziyweni yakhe: Ngubani inkosi engathokoza uku m nika udumo okwedlula mina?
UHamani wasesithi enkosini: Umuntu inkosi ethokoza kudumo lwakhe,
kakulethwe isembatho sobukhosi inkosi uqobo esigqokayo, lebhiza inkosi eligadayo, lokuthi umqhele wobukhosi ubekwe enhlokweni yalo;

lesembatho lebhiza kunikwe esandleni somunye weziphathamandla zenkosi ezihloniphekayo, lokuthi bagqokise lowomuntu inkosi ethokoza kudumo lwakhe, bamgadise ibhiza adabule igceke lomuzi, bamemeze phambi kwakhe bathi: Kwenziwa nje emuntwini inkosi ethokoza ngodumo lwakhe.
Inkosi yasisithi kuHamani: Phangisa thatha isembatho lebhiza njengokutsho kwakho, wenze njalo kuModekhayi umJuda ohlala esangweni lenkosi; kungawi lalizwi kukho konke okukhulumileyo.
UHamani wasethatha isembatho lebhiza, wagqokisa uModekhayi, wamgadisa wadabula igceke lomuzi, wamemeza phambi kwakhe wathi: Kwenziwa nje emuntwini inkosi ethokoza kudumo lwakhe.
Wasebuyela uModekhayi esangweni lenkosi, kodwa uHamani wahaluzela waya endlini yakhe elila.
UHamani wasetshela uZereshi umkakhe labo bonke abangane bakhe.
Besakhuluma loHamani, abathenwa benkosi basondela, bahaluzela ukuletha uHamani.
Bafika-ke inkosi loHamani uku ya kuba ledili loEsta indlovukazi.
Inkosi yasisithi kuEsta langosuku lwesibili edilini lewayini: Siyini isicelo sakho, Esta ndlovukazi? njalo uzasinikwa. Siyini-ke isifiso sakho? kuzakwenziwa ngitsho kuze kube yingxenye yombuso.
UEsta indlovukazi wasephendula wathi: Uba ngithole umusa emehlweni akho, nkosi, njalo uba kukuhle enkosini, impilo yami kangiyinikwe ngesicelo sami labantu bakithi ngesifiso sami.

Ngoba sithengisiwe, mina labantu bakithi, ukuthi sibhujiswe sibulawe njalo sichithwe; kodwa uba besithengiswe ukuba yizigqili lezigqilikazi ngabe ngithule; lanxa isitha besingelinganise ukoniwa kwenkosi.
Inkosi uAhasuwerusi yasikhuluma yathi kuEsta indlovukazi: Ngubani lo, futhi ungaphi lo ogcwalise inhliziyo yakhe ukwenza njalo?
UEsta wasesithi: Umuntu, umbandezeli lesitha, nguHamani lo okhohlakeleyo. UHamani waseqhaqhazela phambi kwenkosi lendlovukazi.
Inkosi yasisukuma edilini lewayini olakeni lwayo, yaya esivandeni sesigodlo.
Inkosi isiphendukile ivela esivandeni sesigodlo isiya endlini yedili lewayini.
UHaribona omunye wabathenwa wasesithi phambi kwenkosi.
Basebemlengisa uHamani kulologodo ayelulungisele uModekhayi. Lwaseludeda ulaka lwenkosi.
Ngalolosuku inkosi uAhasuwerusi yanika uEsta indlovukazi indlu kaHamani isitha samaJuda. UModekhayi wasesiza phambi kwenkosi ngoba uEsta waye se landisile ukuthi wayeyini kuye.
Inkosi yasikhupha indandatho yophawu lwayo eyayiyithathele uHamani, yayinika uModekhayi. UEsta wasebeka uModekhayi phezu kwendlu kaHamani.
UEsta wasebuya ekhuluma phambi kwenkosi, wawa phambi kwenyawo zayo wakhala inyembezi wayincenga ukuthi isuse ububi bukaHamani umAgagi, logobe lwakhe ayelucebe ngamaJuda.
Inkosi yasiselulela intonga yobukhosi yegolide kuEsta. UEsta wasesukuma wema phambi kwenkosi,

wasesithi: Uba kukuhle enkosini, uba-ke ngithole umusa phambi kwayo, lodaba lulungile phambi kwenkosi, lami ngilungile emehlweni ayo, kakubhalwe ukubuyisela emuva izincwadi, ugobe lukaHamani indodana kaHamedatha umAgagi, ayelubhalele ukubhubhisa amaJuda asezabelweni zonke zenkosi.
Ngoba ngingaba lakho njani ukubona ububi obuzathola isizwe sakithi? Kumbe ngingaba lakho njani ukubona ukubhujiswa kwezihlobo zami?
Inkosi uAhasuwerusi yasisithi kuEsta indlovukazi lakuModekhayi umJuda: Khangelani, indlu kaHamani ngiyinike uEsta, yena-ke bamlengise egodweni, ngenxa yokuthi welulela isandla sakhe kumaJuda.

Ngakho lina bhalelani amaJuda ebizweni lenkosi, njengokuhle emehlweni enu, likunameke ngophawu lwendandatho yenkosi, ngoba umbhalo obhalwe ngebizo lenkosi wananyekwa ngophawu lwendandatho yenkosi, kakho ongawubuyisela emuva.

Kwasekubizwa ababhali benkosi ngalesosikhathi ngenyanga yesithathu, eyinyanga uSivani, ngolwamatshumi amabili lantathu lwayo; kwasekubhalwa njengakho konke uModekhayi akulaya kumaJuda, lezikhulwini lakubabusi lakuziphathamandla zezabelo ezisukela eIndiya kuze kufike eEthiyophiya, izabelo ezilikhulu lamatshumi amabili lesikhombisa, isabelo lesabelo njengokombhalo waso, lesizwe ngesizwe njengokolimi lwaso, lakumaJuda njengokombhalo wawo lanjengokolimi lwawo.

Wasebhala ebizweni lenkosi uAhasuwerusi, wanameka ngophawu lwendandatho yenkosi, wathumela izincwadi ngesandla sezigijimi ezigade amabhiza, ezigade amabhiza alejubane awesikhosini, amabhizakazi amatsha.

Ukuthi inkosi yavumela amaJuda ayesemzini ngomuzi wonke ukuthi ahlangane amele impilo yawo ukubhubhisa abulale aqede wonke amandla abantu lesabelo abawahlaseleyo, abantwanyana labesifazana, lokuphanga impango yabo,
ngasuku lunye kuzo zonke izabelo zenkosi uAhasuwerusi, ngolwetshumi lantathu lwenyanga yetshumi lambili, eyinyanga uAdari.
Ikhophi yombhalo yomthetho ozamiswa kuso sonke isabelo ngesabelo yayisobala kubo bonke abantu, ukuthi amaJuda azilungisele lolusuku ukuziphindiselela ezitheni zawo.
Izigijimi zigade amabhiza esikhosini alejubane zaphuma, ziphangisiswa zicindezelwa yilizwi lenkosi, lomthetho wanikwa eShushani isigodlo.

UModekhayi wasephuma phambi kwenkosi ekusembatho sobukhosi sobuluhlaza okwesibhakabhaka lesimhlophe, lomqhele omkhulu wegolide, lesembatho selembu elicolekileyo kakhulu leliyibubende. Umuzi weShushani wasuthokoza wathaba.
AmaJuda ayelokukhanya lentokozo lenjabulo lodumo.

Lakuso sonke isabelo ngesabelo lakuwo wonke umuzi ngomuzi endaweni lapho ilizwi lenkosi lomthetho wayo okwafika khona amaJuda aba lentokozo, lenjabulo, idili, losuku oluhle. Labanengi babantu belizwe baba ngamaJuda, ngoba ukwesaba amaJuda kwabehlela.

Kwathi ngenyanga yetshumi lambili, eyinyanga uAdari, ngosuku lwetshumi lantathu lwayo, sekusondele ilizwi lenkosi lomlayo wayo ukuthi kwenziwe, ngosuku izitha zamaJuda ezazithemba ukuwabusa ngalo, kwaguquka, ngoba amaJuda ngokwawo abusa kwababewazonda.

AmaJuda abuthana emizini yawo kuzo zonke izabelo zenkosi uAhasuwerusi ukwelulela isandla kulabo ababedinge ukulinyazwa kwawo; njalo kakho owayengema phambi kwawo, ngoba ukwesabeka kwawo kwakwehlele bonke abantu.
Zonke-ke iziphathamandla zezabelo, lezikhulu, lababusi, labenzi bomsebenzi inkosi eyayilabo, basiza amaJuda, ngoba ukwesabeka kukaModekhayi kwakubehlele.
Ngoba uModekhayi wayemkhulu endlini yenkosi, lodumo lwakhe lwahamba kuzo zonke izabelo, ngoba lindoda uModekhayi yaqhubeka ikhula.
Ngakho amaJuda atshaya phakathi kwezitha zawo zonke ngokutshaya kwenkemba lokubulala lokubhubhisa, enza ngabazondi bawo ngokwentando yawo.
EShushani isigodlo amaJuda asebulala abhubhisa abantu abangamakhulu amahlanu,
loParishanidatha, loDalifoni, loAsiphatha,
loPoratha, loAdaliya, loAridatha,
loParimashita, loArisayi, loAridayi, loVayizatha.
Amadodana alitshumi kaHamani indodana kaHamedatha, isitha samaJuda, awabulala.
Ngalolosuku inani lababulawayo eShushani isigodlo lafika phambi kwenkosi.

Inkosi yasisithi kuEsta indlovukazi: EShushani isigodlo amaJuda abulele abhubhisa abantu abangamakhulu amahlanu lamadodana alitshumi kaHamani. Enzeni kwezinye izabelo zenkosi? Siyini-ke isicelo sakho? Njalo uzasinikwa. Siyini-ke isifiso sakho futhi? Njalo sizakwenziwa.
UEsta wasesithi: Uba kulungile enkosini kawavunyelwe amaJuda aseShushani ukwenza lakusasa njengokomthetho walamuhla; lamadodana alitshumi kaHamani kabawalengise egodweni.
Inkosi yasisithi kwenziwe njalo; kwasekunikwa umthetho eShushani, lamadodana alitshumi kaHamani bawalengisa.
AmaJuda eyeseShushani asebuthana futhi ngosuku lwetshumi lane lwenyanga uAdari.

Amanye kumaJuda ayesezabelweni zenkosi abuthana-ke amela impilo yabo, aphumula ezitheni zawo, abulala kwabawazondayo izinkulungwane ezingamatshumi ayisikhombisa lanhlanu; kodwa kawelulelanga isandla sawo empangweni.
Kwaku ngosuku lwetshumi lantathu lwenyanga uAdari. Asephumula ngolwetshumi lane lwayo, alwenza lwaba lusuku lwedili lentokozo.
Kodwa amaJuda aseShushani abuthana ngolwetshumi lantathu lwayo langolwetshumi lane lwayo; asephumula ngolwetshumi lanhlanu lwayo, alwenza lwaba lusuku lwedili lentokozo.
Ngenxa yalokhu amaJuda emaphandleni.
UModekhayi wasezibhala lezizinto, wathumela izincwadi kuwo wonke amaJuda ayekuzo zonke izabelo zenkosi uAhasuwerusi, aseduze lakhatshana,
ukumisa phakathi kwabo ukwenza usuku lwetshumi lane lwenyanga uAdari losuku lwetshumi lanhlanu lwayo kuwo wonke umnyaka ngomnyaka,

njengokwensuku amaJuda aphumula ngazo ezitheni zawo, lenyanga eyaphendulwa kuwo kusuka osizini kusiya kuntokozo, lekulileni kube lusuku oluhle, azenze zibe zinsuku zedili lentokozo, lezokuthumelana izabelo, lezipho kubayanga.
AmaJuda emukela lokho ayesekuqalile ukukwenza, lalokho uModekhayi ayewabhalele khona.
Ngoba uHamani indodana kaHamedatha umAgagi, isitha sawo wonke amaJuda, wayecebe mayelana lamaJuda ukuwachitha, waphosa iPuri, eyinkatho, ukuwachoboza lokuwabhubhisa.
Kodwa lapho uEstaefika phambi kwenkosi, yalaya ngencwadi ukuthi icebo lakhe elibi ayelicebe ngamaJuda libuyele ekhanda lakhe; basebebalengisa yena lamadodana akhe egodweni.
Ngenxa yalokhu babiza lezozinsuku ngokuthiiPurimi ngebizo lePuri. Ngenxa yalokhu, ngenxa yawo wonke amazwi aleyoncwadi, lababekubonile mayelana lalokho, lokwakubehlele,

amaJuda amisa azemukelela wona lenzalo yawo labo bonke abazihlanganisa lawo, ukuze bangeqi, ukugcina lezinsuku ezimbili, njengokombhalo wazo, lanjengokwesikhathi sazo esimisiweyo, kuwo wonke umnyaka lomnyaka,

ukuthi lezinsuku zikhunjulwe zigcinwe kuso sonke isizukulwana lesizukulwana, usapho losapho, isabelo ngesabelo, lomuzi ngomuzi, ukuthi lezinsuku zePurimi zingeqiwa phakathi kwamaJuda, lesikhumbuzo sazo singapheli enzalweni yawo.
UEsta indlovukazi, indodakazi kaAbihayili, loModekhayi umJuda, basebebhala ngamandla wonke ukuqinisa lincwadi yesibili yePurimi.
Wasethumela izincwadi kuwo wonke amaJuda ezabelweni ezilikhulu lamatshumi amabili lesikhombisa zombuso kaAhasuwerusi, amazwi okuthula leqiniso,

ukuqinisa lezinsuku zePurimi ngezikhathi zazo ezimisiweyo njengokumisa phezu kwawo kukaModekhayi umJuda loEsta indlovukazi, lanjengokuzimisela kwawo wona lenzalo yawo, indaba zokuzila ukudla lokukhala kwawo.
Ilizwi likaEsta laseliqinisa lezizindaba zePurimi; kwasekubhalwa egwalweni.
Inkosi uAhasuwerusi yasibeka umthelo elizweni lezihlenge nizolwandle.
Zonke-ke izenzo zamandla ayo lawengalo zayo?
Ngoba uModekhayi umJuda wayengowesibili enkosini uAhasuwerusi.
Kwakukhona indoda elizweni leUzi.
Yasizalelwa amadodana ayisikhombisa lamadodakazi amathathu.

Lemfuyo yayo yayiyizimvu eziyizinkulungwane eziyisikhombisa, lamakamela ayizinkulungwane ezintathu, lezipane zenkabi ezingamakhulu amahlanu, labobabhemi abasikazi abangamakhulu amahlanu, lenceku ezinengi kakhulu. Ngakho lowomuntu wayemkhulu okwedlula bonke abantu bempumalanga.
Njalo amadodana akhe ahamba enza idili endlini yaleyo laleyo ngosuku lwayo.
Kwakusithi lapho esephelile amazopha ensuku zedili, uJobe athume, awangcwelise, avuke ekuseni kakhulu, anikele iminikelo yokutshiswa ngokw enani lawo wonke. Wenza njalo uJobe zonke izinsuku.
Kwasekusiba losuku.
yasisithi kuSathane: Uvela ngaphi? USathane wasephendula wathi: Ekuzulazuleni emhlabeni lekuhambahambeni kuwo.
yasisithi kuSathane: Ubekile yini inhliziyo yakho encekwini yami uJobe, ngoba kakho onjengayo emhlabeni, umuntu opheleleyo loqondileyo, owesaba uNkulunkulu loxwaya ububi?
USathane wasephendula wathi: UJobe umesabela ize uNkulunkulu yini?
Kawumbiyelanga yini yena lendlu yakhe lakho konke alakho inhlangothi zonke.
Kodwa isibili yelula isandla sakho khathesi, uthinte konke alakho.
yasisithi kuSathane: Khangela konke alakho kusesandleni sakho; kuphela kuye ungeluleli isandla sakho. Wasephuma uSathane phambi kweN.
Kwasekusiba losuku.
Kwasekufika isithunywa kuJobe sathi: Inkabi bezilima labobabhemi besidla emaceleni azo;
kwasekutheleka amaShebha, akuthatha, atshaya izinceku ngobukhali benkemba, njalo yimi ngedwa kuphela engiphephileyo ukuze ngikubikele.
Lesi sisakhuluma, kwafika lesinye, sathi: Umlilo kaNkulunkulu uwile uvela emazulwini, watshisa izimvu lezinceku, waziqeda; njalo yimi ngedwa kuphela engiphephileyo ukuze ngikubikele.
Lesi sisakhuluma, kwafika lesinye, sathi: AmaKhaladiya atheleka phezu kwamakamela, awathatha, atshaya izinceku ngobukhali benkemba, njalo yimi ngedwa kuphela engiphephileyo ukuze ngikubikele.
Lesi sisakhuluma, kwafika lesinye, sathi: Amadodana akho lamadodakazi akho bebesidla benatha iwayini endlini yomfowabo, izibulo.
Khangela-ke, umoya omkhulu wafika uvela ngaphetsheya kwenkangala, watshaya amagumbi womane endlu, yawela phezu kwamajaha, afa; njalo yimi ngedwa kuphela engiphephileyo ukuze ngikubikele.
UJobe wasesukuma;
wasesithi: Ngaphuma ngize esiswini sikamama, njalo ngizabuyela khona ngize.
Kukho konke lokhu uJobe konanga, kambalelanga ubuwula uNkulunkulu.
Kwakulosuku futhi lapho amadodana kaNkulunkulu afika ukuzimisa phambi kweN, uSathane laye wafika phakathi kwawo ukuzimisa phambi kweN.
yasisithi kuSathane: Uvela ngaphi? USathane wasephendula wathi: Ekuzulazuleni emhlabeni lekuhambahambeni kuwo.

yasisithi kuSathane: Ubekile yini inhliziyo yakho encekwini yami uJobe? Ngoba kakho onjengaye emhlabeni, umuntu opheleleyo loqondileyo, owesaba uNkulunkulu, loxwaya ububi? Usabambelele kubo ubuqotho bakhe, lanxa ungivuse ukuze ngimchithe kungelasizatho.
USathane wasephendula wathi: Isikhumba ngesikhumba, yebo, konke umuntu alakho uzakunikelela impilo yakhe.
Kodwa khathesi yelula isandla sakho, uthinte ithambo lakhe lenyama yakhe.
yasisithi kuSathane: Khangela, usesandleni sakho; kodwa gcina impilo yakhe.
USathane wasephuma phambi kweN, wamtshaya uJobe ngamathumba amabi.
Wasezithathela udengezi ukuziphala ngalo, wahlala phakathi kwesilotha.
Umkakhe wasesithi kuye: Usabambelele yini.
Kodwa wathi kuye: Ukhuluma njengokukhuluma komunye wabesifazana abayiziwula.
Abangane abathathu bakaJobe sebezwile ngakho konke lokhu okubi okumehleleyo, beza, lowo lalowo evela endaweni yakhe, uElifazi umThemani.
Lapho bephakamisa amehlo abo bekhatshana, kabamazanga, baphakamisa ilizwi labo, bakhala inyembezi, badabula ngulowo ibhatshi lakhe.
Basebehlala laye emhlabathini insuku eziyisikhombisa lobusuku obuyisikhombisa, njalo kakho owakhuluma ilizwi kuye, ngoba babona ukuthi ubuhlungu bukhulu kakhulu.
Emva kwalokho uJobe wavula umlomo wakhe, waqalekisa usuku lwakhe.
UJobe wasephendula wathi:
Kalubhubhe usuku engazalwa ngalo, lobusuku okwathiwa ngalo: Kukhulelwe umntwana wesilisa.
Lolosuku kalube ngumnyama, uNkulunkulu angalunanzi ephezulu, lokukhanya kungalukhanyisi.
Umnyama lethunzi lokufa, iyezi lihlale phezu kwalo, umnyama welanga ulesabise.
Lobobusuku, umnyama ububambe, lungathokozi ensukwini zomnyaka, lungezi kunani lezinyanga.
Khangela, lobobusuku kabube yinyumba.
Kababuqalekise abaqalekisi bosuku, abalungele ukuvusa uLeviyathani.
Zibe mnyama inkanyezi zokusa kwabo, bulindele ukukhanya, kodwa kungabi khona, bungaboni inkophe zokusa.
Ngoba bungavalanga iminyango yesisu sika mamawami, bungafihlanga usizi emehlweni ami.
Kungani ngingafanga kusukela esizalweni?
Kungani amadolo angandulela? Kungani lamabele ukuthi ngimunye?
Ngoba khathesi ngabe ngacambalala ngathula, ngalala, khona ngaba lokuphumula,
kanye lamakhosi labeluleki bomhlaba abazakhela amanxiwa,
kumbe kanye leziphathamandla ezazilegolide ezagcwalisa izindlu zazo ngesiliva.
Kumbe njengomphunzo ofihliweyo ngingabi khona, njengensane e zingabonanga ukukhanya.
Lapho ababi bayekela ukuhlupha, lapho abakhathele ngamandla bephumula.
Izibotshwa ziyaphumula ndawonye.
Omncinyane lomkhulu balapho, lesigqili sikhululekile enkosini yaso.
Kungani enika ukukhanya kohluphekayo, lempilo kwabalokubaba komphefumulo;
abalindele ukufa, kodwa kungekho,
abathabayo kakhulu ngentokozo, bajabule lapho bethola ingcwaba?
Emuntwini yini?
Ngoba ukububula kwami kuza phambi kokudla kwami, lokubhonga kwami kuthululeka njengamanzi.
Ngoba engikwesabayo ngokwesaba sekungehlele, lengilovalo ngakho kufikile kimi.
Ngangingahlalisekanga, ngingaphumuli, ngingelakuthula, lohlupho lweza.
UElifazi umThemani wasephendula wathi:
Ubasizama ilizwi kuwe, uzadabuka yini? Kodwa ngubani ongazibamba emazwini?
Khangela, uqondisile abanengi, waqinisa izandla ezibuthakathaka.
Amazwi akho amvusile okhubekayo.
Kodwa khathesi kufikile kuwe, uyadinwa; kuyakuthinta wena, utshaywa luvalo.
Ukwesaba kwakho uNkulunkulu?
Akukhumbule, ngubani owake wachithwa engelacala? Kumbe abalungileyo bake baqunywa ngaphi?
Njengengikubonileyo, abalima ububi.
Ngokuphephetha kukaNkulunkulu bayabhubha, langokuphefumula kwamakhala akhe bayaphela.
Ukubhonga kwesilwane, lelizwi lesilwane esesabekayo.
Isilwane esidala siyabhubha ngokuswela impango.
Ngasenginyenyezelwa ilizwi, lendlebe yami yemukela okuncinyane kwalo.
Phakathi kwemicabango yemibono yebusuku,
ukwesaba kwangifikela lokuthuthumela okwenza ubunengi bamathambo ami baqhaqhazela.
Kwasekusedlula umoya ebusweni bami.
Wema, kodwa angikuqondanga ukubonakala kwawo; isimo sasiphambi kwamehlo ami; kwathula, ngasengisizwa ilizwi lisithi:
Kambe umuntu angalunga okwedlula uNkulunkulu? Umuntu angahlambuluka okwedlula uMenzi wakhe yini?
Khangela, kazithembi inceku zakhe.
Kangakanani abahlala.
Bakhandwa kusukela ekuseni kuze kube kusihlwa.
Ubuhle babo kabususwa labo yini.
Ake umemeze, ukhona ongakuphendula yini? Uzaphendukela kuwuphi wabangcwele?
Ngoba ulaka luyasibulala isiwula, lomhawu ubulale isiphukuphuku.
Mina ngibone isiwula sigxila, kodwa ngahle ngaqalekisa indawo yaso yokuhlala.
Abantwana baso bakhatshana losindiso.
Osivuno saso olambileyo uyasidla, esithatha lemeveni.
Ngoba usizi kaluveli ethulini, lenhlupheko kayihlumi emhlabathini.
Kube kanti umuntu uzalelwe inhlupheko njengoba inhlansi ziqhatshela phezulu.
Kodwa mina bengizadinga uNkulunkulu, lakuNkulunkulu bengizabeka udaba lwami.
Owenza izinto ezinkulu lezingelakuhlolwa, imimangaliso engelakubalwa.
Onika izulu ebusweni bomhlaba, athumele amanzi ebusweni bamaphandle,
ukuze abamise phezulu abaphansi.
Uchitha amacebo abalobuqili, ukuze izandla zabo zingenzi cebo.
Ubamba abahlakaniphileyo ebuqilini babo.
Bahlangana lomnyama emini, baphumputhe phakathi kwemini njengebusuku.
Kodwa ukhulula umyanga enkembeni, emlonyeni wabo, lesandleni solamandla.
Ngakho umyanga ulethemba, lobubi buzavala umlomo wabo.
Khangela, ubusisiwe lowomuntu uNkulunkulu amlayayo.
Ngoba yena uzwisa ubuhlungu, abuye abophe; uyalimaza, lezandla zakhe ziyapholisa.
Uzakukhulula.
Endlaleni uzakuhlenga ekufeni, lempini emandleni enkemba.
Uzafihlelwa isiswepu solimi, njalo kawuyikwesaba incithakalo lapho ifika.
Uzahleka.
Ngoba uzakuba lesivumelwano lamatshe eganga.
Njalo uzakwazi ukuthi ithente lakho lilokuthula, uzakwethekela indawo yakho yokuhlala ungasweli lutho.
Uzakwazi futhi ukuthi inzalo yakho izakuba nengi, lembewu yakho njengotshani bomhlaba.
Uzafika engcwabeni lakho usuluphele, njengenqumbi zamabele zisenyuka ngesikhathi sawo.
Khangela lokhu, sesikuhlolile; kunjalo. Kuzwe, uzazele wena.
UJobe wasephendula wathi:
Kungathi ukudabuka kwami bekungalinganiswa lokulinganiswa, lenhlupheko yami ibekwe ndawonye esikalini!
Ngoba khathesi kungaba nzima kuletshebetshebe lolwandle. Ngenxa yalokho amazwi ami angawamawala.
Ngoba imitshoko kaSomandla iphakathi kwami, obuhlungu bayo umoya wami uyabunatha; izesabiso zikaNkulunkulu ziyazihlela zimelene lami.
Ubabhemi weganga uyakhala yini esohlazeni, kumbe inkabi iyakhonya yini ekudleni kwayo?
Kambe okuduma kungadliwa kungelatshwayi? Kulokuhlabusa kokumhlophe kweqanda yini?
Umphefumulo wami uyala ukukuthinta, kunjengokudla kwami okunengekayo.
Kungathi isicelo sami singafika, njalo uNkulunkulu a ngi nike ithemba lami,
ukuthi kumthokozise uNkulunkulu.
Khona kungahlala kube yinduduzo yami, bengingajabula ebuhlungwini obungayekeliyo.
Ayini amandla ami ukuze ngithembe? Lokuphela kwami kuyini ukuze ngelule impilo yami?
Amandla ami angamandla amatshe yini? Inyama yami ilithusi yini?
Usizo lwami kalukimi yini? Lenhlakanipho iyaxotshwa kimi yini?
Ohluphekayo nga ehawukelwa ngumngane wakhe, kodwa udela ukwesabeka kukaSomandla.
Abafowethu kabenzanga ngokuthembeka njengesifula, njengempophoma yezifula bayedlula,
ezimnyama ngenxa yongqwaqwane, okucatsha kizo iliqhwa elikhithikileyo.
Ngesikhathi sokufudumala kwazo ziyanyamalala, sekutshisa zicitshe endaweni yazo.
Imikhondo yendlela yazo iyajika.
Izihambi zeTema zakhangela.
Zaba lenhloni ngoba zazithembile.
Ngoba khathesi kalisilutho; liyabona isesabiso, liyesaba.
Ngitshilo yini ukuthi: Lethani kimi? Kumbe: Phanini isipho ngenxa yami empahleni yenu?
Kumbe: Ngikhululani esandleni sesitha? Kumbe: Lingihlenge esandleni sabalesihluku?
Ngifundisani, khona mina ngizathula; lingenze ngiqedisise engiduhe khona.
Alamandla angakanani amazwi aqotho; kodwa ukusola okuvela kini kusolani?
Likhumbula amazwi okusola yini, lezinkulumo zophelelwe lithemba zingumoya?
Yebo, li zi wisela phezu kwentandane, ligebhele umngane wenu umgodi.
Ngakho-ke, vumani lingikhangele, ngoba kuphambi kobuso benu nxa ngiqamba amanga.
Ake liphenduke, kungabi lobubi, yebo, libuye liphenduke, ukulunga kwami kukukho.
Kambe kukhona ububi olimini lwami? Ukunambitha kwami bekungehlukanise yini izinto ezimbi?
Kakukho yini imfazo kumuntu emhlabeni, lensuku zakhe ka zinjengensuku zoqatshiweyo yini?
Njengesigqili sikhefuzelela umthunzi,
ngokunjalo mina ngidliswe ilifa lenyanga, lobusuku bezinhlupheko bubalelwe mina.
Lapho ngilala phansi ngithi: Ngizavuka nini? Ngoba ubusuku bude, njalo ngigcwele ukutshukuma kuze kuse.
Inyama yami yembethe impethu lamagade othuli.
Insuku zami ziyaphangisa kuleselukiso someluki, ziphele kungelathemba.
Khumbula ukuthi impilo yami ingumoya; ilihlo lami kaliyikuphinda libone okuhle.
Ilihlo longibonayo kaliyikungibona futhi; amehlo akho aphezu kwami, kodwa ngizakuba nginga se kho.
Iyezi liyaphela linyamalale; ngokunjalo owehlela engcwabeni kayikwenyuka.
Kaphindi abuyele emzini wakhe.
Ngakho mina kangiyikubamba umlomo wami; ngizakhuluma ekucindezelweni komoya wami, ngisole.
Ngilulwandle yini, kumbe isilo solwandle, ukuze lingibekele abalindi?
Lapho ngisithi: Umbheda wami uzangiduduza;
ubusungiqhaqhazelisa ngamaphupho, angethuse ngemibono;
ukuze umphefumulo wami ukhethe ukuklinywa, ukufa kulamathambo ami.
Ngiyanengwa yikho, kangiyikuphila njalonjalo.
Uyini umuntu ukuthi umkhulise,
lokuthi umhambele ikuseni yonke?
Koze kube nini ungayekeli ukungiqaphela, ungangiyekeli ngize ngiginye amathe ami yini?
Ngonile, ngizakwenzani kuwe, wena mlindi wabantu?
Njalo kawuthetheleli ngani isiphambeko sami, ususe isono sami? Ngoba sengizalala phansi othulini; uzangidinga ngovivi, kodwa kangiyikuba khona.
Wasephendula uBilidadi umShuhi wathi:
Koze kube nini ukhuluma lezizinto, lamazwi omlomo wakho abe ngumoya olamandla?
UNkulunkulu uyahlanekela isahlulelo yini?
Uba abantwana bakho bonile kuye, yena usebalahlile emandleni esiphambeko sabo;
uba wena;
uba uhlambulukile, uqotho; isibili khathesi ubezavuka ngenxa yakho, aphumelelise indawo yokuhlala yokulunga kwakho.
Lanxa ukuqala kwakho bekukuncinyane, kube kanti isiphetho sakho sizakwanda kakhulu.
