Uzabuyisela lokho akusebenzelayo; njengokwenotho izakuba njaloinhlawulo, njalo kayikuthokoza.
Ngoba ubacindezele wabadela abayanga, waphanga indlu abengayakhanga.
Ngoba kakwazi ukuthula esiswini sakhe.
Kakuyikusala lutho ekudleni kwakhe; ngenxa yalokhu okuhle kwakhe kakuyikuma.
Ekugcwaleni kokwanela kwakhe uzakuba lencindezelo; sonke isandla sohluphekayo sizamfikela.
Kuzakuthi lapho egcwalisa isisu sakhe, uNkulunkuluathumele kuye ukuvutha kwentukuthelo yakhe.
Uzabalekela isikhali sensimbi.
Uyalihwatsha, liphume emhlana.
Ubumnyama bonke bugcinelwe.
Amazulu azakwembula ububi bakhe.
Ukwanda kwendlu yakhe kuzanyamalala, kukhukhulwe osukwini lwentukuthelo yakhe.
Lesi, lelifa alimiselwa nguNkulunkulu.
Wasephendula uJobe wathi:
Zwanini lilalele ilizwi lami, lalokho kube zinduduzo zenu.
Ngibekezelelani, ukuthi mina ngikhulume; lemva kokukhuluma kwami lingakloloda.
Mina-ke ukusola kwami kusemuntwini yini?
Ngikhangelani, likhakhamale, libeke isandla phezu komlomo.
Yebo, lapho ngikhumbula, ngitshaywa luvalo, lokuthuthumela kubamba inyama yami.
Ababi baphilelani, babe badala, yebo, bakhule emandleni?
Inzalo yabo izinze phambi kwabo kanye labo, lembewu yabo emehlweni abo.
Izindlu zabo zilokuthula kungelakwesaba, loswazi lukaNkulunkulu kaluphezu kwabo.
Inkunzi yakhe iyakhwela ingaphuthi; inkomokazi yakhe iyazala, ingaphunzi.
Bakhupha abantwanyana babo njengomhlambi, labantwana babo bayagida.
Baphakamisa ilizwingesigujana lechacho, bathokoze ngelizwi lomhlanga.
Bachitha insuku zabo ngokuhle, behlele engcwabeni ngokucwayiza kwelihlo.
Babesebesithi kuNkulunkulu: Suka kithi; ngoba kasifisi ulwazi lwendlela zakho.
Uyini uSomandla ukuthi simkhonze? Sizazuzani uba simncenga?
Khangela, okuhle kwabo kakukho esandleni sabo; icebo lababi likhatshana lami.
Kukangaki isibane sababi sicitshwa.
Banjengamahlanga phambi komoya, lanjengomule isiphepho esiwuphephulayo.
UNkulunkulu ubekela.
Amehlo akhe azabona ukuchitheka kwakhe, anathe okolaka lukaSomandla.
Ngoba iyini intokozo yakhe endlini yakhe emva kwakhe?
Kukhonaongafundisa uNkulunkulu ulwazi yini.
Lo uyafa esemandleni akhe apheleleyo, yena wonke onwabile, elokuthula.
Iziphathelo zakhe zigcwele uchago, lomnkantsho wamathambo akhe umanzi.
Lomunye ufa elomphefumulo obabayo.
Balala ndawonye, lempethu zibasibekele.
Khangelani, ngiyayazi imicabango yenu, lamacebo e liwaceba limelene lami.
Ngoba lithi: Ingaphi?
Kalibabuzanga yini abadlula ngendlela, njalo kalinanzeleli iziboniso zabo?
Ukuthi omubi uyekelwa osukwini lokubhujiswa; bazalethwa osukwini lwezintukuthelo.
Ngubani ozamtshela indlela yakhe ebusweni?
Kanti yena uzasiwa engcwabeni, lilindwe idundulu.
Amagade esihotsha amnandi kuye.
Pho lizangiduduza njani ngeze, ngoba empendulweni zenu kusele inkohliso?
Wasephendula uElifazi umThemani wathi:
Umuntu angaba losizo kuNkulunkulu yini?
Kuyintokozo yini kuSomandla ukuthi ulungile? Kumbe inzuzo kuyeukuthi uphelelise indlela zakho?
Uzakusola yini ngenxa yokwesaba kwakho? Uzangena lawe kusahlulelo.
Ububi bakho kabubukhulu yini, lezono zakho kazilakuphela?
Ngoba uthethe isibambiso kubafowenu kungelasizatho.
Kawumnathisanga amanzi odiniweyo, lolambileyo umgodlele ukudla.
Kodwa umuntu olengalo, umhlaba ungowakhe, lowemukeleka ebusweni wahlala kuwo.
Uxotshile abafelokazi bengelalutho.
Ngakho-ke imijibila ikuhanqile, lovalo luhle lwakwesabisa,
kumbe ubumnyama ukuzeungaboni, lesikhukhula.
UNkulunkulu kakho yini engqongeni yamazulu? Bona-ke ingqonga yezinkanyezi, ukuthi ziphakeme kangakanani.
Kanti uthi: UNkulunkulu wazini?
Amayezi amnyama ayisisibekelo sakhe ukuze angaboni.
Usunanzelele indlela endala yini abantu ababi abanyathela kuyo?
Abahluthunwa; uzamcolo wathululwa phezukwesisekelo sabo.
Abathi kuNkulunkulu: Suka kithi?
Kanti yena wayegcwalise izindlu zabo ngokuhle; kodwa icebo labakhohlakeleyo likhatshana lami.
Abalungileyo bayakubona bathokoze.
Isibili isitha sethu sichithiwe, lomlilo uqede insali yabo.
Ake wejwayelane laye, ngalokho okuhle kuzakuza kuwe.
Ake wemukele umlayo ovela emlonyeni wakhe, ubeke amazwi akhe enhliziyweni yakho.
Uba ubuyela kuSomandla.
Ubusubeka igolide lakho othulini, le golideleOfiri elitsheni lezifula.
Ngakho uSomandla uzakuba ligolide lakho, lesiliva sakho esinengi.
Ngoba ngalesosikhathi uzazithokozisa ngoSomandla.
Uzakhuleka kuye, akuzwe.
Uzaquma-ke udaba.
Nxa behliselwe phansi, ubususithi: Phezulu.
Uzamkhulula ongemsulwa; njalo ukhululwa ngokuhlanzeka kwezandla zakho.
Wasephendula uJobe wathi:
Lalamuhla; isandla sami sinzima phezu kokububula kwami.
Kungathi ngabe ngiyazi lapho engingamthola khona!
Ngibeke kuhle udaba lwamiphambi kwakhe.
Bengingawazi amazwi azangiphendula ngawo, ngiqedisise azakutsho kimi.
Uzaphikisana lami ngobukhulu bamandla yini? Hatshi, kodwa uzabeka inhliziyo yakhekimi.
Lapho oqotho angaphikisana laye; ngakho bengizaphepha phakade kumahluleli wami.
Khangelani.
Ngakwesokhohlo ekusebenzeni kwakhe, kodwa kangi m boni.
Kanti uyayazi indlela elami.
Unyawo lwami lubambelele enyathelweni lakhe.
Kangisukanga lemlayweni wezindebe zakhe, ngawalondoloza amazwi omlomo wakhe okwedlula isabelo sami.
Kodwa yena ukokukodwa, ngubani-ke ongambuyisela emuva.
Ngoba uzaphelelisa engikumiselweyo; lezinto ezinengi ezinjalo zikuye.
Ngenxa yalokho ngitshaywa luvalo phambi kwakhe; ngicabanga, ngiyamesaba.
Ngoba uNkulunkulu wenze inhliziyo yami yaphela amandla, loSomandla ungethusile.
Ngoba kangiqunywanga phambi komnyama.
Kungani izikhathi?
Bathuthukisa imingcele, baphange imihlambi bayeluse.
Baxotsha ubabhemi wezintandane.
Baphambula abaswelayo emigwaqweni.
Khangelani, bangobabhemi beganga enkangala; inkangala ibe yikudla kwakhe lo kwabantwana.
Emasimini bavuna ukudla kwakhe, bakhothoze e sivini nisomubi.
Balala beze ebusuku bengelasembatho, bengelasigubuzelo emqandweni.
Bamanzi ngezihlambo zezintaba.
Bahluthuna intandane ebeleni, bathathe lesibambiso kumyanga.
Bahamba beze.
Phakathi kwemiduli yabo bahluza amafutha.
Abantu bayabubula besemzini.
Bona baphakathi kwabavukela ukukhanya; kabazazi indlela zakhe, kabahlali emikhondweni yakhe.
Umbulali uyavuka ngovivi, abulale umyanga loswelayo; lebusuku unjengesela.
Lelihlo lesiphingi lilindela ukuhlwa, sisithi: Kakulalihlo elizangibona; sifake isimbombozo ebusweni baso.
Emnyameni ugebha aphutshele ezindlini a baziphawulele zonaemini; kabakwazi ukukhanya.
Ngoba ikuseni kanyekanye ilithunzi lokufa kubo; uba besaziwa bakuzesabiso zethunzi lokufa.
Ulula phezu kobuso bamanzi; isabelo sabo siqalekisiwe emhlabeni; kaphendukeli endleleni yezivini.
Imbalela lokutshisa kuqeda amanzi eliqhwa elikhithikileyo, ngokunjaloingcwaba abonileyo.
Isizalo sizamkhohlwa, impethu izammunya, engabe esakhunjulwa, lenkohlakalo izakwephulwa njengesihlahla.
Udla ngokuminza inyumba engazaliyo, kamenzeli okuhle umfelokazi.
Njalo udonsa abalamandla ngamandla akhe, uyavuka, njalo kungabi lolethemba lempilo.
Uyamnika ukuze alondolozeke, eseyama kukho, kodwa amehlo akhe aphezu kwendlela zabo.
Bayaphakanyiswa okwesikhatshana, babesebengasekho, behliselwa phansi, bavalelwe njengaye wonke.
Uba-ke kungenjalo, ngubani ongangenza umqambimanga, enze inkulumo yami ibe yize?
Wasephendula uBilidadi umShuhi wathi:
Ukubusa lokwesabeka kulaye; uyenza ukuthula endaweni zakhe eziphezulu.
Kukhona inani yini?
Pho umuntu angalunga njani kuNkulunkulu?
Khangela kuze kube senyangeni, njalo kayikhazimuli, lezinkanyezi kazihlambulukanga emehlweni akhe.
Pho kangakanani umuntu oy impethu!
Wasephendula uJobe wathi:
Umsize njani ongelamandla, wasindisa ingalo e ngelamandla?
Umeluleke njani ongelakuhlakanipha, watshumayela ngobunengi ulwazi oluqotho?
Utshele bani amazwi? Njalo ngumoya kabani ophume kuwe?
Abafileyo, labahlali bawo.
Isihogo sinqunu phambi kwakhe.
Welulela inyakatho.
Uyabophela amanzi emayezini akhe, kodwa amayezi kawadabuki ngaphansi kwawo.
Uyasibekela ubuso besihlalo sakhesobukhosi, endlale iyezi phezu kwaso.
Udwebe umngcele, kuze kube sekucineni kokukhanya lomnyama.
Insika zamazulu ziyathuthumela, zethuswa yikukhuza kwakhe.
Ngamandla akhe uthulisa ulwandle, langenhlakanipho yakhe uphahlaza ukuziqhenya.
Ngomoya wakhe ucecise amazulu; isandla sakhe sagwaza.
Khangela, lokhu kungamaphethelo ezindlela zakhe! Kanti umdumo wamandla akhe ngubani ongawuqedisisa?
UJobe wasebuya ephakamisa isaga sakhe wathi:
Kuphila kukaNkulunkulu, loSomandla owenze umphefumulo wami wababa.
Isibili ngaso sonke isikhathi umphefumulo u se kimi, lomoya kaNkulunkulu usemakhaleni ami,
oqotho indebe zami kaziyikukhuluma okubi.
Kakube khatshana lami ukuthi ngithi lilungile.
Ngizabambelela ekulungeni kwami.
Isitha sami kasibe njengomubi, longivukelayo njengongalunganga.
Ngoba liyini ithemba longamesabiyo uNkulunkulu?
UNkulunkulu uzakuzwa yini ukukhala kwakhe, ukuhlupheka sekwehlele phezu kwakhe?
Uzazithokozisa yini ngoSomandla? Uzabiza uNkulunkulu yini sonke isikhathi?
Ngizalifundisa ngesandla sikaNkulunkulu; okukuSomandla kangiyikukufihla.
Khangela, lina lonke likubonile. Pho, kungani selibe yize lokuba yize ngokunjalo?
Lesi yisabelo somuntu omubi kuNkulunkulu.
Uba abantwana bakhe besanda.
Insali zakhe zizangcwatshwa ekufeni.
Lanxa ebuthelela isiliva njengothuli, elungisa isigqoko njengodaka;
angalungisa, kodwa olungileyo uzasigqoka, longelacala uzakwaba isiliva.
Wakha indlu yakhe umlindi alenzayo.
Ulala enothile.
Izesabiso zizambamba.
Umoya wempumalanga uzamthatha, ahambe.
Abesephosela phezu kwakhe angayekeli; phambi kwesandla sakhe uzabaleka isibili.
Abantubazatshaya izandla zabo ngaye.
Isibili kukhona umthapho wesiliva.
Insimbi ithathwa enhlabathini, lethusi lincibilikiswa e litsh eni.
Umisela umnyama umngcele, udingisisa kuze kube sekupheleleni konke.
Uqhekeza umgodi khatshana lalapho okuhlala khona abantu, laphoabakhohlwe khona lunyawo; bayalenga bejikajika khatshanalabantu.
Umhlaba, kuphuma ukudla kuwo.
Amatshe awo ayindawo, njalo ulothuli lwegolide.
Inyoni edla inyama kayiyazi indlela, lelihlo lelinqe.
Imidlwane yokuziqhenyayo kayiyinyathelanga.
Uyelula isandla sakhe elitsheni elilukhuni, uyagenqula izintaba ezimpandeni.
Aqhekeze imisele emadwaleni, lelihlo lakhe libona konke okuligugu.
Uyabopha izifula zingathonti.
Kodwa inhlakanipho?
Umuntu kalazi ixabiso lakho.
Ukujula kuthi: Kakukho kimi. Lolwandle luthi: Kakulami.
Igolide elihle, lesiliva singelinganis el we intengo yakho.
Kungelingane.
Igolide lekristali kungelingane lakho, futhi ku nge naniswe ngesitsha segolide elicwengekileyo.
Ikorali lekristali.
Itopazi.
Pho, inhlakanipho ivela ngaphi? Lendawo yokuqedisisa ingaphi?
Ngoba kusithekile emehlweni abo bonke abaphilayo, kwafihlwa ezinyonini zamazulu.
Ukubhujiswa lokufa kuthi: Sizwile ngendlebe zethu umbiko wakho.
UNkulunkulu uyayiqedisisa indlela yakho, njalo yena uyayazi indawo yakho.
Ngoba yena uyakhangela kuze kube semikhawulweni yomhlaba, abone ngaphansi kwawo wonke amazulu.
Esenzela umoya isisindo, walinganisa amanzi ngesilinganiso.
Lapho esenzela.
Ngalesosikhathi wakubona, walandisa ngakho; wakulungisa, yebo, wakuhlolisisa.
Wasesithi emuntwini: Khangela, ukwesaba iNkosi, lokhu kuyinhlakanipho.
UJobe wasebuya ephakamisa isaga sakhe wathi:
Kungathi ngabe nginjengenyang enizamandulo, njengensuk winiuNkulunkulu angigcine ngazo,
lapho isibane sakhe sakhanya phezu kwekhanda lami; ngahamba e mnyam eningokukhanya kwakhe!
Njengoba nganginjalo ensukwini zokuvuthwa kwami, lapho iseluleko sikaNkulunkulu,
lapho uSomandla wayeseselami, l abantwana bami bengiphahlile,
lapho ngagezisa izinyathelo zami!
Lapho ngaphuma ngaya esangweni;
amajaha angibona, acatsha; lamaxhegu asukuma ema;
iziphathamandla zayekela ukukhuluma, zabeka isandla phezu komlomo wazo;
ilizwi labakhulu lacatsha, lolimi lwabo lwanamathela.
Lapho indlebe isizwa yangibusisa, lelihlo libona langifakazela,
ngoba ngakhulula umyanga okhalayo, lentandane, longelamsizi.
Isibusiso.
Ngembatha ukulunga, kwangembesa.
Ngangingamehlo koyisiphofu, ngangizinyawo kusiqhuli.
Nganginguyise wabayanga, lendaba e ngingayaziyo ngayihlolisisa.
Ngasengisephula umhlathi womubi, nga menza a lahle impango emazinyweni akhe.
Ngasengisithi: Ngizaphela.
Impande zami zinabele.
Udumo lwami lutsha kimi, ledandili lami laguquka esandleni sami.
Bangilalela, belindele, bathulela iseluleko sami.
Emva kwelizwi lami kabaphendulanga, lelizwi lami lathontela phezu kwabo.
Bangilindela njengezulu, lomlomo wabo bawukhamisela.
Laphongibahlekela, kabakholwanga.
Ngakhetha indlela yabo ngahlala ngiy inhloko, ngahlala njengenkosi, njengoduduza abalilayo.
Kodwa khathesi abatsha kulami ngensuku bayangihleka, oyise babo engangingabadelela ukubafaka lezinja zomhlambi wami.
Yebo, amandla ezandla zabo ayengaba yini kimi, ukuvuthwa kwabo sekuphelile?
Ngenswelo langendlala bajujukile, bangqathuze e lizwe nielomileyo, elali kade li y inkangala legwadule.
Abakha imibhida yetshwayi enkotheni, lempande yesihlahla serotemu iyikudla kwabo.
Baxotshwa phakathi kwabantu; bamemeza ngabo kungathi lisela;
ukuthi bahlale eliweni lezihotsha, imigodi yenhlabathi, lamadwala.
Bayakhonya phakathi kwenkotha, babuthane phansi kokhula.
Bangabantwana beziphukuphuku, yebo abantwana abangelabizo; betshaywa, bexotshwa emhlabeni.
Khathesi.
Banengwa yimi, bamela khatshana lami.
Ngoba ukhulule intambo yami.
Ngakwesokunene abatsha bayasukuma.
Badiliza indlela yami, bancedisa ukuqhubela phambili incithakalo yami, kabalamncedisi.
Beza kungathi bafohlela esikhaleniesibanzi.
Izesabiso ziphendukele phezu kwami.
Khathesi-ke umphefumulo wami uyazithulula; insuku zosizi zingibambile.
Ubusuku bugwaza amathambo ami phakathi kwami.
Ngobunengi bamandla akheisembatho sami.
Ungiphosele odakeni.
Ngiyakhala kuwe, kodwa kawungiphenduli; ngiyasukuma, unginanzelele nje.
Usuphenduke waba lesihluku kimi; ngamandla esandla sakho umelana lami.
Ungiphakamisela emoyeni, ungigadise kuwo, ungincibilikisele kusiphepho.
Ngoba ngiyazi ukuthi uzangibuyisela e kufeni.
Kodwa umuntukayikwelulela isandla engcwabeni, kumbe encithakalweni yakhe.
Kangimkhalelanga inyembezi yini owayelensuku ezilukhuni, umphefumulo wami wadabuka ngongumyanga?
Lapho ngilindele okuhle, kweza okubi.
Imibilini yami yabila, kayithulanga.
Ngahamba ngilila.
Ngingumfowabo wemigobho, lomngane wezintshe.
Isikhumba sami simnyama phezu kwami.
Ichacho lami.
Ngenza isivumelwano?
Ngoba siyini isabelo sikaNkulunkulu esivela phezulu?
Incithakalo kayisiyomubi yini, lengozi yabenzi bobubi?
Yena kaziboni yini indlela zami?
Uba ngihambe ngokuyize, kumbe unyawo lwami luphuthumele enkohlisweni,
kangilinganise ngesilinganiso esilungileyo, ukuze uNkulunkulu azi ubuqotho bami.
Uba inyathelo lami liphambukile endleleni, lenhliziyo yami yalandela amehlo ami;
kangihlanyele, kodwa kudle omunye.
Uba inhliziyo yami iyengwe ngowesifazana,
umkami kacholele omunye.
Ngoba lokho kuyinkohlakalo.
Ngoba ngumlilo odla.
Uba ngalile udaba lwenceku yami loba olwencekukazi yami, lapho ziphikisana lami,
pho ngizakwenzani lapho uNkulunkulu esukuma?
Lowo owangenza esiswini kamenzanga yena yini, lowasibumba esiswini munye?
Uba ngigodlele umyanga isifiso,
kumbe ngadla ucezu lwami ngedwa, ukuze intandane ingadli kulo
(ngoba kwasebutsheni bami yakhula lami ngi njengoyise, ngamqondisa kusukela esizalweni sikamama),
uba ngabona obhubha,
uba inkalo zakhe zingangibusisanga, ngoba ekhudunyezwe yiboya bezimvu zami,
uba ngaphakamisa isandla sami,
kaliwe ihlombe lami esiphangeni sami, lengalo yami iqamuke ethanjeni layo.
Ngoba incithakalo kaNkulunkulu.
Uba ngenzile igolide.
Uba ngithokozile ngoba inotho yami inengi;
uba ngikhangele, loba inyanga ehamba enkazimulweni,
lenhliziyo yami yayengwa ensitha, kumbe isandla sami sange umlomo wami,
lalokho yisiphambeko.
Uba ngithokozile;
njalo ngingavumelanga umlomo wami ukuthi wone, ngokucela umphefumulo wakhe ngesiqalekiso;
uba abantu bethente lami bebengatshongo ukuthi.
Owemzini kazanga alale esitaladeni; iminyango yami ngayivulela isihambi.
Uba ngasibekela iziphambeko zami.
Ngoba ngethuswa lixuku elikhulu, lokudelelwa ngabensendo kwangesabisa, ngakho ngathula, kangaze ngaphuma emnyango.
Kungathi ngabe ngilongangizwa!
Isibili, bengingaluthwala ehlombe lami.
Ngimtshele inani lezinyathelo zami, ngisondele kuye njengesiphathamandla.
Uba umhlaba wami ukhalile ngami, lemifolo yawo ililile ndawonye,
uba ngidlile amandla awo kungelamali, kumbe ngenza umphefumulo wabaniniwo uphele,
kakuhlume ukhula oluhlabayo endaweni yengqoloyi, lokhula olunukayo endaweni yebhali.
Lawomadoda amathathu aseyekela ukumphendula uJobe, ngoba wayelungile emehlweni akhe.
Lwaseluvutha ulaka lukaElihu indodana kaBarakeli umBuzi.
Ulaka lwakhe lwabavuthela labo abangane bakhe abathathu, ngoba bengatholanga impendulo, kube kanti bamlahla uJobe.
Kodwa UElihu wayelindele uJobe ekhuluma, ngoba babebadala ngensuku kulaye.
UElihu esebonile ukuthi kwakungelampendulo emlonyeni walamadoda amathathu, ulaka lwakhe lwaseluvutha.
Ngakho uElihu indodana kaBarakeli umBuzi waphendula wathi: Mina ngingomncinyane ngezinsuku, lina-ke libadala.
Ngathi: Kakukhulume izinsuku, lobunengi beminyaka bazise inhlakanipho.
Isibili umoya ukhona emuntwini.
Abakhulu kabahlakaniphi.
Ngakho ngithi: Lalelani kimi; lami ngizatshengisa umcabango wami.
Khangelani, bengiwalindele amazwi enu, ngabeka indlebe ekukhulumeni kwenu okuhlakaniphileyo, lisadinga amazwi.
Yebo, ngalilalela, khangelani-ke, kakho phakathi kwenu omvumisileyo uJobe, owaphenduleyo amazwi akhe.
Hlezi lithi: Sitholile inhlakanipho; nguNkulunkulu ozamxotsha, hatshi umuntu.
Kodwa kangihlelelanga amazwi, langamazwi enu kangiyikumphendula.
Badideka, kabasaphendulanga, basusa amazwi kubo.
Ngasengilinda, kodwa kabakhulumanga, ngoba bema, kabasaphendulanga.
Lami ngizaphendula ingxenye yami.

ngakho, khangela, ngizaqhubeka ukukwenza ngokumangalisayo lalababantu, umsebenzi omangalisayo lesimanga; ngoba inhlakanipho yabahlakaniphileyo babo izaphela, lokuqedisisa kwabaqedisisayo babo kucatshe.
Maye kulabo abajula besuka eNni ukuze bafihle icebo labo
Ukugonqomisa kwenu kuthiwa kunjengebumba lombumbi! Ngoba umsebenzi kungatsho yini ngombumbi wakho ukuthi: Kaqedisisi?
Kakuseyi sikha tshana esifitshane ithiwe injengehlathi?
Njalo ngalolosuku zizakuzwa amazwi ogwalo, lamehlo eziphofu abone ekufiphaleni lemnyameni.
Abathobekileyo bathokoze koNgcwele kaIsrayeli.
Ngoba olesihluku, labo bonke abalindele okubi baqunyiwe;
abenza umuntu one ngelizwi, bambekele umjibila okhuzayo esangweni.
Ngakho itsho njalo eyahlenga uAbrahama, ngendlu kaJakobe: Khathesi uJakobe kayikuba lanhloni, lobuso bakhe khathesi kabuyikuhloba.
Ngoba lapho ebona abantwana bakhe, umsebenzi wezandla zami.
Lalabo abaduhayo emoyeni bazakwazi ukuqedisisa, labangungunayo.
Maye ebantwaneni abahlamukayo!.
Abahamba ukwehlela eGibhithe
Ngakho amandla kaFaro azakuba lihlazo kini, lokuthembela kube yikuyangeka.
Ngoba iziphathamandla zakhe zaziseZowani.
Bonke izabayangisa, bangabi luncedo njalo bangabi yinzuzo, kodwa babe luyangiso njalo babe lihlazo.
Umthwalo.
Ngoba amaGibhithe.
Khathesi hamba, ukubhale, ukuze kube khona kuze kube lusuku lokucina, kuze kube nininini, kuze kube phakade.
Ngoba bangabantu abavukelayo, abantwana abaqamba amanga, abantwana abangathandi ukuzwa umlayo weN;
abathi kubaboni: Lingaboni, likhangele izinkohliso;
phumani endleleni, liphambuke lisuke emkhondweni, lisuse oNgcwele kaIsrayeli phambi kwethu.
Ngakho utsho njalo oNgcwele kaIsrayeli uthi: Ngoba lidelele lelilizwi, lathembela kucindezelo lokuphambeneyo, labambelela kukho.
Ngakho lobububi buzakuba kini njengomkenke osuzakuwa, ukhukhumala emdulini omude, okudilika kwawo kuhle kufike.
Yebo, uzawephula.
Ngoba itsho njalo iNkosi uJehova, oNgcwele kaIsrayeli: Ngokuphenduka lokuphumula lizasindiswa.
Kodwa lathi: Hatshi, ngoba sizabaleka ngamabhiza; ngakho-ke abalixotshayo bazakuba lejubane.
Inkulungwane eyodwa phezu koqaqa.
Ngakho-ke izalinda.
Ngoba abantu bazahlala eZiyoni eJerusalema; kaliyikukhala lokukhala inyembezi; izakuba lomusa omkhulu kuwe elizwini lokukhala kwakho; lapho ilizwa izakuphendula.
Loba iNkosi ilinika isinkwa sosizi, kodwa amehlo akho azabona abafundisi bakho.
Lendlebe zakho zizakuzwa ilizwi emva kwakho lisithi: Le yiyo indlela, hambani ngayo.
Lizangcolisa lokuhuqiweyo
Khona izanika izulu lenhlanyelo yakho ozayihlanyela emhlabathini, lesinkwa sesivuno somhlaba; uzavunda ucicime. Ngalolosuku;
lezinkabi, oweliweyo ngefotsholo langefologwe.
Laphezu kwayo yonke intaba ende.
Futhi ukukhanya umvimvinya wesilonda sabo.
Khangela, ibizo leN livela khatshana, livutha ulaka lwayo, lomthwalo unzima; indebe zayo zigcwele intukuthelo, lolimi lwayo lunjengomlilo oqothulayo;
lokuphefumula kwayo eliduhisayo emihlathini yabantu.
Lizakuba lengoma, njengeyobusuku bokwehlukaniswa komkhosi, lokuthokoza kwenhliziyo, njengohamba lomhubhe, eDwaleni lakoIsrayeli.
izazwakalisa-ke ilizwi layo elilodumo, ibonakalise ukwehla kwengalo yayo.
Ngoba ngelizwi leN KOSI.
Kuzakuthi loba ngaphi okwedlula khona induku emisiweyo, eyibeka phezu kwayo, kube ngezigubhu ilwe labo.
Ngoba iThofethi njengesifula sesolufa.
Maye kulabo abehlela usizo eGibhithe
Kanti layo ihlakaniphile.
Ngoba amaGibhithe angabantu, kabasuNkulunkulu.
Ngoba itsho njalo kimi: Njengesilwane loqaqa lwayo.
Njengenyoni eziphaphayo.
Phendukelani ku yookuyo abantwana bakoIsrayeli bahlubuke ngokujulileyo.
Ngoba ngalolosuku bazalahla, wonke umuntu.
ISiriya, lamajaha ayo abe yizibhalwa.
Izakwedlulela.
Khangela, inkosi izabusa ngokulunga, leziphathamandla zibuse ngesahlulelo.
Lomuntu uzakuba njengendawo yokucatshela umoya lesivikelo kuzulu lesiphepho.
Lamehlo zalabo abezwayo zizalalela.
Lenhliziyo yabalamawala izaqedisisa ulwazi, lolimi lwabagagasayo luzaphangisa ukukhuluma ngokucaca.
Isithutha kasisayikubizwa ngokuthisihloniphekile, loncitshanayo angathiwa uyaphana.

Ngoba isithutha sikhuluma ubuthutha, lenhliziyo yaso isebenze okubi, ukwenza ubuzenzisi, lokukhuluma okuphambeneyo ngeN, ukwenza umphefumulo wolambileyo ube ze, senze kusweleke okunathwayo kowomileyo.
Izikhali zoncitshanayo lazo zimbi; yena uceba amacebo akhohlakeleyo ukuze achithe abayanga ngamazwi amanga, lanxa oswelayo ekhuluma okulungileyo.
Kodwa ohloniphekayo uceba izinto ezihloniphekayo; langezinto ezihloniphekayo yena uzakuma.
Vukani, besifazana abonwabileyo, lizwe ilizwi lami; madodakazi avikelekileyo, bekani indlebe ekukhulumeni kwami.
Izinsuku ezedlula umnyaka lizathuthumela, besifazana abavikelekileyo, ngoba ukuvunwa kwevini kuzaphela, ukubutha kakuyikufika.
Thuthumelani, besifazana abonwabileyo.
Bazakhalela amabele okumunya, amasimu amahle, ivini elithelayo.
Phezu komhlabathi wabantu bami kuzakhula ameva lo khula oluhlabayo.
Ngoba isigodlo sizadelwa;
aze athululelwe phezu kwethu uMoya.
Khona isahlulelo sizahlala enkangala, lokulunga kuhlale ensimini ethelayo.
Lomsebenzi wokulunga kube yikuthula lokuqinisekiswa kuze kube nininini.
Labantu bami bazahlala endaweni yokuhlala elokuthula, lezindaweni zokuhlala ezivikelekileyo, lezindaweni zokuphumula ezonwabileyo.
Kodwa lizakuna ngesiqhotho, lomuzi uzathotshiswa endaweni ephansi.
Libusisiwe lina elihlanyela ngasemanzini wonke.
Maye kuwe ochithayo; lapho usucinile ukwenza ngenkohliso, bazakwenza ngenkohliso kuwe.
N, woba lomusa kithi, sikulindele, losindiso lwethu ngesikhathi socindezelo.
Emsindweni wokuhlokoma abantu babaleka; ekuziphakamiseni kwakho izizwe zahlakazeka.
Lempango yenu.
iphakeme, ngoba ihlala phezulu; igcwalise iZiyoni ngesahlulelo langokulunga.
Lenhlakanipho lolwazi kuzakuba yikuqina kwezikhathi zakho; ukwesaba kuligugu lakhe.
Khangela, amaqhawe abo azakhala ngaphandle; izithunywa zokuthula zizakhala inyembezi ngokubabayo.
Imigwaqo emikhulu ize, kananzi muntu.
Ilizwe liyalila.
Khathesi ngizavuka, kutsho iN; khathesi ngizadunyiswa; khathesi ngizaphakanyiswa.
Lizakhulelwa; umoya wenu, njengo mlilo, uzaliqeda.
Njalo abantu bazakuba njengo kutshisiweyo kwekalaga; njeng ameva.
Zwanini, lina eli khatshana, vumani amandla ami.
Izoni zeZiyoni ziyesaba, ukuthuthumela? Ngubani phakathi kwethu ongahlala lokutshisa okulaphakade?
Yena ohamba ngokulunga;
yena uzahlala ezindaweni eziphakemeyo.
Amehlo akho azabona iNkosi ebuhleni bayo; abone ilizwe elikhatshana kakhulu.
Inhliziyo yakho izazindla ukwesabisa. Ungaphi umbhali? Ungaphi umlinganisi? Ungaphi obala imiphotshongo?
Kawuyikubona ongeluqedisise.
Khangela iZiyoni, umuzi wemikhosi yethu emisiweyo zalo.
Kodwa lapho izakuba ngelobukhosi kithi, indawo yemifula; umkolo olamaphini okugwedla ongahambi khona, lomkhumbi olamandla ongedluli khona.
Ngoba uJehova ungumahluleli wethu, uJehova ungumnikumthetho wethu, uJehova uyinkosi yethu, yena uzasisindisa.
Ingoda zakho baphange impango.
Lomhlali kayikuthi: Ngiyagula.
Sondelani, zizwe, ukuze lizwe.
Ngoba intukuthelo yeN iphezu kwazo zonke izizwe, lolaka phezu kwawo wonke amabutho azo; izitshabalalisile, izinikele ekubulaweni.
Ababuleweyo bazo labo bazaphoselwa phandle, levumba labo lizakwenyuka ezidunjini zabo, lezintaba zizancibilika ngegazi labo.
Lalo lonke ibutho lamazulu lizabola.
Ngoba inkemba yami ngesigwebo.
Inkemba.
Lezinyathi. Njalo ilizwe labo lizacwila egazini, lothuli lwabo lunoniswe ngamahwahwa.
Ngoba kulusuku lwempindiselo yeN, umnyaka wokubuyiselwa kwempikisano yeZiyoni.
Lezifula zabo zizaphendulwa zibe yingcino, lothuli lwabo lube yisibabule; lelizwe labo lizakuba yingcino etshayo.
Kaliyikucitshwa ubusuku lemini; intuthu; kakho ozadabula phakathi kwalo kuze kube nini lanini.
Kodwa iwunkwe.
Bazabizela izikhulu zalo e mbusw eni, kodwa kakho ozakuba khona, leziphathamandla zalo zonke zizakuba yinto engelutho.
Lameva.
Izilo zenkangala, sizitholele indawo yokuphumula.
Lapho isikhova esikhulu sizakwakha isidleke lawo azabuthana lapho, yilelo lalelo lomngane walo.
Dingani egwalweni lweN KOSI; ngoba umlomo wami ngokwawo ulayile, lomoya wayo ngokwawo ukubuthanisile.
Ngoba yona ibenzele inkatho yokuphosa, lesandla sayo sibehlukanisele ngentambo; lizakuba yilifa labo kuze kube phakade, kusukela kusizukulwana kuze kube sesizukulwaneni bazahlala kulo.
Inkangala; lehlane ithokoze, ikhahlele njengerosi,
ikhahlele kakhulu; khona kuzabona inkazimulo yeN, ubukhosi bukaNkulunkulu wethu.
Qinisani izandla ezibuthakathaka, liqinise amadolo axegayo.
Tshonini kwabalenhliziyo ephangisayo lithi: Qinani, lingesabi. Khangelani, uNkulunkulu wenu uzakuza ngempindiselo, uNkulunkulu el omvuzo; yena uzakuza alisindise.
Khona amehlo eziphofu ezavuleka.
Khona oqhulayo ezakweqa njengendluzele, lezifula enkangala.
Lomhlabathi otshileyo.
Kuzakuba lomgwaqo omkhulu khona, lendlela kayikudlula kuyo, kodwa izakuba ngeyalowo; abahambayo nga leyo ndlela, loba beyizithutha, kabayikulahleka.
Kakuyikuba khona isilwane lapho bazahamba ngayo.
Njalo abenzelwe inhlawulo yokuthula beN bazabuyela.
Kwasekusithi ngomnyaka wetshumi lane wenkosi uHezekhiya, uSenakheribi inkosi yeAsiriya wenyuka wamelana lemizi yonke evikelweyo yakoJuda, wayithatha.
Njalo inkosi yeAsiriya yathuma uRabi-Shake esuka eLakishi esiya eJerusalema enkosini uHezekhiya lebutho elinzima. Wasesima emfolweni wechibi elingaphezulu, emgwaqweni omkhulu wensimu yomwatshi.
Kwasekuphumela kuye uEliyakhimi, indodana kaHilikhiya, owayephezu kwendlu, loJowa indodana kaAsafi umabhalane.
URabi-Shake wasesithi kubo: Tshonini khathesi kuHezekhiya ukuthi: Itsho njalo inkosi enkulu, inkosi yeAsiriya: Lithemba bani leli othembele kulo?
Ngithi (kodwa yilizwi lendebe): Kuleseluleko lamandla empi. Khathesi uthembele kubani ukuthi ungivukele?

Khangela, uthembele kuloludondolo lwalo umhlanga owephukileyo, kuyo iGibhithe, okuthi uba umuntu eseyama kulo, luzangena esandleni sakhe lusihlabe. Unjalo uFaro inkosi yeGibhithe kubo bonke abathembela kuye.
Kodwa uba usithi kimi: Sithembela eNni uNkulunkulu wethu; kakusuye yini ozindawo zakhe eziphakemeyo lamalathi akhe uHezekhiya akususileyo, wathi kuJuda leJerusalema: Lizakhonza phambi kwaleli ilathi?
Ngakho-ke ake unike isibambiso enkosini yami, inkosi yeAsiriya; njalo ngizakunika amabhiza azinkulungwane ezimbili, uba wena ulakho ukunika abagadi bamabhiza phezu kwawo.
Uzabuyisela njani-ke emuva ubuso bombusi oyedwa wabancinyane bezinceku zenkosi yami, wena-ke uthembela eGibhithe ngenxa yezinqola labagadi bamabhiza?
Khathesi sengenyukile yini ngingelaN ngimelene lalelilizwe ukulichitha? yathi kimi: Yenyuka umelene lalelilizwe, ulichithe.
UEIiyakimi loShebina loJowa basebesithi kuRabi-Shake: Ake ukhulume lenceku zakho ngesiSiriya, ngoba siyasiqedisisa; ungakhulumi lathi ngesiJuda, endlebeni zabantu abaphezu komduli.
Kodwa uRabi-Shake wathi: Inkosi yami ingithume enkosini yakho lakuwe yini ukukhuluma lamazwi? Kakusebantwini yini abahlezi phezu komduli ukuze badle ubulongwe babo, banathe umchamo wabo kanye lani?
URabi-Shake wema-ke, wamemeza ngelizwi elikhulu ngesiJuda, wathi: Zwanini amazwi enkosi enkulu, inkosi yeAsiriya.
Itsho njalo inkosi: UHezekhiya kangalikhohlisi, ngoba kayikuba lakho ukulikhulula.
Futhi uHezekhiya angalenzi lithembele eNni, esithi: INkosi izasikhulula lokusikhulula; lumuzi kawuyikunikelwa esandleni senkosi yeAsiriya.

Lingamlaleli uHezekhiya, ngoba itsho njalo inkosi yeAsiriya: Dingani umusa wami ngesipho, li si thumele kimi; lidle ngulowo lalowo okwevini lakhe, langulowo lalowo okomkhiwa wakhe, linathe ngulowo lalowo amanzi omthombo wakhe;
ngize ngifike, ngilithathe, ngilise elizweni elifanana lelizwe lenu, ilizwe lamabele lewayini elitsha, ilizwe lesinkwa lezivini.
UHezekhiya kangalihugi esithi: izasikhulula. Onkulunkulu bezizwe bakhulule yini, ngulowo lalowo ilizwe lakhe, esandleni samakhosi eAsiriya?
Bangaphi onkulunkulu beHamathi leArpadi? Bangaphi onkulunkulu beSefavayimi? Bayikhulule yini layo iSamariya esandleni sami?
Ngobani phakathi kwabo bonke onkulunkulu balawomazwe abakhulule ilizwe labo esandleni sami, ukuthi ikhulule iJerusalema esandleni sami?
Kodwa bathula, kabaze bamphendula lizwi, ngoba umlayo wenkosi wawuyikuthi: Lingamphenduli.
Kwasekufika uEliyakhimi, indodana kaHilikhiya, owayephezu kwendlu, loShebina umbhali, loJowa indodana kaAsafi, umabhalane, kuHezekhiya, izigqoko zabo zidatshuliwe, bamtshela amazwi kaRabi-Shake.
Kwasekusithi inkosi uHezekhiya isi ku zwile, yadabula izigqoko zayo, yazembesa ngesaka, yangena endlini yeN.
Yasithuma uEliyakhimi umphathi wendlu, loShebina umabhalane, labadala babapristi bembethe amasaka, kuIsaya umprofethi indodana kaAmozi.
Basebesithi kuye: Utsho njalo uHezekhiya: Lolusuku lusuku lohlupho, kanti akulamandla okubeletha.

Mhlawumbe iN, uNkulunkulu wakho, izawezwa amazwi kaRabi-Shake, onkosi yeAsiriya, inkosi yakhe, emthume ukuthuka uNkulunkulu ophilayo, lokusola ngamazwi uNkulunkulu wakho ewazwileyo. Ngakho phakamisa umkhuleko ngensali etholakeleyo.
Ngakho inceku zenkosi uHezekhiya zafika kuIsaya.
UIsaya wasesithi kuzo: Lizakutsho njalo enkosini yenu: Itsho njalo iN: Ungesabi amazwi owezwileyo, inceku zenkosi yeAsiriya ezingithuke ngawo.
Khangela, ngizafaka umoya kuyo, njalo izakuzwa ihungahunga, ibuyele elizweni layo; njalo ngizayenza ukuthi iwe ngenkemba elizweni layo.
URabi-Shake wasebuyela, wafica inkosi yeAsiriya isilwa imelene leLibhina; ngoba wayezwile ukuthi isisukile eLakishi.
Wasesizwa ngoTirihaka inkosi yeEthiyophiya kuthiwa: Uphumile uku za kulwa lawe. Esekuzwile wathuma izithunywa kuHezekhiya esithi:
Lizakhuluma kanje kuHezekhiya inkosi yakoJuda lithi: UNkulunkulu wakho othembele kuye kangakukhohlisi esithi: IJerusalema kayiyikunikelwa esandleni senkosi yeAsiriya.
Khangela, wena usuzwile ukuthi amakhosi eAsiriya enzeni kuwo wonke amazwe ngokuwatshabalalisa. Wena-ke uzakhululwa yini?
Onkulunkulu bezizwe bazikhulula yini obaba abazichithayo, iGozani leHarani leRezefi, labantwana beEdeni ababeseTelasari?
Ingaphi inkosi yeHamathi, lenkosi yomuzi weSefavayimi, iHena, leIva?
UHezekhiya wasesemukela izincwadi esandleni sezithunywa, wazifunda, wenyukela endlini yeN; uHezekhiya wasezichaya phambi kweN.
UHezekhiya wasekhuleka eNni, esithi:
N yamabandla, Nkulunkulu kaIsrayeli, ohlala phakathikwamakherubhi, nguwe wedwa onguNkulunkulu wayo yonke imibuso yomhlaba; wena wenze amazulu lomhlaba.
Thoba indlebe yakho, N, uzwe, vula amehlo akho, N, ubone; uzwe wonke amazwi kaSenakheribi awathumele ukuklolodela uNkulunkulu ophilayo.
Qiniso, N, amakhosi eAsiriya achithile zonke izizwe lamazwe azo;
aphosela onkulunkulu bazo emlilweni, ngoba babengeyisibo onkulunkulu, kodwa umsebenzi wezandla zabantu, izigodo lamatshe; ngalokho bababhubhisa.
Ngakho-ke, N Nkulunkulu wethu, sisindise esandleni sakhe, ukuze yonke imibuso yomhlaba yazi ukuthi wena wedwa uyiN.
UIsaya indodana kaAmozi wasethumela kuHezekhiya, esithi: Itsho njalo iN, uNkulunkulu kaIsrayeli: Lokho okukhuleke kimi ngoSenakheribi inkosi yeAsiriya,
leli yilizwi elikhulume ngaye: Intombi emsulwa, indodakazi yeZiyoni iyakudelela, iyakuklolodela; indodakazi yeJerusalema inikina ikhanda ngemva kwakho.
Ngubani omeyisileyo wamhlambaza? Njalo uphakamisele bani ilizwi, waphakamisela amehlo akho phezulu? Umelene loNgcwele kaIsrayeli.
Uklolodele iNkosi ngesandla sezinceku zakho, wathi: Ngobunengi bezinqola zami mina ngenyukele endaweni ephakemeyo yezintaba, ezinhlangothini zeLebhanoni. Njalo ngizagamula imisedari.
Mina ngagebha, nganatha amanzi, langengaphansi yenyawo zami ngomisa yonke imifula.
Kawuzwanga yini ukuthi ngakwenza endulo ibe zinqumbi zamanxiwa.
Ngakho abahlali bayo babelesandla esifitshane, besaba, baba lenhloni, baba njeng otshani beganga, lemibhida eluhlaza, utshani bempahla, lamabele ahanguliweyo engakami.
Kodwa ngiyakwazi ukuhlala kwakho, lokuphuma kwakho, lokungena kwakho, lokungithukuthelela kwakho.
Ngenxa yokungithukuthelela kwakho, lokuthi umsindo, ngikwenze ubuyele ngendlela oweza ngayo.
Lokhu-ke kuzakuba yisibonakaliso kuwe; lonyaka uzakudla okuzikhulelayo; langomnyaka wesibili umkhukhuzela; kuthi ngomnyaka wesithathu lihlanyele, livune, lihlanyele izivini, lidle izithelo zazo.
Lokuphephileyo kwendlu yakoJuda okuseleyo kuzaphinda kugxumeke impande phansi, kuthele izithelo ngaphezulu.
Ngoba kuzaphuma eJerusalema insali, lokuphephileyo entabeni yeZiyoni. Ukutshiseka kweN yamabandla kuzakwenza lokhu.
Ngakho, utsho njalo uJehova ngenkosi yeAsiriya: Kayiyikungena kulumuzi.
Ngendlela eyeza ngayo, ngayo izabuyela, njalo kayiyikungena kulo umuzi, itsho iN.
Ngoba ngizawuvikela lumuzi ukuwusindisa, ngenxa yami, langenxa kaDavida inceku yami.
Khona kwaphuma ingilosi yeN KOSI abazinkulungwane ezilikhulu lamatshumi ayisificaminwembili lanhlanu. Kwathi bevuka ekuseni kakhulu, khangela-ke, bonke babeyizidumbu ezifileyo.
Ngakho uSenakheribi inkosi yeAsiriya wasuka, wahamba ebuyela, wahlala eNineve.

Kwasekusithi ekhonza endlini kaNisiroki unkulunkulu wakhe, oAdrameleki loSharezeri amadodana akhe bamtshaya ngenkemba; bona basebephephela elizweni leArarathi. UEsarihadoni indodana yakhe wasebusa esikhundleni sakhe.
Ngalezonsuku uHezekhiya wagula waphos'ukufa wasefika kuye, wathi kuye: Itsho njalo iN: Layezela indlu yakho, ngoba uzakufa, kawuyikuphila.
UHezekhiya wasephendulela ubuso bakhe ngasemdulini, wakhuleka eNni,
wathi: Ngiyakuncenga, N, ake ukhumbule ukuthi ngihambe phambi kwakho ngobuqotho langenhliziyo epheleleyo, ngenza okulungileyo emehlweni akho. UHezekhiya wasekhala inyembezi ngokukhala okukhulu.
Kwasekufika ilizwi leN kuIsaya, lisithi:
Hamba, uthi kuHezekhiya: Itsho njalo uNkulunkulu kaDavida uyihlo: Ngiwuzwile umkhuleko wakho, ngibonile inyembezi zakho; khangela, ngizakwengezelela iminyaka elitshumi lanhlanu ensukwini zakho,
ngikukhulule wena lalumuzi esandleni senkosi yeAsiriya, ngiwuvikele lumuzi.
Lalesi yisibonakaliso kuwe esivela eNni, esokuthi izayenza le into eyikhulumileyo.

Khangela, ngizabuyisela emuva isithunzi sezinyathelo esesehlile ezinyathelweni zelanga zikaAhazi, izinyathelo ezilitshumi emuva. Ilanga laselibuyela emuva izinyathelo ezilitshumi, ngezinyathelo elalehle ngazo.
Umbhalo kaHezekhiya inkosi yakoJuda lapho egula, esesile emkhuhlaneni wakhe.
Mina ngathi: Ekuqunyweni kwezinsuku zami; ngemukiwe insali yeminyaka yami.
Ngathi: Kangiyikubona uJehova; kangisayikubona muntu labahlali bomhlaba.
Isizukulwana sami sesisukile, sasuswa kimi njengethente lomelusi.
Ngabalisa kwaze kwaba sekuseni.
Njengenkonjane.
Ngingathini? Ikhulumile kimi, yona uqobo ikwenzile. Ngizahamba kabuthakathaka.
Nkosi, ngalezizinto bayaphila.
Khangela, kulokuthula ngibe lobuhlungu obukhulu, kodwa wena uwuthandile umphefumulo wami wawukhululaegodini lencithakalo, ngoba uphosele ngemva komhlana wakho zonke izono zami.
Ngoba ingcwaba lingekubonge bangelithembele iqiniso lakho.
Ophilayo, ophilayo, yena uzakudumisa, njengami lamuhla; uyise uzakwazisa abantwana iqiniso lakho.
yayilungeleukungisindisa; ngakho sizahlabelela izingoma zami ngamachacho insuku zonke zempilo yethu endlini yeN.
Ngoba uIsaya wayethe: Kabathathe isigaqa somkhiwa, basifake njengomnameko phezu kwethumba, njalo uzasila.
UHezekhiya?
Ngalesosikhathi uMerodaki-Baladani, indodana kaBaladani inkosi yeBhabhiloni, wathumela izincwadi lesipho kuHezekhiya, ngoba wayezwile ukuthi ubekade egula, useqinile.
UHezekhiya wasethokoza ngazo, wabatshengisa indlu yokuligugu kwakhe, isiliva; kakubanga lalutho endlini yakhe lembusweni wakhe wonke uHezekhiya angabatshengisanga lona.
Wasefika uIsaya umprofethi enkosini uHezekhiya, wathi kuyo: Atheni lamadoda? Futhi avele ngaphi esiza kuwe? UHezekhiya wasesithi: Avele elizweni elikhatshana esiza kimi, eBhabhiloni.
Wasesithi: Aboneni endlini yakho? UHezekhiya wasesithi: Abone konke okusendlini yami; kakulalutho phakathi kokuligugu kwami engingawatshengisanga lona.
UIsaya wasesithi kuHezekhiya: Zwana ilizwi leN yamabandla.
Khangela, insuku ziyeza lapho konke okusendlini yakho, lalokho oyihlo abakubuthelelayo kuze kube lamuhla, kuzathwalelwa eBhabhiloni; kakuyikusala lutho, kutsho iN.
Njalo bazathatha emadodaneni akho azaphuma kuwe, ozawazala; njalo abe ngabathenwa esigodlweni senkosi yeBhabhiloni.
UHezekhiya wasesithi kuIsaya: Ilizwi leN olikhulumileyo lilungile. Wathi futhi: Ngoba kuzakuba lokuthula leqiniso ensukwini zami.
Duduzani, liduduze abantu bami, utsho uNkulunkulu wenu.
Khulumani kunhliziyo yeJerusalema, limemeze kuyo ukuthi imfazo yayo iphelelisiwe, ukuthi ububi bayo buthethelelwe, ngoba yemukele esandleni seN okuphindwe kabili ngazo zonke izono zayo.
Ilizwi lomemezayo ehlane oqondileyo enkangala.
Sonke isigodi sizaphakanyiswa kuzakwenziwa kuqonde, lendawo ezimaxhakaxhaka zibe ligceke.
Inkazimulo.
Ilizwi lathi: Memeza! Wasesithi: Ngizamemeza ngithini? Yonke inyama.
Utshani buyabuna.
Utshani buyabuna, iluba liyawohloka.

Wena Ziyoni, oletha izindaba ezinhle, khwela entabeni ende; wena Jerusalema, oletha izindaba ezinhle, phakamisa ilizwi lakho ngamandla, liphakamise ungesabi; tshono emizini yakoJuda uthi: Khangelani, uNkulunkulu wenu.
Khangela, iNkosi uJehova izakuza ngamandla.
Izakwelusa umhlambi wayo njengomelusi ezimunyisayo.
Ngubani olinganise amanzi?
Ngubani, kumbe wamfundisa eng umeluleki wakhe?
Yelulekane lobani, owayenza yaqedisisa, wayifundisa endleleni yesahlulelo, wayifundisa ulwazi, wayazisa indlela yokuqedisisa?
Khangela, izizwe zinjengethonsi lenkonxa, zibalwa njengothuli lwesikali. Khangela, uphakamisa izihlenge.
LeLebhanoni kayeneli ukutsha zayo kazeneli umnikelo wokutshiswa.
Zonke izizwe zinjengezingasilutho.
Pho, lizamfananisa lobani uNkulunkulu, loba mfanekiso bani elizamlinganisa lawo?
Ingcitshi incibilikisa isithombe esibaziweyo, abumbe ngokuncibilikisa amaketane esiliva.
Lowo ongumyanga ongelamnikelo ukhetha isihlahla e singaboliyo, azidingele umbazi oyingcitshi ukuze alungise isithombe e singayikunyikinywa.
Kalazi yini?
Kunguye ohlala phezu kwesigombolozi somhlaba, awelule njengethente lokuhlala;
owenza iziphathamandla.
Yebo, kabayikugxunyekwa; yebo, kabayikuhlanyelwa; yebo, isiqu sabo kasiyikugxila emhlabathini.
Pho, lizangifananisa lobani? kutsho oNgcwele.
Phakamiselani amehlo enu phezulu.
Utsholoni, wena Jakobe, ukhulume, wena Israyeli ukuthi: Indlela yami isithekile eNni sedlulisiwe nguNkulunkulu wami?
Kawazi yini.
Inika abadangeleyo amandla, lakwabangaqinanga yandisa amandla.
Labatsha bazaphelelwa ngamandla, badinwe, lamajaha azakuwa lokuwa;
kodwa abalindela bazavuselela amandla, bagijime bangadinwa, bahambe bangapheli amandla.
Thulani phambi kwami; kabasondele; babesebekhuluma; kasisondele kanyekanye kusahlulelo.
Ngubani owavusa.
Waxotshana lawo, wedlula ephephile, ngendlela anga yi hambanga ngenyawo zakhe.
Ngubani okusebenzileyo, wa kw enza.
Izihlenge zakubona, zesaba; imikhawulo yomhlaba yathuthumela; yasondela, yafika.
Basiza, ngulowo lalowo umakhelwane wakhe, wonkewasesithi kumfowabo: Qina!
Umbazi.
Kodwa wena Israyeli isithandwa sami,
wena engakubambayo kwasemikhawulweni yomhlaba, ngakubiza ezikhulwini zawo, kangikulahlanga;
ungesabi, yebo ngizakusekela ngesandla sami sokunene esokulunga kwami.
Khangela bonke abakuthukuthelelayo; labantu abalwa lawe bazabhubha.
Uzabadinga, ungabatholi; abantu abaphikisana lawe bazakuba njengento engesilutho.
Ngoba mina N, uNkulunkulu wakho, ngibamba isandla sakho sokunene.
Ungesabi.
Khangela, ngizakwenza, wenze amaqaqa abe njengamakhoba;
uzawela.
Abayanga labaswelayo badinga amanzi, kodwa engekho; ulimi lwabo lome ngokoma kangiyikubadela.
Ngizavula imifula.
Ngizamisa enkangala umsedari, lomsayiphuresi ndawonye;
ukuze babone, bazi, ukuthi isandla seN sikwenzile lokhu, loNgcwele kaIsrayeli ukudalile.
Sondezani indaba yenu, itsho iN, lisondeze izizatho zenu eziqinileyo, itsho iNkosi kaJakobe.
Kabasondeze, basitshele okuzakwenzakala, ukuthi ziyini, ukuze si zi beke enhliziyweni yethu, sazi isiphetho sazo; loba yenza ukuthi sizwe izinto ezizayo.
Tshonini izinto ezizakuza, sikhangele kanyekanye.
Khangelani, livela kokungekho, lomsebenzi wenu uvela emayeni; uyisinengiso olikhethayo.
Ngimvusile; njalo uzakwehlela phezukweziphathamandla njengodaka, lanjengombumbi evoxa ibumba.
Ngubani owabikayo kwasekuqaleni, ukuze sazi? langaphambili ukuze sitsho ukuthi: U lungile? Yebo, kakho obikayo, yebo, kakho ozwakalisayo, yebo, kakho owezwayo amazwi enu.
Owokuqala.
Ngoba ngakhangela, njalo kwakungelamuntu, laphakathi kwabo kungekho umeluleki, ukuthi, lapho ngibabuza, baphendule ilizwi.
Khangela, bonke bayize; izithombe zabo ezibunjiweyo zingumoya lokusanganiseka.
Khangela; uzavezela izizwe isahlulelo.
Kayikumemeza, kayikuphakamisa ilizwi, kayikwenza ilizwi lakhe lizwakale esitaladeni.
Umhlanga ofecekileyo kayikuwephula, lentambo yesibane ethunqayo kayikuyicitsha; uzaveza isahlulelo ngeqiniso.
Kayikudinwa, kayikwephulwa, aze amise isahlulelo emhlabeni; lezihlenge zizalindela umlayo wakhe.
Utsho njalo uNkulunkulu iN, owadala amazulu, wawelula kulabo abahamba kuwo.
Mina N ngikubizile ngokulunga, ngizabamba isandla sakho.
Ukuthi uvule amehlo eziphofu endlini yezibotshwa.
NgiyiN, lelo libizo lami; lodumo lwami, kumbe indumiso yami ezithombeni ezibaziweyo.
Khangela, izinto zamandulo se zifikile; zingakahlumi ngilitshela ngazo.
Hlabelelani, labahlali bazo.
Kakuthi inkangala ahlala kuyo; kakuthi abahlali bedwala bahlabelele, bamemeze besengqongeni yezintaba.
Kabayinike udumo.
izaphuma njengeqhawe, izinqobe izitha zayo.
Kwasendulo ngithule, ngathi zwi, ngazibamba; ngiphefuzele, ngikhefuzele kanyekanye.
Ngizabhidliza izintaba lamaqaqa, ngomise konke okuluhlaza kwazo, ngenze imifula ibe yizihlenge, ngomise amachibi.

Njalo ngizakwenza iziphofu zihambe ngendlela e zinga y aziyo, ngizikhokhelele emikhondweni e zinga ya ziyo; ngizakwenza umnyama ube yikukhanya phambi kwazo, lezinto ezigobileyo ziqonde; lezizinto ngizazenza kuzo, ngingaziyekeli.
Bazabuyiselwa emuva abathembela ezithombeni ezibaziweyo, abathi ezithombeni ezibunjwe ngokuncibilikisa: Lingonkulunkulu bethu.
Zwanini lina zacuthe.
Ngubani oyisiphofu?
Wena ubona izinto ezinengi.
iyathokoza ngenxa yokulunga kwayo; ikhulise umlayo, i w enze u be lodumo.
Kodwa laba ngabantu abantshontshelwayo baphangwa, bonke bathiyiwe emigodini, bafihlwa ezintolongweni; bangabokuphangwa, njalo kungabikho othi: Buyisela.
Ngubani phakathi kwenu ozabeka indlebe kulokhu, ozalalela azwe esikhathini esizayo?
Ngubani owanikela uJakobe ekuphangweni, loIsrayeli kubaphangi? Kwakungeyisiyo yini esone kuyo? Ngoba bengavumanga ukuhamba endleleni zayo, njalo bengalalelanga umlayo wayo.
Ngakho yathululela.
Kodwa khathesi itsho njalo eyakudalayo; ungowami.
Lapho udabula emanzini, lelangabi kaliyikukulumathisa.
Ngoba ngiyuNkulunkulu wakho, oNgcwele kaIsrayeli, uMsindisi wakho esikhundleni sakho.
Njengoba wawuligugu esikhundleni sakho, lezizwe endaweni yempilo yakho.
Ungesabi;
ngizakutsho kuyo inyakatho asemkhawulweni womhlaba,
wonke obizwa ngebizo lami.
Khuphani abantu abayiziphofu abalamehlo, lezacuthe ezilendlebe.

Izizwe zonke kazibuthane ndawonye, labantu bahlangane. Ngubani phakathi kwabo ongamemezela lokhu, asenze sizwe izinto zamandulo? Kabalethe abafakazi babo, ukuze balungisiswe, kumbe bezwe bathi: Kuliqiniso.
Lingabafakazi bami, langemva kwami kayikuba khona.
Mina, mina ngiyiN KOSI.
Ngimemezele, ngasindisa, ngazwakalisa, kungakabikho unkulunkuluwezizwe.
Yebo, kungakabi khona usuku, mina nginguye?
Itsho njalo iN, uMhlengi wenu okukhala kwawo kusemikhunjini.
NgiyiN, oNgcwele wenu, uMdali kaIsrayeli, inkosi yenu.
Itsho njalo iN, eyenza indlela olwandle, lomkhondo emanzini alamandla,
ekhupha inqola lebhiza, ibutho lamandla.
Lingakhumbuli izinto zakuqala, linganakani ngezinto zendulo.
Khangelani, ngizakwenza into entsha.
Inyamazana zeganga zizangidumisa, imigobho, abakhethiweyo bami.
Lababantu ngizibumbele bona.
Kanti kawungibizanga, Jakobe, kodwa udiniwe ngami, Israyeli.
Kawulethanga kimi izimvu zomnikelo wakho wokutshiswa.
Kawungithengelanga umhlanga olephunga elimnandi.
Mina, mina nginguye owesula iziphambeko zakho.
Ngikhumbuza; kasehlulelane; landisa wena, ukuze ulungisiswe.
Uyihlo wokuqala wona, labachasisi bakho baphambukile bemelene lami.
Ngakho ngingcolise.
Kodwa khathesi zwana, Jakobe nceku yami engikukhethileyo.
Itsho njalo umenzi wakho.
Ngoba ngizathela amanzi.
Bazahluma phakathi kotshani.
Omunye uzakuthi: Mina ngingoweN; lomunye azibize ngebizo likaJakobe, lomunye abhale e sandl enisakhe.
Utsho njalo uJehova, inkosi yakoIsrayeli, loMhlengi wakhe.
Njalo ngubani ongabiza njengami, lezizakuza, kabazimemezele kubo.
Lingatshaywa luvalo, lingesabi; kangikuzwisanga yini; kangilazi.
Bonke ababumba izithombe ezibaziweyo bayize; ukuze bayangeke.
Ngubani obumbe unkulunkulu, loba wabumba ngokuncibilikisa isithombe esibaziweyo esingasizi lutho?
Khangela, bonke abangane bakhe bazayangeka; lababazi bangababantu; kababuthane bonke, basukume; bazakwesaba, bayangeke kanyekanye.
Umkhandi wensimbi, alisebenze ngamandla engalo yakhe; yebo, alambe, aze aphele amandla; kanathi manzi, aze adinwe.
Umbazi welula intambo yokulinganisa, adwebe ngosungulo, asenze ngezancele, asidwebe ngekhampasi, asenze ngomfanekiso womuntu, ngokobuhle bomuntu, ukuze sihlale endlini.
Uzigamulela imisedari, athathe umsayiphuresi lesihlahla se-okhi, aziqinisela zona phakathi kwezihlahla zegusu, ahlanyele ifiri, lezulu li yi khulise.
Kuzakuba-ke ngokomuntu ukuthi akubase.
Atshise ingxenye yakho emlilweni; ngengxenye yakho adle inyama, ose amawoso asuthe; yebo, uyotha athi: Alala! ngiyakhudumala, ngiwubonile umlilo.
Njalo okuseleyo kwakho akwenze kube ngunkulunkulu, kube yisithombe sakhe esibaziweyo; akhothame kuso athi: Ngophula, ngoba ungunkulunkulu wami.
Kabazanga, kabaqedisisanga; ngoba ebhade amehlo abo ukuze bangaboni; le nhliziyo zabo ukuze bangaqedisisi.

Kakho ocabanga enhliziyweni yakhe, njalo kakulalwazi njalo kakulakuqedisisa kokuthi: Ngibasile ingxenye yakho emlilweni, yebo ngibhake isinkwa phezu kwamalahle akho, ngosa inyama, ngayidla; kambe ngizakwenza insali yakho isinengiso yini? Ngizakhothamela okwesihlahla yini?
Udla umlotha?
Khumbula lezizinto, Jakobe, lawe Israyeli, ngoba uyinceku yami. Wena Israyeli, kawuyikukhohlwa yimi.
Ngesule.
Hlabelelani, lina mazulu.
Itsho njalo iN, uMhlengi wakho;
efubisa izibonakaliso zabaqambimanga;
eqinisa ilizwi lenceku yayo; ifeze amacebo ezithunywa zayo; ethi kuyo iJerusalema: Uzahlalwa; lemizini yakoJuda: Lizakwakhiwa; futhi ngizavusa amanxiwa ayo;
etshoyo enzikini: Tshana; njalo ngizakomisa imifula yakho;
etshoyo ngoKoresi: Kayakhiwe; l e thempeli ni: Isisekelo sakho kasibekwe.
Itsho njalo kogcotshiweyo wayo, kuKoresi, ukuvula phambi kwakhe amasango alezivalo ezimbili, lamasango angavalwa.
Mina ngizahamba phambi kwakho, ngenze indawo ezigobileyo ziqonde.
Ngizakunika okuligugu kobumnyama.
Ngenxa yenceku yami uJakobe.
NgiyiN KOSI.
Ukuze bazi.
Ngibumba ukukhanya, ngidale umnyama; mina N ngenza zonke lezizinto.
Thontisani, mazulu kumile kanyekanye; mina N ngikudalile.
Maye kuye lizakutsho yini kolibumbayo ukuthi: Wenzani? kumbe: Umsebenzi wakho, kawulazandla yini?
Maye kuye othi kuyise: Uzalani? kumbe kowesifazana: Ubeletheni?
Itsho njalo iN, oNgcwele kaIsrayeli, loMbumbi wakhe: Buzani kimi ngezinto ezizayo liyangilaya.
Mina ngiwenzile umhlaba.
Mina ngimvusile ngokulunga, kutsho yamabandla.
Itsho njalo iN: Umsebenzi weGibhithe.
Isibili unguNkulunkulu ozifihlayo, uNkulunkulu wakoIsrayeli, uMsindisi.
Bazayangeka.
KodwauIsrayeli uzasindiswa eNni ngo sindiso olulaphakade; kaliyikuyangeka, kaliyikuba lenhloni.
Ngoba itsho njalo eyadala amazulu.
Kangikhulumelanga ekusithekeni.
Buthanani libuye; sondelani kanyekanye, lina elaphunyuka ezizweni.
Tshelani, li ba sondeze.
Khangelani kimi, lisindiswe.
Ngizifungile mina.
Ngeqiniso, omunye uzakuthi: ENni ngilokulunga lamandla.
ENni.
UBeli uyakhothama, uNebo uyazithoba.
Bayaguqa, bakhothame kanyekanye, kabalakophula umthwalo, kodwa bona ngokwabo baya ekuthunjweni.
Ngilalela, ndlu kaJakobe, lensali yonke.
Kuze kube sekugugeni, ngitsho mina ngithwale, ngikhulule.
Lizangifananisa, li ngi linganise, lingiqathanise lobani ukuze sifanane?
Bathulula igolide.
Bametshata ehlombe, kamsindisi enkathazweni yakhe.
Khumbulani lokhu, lizibonakalise liqinile, lina bahlamuki.
Khumbulani izinto zakuqala zendulo; nging uNkulunkulu, njalo kakho ofanana lami;
engimemezela isiphetho kwasekuqaleni;
engibiza inyoni edla inyama; ngikumisile, yebo, ngizakwenza.
Ngilalelani, lina abalenhliziyo eziqinileyo, lina elikhatshana lokulunga.
Ngiyasondeza ukulunga kwami, udumo lwami koIsrayeli.
Yehla.
Thatha amatshe okuchola, uchaphe imifula.
Ubunqunu bakho buzakwembulwa.
UMhlengi wethu.
Hlala ngokuthula.
Ngabathukuthelela.
Wena wathi.
Khathesi-ke zwana lokhu, wena ozithokozisayo, ohlezi uvikelekile.
Kodwa lezizinto ezimbili.
Ngoba wathembela ebubini bakho: Yimi, njalo kakho omunye ngaphandle kwami.
Ngakho ububi buzakwehlela, kawusoze wazi lapho obenyuka khona; lengozi izakwehlela.
Mana khathesi; mhlawumbe uzakuba lakho ukuba lenzuzo, mhlawumbe unqobe.
Udiniwe, abakhangela izinkanyezi, abazisa ngezinyanga, bakusindise kwezizakwehlela.
Khangela, bazakuba njengamabibi.
Bazakuba njalo kuwe labo owatshikatshika labo, owathengiselana labo kusukela ebutsheni bakho; bazazulazula, ngulowo lalowo ngendlela yakhe; kakuyikuba lomsindisi wakho.
Zwanini lokhu, lina ndlu kaJakobe, elabizwa ngebizo likaIsrayeli, elaphuma emanzini akoJuda, njalo kungeyisikho ngokulunga.
Ngoba bazibiza ngokuthi ba ngabomuzi oyingcwele; yamabandla libizo lakhe.
Ngamemezela izinto zamandulo.
Ngoba ngangisazi ukuthi ulukhuni, lentamo yakho ingumsipha wensimbi, lebunzi lakho lilithusi;
ngitsho kwasekuqaleni sizenzile, lesithombe sami esibaziweyo, lesithombe sami esibunjwe ngokuncibilikisa sikulayile.
Usuzwile, khangela konke lokhu; njalo kaliyikukumemezela yini? Ngikwenze uzwe izinto ezintsha kusukela khathesi, lezinto ezifihlakeleyo obungazazi.
Zidalwe khathesi, kungeyisikho ekuqaleni.
Yebo, kawuzwanga; yebo, kawazanga.
Ngenxa yebizo lami, la ngenxayodumo lwami ngizibambe ngawe, ukuze ngingakuqumi.
Khangela, ngikuhlolile.
Ngenxa yami.
Ngilalela, Jakobe, lawe Israyeli obiziweyo wami: Nginguye.
Isandla sami laso sabeka isisekelo somhlaba, lesandla sami sokunene sendlale amazulu; laphongikubiza, kuyasukuma kanyekanye.
Buthanani lina lonke, lizwe; ngubani phakathi kwabo omemezele lezizinto.
Mina uqobo ngikhulumile; yebo ngambiza, ngimlethile, njalo uzaphumelelisa indlela yakhe.
Sondelani kimi, lizwe lokhu; kangikhulumanga ensitha ingithumile.
Itsho njalo ofanele ukuthi uhambe ngayo.
Kungathi ngabe walalela imilayo yami kwakuzakuba njengomfula, lokulunga kwakho njengamagagasi olwandle.
Inzalo yakho layo yayizakuba njengetshebetshebe yemibilini yakho njengezinhlamvu zalo; ibizo lawo belingayikuqunywa kumbe lichithwe lisuke phambi kwami.
Phumani eBhabhiloni.
Njalo kabomanga.
Akulakuthula, itsho IN, kwabakhohlakeleyo.
Ngilalelani, zihlenge; ngisemibilini kamama yaqamba ibizo lami.
Yasisenza umlomo wami, yangifihla esambeni sayo semitshoko.

Ngoba khangela, ngidala; okwakuqala kakusayikukhunjulwa, kumbe kuvele enhliziyweni.
Kodwa jabulani, lithokoze kuze kube laphakade, labantu bayo babeyinjabulo.
Ngizathokoza-ke ngeJerusalema lelizwi lokukhala.
Kusukela lapho kakusayikuba khona usane lwezinsuku, kumbe ixhegu elingagcwalisi insuku zalo; ngoba omutsha uzakufa eleminyaka elikhulu sizaqalekiswa.
Njalo bazakwakha izindlu, bahlale kuzo, badle izithelo zazo.
Kabayikwakha okwesikhathi eside.
Kabayikutshikatshikela ize kanye labo.
Kuzakuthi-ke bengakabizi, mina ngiphendule.
Impisi lewundlu, itsho iN.
Itsho njalo iN: Amazulu ayisihlalo sami sobukhosi. Ingaphi leyondlu elizangakhela yona? Njalo ingaphi indawo yami yokuphumula?
Ngoba zonke lezizinto isandla sami sazenza.
Ohlaba inkabi unjeng obulala umuntu, lomphefumulo wabo uthokoza ngezinengiso zabo.
Lami ngizakhetha izigcono zabo.
Zwanini ilizwi leN, lina elithuthumela ngelizwi layo; bona-ke bazayangeka.
Ilizwi lomsindo elivela emzini, ilizwi elivela ethempelini, ilizwi leN elibuyisela izinzuzo ezitheni zayo.
Ingakahelelwa bayo, yabeletha owesilisa.

Ngubani o wakewezwa okunje? Ngubani o wakewabona izinto ezinje? Umhlaba uzakwenziwa uzale yini ngosuku olulodwa? Kumbe isizwe singabelethwa yini ngesikhathi sinye? Ngoba iZiyoni ithe ihelelwa, yazala abantwana bayo.
Mina ngizasondeza ekuzalweni, ngingazalisi yini? itsho iN. Ngizazalisa, besengivala yini? utsho uNkulunkulu wakho.
Thokozani kanye leJerusalema;
ukuze limunye ngobunengi bodumo lwayo.
Ngoba itsho njalo iN: Khangelani, ngizaqhelisa ukuthula.
Njengalowo unina amduduzayo.
Lapho libona lokhu, inhliziyo yenu izathokoza; lesandla seN sizakwaziwa ngasezincekwini zayo, njalo izakuba lolaka ngasezitheni zayo.
Ngoba khangela, izafika ngomlilo, lokukhuza kwayo ngamalangabi omlilo.
Ngoba ngomlilo langenkemba yayo.
Labo abazingcwelisayo, bazihlambulule ezivandeni, itsho iN.
Ngoba mina ngiyayaziimisebenzi yabo lemicabango yabo.
Ngizabeka-ke isibonakaliso.

Bazaletha-ke bephuma kuzo zonke izizwe bephezu kwamabhiza, langezinqola, langamathala, laphezu kwezimbongolo, laphezu kwezinyamazana ezilejubane, entabeni yami engcwele e Jerusalema, itsho iN, njengabantwana bakoIsrayeli beletha umnikelo ngesitsha esihlambulukileyo endlini yeN.
Ngizathatha-ke lakubo babe ngabapristi njalobabe ngamaLevi, itsho iN.
Ngoba njengamazulu amatsha lomhlaba omutsha lebizo lakho kuzakuma.
Kuzakuthi-ke izakuzakhonza phambi kwami, itsho iN.
Bazaphuma-ke, babone izidumbu zabantu kuyo yonke inyama.
Amazwi kaJeremiya, indodana kaHilikhiya wabapristi
okwafika kuye ilizwi leN ensukwini zikaJosiya
Lafika futhi ensukwini zikaJehoyakhimi indodana kaJosiya, inkosi yakoJuda,
Kwasekufika kimi ilizwi leN lisithi:
Ngingakakubumbi esiswini
Ngasengisithi: Hawu Nkosi Jehova! Khangela, angikwazi ukukhuluma,
Kodwa yathi kimi: Ungatsho ukuthi: Ngingumntwana; ngoba uzakuya kubo bonke engikuthuma kubo, lakho konke engikulaya khona uzakukhuluma.
Ungesabi ubuso babo, itsho iN.
yasiselula isandla sayo,
Bona, ngikubekile lamuhla phezu kwezizwe laphezu kwemibuso,
Ilizwi leN laselifika kimi lisithi: Ubonani, Jeremiya? Ngasengisithi: Ngibona uswazi lwesihlahla se-alimondi.
yasisithi kimi: Ubone kuhle, ngoba ngizalinda ilizwi lami ukuze ngilenze.
Njalo ilizwi leN lafika kimi ngokwesibili lisithi: Ubonani? Ngasengisithi: Ngibona imbiza
yasisithi kimi: Okubi kuzaqutshulwa kuvela enyakatho phezu kwabo bonke abakhileyo belizwe.
Ngoba khangela, ngibiza insapho zonke zemibuso zimelene lemiduli yayo yonke inhlangothi zonke, zimelene lemizi yonke yakoJuda.
Ngizakhuluma izigwebo zami zimelene labo ngenxa yabo bonke ububi babo,
Wena-ke, bopha ukhalo lwakho, hlezi ngikwethuse phambi kwabo.
Ngoba khangela, mina ngikubekile lamuhla ukumelana lelizwe lonke, ukumelana lamakhosi akoJuda, ukumelana leziphathamandla zayo, ukumelana labapristi bayo, lokumelana labantu belizwe.
Njalo bazakulwa bemelene lawe; kodwa kabayikukwehlula;
Laselifika kimi ilizwi leN lisithi:
Hamba u ye memezela endlebeni zeJerusalema usithi: Itsho njalo iN: Ngiyakukhumbula, umusa wobutsha bakho,
UIsrayeli wayeyibungcwele eNni, itsho iN.
Zwanini ilizwi leN, ndlu kaJakobe, lensendo zonke zendlu kaIsrayeli.
Itsho njalo iN: Yibubi bani oyihlo ababuthola kimi, ukuze baye khatshana lami,
Njalo kabatshongo ukuthi: Ingaphi eyasenyusa elizweni leGibhithe, elizweni umuntu angalidabulanga, lalapho okungahlalanga muntu khona?
Njalo ngaliletha elizweni elivundileyo,
Abapristi kabatshongo ukuthi: Ingaphi iN? Lalabo abaphatha umlayo kabangazanga;
Ngakho ngisezaphikisana lawe,
Ngoba dlulelani ezihlengeni linakane kuhle, libone ukuthi kukhona into enjengale yini?
Isizwe sake santshintsha yini onkulunkulu baso,
Mangalani kakhulu, mazulu, ngalokhu, lethuke, lichitheke kakhulu, itsho iN.
Ngoba abantu bami benzile izinto ezimbi ezimbili; bangidelile ukuthi bazigebhele izikhongozelo, izikhongozelo ezidabukileyo, ezingegcine manzi.
UIsrayeli uyisigqili yini? Kungani waba yimpango?
Amabhongo ezilwane abhongele phezu kwakhe,
Futhi abantwana beNofi badlele enkanda yakho.
Kawuzenzelanga lokhu yini,
Khathesi-ke ulani lendlela yeGibhithe,
Ububi bakho buzakulaya, lokuthi ukungesaba kakukho kuwe, itsho iNkosi uJehova wamabandla.
Ngoba kwasendulo ngephula ijogwe lakho,
Kube kanti mina ngakuhlanyela,
Ngoba lanxa ugeza itsho iNkosi uJehova.
Ungatsho njani ukuthi: Kangingcolanga,
Ungubabhemi weganga
Nqanda unyawo lwakho ekungabini ngolungelasicathulo, njalo ngizabalandela.
Njengesela lilenhloni lapho selibanjiwe, ngokunjalo indlu kaIsrayeli ilenhloni, bona, amakhosi abo, iziphathamandla zabo, labapristi babo, labaprofethi babo,
besithi esigodweni: Wena ungubaba; lelitsheni:
Kodwa bangaphi onkulunkulu bakho ozenzele bona?
Liphikisanelani lami? Lonke liphambekile kimi, itsho iN.
Ngibatshayile abantwana benu njengesilwane esichithayo.
Wena sizukulwana, kasisayikuza kuwe?
Intombi ingazikhohlwa yini iziceciso zayo, kumbeumakoti amabhanti akhe?
Kungani ulungisa indlela yakho ekudingeni uthando?
Lezigqokweni zakho kutholakala igazi lemiphefumulo yabayanga abangelacala; kawubatholanga befohlela phakathi, kodwa phezu kwakho konke lokhu.
Kanti wena uthi: Ngoba kangilacala, isibili intukuthelo yakhe izaphenduka isuke kimi. Khangela, ngizakwehlulelana lawe,
Kungani uzulazula kangaka
Yebo, uzaphuma usuka lapha, lezandla zakho ziphezu kwekhanda lakho, ngoba iwalile amathemba akho, njalo kawuyikuphumelela ngawo.
Kuthiwa: Uba indoda ilahla umkayo, itsho iN.
Phakamisela amehlo akho emadundulwini,
Ngakho izihlambo zigodliwe;
Kawuyikuthi kusukela khathesi ukhale yini kimi uthi: Baba, ungumeluleki
Yena uza lu gcina yini ulakalwakhephakade? Uza lu londoloza kuze kube sekucineni yini? Khangela, ukhulumile, wenza izinto ezimbi, uphumelele.
yasisithi kimi ensukwini zikaJosiya inkosi: Ubonile yini lokho uIsrayeli ohlehlele nyovane akwenzileyo?
Ngasengisithi esezenzile zonke lezizinto:
Ngasengibona, lapho ngenxa yazo zonke imbangela
Kwasekusithi ngenxa yendumela yokufeba kwakhe wangcolisa ilizwe,
Kube kanti kukho konke lokhu udadewabo ongathembekanga, uJuda, kabuyelanga kimi ngenhliziyo yakhe yonke, kodwa ngenkohliso, itsho iN.
yasisithi kimi: UIsrayeli ohlehlela nyovane
Hamba uyememezela lamazwi ngasenyakatho
Yazi kuphela isiphambeko sakho ukuthi uphambekile umelene leN uNkulunkulu wakho, itsho iN.
Phendukani,
Njalo ngizalinika

Kuzakuthi-ke lapho selandile laba banengi elizweni, ngalezonsuku, itsho iN, kabasayikuthi: Umtshokotsho wesivumelwano seN; njalo kawuyikufika enhliziyweni, njalo kabayikuwukhumbula, futhi kabayiku wu hambela, kungabuyi kwenziwe futhi.
Ngalesosikhathi bazabiza iJerusalema ngokuthiyisihlalo sobukhosi seN; lezizwe zonke zizabuthaniswa kuyo,
Ngalezonsuku indlu yakoJuda izakuya kuyo indlu yakoIsrayeli,
Kodwa mina ngathi: Ngizakubeka njani phakathi kwabantwana, ngikunike ilizwe eliloyisekayo, ilifa elihle kakhulu lezizwe. Ngasengisithi: Uzangibiza ngokuthi: Baba; njalo ungaphambuki ekungilandeleni.
Isibili, njengo mfazi ungathembekanga kumkakhe, lina ndlu kaIsrayeli, itsho iN.
Ilizwi lezwakala emadundulwini,
Phendukani, lina bantwana abahlehlela nyovane; Khangela, thina siyeza kuwe, ngoba uyuNkulunkulu wethu.
Isibili kuyize ukuthembela kusindisooluvela emaqaqeni, l ebuneng inibezintaba.
Ngoba ihlazo liwuqedile izimvu zabo lenkomo zabo, amadodana abo lamadodakazi abo.
Silala phansi ehlazweni lethu, lenhloni zethu zisimbozile;
Uba uphenduka, Israyeli, itsho iN, phendukela kimi;
Futhi uzafunga:
Ngoba itsho njalo kumadoda akoJuda leJerusalema: Qhathani
Zisokeleni eNni,
Bikani koJuda, lizwakalise eJerusalema, lithi: Vuthelani uphondo elizweni;
Misani uphawu ngaseZiyoni, lokwephuka okukhulu.
Isilwane sesenyukile siphuma ehlathini laso,
Ngenxa yalokhu bhincani amasaka,
Njalo kuzakuthi ngalolosuku, itsho iN, inhliziyo yenkosi izaphela, lenhliziyo yeziphathamandla; labapristi bazamangala kakhulu, labaprofethi bazathithibala.
Ngasengisithi: Hawu, Nkosi Jehova! isibili ubakhohlisile lokubakhohlisa lababantu leJerusalema usithi: Lizakuba lokuthula; kanti inkemba ifinyelela emphefumulweni.
Ngalesosikhathi kuzakuthiwa kulabobantu lakuyo iJerusalema: Umoya otshisayo indlela yendodakazi yabantu bami, ungeyisiwo wokwela njalo ungeyisiwo wokuhlambulula.
Umoya ogcweleyo ovela kuwo uzakuza kimi. Khathesi lami ngizakhuluma izahlulelo zimelene labo.
Khangela, uzakwenyuka njengamayezi, lenqola zakhe njengesivunguzane;
Jerusalema, hlambulula inhliziyo yakho kuphume inkohlakalo, ukuze usindiswe. Koze kube nini imicabango yakho emibi ihlala phakathi kwakho?
Ngoba ilizwi liyamemeza
Khumbuzani izizwe, khangelani, lizwakalise limelene leJerusalema; kufika abalindi bevela elizweni elikhatshana, baphakamisa ilizwi labo bemelene lemizi yakoJuda.
Njengabalindi bensimu bamelene layo inhlangothi zonke, ngoba ingivukele, itsho iN.
Indlela yakho lezenzo zakho kukwenzele lezizinto; ngoba kufinyelela enhliziyweni yakho.
Imibilini yami, imibilini yami!
Kuyamenyezelwa incithakalo phezu kwencithakalo,
Koze kube nini ngibona isiboniso, ngizwe ukukhala kophondo?
Ngoba abantu bami bayizithutha, mina kabangazi; kodwa ukwenza okuhle kabakwazi.
Ngabona umhlaba,
Ngabona izintaba, khangela-ke, zazinyikinyeka, lamaqaqa wonke ayenyakazela.
Ngabona, khangela-ke, kwakungelamuntu,
Ngabona, khangela-ke, ilizwe elivundileyo laliyinkangala,
Ngoba itsho njalo iN: Ilizwe lonke lizakuba lunxiwa, kodwa kangiyikuqeda ngokupheleleyo.
Ngenxa yalokhu umhlaba uzalila, njalo kangiyikubuyela emuva ngisuka kukho.
Umuzi wonke uzabaleka ngenxa yomsindo wabagadi bamabhiza labatshoki ngamadandili;
Wena-ke ozachitheka, zidinga impilo yakho.
Ngoba ngizwile ilizwi kungathi ngelowesifazana ohelelwayo,
Hambani liye le lale ezitaladeni zeJerusalema,
Loba-ke besithi:
N, amehlo akho kawakho eqinisweni yini?
Mina ngasengisithi: Qiniso, laba ngabayanga, bayizithutha;
Mina ngizakuya kwabakhulu, ngikhulume labo, ngoba bona bayayazi indlela yeN,
Ngakho-ke isilwane
Ngingakuthethelela njani ngalokhu?
Babe njeng amabhiza asuthayo ekuseni, bakhonya,
Kangiyikujezisa yini ngenxa yalezizinto? itsho iN; kumbe umphefumulo wami kawuyikuphindisela yini esizweni esinjengalesi?
Yenyukelani emidulini ayo, lichithe, ngoba kazisizo zeN.
Ngoba indlu kaIsrayeli lendlu kaJuda zenze ngenkohliso enkulu zimelene lami, itsho iN.
Bayiphikile iN,
Labaprofethi bazakuba ngumoya, lelizwi kalikho kubo; kuzakwenziwa njalo kibo!
Ngalokho itsho njalo uNkulunkulu wamabandla: Ngoba likhuluma lelilizwi, khangela, ngizakwenza amazwi ami emlonyeni wakho njalo uzabaqothula.
Khangelani, ngizaletha phezu kwenu isizwe
Isamba saso semitshoko bonke bangamaqhawe.
Njalo sizakudla isivuno sakho lokudla kwakho; othembela kiyo, sizayithelela ubuyanga ngenkemba.
Kodwa langalezonsuku, itsho iN, kangiyikwenza isiphetho esipheleleyo kini.
Kuzakuthi-ke lapho lisithi: uNkulunkulu wethu yenzeleni zonke lezizinto kithi?
Memezelani lokhu endlini kaJakobe, likuzwakalise koJuda, lisithi:
Zwanini-ke lokhu, lina bantu abayizithutha elilendlebe, kodwa lingezwa.
Kalingesabi yini? kube kanti kawayikudlula phezu kwawo.
Kodwa lababantu balenhliziyo evukelayo lephikayo; baphambukile, bahamba.
Futhi kabatsho enhliziyweni zabo ukuthi: Ake sesabe uNkulunkulu wethu, enika izulu
Iziphambeko zenu ziphambule lezizinto,
Ngoba phakathi kwabantu bami kutholakala abakhohlakeleyo; bacatheme njengabathiya inyoni; babeka umgibe ochithayo, babambe abantu.
Njengezongo ligcwele inyoni, zinjalo izindlu zabo zigcwele inkohliso; ngakho-ke sebebakhulu, banothile.
Bazimukile, lelungelo labaswelayo kabalahluleli.
Kangiyiku ba jezisa ngalezizinto yini? kutsho iN. Umphefumulo wami kawuyikuphindisela esizweni esinjengalesi yini?
Okwethusayo lokwesabekayo kwenzakele elizweni.
Abaprofethi baprofetha kodwa lizakwenzani ekupheleni kwakho?
Lina bantwana bakoBhenjamini, lencithakalo enkulu.
Indodakazi yeZiyoni ngiyifananise l owesifazanaomuhle obuthakathaka.
Abelusi bazafika kuye lemihlambi yabo;
Z ehlukaniseleni impi limelene layo;, ngoba amathunzi okuhlwa aselulekile.
Sukumani, senyuke ngobusuku, sidilize izigodlo zayo.
Ngoba itsho njalo yamabandla: Gamulani izihlahla, kulocindezelo kuphela phakathi kwawo.
Njengomthombo umpompoza amanzi awo, phambi kwami kulenhlungu lamanxeba njalonjalo.
Layeka, Jerusalema, hlezi umphefumulo wami wehlukane lawe;
Itsho njalo yamabandla: Bazayikhothoza lokuyikhothoza insali kaIsrayeli njengevini; buyisela isandla sakho ezitsheni njengomvuni wevini.
Ngizakhuluma kubani, kabathokozi ngalo.
Ngakho ngigcwele ulaka lweN, ngikhathele yikuzithiba.
Lezindlu zabo zizanikelwa kwabanye, ngoba ngizakwelulela isandla sami phezu kwabahlali belizwe, itsho iN.
Ngoba kusukela komncinyane wabo kuze kufike komkhulu wabo
Bapholisa kancane inxeba labantu bami,
Baba lenhloni yini lapho besenza isinengiso? ngesikhathi sokubahambela kwami bazakhubeka, itsho iN.
Itsho njalo iN: Manini ezindleleni, libone, libuze ngemikhondo yasendulo,
Futhi ngilibekele abalindi, Kodwa bathi: Kasiyikulalela.
Ngakho zwanini, lina zizwe, wazi, wena bandla, okuphakathi kwabo.
Zwana, wena mhlaba; ngoba bengalalelanga amazwi ami, lomlayo wami, kodwa bawalile.
Izelani kimi lemihlatshelo yenu kayimnandi kimi.
Ngakho itsho njalo iN: Khangela, ngizabeka izikhubekiso phambi kwalababantu, njalo oyise lamadodana bakhubeke kanyekanye kuzo, umakhelwane lomngane wakhe, bazabhubha.
Itsho njalo IN: Khangela, abantu bayeza bevela
Bazabamba idandili lomkhonto; bagade amabhiza, behleliwe njengabantu bempi bemelene lawe, ndodakazi yeZiyoni.
Siyizwile indumela yakho, izandla zethu ziyadangala;
Lingaphumi liye egangeni, lingahambi endleleni, ngoba kukhonainkemba yesitha, ukwesaba inhlangothi zonke.
Wena ndodakazi yabantu bami, bhinca amasaka, ngoba umchithi uzafika kithi masinyane.
Ngikubekile ubengumphotshongo
Bonke bangabahlamuki abalenkani,
Imvutho itshile, umnuso usuqedwe ngumlilo;
Bazababiza ngokuthibayisiliva esilahliweyo, ngoba ibalahlile.
Ilizwi elafika kuJeremiya livela eNni lisithi:
Mana esangweni lendlu yeN umemezele khona lelilizwi uthi: Zwanini ilizwi leN, lina bonke bakoJuda, abangena kulamasango uku za khonza iN.
Itsho njalo yamabandla, uNkulunkulu wakoIsrayeli: Lungisani indlela zenu lezenzo zenu,
Lingathembi lina emazwini amanga okuthi: La alithempeli leN, ithempeli leN, ithempeli leN.
Ngoba uba lilungisisa lokulungisa izindlela zenu lezenzo zenu;
lingacindezeli
khona ngizalenza ukuthi lihlale kulindawo,
Khangelani, lina lithembela
Lizakweba, libulale, lifebe,
Beselisiza lime phambi kwami kulindlu, ebizwa ngebizo lami, lithi: Sikhululwe ukuze senze zonke lezizinengiso.
Indlu le, emehlweni enu yini? Khangelani, mina sengibonile, itsho iN.
Ngoba yanini khathesi endaweni yami
Khathesi-ke, ngoba lenzile yonke le imisebenzi, itsho iN, njalo ngikhulumile lani, ngivuka ngovivi ngikhuluma,
ngakho ngizakwenza kulindlu, ebizwa ngebizo lami, elithemba kiyo, lakundawo engayinika lina laboyihlo,
Njalo ngizalixotsha lisuke ebusweni bami, njengalokho ngaxotsha bonke abafowenu,
Ngakho wena ungabakhulekeli lababantu,
Kawukuboni yini abakwenza emizini yakoJuda lezitaladeni zeJerusalema?
Abantwana batheza inkuni, laboyise baphembe umlilo, labesifazana baxove inhlama,
Bathukuthelisa mina yini?
Ngakho itsho njalo iNkosi uJehova: Khangela, intukuthelo yami lolaka lwami kuzathululelwa kulindawo,
Itsho njalo yamabandla, uNkulunkulu kaIsrayeli: Fakani iminikelo yenu yokutshiswa kanye lemihlatshelo yenu,
Ngoba kangikhulumanga kuboyihlo,
Kodwa ngabalaya le into ngisithi: Lalelani ilizwi lami,
Kodwa kabalalelanga, kabathobanga indlebe yabo; hatshi-ke phambili.
Kusukela osukwini oyihlo abaphuma ngalo elizweni leGibhithe kuze kube yilolusuku, ngithume kini zonke inceku zami, abaprofethi,
Kanti kabangilalelanga,
Ngakho uzakhuluma wonke lamazwi kibo, kodwa kabayikukuphendula.
Ngakho uzakuthi kibo: Lesi yisizwe esingalaleli ilizwi leN, uNkulunkulu waso, lesingemukeli ukulaywa; liqunyiwe emlonyeni waso.
Gela ngoba isalile yasidela isizukulwana solaka lwayo.
Ngoba abantwana bakoJuda benzile ububi emehlweni ami, itsho iN; babekile izinengiso zabo endlini
Bakhile-ke indawo eziphakemeyo lokungavelanga enhliziyweni yami.
Ngakho khangela, insuku ziyeza,
Lezidumbu zalababantu zizakuba yikudla kwenyoni zamazulu, ozazethusa.
Khona ngizakwenza
Ngalesosikhathi, itsho iN, bazakhupha amathambo amakhosi akoJuda, lamathambo eziphathamandla zayo, lamathambo abapristi, lamathambo abaprofethi, lamathambo abahlali beJerusalema, emangcwabeni abo;
baweneke
Njalo ukufa kuzakhethwa kulempilo yiyo yonke insali yabaseleyo balolusapho olubi, itsho yamabandla.
Uzakuthi kibo futhi: Itsho njalo IN: Bazakuwa bangavuki yini? Uzaphambuka angaphenduki yini?
Pho,baphambukelani lababantu eJerusalema ngokuphambuka
Ngilalele ngezwa,
Yebo ingabuzane emazulwini liyazazi izikhathi zalo ezimisiweyo;
Litsho njani ukuthi: Sihlakaniphile, lomlayo weN ulathi?
Abahlakaniphileyo bayangekile, khangela, balalile ilizwi leN; pho balenhlakanipho bani?

Ngakho omkabo ngizabanika abanye, amasimu abo kwabazakudla ilifa la bo; ngoba kusukela komncinyane kuze kufike komkhulu bonke bayizihwaba zenzuzo embi, kusukela kumprofethi kuze kube kumpristi wonke wenza ngenkohliso.
Ngoba balipholise kancane inxeba lendodakazi yabantu bami, besithi: Ukuthula, ukuthula! khona kungelakuthula.

Baba lenhloni yini lapho sebenze amanyala? Hatshi, kababanga lanhloni lakanye, futhi kabakwazi ukuyangeka; ngakho bazakuwa phakathi kwabawayo; ngesikhathi sokuhanjelwa kwabo bazawiselwa phansi, itsho iN.
Isibili ngizabaqeda, itsho iN; kakuyikuba khona lengibanike khona kuzakwedlula kibo.
Sihlaleleni? Buthanani, ngoba sonile eNni.
Sa lindela ukuthula,
Ukuthimula kwamabhiza akhe kwezwakala lokugcwala kwalo, umuzi labahlala kiwo.
Ngoba khangelani, ngithumela phakathi kwenu izinyoka, itsho iN.
Ukududuzwa kwami kusosizini, inhliziyo yami iphelelwa ngamandla kimi.
Khangelani, ilizwi lokukhala kwendodakazi yabantu bami livela elizweni elikhatshana. ngokuyize kwabezizwe?
Isivuno sidlulile, ihlobo liphelile, kanti thina kasisindiswanga.
Ngokwephuka ukumangala okukhulu kungibambile.
Kakulabhalisamu yini eGileyadi?
Kungathi ngabe ikhanda lami lingamanzi, emini lebusuku!
Kungathi ngabe ngilendawo yokulala yezihambi
Njalo bagobisa ulimi lwabo njenge dandili labo besenzelaamanga; itsho iN.
Qaphelani, ngulowo lalowo umakhelwane wakhe,
Njalo bazakhohlisa, ngulowo lalowo umakhelwane wakhe, bengakhulumi iqiniso; balufundisile ulimi lwabo ukukhuluma amanga, bezidinisa ngokwenza okubi.
Indawo yakho yokuhlala iphakathi kwenkohliso; ngenkohliso bayala ukungazi, itsho iN.
Ngakho itsho njalo yamabandla: Khangela, ngizabancibilikisa,
Ulimi lwabo lungumtshoko wokubulala,
Kangiyikubajezisa yini ngenxa yalezizinto? itsho iN; umphefumulo wami kawuyikuphindisela yini esizweni esinjengalesi?
Ngizaphakamisa ukukhala lesililo phezu kwezintaba, laphezu kwezindawo zokuhlala zenkangala ingoma yokulila,
Ngizayenza iJerusalema ibe zinqumbi, lemizi yakoJuda ngizayenza ibelunxiwa, ingabi lamhlali.
Ngubani umuntu ohlakaniphileyo ongaqedisisa lokhu? kuze kungabikho odlulayo?
yasisithi: Ngoba bedelile umlayo wami engawubeka phambi kwabo, njalo bengalilalelanga ilizwi lami, bengahambanga ngalo;
kodwa balandela
Ngalokho itsho njalo yamabandla, uNkulunkulu kaIsrayeli: Khangela, ngizabondla
Njalo ngizabahlakaza phakathi kwezizwe ngize ngibaqede.
Itsho njalo yamabandla: Qaphelani, libize abesifazana abalilayo ukuthi beze; lithumele kwabesifazana abahlakaniphileyo, ukuthi beze.
Kabaphangise, basiphakamisele isililo, ukuze amehlo ethu ehlise inyembezi, lenkophe zethu zimpompoze amanzi.
Ngoba ilizwi lokulila liyezwakala liphuma eZiyoni lisithi: Yeka ukuchitheka kwethu!
Kanti zwanini ilizwi leN, lina besifazana, lendlebe zenu zilemukele ilizwi lomlomo wayo; lifundise amadodakazi enu ukuqhinqa isililo, kube ngulowo lalowo umakhelwane wakhe ingoma yokulila.
Ngoba ukufa kwenyukele emawindini ethu, kwangena ezigodlweni zethu, ukuquma abantwana
Khuluma uthi: Itsho njalo iN: Ngitsho isidumbu somuntu sizakuwa njengamalongwe ebusweni bensimu,
Itsho njalo iN: Ohlakaniphileyo kangazincomi ngenhlakanipho yakhe, leqhawe lingazincomi ngobuqhawe balo, isinothi singazincomi ngenotho yaso;
kodwa ozincomayo kazincome ngalokhu, itsho iN.
Khangela, insuku ziyeza,
IGibhithe, loJuda, loEdoma, labantwana bakoAmoni, loMowabi,
Zwanini ilizwi elikhuluma kini, lina ndlu kaIsrayeli.
Itsho njalo IN: Lingafundi indlela yabahedeni, lingatshaywa luvalo ngezibonakaliso zamazulu, ngenxa yokuthi abahedeni bayazesaba.
Ngoba imikhuba yabantu iyize;
Basicecisa ngesiliva langegolide, ukuze singazamazami.
Zinjengesihlahla
Njengoba kungekho onjengawe,
Ngubani ongekwesabe,
Kodwa kanyekanye banjengezinyamazana
Isiliva esikhandiweyo
Kodwa inguNkulunkulu weqiniso, inguNkulunkulu ophilayo lenkosi yaphakade. Ekuthukutheleni kwayo umhlaba uyazamazama, lezizwe kazilakulumela ulaka lwayo.
Lizakutsho njalo kubo: Onkulunkulu abangenzanga amazulu lomhlaba
Owenza umhlaba ngamandla akhe,
Lapho ekhupha ilizwi,
Wonke umuntu unjengenyamazana elwazini;
Ziyize,
Isabelo sikaJakobe kasinjengazo,
Qoqa impahla yakho uyikhuphe elizweni,
Ngoba itsho njalo iN: Khangela, ngizabajikijela ngaphandle abahlali belizwe
Maye kimi ngenxa yokwephuka kwami!
Ithente lami lidiliziwe,
Ngoba abelusi lomhlambi wabo wonke uhlakazekile.
Khangela, umsindo wombiko ufikile,
N, ngiyazi ukuthi indlela yomuntu kayikho kuye;
N, ngilaya, kodwa ngesahlulelo, hatshi olakeni lwakho, hlezi unginciphise.
Thululela ulaka lwakho phezu kwabahedeni
Ilizwi elafika kuJeremiya livela eNni, lisithi:
Zwanini amazwi likhulume ebantwini bakoJuda lakubahlali beJerusalema.
Njalo uthi kibo: Itsho njalo uNkulunkulu kaIsrayeli: Uqalekisiwe umuntu ongalaleli amazwi alesisivumelwano,
engawalayela oyihlo ngosuku engibakhupha ngalo elizweni leGibhithe, esithandweni sensimbi, lami ngibe nguNkulunkulu wenu,
ukuze ngimise isifungo engasifunga kuboyihlo Ngasengiphendula ngathi: Ameni, N.
yasisithi kimi: Memezela wonke lamazwi emizini yakoJuda
Ngoba ngafakaza lokufakaza kuboyihlo ngosuku engabakhuphula ngalo elizweni leGibhithe, kuze kube lamuhla, ngivuka ngovivi ngifakaza,
Kodwa kabalalelanga, kodwa kaba w enzanga.
yasisithi kimi: Kutholakele ugobe phakathi kwabantu bakoJuda, laphakathi kwabahlali beJerusalema.
Sebebuyele eziphambekweni zabokhokho babo,
Ngakho itsho njalo iN: Khangela, ngizaletha okubi phezu kwabo, abangeke baphume kukho; lapho bekhala kimi, kangiyikubezwa.
Khona imizi yakoJuda labahlali beJerusalema bezahamba bakhale kubonkulunkulu ababatshisela impepha, kodwa kabayikubasindisa lokubasindisa ngesikhathi sobubi babo.
Ngoba njenge nani lemizi yakho babe njaloonkulunkulu bakho, Juda, la njenge nani lezitalada zeJerusalema limisile amalathi kulokhu okuyangisayo, amalathi okutshisela uBhali impepha.
Ngakho wena ungabakhulekeli lababantu,
Othandekayo wami
yabiza ibizo lakho ngokuthi: Isihlahla somhlwathi esiluhlaza esihle ngezithelo ezinhle;
Ngoba yamabandla, eyakuhlanyelayo,
yasingazisa ukuthi ngazi; wasungitshengisa izenzo zabo.
Kodwa mina nganginjengewundlu kumbeinkabi kusiwa ekuhlatshweni;
Kodwa, wena N yamabandla, umahluleli olungileyo, ohlola izinso ngoba ngembule udaba lwami kuwe.
Ngakho itsho njalo ngamadoda eAnathothi,
Ngakho itsho njalo yamabandla: Khangela, ngizawajezisa; amajaha azakufa ngenkemba, amadodana awo lamadodakazi awo azakufa ngendlala,
njalo kakuyikuba lensali kuwo; ngoba ngizaletha okubi phezu kwamadoda
Ulungile wena N,
Ubahlanyele, yebo, bagxilile impande; bayaqhubeka, yebo, bathele izithelo; useduze emlonyeni wabo, kanti ukhatshana lezinso zabo.
Kodwa wena, N, uyangazi,
Koze kube nini ilizwe lilila, ngoba bathi: Kayiyikubona isiphetho sethu.
Uba ugijime labezinyawo, bakudinisa, pho, ungancintisana njani lamabhiza?
Ngoba ngitsho abafowenu lendlu kayihlo, loba bekhuluma izinto ezinhle kuwe.
Ngiyidelile indlu yami, ngilitshiyile ilifa lami; nginikele othandiweyo womphefumulo wami esandleni sezitha zakhe.
Ilifa lami kimi linjengesilwane ehlathini; lingiphumisele ilizwi; ngakho-ke ngilizondile.
Ilifa lami kimi li njenge nyoni elamabalabala edla inyama,
Abelusi abanengi basichithile basenzile isabelo sami esiloyisekayo saba yinkangala elunxiwa.
Basenze saba lunxiwa, sililela kimi
Abachithi bafikile phezu kwawo wonke amadundulu enkangala; ngoba inkemba yeN izakudla kusukela ko munyeumkhawulo welizwe kusiya ko munyeumkhawulo welizwe; kakulakuthula kuyo yonke inyama.
Bahlanyele ingqoloyi, kodwa bazavuna ameva;
Itsho njalo iN: Mayelana labo bonke omakhelwane bami ababi Khangela, ngizabasiphuna elizweni labo, ngiyisiphune indlu yakoJuda isuke phakathi kwabo.
Kuzakuthi-ke emva kokubasiphuna kwami, ngizabuya kube ngulowo lalowo elifeni lakhe, langulowo lalowo elizweni lakhe.
Kuzakuthi-ke uba bezazifunda ngokukhuthala izindlela zabantu bami, ukuthi bafunge ngebizo lami bathi: Kuphila kukaJehova;
Kodwa uba bengalaleli, ngizasisiphuna lesosizwe, ngisisiphune ngisibhubhise, itsho iN.
Itsho njalo kimi: Hamba uzithengele ibhanti lelembu ulifake ekhalweni lwakho, ungalifaki emanzini.
Ngasengithenga ibhanti njengokwelizwi leN, ngalifaka ekhalweni lwami.
Ilizwi leN laselifika kimi ngokwesibili lisithi:
Thatha ibhanti olithengileyo elisokhalweni lwakho, usukume uye eYufrathi, ulifihle khona engoxweni yedwala.
Ngasengihamba, ngalifihla ngaseYufrathi njengoba ingilayile.
Kwasekusithi ekupheleni kwensuku ezinengi, yasisithi kimi: Sukuma, uye eYufrathi, u ye thatha khona ibhanti engakulaya ukuthi ulifihle khona.
Ngasengisiya eYufrathi, ngagebha, ngalithatha ibhanti endaweni lapho engangilifihle khona; khangela-ke, ibhanti lalonakele,
Laselifika kimi ilizwi leN lisithi:
Itsho njalo iN: Ngalindlela lokuziqhenya okukhulu kweJerusalema.
Lababantu ababi, abala ukuzwa amazwi ami, abahamba ngobulukhuni benhliziyo yabo,
Ngoba njengoba ibhanti linamathela okhalweni lomuntu, ngokunjalo nginamathelise kimi indlu yonke yakoIsrayeli lendlu yonke yakoJuda, itsho iN; ukuze kimi babe ngabantu, kodwa kabalalelanga.
Ngakho uzakhuluma kibo lelilizwi: Itsho njalo uNkulunkulu kaIsrayeli: Yonke imbodlela Isibili kasikwazi yini ukuthi yonke imbodlela izagcwaliswa ngewayini?
Ubususithi kibo: Itsho njalo iN: Khangela, ngizagcwalisa bonke abakhileyo balelilizwe, lamakhosi ahlala esihlalweni sobukhosi sikaDavida,
Njalo ngizabaphahlaza omunye komunye, laboyise lamadodana ndawonye, itsho iN; kangiyikuhawukela, kangiyikuyekela, kangiyikuba lomusa, ukuthi ngingabachithi.
Zwanini, libeke indlebe, lingaziqhenyi, ngoba ikhulumile.
Inikeni uNkulunkulu wenu udumo,
Kodwa uba lingalaleli, umphefumulo wami uzakhala inyembezi endaweni zensitha ngenxa yokuziqhenya kwenu, lehlise inyembezi, ngoba umhlambi weN uthunjiwe.
Tshono enkosini
Imizi yeningizimu izavalwa, njalo kakho oza yi vula; uJuda uzathunjwa, yena wonke, uzathunjwa ngokupheleleyo.
Phakamisani amehlo enu, libone labo abavela enyakatho. Ungaphi umhlambi owaphiwa wona, umhlambi wakho omuhle?
Uzakuthini uba esenza isijeziso phezu kwakho, ngoba wena ubafundise ukuthi babey izinduna
Njalo uba usithi enhliziyweni yakho: Kungani lezizinto zenzakele kimi? l ezithende zakho zaphathwa ngodlakela.
UmEthiyophiya angasiphendula yini isikhumba sakhe, kumbe ingwe amabala ayo? Khonalani lizakuba lakho ukwenza okuhle elejwayele ukwenza okubi.
