Ngakho ngizabahlakaza njengamakhoba edluliswa ngomoya wenkangala.
Le yinkatho yakho, isabelo sezilinganiso zakho ezivela kimi,
Ngakho lami ngizakwembula amalogwe akho phezu kobuso bakho,
Ngibonile ubufebe bakho, lokukhonya kwakho, Kusezadlula nini?
Ilizwi leN elafika kuJeremiya mayelana lendaba zembalela.
UJuda uyalila, lamasango akhe adangele; amnyama kuze kube semhlabathini, lokukhala kweJerusalema kwenyukile.
Njalo izikhulu zakhe zithuma abancinyane bazo emanzini; bafika emithonjeni, bangatholi manzi; babuyele inkonxa zabo zingelalutho, belenhloni, beyangekile, bembomboze ikhanda labo.
Ngoba umhlabathi udabukile, ngoba kungekho izulu elizweni, abalimi balenhloni, bambomboza ikhanda labo.
Yebo impala layo iyazala egangeni, i ku tshiye, ngoba kungelatshani.
Labobabhemi beganga bayema emadundulwini, baphembele umoya amehlo abo ayaphela, ngoba kungelatshani.
Lanxa izono zethu zifakaza zimelana lathi, N, yenza ngenxa yebizo lakho.
Wena themba likaIsrayeli, uMsindisi wakhe ngesikhathi sembandezelo, kungani uzakuba njengowezizweni elizweni?
Kungani uzakuba njengomuntu odidekileyo, njengeqhawe e lingelakusindisa.
Itsho njalo ngalababantu: Ngokunjalo bathanda ukuzula, kabazinqandanga inyawo zabo; ngakho kayithokozi ngabo.
yasisithi kimi: Ungakhulekeli lababantu.
Lapho bezila ukudla, kangiyikuzwa ukukhala kwabo.
Ngasengisithi: Hawu, Nkosi Jehova! Khangela, abaprofethi bathi kubo: Kaliyikubona inkemba, kaliyikuba lendlala.
yasisithi kimi: Abaprofethi baprofetha amanga ngebizo lami.
Ngakho itsho njalo mayelana labaprofethi abaprofetha ebizweni lami, ngoba mina ngingabathumanga.

Labantu, abaprofetha kibo, bazakuba ngabaphoselwa ezitaladeni zeJerusalema ngenxa yendlala lenkemba; njalo kungekho obangcwabayo, bona, omkabo, lamadodana abo, lamadodakazi abo; ngoba ngizathululela ububi babo phezu kwabo.
Ngakho uzakutsho lelilizwi kibo elokuthi: Amehlo ami kawehlise inyembezi ebusuku lemini.
Uba ngiphumela emaphandleni, khangela-ke, ababulewe ngenkemba.
Usumalile isibili uJuda yini? Umphefumulo wakho unengwa yiZiyoni yini.
Siyazi, N, ukukhohlakala kwethu lo bubi babobaba, ngoba sonile kuwe.
Unga si deleli, ngenxa yebizo lakho.
Kukhona yini phakathi.
yasisithi kimi: Loba bekumi phambi kwami inhliziyo yami ibingebe kulababantu; baxotshe phambi kwami, bayekele baphume.
Kuzakuthi-ke uba besithi kuwe: Sizaphuma siye ngaphi? Uzabatshela-ke uthi: Itsho njalo iN: Abokufa baya ekufeni, labenkemba baya enkembeni, labendlala baya endlaleni, labokuthunjwa baya ekuthunjweni.
Ngoba ngizabamisela izinhlobo ezine, lezinyamazana zomhlaba zokudla lezokubhubhisa.
Ngizabanikela babe yinto eyesabekayo kuyo yonke imibuso yomhlaba, ngenxa kaManase indodana kaHezekhiya, inkosi yakoJuda, ngalokho akwenza eJerusalema.
Ngoba ngubani ozakuhawukela, wena Jerusalema? njalo ngubani ozakulilela? njalo ngubani ozaphambukela eceleni ukubuza ngokuthula kwakho?
Wena ungidelile,
Njalo ngizabela
Abafelokazi babo bandile kimi kuletshebetshebe lolwandle. bengananzelele.
Owazala abayisikhombisa usekhathele; waba lenhloni, wayangeka; lensali yabo ngizayinikela enkembeni phambi kwezitha zabo, itsho iN.
Maye mina, futhi kabangebolekisanga ngenzuzo, kantibayangithuka, ngulowo lalowo wabo.
yathi: Isibili kuzakuba kuhle ngensali yakho;
Insimbi ingayephula yini insimbi evela enyakatho
Inotho yakho lokuligugu kwakho ngizakunikela kube yimpango,
Ngizakwenza ukuthi u dlule kanye lezitha zakho u ye elizweni onga l aziyo; uzabhebha phezu kwenu.
Wena uyazi, N;
Amazwi akho atholakala njalo ngawadla; ngoba ibizo lakho labizwa phezu kwami, wena N, Nkulunkulu wamabandla.
Kangihlalanga ngoba ungigcwalise ngentukuthelo.
Kungani ubuhlungu bami bube khona njalonjalo, lenxeba lami lingelapheki,
Ngakho itsho njalo iN: Uba ubuya, njalo uba ukhupha okuligugu kokungasizi lutho, uzakuba njengomlomo wami. Bona kababuyele kuwe, kodwa wena ungabuyeli kubo.
Ngoba ngizakwenza ube ngumduli wethusi ovikelweyo kulababantu; itsho iN.
Ngizakophula esandleni sababi,
Ilizwi leN laselifika kimi lisithi:
Ungazithatheli umfazi, njalo ungabi lamadodana kumbe amadodakazi kulindawo.
Ngoba itsho njalo mayelana lamadodana lamayelana lamadodakazi azalelwe kulindawo, lamayelana labonina abawazalayo lamayelana laboyise abawazalele kulelilizwe:
Bazakufa izimfa zemikhuhlane; lokwenyamazana zomhlaba.
Ngoba itsho njalo iN: Ungangeni endlini yesililo, ungayikulila, ungabakhaleli; ngoba ngikususile ukuthula kwami kulababantu, itsho iN, uthandolomusa lezihawu.
Njalo abakhulu labancinyane bazakufa kulelilizwe; kabayikungcwatshwa, ngenxa yabo.
Futhi kabayikubahlephulela isinkwaesililweni, ukubaduduza ngenxa yofileyo; futhi kakho ozabanathisa inkezo yezinduduzo ngenxa kayise langenxa kanina.
Njalo ungangeni endlini yedili, ukuhlala labo, ukudla lokunatha.

Ngoba itsho njalo yamabandla, uNkulunkulu kaIsrayeli: Khangelani, ngizakwenza ukuthi kuphele kule indawo, emehlweni enu, lensukwini zenu, ilizwi lentokozo, lelizwi lenjabulo, ilizwi lomyeni, lelizwi likamakoti.

Njalo kuzakuthi lapho utshela lababantu wonke lamazwi, babesebesithi kuwe: ikhulumelani konke lokhu okubi okukhulu imelene lathi, njalo buyini ububi bethu, njalo yisiphi isono sethu esisonileyo simelene leN uNkulunkulu wethu?
Khona uzakuthi kubo: babasebenzela, babakhonza, bangidela mina, kabagcinanga umlayo wami;
lina-ke lenze okubi kulaboyihlo; ukuthi bangangilaleli.
Ngakho ngizaliphosela ngaphandle kwalelilizwe, lina laboyihlo; lapho-ke lizasebenzela abanye onkulunkulu emini lebusuku, ngoba kangiyikulinika umusa.
Ngakho, khangela, eyakhuphula abantwana bakoIsrayeli elizweni leGibhithe;
kodwa: Kuphila kweN,
Khangela, ngizathumela kubagoli benhlanzi
Ngoba amehlo ami aphezu kwazo zonke izindlela zabo;
Kuqala-ke ngizaphindisela isiphambeko sabo lesono sabo bagcwalisa ilifa lami ngezidumbu zamanyala abo lezinengiso zabo.
N, wena mandla ami, lenqaba yami,
Umuntu angazenzela onkulunkulu yini, kanti kabayisibo onkulunkulu?
Ngakho, khangela, ngizabenza bazi okwalesisikhathi,
Isono sakoJuda sibhaliwe ngepheni yensimbi,
abantwana babo besakhumbula amalathi abo
Wena ntaba yami esegangeni, le zindawo zakho eziphakemeyo, ngenxa yesono kuyo yonke imingcele yakho.
Lawe, ngitsho ngokwakho, uzayekela ilifa lakho engakunika lona; ngoba usuphembe umlilo ekuthukutheleni kwami; uzavutha kuze kube nininini.
Itsho njalo iN: Uqalekisiwe umuntu othembela emuntwini, lonhliziyo yakhe iphambuka eNni.
Ngoba uzakuba njengesihlahlanyana enkangala,
Ubusisiwe umuntu othembela eNni,
Ngoba uzakuba njengesihlahla esihlanyelwe ngasemanzini, kasikhathazeki emnyakeni wokubalela, kasiyekeli ukuthela isithelo.
Inhliziyo ngubani ongayazi?
Mina N ngihlola inhliziyo, njengokwesithelo sezenzo zakhe.
Njenge thendele elifukamela amaqandalinga wa chamuseli,
Isihlalo sobukhosi esilenkazimulo, esiphakanyisiweyo kwasekuqaleni, siyindawo yendlu yethu engcwele.
N, themba likaIsrayeli,
Ngisilisa, N, njalo ngizasila;
Khangela, bathi kimi: Lingaphi ilizwi leN?
Kodwa mina kangiphangisanga
Ungabi luvalo kimi; wena uyisiphephelo sami osukwini lobubi.
Kabayangeke labo abangizingelayo,
Itsho njalo kimi: Hamba u ye kuma esangweni labantwana babantu, angena ngalo amakhosi akoJuda, aphuma ngalo, lakuwo wonke amasango eJerusalema,
ubususithi kubo: Zwanini ilizwi leN, abangena ngala amasango!
Itsho njalo iN: Ziqapheleni, lingathwali mthwalo ngosuku lwesabatha, kumbe li wu ngenise ngamasango eJerusalema.
Futhi lingakhuphi umthwalo ezindlini zenu ngosuku lwesabatha, lingenzi loba yiwuphi umsebenzi;
Kodwa kabalalelanga, kababekanga indlebe yabo,
Kuzakuthi-ke uba lina lingilalela lokungilalela, itsho iN, ukuthi lingangenisi mthwalo ngamasango alumuzi ngosuku lwesabatha, ukuthi lingenzi loba yiwuphi umsebenzi ngalo;

khona kuzangena ngamasango alumuzi amakhosi leziphathamandla abahlala esihlalweni sobukhosi sikaDavida, wona leziphathamandla zawo, abantu bakoJuda, labahlali beJerusalema; lalumuzi uzahlalwa kuze kube nininini.
Bazakuza-ke bevela emizini yakoJuda, endlini yeN.
Kodwa uba lingangilaleli, ukwenza usuku lwesabatha lube ngcwele,
Ilizwi elafika kuJeremiya livela eNni lisithi:
Sukuma, wehlele e ndl iniyombumbi, lapho-ke ngizakuzwisa amazwi ami.
Ngasengisehlela e ndl iniyombumbi, khangela-ke wayesenza umsebenzi emavilini.
Njalo imbiza ayeyenza ngebumba yonakala esandleni sombumbi; wasebuya wenza ngayo enye imbiza njengoba kwakuqondile emehlweni ombumbi ukwenza.
Ilizwi leN laselifika kimi lisithi:
Ndlu kaIsrayeli, ngingeze ngenza kini njengalo umbumbi yini? lina ndlu kaIsrayeli.
Nge sikhatshana ngizakhuluma ngesizwe langombuso
uba lesosizwe engikhulume ngimelene laso siphenduka ebubini baso,
La nge sikhatshana ngizakhuluma ngesizwe langombuso, ukwakha loku ku hlanyela;
uba kusenza okubi emehlweni ami, kungalaleli ilizwi lami, khona ngizazisola ngokuhle ebengisithi ngizakwenzela okuhle ngakho.

Ngakho khathesi ake ukhulume ebantwini bakoJuda lakwabahlali beJerusalema, usithi: Itsho njalo iN: Khangelani, ngilibumbela okubi, ngilicebela icebo. Phendukani khathesi, ngulowo lalowo endleleni yakhe embi,
Kodwa bathi: Kakulathemba;
Ngakho itsho njalo iN: Buzani khathesi phakathi kwabahedeni,
Umuntuangatshiya yini iliqhwa elikhithikileyo leLebhanoni e livela edwaleni leganga? Angatshiywa yini amanzi aqandayo ageleza evelakwezinye indawo?
Kodwa abantu bami bangikhohliwe,
besenza ilizwe labo libe lunxiwa,
Ngizabahlakaza
Basebesithi: Wozani simcebele amacebo uJeremiya; singananzi lawaphi amazwi akhe.
Nginakekela, N, ulalele ilizwi labaphikisana lami.
Kuyavuzwa okubi esikhundleni sokuhle yini? Khumbula ukuthi ngema phambi kwakho ukubakhulumela okuhle, ukuphambula ulaka lwakho kibo.
Ngakho nikela abantwana babo endlaleni, babe ngabafelokazi, lamadoda abo abulawe yi kufa, amajaha abo atshaywe ngenkemba empini.
Kakuzwakale ukukhala endlini zabo,
Kanti wena, N, uyawazi wonke amacebo abo bemelene lami uku ngi bulala. Ungathetheleli
Itsho njalo iN: Hamba u ye thenga
Ubusuphuma uye esihotsheni sendodana kaHinomu esisekungeneni kwesango lodengezi, umemezele khona amazwi engizakutshela wona.
Uthi: Zwanini ilizwi leN,
Ngenxa yokuthi bangidelile,
Futhi bakha izindawo eziphakemeyo zikaBhali,
Ngakho khangela, insuku ziyeza, kodwa isiHotsha sokuBulawa.
Njalo ngizachitha icebo lakoJuda leJerusalema kulindawo,
Ngenze lumuzi ube lunxiwa, lokokuncifelwa; wonke owedlula kuwo uzamangala kakhulu ancife ngenxa yazo zonke inhlupheko zawo.
Njalo ngizabenza badle inyama yamadodana abo lenyama yamadodakazi abo; ezizabacindezela ngakho izitha zabo labadinga impilo yabo.
Khona uzaphahlaza
ubususithi kiwo: Itsho njalo yamabandla:
Ngizakwenza njalo kulindawo, itsho iN, lakwabakhileyo bayo, ukuthi ngenze lumuzi ubenjengeThofethi.
Njalo izindlu zeJerusalema lezindlu zamakhosi akoJuda zizangcoliswa njengendawo yeThofethi,
Khona wabuya uJeremiya evela eTofethi, wathi ebantwini bonke:
Itsho njalo yamabandla, uNkulunkulu kaIsrayeli: Khangelani, ngizakwehlisela kulumuzi lakuyo yonke imizana yawo konke okubi engikutshiloyo ngawo, ngoba benze lukhuni intamo yabo,
Kwathi uPashuri wamuzwa uJeremiya eprofetha lezizinto,
uPashuri wasemtshaya uJeremiya umprofethi, wamfaka esitokisini elalingasendlini yeN.
Kwasekusithi ngosuku olulandelayo, uPashuri wamkhupha uJeremiya esitokisini. UJeremiya wasesithi kuye: kayibizanga ibizo lakho ngokuthiuPashuri, kodwa uMagori-Misabibi.

Ngoba itsho njalo iN: Khangela, ngizakwenza ube yinto eyesabekayo kuwe uqobo, lakubo bonke abangane bakho; njalo bazakuwa ngenkemba yezitha zabo, lamehlo enu aza ku bona. Njalo ngizanikela wonke uJuda esandleni senkosi yeBhabhiloni, ezabathumba ibase eBhabhiloni, ibatshaye ngenkemba.
Futhi ngizanikela yonke
Lawe Pashuri, lani lonke bahlali bendlu yakho, lizakuya ekuthunjweni; njalo uzakuya eBhabhiloni, ufele khona, ungcwatshelwe khona, wena labangane bakho bonke, oprofethe kibo amanga.
N, wangiyenga, bonke bayangiklolodela.
Ngoba loba nini ngikhuluma, ngiyakhala, ngimemeze udlakela lencithakalo;
Ngasengisithi: Kangiyikuyikhumbula, kangisayikukhuluma ngebizo layo; kodwa enhliziyweni yami kunjengomlilo ovuthayo ovalelwe emathanjeni ami; ngingeke ngenelise.
Ngoba ngizwile ukuhleba kwabanengi, siphindisele impindiselo yethu kuye.
Kodwa ilami njengeqhawe elesabekayo;
Kodwa, N yamabandla, ohlolayo olungileyo,
Hlabelelani eNni,.
Kaluqalekiswe usuku engazalwa ngalo; usuku umama angizala ngalo kalungabusiswa.
Kaqalekiswe umuntu owaletha izindaba kubaba, esithi: Uzalelwe umntwana wesilisa; emenza athokoze kakhulu.
Njalo lowomuntu kabe njengemizi eyayigenqulayo,
Ngoba ingangibulalanga kwasesiswini; kumbe umama waba lingcwaba lami, lesisu sakhe sakhulelwa kokuphela.
Ngaphumelani esiswini ukuthi insuku zami ziphele ehlazweni?
Ilizwi elafika kuJeremiya livela eNni lapho inkosi uZedekhiya ethuma kuye uPashuri indodana kaMalikiya,, isithi:
Ake usibuzele eNni, ukuze enyuke asuke kithi.
UJeremiya wasesithi kubo: Lizakutsho njalo kuZedekhiya:
Itsho njalo uNkulunkulu kaIsrayeli: Khangelani, ngizaphendulela emuvaizikhali zempi ezisezandleni zenu, elilwa ngazo lenkosi yeBhabhiloni lamaKhaladiya,
Njalo mina ngizakulwa lani ngesandla eseluliweyo, langengalo elamandla,
Njalo ngizatshaya abakhileyo balumuzi, umuntu kanye lesifuyo; bazakufa ngomatshayabhuqe wesifo omkhulu.
Kuthi emva kwalokhu, itsho iN, uZedekhiya
Njalo kulababantu uzakuthi: Itsho njalo IN: Khangelani, ngibeka phambi kwenu indlela yokuphila lendlela yokufa.
Osala kulumuzi uzakufa
Ngoba ngimisile ubuso bami bumelene lalumuzi ngokubi,
Lamayelana lendlu yenkosi yakoJuda, zwanini ilizwi leN:
Wena ndlu kaDavida, itsho njalo IN: Yehlulelani isahlulelo
Khangela, ngimelene lawe, Kumbe ngubani ozangena endaweni zethu zokuhlala?
Kodwa ngizalijezisa njengokwesithelo sezenzo zenu,
Itsho njalo iN: Yehlela e ndl iniyenkosi yakoJuda, ukhulume khona lelilizwi,
uthi: Zwana ilizwi leN, wena nkosi yakoJuda,
Itsho njalo iN: Yenzani isahlulelo lokulunga,
Ngoba uba lisenza linto isibili, khona kuzangena ngamasango alindlu amakhosi lenceku zayo labantu bayo.
Kodwa uba lingawalaleli lamazwi, ngiyafunga ngami,
Ngoba itsho njalo mayelana lendlu yenkosi yakoJuda: UyiGileyadi kimi, inhloko yeLebhanoni;
Ngizakulungisela abachithi,
Lezizwe ezinengi zizadlula kulumuzi, zithi, ngulowo kumakhelwane wakhe: yenzeleni kanje kulumuzi omkhulu?
Khona bazakuthi: Ngenxa yokuthi basidelile isivumelwano seN uNkulunkulu wabo, babasebenzela.
Lingamkhaleli ngoba kasayikubuya kumbe abone ilizwe lokuzalwa kwakhe.
Ngoba itsho njalo mayelana loShaluma indodana kaJosiya, Kasayikubuya lapha;
kodwa uzafela endaweni abamthumbele kuyo, kasayikulibona lelilizwe.
Maye angamniki umvuzo wakhe;
othi: Ngizazakhela indlu enkulu lamakamelo aphezulu abanzi;
Uzabusa yini, ngoba utshisekela ulaka ugqokeimisedari?
Wehlulela udaba lomyanga loswelayo; itsho iN.
Kodwa amehlo akho lenhliziyo yakho kakukho kokunye lekwenzeni udlakela.
Ngakho itsho njalo mayelana loJehoyakhimi indodana kaJosiya, inkosi yakoJuda:
Uzangcwatshwa ngokungcwatshwa kukababhemi, ehudulwa alahlwe ngaphandle kwamasango eJerusalema.
Yenyukela eLebhanoni, umemeze, uphakamise ilizwi lakho eBashani, umemeze useAbarimi,
Ngakhuluma lawe ekonwabeni kwakho, kodwawathi: Kangiyikulalela. Lokhu bekuyindlela yakho kusukela ebutsheni bakho,
Umoya uzakudla bonke abelusi bakho, isibili khona uzakuba lenhloni, uyangeke, ngenxa yobubi bakho bonke.
Wena ohlala eLebhanoni,
Kuphila kwami, kanti bengizakuhluthula kuso,
ngikunikele esandleni sabadinga impilo yakho, ngitsho esandleni sikaNebhukadirezari inkosi yeBhabhiloni, lesandleni samaKhaladiya,
ngikuphosele phandle liye kwelinye ilizwe, elingazalelwanga kulo; njalo lizafela khona.
Kodwa elizweni abaphakamisa umphefumulo wabo ukubuyela kulo, kabayikubuyela kulo.
Lumuntu uKoniya uyisithombe esidelelekayo lesiphahlazekileyo yini?
Lizwe, lizwe, lizwe, zwana ilizwi leN.
Itsho njalo iN: Bhalani lumuntu ukuthikalabantwana, esabusa koJuda.
Maye kubelusi abachitha behlakaza izimvu zedlelo lami! itsho iN.
Ngakho itsho njalo iN, uNkulunkulu kaIsrayeli, imelene labelusi abelusa abantu bami: itsho iN.
Mina-ke ngizabutha insali yezimvu zami
Ngizamisa phezu kwazo abelusi abazazelusa; njalo kazisayikwesaba, kaziyikutshaywa luvalo, kaziyikulahleka, itsho iN.
Khangela, insuku ziyeza,
Ensukwini zalo uJuda uzasindiswa, loIsrayeli ahlale
Ngakho khangela, itsho iN, lapho abangasayikuthi: Kuphila kweN, eyabakhuphula abantwana bakoIsrayeli elizweni leGibhithe.
Kodwa: Kuphila kweN eyakhuphula eyaletha inzalo yendlu kaIsrayeli isuka elizweni lenyakatho lakuwo wonke amazwe engangiyixotshele khona. Njalo bazahlala elizweni lakibo.
Mayelana labaprofethi: Inhliziyo yami yephukile ngaphakathi kwami;
Ngoba ilizwe ligcwele izifebe; lokuhamba kwabo kubi, lamandla abo kawaqondanga.
Ngoba lomprofethi lompristi kabamesabi uNkulunkulu; itsho iN.
Ngakho indlela yabo izakuba kibo njenge zindlelaezitshelelayo itsho iN.
Ngibonile-ke ubuwula kubaprofethi bami uIsrayeli.
Kodwa kubaprofethi beJerusalema ngibonile into eyesabekayo;
Ngakho itsho njalo yamabandla mayelana labaprofethi: ngoba kusukela kubaprofethi beJerusalema ukungamesabi uNkulunkulu kuphumele ilizwe lonke.
Itsho njalo yamabandla: Lingalaleli amazwi abaprofethi abaprofetha kini; balenza libe yize; bakhuluma umbono wenhliziyo yabo, hatshi ovela emlonyeni weN.
Baqhubeka besithi kwabangidelelayo: ithe: Lizakuba lokuthula;
Ngoba ngubani omi kucebo leN, wabona wezwa ilizwi layo? Ngubani oqaphelise ilizwi lakhe, wa li zwa?
Khangela, isivunguzane seN, ulaka luphumile,
Ulaka lweN kaluyikuphenduka,
Kangibathumanga lababaprofethi, kanti bona bagijima; kangikhulumanga labo, kanti bona baprofetha.
Kodwa uba bebemi kucebo lami,
NginguNkulunkulu oseduze yini, itsho iN, njalo hatshi uNkulunkulu okhatshana?
Ukhona yini ongacatsha endaweni ezisithekileyo itsho iN.
Ngizwile ukuthi abaprofethi batheni, abaprofetha amanga ebizweni lami
Koze kube nini kusenhliziyweni yabaprofethi abaprofetha amanga?
abacabanga ukwenza abantu bami bakhohlwe ibizo lami ngamaphupho abo abawalandisa ngulowo umakhelwane wakhe,
Umprofethi olephupho, kalilandise iphupho; lolelizwi lami, kalikhulume ilizwi lami ngeqiniso. Amahlanga ayini lamabele? itsho iN.
Ilizwi lami kalinjalo njengomlilo yini,
Ngakho khangela, ngimelene labaprofethi, itsho iN, abeba amazwi ami, ngulowo kumakhelwane wakhe.
Khangela, ngimelene labaprofethi, itsho iN, abasebenzisa ulimi lwabo, bathi: Ithi.
Khangela, ngimelene labaprofetha amaphupho amanga, ngingabalayanga; ngakho kabayikubasiza ngitsho ngalutho lababantu, itsho iN.
Lalapho lababantu, loba umprofethi, kumbe umpristi, itsho iN.
Mayelana lomprofethi, lompristi, labantu, ngizamjezisa lalowomuntu lendlu yakhe.
Lizakhuluma ngalindlela, ngulowo kumakhelwane wakhe, langulowo kumfowabo: iphendule yathi ni? Lokuthi: ikhulumeni?
Kodwa umthwalo weN kalisayikukhuluma ngawo. Ngoba ilizwi langulowo lalowomuntu lizakuba ngumthwalo wakhe, ngoba liwahlanekele amazwi kaNkulunkulu ophilayo, yamabandla, uNkulunkulu wethu.
Uzakutsho ngokunjalo kumprofethi: ikuphenduleni? njalo: ikhulumeni?
Kodwa uba lisithi: Umthwalo weN; ngakho itsho njalo iN: Ngoba likhuluma lamazwi okuthi: Umthwalo weN; njalo ngithumele kini ngisithi: Lingabokuthi: Umthwalo weN;
ngakho khangelani, mina ngizalikhohlwa ngokupheleleyo, lisuke ebusweni bami.
Njalo ngizabeka phezu kwenu ihlazo elilaphakade lokuyangeka okulaphakade, okungayikukhohlakala.
yangenza ngibone, wabasusa eJerusalema, wabasa eBhabhiloni.
Esinye isitsha sasile mikhiwa emihle kakhulu njengemikhiwa evuthwe kuqala; eyayingeke idliwe ngenxa yobubi bayo.
yasisithi kimi: Ubonani, Jeremiya? Ngasengisithi: Imikhiwa, imikhiwa emihle, emihle kakhulu; lemibi, emibi kakhulu, engeke idliwe ngenxa yobubi bayo.
Lafika kimi futhi ilizwi leN lisithi:
Itsho njalo iN, uNkulunkulu kaIsrayeli: Njengalimikhiwa emihle, ngokunjalo ngizananzelela abathunjiweyo bakoJuda, engibaxotshe ngabasusa kulindawo ngabasaelizweni lamaKhaladiya,
Ngoba ngizabeka ilihlo lami phezu kwabo
Njalo ngizabanika inhliziyo yokuthi bangazi mina,
Kodwa njengemikhiwa emibi engeke idliwe ngenxa yobubi bayo,
ngibanikele babe yinto eyesabekayo, babe yibubi, kuyo yonke imibuso yomhlaba, kuzo zonke indawo engizabaxotshela khona.
Njalo ngizathumela baze baqedwe basuke elizweni engalinika bona laboyise.
Ilizwi elafika kuJeremiya mayelana labantu bonke bakoJuda, ngomnyaka wesine kaJehoyakhimi indodana kaJosiya, inkosi yakoJuda (kwakungumnyaka wokuqala kaNebhukadirezari, inkosi yeBhabhiloni),
alikhulumayo uJeremiya umprofethi kubo bonke abantu bakoJuda, lakubo bonke abahlali beJerusalema, esithi:
Kusukela emnyakeni wetshumi lantathu kaJosiya, indodana kaAmoni, inkosi yakoJuda,
Futhi ithumile kini zonke izinceku zayo, abaprofethi, ivuka ngovivi i ba thuma;
besithi: Phendukani khathesi ngulowo lalowo
njalo lingalandeli abanye onkulunkulu ukubasebenzela lokubakhonza, khona ngingayikulenzela okubi.
Kodwa kalingilalelanga, itsho iN, ukuze lingithukuthelise
Ngakho itsho njalo yamabandla: Ngenxa yokuthi lingawalalelanga amazwi ami,
khangela, ngizathuma, ngilande zonke izinsapho zenyakatho, babe zincithakalo ezilaphakade.
Futhi ngizaphelisa ngisuse kubo ilizwi lentokozo lelizwi lenjabulo, ilizwi lomyeni lelizwi likamakoti,
Lelizwe lonke leli lizakuba lunxiwa
Kuzakuthi-ke iminyaka engamatshumi ayisikhombisa isiphelele
Ngehlisele phezu kwalelolizwe wonke amazwi ami engawakhuluma ngimelene lalo, konke okubhaliweyo kulolugwalo, uJeremiya akuprofethayo ngazo zonke izizwe.
Ngoba izizwe ezinengi lanjengokomsebenzi wezandla zabo.
Ngoba itsho njalo uNkulunkulu kaIsrayeli kimi: Thatha inkezo yewayini yalolulaka esandleni sami, wenze zonke izizwe engikuthuma kuzo ziyinathe.
Njalo zizanatha,
Ngasengithatha inkezo esandleni seN, nganathisa zonke izizwe eyayingithume kizo,
iJerusalema, lemizi yakoJuda, lamakhosi ayo, leziphathamandla zayo, ukubenza babe yincithakalo, njengalamuhla;
uFaro inkosi yeGibhithe, lezinceku zakhe, leziphathamandla zakhe, labantu bakhe bonke;
labo bonke abaxubeneyo,
iEdoma,
lawo wonke amakhosi eTire,
iDedani, labo bonke abaqunywe ezingonsini;
lamakhosi wonke
lamakhosi wonke eZimri,
lawo wonke amakhosi enyakatho,
Ubususithi kibo: Itsho njalo yamabandla, uNkulunkulu kaIsrayeli: Nathani
Kuzakuthi-ke lapho besala ukuthatha inkezo esandleni sakho ukuthi banathe,
Ngoba khangela, ngiyaqala ukwenza okubi emzini obizwa ngebizo lami, itsho yamabandla.
Wena-ke profetha wonke lamazwi umelene labo, uthi kubo: izabhonga iphezulu, imelene labo bonke abakhileyo bomhlaba.
Umsindo uzafika emkhawulweni womhlaba; abakhohlakeleyo izabanikela enkembeni, itsho iN.
Itsho njalo yamabandla: Khangela, ububi buzaphuma esizweni busiya esizweni, lesivunguzane esikhulu
Langalolosuku ababuleweyo beN bazasukela ko munyeumkhawulo womhlaba baze bafike ko munyeumkhawulo;
Qhinqani isililo, zikhulu zomhlambi; ngoba izinsuku zokuhlatshwa lezokuhlakazeka kwenu zigcwalisekile, njalo lizakuwa njengesitsha esiloyisekayo.
Lokubaleka kuzaphela kubelusi, lokuphunyuka kuzikhulu zomhlambi.
Kuzakubalelizwi lokukhala kwabelusi lokuqhinqa isililo kwezikhulu zomhlambi; ngoba izachitha idlelo labo.
Lezibaya ezilokuthula
Itshiyile ubhalu lwayo
Ekuqaleni kokubusa kukaJehoyakhimi indodana kaJosiya inkosi yakoJuda kwafika lelilizwi livela eNni lisithi:
Itsho njalo iN: Mana egumeni lendlu yeN,
Mhlawumbe bazalalela,
Uzakuthi-ke kibo: Itsho njalo IN: Uba lingayikungilalela, ukuthi lihambe ngomlayo wami engiwubeka phambi kwenu,
ukuthi lilalele amazwi enceku zami abaprofethi
ngizakwenza-ke lindlu ibe njengeShilo,
Ngakho abapristi labaprofethi labo bonke abantu bamuzwa uJeremiya ekhuluma lamazwi endlini yeN.
Kwathi uJeremiya eseqedile ukukhuluma konke eyayi m laye ukuthi akukhulume ebantwini bonke, abapristi labaprofethi labo bonke abantu bambamba besithi: Uzakufa lokufa!
Kungani uprofetha ngebizo leN usithi: Lindlu izakuba njengeShilo, Bonke abantu basebembuthanela uJeremiya endlini yeN.
Kwathi iziphathamandla zakoJuda sezizwile lezizinto, zenyuka zivela endlini yenkosi zafikaendlini yeN, zahlala emnyango wesango elitsha le ndlu y eN.
Abapristi labaprofethi basebekhuluma kuzo iziphathamandla lakubo bonke abantu besithi: Umuntu lo ufanele isigwebo sokufa, ngoba uprofethe emelene lalumuzi, njengoba lizwile ngendlebe zenu.
Wasekhuluma uJeremiya kuzo zonke iziphathamandla lakubo bonke abantu esithi: yangithuma ukuprofetha ngimelene lalindlu ngimelene lalumuzi wonke amazwi eliwezwileyo.
Ngakho-ke lungisani indlela zenu lezenzo zenu,
Kodwa mina, khangela, ngisesandleni senu;

Kodwa yazini isibili ukuthi uba lingibulala, isibili lizakwehlisela igazi elingelacala phezu kwenu laphezu kwalumuzi laphezu kwabakhileyo bawo; ngoba ngeqiniso ingithume kini ukuthi ngikhulume wonke la amazwi endlebeni zenu.
Iziphathamandla labo bonke abantu basebesithi kubapristi lakubaprofethi: Lumuntu kafanele isigwebo sokufa, ngoba ukhulumile kithi ebizweni leN uNkulunkulu wethu.
Kwasekusukuma abanye bakhuluma kulo lonke ibandla labantu, besithi:
UMika umMorashethi waprofetha ensukwini zikaHezekhiya inkosi yakoJuda, leJerusalema ibe zinqumbi, lentaba yendlu ibe zindawo eziphakemeyo zegusu.
UHezekhiya inkosi yakoJuda layo wonke uJuda bambulala isibili yini? Kayesabanga yini iN,
Kwakukhona njalo umuntu owaprofetha ebizweni leN, uUriya indodana kaShemaya oweKiriyathi-Jeyarimi, owaprofetha ngalumuzi langalelilizwe njengokwamazwi wonke kaJeremiya.
Kwathi inkosi uJehoyakhimi lawo wonke amaqhawe akhe lazo zonke iziphathamandla zakhe besizwa amazwi akhe, inkosi yadinga ukumbulala; kwathi uUriya ekuzwa, wesaba, wabaleka, waya eGibhithe.
Inkosi uJehoyakhimi yasithuma amadoda eGibhithe, uElinathani la manyeamadoda kanye laye eGibhithe,
basebemkhipha uUriya eGibhithe, bamletha enkosini uJehoyakhimi, owambulala ngenkemba, waphosela isidumbu sakhe emangcwabeni abantwana babantu.
Kodwa isandla sikaAhikhamu sasiloJeremiya, ukuze bangamnikeli esandleni sabantu ukuthi bambulale.
Ekuqaleni kokubusa kwafika lelilizwi kuJeremiya livela eNni, lisithi:
Itsho njalo kimi: Zenzele imichilo ukugaxe entanyeni yakho,
ukuthumele enkosini yeEdoma
uzilaye ukuthi zithi emakhosini azo: Itsho njalo N yamabandla, uNkulunkulu kaIsrayeli: Lizakutsho njalo emakhosini enu:
Mina ngenze umhlaba,
Khathesi mina sengiwanikele wonke lamazwe esandleni sikaNebhukadinezari inkosi yeBhabhiloni inceku yami;
Lezizwe zonke zizasebenzela yena,

Kuzakuthi-ke isizwe lombuso okungayikumsebenzela yena, uNebhukadinezari inkosi yeBhabhiloni, lokungayikubeka intamo yakho ngaphansi kwejogwe lenkosi yeBhabhiloni, langendlala langomatshayabhuqe wesifo, ngize ngikuqede ngesandla sakhe.
Lina-ke lingabalaleli abaprofethi benu
Ngoba baprofetha amanga kini, ukuze balisuse liye khatshana lelizwe lakini, lokuze ngilixotshe liphume, libhubhe.
Kodwa isizwe esizangenisa intamo yaso ngaphansi kwejogwe lenkosi yeBhabhiloni, siyisebenzele, ngizasiyekela elizweni laso, itsho iN, ukuthi silisebenze, sihlale kulo.
Ngakhuluma lakuZedekhiya inkosi yakoJuda
Lizafelani, wena labantu bakho,
Ngakho lingawalaleli amazwi abaprofethi abakhuluma kini besithi: Kaliyikuyisebenzela inkosi yeBhabhiloni;
Ngoba kangibathumanga, itsho iN, kodwa baprofetha amanga ngebizo lami, libhubhe, lina labaprofethi abaprofetha kini.
Ngasengikhuluma kubapristi lakulababantu bonke, ngisithi: Itsho njalo IN: Lingawalaleli amazwi abaprofethi benu abaprofetha kini besithi:
Lingabalaleli; sebenzelani inkosi yeBhabhiloni,
Kodwa uba bengabaprofethi, njalo uba ilizwi leN likubo, khathesi kabayincenge yamabandla,
Ngoba itsho njalo yamabandla mayelana lezinsika, langensali yezitsha ezisele kulumuzi,
uNebhukadinezari inkosi yeBhabhiloni angazithathanga, ekuthumbeni kwakhe uJekoniya indodana kaJehoyakhimi inkosi yakoJuda eJerusalema emusa eBhabhiloni, lazo zonke izikhulu zakoJuda leJerusalema;
yebo, itsho njalo yamabandla uNkulunkulu kaIsrayeli mayelana lezitsha eziseleyo endlini kaJehova lendlini yenkosi yakoJuda leJerusalema:
Zizasiwa eBhabhiloni,
Kwasekusithi ngalowomnyaka, wakhuluma kimi endlini yeN emehlweni abapristi labantu bonke, esithi:
Itsho njalo yamabandla, uNkulunkulu kaIsrayeli, isithi: Ngilephulile ijogwe lenkosi yeBhabhiloni.
Kusesephakathi kweminyaka emibili yezinsuku ngizabuyisela kulindawo uNebhukadinezari inkosi yeBhabhiloni azisusa kulindawo wazisa eBhabhiloni.
Futhi uJekoniya indodana kaJehoyakhimi inkosi yakoJuda, labo bonke abathunjwa bakoJuda, abaya eBhabhiloni, ngiza ba buyisela kulindawo, itsho iN; ngoba ngizalephula ijogwe lenkosi yeBhabhiloni.
Wasekhuluma uJeremiya umprofethi kuHananiya umprofethi emehlweni abapristi lemehlweni abantu bonke ababemi endlini yeN;
uJeremiya umprofethi wasesithi: Ameni! kayenze njalo, kayiqinise amazwi akho owaprofethileyo, ukuthi ibuyise izitsha zendlu yeN, labo bonke abathunjwa, kusuke eBhabhiloni kuze kulindawo.
Kodwa ake uzwe lelilizwi engilikhuluma endlebeni zakho lendlebeni zabo bonke abantu:
Abaprofethi ababephambi kwami lababephambi kwakho kwasendulo baprofetha bemelene lamazwe amanengi bemelene lemibuso emikhulu, ngempi langobubi langomatshayabhuqe wesifo.
Umprofethi oprofetha lapho ilizwi lomprofethi selifikile, lowomprofethi uzakwaziwa ukuthi imthumile ngeqiniso.
Umprofethi uHananiya waselisusa ijogwe entanyeni kaJeremiya umprofethi, walephula.
UHananiya wasekhuluma emehlweni abantu bonke esithi: Itsho njalo iN: Ngokunjalo ngizalephula ijogwe likaNebhukadinezari inkosi yeBhabhiloni UJeremiya umprofethi wasehamba ngendlela yakhe.
Laselifika ilizwi leN kuJeremiya, emva kokuthi uHananiya umprofethi esephulile ijogwe elisusa entanyeni kaJeremiya umprofethi, lisithi:
Hamba u ye tshela uHananiya usithi: Itsho njalo iN: Wephulile amajogwe esigodo; kodwa uzawenza amajogwe ensimbi endaweni yawo.
Ngoba itsho njalo yamabandla, uNkulunkulu kaIsrayeli: Ngigaxile ijogwe lensimbi
UJeremiya umprofethi wasesithi kuHananiya umprofethi: Ake uzwe, Hananiya; kayikuthumanga,
Ngakho itsho njalo iN: Khangela, ngizakuxotsha ebusweni bomhlaba; lonyaka uzakufa, ngoba ukhulumile ukuhlamuka umelene leN.
Wafa-ke uHananiya umprofethi ngalowomnyaka ngenyanga yesikhombisa.

La-ke ngamazwi encwadi ayithumelayo uJeremiya umprofethi ivela eJerusalema isiya kunsali yabadala babathunjiweyo lakubaprofethi lebantwini bonke ayebathumbile uNebhukadinezari besuka eJerusalema wabasa eBhabhiloni
(emva kokuphuma kukaJekoniya inkosi, besuka eJerusalema),
ngesandla sikaElasa indodana kaShafani, isithi:
Itsho njalo yamabandla, uNkulunkulu kaIsrayeli, kibo bonke abathunjiweyo engabenza bathunjwa besuswa eJerusalema basiwa eBhabhiloni:
Yakhani izindlu, lihlale kizo, lihlanyele izivande, lidle izithelo zazo;
lithathe abafazi, lizale amadodana lamadodakazi, lithathele amadodana enu abafazi, lendise amadodakazi enu emadodeni, ukuze azale amadodana lamadodakazi, lande khona, linganciphi.
Lidinge ukuthula komuzi lapho engilithumbele khona, liwukhulekele eNni; ngoba ekuthuleni kwawo lizakuba lokuthula.
Ngoba itsho njalo yamabandla, uNkulunkulu kaIsrayeli: Akuthi abaprofethi benu labavumisi benu
ngoba baprofetha amanga kini ngebizo lami; itsho iN.
Ngoba itsho njalo iN: Qiniso, lapho iminyaka engamatshumi ayisikhombisa isigcwalisekile eBhabhiloni,
Ngoba mina ngiyazi imicabango engiyicabanga ngani, itsho iN, imicabango yokuthula, kayisiyo eyokubi, ukuthi ngilinike isiphetho lokulindelweyo.
Khona lizangibiza liyekhuleka kimi, ngilizwe.
Njalo lizangidinga,
Njalo ngizatholwa yini, itsho iN, ngilibuyise endaweni engalithumba livela khona.
Ngoba litshilo: isivusele abaprofethi eBhabhiloni.
Ngoba utsho njalo uJehova ngenkosi ehlezi esihlalweni sobukhosi sikaDavida langabo bonke abantu abahlala kulumuzi, abafowenu abangaphumelanga ekuthunjweni kanye lani:
Itsho njalo yamabandla: Khangelani, ngizathumela phakathi kwabo inkemba, indlala, lomatshayabhuqe wesifo,
Ngixotshane labo ngenkemba, ngendlala, langomatshayabhuqe wesifo, ngibanikele ukuba yisesabiso kuyo yonke imibuso yomhlaba,
ngenxa yokuthi bengawalalelanga amazwi ami, itsho iN, engawathumela kibo ngenceku zami abaprofethi, ngivuka ngovivi ngi ba thuma, itsho iN.
Lina-ke zwanini ilizwi leN, lina lonke bathunjiweyo, engabathuma besuka eJerusalema besiya eBhabhiloni:

Itsho njalo yamabandla uNkulunkulu kaIsrayeli, mayelana loAhabi indodana kaKolaya, lamayelana loZedekhiya indodana kaMahaseya, abaprofetha amanga kini ngebizo lami: Khangelani, ngizabanikela esandleni sikaNebhukadirezari inkosi yeBhabhiloni, ozababulala phambi kwamehlo enu.
Njalo kuzathathwa kubo
ngenxa yokuthi benze ubuthutha koIsrayeli, bafeba labafazi babomakhelwane babo, itsho iN.
Uzakhuluma kuShemaya umNehelami usithi:
Itsho njalo yamabandla, uNkulunkulu kaIsrayeli, isithi: Ngenxa yokuthi wena uthumele izincwadi ngebizo lakho kubo bonke abantu abaseJerusalema, lakuZefaniya lakubo bonke abapristi, usithi:
isikwenze ube ngumpristi esikhundleni sikaJehoyada umpristi,
Khathesi-ke, kungani ungamkhuzanga uJeremiya umAnathothi
Ngoba ngenxa yalokhu usethumele kithi e Bhabhiloni esithi: Kuzakuba kude; yakhani izindlu, lihlale kizo, lihlanyele izivande, lidle izithelo zazo.
UZefaniya umpristi waseyifunda lincwadi endlebeni zikaJeremiya umprofethi.
Laselifika ilizwi leN kuJeremiya lisithi:
Thumela kubo bonke abathunjiweyo usithi: Itsho njalo ngoShemaya umNehelami: Ngenxa yokuthi uShemaya eprofethe kini, mina-ke ngingamthumanga,
ngakho itsho iN: Khangela, ngizajezisa uShemaya umNehelami kanye lenzalo yakhe; kayikuba lamuntu ozahlala phakathi kwalababantu, angaboni okuhle engizakwenzela abantu bami,
Ilizwi elafika kuJeremiya livela eNni lisithi:
Itsho njalo uNkulunkulu kaIsrayeli, isithi: Zibhalele encwadini wonke amazwi engiwakhulume kuwe.
Ngoba khangela, insuku ziyeza,
Lala ngamazwi eyawakhuluma mayelana loIsrayeli lamayelana loJuda.
Ngoba itsho njalo iN: Sizwile ilizwi lokuthuthumela; kulokwesaba, hatshi ukuthula.
Ake libuze, libone uba indoda ingabeletha yini? Kungani ngibona ngulowo lalowo owesilisa isandla sakhe siphezu kokhalo lwakhe njengowesifazana obelethayo,
Maye! ngoba lukhulu lolosuku, kuyisikhathi sokuhlupheka kukaJakobe, kodwa uzasindiswa kukho.
Kuzakuthi-ke ngalolosuku,
Kodwa bazasebenzela uJehova, uNkulunkulu wabo, loDavida inkosi yabo
Ngakho wena ungesabi,
Ngoba mina ngilawe, itsho iN, ukukusindisa;
Ngoba itsho njalo iN: Ukwaphuka kwakho kakwelapheki,
Kakho owahlulela udaba lwakho, ukuthi abophe isilonda sakho; kawulamithi epholisayo.
Zonke izithandwa zakho zikukhohliwe;
Ukhalelani ngokwephuka kwakho? Usizi lwakho kalwelapheki ngenxa yobunengi besiphambeko sakho; ngizenzile lezizinto kuwe.
Ngakho bonke abakudlayo
Ngoba ngizakwenyusela ukuphila kuwe,
Itsho njalo iN: Khangela, ngizabuyisa ukuthunjwa kwamathente kaJakobe, lesigodlo sizahlala njengomkhuba waso.
Njalo kuzaphuma kubo ukubonga,
Labantwana babo bazakuba njengendulo, lenhlangano yabo izamiswa phambi kwami; njalo ngizajezisa bonke ababacindezelayo.
Lesikhulu sabo sizavela kubo, itsho iN.
Njalo lizakuba ngabantu bami, lami ngibe nguNkulunkulu wenu.
Khangelani isivunguzane seN, ukuvutha kuphumile,
Ukuvutha
Ngalesosikhathi, bona-ke bazakuba ngabantu bami.
Itsho njalo iN: Abantu babaseleyo benkemba bathola umusa enkangala; ngitshouIsrayeli, lapho ngi siyamphumuza.
yabonakala kimi ikhatshana isithi: Yebo, ngikuthandile
Ngizabuya ngikwakhe,
Uzabuya uhlanyele izivini phezu kwezintaba abahlanyeli bazahlanyela, badle izithelo.
Ngoba kuzakuba khona usuku abazamemeza ngaloabalindi entabeni yakoEfrayimi
Ngoba itsho njalo iN: Mhlabeleleni uJakobe nge ntokozo, insali yakoIsrayeli.
Khangelani, ngizabaletha bevela elizweni lenyakatho, abesifazana abakhulelweyo lababelethayo ndawonye; bazabuya lapha belibandla elikhulu.
Bazabuya belokukhala,
Zwanini ilizwi leN, lina zizwe, li li memeze ezihlengeni ezikhatshana, lithi: Yena owachitha uIsrayeli uzambutha,
Ngoba imhlengile uJakobe, yamhlawulela
Ngakho bazakuza bahlabelele ekuphakameni kweZiyoni,
Khona intombi izathokoza ekugideni,
Njalo ngizasuthisa umphefumulo wabapristi ng amanono, labantu bami bazasuthiswa ngokuhle kwami, itsho iN.
Itsho njalo iN: Ilizwi lezwakala
Itsho njalo iN: Bamba ilizwi lakho ekukhaleni, lamehlo akho ezinyembezini; ngoba kulomvuzo womsebenzi wakho, itsho iN, ngoba bazabuya bevela elizweni lesitha.
Kukhona-ke ithemba enzalweni yakho,
Ngizwile lokuzwa uEfrayimi ezililela ngoba uyuNkulunkulu wami.
Isibili emva kokuphenduka kwami,
UEfrayimi uyindodana yami eligugu yini, ungumntwana wami othokozisayo yini? isibili ngizakuba lesihawu kuye, kutsho iN.
Zibekele izitshengiso zendlela, phenduka, ntombi emsulwa yakoIsrayeli, uphendukele kule imizi yakini.
Koze kube nini uzulazula,
Itsho njalo yamabandla, uNkulunkulu kaIsrayeli: Bazabuya batsho lelilizwi elizweni lakoJuda lemizini yakho, lapho ngibuyisela ukuthunjwa kwabo:
Njalo kuzahlala kulo uJuda layo yonke imizi yakhe ndawonye, abalimi labahamba lemihlambi.
Ngoba ngisuthise ngigcwalise wonke umphefumulo ophela amandla.
Ngasengiphaphama, ngabona; lobuthongo bami babumnandi kimi.
Khangela, insuku ziyeza, lenhlanyelo yenyamazana.
Kuzakuthi-ke njengalokho itsho iN.
Ngalezonsuku kabasayikuthi:
Kodwa ngulowo lalowo uzafela ububi bakhe; wonke umuntu odla izithelo zevini ezimunyu, amazinyo akhe azatshelela.
Khangela, lendlu kaIsrayeli lendlu kaJuda;
kungeyisikho njengesivumelwano engasenza laboyise mhla ngibamba isandla sabo itsho iN.
Kodwa yilesi isivumelwano engizasenza lendlu kaIsrayeli labo babe ngabantu bami.
Kabasayikufundisa-ke, ngulowo lalowo umakhelwane wakhe, langulowo lalowo umfowabo, esithi: Yazi iN; ngoba bonke bazangazi,
Itsho njalo iN, enika ilanga libe yikukhanya emini,
Uba lezozimiso
Itsho njalo iN: Uba engalinganiswa amazulu phezulu, ngenxa yakho konke abakwenzileyo, itsho iN.
Khangela, insuku ziyeza,
Lentambo yokulinganisa isezaphuma maqondana layo
Lesihotsha sonke sezidumbu
Ilizwi elafika kuJeremiya livela eNni emnyakeni wetshumi kaZedekhiya, inkosi yakoJuda,
Ngoba ngalesosikhathi ibutho lenkosi yeBhabhiloni layivimbezela iJerusalema; uJeremiya umprofethi wayevalelwe-ke elalisendlini yenkosi yakoJuda.
Ngoba uZedekhiya inkosi yakoJuda wayemvalele esithi: Kungani wena uprofetha usithi: Itsho njalo iN: Khangela, ngiwunikela lumuzi esandleni senkosi yeBhabhiloni,
loZedekhiya inkosi yakoJuda
izakhokhela-ke uZedekhiya imuse eBhabhiloni, kaliyikuphumelela.
UJeremiya wasesithi: Ilizwi leN lafika kimi lisithi:
Khangela, uHanameli indodana kaShaluma
Kwasekufika kimi uHanameli indodana kamalumami, njengokutsho kweN, egumeni lentolongo, eselizweni lakoBhenjamini, ngoba ulelungelo lelifa, ulohlengo; zithengele yona. Ngasengisazi ukuthi yilizwi leN.
Ngasengiyithenga insimu kuHanameli indodana kamalumami, eseAnathothi, eng amashekeli ayisikhombisa lenhlamvu ezilitshumi zesiliva.
Ngasengibhala incwadi, nga yi phawula,
Ngasengithatha incwadi yokuthenga enanyekiweyo njengoko mthetho
nganika incwadi yokuthenga kuBharukhi
Ngasengilaya uBharukhi phambi kwamehlo abo ngisithi:
Itsho njalo yamabandla, uNkulunkulu kaIsrayeli: Thatha lezizincwadi, le incwadi yokuthenga, zombili enanyekiweyo uzifake embizeni yebumba, ukuze zihlale insuku ezinengi.
Ngoba itsho njalo yamabandla, uNkulunkulu kaIsrayeli: Kuzabuya kuthengwe izindlu lamasimu lezivini
Ngasengikhuleka eNni, senginike uBharukhi indodana kaNeriya ngisithi:
Hawu Nkosi Jehova! Khangela, nguwe owenze amazulu lomhlaba
owenza uthandolomusa kwabayizinkulungwane,
omkhulu ngeseluleko, lanjengesithelo sezenzo zakhe;
owamisa izibonakaliso lezimangaliso elizweni leGibhithe, njengalamuhla.
Wabakhupha abantu bakho uIsrayeli elizweni leGibhithe ngezibonakaliso,
wabanika lelilizwe, owafunga kuboyise ukubanika lona,
Basebengena badla ilifa lalo, kodwa kabalilalelanga ilizwi lakho, kabahambanga ngomlayo wakho, kabakwenzanga konke owabalaya khona ukuthi bakwenze; ngakho ubehlisele bonke lobububi.
Khangela amadundulu; afikile emzini ukuwuthumba, lomuzi unikelwe esandleni samaKhaladiya lalokho owakukhulumayo kwenzakele; khangela-ke, uya ku bona.
Kanti, wena Nkosi Jehova, uthe kimi: Zithengele insimu ngemali,
Laselifika ilizwi leN kuJeremiya lisithi:
Khangela, ngiyiN, uNkulunkulu wayo yonke inyama;
Ngakho itsho njalo iN: Khangela, ngiwunikela lumuzi esandleni samaKhaladiya, lesandleni sikaNebhukadirezari inkosi yeBhabhiloni, ozawuthumba.
LamaKhaladiya alwa emelene lalumuzi azangena, awuthungele lumuzi ngomlilo, awutshise kanye lezindlu
Ngoba abantwana bakoIsrayeli labantwana bakoJuda bebesenza okubi kuphela emehlweni ami, kusukela ebutsheni babo; itsho iN.
Ngoba lumuzi ubukimi ngokolaka lwami langokwentukuthelo yami, kusukela ngosuku abawakha ngalo kuze kube lamuhla, ukuze ngiwususe ebusweni bami;

ngenxa yabo bonke ububi babantwana bakoIsrayeli lobabantwana bakoJuda abakwenzayo ukungithukuthelisa, amakhosi abo, iziphathamandla zabo, abapristi babo, labaprofethi babo, labantu bakoJuda, labahlali beJerusalema.
Basebengiphendulela umhlana,
Kodwa bamisa izinengiso zabo endlini,
Basebesakha indawo eziphakemeyo zikaBhali
Khathesi-ke, ngakho itsho njalo iN, uNkulunkulu kaIsrayeli, mayelana lomuzi lo elithi ngawo: Unikelwe esandleni senkosi yeBhabhiloni
Khangelani, ngizabaqoqa bevela emazweni wonke
Yebo, bazakuba ngabantu bami, lami ngibe nguNkulunkulu wabo.
Ngizabanika inhliziyonye lakubantwana babo emva kwabo.
Njalo ngizakwenza labo isivumelwano esilaphakade, ukuze bangaphenduki basuke kimi.
Yebo, ngizathokoza ngabo ukubenzela okuhle,
Ngoba itsho njalo iN: Njengoba ngehlisele phezu kwalababantu bonke lobububi obukhulu,
Amasimu azathengwa-ke kulelilizwe
Bazathenga amasimu ngemali, babhale izincwadi, itsho iN.
Ilizwi leN laselifika kuJeremiya ngokwesibili, esavalelwe egumeni lentolongo, lisithi:
Itsho njalo iN, ekwenzayo,
Ngibiza, ngikuphendule,
Ngoba itsho njalo iN, uNkulunkulu wakoIsrayeli, ngezindlu zalumuzi langezindlu zamakhosi akoJuda, ezidilizelwe phansi ukuba ngamadundulu langenxa yenkemba:
Beza ukulwa lamaKhaladiya,
Khangela, ngizawandisela impilo enhle lokusiliswa; ngibembulele ukwanda kokuthula leqiniso.
Ngizabuyisa ukuthunjwa kukaJuda lokuthunjwa kukaIsrayeli,
Ngibahlambulule kubo bonke ububi babo abona ngabo kimi, abona ngazo kimi labaphambeka ngazo kimi.
Njalo kuzakuba kimi libizo lenjabulo,
Itsho njalo iN: Kuzabuya kuzwakale kulindawo, elithi ngayo, ilunxiwa, engelamuntu lengelanyamazana,
ilizwi lokuthaba, lelizwi lentokozo, itsho iN.
Itsho njalo yamabandla: Kule indawo elunxiwa engelamuntu kuze kube senyamazaneni,
Emizini yentabeni, itsho iN.
Khangela, insuku ziyeza,
Ngalezonsuku langalesosikhathi ngizahlumisela uDavida iHlumela elilungileyo; njalo uzakwenza isahlulelo lokulunga elizweni.
Ngalezonsuku uJuda uzasindiswa, leJerusalema ihlale ivikelekile. Njalo yileli ibizoelizabizwa ngalo: ukulunga kwethu.
Ngoba itsho njalo iN: Kakuyikuqunywa muntu kuDavida
Njalo kakuyikuqunywa muntu kubapristi, amaLevi, ebusweni bami, enze umhlatshelo insuku zonke.
Ilizwi leN laselifika kuJeremiya lisithi:
Itsho njalo iN: Uba lingasephula isivumelwano sami semini lesivumelwano sami sobusuku, ukuze kungabi khona imini lobusuku ngesikhathi sakho,
khona sizakwephulwa isivumelwano sami loDavida inceku yami,
Njengoba ibutho lamazulu lingebalwe, ngokunjalo ngizakwandisa inzalo kaDavida inceku yami lamaLevi angikhonzayo.
Ilizwi leN laselifika kuJeremiya lisithi:
Kawubonanga yini abakutshoyo lababantu besithi: Izinsapho ezimbili ebizikhethile izilahlile?
Itsho njalo iN: Uba isivumelwano sami singeyisiso esemini lesebusuku,
khona ngizayala inzalo kaJakobe lekaDavida inceku yami,
Ilizwi elafika kuJeremiya livela eNni, lapho uNebhukadinezari inkosi yeBhabhiloni, lazo zonke izizwe, babesilwa bemelene leJerusalema bemelene layo yonke imizi yayo, lisithi:
Itsho njalo iN, uNkulunkulu kaIsrayeli: Hamba ukhulume kuZedekhiya inkosi yakoJuda
Lawe kawuyikuphunyuka esandleni sayo,
Kodwa zwana ilizwi leN, Zedekhiya, nkosi yakoJuda: Itsho njalo ngawe: Kawuyikufa ngenkemba.
Uzakufa ngokuthula, besithi: Maye inkosi! Ngoba mina ngilikhulumile lelolizwi, itsho iN.
UJeremiya umprofethi wasewakhuluma wonke lamazwi kuZedekhiya inkosi yakoJuda eJerusalema,
lapho ibutho lenkosi yeBhabhiloni lisilwa limelene leJerusalema limelene layo yonke imizi yakoJuda eyayisele, limelene leLakishi
Ilizwi elafika kuJeremiya livela eNni, emva kokuthi inkosi uZedekhiya esenzile isivumelwano labo bonke abantu ababeseJerusalema ukumemezela inkululeko kubo,
ukuthi ngulowo lalowo ayekele isigqili sakhe

Kwasekulalela zonke iziphathamandla labo bonke abantu ababengene lesosivumelwano sokuthi ngulowo lalowo ayekele isigqili sakhe langulowo lalowo isigqilikazi sakhe sihambe sikhululekile, bangaphindi bazenze zibe yizigqili; basebelalela, ba zi yekela za hamba.
Kodwa emva kwalokho baphenduka, bazehlisela phansi zaba yizigqili lezigqilikazi.
Ngakho ilizwi leN lafika kuJeremiya livela eNni, lisithi:
Itsho njalo iN, uNkulunkulu kaIsrayeli: Mina ngenza isivumelwano laboyihlo mhla ngibakhupha elizweni leGibhithe, endlini yobugqili, ngisithi:
Ekupheleni
Lina seliphendukile lamuhla, lenza okulungileyo emehlweni ami, limemezela inkululeko, ngulowo lalowo kumakhelwane wakhe,
Kodwa liphendukile, langcolisa ibizo lami, lazehlisela phansi, zaba yizigqili lezigqilikazi zenu.
Ngakho itsho njalo iN: Lina kalingilalelanga, ukumemezela inkululeko,
Nginikele amadoda aseqileyo isivumelwano sami, angaqinisanga amazwi esivumelwano asenza phambi kwami, adlula phakathi kweziqa zalo;
iziphathamandla zakoJuda, leziphathamandla zeJerusalema, abathenwa, kweziqa zethole.
Yebo, ngizabanikela esandleni sezitha zabo lesandleni salabo abadinga impilo yabo;
LoZedekhiya inkosi yakoJuda leziphathamandla zakhe ngizabanikela esandleni sezitha zabo, lesandleni salabo abadinga impilo yabo,
Khangelani, ngizalaya,
Ilizwi elafika kuJeremiya livela eNni ensukwini zikaJehoyakhimi indodana kaJosiya, inkosi yakoJuda, lisithi:
Yana endlini yamaRekabi, uwanathise iwayini.
Ngasengithatha uJahazaniya, indodana kaJeremiya, indodana kaHabaziniya, labafowabo, lawo wonke amadodana akhe, lendlu yonke yamaRekabi.
Ngabaletha endlini yeN, ekamelweni lamadodana kaHanani,
Ngasengibeka phambi kwamadodana endlu yamaRekabi izimbiza ezigcwele iwayini, lezinkezo, ngathi kibo: Nathani iwayini.
Kodwa bathi: Kasilinathi iwayini, ngoba uJonadabi, indodana kaRekabi, ubaba, wasilaya esithi: Linganathi iwayini, lina labantwana benu, kuze kube nininini.

Njalo lingakhi izindlu, lingahlanyeli inhlanyelo, lingahlanyeli izivini, lingabi lazo; kodwa lihlale emathenteni zonke insuku zenu, ukuze liphile insuku ezinengi ebusweni bomhlaba lapho elihlala khona njengabezizwe.
Ngakho salilalela ilizwi likaJonadabi, indodana kaRekabi, ubaba, kukho konke asilaya ngakho, ukuthi singanathi iwayini zonke insuku zethu, thina, omkethu, amadodana ethu, lamadodakazi ethu;
lokuthi singakhi izindlu zokuhlala kwethu; njalo singabi lesivini kumbe insimu kumbe inhlanyelo;
kodwa sihlala emathenteni, silalele senze njengakho konke uJonadabi ubaba asilaya khona.
Kodwa kwathi lapho uNebhukadirezari inkosi yeBhabhiloni
Laselifika ilizwi leN kuJeremiya lisithi:
Itsho njalo yamabandla, uNkulunkulu kaIsrayeli: Hamba uthi ebantwini bakoJuda lakwabahlali beJerusalema: Kaliyikwemukela yini ukulaywa ukuthi lilalele amazwi ami? itsho iN.

Aqiniswa amazwi kaJonadabi, indodana kaRekabi, awalaya abantwana bakhe ukuthi banganathi iwayini; ngoba kaba li nathanga kuze kube lamuhla, ngoba bawulalele umlayo kayise. Lami ngikhulumile kini ngivuke ngovivi ngikhuluma, kodwa kalingilalelanga.
Futhi ngithume kini zonke inceku zami abaprofethi, kalilalelanga kimi.
Ngoba amadodana kaJonadabi, indodana kaRekabi, awuqinisile umlayo kayise awalaya wona, kodwa lababantu kabangilaleli,

ngakho itsho njalo iN, uNkulunkulu wamabandla, uNkulunkulu kaIsrayeli: Khangelani, ngizakwehlisela phezu kukaJuda laphezu kwabakhileyo bonke beJerusalema bonke ububi engibukhulume ngabo; ngoba ngikhulumile kibo, kodwa kabalalelanga, ngibabizile, kodwa kabaphendulanga.

Lakuyo indlu yamaRekabi uJeremiya wathi: Itsho njalo yamabandla, uNkulunkulu kaIsrayeli: Ngenxa yokuthi lilalele umlayo kaJonadabi uyihlo, lagcina yonke imilayo yakhe, lenza njengakho konke alilaya khona,
ngakho itsho njalo yamabandla, uNkulunkulu kaIsrayeli: Kakuyikuqunywa muntu kuJonadabi indodana kaRekabi oma phambi kwami insuku zonke.
Kwasekusithi ngomnyaka wesine kaJehoyakhimi, indodana kaJosiya, inkosi yakoJuda, lelilizwi lafika kuJeremiya livela eNni, lisithi:
Zithathele umqulu wogwalo, kuze kube lamuhla.
Mhlawumbe abendlu kaJuda bazakuzwa bonke ububi engicabanga ukubenza kubo;
UJeremiya wasebiza uBharukhi indodana kaNeriya;
UJeremiya waselaya uBharukhi esithi: Ngivinjelwe, kangilakungena endlini yeN.

Ngakho hamba wena, ufunde emqulwini owubhalileyo, kuvela emlonyeni wami, amazwi eN endlebeni zabantu endlini yeN ngosuku lokuzila ukudla; uwafunde futhi endlebeni zakhe wonke uJuda abavela emizini yabo.
Mhlawumbe ukuncenga kwabo kuzakuwa phambi kweN, ngoba lukhulu ulaka lentukuthelo ekukhulume kulababantu.
UBharukhi indodana kaNeriya wasesenza njengakho konke uJeremiya umprofethi ayemlaye khona, efunda egwalweni amazwi eN e ndli niyeN.
Kwasekuthi emnyakeni wesihlanu kaJehoyakhimi, indodana kaJosiya, inkosi yakoJuda, ngenyanga yesificamunwemunye, bamemezela labantu bonke abavela emizini yakoJuda eJerusalema.
UBharukhi wasefunda egwalweni amazwi kaJeremiya e ndli niyeN, ekamelweni likaGemariya, endlebeni zabantu bonke.
UMikhaya, indodana kaGemariya, indodana kaShafani, wasesizwa wonke amazwi eN avela kulolugwalo,
wehlela endlini yenkosi, ekamelweni lombhali; leziphathamandla zonke.
UMikhaya wasebatshela wonke amazwi ayewezwile, lapho uBharukhi efunda egwalweni endlebeni zabantu.

Zonke iziphathamandla zasezithuma uJehudi, indodana kaNethaniya, indodana kaShelemiya, indodana kaKushi, kuBharukhi, zisithi: Umqulu ofunde kuwo endlebeni zabantu, uthathe ngesandla sakho uze. Ngakho uBharukhi indodana kaNeriya wathatha umqulu ngesandla sakhe, waya kuzo.
Zasezisithi kuye: Ake uhlale phansi, uwufunde endlebeni zethu. UBharukhi wasefunda endlebeni zazo.
Kwasekusithi sezizwile wonke amazwi, zethukile, ngulowo lalowo ekhangelekumakhelwane wakhe, zathi kuBharukhi: Sizayitshela isibili inkosi wonke amazwi la.
Zasezimbuza uBharukhi zisithi: Ake usitshele, wawabhala njani wonke lamazwi emlonyeni wakhe?
UBharukhi wasesithi kuzo: Wangifundela wonke lamazwi evela emlonyeni wakhe, nga wa bhala egwalweni ngeyinki.
Iziphathamandla zasezisithi kuBharukhi: Hamba ucatshe, wena loJeremiya, kakungabi lamuntu owaziyo lapho elikhona.
Zasezingena enkosini egumeni, kodwa umqulu zawubeka ekamelweni likaElishama umbhali; zakhuluma wonke amazwi endlebeni zenkosi.
Inkosi yasithuma uJehudi ukuthi awulande umqulu; wasewuthatha ekamelweni likaElishama umbhali;
Inkosi yayihlezi-ke endlini yobusika umlilowawuvutha embawuleni phambi kwayo.
Kwasekusithi lapho uJehudi esefundile amakhasi amathathu loba amane, yawasika ngengqamu yombhali, yawaphosela emlilweni osembawuleni, waze watsha waphela umqulu wonke emlilweni osembawuleni.
Kodwa kabesabanga, inkosi lenceku zayo zonke, abawezwayo wonke lamazwi.
Loba kunjalo labo oElinathani loDelaya loGemariya kodwa kayibalalelanga.
Kodwa inkosi yalaya uJerameli indodana yenkosi, loSeraya indodana kaAziriyeli, loShelemiya indodana kaAbideli, kodwa yabafihla.
Ilizwi leN laselifika kuJeremiya emva kokuthi inkosi isiwutshisile umqulu lamazwi uBharukhi ayewabhalile evela emlonyeni kaJeremiya, lisithi:
Zithathele futhi omunye umqulu, ubhale kuwo wonke amazwi okuqala ayesemqulwini wokuqala, uJehoyakhimi inkosi yakoJuda eyawatshisayo.

Njalo uzakuthi kuJehoyakhimi inkosi yakoJuda: Itsho njalo iN: Wena utshisile lumqulu, usithi: Ubhaleleni kiwo usithi: Inkosi yeBhabhiloni izafika isibili, ilichithe lelilizwe, yenze ukuthi kuphele kulo abantu lenyamazana?
Ngakho itsho njalo mayelana loJehoyakhimi inkosi yakoJuda: Kayikuba la muntu kwemini lekuqandeni kobusuku.
Ngizamjezisa-ke yena, lenzalo yakhe, lenceku zakhe, ububi babo; ngehlisele phezu kwabo laphezu kwabahlali beJerusalema laphezu kwabantu bakoJuda konke okubi engikukhulume kubo, kodwa kabalalelanga.

UJeremiya wasethatha omunye umqulu, wawunika uBharukhi, indodana kaNeriya, umbhali, owabhala kiwo okuvela emlonyeni kaJeremiya wonke amazwi ogwalo uJehoyakhimi inkosi yakoJuda eyalutshisayo ngomlilo; kwengezelelwa-ke kiwo amanye amazwi amanengi afanana lawo.
Inkosi uZedekhiya indodana kaJosiya
Kodwa kawalalelanga, yena labantu belizwe, amazwi eN eyayiwakhulume ngesandla sikaJeremiya umprofethi.
Inkosi uZedekhiya yasithuma uJehukali isithi: Ake usikhulekele eNni uNkulunkulu wethu.
UJeremiya wangena-ke waphuma phakathi kwabantu,
Ibutho likaFaro laliphumile-ke eGibhithe;
Laselifika ilizwi leN kuJeremiya umprofethi lisithi:
Itsho njalo iN, uNkulunkulu kaIsrayeli: Lizakutsho njalo enkosini yakoJuda elithume kimi ukungibuza:
AmaKhaladiya azabuya futhi,
Itsho njalo iN: Lingakhohlisi imiphefumulo yenu lisithi: AmaKhaladiya isibili azasuka kithi; ngoba kawayikusuka.
Ngoba loba lilitshaya ibutho lonke lamaKhaladiya alwa emelene lani,
Kwasekusithi ibutho lamaKhaladiya selenyukile lisuka eJerusalema ngenxa yebutho likaFaro,
uJeremiya waphuma eJerusalema ukuya elizweni lakoBhenjamini
Kwasekusithi esesesangweni lakoBhenjamini,
UJeremiya wasesithi: Ngamanga; kangihlubukeli kumaKhaladiya. Kodwa kamlalelanga; ngokunjalo uIriya wambamba uJeremiya, wamletha kuziphathamandla.
Iziphathamandla zasezithukuthela ngoJeremiya, zamtshaya, zamfaka entolongweni, ngoba zaziyenze yaba yintolongo.
UJeremiya esengene endlini yomgodi lezitokisini, uJeremiya esehlale khona insuku ezinengi,
inkosi uZedekhiya yasithuma, yamthatha; inkosi yasimbuza endlini yayo ensitha
UJeremiya wathi futhi enkosini uZedekhiya: Ngoneni kuwe lezincekwini zakho lakulababantu ukuthi lingifake entolongweni?
Bangaphi khathesi abaprofethi benu abaprofetha kini besithi: Inkosi yeBhabhiloni kayiyikufika imelane lani kumbe imelane lalelilizwe?
Khathesi-ke, ake uzwe, nkosi yami, nkosi, kakuthi ukuncenga kwami hlezi ngifele khona.
Ngakho inkosi uZedekhiya yalaya ukuthi bamfake uJeremiya egumeni lentolongo,
UShefathiya indodana kaMathani, loGedaliya indodana kaPashuri, loJukali indodana kaShelemiya,
Itsho njalo iN: Osala kulumuzi uzakufa ngenkemba, ngendlala, langomatshayabhuqe wesifo; ngoba uzakuba lempilo yakhe ibe yimpango, aphile.
Itsho njalo iN: Lumuzi uzanikelwa isibili esandleni sebutho lenkosi yeBhabhiloni,
Iziphathamandla zasezisithi enkosini: Ake abulawe lumuntu, lezandla zabo bonke abantu, ngokukhuluma kibo amazwi anje; ngoba lumuntu kadingi ukuthula kwalababantu, kodwa okubi.
Inkosi uZedekhiya yasisithi: Khangela, usesandleni senu, ngoba inkosi kayilakho okuphambene lani ngalutho.
Basebemthatha uJeremiya, bamphosela emgodini kaMalikiya indodana yenkosi,
Kwathi uEbedimeleki
uEbedimeleki waphuma endlini yenkosi, wakhuluma lenkosi esithi:
Nkosi yami, nkosi, abantu laba benzile okubi ngakho konke abakwenze kuJeremiya umprofethi, abamphosele emgodini, ngoba uzakufa endaweni yakhe
Inkosi yasimlaya uEbedimeleki umEthiyophiya, isithi: Thatha lapha amadoda angamatshumi amathathu ngaphansi kwesandla sakho, umenyule uJeremiya umprofethi emgodini engakafi.
Ngakho uEbedimeleki wathatha amadoda ngaphansi kwesandla sakhe, wazehlisela kuJeremiya emgodini ngamagoda.
UEbedimeleki umEthiyophiya UJeremiya wasesenza njalo.
Basebemdonsa uJeremiya ngamagoda, bamenyula emgodini. UJeremiya wasehlala egumeni lentolongo.
Inkosi uZedekhiya yasithuma yathatha uJeremiya umprofethi yamusa kuye, ekungeneni kwesithathu okusendlini yeN. Inkosi yasisithi kuJeremiya: Ngizakubuza udaba, ungangifihleli lutho.
UJeremiya wasesithi kuZedekhiya: Uba ngikutshela, kawuyikungibulala lokungibulala yini? Loba ngikweluleka, kawuyikungilalela.
Inkosi uZedekhiya yasifunga kuJeremiya ekusithekeni
UJeremiya wasesithi kuZedekhiya: Itsho njalo iN, uNkulunkulu wamabandla, uNkulunkulu kaIsrayeli: Uba uphuma isibili lalumuzi kawuyikutshiswa ngomlilo; uzaphila wena lendlu yakho.
Kodwa uba ungaphumi
Inkosi uZedekhiya yasisithi kuJeremiya: Ngiyawesaba amaJuda ahlubukele kumaKhaladiya,
UJeremiya wasesithi: Kawayiku ku nikela; ake ulalele ilizwi leN njengalelo engilikhuluma kuwe, futhi umphefumulo wakho uzaphila.
Kodwa uba usala ukuphuma, yileli ilizwi engibonise lona lokuthi:
Khangela-ke, bonke abesifazana abasele endlini yenkosi yakoJuda bazakhitshelwa kuziphathamandla zenkosi yeBhabhiloni, bathi: Abangane bakho bakukhuthazile,
Njalo azakhuphela abafazi bonke bakho lamadodana akho kumaKhaladiya;
UZedekhiya wasesithi kuJeremiya: Kakungabi khona umuntu owaziyo lamazwi, khona ungayikufa.
Kodwa nxa iziphathamandla zisizwa ukuthi ngikhulume lawe, zize kuwe zithi kuwe: Ake usitshele, ubusithini enkosini, ungakufihli kithi, khona kasiyikukubulala; njalo inkosi ikhulumeni kuwe;
uzakuthi-ke kuzo: Mina ngiwise ukuncenga kwami phambi kwenkosi
Zasezifika zonke iziphathamandla kuJeremiya, zambuza; yena waziphendula njengawo wonke lamazwi inkosi ewalayileyo. Zasezithula kuye, ngoba udaba lwalungezwakali.
UJeremiya wasehlala wayekhona lapho iJerusalema ithunjwa.
Ngomnyaka wesificamunwemunye kaZedekhiya inkosi yakoJuda, ngenyanga yetshumi, kwafika uNebhukadirezari inkosi yeBhabhiloni lebutho lakhe lonke, bamelana leJerusalema, bayivimbezela.
Ngomnyaka wetshumi lanye kaZedekhiya, ngenyanga yesine, ngolwesificamunwemunye lwenyanga, umuzi wafohlelwa.
Zonke iziphathamandla zenkosi yeBhabhiloni zasezingena, lazo zonke ezinye iziphathamandla zenkosi yeBhabhiloni.

Kwasekusithi lapho uZedekhiya inkosi yakoJuda lawo wonke amadoda empi bezibona, babaleka, baphuma emzini ebusuku nge ndlela yesivande senkosi, ngesango eliphakathi kwemiduli emibili; waphuma nge ndlela yamagceke.
Kodwa ibutho lamaKhaladiya laxotshana labo, lamfica uZedekhiya emagcekeni eJeriko; selimbambile lamenyusela kuNebhukadinezari inkosi yeBhabhiloni eRibila, elizweni leHamathi,
Inkosi yeBhabhiloni yasibulala amadodana kaZedekhiya eRibila emehlweni akhe;
Yasiphumputhekisa amehlo kaZedekhiya, yambopha ngamaketane ethusi amabili ukuze imuse eBhabhiloni.
AmaKhaladiya asetshisa indlu yenkosi lezindlu zabantu ngomlilo, adilizela phansi imiduli yeJerusalema.
Lensali yabantu eyayisele emzini, lalabo ababehlubukile, ababehlubukile kuyo, lensali yabantu eyayisele, uNebuzaradani induna yabalindi yabathumba yabasa eBhabhiloni.
Kodwa uNebuzaradani induna yabalindi watshiya elizweni lakoJuda ebantwini ababengabayanga ababengelalutho, wabanika izivini lamasimu ngalolosuku.
UNebhukadirezari inkosi yeBhabhiloni waselaya ngesandla sikaNebuzaradani induna yabalindi ngoJeremiya esithi:
Mthathe, umise amehlo akho kuye, ungamenzeli ulutho olubi, kodwa njengokukhuluma kwakhe kuwe wenze njalo ngaye.
Ngakho bathuma oNebuzaradani induna yabalindi, loNebushazibani, uRabisarisi, loNerigali-Sharezi,
bathuma, bamthatha uJeremiya egumeni lentolongo,
Ilizwi leN laselifika kuJeremiya esavalelwe egumeni lentolongo, lisithi:
Hamba ukhulume kuEbedimeleki umEthiyophiya njalo azakuba phambi kwakho ngalolosuku.
Kodwa ngizakophula ngalolosuku, itsho iN, njalo kawuyikunikelwa esandleni sabantu obesabayo.
Ngoba ngizakukhulula isibili, kawuyikuwa-ke ngenkemba, kodwa impilo yakho izakuba yimpango kuwe, itsho iN.
Ilizwi elafika kuJeremiya livela eNni emva kokuthi uNebuzaradani induna yabalindi esemyekele wahamba
Induna yabalindi yasimthatha uJeremiya yathi kuye:
isikulethile yakwenza njengokutsho kwayo, ngoba lonile eNni, kalilalelanga ilizwi layo; ngakho loludaba lwenzakele kini.
Khathesi-ke, khangela, lamuhla ngiyakukhulula kulamaketane asezandleni zakho.
Kodwa engakabuyeli, wathi: Buyela yamyekela ukuthi ahambe.
Ngakho uJeremiya wafika kuGedaliya indodana kaAhikhamu eMizipa,
Kwathi zonke induna zamabutho ezazisegangeni, zona kanye lamadoda azo, kulabo ababengathunjelwanga eBhabhiloni,
khona beza kuGedaliya eMizipa, bona lamadoda abo.
UGedaliya, indodana kaAhikhamu, indodana kaShafani, wasefunga kibo lamadoda abo, esithi: Lingesabi ukusebenzela amaKhaladiya; hlalani elizweni, liyisebenzele inkosi yeBhabhiloni; khona kuzalilungela.

Khangelani-ke, mina ngihlala eMizipa ukuma phambi kobuso bamaKhaladiya azafika kithi; kodwa lina buthani iwayini lezithelo zehlobo lamafutha, likufake ezitsheni zenu, lihlale emizini yenu eliyithetheyo.
Futhi, lapho wonke amaJuda lokuthi yabeka phezu kwabo uGedaliya, indodana kaAhikhamu, indodana kaShafani;
wonke amaJuda asebuya esuka endaweni zonke ayexotshelwe khona,
UJohanani indodana kaKareya basebesiza kuGedaliya eMizipa,
bathi kuye: Uyakwazi isibili yini ukuthi uBhahalisi ukukutshaya empilweni? Kodwa uGedaliya indodana kaAhikhamu kabakholwanga.

UJohanani indodana kaKareya wasekhuluma loGedaliya ensitha eMizipa esithi: Ake ungiyekele ngihambe ngi ye tshaya uIshmayeli indodana kaNethaniya, kungabi lamuntu okwaziyo. Uzakutshayelani empilweni, ukuze bahlakazeke bonke abakoJuda ababuthene kuwe, kubhubhe insali yakoJuda?
Kodwa uGedaliya indodana kaAhikhamu wathi kuJohanani indodana kaKareya: Ungayenzi le indaba, ngoba uqamba amanga ngoIshmayeli.
Kwasekusithi ngenyanga yesikhombisa khona ndawonye eMizipa.
UIshmayeli indodana kaNethaniya wasesukuma,
UIshmayeli wabulala lawo wonke amaJuda ayelaye, amadoda empi.
Kwasekusithi ngosuku lwesibili esembulele uGedaliya, kungelamuntu okwaziyo,
kwafika amadoda evela eShekema,
UIshmayeli indodana kaNethaniya ukuwahlangabeza, ehamba, ehamba ekhala inyembezi. Kwasekuthi lapho ehlangana lawo, wathi kuwo: Wozani kuGedaliya indodana kaAhikhamu.
Kwasekusithi sebefikile phakathi komuzi, uIshmayeli indodana kaNethaniya wawabulala wawaphoselaphakathi yena lamadoda ayelaye.

Kodwa kwatholakala amadoda alitshumi phakathi kwawo, athi kuIshmayeli: Ungasibulali, ngoba sileziphala ensimini, ingqoloyi lebhali lamafutha loluju. Ngakho wa wa yekela, kaze awabulala phakathi kwabafowabo.
Njalo umgodi uIshmayeli ayephosele kuwo zonke izidumbu zabantu ayebatshayile lowo uIshmayeli indodana kaNethaniya wawugcwalisa ngababuleweyo.
UIshmayeli wasethumba yonke insali yabantu ababeseMizipa, amadodakazi enkosi,
Kwathi uJohanani indodana kaKareya besizwa konke okubi uIshmayeli indodana kaNethaniya ayekwenzile,
bathatha wonke amadoda, bayakulwa loIshmayeli indodana kaNethaniya; bamfica emanzini amanengi
Kwasekusithi bonke abantu ababeloIshmayeli bebona uJohanani indodana kaKareya lazo zonke induna zamabutho ezazilaye, bathokoza.
Basebetshibilika abantu bonke uIshmayeli ayebathumbe besuka eMizipa, baphenduka baya kuJohanani indodana kaKareya.
Kodwa uIshmayeli indodana kaNethaniya waphunyuka wasuka phambi kukaJohanani, lamadoda ayisificaminwembili, waya ebantwaneni bakoAmoni.
UJohanani indodana kaKareya
Basebesuka ba ya hlala eGeruthi-Kimihamu
ngenxa yamaKhaladiya; ngoba babewesaba, ngoba uIshmayeli indodana kaNethaniya wayebulele uGedaliya indodana kaAhikhamu, inkosi yeBhabhiloni eyayimmise phezu kwelizwe.
Zasezisondela zonke induna zamabutho,
bathi kuJeremiya umprofethi: Ake kuthi ukuncenga kwethu kuwe phambi kwakho, usikhulekele eNni uNkulunkulu wakho, njengalokho amehlo akho esibona;
ukuze iN, uNkulunkulu wakho, isazise indlela esizahamba ngayo, lento esizayenza.
UJeremiya umprofethi wasesithi kibo: Sengizwile; khangelani, ngizakhuleka eNni uNkulunkulu wenu njengokwamazwi enu; kuzakuthi-ke, lonke ilizwi ezaliphendula ngizalitshela lona,
Bona basebesithi kuJeremiya: kayibe ngumfakazi oqinisileyo
Loba kukuhle loba kukubi, sizalalela ilizwi leN uNkulunkulu wethu, esikuthuma kuyo, ukuze kusilungele lapho sililalela ilizwi leN uNkulunkulu wethu.
Kwasekusithi ekupheleni kwensuku ezilitshumi, ilizwi leN lafika kuJeremiya.
Wasebiza uJohanani indodana kaKareya,
wathi kibo: Itsho njalo iN, uNkulunkulu kaIsrayeli, elingithume kiyo ukuthi ngenze ukuncenga kwenu kuwe phambi kwayo:
Uba lihlala lokuhlala kulelilizwe, ngizalakha
Lingayesabi inkosi yeBhabhiloni eliyesabayo, lingayesabi, ngilophule esandleni sayo.
Ngilinike izihawu, ukuze ibe lomusa kini, ilibuyisele elizweni lakini.
Kodwa uba lisithi: Kasiyikuhlala kulelilizwe; ukuthi lingalaleli ilizwi leN uNkulunkulu wenu;
lisithi: Hatshi; kodwa sizangena elizweni leGibhithe, singalambelanga isinkwa, sihlale khona;
khathesi-ke, ngakho zwanini ilizwi leN, nsali yakoJuda: Itsho njalo yamabandla, uNkulunkulu kaIsrayeli: Uba lina libeka ubuso benu
kuzakuthi-ke inkemba elinqineka ngayo izanamathela emva kwenu khona eGibhithe, lifele khona.
Bazakuba njalo bonke abantu ababeka ubuso babo ukuya eGibhithe, ukuze bahlale njengabezizwe khona;
Ngoba itsho njalo yamabandla, uNkulunkulu kaIsrayeli: Njengokuthululwa kolaka lwami lentukuthelo yami phezu kwabahlali beJerusalema, lingaphindi liyibone lindawo.
ithe ngani, nsali yakoJuda: Lingangeni eGibhithe. Yazini isibili ukuthi lamuhla ngifakazile ngimelene lani.
Ngoba liyikhohlisile imiphefumulo yenu; ngoba lina lingithume eNni, uNkulunkulu wenu, lisithi: ngokunjalo sitshele, sikwenze.
Sengilitshelile lamuhla, kodwa kalililalelanga ilizwi leN uNkulunkulu wenu, laloba yiyiphi into engithume yona kini.
Khathesi-ke yazini isibili ukuthi lizakufa ngenkemba, ngendlala, langomatshayabhuqe wesifo, endaweni eliloyisa ukuyahlala khona njengabezizwe.
Kwasekusithi lapho uJeremiya eseqedile ukukhuluma kubo bonke abantu wonke amazwi eN uNkulunkulu wabo, uNkulunkulu wabo eyayimthume ngawo kibo, ngitshowonke lamazwi;
wasekhuluma uAzariya indodana kaHoshaya,
kodwa uBharukhi indodana kaNeriya ukuze asibulale, asithumbele eBhabhiloni.
Ngakho uJohanani indodana kaKareya, labo bonke abantu, kabalilalelanga ilizwi leN, ukuze bahlale elizweni lakoJuda.
Kodwa uJohanani indodana kaKareya
amadoda,
Basebengena elizweni leGibhithe, ngoba kabalilalelanga ilizwi leN; basebefika eThahaphanesi.
Laselifika ilizwi leN kuJeremiya eThahaphanesi lisithi:
Thatha esandleni sakho amatshe amakhulu, uwafihle ebumbeni ewondweni, emehlweni amadoda angamaJuda,
uthi kiwo: Itsho njalo yamabandla, uNkulunkulu kaIsrayeli: Khangelani, ngizathuma ngilande uNebhukadirezari inkosi yeBhabhiloni inceku yami, endlale ithente lakhe lesikhosini phezu kwawo.
Eze atshaye ilizwe leGibhithe;
Ngiphembe umlilo aphume khona ngokuthula.
Njalo uzakwephula insika zeBetshemeshi eziyizithombe
Ilizwi elafika kuJeremiya ngawo wonke amaJuda ayehlala elizweni leGibhithe ahlala eMigidoli lisithi:

Itsho njalo yamabandla, uNkulunkulu kaIsrayeli: Lina likubonile konke okubi engakwehlisela phezu kweJerusalema laphezu kwayo yonke imizi yakoJuda. Khangelani-ke, lamuhla ilunxiwa, njalo kakho ohlala phakathi kwayo,
ngenxa yobubi babo ababenzileyo, ukungithukuthelisa, abangabaziyo, bona, lina, laboyihlo.
Kanti ngathuma kini inceku zami zonke abaprofethi, ngisithi: Ake lingayenzi linto enengekayo engiyizondayo.
Kodwa kabalalelanga
Ngakho kwathululwa intukuthelo yami lolaka lwami, njengalamuhla.
Ngakho-ke, itsho njalo iN, uNkulunkulu wamabandla, uNkulunkulu kaIsrayeli: Libenzelani ububi obukhulu kangakalimelene lemiphefumulo yenu,
ngokungithukuthelisa phakathi kwazo zonke izizwe zomhlaba?
Se lakhohlwa yini izinto ezimbi zaboyihlo, lezinto ezimbi zamakhosi akoJuda, lezinto ezimbi zabomkabo, abazenza elizweni lakoJuda lezitaladeni zeJerusalema?
Kabadabukanga kuze kube lamuhla, kabesabanga, kabahambanga ngomlayo wami langezimiso zami engazibeka phambi kwenu laphambi kwaboyihlo.
Ngakho itsho njalo yamabandla, uNkulunkulu kaIsrayeli: Khangelani, ngimisa ubuso bami bumelene lani ngokubi ukuze ngiqume uJuda wonke.
Ngithathe insali yakoJuda, abamise ubuso babo ukungena elizweni leGibhithe ukuhlala khona njengabezizwe;
Ngoba ngizajezisa labo abahlezi elizweni leGibhithe,
ukuze insali yakoJuda efikileyo ukuhlala khona njengowezizwe elizweni leGibhithe ingabi lophunyukayo losilayo,
Khona wonke amadoda ayesazi ukuthi omkabo batshisela abanye onkulunkulu impepha, bamphendula uJeremiya, besithi:
Lelilizwi olikhulume kithi ebizweni leN, kasiyikukulalela.
Kodwa sizakwenza lokwenza loba yiyiphi into ephume emlonyeni wethu, kasibonanga okubi.
Kodwa kusukela lapho sayekela ukutshisela indlovukazi yamazulu impepha
Futhi lapho sitshisela indlovukazi yamazulu impepha, siyithululela iminikelo yokuthululwa, ngaphandle kwamadoda enu yini?
UJeremiya wasekhuluma kubo bonke abantu, emadodaneni, lakwabesifazana, lakubo bonke abantu ababemphendule ngalelolizwi, esithi:
Impepha elayitshisa emizini yakoJuda lezitaladeni zeJerusalema,
Kwaze kwathi iN KOSI njengalamuhla.
Ngenxa yokuthi litshisile impepha, lokuthi lonile eNni, njengalamuhla.
UJeremiya wasesithi kubo bonke abantu lakwabesifazana bonke: Zwanini ilizwi leN, wonke uJuda oselizweni leGibhithe.
Itsho njalo yamabandla, uNkulunkulu kaIsrayeli, ithi: Lina labomkenu, likhulumile ngomlomo wenu, Lizaqinisa lokuqinisa izithembiso zenu, lenze sibili izithembiso zenu!
Ngakho zwanini ilizwi leN, lonke Juda elihlala elizweni leGibhithe:
Khangela, ngizabalindela ngokubi, aze aphele.
Lalabo abaphepha enkembeni bazabuyela elizweni lakoJuda bevela elizweni leGibhithe,
Lalokhu kuzakuba yisibonakaliso kini, kutsho iN, ukuthi ngizalijezisa kulindawo, ukuze lazi ukuthi amazwi ami azakuma lokuma emelana lani ngokubi.
Itsho njalo iN: Khangelani, ngizanikela uFaro Hofira inkosi yeGibhithe esandleni sezitha zakhe,
Ilizwi uJeremiya umprofethi alikhuluma kuBharukhi indodana kaNeriya, lisithi:
Itsho njalo iN, uNkulunkulu kaIsrayeli, kuwe Bharukhi:
Uthi wena: Hawu maye mina! ngoba yengezelela usizi ebuhlungwini bami,
Uzakutsho njalo kuye: Itsho njalo iN: Khangela, lokho engikwakhileyo ngiyakudiliza, lalokho engikuhlanyeleyo ngiyakusiphuna; yebo, ilizwe leli lonke.
Wena-ke uzazidingela izinto ezinkulu yini?
Ilizwi leN elafika kuJeremiya umprofethi limelene labezizwe;
limelene leGibhithe, limelene lebutho likaFaro Neko inkosi yeGibhithe,
Hlelani ihawu lesihlangu, lisondele empini.
Bophelani amabhiza,
Ngibaboneleni betshaywa luvalo, bebuyela emuva? Lamaqhawe abo ephulaphuliwe, ayabaleka ngesiqubu, kawanyemukuli emuva; itsho iN.
Olejubane kangabaleki,
Ngubani lo o khukhumala
IGibhithe ikhukhumala ithi: Ngizakhukhumala, ngiwusibekele umhlaba, ngichithe umuzi labahlala kiwo.
Yenyukani mabhiza, lihlanye
Ngoba lolu lusuku lweNkosi uJehova wamabandla,
Yenyukela eGileyadi, u ye thatha
Izizwe zizwile ihlazo lakho, lomhlaba ugcwele ukukhala kwakho;
Ilizwi eyalikhuluma kuJeremiya umprofethi ngokuza kukaNebhukadirezari inkosi yeBhabhiloni ukutshaya ilizwe leGibhithe:
Memezelani eGibhithe, lizwakalise eMigidoli,
Kungani amadoda akho alamandla Kawemanga ngoba iwafuqile.
Yandisa abakhubekayo,
Bamemeza khona, bathi: UFaro inkosi yeGibhithe ungumsindo;
Kuphila kwami, uzafika.
Zenzele izikhali zokuthunjwa,
IGibhithe ilithokazi
Labaqatshiweyo bayo phakathi kwayo banjengethole lesibaya;
Ilizwi layo lizahamba
Bagamule ihlathi layo, kabalakubalwa.
Indodakazi yamaGibhithe izayangeka, izanikelwa esandleni sabantu benyakatho.
yamabandla, uNkulunkulu kaIsrayeli, ithi: Khangela, ngizajezisa uAmoni lamakhosi ayo, yebo uFaro labathembela kuye.
Ngibanikele esandleni salabo abadinga impilo yabo, itsho iN.

Kodwa wena, ungesabi, nceku yami Jakobe, ungatshaywa luvalo, Israyeli, ngoba khangela, ngizakusindisa usekhatshana, lenzalo yakho elizweni lokuthunjwa kwayo; uJakobe uzaphenduka-ke, athule, onwabe, njalo kakho oza m ethusa.

Wena, ungesabi, nceku yami Jakobe, itsho iN, ngoba ngilawe; ngoba ngizaqeda ngokupheleleyo zonke izizwe engikuxotshele kuzo, kodwa kangiyikukuqeda ngokupheleleyo, ngikukhuze ngokufaneleyo, kodwa kangiyikukuyekela lokukuyekela ungajeziswanga.
Ilizwi leN elafika kuJeremiya umprofethi limelene lamaFilisti,

Itsho njalo iN: Khangela, amanzi azakhukhumala azakuba yisifula esikhukhulayo, akhukhule ilizwe lokugcwala kwalo, umuzi labahlala kiwo; labantu bazakhala, labo bonke abakhileyo belizwe bazaqhinqa isililo,
ngomsindo wokugidiza kwamasondo amabhizaakhe alamandla, ngenxa yokuyekethiswa kwezandla;
ngenxa yosuku oluzayo ukuchitha wonke amaFilisti,
Ubumpabanga sebufikile eGaza, kuze kube nini?
Hawu, nkemba yeN;
Ungathula njani, lapho iyilawulile? Imelene
Imelene loMowabi,
Kakusayikuba khona udumo lukaMowabi eHeshiboni uzathula, inkemba izakulandela.
Ilizwi lokukhala livela incithakalo lokwephuka okukhulu!
UMowabi wephukile; abancinyane bakhe benze ukukhala kuzwakale.
Ngoba e kwenyuk enikweLubithi ukukhala kuzakwenyuka lo kukhala,
Balekani, likhulule impilo yenu, libe njengesihlahla esiyize enkangala.
Ngoba ngenxa yokuthembela kwakho emisebenzini yakho lemagugwini akho
Lomchithi uzafikela wonke umuzi, njengokutsho kweN.
Nikani uMowabi amaphiko,
Uqalekisiwe lowo owenza uqalekisiwe lalowo ogodla inkemba yakhe egazini.
UMowabi wonwabile kusukela ebutsheni bakhe, kathululelwanga esuka embizeni esiya embizeni, kahambanga ekuthunjweni; ngakho-ke ukunambitheka kwakhe kumi kuye, lephunga lakhe kaliphenduki.
Ngakho, khangela, insuku ziyeza, itsho iN, lapho ngizathuma kuye abathambeki
Khona uMowabi uzakuba lenhloni ngoKemoshi, njengalokho indlu kaIsrayeli yaba lenhloni
Lingatsho njani ukuthi: Singamaqhawe lamadoda empi alamandla?
UMowabi uchithiwe,
Inkathazo kaMowabi iseduze ukufika, lobubi bakhe buyaphangisa kakhulu.
Mlileleni, lina lonke elimzingelezeleyo, lani lonke elazi ibizo lakhe; lithi: Yephuke njani
Yehla ebukhosini, uhlale wachitha inqaba zakho.
Mana endleleni, ulinde, ubuze obalekayo lowesifazana ophunyukileyo, uthi: Kwenzakaleni?
UMowabi uyangekile, ngoba udilikile;
Lesahlulelo sehlele phezu kwelizwe elilamagceke,
laphezu kweDiboni,
laphezu kweKiriyathayimi,
laphezu kweKeriyothi, laphezu kwayo yonke imizi yelizwe lakoMowabi, ekhatshana leseduze.
Uphondo lukaMowabi luqunyiwe, itsho iN.
Mdakiseni, ngitsho yena.
Ngoba uIsrayeli kabanga yinhlekisa yini kuwe? Ngoba kusukela ngesikhathi samazwi akho ngaye wanyikinya ikhanda.
Tshiyani imizi,
Sizwile ngo kuzigqaja kukaMowabi (uyazigqaja kakhulu), ukuziphakamisa kwakhe, lokuzigqaja kwakhe, lokuzikhukhumeza kwakhe, lokuphakama kwenhliziyo yakhe.
Mina ngiyayazi, itsho iN, intukuthelo yakhe,
Ngalokho-ke ngizaqhinqa isililo ngoMowabi,
Ngokukhala inyembezi kweJazeri umchithi wehlele phezu kwezithelo zakho zehlobo lemavinini akho avuniweyo.
Lokuthaba lentokozo kususiwe esivandeni
Ngenxa yokukhala kweHeshiboni, kuze kube seEleyale,
Njalo ngizaqeda koMowabi, itsho iN, lowo onikela endaweni ephakemeyo, lotshisela onkulunkulu bakhe impepha.
Ngenxa yalokho inhliziyo yami
Ngoba lonke ikhanda
Phezu kwazo zonke impahla zezindlu zakoMowabi itsho iN.
Bazaqhinqa isililo besithi: Udilike njani! uMowabi uphendule njani umhlana el enhloni!
Ngoba itsho njalo iN: Khangela, uzaphapha ngesiqubu njengokhozi,
Imizi ithunjiwe,
LoMowabi uzachithwa angabi yisizwe,
Ukwesaba lomjibila kuphezu kwakho, mhlali wakoMowabi, itsho iN.
Obalekela ukwesaba uzawela emgodini, itsho iN.
Emthunzini lenkanda yabantwana besiphithiphithi.
Maye kuwe, Mowabi! Abantu bakaKemoshi baphelile, ngoba amadodana akho athethwe asiwa ekuthunjweni, lamadodakazi akho ekuthunjweni.
Kodwa ngizabuyisa ukuthunjwa kukaMowabi
Mayelana labantwana bakoAmoni labantu bakhe behlala emizini yayo?
Ngakho khangela, insuku ziyeza, itsho iN, lapho ngizakwenza ukuthi kuzwakale umkhosi wempi itsho iN.
Qhinqa isililo, Heshiboni,
Uzincomelani ngezihotsha? Isihotsha sakho siyageleza, ndodakazi ehlehlela nyovane,
Khangela, ngizakwehlisela phezu kwakho uvalo,
Kodwa emva kwalokho ngizabuyisa ukuthunjwa kwabantwana bakoAmoni, itsho iN.
Mayelana leEdoma, Inhlakanipho yabo isinyamalele yini?
Balekani,
Uba abavuni bamavini befika kuwe azaphanga aze anele?
Kodwa mina ngimhlubule uEsawu,
Tshiya izintandane zakho, mina ngizazilondoloza ziphila, labafelokazi bakho kabathembele kimi.
Ngoba itsho njalo iN: Khangela, labo okugwetshwa kwabo kwakungeyisikho ukunatha inkezo baza yi natha loku yi natha, Kawuyikuyekelwa ungelacala, kodwa isibili uzanatha.
Ngoba ngifungile ngami uqobo,
Ngizwile umbiko ovela eNni, lize limelane layo, lisukumele impi.
Ngoba khangela, ngizakwenza ube mncinyane phakathi kwezizwe, udeleleke phakathi kwabantu.
Ukwesabeka kwakho kukukhohlisile, ukuziqhenya kwenhliziyo yakho, wena ohlala ezingoxweni zamadwala, itsho iN.
IEdoma layo izakuba yinto eyesabekayo;
Njengokuchithwa kweSodoma leGomora,
Khangela, njengesilwane

Ngakho, zwanini icebo leN elicebe imelene leEdoma, lemicabango yayo eyicabange emelene labahlali beThemani: Isibili abancinyane bomhlambi bazabadonsa; isibili izachitha indawo yabo yokuhlala phezu kwabo.
Ngomsindo wokuwa kwabo umhlaba uyazamazama; ukukhala, umsindo wakho wezwakala eLwandle oluBomvu.
Khangela, uzakwenyuka
Mayelana leDamaseko.
IDamaseko
Kawutshiywanga njani
Ngakho amajaha awo azawela ezitaladeni zawo, itsho yamabandla.
Ngizaphemba-ke umlilo emdulini
Mayelana leKedari
Bazathatha amathente abo lemihlambi yabo,
Balekani, lizulazule kakhulu, lina bahlali beHazori, itsho iN; ngoba uNebhukadirezari inkosi yeBhabhiloni waceba icebo emelene lani, wacabanga umcabango emelene lani.
Sukumani, lenyuke limelene lesizwe esonwabileyo,

Lamakamela abo azakuba yimpango, lemihlambi yezifuyo zabo izakuba yimpango; njalo ngizabachithachitha kuyo yonke imimoya, a baphoselwe engonsini, ngilethe inkathazo yabo evela inhlangothi zonke zaso, itsho iN.
LeHazori izakuba yindawo yokuhlala yamakhanka,
Ilizwi leN elafika kuJeremiya umprofethi limelene leElamu ekuqaleni kokubusa kukaZedekhiya, inkosi yakoJuda, lisithi:
Itsho njalo yamabandla: Khangela, ngizakwephula idandili leElamu, induna yamandla abo.
Ngilethele iElamu imimoya emine evela emikhawulweni emine yamazulu, ngibahlakazele kuyo yonke leyomimoya;
Ngoba ngizakwenza abeElamu besabe phambi kwezitha zabo ngize ngibaqede.
Ngizamisa-ke isihlalo sami sobukhosi eElamu, ngichithe kuyo inkosi leziphathamandla, itsho iN.
Kodwa kuzakuthi ekucineni kwezinsuku itsho iN.
Ilizwi eyalikhuluma imelene leBhabhiloni, imelene lelizwe lamaKhaladiya, ngesandla sikaJeremiya umprofethi, lisithi:
Memezani phakathi kwezizwe, lizwakalise; misani uphawu, imifanekiso yayo ibhidliziwe.
Ngoba isizwe senyuka simelene layo esivela enyakatho,
Ngalezonsuku langalesosikhathi, itsho iN, abantwana bakoIsrayeli bazakuza, bona labantwana bakoJuda kanyekanye;
Bazabuza indlela e Ziyoni,
Abantu bami
Bonke ababatholayo babadla,
Balekani
Ngoba khangela, ngizavusa ngenze ukuthi kwenyukele eBhabhiloni.
Njalo iKhaladiya izakuba yimpango; bonke abayiphangayo bazasutha, itsho iN.
Ngoba lalijabula,
unyoko ulenhloni kakhulu, owalizalayo uyangekile. Khangela, ingemuva yezizwe iyinkangala
Ngenxa yolaka lweN kayiyikuhlalwa,
Zihleleleni ukumelana leBhabhiloni
Memezani limelene layo
Qumani umhlanyeli asuke eBhabhiloni, laye ophatha isikela ngesikhathi sokuvuna;
UIsrayeli uyimvu ehlakazekileyo;
Ngakho itsho njalo yamabandla, uNkulunkulu kaIsrayeli: Khangela, ngizayijezisa inkosi yeBhabhiloni lelizwe layo,
Njalo ngizabuyisela uIsrayeli endaweni yakhe yokuhlala,
Ngalezonsuku langalesosikhathi, itsho iN, kuzadingwa ububi koIsrayeli,
Umelene lelizwe leMerathayimi,
Umsindo wempi uselizweni, lokuchitheka okukhulu.
Yeka ukuganyulwa lokwephuka kwesando somhlaba wonke!
Ngakuthiya ngomjibila,
ivulile isiphala sayo, yakhupha izikhali zolaka lwayo, ngoba lokhu kungumsebenzi weNkosi uJehova wamabandla elizweni lamaKhaladiya.
Wozani limelane layo livela ephethelweni, livule izibuya zayo, liyibuthelele
Bulalani amajongosi ayo wonke,
Ilizwi lababalekayo labaphunyukayo bevela elizweni leBhabhiloni,
Bizani abatshoki bamelane leBhabhiloni, imelene loNgcwele kaIsrayeli.
Ngakho amajaha ayo azakuwa ezitaladeni zayo, itsho iN.
Khangela, ngimelana lawe, wena oziqhenyayo, itsho iNkosi uJehova wamabandla; ngoba usuku lwakho selufikile,
Khona oziqhenyayo ezakhubeka awe, njalo kungekho ozamvusa; njalo ngizaphemba umlilo emizini yakhe
Itsho njalo yamabandla: Babecindezelwe abantwana bakoIsrayeli labantwana bakoJuda ndawonye;
Umhlengi wabo ukuze inike umhlaba ukuphumula, kodwa inyakazise abahlali beBhabhiloni.
Inkemba iphezu kwamaKhaladiya, itsho iN, laphezu kwabahlali beBhabhiloni, laphezu kweziphathamandla zayo,
Inkemba iphezu kwabaqambimanga ukuze adilizwe.
Inkemba iphezu kwamabhiza ayo, ukuze kuphangwe.
Imbalela iphezu kwamanzi ayo,
Ngakho izilo zenkangala
Njengoba uNkulunkulu wagenqula iSodoma leGomora njalo kakulandodana yomuntu ezahlala njengowezizwe kuyo.
Khangela, abantu bazavela lamakhosi amanengi azavuswa evela emikhawulweni yomhlaba.
Bazabamba idandili lomkhonto; balesihluku, kabayikuba lomusa; ilizwi labo lizahlokoma njengolwandle, bagade amabhiza, ngulowo lalowo ehleliwe njengomuntu wempi emelene lawe, ndodakazi yeBhabhiloni.
Inkosi yeBhabhiloni izwile umbiko wabo, lezandla zayo zaba buthakathaka; ucindezelo lwayibamba, umhelo njengowobelethayo.
Khangela, njengesilwane esivela ekukhukhumaleni kweJodani
Ngakho, zwanini icebo leNKOSI eyicabange imelene lelizwe lamaKhaladiya: Isibili abancinyane bomhlambi bazabadonsa; isibili izachitha indawo yokuhlala phezu kwabo.
Ngomsindo wokuthunjwa kweBhabhiloni
Itsho njalo iN: Khangela ngizavusela iBhabhiloni lalabo abahlala enhliziyweni yalabo abangivukelayo
Ngithume eBhabhiloni abelayo,
