Kakuthi otshokayo agobise idandili lakhe
Ngokunjalo ababuleweyo bazakuwa elizweni lamaKhaladiya, labagwazwe
Ngoba uIsrayeli kayikutshiywa, loJuda nguNkulunkulu wabo, yyamabandla, lanxa ilizwe labo ligcwele icala koNgcwele kaIsrayeli.
Balekani liphume phakathi kweBhabhiloni,
IBhabhiloni yayiyinkezo yegolide esandleni seN,
IBhabhiloni mhlawumbe ingelatshwa.
Besingayelapha iBhabhiloni, kodwa kayelaphekanga; itshiyeni,
ikhuphe umsebenzi weN uNkulunkulu wethu.
Lolani imitshoko,
Phakamisani isiboniso phezu kwemiduli yeBhabhiloni, lokho ekukhulume ngabahlali beBhabhiloni.
Wena ohlala emanzini amanengi,
yamabandla ifungile
Wenza umhlaba ngamandla akhe, walimisa ilizwe ngenhlakanipho yakhe, langokuqedisisa kwakhe wendlala amazulu.
Lapho ekhupha ilizwi lakhe, kulokuhlokoma kwamanzi amanengi emazulwini, ukhuphula inkungu ivela emkhawulweni womhlaba, enze imibane kanye lezulu, akhuphe umoya eziphaleni zakhe.
Wonke umuntu uyisiphukuphuku kalalwazi; wonke umkhandi wegolide uyangiswa yisithombe esibaziweyo, ngoba isithombe sakhe esibunjwe ngokuncibilikisa siyinkohliso, njalo kakulamoya kuzo.
Ziyize, umsebenzi wezinkohliso; ngesikhathi sokuhanjelwa kwazo zizabhubha.
Isabelo sikaJakobe kasinjengazo; ngoba yena nguye umbumbi wakho konke, lo Israyeliuyintonga yelifa lakhe; yamabandla libizo lakhe.
Wena uyinduku yami yempi, izikhali zempi; ngoba ngawe ngizaphahlaza izizwe, langawe ngichithe imibuso,
langawe ngiphahlaze ibhiza lomgadi walo, langawe ngiphahlaze inqola lomkhweli wayo,
langawe ngiphahlaze indoda lowesifazana, langawe ngiphahlaze ixhegu lomutsha,
langawe ngiphahlaze umelusi lomhlambi wakhe, langawe ngiphahlaze umlimi lesipani sakhe, langawe ngiphahlaze ababusi lezinduna.
Njalo ngizayiphindisela iBhabhiloni emehlweni enu, itsho iN.
Khangela, ngimelana lawe, wena ntaba echithayo,
Njalo kabayikuthatha kuwe ilitshe libe ngelengonsi, lelitshe libe ngelezisekelo; ngoba uzakuba ng amanxiwa aphakade, itsho iN.
Phakamisani isiboniso elizweni,
Lungisani izizwe
Lelizwe lizazamazama libe lobuhlungu,
Amaqhawe eBhabhiloni ayekele ukulwa, ahlala ezinqabeni, amandla awo aphelile, sebengabesifazana;
Isigijimi sizagijima ukuhlangana lesigijimi,
lamazibuko lamadoda empi ethukile.
Ngoba itsho njalo yamabandla, uNkulunkulu kaIsrayeli: Indodakazi yeBhabhiloni injengebala lokubhulela;
UNebhukadirezari inkosi yeBhabhiloni ungidlile,
Udlakela lwami lo lw enyama yami kube phezu kweBhabhiloni, utsho umhlalikazi weZiyoni; legazi lami libe phezu kwabahlali beKhaladiya, itsho iJerusalema.
Ngakho itsho njalo iN: Khangela, ngizalumela udaba lwakho,
LeBhabhiloni izakuba ngamadundulu,
Bazabhonga kanyekanye njengamabhongo ezilwane,
Ekutshisekeni kwabo ngizabenzela amadili, itsho iN.
Ngizabehlisa njengamawundlu ekuhlatshweni, njengezinqama kanye lezimpongo.
Ithunjwe njani iSheshaki;
Ulwandle lukhukhumele phezu kweBhabhiloni, isibekelwe ngobunengi bamagagasi alo.
Imizi yayo isingamanxiwa, okungadluli kulo indodana yomuntu.
Njalo ngizajezisa uBheli eBhabhiloni,
Phumani phakathi kwayo, bantu bami,
Njalo hlezi inhliziyo yenu ibe buthakathaka,
Ngakho khangela, insuku ziyeza lapho engizahambela
Kuzakuthi-ke amazulu lomhlaba lakho konke okukukho itsho iN.
Njengalokhu iBhabhiloni yenza bawe ababuleweyo bakoIsrayeli,
Lina eliphunyukileyo enkembeni,
Siyangekile ngoba sizwile ihlazo;
Ngakho khangela, insuku ziyeza,
Loba iBhabhiloni ingaphakamela emazulwini, kube kantiabachithi bazayifikela bevela kimi, itsho iN.
Kulomsindo wokukhala ovela eBhabhiloni, lokufohlela okukhulu elizweni lamaKhaladiya.
Ngoba ichithile iBhabhiloni, yabhubhisa kuyo ilizwi elikhulu. Lapho amagagasi abo ahlokoma njengamanzi amanengi, umsindo wawo uzakhupha ilizwi.
Ngoba umchithi wehlela phezu kwayo, phezu kweBhabhiloni, amaqhawe ayo azathunjwa, amadandili awo ephukile; ngoba iN, uNkulunkulu wezimpindiselo, uza yi vuza sibili.
Ngizadakisa-ke
Itsho njalo yamabandla: Imiduli ebanzi yeBhabhiloni izadilizwa ngokupheleleyo,
Ilizwi uJeremiya umprofethi alilaya uSeraya indodana kaNeriya,
UJeremiya wasebhala egwalweni konke okubi okuzakwehlela iBhabhiloni, wonke lamazwi abhaliweyo emelene leBhabhiloni.
UJeremiya wasesithi kuSeraya: Lapho usufikile eBhabhiloni, ubone ufunde wonke lamazwi.
Ubususithi: N, wena ukhulumile ngalindawo ukuthi uzayiquma, ukuze kungabi khona umhlali kiyo, kodwa ibe zincithakalo phakade.
Kuzakuthi-ke usuqedile ukulufunda lolugwalo, ubophele ilitshe kulo, uluphosele phakathi kweYufrathi,
ubususithi: Ngokunjalo iBhabhiloni izatshona,
UZedekhiya wayeleminyaka engamatshumi amabili lanye esiba yinkosi, wabusa iminyaka elitshumi lanye eJerusalema; lebizo likanina lalinguHamuthali, indodakazi kaJeremiya weLibhina.
Wasesenza okubi emehlweni eN, njengakho konke akwenzayo uJehoyakhimi.
Ngoba ngenxa yokuthukuthela kweN kwenzeka eJerusalema loJuda yaze yabaphosela khatshana lobuso bayo; uZedekhiya wasevukela inkosi yeBhabhiloni.

Kwasekusithi ngomnyaka wesificamunwemunye wokubusa kwakhe, ngenyanga yetshumi, ngolwetshumi lwenyanga, uNebhukadirezari inkosi yeBhabhiloni wafika, yena lebutho lakhe lonke, ukumelana leJerusalema; basebemisa inkamba bemelene layo, bayakhela izinqaba zokuvimbezela bemelene layo inhlangothi zonke.
Ngokunjalo umuzi wangena ekuvinjezelweni kwaze kwaba ngumnyaka wetshumi lanye wenkosi uZedekhiya.
Ngenyanga yesine, ngolwesificamunwemunye lwenyanga, lapho indlala yayiqinile phakathi komuzi, abantu belizwe kababanga lokudla.

Basebewufohlela umuzi; wonke amadoda empi asebaleka, aphuma emzini ebusuku, ngendlela yesango, phakathi kwemiduli emibili, elisesivandeni senkosi (amaKhaladiya ayemelene lomuzi inhlangothi zonke), ahamba ngendlela yegceke.
Kodwa ibutho lamaKhaladiya laxotshana lenkosi, lafica uZedekhiya emagcekeni eJeriko; lebutho lakhe lonke lahlakazeka lisuka kuye.
Basebeyibamba inkosi, bayenyusela enkosini yeBhabhiloni eRibila elizweni leHamathi, eyakhuluma izigwebo kuyo.
Inkosi yeBhabhiloni yasibulala amadodana kaZedekhiya emehlweni akhe, futhi yazibulala lazo zonke iziphathamandla zakoJuda eRibila.
Yasiphumputhekisa amehlo kaZedekhiya, yambopha ngamaketane ethusi amabili, ukuze inkosi yeBhabhiloni imuse eBhabhiloni, yamfaka entolongweni, kwaze kwaba lusuku lokufa kwakhe.
Njalo ngenyanga yesihlanu, uNebuzaradani induna yabalindi, eyayimi phambi kwenkosi yeBhabhiloni, wangena eJerusalema.
Watshisa indlu kaJehova, lendlu yenkosi, lezindlu zonke zeJerusalema lezindlu zonke zabakhulu wazitshisa ngomlilo.
Lebutho lonke lamaKhaladiya, elalilenduna yabalindi, labhidliza yonke imiduli yeJerusalema inhlangothi zonke.
UNebuzaradani induna yabalindi wasethumba abathilekwabangabayanga babantu,, ababehlamukele enkosini yeBhabhiloni, labaseleyo bexuku.
Kodwa uNebuzaradani induna yabalindi watshiya abanyekwabangabayanga belizwe ukuthi babe ngabaphathi bezivini labalimi.
Lensika zethusi ezazisendlini yeN,
Athatha izimbiza, lazo zonke izitsha zethusi abakhonza ngazo,
lemiganu, lezitsha zokuthwala umlilo, okwakuligolide golide lokwakuyisiliva siliva induna yabalindi yakuthatha.

Insika zombili, ulwandle olulodwa, lenkabi zethusi ezazilitshumi lambili ezazingaphansi kwezisekelo inkosi uSolomoni eyayikwenzele indlu yeN; ithusi lazo zonke lezizitsha lalingelakulinganiswa ngesisindo.
Mayelana lezinsika, ubude bensika eyodwa babuzingalo ezilitshumi lesificaminwembili, lentambo yezingalo ezilitshumi lambili yayigombolozela,
Lesiduku esiphezu kwayo sasilithusi, lobude besiduku esisodwa babuzingalo ezinhlanu, konke kwakulithusi. Lensika yesibili yayilokufanana lalezi, lamapomegranati.
Njalo kwakulamapomegranati angamatshumi ayisificamunwemunye lesithupha eceleni;
Induna yabalindi yasithatha uSeraya umpristi oyinhloko,

Yasithatha emzini umthenwa othile owayengumphathi phezu kwamadoda empi, lamadoda ayisikhombisa kulabo ababona ubuso benkosi, atholakala emzini, lomabhalane wenduna yebutho eyayibuthela abantu belizwe emabuthweni, lamadoda angamatshumi ayisithupha abantu belizwe, ayetholakala phakathi komuzi.
UNebuzaradani induna yabalindi wasebathatha, wabasa enkosini yeBhabhiloni eRibila.
Inkosi yeBhabhiloni yasibatshaya, yababulalela eRibila elizweni leHamathi. Ngokunjalo uJuda wathunjwa esuswa elizweni lakhe.
Laba ngabantu uNebhukadirezari abathumbayo: Ngomnyaka wesikhombisa, amaJuda azinkulungwane ezintathu lamatshumi amabili lantathu;
ngomnyaka wetshumi lesificaminwembili kaNebhukadirezari, kwasuka eJerusalema imiphefumulo engamakhulu ayisificaminwembili lamatshumi amathathu lambili;

ngomnyaka wamatshumi amabili lantathu kaNebhukadirezari, uNebuzaradani induna yabalindi wathumba amaJuda, imiphefumulo engamakhulu ayisikhombisa lamatshumi amane lanhlanu; yonke imiphefumulo yayizinkulungwane ezine lamakhulu ayisithupha.
Kwasekusithi ngomnyaka wamatshumi amathathu lesikhombisa wokuthunjwa kukaJehoyakhini inkosi yakoJuda, wamkhupha entolongweni,
wasekhuluma kuhle laye, wabeka isihlalo sakhe sobukhosi phezu kwesihlalo sobukhosi samakhosi ayelaye eBhabhiloni.
Wasentshintsha izigqoko zokubotshwa kwakhe; njalo wadla isinkwa phambi kwayo njalonjalo insuku zonke zempilo yakhe.
Mayelana lesabelo sakhe, isabelo esimiyo wasinikwa yinkosi yeBhabhiloni, into yosuku ngosuku lwayo, kwaze kwaba lusuku lokufa kwakhe, zonke insuku zempilo yakhe.
Yeka!
Uyakhala ngenkohliso, sebeyizitha zawo.
UJuda.
Indlela zeZiyoni ziyalila, ngoba kungekho ozayo emkhosini, layo isekubabeni.
Abamelani bayo sebeyinhloko ekuthunjweni phambi kwesitha.
Labo bonke ubuhle bayo busukile kundodakazi yeZiyoni. Iziphathamandla zayo zinjengezindluzele e zingatholi idlelo, njalo ziyahamba zingelamandla phambi komzingeli.
E zinsuk winizenhlupheko yayo lokuzulazula.
IJerusalema yonile kakhulu, ngakho-ke isingcolile; bonke ababeyihlonipha bayidelela, ngoba sebebonile, ibuyele emuva.
Ukungcola kwayo kwakusemiphethweni yezigqoko.
Isitha selule isandla saso phezu kwazo zonke izinto zayo eziloyisekayo phakathi kwebandla lakho.
Bonke abantu bayo bayabubula bavuselele umphefumulo. Bona, N, ukhangele, ngoba ngiyadelelwa.
Kakusilutho kini yini lonke elidlulayo lwayo.
Iphezulu, ithumele usuku lonke.
Ijokwe entanyeni yami, iwisile amandla ami; iNkosi inginikele ezandleni zabo, ngingelakho ukuvuka.
INkosi yeyisile intombi emsulwa, indodakazi yakoJuda, isikhamelo sewayini.
Ngenxa yalezizinto ngiyakhala inyembezi; ilihlo lami, ilihlo lami umphefumulo wami ukhatshana lami; abantwana bami bachithakele ngoba isitha sinqobile.
IZiyoni iyelula ongcolileyo phakathi kwabo.
IN KOSI wayo. Ake lizwe, bantu lonke, libone usizi lwami. Intombi zami ezimsulwa lamajaha ami baye ekuthunjweni.
Ngabiza izithandwa zami bavuselele umphefumulo wabo.
Bona, N, ngoba ngilusizi; imibilini yami.
Bezwile ukuthi mina ngiyabubula njengami.
Kabufike iphela amandla.
INkosi iyigubuzele kangakanani zayo ngosuku lwentukuthelo yayo!
INkosi iginyile zawo.
Iqumile ngokuvutha imelene loJakobe njengomlilo welangabi oqothula inhlangothi zonke.
Igobisile izinto eziloyisekayo zamehlo ethenteni lendodakazi yeZiyoni; yathulula ulaka lwayo njengomlilo.
INkosi lesililo kundodakazi yakoJuda.
Ithethe inkosi lompristi ngokuvutha kolaka lwakhe.
INkosi ilahlile umsindo endlini yeN njengosukwini lomkhosi omisiweyo.
IN KOSI amandla.
Amasango ayo atshonile kabatholi umbono uvela eNni.
Abadala bendodakazi yeZiyoni bahlezi amasaka; izintombi zeJerusalema zikhothamisele emhlabathini amakhanda azo.
Amehlo ami ezitaladeni zomuzi.
Bathi kubonina: Angaphi bedangala njengabagwaziweyo ezitaladeni zomuzi, lapho umphefumulo wabo uzithululela esifubeni sabonina.
Ngingakufakazelani? Kuyini kwakho kukhulu njengolwandle; ngubani ongakwelapha?
Abaprofethi yamanga lezinkohliso.
Bonke abedlulayo ngendlela yomhlaba wonke?
Zonke.
IN KOSI lwabamelene lawe.
Inhliziyo yabo yakhala eNkosini: Wena yelihlo lakho ingapheli!
Sukuma, unqongoloze kwaso sonke isitalada.
Bona, N, ukhangele ukuthi wenze bazabulawa endaweni engcwele yeNkosi yini?
Abatsha.
Wabiza njeng o suk winiolumisiweyo ngabakhulisa isitha sami sabaqedile.
Ngiyindoda yolaka lwayo.
Ingikhokhele yangihambisa e mnyam enikodwa hatshi e kukhany eni.
Isibili iphenduke yamelana lami; iphendule isandla sayo imelene lamiusuku lonke.
Igugisile amathambo ami.
Yakhile.
Ingihlalise endulo.
Ingibiyele ngingaphumi, yenza iketane lami lethusi laba nzima.
Njalo nxa ngikhala ngimemeza, ivalela phandle umkhuleko wami.
Ibiyele izindlela zami zagoba.
Yaba kimi njengebhere ezindaweni zensitha.
Iphambule izindlela zami, yangidabudabula.
Igobisile njengento yokunenjwa ngomtshoko.
Yenze yayo angena ezinsweni zami.
Ngaba yinhlekisa usuku lonke.
Ingisuthise umhlonyane.
Njalo ichoboze amazinyo ami ngokhethe emlotheni.
Njalo wena walahla.
Ngakho eNni.
Khumbula inhlupheko.
Umphefumulo wami uhlala u ku khumbula, njalo ukhotheme phakathi kwami.
Lokhu ngiyakubuyisela ngiyathemba.
Kuyizihawu zeN ukuthi kasiqedwanga izisa zakhe kazipheli;
zintsha ikuseni yonke uthembeko lwayo.
iyisabelo sami kiyo.
ilungile kwabayilindelayo, kumphefumulo o yidingayo.
Kuhle ukuthi umuntuathembe kusindiso lweN.
Kuhle.
Kahlale yedwa, athule, ngoba isimethese lona.
Kabeke umlomo wakhe othulini; mhlawumbe kungaba khona ithemba.
Kanikele isihlathi sakhe komtshayayo; asuthe inhlamba.
Ngoba iNkosi kayiyikulahla kuze kube phakade.
Ngoba lanxa idabukisile bezisa zayo.
Ngoba abantwana babantu;
ukuchoboza ngaphansi kwenyawo zayo zonke izibotshwa zomhlaba;
ukuphambukisa ilungelo lomuntu phambi kobuso boPhezukonke;
ukuphambanisa yini?
Ngubani ongakukhuluma, njalo kwenzeke, nxaiNkosi inga ku layanga?
Kakuphumi ububi yini?
Ngakho zakhe?
Asihlole silinge izindlela zethu, sibuyele eNni.
Asiphakamisele inhliziyo lezandla zethu kuNkulunkulu emazulwini.
Siphambukile; wena kawuthethelelanga.
Wembese ngolaka, waxotshana lathi, wabulala, kawuhawukelanga.
Uzembese ngeyezi, ukuze kungedluli umkhuleko.
Usenze saba yimfucuza lezibi phakathi kwezizwe.
Zonke umlomo wazo zimelene lathi.
Ukwesaba lokwephuka.
Ilihlo lami lehlisa imifula yamanzi ngokuchitheka kwendodakazi yabantu bami.
Ilihlo lami,
ize ikhangele phansi ibone isezulwini.
Ilihlo lami lenza yawo wonke amadodakazi omuzi wakithi.
Izitha zami zingizingele.
Bayiqumile ilitshe phezu kwami.
Amanzi.
Ngabiza phansi;
wezwa kwami, ekukhaleleni kwami usizo.
Wasondela: Ungesabi.
Nkosi, uzimele impilo yami.
N, ubonile ukoniwa udaba lwami.
Ubonile yonke impindiselo yabo, wonke amacebo abo amelene lami.
Uzwile inhlamba yabo amelene lami,
indebe zabangivukelayo kumelene lami lonke usuku.
Khangela ukuhlala yabo.
Buyisela wezandla zabo.
Banike ubulukhuni benhliziyo, isiqalekiso sakho kibo.
Xotshana la bongolaka, ubabhubhise bangabi ngaphansi eN.
Yeka kwazo zonke izitalada.
Amadodana aligugu eZiyoni, alinganiswa legolide elihle, umsebenzi wezandla zombumbi!
Ngitsho amakhanka enkangala.
Ulimi lomunyayo lunamathela.
Ababesidla izibiliboco inqumbi zomquba.
Ngoba icala kwangathi ngomzuzwana, kungelazandla ezayonayo.
AmaNazari.
Ukubonakala kwawo se kumnyama kulomsizi sinamathele emathanjeni awo, somile, saba njengogodo.
Ababulawa ngenkemba bangcono kulababulawa yindlala; ngoba laba bayacikizeka yikuswela izithelo zensimu.
Izandla abantwana babo; baba yikudla kwabo ekwephukeni kwendodakazi yabantu bami.
iphelelisile umlilo eZiyoni oqothule izisekelo zayo.
Amakhosi omhlaba labo bonke abakhileyo bomhlaba babengayikukholwa ukuthi umcindezeli lesitha babengangena emasangweni eJerusalema.
Kwakungenxa igazi labalungileyo phakathi kwayo.
Bazula njenge ziphofu ezitaladeni, bangcoliswa abantukabangelakuthinta izembatho zabo.
Bamemeza kubo bathi: Sukani, kungcolile, sukani, sukani, lingathinti! Lapho bebaleka njalo bezula, bathi phakathi kwabezizwe: Kabasayikuhlala njengabezizwe.
Ubuso ubuso babapristi, kababanga lomusa kubadala.
Thina e singelakusisindisa.
Bazingela sesifikile.
Abasizingelayo balejubane lathi ngokutshiseka ezintabeni; basicathamela enkangala.
Umoya komthunzi wakhe sizaphila phakathi kwezizwe.
Jabula.

Ekuseni ilizwi leN laselifika kimi lisithi:
Ndodana yomuntu, kayitshongo yini kuwe indlu kaIsrayeli, indlu evukelayo?
Tshono kibo: Itsho njalo iNkosi uJehova: Lo umthwalo umayelanalesiphathamandla eJerusalema, layo yonke indlu kaIsrayeli ephakathi kwabo.
Wothi: Ngiyisibonakaliso senu.
Njalo isiphathamandla esiphakathi kwabo.
Njalo ngizakwendlala imbule lami phezu kwaso.
Labo bonke abasihanqileyo ukubalusizo lwaso lalo lonke ibutho laso.
Khona bazakwazi ukuthi ngiyiN KOSI.
Kodwa ngizatshiya amadoda amalutshwana kibo.
Ilizwi leN lafika kimi futhi lisithi:
Ndodana yomuntu, dlana isinkwa sakho ngokuqhaqhazela, unathe amanzi akho ngokuthuthumela langokukhathazeka.
Ubususithi ebantwini belizwe: Itsho njalo iNkosi uJehova ngabahlali beJerusalema, ngelizwe lakoIsrayeli: Bazakudla isinkwa sabo ngokukhathazeka.
Lemizi okuhlalwa kiyo izakuba ngamanxiwa.
Ilizwi leN laselifika kimi lisithi:
Ndodana yomuntu, kuyini lesisaga elilaso elizweni lakoIsrayeli esithi: Insuku ziyelulwa?
Ngakho batshele uthi: Itsho njalo iNkosi uJehova: Ngizakwenza lesisaga siphele, njalo kabasayikusisebenzisa njengesaga koIsrayeli; kodwa tshono kibo: Kusondele izinsuku.
Ngoba kakusayikuba khona.
Ngoba mina N ngizakhuluma; ilizwi engizalikhuluma lizakwenzeka.
Lafika futhi kimi ilizwi leN lisithi:
Ndodana yomuntu, khangela, abendlu yakoIsrayeli bathi: Umbono awubonayo.
Ngakho uthi kibo: Itsho njalo iNkosi uJehova: Kakusayikuphuziswa.
Ilizwi leN laselifika kimi lisithi:
Ndodana yomuntu, profetha umelene labaprofethi bakoIsrayeli abaprofethayo, utsho kibo abaprofetha okwenhliziyo yabo: Zwanini ilizwi leN.
Itsho njalo iNkosi uJehova: Maye kubaprofethi abayizithutha, abalandela umoya wabo, abangabonanga lutho!
Israyeli, abaprofethi bakho banjengamakhanka emanxiweni.
Kalenyukelanga ezikhexeni.
Babone okuyize; bathemba ekuqinisweni kwelizwi.
Kalibonanga yini umbono oyize.
Ngakho itsho njalo iNkosi uJehova: Ngoba likhulume okuyize, labona amanga, ngakho, khangelani, ngimelene lani, itsho iNkosi uJehova.
Njalo isandla sami sizakuba phezu kwabaprofethi ababona okuyize.
Ngoba, yebo ngoba beduhise abantu bami.
Tshono kulabo abawubhada ngekalaga ukuthi uzakuwa.
Khangela-ke, nxa umduli usuwile, kakuyikutshiwo yini kini ukuthi: Lungaphi udaka elalibhade ngalo?
Ngakho itsho njalo iNkosi uJehova: Ngiza wu qhekeza ngomoya wesiphepho ekuthukutheleni kwami.
Ngokunjalo ngizadiliza umduli eliwubhade ngekalaga, ngiwuwisele emhlabathini, ukuze kwembuleke isisekelo sawo, uwe; njalo lizaqedwa phakathi kwawo.
Ngokunjalo ngizaphelelisa ulaka lwami emdulini laphezu kwalabo abawubhade ngekalaga, besengisithi kini: Umduli kawu se kho, lalabo abawubhadayo kabakho;
okutshoabaprofethi bakoIsrayeli abaprofetha ngeJerusalema, labayibonela umbono wokuthula, kanti kungelakuthula, itsho iNkosi uJehova.
Wena-ke ndodana yomuntu, misa ubuso bakho.
Ubususithi: Itsho njalo iNkosi uJehova: Maye kwabesifazana abathungela izigqizo?

Futhi lizangingcolisa yini phakathi kwabantu bami ngenxa yezandla ezigcwele ibhali, langenxa yezincezu zezinkwa, ukuthi libulale imiphefumulo ebingayikufa, lokuthi ligcine iphila imiphefumulo ebingayikuphila, ngokuqamba amanga kwenu ebantwini bami abalalela amanga?

Ngalokho itsho njalo iNkosi uJehova: Khangelani, ngimelene lezigqizo zenu, elizingela ngazo lapho imiphefumulo liyenza iphaphe; ngizaziqamula engalweni zenu, ngiyekele imiphefumulo ihambe, ngitsho imiphefumulo eliyizingelayo liyenza iphaphe.
Lezimbombozo zenu ezinde ngizazidabula.
Ngoba lidanisile inhliziyo yolungileyo ng amanga, engingamdabukisanga mina.
Ngakho kalisayikubona okuyize njalo kaliyikuvumisa okuvunyiswayo.
Kwasekufika kimi abanye babadala bakoIsrayeli, bahlala phambi kwami.
Ilizwi leN laselifika kimi lisithi:
Ndodana yomuntu, lamadoda amise izithombe zawo enhliziyweni yawo, abeka isikhubekiso sesiphambeko sawo phambi kobuso bawo?

Ngakho khuluma lawo, uthi kuwo: Itsho njalo iNkosi uJehova: Wonke umuntu wendlu kaIsrayeli omisa izithombe zakhe enhliziyweni yakhe, abeke isikhubekiso sesiphambeko sakhe phambi kobuso bakhe, abesesiza kumprofethi, mina ngizamphendula njengobunengi bezithombe zakhe;
ukuze ngibambe indlu kaIsrayeli ngenhliziyo yabo.
Ngakho tshono kuyo indlu kaIsrayeli: Itsho njalo iNkosi uJehova: Phendukani, lifulathele izithombe zenu, lifulathelise ubuso benu kuzo zonke izinengiso zenu.
Ngoba ngulowo lalowo wendlu kaIsrayeli, kumbe owezizweni ohlala koIsrayeli njengowezizwe ozehlukanisa ekungilandeleni, amise izithombe zakhe enhliziyweni yakhe.
Ngizamisa ubuso bami ngimelane lalowomuntu.
Futhi uba umprofethi ekhohliseka, nxa ekhulume ilizwi, mina N ngimkhohlisile lowomprofethi; njalo ngizakwelulela isandla sami phezu kwakhe, ngimbhubhise asuke phakathi kwabantu bami uIsrayeli.
Njalo bazathwala icala labo;
ukuze indlu kaIsrayeli ingabe isaphambuka ekungilandeleni.
Ilizwi leN lafika kimi futhi lisithi:
Ndodana yomuntu, lapho ilizwe lisona kimi ngokuphambeka okukhulu, ngizakwelulela isandla sami phezu kwalo;
lanxa lamadoda amathathu.
Uba ngidabulisa izilo ezimbi elizweni, zenze lifelwe ngabantwana, lize libe lunxiwa, kuze kungabi khona odlulayo ngenxa yezilo,
lobalamadoda amathathu abephakathi kwalo.
Kumbe uba;
loba lamadoda amathathu abephakathi kwalo.
Kumbe ubangithumela umatshayabhuqe wesifo kulelolizwe;
loba oNowa, uDaniyeli, loJobe bebephakathi kwalo.
Ngoba itsho njalo iNkosi uJehova: Kakhulu kangakanani lapho ngithuma izahlulelo zami ezine ezimbi phezu kweJerusalema.
Kodwa khangela, kuzasala kiyo abaphephileyo abazakhutshwa, amadodana lamadodakazi.
Ngokunjalo bazaliduduza.
Ilizwi leN laselifika kimi lisithi:
Ndodana yomuntu, isihlahla sevini siyini ngaphezu kwaso sonke isihlahla, kumbeugatsha oluphakathi kwezihlahla zegusu?
Kuzathathwa kiso isigodo yini ukwenza umsebenzi? Bangathatha kiso isikhonkwane yini ukuthi balengise lasiphi isitsha kiso?
Khangela yini?
Khangela, lapho sisaphelele, asenziwanga sibe ngumsebenzi; kuncane kangakanani lapho umlilo ususiqedile sesitshile sisezakwenziwa sibe ngumsebenzi!
Ngakho itsho njalo iNkosi uJehova: Njengesihlahla sevini phakathi kwezihlahla zegusu, engisinikele emlilweni sibe yikudla, ngokunjalo ngizanikela abahlali beJerusalema.
Ngoba ngizamisa ubuso bami bumelane labo.
Njalo ngizakwenza ilizwe libe lunxiwa, ngoba benze isiphambeko, itsho iNkosi uJehova.
Ilizwi leN lafika kimi futhi lisithi:
Ndodana yomuntu, yenza iJerusalema yazi amanyala ayo,
uthi: Itsho njalo iNkosi uJehova kuyo iJerusalema: Ukudabuka kwakho lokuzalwa kwakho.

Mayelana lokuzalwa kwakho, ngosuku owazalwa ngalo inkaba yakho kayiqunywanga, njalo kawugeziswanga emanzini ukuthi u hlanjululwe, kawugcotshwanga ngetshwayi ngitsho, kawugoqelwanga ngamalembu ngitsho.
Kakulalihlo elakuhawukelayo, ukuthi lenze yiloba yikuphi kwalezizinto kuwe, ukuthi likuhawukele.
Kwathi ngisedlula kuwe ngikubona uqhatsha egazini lakho, ngathi kuwe usegazini lakho.
Ngikwenzile waba linani elikhulu, waba njengehlumela leganga, wanda, wakhula.

Kwathi ngisedlula kuwe ngakubona, khangela-ke, isikhathi sakho sasiyisikhathi sothando; ngasengisendlala umphetho wesembatho sami phezu kwakho, ngembesa ubunqunu bakho; yebo, ngafunga kuwe, ngangena esivumelwaneni lawe, itsho iNkosi uJehova.
Ngasengikugezisa ngamanzi, ngahlambulula igazi lakho elinengi kuwe, ngakugcoba ngamafutha.
Ngakugqokisa ilembu elifekethisiweyo.
Ngakucecisa ngeziceciso.
Ngafaka isongo emakhaleni akho, lamacici ezindlebeni zakho.
Ngokunjalo waceciswa ngegolide lesiliva.
Lodumo lwakho lwaphumela ezizweni.
Kodwa wathembela ebuhleni bakho, kwaba ngokwakhe.
Wathatha ezembathweni zakho, wazenzela indawo eziphakemeyo; izinto ezinjekaziyikuza, njalo kakuyikwenzeka.
Wathatha futhi izitsha zakho ezinhle egolideni lami lesiliveni sami engangikunike khona.
Wathatha izembatho zakho ezifekethisiweyo.
Lokudla kwami engakunika khona, wakubeka phambi kwazo kwaba liphunga elimnandi; kwaba njalo, itsho iNkosi uJehova.
Wasuthatha amadodana akho lamadodakazi akho, owawungizalele wona,
ukuze ubulale abantwana bami?
Lakuwo wonke amanyala akho lokuwula kwakho kawukhumbulanga insuku zobutsha bakho.
Kwasekusithi emva kwayo yonke inkohlakalo yakho (maye, maye kuwe! itsho iNkosi uJehova),
wazakhela idundulu, wazenzela indawo ephakemeyo kuso sonke isitalada.
Kuyo yonke inhloko yendlela wakhile indawo yakho ephakemeyo.
Njalo waphinga.
Ngakho, khangela, ngelulele isandla sami phezu kwakho, nganciphisa.
Uwulile futhi.
Wandisa futhi ukuwula kwakho; kodwa langalokhu kawusuthisekanga.
Ibuthakathaka kangakanani inhliziyo yakho, itsho iNkosi uJehova, ekwenzeni kwakho zonke lezizinto, umsebenzi wowesifazana ophingayo, obusayo,
ekwakheni kwakho idundulu lakho enhlokweni yayo yonke indlela.
Umfazi ofebayo, endaweni yendoda yakhe uthatha abemzini!
Bapha isipho kuwo wonke amawule. Kodwa wena unika isipho sakho kuzo zonke izithandwa zakho, uzithenga ukuze zize kuwe enhlangothini zonke ngokuwula kwakho.
Ngakho kuwe kulokuphambene labesifazana ekuwuleni kwakho, ngoba kakho olandela wena ukuyawula; lekunikeni kwakho iholo lewule.
Ngakho, wena wule, zwana ilizwi leN.
Itsho njalo iNkosi uJehova: Ngoba ukuwula kwakho kuthululiwe, lobunqunu bakho bembulwa ngokuwula kwakho lezithandwa zakho, langazo zonke izithombe zezinengiso zakho.
Ngakho, khangela, ngizaqoqa zonke izithandwa zakho obuthokoza lazo.
Njalo ngizakugweba, ngikuphe igazi lentukuthelo lobukhwele.
Ngizakunikela futhi esandleni sazo, ziwisele phansi idundulu lakho.
Zikwenyuselele ixuku.
Zitshise izindlu zakho ngomlilo.
Ngokunjalo ngizakwenza ukukuthukuthelela kwami kuphumule, lobukhwele bami busuke kuwe; njalo ngizathula, ngingabe ngisathukuthela.
Ngenxa yokuthi ungakhumbulanga insuku zobutsha bakho.
Khangela, wonke osebenzisa izaga uzasebenzisa isaga ngawe esithi: Njengonina injaloindodakazi yakhe.
Wena uyindodakazi kanyoko, owayesenyanya indoda yakhe labantwana bakhe.
Lodadewenu omdala yiSamariya.
Kanti kawuhambanga ngezindlela zabo, wenze njengokwezinengiso zabo.
Kuphila kwami, itsho iNkosi uJehova.
Khangela, lesi sasiyisiphambeko seSodoma udadewenu: Ukuzigqaja, ukusutha isinkwa, lokuchelesa okulokuthula kwakukuyo lakumadodana ayo, kodwa kaqinisanga isandla sabayanga labaswelayo.
Babeziphakamisa, benza isinengiso phambi kwami.
Futhi iSamariya kayonanga ngengxenye yezono zakho.
Lawe.
Lapho ngizabuyisa abathunjiweyo babo, abathunjwa beSodoma lamadodakazi ayo, labathunjwa beSamariya lamadodakazi ayo, khona ngizabuyisaukuthunjwa kwabathunjwa bakho phakathi kwabo.
Ukuze uthwale ihlazo lakho.
Lapho odadewenu iSodoma lamadodakazi ayo bezabuyela esimeni sabo sakuqala, leSamariya lamadodakazi ayo babuyele esimeni sabo sakuqala, lawe lamadodakazi akho lizabuyela esimeni senu sakuqala.
Ngoba iSodoma udadewenu kayibanga semlonyeni wakho njengombiko ngosuku lokuzigqaja kwakho,
bungakembulwa ububi bakho, ngesikhathi sehlazo lamadodakazi eSiriya.
Wena uthwele amacebo akho amabi lezinengiso zakho, itsho iN.
Ngoba itsho njalo iNkosi uJehova: Ngizakwenza lakuwe njengokwenza kwakho, odelela.
Kube kanti mina ngizakhumbula isivumelwano sami lawe.
Khona uzakhumbula izindlela zakho.
Njalo mina ngizamisa isivumelwano sami lawe.
Ukuze ukhumbule, ube lenhloni.
Ilizwi leN laselifika kimi lisithi:
Ndodana yomuntu, yenza ilibho,
uthi: Itsho njalo iNkosi uJehova: Ukhozi olukhulu,
lwaqunta isihloko sezingatshana zawo ezintsha.
Lwaseluthatha okwenhlanyelo yalelolizwe.
Yasihluma, yaba livini elinabayo.
Kwasekusiba khona olunye ukhozi olukhulu.
Lalihlanyelwe ensimini enhle ngasemanzini amanengi ukuthi liveze ingatsha.

Wothi: Itsho njalo iNkosi uJehova: Lizaphumelela yini? Kaluyikusiphuna yini impande zalo, luqume izithelo zalo, libune? Lizabuna kuwo wonke amahlamvu alo amatsha okumila kwalo, kungengengalo enkulu labantu abanengi, ukulisiphuna ngempande zalo.
Yebo, khangela, selihlanyelwe lizaphumelela yini.
Laselifika ilizwi leN kimi lisithi:
Tshono khathesi kuyo indlu evukelayo, yathatha inkosi yayo leziphathamandla zayo, yabaletha ngakuyo eBhabhiloni.
Yathatha owenzalo yesikhosini, yenza isivumelwano laye;
ukuze umbuso ube phansi, ungaziphakamisi, ukuthi ngokulondoloza isivumelwano sakhe ume.
Kodwa wayivukela?
Kuphila kwami, itsho iNkosi uJehova.
Njalo, ukuquma abantu abanengi.
Ngoba edelele isifungo.
Ngakho, itsho njalo iNkosi uJehova: Kuphila kwami.
Ngizakwendlala imbule lami phezu kwakhe.
Labo bonke ababalekayo bakhe kanye lawo wonke amaviyo akhe bazakuwa ngenkemba.
Itsho njalo iNkosi uJehova: Lami ngizathatha esihlokweni somsedari omude, ngikumise.
Entabeni yengqonga yakoIsrayeli ngizaluhlanyela.
Ngokunjalo zonke izihlahla zeganga zizakwazi ukuthi mina ngithobisile isihlahla eside.
Ilizwi leN lafika kimi futhi lisithi:
Litshoni, ukuthi lisebenzise lesisaga ngelizwe lakoIsrayeli?
Kuphila kwami, itsho iNkosi uJehova.
Khangela, yonke imiphefumulo ngeyami; njengomphefumulo kayise, unjalo lomphefumulo wendodana, kungokwami. Umphefumulo owonayo, wona uzakufa.
Kodwa uba umuntu elungile, enze ukwahlulela lokulunga,
engadleli phezu kwezintaba,
engacindezeli muntu,
enganiki,
ehamba ngezimiso zami, egcina izahlulelo zami, ukwenza iqiniso.
Uba ezala indodana engumphangi, umchithi wegazi, lowenza okufanana lokunye kwalezizinto,
longenzi zonke lezozinto, kodwa ngitsho edlela phezu kwezintaba,
ecindezela umyanga loswelayo,
enika ngenzuzo, athathe ngokwengezelelweyo, uzaphila yini? Kayikuphila; wenze zonke lezizinengiso; uzakufa lokufa.
Khangela-ke, uzala indodana ebona zonke izono zikayise azenzileyo, ibona, ingenzi njengalezizinto,
ingadleli phezu kwezintaba,
ingacindezeli muntu,
isuse isandla sayo kongumyanga.
Uyise, ngoba ecindezele ngocindezelo.
Kanti lithi: Kungani indodana ingathwali isiphambeko sikayise.
Umphefumulo owonayo, wona uzakufa.
Kodwa uba omubi ephenduka ezonweni zakhe zonke azenzileyo.
Iziphambeko zakhe zonke azenzileyo kaziyikukhunjulelwa kuye; ekulungeni kwakhe akwenzileyo, uzaphila.
Ngiyathokoza lokuthokoza ngokufa kokhohlakeleyo yini? itsho iNkosi uJehova; kakusikuthi aphenduke ezindleleni zakhe, aphile yini?
Kodwa nxa olungileyo ephenduka ekulungeni kwakhe, esenza isiphambeko, enze njengokwezinengiso zonke azenzayo omubi, uzaphila yini.
Kanti lithi: Indlela yeNkosi kayilingani. Zwanini-ke, lina ndlu kaIsrayeli; indlela yami kayilingani yini? Kayisizo yini izindlela zenu ezingalinganiyo?
Lapho olungileyo ephenduka ekulungeni kwakhe, enze iziphambeko, afele kuzo, eziphambekweni azenzileyo uzakufa.
Futhi nxa omubi ephenduka ebubini bakhe abenzileyo.
Ngoba ebona, ephenduka kuzo zonke iziphambeko zakhe azenzileyo.
Kanti indlu kaIsrayeli ithi: Indlela yeNkosi kayilingani. Wena ndlu kaIsrayeli, indlela zami kazilingani yini? Kayisizo yini indlela zenu ezingalinganiyo?
Ngakho ngizalahlulela, lina ndlu kaIsrayeli, ngulowo lalowo njengokwendlela zakhe, itsho iNkosi uJehova.
Lahlani lisuse kini zonke iziphambeko zenu eliphambeke ngazo?
Ngoba kangithokozi ngokufa kofayo, itsho iNkosi uJehova.
Wena-ke, phakamisa isililo ngezikhulu zakoIsrayeli,
uthi: Uyini unyoko? Isilwanekazi; salala phakathi kwezilwane.
Sakhulisa omunye wemidlwane yaso, waba libhongo.
Izizwe zasezisizwa ngawo, wabanjwa.
Kwathi sibona ukuthi sesilindile, lokuthiithemba laso selibhubhile.
Wahamba waya le lale phakathi kwezilwane, waba libhongo.
Wazazi inqaba zabo, wachitha imizi yabo.
Izizwe zasezisima zimelene lawo inhlangothi zonke.
Zawufaka ekhejini ngamaketane, zawusa enkosini yeBhabhiloni.
Unyoko unjengevini.
Lalilezinti eziqinileyo ezaba zintonga zababusayo.
Kodwa lasitshunwa ngokuthukuthela, laphoselwa emhlabathini, lomoya wempumalanga womisa isithelo salo.
Khathesi selihlanyelwe enkangala.
Umlilo usuphume oluthini.
Kwasekusithi ngomnyaka wesikhombisa, nge nyangayesihlanu, ngolwetshumi lwenyanga, abathile babadala bakoIsrayeli beza uku za buza iN KOSI.
Ilizwi leN laselifika kimi lisithi:
Ndodana yomuntu, khuluma kubadala bakoIsrayeli, uthi kibo: Itsho njalo iNkosi uJehova: Lize uku za ngibuza yini.
Uzabahlulela yini, uza ba hlulela yini, ndodana yomuntu;
uthi kibo: Itsho njalo iNkosi uJehova: Ngosuku engakhetha ngalo uIsrayeli.
Ngalolusuku ngaphakamisa isandla sami kibo.
Ngasengisithi kibo: Lahlani ngulowo lalowo izinengiso.
Kodwa bangivukela, bengavumi ukulalela kimi.
Kodwa ngakwenza.
Ngakho ngabakhupha elizweni leGibhithe.
Ngabanika izimiso zami, ngabazisa izahlulelo zami.
Ngabanika futhi amasabatha ami ukuze abe yisibonakaliso phakathi kwami labo.
Kodwa indlu kaIsrayeli yangivukela enkangala.
Kodwa ngakwenza ngenxa yebizo lami.
Futhi lami ngabaphakamisela isandla sami enkangala, ukuthi kangiyikubaletha elizweni engangilinike bona;
ngoba badelela izahlulelo zami.
Lanxa kunjalo.
Kodwa ngathi kubantwana babo enkangala.
NgiyuNkulunkulu wenu; hambani ngezimiso zami, ligcine izahlulelo zami, lizenze.
Lingcwelise.
Kodwa abantwana.
Kodwa ngabuyisa isandla sami, engangibakhuphe phambi kwamehlo azo.
Mina ngabaphakamisela isandla sami futhi enkangala;
ngoba bengazenzanga izahlulelo zami.
Ngakho mina ngabanika futhi izimiso ezazingalunganga, lezahlulelo ababengeke baphile ngazo.
Ngasengibangcolisa kuzo izipho zabo.
Ngakho, ndodana yomuntu, khuluma kuyo indlu yakoIsrayeli, uthi kibo: Itsho njalo iNkosi uJehova: Lakulokhu oyihlo bangihlambazile, ngokuthi baphambeke isiphambeko bemelene lami.
Lapho sengibalethe elizweni, engaphakamisela isandla sami ngalo ukuthi ngibanike lona.
Ngasengisithi kibo: Iyini indawo ephakemeyo eliya kuyo.
Ngakho tshono kuyo indlu kaIsrayeli: Itsho njalo iNkosi uJehova: Lizazingcolisa ngendlela yaboyihlo yini?
Ngoba lapho linikela izipho zenu.
Lalokho okuvela engqondweni yenu kakuyikuba khona ngitsho.
Kuphila kwami, itsho iNkosi uJehova!
Ngoba ngizalikhupha ebantwini.
Njalo ngizaliletha enkangala yabantu.
Njengalokhu.
Njalo ngizalidlulisa ngaphansi kwentonga, ngilingenise kusibopho sesivumelwano.
Ngihlanze ngikhuphe phakathi kwenu abavukeli.
Lina-ke, ndlu kaIsrayeli, itsho njalo iNkosi uJehova, hambani likhonze, ngulowo lalowo izithombe zakhe.
Ngoba entabeni yami engcwele.
Ngizalemukela ngephunga elimnandi.
Lizakwazi-ke ukuthi ngiyiN KOSI.
Lapho-ke lizakhumbula.
Beselisazi ukuthi ngiyiN KOSI.
Ilizwi leN lafika kimi futhi lisithi:
Ndodana yomuntu, misa ubuso bakho ngasendleleni yeningizimu;
uthi kilo igusu leningizimu: Zwana ilizwi leN: Itsho njalo iNkosi uJehova: Khangela, ngizaphemba umlilo phakathi kwakho.
Futhi yonke inyama izabona ukuthi mina N ngiwuphembile, kawuyikucitshwa.
Ngasengisithi: Hawu, Nkosi Jehova?
Ilizwi leN laselifika kimi lisithi:
Ndodana yomuntu, misa ubuso bakho ngaseJerusalema;
uthi elizweni lakoIsrayeli: Itsho njalo iN: Khangela, ngimelene lawe, njalo ngizahwatsha inkemba yami esikhwameni sayo.
Ngenxa yokuthi ngizaquma;
ukuthi yonke inyama ikwazi ukuthi mina N ngiyihwatshile inkemba yami esikhwameni sayo.
Wena-ke, ndodana yomuntu, bubula ngokudabuka kokhalo, langokubaba ububule phambi kwamehlo abo.
Kuzakuthi-ke nxa besithi kuwe: Wena ububulelani? uzaphendula: Ngenxa yombiko; ngoba uyeza; layo yonke inhliziyo izancibilika.
Ilizwi leN laselifika kimi lisithi:
Ndodana yomuntu, profetha uthi: Itsho njalo iN: Wothi: Inkemba.
Ilolelwe ukuthi ibulale lokubulala.
Njalo uyinikele ukuthi ilolongwe ukuze iphathwe ngesandla.

Khala, uqhinqe isililo, ndodana yomuntu, ngoba yona izakuba phezu kwabantu bami, izakuba phezu kwazo zonke iziphathamandla zakoIsrayeli; zizaphoselwa enkembeni kanye labantu bami; ngakho, tshaya ethangazini lakho.
Ngoba kuyikuhlolwa, pho, kuzakuba njani nxa intonga idelela.
Ngakho wena, ndodana yomuntu, profetha, utshaye isandla esandleni.
Ngimise umcijo wenkemba umelene lamasango abo wonke, ukuze inhliziyo incibilike lezikhubekiso zande.
Hamba ngendlela enye kumbe ngenye, ngakwesokunene, umise ngakwesokhohlo.
Lami-ke ngizatshaya isandla sami esandleni sami.
Ilizwi leN lafika kimi futhi lisithi:
Wena-ke, ndodana yomuntu, zimisele izindlela ezimbili, ukuze inkemba yenkosi yeBhabhiloni ibuye; elizweni linye zizaphuma zombili.
Misa indlela, ukuze inkemba ize, lakoJuda eJerusalema ebiyelweyo.
Ngoba inkosi yeBhabhiloni yema kunina wendlela, ibuze izithombe, ikhangele esibindini.
Esandleni sakhe sokunene kwakulokuvumisa ngeJerusalema, ukumisa izinqama zokudiliza, ukuvula umlomo ekubulaleni.
Njalo kuzakuba kubo njengokuvumisa kwamanga emehlweni abo, kubo abafunge izifungo.

Ngakho itsho njalo iNkosi uJehova: Ngoba lenze ububi benu bukhunjulwe, ngokwembulwa kweziphambeko zenu, kuze kuthi izono zenu zibonakale kuzo zonke izenzo zenu, ngoba likhunjulwe, lizabanjwa ngesandla.
Wena-ke, siphathamandla esingcolileyo,
itsho njalo iNkosi uJehova: Susa iqhiye, wethule umqhele; lokhu kakuyikuba yikho.
Ngizakwenza kube lunxiwa, unxiwa, unxiwa; lokhu kungabi kusaba khona.
Wena-ke, ndodana yomuntu, profetha uthi: Itsho njalo iNkosi uJehova ngabantwana bakoAmoni.
Besakubonela okuyize.
Buyisela inkembaesikhwameni sayo.
Njalo ngizathululela intukuthelo yami phezu kwakho.
Uzakuba yikudla komlilo; igazi lakho libe phakathi kwelizwe; kawuyikukhunjulwa.
Ilizwi leN laselifika kimi lisithi:
Wena-ke, ndodana yomuntu, uzakwehlulela yini.
Ubususithi: Itsho njalo iNkosi uJehova: Umuzi ochitha igazi phakathi kwawo.
Wena usulecala.
Abaseduze labakhatshana lawe bazakuhleka usulu, wena ongcolileyo ngebizo, ogcwele isiphithiphithi.
Khangela, iziphathamandla zakoIsrayeli zaziphakathi kwakho.
Baphathe uyihlo lonyoko ngokweyisa kuwe.
Uzidelele izinto zami ezingcwele.
Abantu abahlebayo.
Bembule ubunqunu baboyise phakathi kwakho.
Futhi omunye wenze amanyala lomfazi kamakhelwane wakhe.
Phakathi kwakho bemukele izipho.
Khangela-ke ngitshayile isandla sami.
Inhliziyo yakho izakuma yini, kumbe izandla zakho ziqine, ensukwini engizaphathana lawe.
Ngikuhlakaze phakathi kwezizwe.
Njalo uzangcoliswa phakathi kwakho emehlweni abezizwe.
Ilizwi leN laselifika kimi lisithi:
Ndodana yomuntu, indlu kaIsrayeli isibengamanyele kimi.
Ngakho itsho njalo iNkosi uJehova: Ngoba lonke selibengamanyele, ngakho khangelani, ngizalibuthelela phakathi kweJerusalema.
Njengobabebuthelela isiliva lethusi.
Yebo, ngizalibuthelela, ngivuthele phezu kwenu.
Njengesiliva sincibilikiswa phakathi kwesithando, ngokunjalo lizancibilikiswa phakathi kwaso.
Ilizwi leN laselifika kimi lisithi:
Ndodana yomuntu, wothi kiyo: Wena uyilizwe elingahlanjululwanga, le linganethwanga ngosuku lwentukuthelo.
Ugobe lwabaprofethi bayo phakathi kwayo, benza abafelokazi baba banengi phakathi kwayo.
Abapristi bayo.
Iziphathamandla zayo phakathi kwayo.
Labaprofethi bayo babacombe ngekalaga.
Abantu belizwe bacindezele ng ocindezelo, baphanga impango.
Njalo ngadinga umuntu phakathi kwabo.
Ngakho ngithululele intukuthelo yami phezu kwabo.
Ilizwi leN lafika kimi futhi lisithi:
Ndodana yomuntu, kwakulabesifazana ababili, amadodakazi omfazi oyedwa.
Basebesenza ubuwule.
Lamabizo abo ayenguOhola omdala, loOholiba umnawakhe.
UOhola wasesenza ubuwule engaphansi kwami,
agqoke okuluhlaza okwesibhakabhaka, abalawulimabutho lababusi.
Ngokunjalo wanika ubuwule bakhe kubo, bonke belikhethelo labantwana beAsiriya, lakubo bonke obakhanukayo; wazingcolisa ngazo zonke izithombe zabo.
Futhi kabuyekelanga ubuwule bakhe abuya laboeGibhithe.
Ngakho ngamnikela esandleni sezithandwa zakhe, esandleni sabantwana beAsiriya.
Bona baveza ubunqunu bakhe.
Kwathi umnawakhe uOholiba ekubona, lebuwuleni bakhe okwedlula ubuwule bukadadewabo.
Wakhanuka.
Ngasengibona ukuthi ungcolisiwe; bobabili babelendlelanye.
Wasesengezelela ebuwuleni bakhe; lapho ebona abesilisa bebazwe ngokugujwa emdulini,
bebhince ibhanti ezinkalweni zabo, belamaqhiye alengayo emakhanda abo, bonke bekhangeleka beyiziphathamandla, umfanekiso wabantwana beBhabhiloni, beKhaladiya, ilizwe lokuzalwa kwabo.
Wasebakhanuka eku ba boneni ngamehlo akhe.
Amadodana eBhabhiloni afika kuye embhedeni wothando, amngcolisa ngokuphinga kwawo, wasengcoliswa yiwo.
Wasesembula ubuwule bakhe, wembula ubunqunu bakhe; khona umphefumulo wami wehlukaniswa laye, njengalokhu umphefumulo wami wehlukaniswa lodadewabo.
Kodwa wandisa ubuwule bakhe.
Wasekhanuka izithandwa zabo.
Ngokunjalo wena wakhumbula amanyala obutsha bakho.
Ngakho, wena Oholiba, itsho njalo iNkosi uJehova: Khangela, ngizavusa izithandwa zakho zimelane lawe, owehlukana lazo umphefumulo wakho;
abantwana beBhabhiloni, lamaKhaladiya wonke, iPekodi, leShowa, leKowa, la bo bonke abantwana beAsiriya kanye labo.
Njalo bazakuza bemelene lawe bele zikhali, izinqola, lamavili, langexuku labantu.
Njalo ngizabeka ubukhwele bami bumelane lawe, bakuphathe ngolaka; bazasusa impumulo yakho lendlebe zakho, lensali yakho izakuwa ngenkemba; bona bazathatha amadodana lamadodakazi akho.
Futhi bazakuhlubula izigqoko zakho.
Ngokunjalo ngizaqeda amanyala akho kuwe.
Ngoba itsho njalo iNkosi uJehova: Khangela, ngizakunikela esandleni salabo obazondayo.
Njalo bazakuphatha ngenzondo, bathathe wonke umtshikatshika wakho.
Lezizinto zizakwenziwa kuwe, ngoba ulandele abezizweni ngokuwula, la ngenxa yokuthi wangcoliswa ngezithombe zabo.
Uhambile ngendlela kadadewenu; ngakho ngizanikela inkezo yakhe esandleni sakho.
Itsho njalo iNkosi uJehova: Uzanatha inkezo kadadewenu ezikileyo lebanzi; uzakuba yinhlekisa lokuklolodelwa; imumethe okunengi.
Uzagcwala ukudakwa losizi.
Yebo, uzayinatha.
Ngakho itsho njalo iNkosi uJehova: Ngoba ungikhohliwe.
yathi futhi kimi: Ndodana yomuntu, uzakwahlulela uOhola loOholiba yini.
Ngoba bafebile, legazi lisezandleni zabo, njalo bafebile lezithombe zabo.
Babuye benza lokhu kimi: Bangcolise indawo yami engcwele ngalolosuku.
Ngoba sebebulalele izithombe zabo abantwana babo.
Lalokho ukuthi bathumele kumadoda avela khatshana, okwathunywa kiwo isithunywa.
Wahlala embhedeni okhazimulayo.
Lelizwi lexuku elonwabileyo lalilaye.
Ngasengisithi kowesifazana owayeguge ngokufeba: Khathesi bazakwenza ubuwule laye, yena-ke labo.
Basebengena kuye, njengoba besiya kowesifazana oyisifebe; ngokunjalo bangena kuOhola lakuOholiba, abesifazana abalamanyala.
Kodwa amadoda alungileyo wona azabagweba, ngokwe ndlela yezifebekazi la nge ndlela yabesifazana abachitha igazi.
Ngoba itsho njalo iNkosi uJehova: Ngizabenyusela ixuku, ngibanikele babe yisesabiso njalo babe yimpango.
Njalo ixuku lizabakhanda ngamatshe, libaqume ngezinkemba zalo.
Ngokunjalo ngizakwenza amanyala aphele elizweni.
Ngokunjalo bazabeka amanyala enu phezu kwenu, lithwale izono zezithombe zenu.
Ilizwi leNKOSI laselifika kimi, ngomnyaka wesificamunwemunye, ngenyanga yetshumi, ngolwetshumi lwenyanga, lisithi:
Ndodana yomuntu, zibhalele ibizo losuku, lwalona lolusuku; inkosi yeBhabhiloni yazimisa ukumelana leJerusalema ngalona lolusuku.
Njalo tshono umfanekiso,
ubuthele iziqa zayo kiyo, zonke iziqa ezinhle.
Thatha ikhethelo lomhlambi, ubuthelele lamathambo ngaphansi kwayo, kwenze kubile kuhle, kuphekwe lamathambo phakathi kwayo.
Ngakho itsho njalo iNkosi uJehova: Maye kuwoumuzi wegazi.
Ngoba igazi lawo liphakathi kwawo, ulibeke edwaleni elize.
Ukuze ngivuse intukuthelo, ukuze ngiphindisele impindiselo, ngibekile igazi lawo edwaleni elize, ukuze lingagqitshelwa.
Ngakho itsho njalo iNkosi uJehova: Maye kuwoumuzi wegazi.
Yandisa izinkuni, uphembe umlilo, uqede inyama.
Ubusuyibeka phezu kwamalahle ayo ingelalutho, ukuze kutshise.
I zi dinisile ngomtshikatshika, lomengulo wayo omnengi kawuphumanga kuyo. Umengulo wayo usemlilweni.
Kulamanyala ekungcoleni kwakho; ngoba ngikuhlambulule, kodwa kawuhlambulukanga, kawuyikuhlambuluka ekungcoleni kwakho futhi.
Mina N ngikhulumile; kuzafika.
Ilizwi leN lafika kimi futhi, lisithi:
Ndodana yomuntu, khangela, ngizasusa kuwe isiloyiso samehlo akho ngokutshaya.
Bubula, uthule, ungenzi isililo ngabafileyo.
Ngasengikhuluma labantu ekuseni, lakusihlwa umkami wafa. Ngasengisenza ekuseni njengokulaywa kwami.
Abantu basebesithi kimi: Kawuyikusitshela yini ukuthi lezizinto ziyini kithi, ukuthi wenze nje?
Ngasengisithi kubo: Ilizwi leN lafika kimi lisithi:
Tshono kuyo indlu kaIsrayeli: Itsho njalo iNkosi uJehova: Khangela, ngizangcolisa indawo yami engcwele.
Khona lizakwenza njengoba ngenzile; kaliyikumbomboza indevu zendebe yangaphezulu.
Lamaqhiye enu azakuba phezu kwamakhanda enu.
Ngokunjalo uHezekeli uzakuba yisibonakaliso kini.
Futhi, wena ndodana yomuntu, kakuyikuba njaloyini ngalolosuku lapho engizasusa kubo inqaba yabo,
ngalolosuku kuzafika kuwe ophunyukileyo, ukwenza indlebe zakhozizwe?
Ngalolosuku umlomo wakho uzavulekela yena ophunyukileyo.
Ilizwi leN laselifika kimi, lisithi:
Ndodana yomuntu, misa ubuso bakho.
Uthi kubantwana bakoAmoni: Zwanini ilizwi leNkosi uJehova: Itsho njalo iNkosi uJehova,
ngakho, khangela, ngizakunikela ebantwaneni basempumalanga.
Njalo ngizakwenza iRaba.
Ngoba itsho njalo iNkosi uJehova: Ngoba utshayile isandla;
ngakho, khangela, ngizakwelulela isandla sami phezu kwakho.
Itsho njalo iNkosi uJehova: Ngoba oMowabi;
ngakho khangela, ngizavula uhlangothi lukaMowabi kusukela emizini;
njalo ngizayinikela emadodaneni empumalanga kube yilifa.
Ngizakwenza izahlulelo laphakathi kukaMowabi; njalo bazakwazi ukuthi ngiyiN.
Itsho njalo iNkosi uJehova: Ngoba uEdoma enze ngokuphindisela;
ngakho itsho njalo iNkosi uJehova: Lami ngizakwelula isandla sami phezu kukaEdoma.
Njalo ngizabeka impindiselo yami phezu kukaEdoma ngesandla sabantu bami uIsrayeli.
Itsho njalo iNkosi uJehova: Ngoba amaFilisti enze ngempindiselo;
ngakho itsho njalo iNkosi uJehova: Khangela, ngizakwelulela isandla sami phezu kwamaFilisti.
Ngenze izimpindiselo ezinkulu phezu kwabo ngokukhuza kwentukuthelo.
Kwasekusithi ngomnyaka wetshumi lanye, ngolokuqala lwenyanga, ilizwi leN lafika kimi, lisithi:
Ndodana yomuntu, ngenxa yokuthi iTire itshilo ngeJerusalema.
Ngakho itsho njalo iNkosi uJehova: Khangela, ngimelane lawe, wena Tire, ngenze izizwe ezinengi zenyuke zimelane lawe.
Njalo zizachitha imiduli yeTire, zibhidlizele phansi imiphotshongo yayo; ngiphale inhlabathi yayo kuyo, ngiyenze.
Izakuba yindawo yokuchayela amambule.
Lamadodakazi ayo asensimini azabulawa ngenkemba.
Ngoba itsho njalo iNkosi uJehova: Khangela, ngizaletha phezu kweTire uNebhukadirezari inkosi yeBhabhiloni.
Uzabulala ngenkemba amadodakazi akho ensimini.
Uzamisa imigqala yokudiliza imelane lemiduli yakho, adilizele phansi imiphotshongo yakho ngezinkemba zakhe.

Ngenxa yobunengi bamabhiza akhe uthuli lwawo luzakusibekela; imiduli yakho izanyikinywa ngumsindo wabagadi bamabhiza lamavili lezinqola, nxa ezangena emasangweni akho, njengokungena emzini ofohlelwayo.
Ngamasondo amabhiza akhe uzanyathela zonke izitalada zakho; uzabulala abantu bakho ngenkemba, lensika zakho eziqinileyo ziwele emhlabathini.
Njalo bazaphanga inotho yakho.
Ngizakwenza kuphele umsindo wengoma zakho.
Njalo ngizakwenza ube lidwala elize.
Itsho njalo iNkosi uJehova kuyo iTire: Izihlenge kaziyikunyikinyeka yini ngomdumo wokuwa kwakho?
Khona zonke iziphathamandla zolwandle.
Zizakuphakamisela isililo!
Khathesi izihlenge zizathuthumela.
Ngoba itsho njalo iNkosi uJehova: Lapho ngizakwenza ubengumuzi olunxiwa, njengemizi engahlalwayo; lapho ngizakwenyusa ukujula phezu kwakho, lamanzi amanengi akusibekele;
khona ngizakwehlisela phansi lalabo abehlela emgodini.
Ngizakwenza ube ngokwesabekayo okukhulu.
Ilizwi leN laselifika kimi lisithi:
Wena-ke, ndodana yomuntu, phakamisa isililo ngeTire,
uthi kiyo iTire, ehlezi ngasekungeneni kolwandle.
Imingcele yakho isenhliziyweni yezinlwandle; abakhi bakho baphelelise ubuhle bakho.
Benzile wonke amapulanka akho nge zihlahla zefiri.
Ng ama-okhi eBashani.
Ilembu elicolekileyo kakhulu.
Abakhileyo beSidoni leArvadi.
Abadala beGebali.
AmaPerisiya.
Amadodana eArvadi lebutho lakho.
ITarshishi.
IJavani.
Abendlu kaTogarima.
Amadodana eDedani ayengabathengiselani bakho.
ISiriya yayingumthengiselani wakho ngenxa yokwanda kwemisebenzi yakho.
UJuda lelizwe lakoIsrayeli babengabathengiselani bakho, benana impahla yakho ngengqoloyi.
IDamaseko yayingumthengiselani wakho ngobunengi bemisebenzi yakho, ngenxa yobunengi benotho yonke.
Njalo iDani leJavani yayihamba isiya le lale yazinikela empahleni zakho kwakuyimpahla yakho yokuthengiselana.
IDedani yayingumthengiselani wakho ngamalembu aligugu ezinqola.
IArabhiya babengabathengiselani besandla sakho, ngamawundlu lezinqama lezimbuzi, ngalezi babethengiselana lawe.
Abathengiselani beShebha, langamatshe wonke aligugu, legolide.
IHarani leKane.

Laba babengabathengiselani bakho ngezinto ezipheleleyo, ngezigqoko eziluhlaza okwesibhakabhaka, langamabhokisi omsedari elembu elifekethisiweyo, abotshwe aqiniswa ngezintambo, phakathi kokuthengiswayo kwakho.
Imikhumbi.
Abagwedli bakho bakusa emanzini amanengi.
Inotho yakho.
Ngelizwi lokukhala kwabatshayeli bakho bomkhumbi.
Njalo bonke abaphatha.
Bazwakalise ilizwi labo bemelene lawe,
bazenze ompabanga ngokupheleleyo ngenxa yakho.
Lekulileni kwabo bazaphakamisa isililo ngawe?
Ekuphumeni kwezimpahla zakho zokuthengiselana ezinlwandle.
Nge sikhathi okwephulwa ngaso ezinlwandle.
Bonke abakhileyo bezihlenge.
Abathengiselani phakathi kwabantu.
Ilizwi leN laselifika kimi futhi lisithi:
Ndodana yomuntu, tshono kusiphathamandla seTire.
Khangela, uhlakaniphile; kakulamfihlo abangayifihla kuwe.
Ngenhlakanipho yakho langokuqedisisa kwakho.
Ngobukhulu benhlakanipho yakho ekuthengiselaneni kwakho.
Ngakho itsho njalo iNkosi uJehova: Ngoba usumise inhliziyo yakho njengenhliziyo kaNkulunkulu,
ngakho, khangela, ngizaletha abezizwe phezu kwakho.
Bazakwehlisela phansi egodini.
Usezakutsho yini phambi kwabakubulalayo: NginguNkulunkulu.
Uzakufa izimfa zongasokanga.
Ilizwi leN lafika kimi futhi lisithi:
Ndodana yomuntu, phakamisa isililo.
WawuseEdeni, isivande sikaNkulunkulu.
Wena ulikherubhi eligcotshiweyo elisibekelayo, njalo ngikumisile.
Wawuphelele ezindleleni zakho kusukela osukwini owadalwa ngalo kwaze kwatholakala ububi kuwe.
Ngobunengi bokuthengiselana kwakho sebegcwalise ingaphakathi yakho ngodlakela, wasusona.
Inhliziyo yakho yaziphakamisa.
Ngobunengi beziphambeko zakho, ngobubi bokuthengiselana kwakho.
Bonke abakwaziyo phakathi kwezizwe bazamangala kakhulu ngawe.
Ilizwi leN lafika kimi futhi, lisithi:
Ndodana yomuntu, misa ubuso bakho,
uthi: Itsho njalo iNkosi uJehova: Khangela, ngimelene lawe, wena Sidoni.
Ngoba ngizathumela umatshayabhuqe wesifo kiyo.
Njalo kakusayikuba khona.
Itsho njalo iNkosi uJehova: Nxa sengibuthe indlu kaIsrayeli ivela ezizweni abahlakazwe kizo.
Njalo bazahlala kilo belondolozekile.
Ngomnyaka wetshumi, ng enyangayetshumi, ngolwetshumi lambili lwenyanga, ilizwi leN lafika kimi, lisithi:
Ndodana yomuntu, misa ubuso bakho.
Khuluma uthi: Itsho njalo iNkosi uJehova: Khangela, ngimelane lawe, Faro, nkosi yeGibhithe.
Kodwa ngizafaka izingwegwe emihlathini yakho.
Njalo ngizakutshiya enkangala, wena lazo zonke inhlanzi zemifula yakho.
Labo bonke abahlali beGibhithe bazakwazi ukuthi ngiyiN KOSI.
Lapho bekubamba ngesandla, wephula wadabula lonke ihlombe labo; lalapho beseyama kuwe.
Ngakho itsho njalo iNkosi uJehova: Khangela, ngizaletha inkemba phezu kwakho.
Lelizwe leGibhithe lizakuba yincithakalo lenkangala. Khona bezakwazi ukuthi ngiyiN KOSI.
Ngakho, khangela, ngimelene lawe.
Kakulanyawo lomuntu oluzadlula kilo, kakulanyawo lwenyamazana oluzadlula kilo; futhi kaliyikuhlalwa okwe minyaka engamatshumi amane.
Ngoba ngizakwenza ilizwe leGibhithe libeyincithakalo phakathi kwamazwe wonke achithekileyo.
Ngoba itsho njalo iNkosi uJehova: Ekupheleni kweminyaka engamatshumi amane ngizabutha amaGibhithe ebantwini abahlakazekele khona.

Ngizazelusa edlelweni elivundileyo.

Ngizadinga ezilahlekileyo.
Lina-ke, mhlambi wami, itsho njalo iNkosi uJehova: Khangela, ngizakwahlulela phakathi kwemvu lemvu.

Ngasengiprofetha njengalokho yayingilayile.

Wena-ke ndodana yomuntu, zithathele intonga eyodwa, ubhale phezu kwayo, layo yonke indlu kaIsrayeli abangane bakhe.

ngibenze babe yisizwe esisodwa elizweni.

Bahlale elizweni engalinika inceku yami uJakobe, ababehlala kulo oyihlo, yebo, bazahlala kulo, bona, labantwana babo, labantwana babantwana babo.

Ndodana yomuntu,

Uzawela.
