Labahlali bemizi yakoIsrayeli bazaphuma, batshise;
ukuze bangathezi izinkuni egangeni, bangagamuli emaguswini; ngoba bazaphemba umlilo ngezikhali.

Kuzakuthi-ke ngalolosuku, ngiphe uGogi lapho indawo yengcwaba koIsrayeli, isihotsha sabadluli empumalanga kolwandle, esizavimbela abadluli. Lalapho bazangcwaba uGogi lexuku lakhe lonke; basibize ngokuthiyisiHotsha sexuku likaGogi.
Njalo indlu yakoIsrayeli izabangcwaba, ukuze bahlambulule ilizwe, okwe nyanga eziyisikhombisa.
Yebo bonke abantu belizwe baza ba ngcwaba, kube libizo kubo ngo suku engizadunyiswa ngalo, itsho iNkosi uJehova.
Njalo bazakwehlukanisa amadoda ahlezi edabula phakathi kwelizwe ukuyangcwaba, labedlulayo, labo abaseleyo ebusweni belizwe.
Labedlulayo bazadlula phakathi kwelizwe, lapho be bona ithambo lomuntu.
Futhi lebizo lomuzi lizakuba yiHamona. Ngokunjalo bazahlambulula ilizwe.
Wena-ke, ndodana yomuntu, itsho njalo iNkosi uJehova: Tshono, ukuze lidle inyama linathe igazi.
Lizakudla inyama yamaqhawe, linathe igazi leziphathamandla zomhlaba.
Njalo lizakudla amafutha lize lisuthe, linathe igazi lize lidakwe.
Ngokunjalo lizasutha etafuleni lami ngamabhiza lezinqola, langawo wonke amadoda empi, itsho iNkosi uJehova.
Njalo ngizamisa inkazimulo yami phakathi kwezizwe.
Ngokunjalo abendlu kaIsrayeli bazakwazi ukuthi ngiyuNkulunkulu wabo.
Lezizwe zizakwazi ukuthi abendlu kaIsrayeli bathunjwa ngenxa yobubi bayo; ngenxa yokuthi baphambuka bemelene lami ngakho ngafihla ubuso bami kibo.
Ngabaphatha njengokokungcola kwabo lanjengokweziphambeko zabo.
Ngakho itsho njalo iNkosi uJehova: Khathesi ngizabuyisa abathunjwa bakaJakobe.
Sebethwele ihlazo labo, laso sonke isiphambeko sabo abaphambeke ngaso bemelene lami.
Sengibabuyisile bevela ebantwini, ngabaqoqa bevela emazweni ezitha zabo.
Khona bazakwazi ukuthi ngiyiNkosi uNkulunkulu wabo, engenza ukuthi bakhokhelelwe ekuthunjweni phakathi kwezizwe.
Njalo kangisayikufihla ubuso bami kibo.
Ngomnyaka wamatshumi amabili lanhlanu wokuthunjwa kwethu, wangiletha lapho.
Ngemibono kaNkulunkulu; njalo eceleni kwayo kwakulokunjengesakhiwo somuzi ngaseningizimu.
Wasengiletha khona, khangela-ke, kwakulomuntu; wema-ke esangweni.
Lowomuntu wasesithi kimi: Ndodana yomuntu.
Khangela-ke, kwakulomduli ngaphandle kwendlu ozingelezeleyo inhlangothi zonke.
Wasesiza esangweni elikhangele indlela yempumalanga, ububanzi baba ngumhlanga owodwa.
Njalo yi lelo lalelo kamelo.
Walinganisa lekhulusi lesango ngaphakathi, laba ngumhlanga owodwa.
Waselinganisa ikhulusi lesango, laba yizingalo eziyisificaminwembili; lemigubazi yawo.
Lamakamelo esango ngendlela yempumalanga; lemigubazi yayilesilinganiso sinye ngapha langapha.
Waselinganisa ububanzi bentuba yesango, baba yizingalo ezilitshumi; ubude besango, baba yizingalo ezilitshumi lantathu.
Lomkhawulo.
Waselinganisa isango kusukela ephahleni lwelinye ikamelo kusiya ephahleni lwelinye; ububanzi babuzingalo ezingamatshumi amabili lanhlanu, umnyango phambi komnyango.
Wenza futhi imigubazi, ngitsho kuze kube semgubazini weguma inhlangothi zonke zesango zizingelezele.
Njalo kusukela ebusweni besango lokungena kuze kube sebusweni bekhulusi lesango elingaphakathi kwaba zingalo ezingamatshumi amahlanu.
Futhi kwakulamawindi avaliweyo emakamelweni.
Wasengingenisa egumeni elingaphandle.
Lendawo egandelweyo; kwakuyindawo egandelweyo engaphansi.
Waselinganisa ububanzi, kusukela ngaphambi kwesango elingaphansi kusiya ngaphambi kweguma elingaphakathi ngaphandle, kwaba yizingalo ezilikhulu, ngasempumalanga langasenyakatho.
Lesango elikhangele indlela yenyakatho, kulo iguma elingaphandle, walinganisa ubude balo lobubanzi balo.
Lamakamelo.
Lamawindi.
Lesango leguma elingaphakathi lalimaqondana lesango elingasenyakatho, kwaba zingalo ezilikhulu.
Emva kwalokho wangiletha ngendlela yeningizimu, khangela-ke, kwakukhona isango ngase ndlel eniyeningizimu; waselinganisa imigubazi yalo.
Kwakukhona amawindi.
Kwakukhona izinyathelo eziyisikhombisa.
Kwakukhona isango egumeni elingaphakathi ngendlela yeningizimu.
Wasengiletha egumeni elingaphakathi ngesango leningizimu.
Lamakamelo.
Kwakulamakhulusi azingelezeleyo inhlangothi zonke.
Lamakhulusi eziyisificaminwembili.
Wasengiletha egumeni elingaphakathi ngasendleleni yempumalanga.
Lamakamelo alo.
Lamakhulusi.
Wasengisa esangweni elingenyakatho, walinganisa njengezilinganiso lezi.
Amakamelo alo.
Lemigubazi yalo.
Njalo amakamelo.
Lekhulusini lesango kwakukhona amatafula amabili ngapha, lamatafula amabili ngapha, ukuhlabela phezu kwawo umnikelo wokutshiswa.
Laseceleni ngaphandle ekwenyukeleni kuso isivalo sesango lenyakatho kwakulamatafula amabili, laseceleni elinye elingasekhulusini lesango kwakulamatafula amabili.
Amatafula amane ngapha, lamatafula amane ngapha, ngaseceleni kwesango; amatafula ayisificaminwembili, ababehlabela phezu kwawo.
Lamatafula amane omnikelo wokutshiswa lomhlatshelo.
Kwakulezingwegwe sinye, zimisiwe ngaphakathi inhlangothi zonke ezizingelezeleyo; laphezu kwamatafula kwakulenyama yomnikelo.

Langaphandle kwesango elingaphakathi kwakulamakamelo, elaliseceleni kwesango elisenyakatho, lokukhangela kwalo kusendleleni yeningizimu; elilodwa liseceleni kwesango eliseningizimu, likhangele ngasendleleni yenyakatho.
Wasesithi kimi: Lelikamelo.
Lekamelo okukhangela kwalo kusendleleni yenyakatho lingelabapristi.
Waselinganisa iguma; ubude baba zingalo ezilikhulu.
Wasengiletha ekhulusini lendlu, izingalo ezinhlanu ngapha lezingalo ezinhlanu ngapha, lobubanzi besango, izingalo ezintathu ngapha, lezingalo ezintathu ngapha.
Ubude bekhulusi babuzingalo ezingamatshumi amabili, lobubanzi buzingalo ezilitshumi lanye, enye ngapha, lenye ngapha.
Wasengingenisa ethempelini.
Lobubanzi bomnyango babuzingalo ezilitshumi.
Wasengena ngaphakathi, ingalo ezimbili; lomnyango, ingalo eziyisithupha; lobubanzi bomnyango, ingalo eziyisikhombisa.
Waselinganisa ubude bayo, ingalo ezingamatshumi amabili.
Waselinganisa umduli wendlu, izingalo eziyisithupha; lobubanzi b ama kamelo aseceleni, izingalo ezine, inhlangothi zonke ezizingelezele indlu inhlangothi zonke.
Njalo amakamelo aseceleni.
Kwaba khona ukuqhela.
Ngabona futhi ukuphakama kwendlu inhlangothi zonke ezizingelezeleyo; izisekelo zamakamelo aseceleni.
Ubuqatha bomduli, owawungowekamelo eliseceleni ngaphandle ayengakuyo indlu.
Laphakathi kwamakamelo kwakulobubanzi.
Lezivalo zamakamelo aseceleni babuzingalo ezinhlanu inhlangothi zonke ezizingelezeleyo.

Mayelana lesakhiwo esasiphambi, ububanzi babuyizingalo ezingamatshumi ayisikhombisa; lomduli wesakhiwo wawuzingalo ezinhlanu ngobuqatha inhlangothi zonke ezizingelezeleyo, lobude bawo babuzingalo ezingamatshumi ayisificamunwemunye.
Waselinganisa indlu, ubude babuyizingalo ezilikhulu; lendawo eyehlukanisiweyo;
lobubanzi bobuso bendlu, lobendawo eyehlukanisiweyo ngasempumalanga.
Waselinganisa ubude besakhiwo maqondana, lethempeli elingaphakathi, lamakhulusi eguma.
Imibundu, kwembeswe ngamapulanka azingelezeleyo inhlangothi zonke, kusukela emhlabathini kusiya emawindini; amawindi-ke ayesibekelwe;
kuze kube phezu komnyango, kuze kube sendlini engaphakathi lengaphandle, lakuwo wonke umduli inhlangothi zonke uzingelezele ngaphakathi langaphandle, nge zilinganiso.
Njalo kwakwenziwe ng amakherubhi.
Kuze kuthi ubuso bomuntu babukhangelene lesihlahla selala ngapha, lobuso bebhongo lesilwane bukhangelene lesihlahla selala ngapha. Kwakwenziwe endlini yonke inhlangothi zonke ezizingelezeleyo.
Kusukela emhlabathini kuze kube phezu komnyango kwakwenziwe amakherubhi.
Imigubazi yethempeli, isimo sobunyesasinjengesimo sobunye.
Ilathi lesigodo.
Kwakulezivalo ezimbili kulo ithempeli.
Njalo izivalo zazilempiko ezimbili; ezimbili ezesivalo esinye, lempiko ezimbili ezesinye.
Njalo kwenziwa kuzo, kuzo izivalo zethempeli.
Kwakukhona amawindi avaliweyo.
Wasengikhuphela egumeni elingaphandle.
Phambi kobude bezingalo ezilikhulu kwakulomnyango wenyakatho.
Maqondana le zingaloezingamatshumi amabili ezazingezeguma langaphakathi.
Laphambi kwamakamelo.
Amakamelo angaphezulu-ke ayemafitshane lakulakwaphakathi kwesakhiwo.
Ngoba aye leziteziezintathu, kodwa zazingelazinsika njengezinsika zamaguma; ngakho-ke isakhiwo sasinciphile.
Lomduli owawungaphandle.
Ngoba ubude bamakamelo ayesegumeni elingaphandle babuzingalo ezingamatshumi amahlanu; khangela-ke, ngaphambi kwethempeli kwakuzingalo ezilikhulu.
Langaphansi kwalamakamelo kwakulokungena ngasempumalanga, lapho umuntuengena kuwo evela egumeni elingaphandle.
Amakamelo ayesebubanzini bomduli weguma.
Lendlela phambi kwawo.
Lanjengokweminyango yamakamelo ayesendlel eniyeningizimu kwakulomnyango esihlokweni sendlela.
Wasesithi kimi: Amakamelo enyakatho l amakamelo eningizimu, ngoba indawo ingcwele.
Lapho abapristi bengena, kabayikuphuma endaweni engcwele baye egumeni elingaphandle, kodwa bazabeka lapho izembatho zabo abakhonza ngazo.
Eseqedile izilinganiso zendlu engaphakathi, wangikhupha nge ndlela yesango elikhangele indlela yempumalanga, wayilinganisa inhlangothi zonke ezizingelezeleyo.
Walinganisa uhlangothi lwempumalanga ngomhlanga wokulinganisa, imihlanga engamakhulu amahlanu, ngomhlanga wokulinganisa inhlangothi zonke.
Walinganisa uhlangothi lwenyakatho, imihlanga engamakhulu amahlanu, ngomhlanga wokulinganisa inhlangothi zonke.
Walinganisa uhlangothi olungeningizimu, imihlanga engamakhulu amahlanu, ngomhlanga wokulinganisa.
Wasephendukela kuhlangothi lwentshonalanga, walinganisa imihlanga engamakhulu amahlanu ngomhlanga wokulinganisa.
Wayilinganisa ezinhlangothini zozine. Yayilomduli inhlangothi zonke uzingelezele.
Wasengiyisa esangweni, isango elikhangele indlela yempumalanga.
Khangela-ke, inkazimulo kaNkulunkulu kaIsrayeli.
Futhi kwakunjengesimo sombono engangiwubonile.
Inkazimulo yeN KOSI.
UMoya wasengiphakamisa.
Ngasengimuzwa ekhuluma lami engasendlini; futhi umuntu wayemi eceleni kwami.
Wasesithi kimi: Ndodana yomuntu, leyindawo yesihlalo sami sobukhosi,
ekumiseni kwabo umbundu wabo ngamanyala abo abawenzileyo, ngakho ngibaqedile olakeni lwami.
Khathesi kabadedisele ubufebe babo.
Wena, ndodana yomuntu, tshengisa indlu yakoIsrayeli le indlu.
Uba-ke belenhloni ngakho konke abakwenzileyo, bazise isimo sendlu.
Lo ngumlayo wendlu: Phezu kwengqonga yentaba. Khangela, lo ngumlayo wendlu.
Futhi lezi yizilinganiso zelathi ngezingalo. Njalo le izakuba ngumhlane welathi.

Njalo kusukela kusisekelo emhlabathini kuze kube semngceleni ophansi kube zingalo ezimbili, lobubanzi bube yingalo eyodwa; futhi kusukela emngceleni omncane kusiya emngceleni omkhulu kube zingalo ezine, lobubanzi bube yingalo.
Njalo iziko lelathi libe zingalo ezine, njalo kusukela eziko lelathi kusiya phezulu kube lezimpondo ezine.
Njalo iziko lelathi libe yizingalo ezilitshumi lambili ngo bude, ezilitshumi lambili ngo bubanzi, kulingana inhlangothi zozine.
Umngcele.
Wasesithi kimi: Ndodana yomuntu, itsho njalo iNkosi uJehova: Lezi yizimiso zelathi.
Njalo uzanika kubapristi amaLevi.
Uthathe okwegazi layo.
Futhi uzathatha ijongosi lomnikelo wesono.
Langosuku lwesibili uzasondeza izinyane lembuzi elingelasici libe ngumnikelo wesono; njalo bazahlambulula ilathi njengoba babe li hlambulule ngejongosi.
Nxa usuqedile ukuhlambulula, uzasondeza ijongosi ithole lenkomo elingelasici, lenqama engelasici evela emhlanjini.
Ukusondeze phambi kweN; njalo abapristi bazathela itshwayi phezu kwakho, bakunikele kube ngumnikelo wokutshiswa eNni.
Insuku eziyisikhombisa uzalungisa insuku zonke imbuzi yomnikelo wesono; futhi bazalungisa ijongosi ithole lenkomo, lenqama evela emhlanjini, kungelasici.
Insuku eziyisikhombisa bazakwenzela ilathi inhlawulo yokuthula, balihlambulule, balehlukanise.
Nxa seziphelile lezonsuku, itsho iNkosi uJehova.
Wasengibuyisela nge ndlela, elalivalekile.
yasisithi kimi: Lelisango lizahlala livaliwe, kaliyikuvulwa, kakulamuntu ozangena ngalo; ngoba iN, uNkulunkulu kaIsrayeli, ingene ngalo, ngakho lizakuba livalekile.
Libengelesiphathamandla; isiphathamandla.
Wasengiletha nge ndlela yesango lenyakatho ngaphambi kwendlu.
yasisithi kimi: Ndodana yomuntu, beka inhliziyo yakho, ubone ngamehlo akho.
Njalo uzakuthi kibo abavukelayo, lina ndlu kaIsrayeli.
Ngoba lingenisile abezizwe, futhi bephulile isivumelwano sami ngamanyala enu wonke.
Njalo kaligcinanga umlindo wezinto zami ezingcwele; kodwa lizimisele abagcini bomlindo wami endaweni yami engcwele.
Itsho njalo iNkosi uJehova: Kakula muntuwezizwe, kumbe ongasokanga enyameni, ozangena endaweni yami engcwele, kuye wonke owezizwe ophakathi kwabantwana bakoIsrayeli.
Kodwa amaLevi asuka aya khatshana lami.
Kube kanti azakuba yizikhonzi.
Ngenxa yokuthi bebakhonze phambi kwezithombe zabo, baba yisikhubekiso sesiphambeko kuyo indlu yakoIsrayeli, ngalokho ngiphakamise isandla sami ngimelene labo.
Njalo kabayikusondela kimi, lamanyala abo abawenzileyo.
Kodwa ngizabenza abagcini bomlindo wendlu.
Kodwa abapristi abangamaLevi, itsho iNkosi uJehova.
Bona bazangena endaweni yami engcwele, bona basondele etafuleni lami.
Kuzakuthi-ke lapho bengena emasangweni eguma elingaphakathi, kodwa uboya bezimvu kabuyikuza phezu kwabo, besakhonza emasangweni eguma elingaphakathi, langaphakathi.
Kuzakuba lamaqhiye babe enkalweni zabo, bangabhinci ngokuginqisayo.
Lalapho bephumela egumeni elingaphandle, ngitshoegumeni elingaphandle besiya ebantwini.
Futhi kabayikuphuca amakhanda abo; bazagela lokugela amakhanda abo.
Futhi kabayikunatha iwayini.
Njalo kabayikuzithathela umfelokazi babe ngabafazi, kodwa bazathatha izintombi ezimsulwa zenzalo yendlu yakoIsrayeli, loba umfelokazi ongumfelokazi wompristi.
Njalo bazafundisa abantu bami.
Lekuphikisaneni bona bazakuma ekwahluleleni.
Njalo kabayikuza emuntwini ofileyo.
Langemva kokuhlanjululwa kwakhe bazambalela insuku eziyisikhombisa.
Langosuku azangena ngalo endaweni engcwele, egumeni elingaphakathi, itsho iNkosi uJehova.
Lokhu kuzakuba yilifa kubo; mina ngiyinzuzo yabo.
Bona bazakudla umnikelo wokudla.
Lokuqala kwazo zonke izithelo zokuqala zakho konke, lawo wonke umnikelo wakho konke.
Abapristi kabayikudla loba kuyini okuzifeleyo, loba okudatshuliweyo, okwenyoni kumbe okwenyamazana.
Kuzakuthi-ke lapho lisaba ilizwe ngenkatho ukuthi libe yilifa. Leyo izakuba ngcwele kuyo yonke imingcele yayo inhlangothi zonke.
Kuleyo kuzakuba lokwendawo engcwele engamakhulu amahlanu, lamakhulu amahlanu.
Langalesisilinganiso lizalinganisa.
Kuzakuba yindawo engcwele yelizwe.
Lobude bezinkulungwane ezingamatshumi amabili lanhlanu, lobubanzi bezinkulungwane ezilitshumi.
Njalo lizanika imfuyo yomuzi, ububanzi bezinkulungwane ezinhlanu, lobude bamatshumi amabili lanhlanu.

Njalo isiphathamandla wesabeloesingcwele lakwemfuyo yomuzi, phambi komnikelo wesabelo ongcwele, laphambi kwemfuyo yomuzi, kusukela ngentshonalanga kuqonda entshonalanga, lakusukela ngempumalanga kuqonda empumalanga. Lobude buzaqondana lesinye sezabelo, kusukela emngceleni wentshonalanga kuze kube semngceleni wempumalanga.
Mayelana lelizwe, uzakuba lalo libe yimfuyo koIsrayeli. Njalo iziphathamandla.
Itsho njalo iNkosi uJehova: Sekwanele kini, lisuse ukuxotsha kwenu kubo abantu bami, itsho iNkosi uJehova.
Lizakuba, lebhathi elilungileyo.
I-efa, le-efa ingxenye eyodwa etshumini yehomeri; isilinganiso sakho sizakuba ngokwehomeri.
Leshekeli lizakuba ngamagera angamatshumi amabili kini.
Lokhu kungumnikelo elizawunikela.
Mayelana lesimiso samafutha, ibhathi lamafutha alitshumi; ngoba amabathi alitshumi alihomeri.
Lewundlu elilodwa emhlanjini, kuwo amakhulu amabili, endaweni elamanzi kaIsrayeli, itsho iNkosi uJehova.
Bonke abantu belizwe bazakuba kulowomnikelo kusenzelwa isiphathamandla koIsrayeli.
Kuzakuba phezu kwesiphathamandla.
Itsho njalo iNkosi uJehova: Nge nyangayokuqala, ngolokuqala lwenyanga.
Njalo umpristi uzathatha okwegazi lomnikelo wesono.
Futhi uzakwenza njalo ngolwesikhombisa lwenyanga ngenxa yomuntu oduhayo.
Nge nyangayokuqala, ngosuku lwetshumi lane lwenyanga, lizakuba lephasika, umkhosi wensuku eziyisikhombisa; isinkwa esingelamvubelo sizadliwa.
Langalolosuku isiphathamandla sizazilungisela sona kanye labo bonke abantu belizwe ijongosi lomnikelo wesono.
Ngensuku eziyisikhombisa zomkhosi.
Uzalungisa-ke umnikelo wokudla.
Nge nyangayesikhombisa.
Itsho njalo iNkosi uJehova: Isango.
Njalo isiphathamandla sizangena nge ndlela yekhulusi lalelosango sivela phandle, siphume; kodwa isango kaliyikuvalwa kuze kube kusihlwa.
Ngokunjalo abantu belizwe bazakhonza phambi kweN.
Lomnikelo wokutshiswa, lenqama engelasici.
Lomnikelo wokudla.
Langosuku lokuthwasa kwenyanga, lamawundlu ayisithupha, lenqama; kungabi lasici.
Njalo sizalungisa umnikelo wokudla.
Lalapho isiphathamandla singena, sizangena nge ndlela yekhulusi lalelosango, siphume ngendlela yalo.
Kodwa lapho abantu belizwe.
Lesiphathamandla sizangena siphakathi kwabo; lalapho bephuma sizaphuma.
Lemadilini.
Lalapho isiphathamandla silungisa umnikelo wesihle, umnikelo wokutshiswa, loba iminikelo yokuthula, umnikelo wesihle eNni emva kokuphuma kwaso.
Njalo uzalungisa iwundlu elilomnyaka munye elingelasici libe ng umnikelo wokutshiswa eNni insuku zonke. Uzalilungisa ngaleyo laleyo ikuseni.
Futhi uzalilungisela umnikelo wokudla ngaleyo laleyo ikuseni, ingxenye yesithupha ye-efa, ukuthambisa impuphu ecolekileyo, kube ng umnikelo wokudla eNni, nge zimiso eziphakade njalonjalo.
Ngokunjalo bazalungisa iwundlu lomnikelo wokudla lamafutha ngaleyo laleyo ikuseni kube ng umnikelo wokutshiswa njalonjalo.
Itsho njalo iNkosi uJehova: Uba isiphathamandla sinika isipho kuloba yiyiphi yamadodana aso, ilifa laso, amadodana aso azakuba lalo, lizakuba yimpahla yawo ngokwelifa.
Kodwa uba sinika isipho selifa laso kwenye yezinceku zaso; khona sizabuyela kusiphathamandla; kodwa siyilifa laso, amadodana aso azakuba laso.
Futhi isiphathamandla kasiyikuthatha ulutho elifeni labantu; sizanika ilifa emadodaneni aso emfuyweni yaso; ukuze abantu bami bangahlakazwa ngulowo asuke emfuyweni yakhe.
Wasengingenisa ekungeneni, okwakuseceleni kwesango, akhangele ngasenyakatho; khangela-ke kwakulendawo kunhlangothi zombili ngasentshonalanga.
Wasesithi kimi: Yiyo le indawo lapho abapristi abazaphekela.
Wasengikhuphela egumeni elingaphandle, wangidlulisa engonsini zozine zeguma; khangela-ke, kuleyo laleyongonsi yeguma kwakulelinye iguma.
Ezingonsini zozine zeguma kwakulamaguma ahlanganisiweyo; ubude babuzingalo ezingamatshumi amane, lobubanzi babuzingalo ezingamatshumi amathathu; lezizingonsi zozine zazilesilinganiso sinye.
Njalo kwakulomzila wesakhiwo inhlangothi zonke kuzo, inhlangothi zonke zozine, njalo kwenziwe amaziko okubilisa ngaphansi kwemizila yesakhiwo inhlangothi zonke.
Wasesithi kimi: Lezi yizindlu zokuphekela, lapho abakhonzi bendlu.
Emva kwalokho wangibuyisela emnyango wendlu.
Wasengikhupha nge ndlela yesango ngasenyakatho. Khangela-ke, kwageleza amanzi avela ehlangothini lwesokunene.
Ekuphumeni kwendoda, yalinganisa izingalo eziyinkulungwane, yangidabulisa phakathi kwamanzi; amanzi afika enqagaleni.
Walinganisa futhi inkulungwane, wangidabulisa emanzini; amanzi afika emadolweni. Walinganisa futhi inkulungwane, wangidabulisa; amanzi afika ekhalweni.
Walinganisa futhi inkulungwane; kwaba ngumfula engingeke ngiwuchaphe, ngoba amanzi ayesephakeme, amanzi ongantsheza kuwo, umfula owawungeke wachatshwa.
Wasesithi kimi: Ubonile yini, ndodana yomuntu? Wasengihambisa, wangenza ngabuyela ekhunjini lomfula.
Ekubuyeleni kwami, khangela-ke, ekhunjini lomfula kwakulezihlahla ezinengi kakhulu ngapha langapha.
Wasesithi kimi: La amanzi aphumela ngaselizweni lempumalanga, amanzi azakwelatshwa.

Kuzakuthi-ke, sonke isidalwa esiphilayo, loba ngaphi lapho imifula efika khona, sizaphila. Futhi kuzakuba khona inhlanzi ezinengi kakhulu, ngoba amanzi la azafika lapho; ngoba zizakwelatshwa; ngoba kuzaphila konke lapho umfula ofika khona.
Kuzakuthi-ke, abagoli benhlanzi beme ngakuwo kusukela e-Engedi, ezinengi kakhulu.
Kodwa izindawo zawo ezilodaka.
Futhi ngasemfuleni ekhunjini lwawo, ngapha langapha.
Itsho njalo iNkosi uJehova: Lo uzakuba ngumngcele, elizakudla ilifa lelizwe ngawo njengokwezizwe ezilitshumi lambili zakoIsrayeli.
Njalo lizakudla ilifa lalo, omunye njengomunye, engaphakamisa isandla sami ngaloukulinika oyihlo.
Njalo lokhu kuzakuba ngumngcele welizwe ngakuhlangothi lwenyakatho, kusukela olwandle olukhulu.
IHamathi.
Lomngcele osuka elwandle uzakuba yiHazari-Enoni. La loluluhlangothi lwenyakatho.
Futhi uhlangothi lwempumalanga lizalulinganisa lusuka phakathi kweHawurani. La loluluzakuba luhlangothi lwempumalanga.
Lohlangothi lweningizimu ngaseningizimu.
Lohlangothi lwentshonalanga luzakuba lulwandle olukhulu kusukela emngceleni. Lolu luhlangothi lwentshonalanga.
Ngokunjalo lizazehlukanisela lelilizwe njengokwezizwe zakoIsrayeli.
Kuzakuthi-ke, lilabe ngenkatho.
Kuzakuthi-ke, esizweni owezizwe ahlala njengowezizwe kiso, lapho liza m nika ilifa lakhe, itsho iNkosi uJehova.
La-ke ngamabizo ezizwe.
Langasemngceleni kaDani, kusukela ehlangothini lwempumalanga kusiya ehlangothini lwentshonalanga, isabeloesisodwa sika Asheri.
Langasemngceleni kaAsheri, kusukela ehlangothini lwempumalanga kusiya ehlangothini lwentshonalanga, isabeloesisodwa sika Nafithali.
Langasemngceleni kaNafithali, kusukela ehlangothini lwempumalanga kusiya ehlangothini lwentshonalanga, isabeloesisodwa sika Manase.
Langasemngceleni kaManase, kusukela ehlangothini lwempumalanga kusiya ehlangothini lwentshonalanga, isabeloesisodwa sika Efrayimi.
Langasemngceleni kaEfrayimi, kusukela ehlangothini lwempumalanga kusiya ehlangothini lwentshonalanga, isabeloesisodwa sika Rubeni.
Langasemngceleni kaRubeni, kusukela ehlangothini lwempumalanga kusiya ehlangothini lwentshonalanga, isabeloesisodwa sika Juda.
Langasemngceleni kaJuda, kusukela ehlangothini lwempumalanga kusiya ehlangothini lwentshonalanga, kuzakuba ngumnikelo elizawunikela.
Umnikelo elizawunikela eNni uzakuba yibude obuyizinkulungwane ezingamatshumi amabili lanhlanu, lobubanzi bezinkulungwane ezilitshumi.
Njalo kuzakuba kuso umnikelo ongcwele wabapristi izakuba phakathi kwaso.
Sizakuba ngesabapristi abangcwelisiweyo.
Lokunikelweyo komnikelo welizwe kuzakuba kubo yinto engcwelengcwele ngasemngceleni wamaLevi.

Njalo maqondana lomngcele wabapristi, amaLevi azakuba lobude bezinkulungwane ezingamatshumi amabili lanhlanu, lobubanzi bezinkulungwane ezilitshumi. Ubude bonke buzakuba zinkulungwane ezingamatshumi amabili lanhlanu, lobubanzi bube zinkulungwane ezilitshumi.
Njalo kabayikuthengisa okwakho, ngoba kungcwele eNni.
Lezinkulungwane ezinhlanu eziseleyo; lomuzi uzakuba phakathi kwazo.
Lalezi zizakuba yizilinganiso zaso; uhlangothi lwenyakatho luzakuba zinkulungwane ezine lamakhulu amahlanu.

Njalo amadlelo omuzi azakuba ngamakhulu amabili lamatshumi amahlanu ngasenyakatho, lamakhulu amabili lamatshumi amahlanu ngaseningizimu, lamakhulu amabili lamatshumi amahlanu ngasempumalanga, lamakhulu amabili lamatshumi amahlanu ngasentshonalanga.
Lokuseleyo ngobude maqondana lomnikelo ongcwele kuzakuba zinkulungwane ezilitshumi ngempumalanga, lezinkulungwane ezilitshumi ngentshonalanga; njalo kuzakuba maqondana lomnikelo ongcwele.
Njalo izisebenzi zomuzi.
Wonke umnikelo.
Njalo okuseleyo kuzakuba ngokwesiphathamandla.
Futhi kusukela enzuzweni yamaLevi, lakusukela enzuzweni yomuzi, ephakathi kokungokwesiphathamandla, phakathi komngcele kaJuda lomngcele kaBhenjamini, kuzakuba ngokwesiphathamandla.
Mayelana lokuseleyo kwezizwe, kusukela kuhlangothi lwempumalanga kusiya kuhlangothi lwentshonalanga, uBhenjamini uzakuba l esabeloesisodwa.
Lasemngceleni wakoBhenjamini, kusukela kuhlangothi lwempumalanga kusiya kuhlangothi lwentshonalanga, uSimeyoni uzakuba lesisodwa.
Lasemngceleni kaSimeyoni, kusukela kuhlangothi lwempumalanga kusiya kuhlangothi lwentshonalanga, uIsakari uzakuba lesisodwa.
Lasemngceleni kaIsakari, kusukela kuhlangothi lwempumalanga kusiya kuhlangothi lwentshonalanga, uZebuluni uzakuba lesisodwa.
Lasemngceleni kaZebuluni, kusukela kuhlangothi lwempumalanga kusiya kuhlangothi lwentshonalanga, uGadi uzakuba lesisodwa.
Lasemngceleni kaGadi, kuhlangothi lweningizimu ngaseningizimu.
Yilo ilizwe elizalaba ngenkatho libe yilifa kuzo izizwe zakoIsrayeli, njalo lezi yizabelo zazo, itsho iNkosi uJehova.
Lalokhu yikuphuma komuzi.
Njalo amasango omuzi azakuba ngamabizo ezizwe zakoIsrayeli.
Lehlangothini lwempumalanga izinkulungwane ezine lamakhulu amahlanu, lamasango amathathu; ngitsho isango elilodwa elikaJosefa, isango elilodwa elikaBhenjamini, isango elilodwa elikaDani.
Lehlangothini lweningizimu izilinganiso ezizinkulungwane ezine lamakhulu amahlanu, lamasango amathathu; isango elilodwa elikaSimeyoni, isango elilodwa elikaIsakari, isango elilodwa elikaZebuluni.
Uhlangothi lwentshonalanga, izinkulungwane ezine lamakhulu amahlanu, amasango azo amathathu; isango elilodwa elikaGadi, isango elilodwa elikaAsheri, isango elilodwa elikaNafithali.
Inhlangothi zonke yizinkulungwane ezilitshumi lesificaminwembili. Njalo ibizo lomuzi kusukela nga lolo suku lizakuba.
Ngomnyaka wesithathu wokubusa kukaJehoyakhimi inkosi yakoJuda, kwafika uNebhukadinezari inkosi yeBhabhiloni eJerusalema, wayivimbezela.
INkosi yasinikela uJehoyakhimi inkosi yakoJuda esandleni sakhe, lengxenye yezitsha zendlu kaNkulunkulu.
Inkosi yasikhuluma kuAshipenazi induna yabathenwa bayo;
amajaha okungelalasici kuwo, amahle ngesimo.
Inkosi yasiwamisela into yosuku ngosuku.
Njalo kwakukhona phakathi kwabo kubantwana bakoJuda: ODaniyeli, uHananiya, uMishayeli, loAzariya.
Njalo induna yabathenwa yabatha amabizo.
Kodwa uDaniyeli wazimisela enhliziyweni yakhe ukuthi angazingcolisi yokunatha kwayo; ngakho wacela enduneni yabathenwa ukuthi angazingcolisi.
UNkulunkulu wasemnika uDaniyeli umusa phambi kwenduna yabathenwa.

Induna yabathenwa yasisithi kuDaniyeli: Ngiyayesaba inkosi yami, inkosi, emise ukudla kwenu lokunathwayo kwenu; ngoba kungani izabona ubuso benu budanile kulamajaha ayintanga yenu? Ngokunjalo lizafaka ikhanda lami engozini enkosini.
UDaniyeli wasesithi kumphathi, induna yabathenwa eyayimmise waba phezu kwaboDaniyeli, uHananiya, uMishayeli, loAzariya:
Ake ulinge inceku zakho insuku ezilitshumi ukuthi sidle, lamanzi ukuthi sinathe.
Kakuthi-ke izimo zethu zibonakale phambi kwakho, lezimo zamajaha adla isabelo sokudla kwenkosi; wenze-ke ezincekwini zakho njengokubona kwakho.
Wasebalalela kuloludaba, wabalinga insuku ezilitshumi.
Kwathi ekupheleni kwezinsuku ezilitshumi izimo zabo zabonakala zizinhle njalo zizimukile enyameni kulawo wonke amajaha.
Ngakho-ke umphathi wasusa isabelo sokudla kwabo.
Mayelana lala amajaha amane, uNkulunkulu wawanika.
Kwathi ekupheleni kwezinsuku inkosi eyayitshilo ukuthi bazawangenisa ngazo, induna yabathenwa yawangenisa phambi kukaNebhukadinezari.
Inkosi yasikhuluma lawo; njalo phakathi kwawo wonke kakutholwanga onjengoDaniyeli, uHananiya, uMishayeli, loAzariya; ngakho ema phambi kwenkosi.
Mayelana lazo zonke izindaba zenhlakanipho lo kuqedisisa, inkosi eyayiwabuza ngazo abasembusweni wayo wonke.
Njalo uDaniyeli waba khona kwaze kwaba ngumnyaka wokuqala wenkosi uKoresi.
Ngomnyaka wesibili wokubusa kukaNebhukadinezari.
Inkosi yasisithi kubizwe.
Inkosi yasisithi kibo: Ngiphuphe iphupho; umoya wami wasukhathazeka ukulazi iphupho.
AmaKhaladiya asekhuluma enkosini ngesiAramu.
Inkosi yaphendula yathi kumaKhaladiya.
Kodwa uba litshengisa iphupho lengcazelo yalo.
Baphendula okwesibili bathi: Inkosi kayitshele inceku zayo iphupho, thina sizabonisa ingcazelo yalo.
Inkosi yaphendula yathi: Mina ngiyazi isibili ukuthi lithenga isikhathi.
Kodwa uba lingangazisi iphupho, kulesimiso esisodwa ngani, besengisazi ukuthi lingangitshela ingcazelo yalo.
AmaKhaladiya aphendula phambi kwenkosi.
Futhi kuyinto enzima inkosi eyibuzayo, njalo kakho omunye ongayibonisa phambi kwenkosi, ngaphandle, okuhlala kwabo kakukho kwa bas enyameni.
Ngenxa yalokhu inkosi yaba lolaka yathukuthela kakhulu.
Kwasekuphuma isimiso, ukuthi abahlakaniphileyo.
Khona uDaniyeli wabuyisela icebo lokuqonda kuAriyoki.
Waphendula wathi kuAriyoki induna yenkosi: Kungani isimiso singesesiphangiphangi esivela enkosini? Khona uAriyoki wamazisa uDaniyeli indaba.
UDaniyeli wasengena, wacela enkosini ukuthi imnike isikhathi sokuthi ayitshengise inkosi ingcazelo.
Khona uDaniyeli waya endlini yakhe, wabazisa oHananiya, uMishayeli, loAzariya, abangane bakhe, loludaba;
ukuze bacele izihawu.
Khona imfihlakalo yembulelwa uDaniyeli.
UDaniyeli waphendula wathi: Kalidunyiswe ibizo likaNkulunkulu kusukela phakade kuze kube phakade.
Ngoba uyaguqula, lolwazi kulabo abazi ukuqedisisa.
Uyembula okujulileyo lokufihlakeleyo.
Ngiyakubonga ngikudumise, ngoba usazisile udaba lwenkosi.
Ngakho uDaniyeli wangena; wahamba, wakhuluma kanje kuye: Ungabhubhisi abahlakaniphileyo beBhabhiloni; ngingenisa phambi kwenkosi, mina ngizayitshengisa inkosi ingcazelo.
Khona uAriyoki wangenisa uDaniyeli phambi kwenkosi ngokuphangisa, watsho njalo kuyo: Ngithole indoda kwabathunjiweyo bakoJuda, ezakwazisa inkosi ingcazelo.
Inkosi yaphendula yathi kuDaniyeli, obizo lakhe lalinguBeliteshazari, lengcazelo yalo?
UDaniyeli waphendula phambi kwenkosi, wathi: Imfihlakalo inkosi eyibuzayo inkosi.
Kodwa ukhona uNkulunkulu emazulwini:
Wena, nkosi, usembhedeni wakho kwavela imicabango yakho nga lokhu okuzakwenzeka emva kwalokhu; lalowo owembula izimfihlakalo ukwazisile wena lokho okuzakwenzeka.
Mayelana lami, limfihlakalo yembulwa kimi hatshi ngenxa yenhlakanipho ephakathi kwami okwedlula bonke abaphilayo, kodwa ukuthi kwaziswe ingcazelo enkosini, lokuthi wazi imicabango yenhliziyo yakho.
Wena nkosi, wabona, khangela-ke, isithombe esikhulu. Lesisithombe esikhulu, okukhazimula kwaso kwakusedlulisa, sema phambi kwakho; lesimo saso sasisesabeka.
Ikhanda lalesisithombe lalingelegolide elihle, isifuba saso lengalo zaso kwakungokwesiliva, isisu saso lamathangazi aso kwakungokwethusi,
imilenze yaso yayingeyensimbi, inyawo zaso ingxenye yayingeyensimbi lengxenye yayingeyebumba.
Wasubona kwaze kwasikwa ilitshe kungengezandla, elatshaya isithombe ezinyaweni zaso ezensimbi lebumba.
Khona kwachotshozwa ndawonye insimbi, ibumba, ithusi, isiliva, legolide, kwaba njengamakhoba amabala okubhulela ehlobo.
Yilo lelo iphupho; sesizakutsho ingcazelo yalo phambi kwenkosi.
Wena, nkosi, uyinkosi yamakhosi.
Njalo loba kungaphi lapho abantwana babantu abahlezi khona, izinyamazana zeganga lezinyoni zamazulu uzinikele esandleni sakho.
Langemva kwakho kuzavela omunye umbuso, ozabusa emhlabeni wonke.
Lombuso wesine uzaqina njengensimbi.
Njalo njengoba wabona izinyawo lamazwane.
Njengoba amazwane enyawo ayelengxenye yensimbi lengxenye yebumba; umbuso uzakuba lamandla nganxanye, wephuke lula nganxanye.
Njalo njengoba wabona insimbi ihlanganiswe lebumba eliludaka.
Langensuku zalamakhosi uNkulunkulu wamazulu.
Ngenxa yokuthi uyazisile inkosi okuzakwenzeka emva kwalokhu; iphupho liqinisekile, lengcazelo yalo ithembekile.
Khona inkosi uNebhukadinezari yathi mbo ngobuso bayo.
Inkosi yamphendula uDaniyeli, yathi: Kuliqiniso ukuthi uNkulunkulu wenu unguNkulunkulu wabonkulunkulu, ngoba ubelakho ukwembula limfihlakalo.
Khona inkosi yamenza uDaniyeli waba ngomkhulu, yamupha izipho ezinkulu ezinengi.
UDaniyeli wasecela enkosini, njalo yamisa
UNebhukadinezari inkosi wenza isithombe segolide.
UNebhukadinezari inkosi wasethumela ukubuthela ndawonye iziphathamandla, ukuze beze ekwehlukanisweni kwesithombe uNebhukadinezari inkosi ayesimisile.

Khona iziphathamandla, ababusi, lezinduna, abeluleki, abaphathizikhwama, abehluleli, abathonisisi, labo bonke ababusi bezabelo babuthana ndawonye ekwehlukanisweni kwesithombe uNebhukadinezari inkosi ayesimisile; basebesima phambi kwesithombe uNebhukadinezari ayesimisile.
Ummemezeli wasememeza ngamandla wathi: Liyalaywa, lina bantu, zizwe, lezindimi, ukuthi:
Ngesikhathi elizwa uNebhukadinezari inkosi asimisileyo.
Njalo loba ngubani ongawi phansi, akhonze.
Ngakho ngalesosikhathi uNebhukadinezari inkosi ayesimisile.
Ngakho ngalesosikhathi.
Aphendula athi kuNebhukadinezari inkosi: Nkosi, phila kuze kube nininini!
Wena nkosi, wenzile umlayo;
njalo loba ngubani ongawi phansi, akhonze.
Kukhona amaJuda athile owamise phezu komsebenzi.
Khona uNebhukadinezari ekuthukutheleni lekuvutheni kolaka walaya ukuletha oShadraki, uMeshaki, loAbedinego. Khonokho lawomadoda alethwa phambi kwenkosi.
UNebhukadinezari waphendula wathi kibo: Kungamabomu yini, Shadraki, Meshaki, loAbedinego?
Khathesi, uba selilungile ukuthi ngesikhathi lisizwa ukukhala kophondo, umhlanga, ichacho, ichachwana, ugubhu lwezintambo, lomfece, layo yonke imihlobo yokukhaliswayo?
OShadraki, uMeshaki, loAbedinego.
Uba kungenzeka, uNkulunkulu wethu esimkhonzayo ulakho ukusikhulula esithandweni somlilo ovuthayo; njalo uza si khulula esandleni sakho, nkosi.
Kodwa uba kungenjalo, kakwaziwe kuwe, nkosi, ukuthi kasiyikubakhonza onkulunkulu bakho, lokuthi kasiyikukhothamela isithombe segolide osimisileyo.

Khona uNebhukadinezari wagcwala ulaka, lesimo sobuso bakhe sabaguqukela oShadraki, uMeshaki loAbedinego; waphendula, walaya ukuthi batshise isithando kasikhombisa ngaphezu kwalokho okwejwayeleke ukutshiswa ngakho.
Waselaya amadoda alamandla ayesebuthweni lakhe ukuthi abophe oShadraki, uMeshaki, loAbedinego, ukuthi babaphosele esithandweni somlilo ovuthayo.
Lawomadoda asebotshwa embethe izembatho zawo, amabhulugwe awo, aphoselwa phakathi kwesithando somlilo ovuthayo.
Ngakho ngenxa yokuthi ilizwi lenkosi belibukhali, lesithando sitshisa kakhulu.
Lala amadoda amathathu, oShadraki, uMeshaki, loAbedinego, awela phansi ebotshiwe phakathi kwesithando somlilo esivuthayo.
Khona uNebhukadinezari inkosi wethuka, wasukuma ngokuphangisa: Kasiphoselanga amadoda amathathu ebotshiwe phakathi komlilo yini? Baphendula bathi enkosini: Liqiniso, nkosi.
Yaphendula yathi: Khangelani, ngibona amadoda amane ekhululekile ehamba phakathi komlilo.

Khona uNebhukadinezari wasondela emnyango wesithando somlilo esivuthayo, waphendula, wathi: Shadraki, Meshaki, loAbedinego, lina zinceku zikaNkulunkulu oPhezukonke, phumani, lize. Khona oShadraki, Meshaki, loAbedinego baphuma phakathi komlilo.
Iziphathamandla.
UNebhukadinezari waphendula, wathi: Kadunyiswe uNkulunkulu kaShadraki, uMeshaki, loAbedinego, othume.
Ngakho umlayo wenziwa yimi.
Khona inkosi yabaphumelelisa oShadraki, uMeshaki, loAbedinego, esabelweni seBhabhiloni.
UNebhukadinezari inkosi, kubo bonke abantu, izizwe, lezindimi!
Bekukuhle kimi ukuthi ngikwazise izibonakaliso lezimangaliso.
Yeka ubukhulu bezibonakaliso zakhe.
Mina,uNebhukadinezari, ngangonwabile endlini yami,
ngabona iphupho elangesabisayo; lemicabango phezu kombheda wami.
Ngakho umlayo wenziwa yimi, ukuze bangazise ingcazelo yephupho.
Kwasekungena izanuse, izangoma, amaKhaladiya.
Kodwa ngasekucineni uDaniyeli wangena phambi kwami, obizo lakhe lalinguBeliteshazari:
Wena Beliteshazari, lengcazelo yalo.
Yayinjalo imibono yekhanda lami embhedeni wami, isihlahla phakathi komhlaba, lobude baso babubukhulu.
Isihlahla sakhula saba sikhulu, saqina, lobude baso bafinyelela emazulwini, lokubonakala kwaso kwaze kwaba sekucineni komhlaba wonke.
Amahlamvu aso ayemahle, layo yonke inyama yondliwa kiso.
Ngabona emibonweni yekhanda lami embhedeni wami.
Wamemeza ngamandla watsho njalo: Sigamuleni isihlahla, lezinyoni ngasezingatsheni zaso.

Lanxa kunjalo tshiyani isidindi sempande zakhe emhlabathini, langebhanti lensimbi lethusi ohlazeni lwasendle; njalo kakumanziswe ngamazolo amazulu, lesabelo sakhe kasibe kanye lezinyamazana etshanini bomhlaba.
Inhliziyo yakhe kayiphenduke ingabi ngeyomuntu, kayiphiwe inhliziyo yenyamazana; futhi kakwedlule phezu kwakhe izikhathi eziyisikhombisa.
Loludaba lungesimemezelo.
Leliphupho ngilibonile mina nkosi uNebhukadinezari. Wena-ke, Beliteshazari.
Ng'khona uDaniyeli, obizo lakhe lalinguBeliteshazari.
Isihlahla osibonileyo, esakhula saba sikhulu saqina, lobude baso bafinyelela emazulwini, lokubonakala kwaso kwaze kwaba semhlabeni wonke,
esimahlamvu aso ayemahle, lenyoni zamazulu zahlala ezingatsheni zaso;
singuwe, wena nkosi, osukhulile waba mkhulu waqina.
Njengalokho inkosi yabona umlindi.
Nansi ingcazelo, nkosi, njalo nansi isimemezelo, esiza phezu kwenkosi yami, inkosi:
Ukuthi bazakuxotsha ebantwini.
Njengalokho bathi kutshiywe isidindi sempande zesihlahla.
Ngakho, nkosi, kasemukeleke kuwe iseluleko sami.
Konke lokhu kwamehlela uNebhukadinezari inkosi.
Ekupheleni kwenyanga ezilitshumi lambili wayehambahamba phezu kwesigodlo sombuso weBhabhiloni.
Inkosi yaphendula yathi?
Ilizwi lisesemlonyeni wenkosi.
Bazakuxotsha usuke ebantwini, lenhlalo yakho izakuba kanye lenyamazana zeganga.
Ngalesosikhathi lolulutho lwagcwaliseka phezu kukaNebhukadinezari, zaze inwele zakhe zakhula njenge nsibazelinqe, lenzipho zakhe njengezenyoni.
Njalo ekupheleni kwezinsuku, mina Nebhukadinezari;
futhi bonke abahlali bomhlaba?
Ngasona lesosikhathi ingqondo yami yabuyela kimi.

Njalo ozelwe ngobufebe uzahlala.
Ngizasusa igazi lakhe emlonyeni wakhe.
Besengimisa inkamba ngasendlini yami ngenxa yebutho.
Thokoza kakhulu.
Njalo ngizaquma inqola isuke koEfrayimi kuze kube semikhawulweni yomhlaba.
Lawe, ngegazi lesivumelwano.
Phendukelani enqabeni, lina zibotshwa;
lapho sengizigobisele uJuda.
Njalo izabonakala phezu kwabo, lomtshoko wayo uzaphuma.
yamabandla izabavikela, njengamagumbi elathi.
Njalo uNkulunkulu wabo izabasindisa ngalolosuku.
Ngoba kungakanani.
Celani eNni izulu ngesikhathi sezulu, kulowo lalowo utshani egangeni.
Ngoba izithombe zikhulume ize.
Intukuthelo yami yavutha imelene labelusi, ngajezisa izimpongo.
Kwaphuma kuye igumbi.
Futhi bazakuba njengamaqhawe.
Njalo ngizaqinisa indlu kaJuda.
Njalo amaEfrayimi azakuba njengeqhawe.
Ngizabatshayela ukhwelo.
Njalo ngizabahlanyela phakathi kwezizwe; baphile labantwana babo, baphenduke.
Ngibabuyise bevela elizweni leGibhithe.
Njalo uzadabula olwandle l enhlupheko.
Njalo ngizabaqinisa eNni.
Vula iminyango yakho, wena Lebhanoni.
Qhinqa isililo, wena sihlahla sefiri.
Kulelizwi lokuqhinqa isililo kwabelusi, ngoba udumo lwabo luyachithwa.
Itsho njalo uNkulunkulu wami: Yelusa izimvu;
obathengi bazo; labelusi bazo kabalasihawu ngazo.

Ngoba kangisayikuyekela abahlali belizwe, itsho iN; kodwa khangela, ngizanikela abantu, ngulowo lalowo esandleni sikamakhelwane wakhe, lesandleni senkosi yakhe; njalo bazaliphahlaza ilizwe, njalo kangiyikubophula esandleni sabo.
Njalo ngizakwelusa izimvu zokuhlatshwa.
Ngasengiquma abelusi abathathu ngenyanga eyodwa; lomphefumulo wami wadabuka ngabo, lomphefumulo wabo lawo wangenyanya.
Ngasengisithi: Kangi sa yikulelusa; ofayo kafe.
Ngasengithatha intonga yami, uBuhle, ngayiqamula, ukuze ngephule isivumelwano sami engangisenze labantu bonke.
Sephulwa-ke ngalolosuku; ngakho-ke eziyangekileyo zezimvu.
Ngasengisithi kizo: Uba kulungile emehlweni enu, nikani inkokhelo yami; kodwa uba kunge njalo, yekelani.
yasisithi kimi: Ziphosele kumbumbi.
Ngasengiqamula intonga yami yesibili, uZibopho, ukuze ngephule ubuzalwane phakathi kukaJuda loIsrayeli.
yasisithi kimi: Zithathele futhi izikhali zomelusi oyisithutha.
Ngoba khangela, ngizavusa umelusi elizweni; o ngayikuhambela eziqunyiweyo, adabule iziqa amasondo azo.
Maye kumelusi ongasizi lutho.
Umthwalo welizwi leN ngoIsrayeli:
Khangela, ngizakwenza iJerusalema; yebo, izakuba laphezu kukaJuda ekuvinjezelweni kumelene leJerusalema.
Kuzakuthi-ke ngalolosuku ngenze iJerusalema.
Ngalolosuku, itsho iN KOSI.
Khona ababusi bakoJuda bazakutsho enhliziyweni yabo: Abahlali beJerusalema bangamandla ami eNni yamabandla uNkulunkulu wabo.
Ngalolosuku ngizakwenza.
Futhi izasindisa amathente akoJuda kuqala, ukuze udumo lwendlu kaDavida lodumo lwabakhileyo beJerusalema lungazikhulisi lumelene loJuda.
Ngalolosuku iN KOSI.
Kuzakuthi-ke ngalolosuku.
Njalo ngizathululela phezu kwendlu kaDavida laphezu kwabahlali beJerusalema umoya womusa.
Ngalolosuku.
Futhi ilizwe lizalila;
usapho lwendlu kaLevi lulodwa, labafazi babo bebodwa; usapho lukaShimeyi lulodwa, labafazi babo bebodwa;
zonke izinsapho eziseleyo, usapho ngosapho lulodwa, labafazi babo bebodwa.
Ngalolosuku kuzakuba.
Kuzakuthi-ke ngalolosuku.
Kuzakuthi-ke, loba ngubani esaprofetha, uyise lonina abamzalayo.
Kuzakuthi-ke ngalolosuku;
kodwa uzakuthi: Kangisuye mprofethi, ngingumlimi womhlabathi; ngoba umuntu wangithenga kusukela ebutsheni bami.
Lo munyeuzakuthi kuye: Ayini lamanxeba asezandleni zakho? Yena uzakuthi: Engatshaywa ngawo e ndl iniyabangane bami.
Vuka, nkemba, umelane lomelusi wami.
Kuzakuthi-ke elizweni lonke, itsho iN, ingxenye ezimbili kulo zizaqunywa ziphele.
Njalo eyesithathu ngizayidabulisa emlilweni.
Khangela, usuku lweN luyeza, lempango yakho izakwehlukaniswa phakathi kwakho.
Ngoba ngizabuthanisa zonke izizwe zimelane leJerusalema empini.
Khona izaphuma, ilwe imelene lalezozizwe, njengamhla isilwa ngosuku lwempi.
Langalolosuku inyawo zayo zizakuma.
Lizabaleka-ke nge sihotsha sezintaba zami; ngoba isihotsha sezintaba sizafinyelela eAzali.
Kuzakuthi-ke ngalolosuku kungabi khona ukukhanya, kube mnyama.
Kodwa kuzakuba lusuku olulodwa oluzakwaziwa eNni.
Kuzakuthi-ke ngalolosuku.
Njalo uJehova uzakuba yiNkosi phezu komhlaba wonke.
Ilizwe lonke lizaphendulwa libe njengegceke.
Njalo bazahlala kilo, kungabe kusaba khona.
Lalokhu kuzakuba yinhlupheko ezatshaya ngayo zonke izizwe.
Kuzakuthi-ke ngalolosuku.
LoJuda laye uzakulwa eJerusalema; lenotho yazo zonke izizwe ezizingelezeleyo izabuthwa.
Izakuba njalo-ke inhlupheko, eyembongolo, eyekamela, lekababhemi, leyazo zonke inyamazana ezizakuba kulezizinkamba, njengaleyonhlupheko.
Kuzakuthi-ke, bonke abaseleyo ezizweni zonke ezeza ukumelana leJerusalema.
Kuzakuthi-ke loba ngubani ongayikwenyuka kuzo insapho zomhlaba aye eJerusalema.
Futhi uba usapho lweGibhithe lungenyuki luze, kakuyikuba le zuluphezu kwalo.
Lokhu kuzakuba yisijeziso sesono seGibhithe.
Ngalolosuku kuzakuba semabhereni amabhiza.
Yebo, yileyo laleyo imbiza eJerusalema lakoJuda izakuba yibungcwele eNni yamabandla.
Umthwalo ngesandla sikaMalaki.
Ngilithandile
loEsawu ngamzonda enkangala.
Lanxa uEdoma esithi: Senziwe abayanga ebathukutheleleyo kuze kube phakade.
Lamehlo wakoIsrayeli.
Indodana: Silidelele ngani ibizo lakho?
Lisondeza leN liyadeleleka.
Njalo nxa lisondeza yini ubuso bakho? itsho yamabandla.
Khathesi-ke ake lincenge ubuso bukaNkulunkulu ukuze abe lomusa kithi; lokhu ubuso benu yini? itsho yamabandla.
Ngubani umnikelo esandleni senu ngentokozo.
Ngoba kwezizwe, itsho yamabandla.
Kodwa liyalingcolisa ngokuthi kwenu: Itafula.
Njalo lithi: Khangela, kudinisa lokhu yini ngokuthokoza esandleni senu? itsho iN.
Kaqalekiswe-ke umkhohlisi oleduna phakathi kwezizwe.
Khathesi-ke, bapristi, umlayo lo ngowenu.
Uba enhliziyweni.
Khangelani, ngizakona kanye lawo.
Njalo lizakwazi ukuthi ngithumele lumlayo isivumelwano sami sibe loLevi, itsho yamabandla.
Isivumelwano yikwesaba angesaba ngakho; wathuthumela phambi kwebizo lami.
Umlayo abanengi ebubini.
Ngoba indebe seN yamabandla.
Kodwa lina liphambukile endleleni, lakhubekisa sikaLevi, itsho yamabandla.
Ngakho lami ngilenzile ubuso emlayweni.
Kasilababa isivumelwano sabobaba?
UJuda wenze ngenkohliso kankulunkulu wezizweni.
izaquma umuntu owenza lokhu, ovusayo lophendulayo oletha umnikelo eNni yamabandla.
Lalokhu likwenzile kabili; lisibekela ilathi leN ngezinyembezi, ngokukhala, langokububula, okungangokuthi kayisawunanzi umnikelo, kumbe ukuwemukela ngokuthokoza esandleni senu.
Kanti wesivumelwano sakho.
Kenzanga.
Ngoba ngenkohliso.
Liyidinisile uNkulunkulu wesahlulelo?
Khangelani, itsho iNkosi yamabandla.
Kodwa ngubani yomwatshi.
Sizahlala njeng omcwengi eNni.
Ng'khona umnikelo yakuqala.
Njalo ngizasondela kini ngokwahlulela; ngibe eceleni, njalo abangangesabiyo, itsho iNkosi yamabandla.
Ngoba ngiyiN, kangiphenduki lina madodana kaJakobe kaliqedwa.
Ngitsho lithi: Sizabuyela ngani?
Umuntu angamphanga.
Liqalekisiwe ngesiqalekiso, lesisizwe sonke.
Lethani kuze kungabi le ndawoeyaneleyo.
Ngizakhuza odlayo kaliyikulibozisela ensimini, itsho yamabandla.
Njalo zonke, itsho yamabandla.
Amazwi enu lithi: Sikhulumeni simelene lawe?
Lithe phambi kweN yamabandla?
Khathesi-ke uNkulunkulu, baphephe.
Khona labo abayesabayo iN, langalabo abazindla ngebizo layo.
Njalo bazakuba ngabami, itsho yamabandla, ngalolosuku.
Beselibuya libona kokhonza uNkulunkulu lalowo ongamkhonziyo.
Ngoba khangelani, luyeza kumbe ugatsha.
Kodwa kini elesaba esibaya.
Lizanyathelela, itsho yamabandla.
Khumbulani umlayo lezahlulelo.
Khangelani usuku lweN olukhulu lolwesabekayo.
Uzaphendulela-ke.
Ugwalo lokuzalwa kukaJesu Kristu.
UAbrahama wazala;
uJuda wasezala uFaresi loZara kuTamari; uEsiromu wasezala uAramu;
uAramu wasezala uAminadaba; uAminadaba wasezala uNashoni; uNashoni wasezala uSalimoni;
uSalimoni wasezala uBowosi kuRahabi; uBowosi wasezala uObedi kuRuthe; uObedi wasezala uJese;
uJese wasezala uDavida inkosi;
uSolomoni wasezala uRehobhowamu; uRehobhowamu wasezala uAbhiya; uAbhiya wasezala uAsa;
uAsa wasezala uJehoshafathi; uJehoshafathi wasezala uJoramu; uJoramu wasezala uOziya;
uOziya wasezala uJothamu; uJothamu wasezala uAhazi; uAhazi wasezala uHezekhiya;
uHezekhiya wasezala uManase; uManase wasezala uAmoni; uAmoni wasezala uJosiya;
uJosiya wasezala uJekoniya labafowabo.
Kwathi emva kokuthunjelwa eBhabhiloni uJekoniya;
uZerubhabheli wasezala uAbiyudi; uAbiyudi wasezala uEliyakhimi; uEliyakhimi wasezala uAzori;
uAzori wasezala uZadoki; uZadoki wasezala uAkimi; uAkimi wasezala uEliyudi;
uEliyudi wasezala uEleyazare; uEleyazare wasezala uMathani; uMathani wasezala uJakobe;
uJakobe wasezala uJosefa indoda kaMariya, okwazalwa kuye uJesu othiwa nguKristu.

Ngakho izizukulwana zonke ezisukela kuAbrahama zisiya kuDavida ziyizizukulwana ezilitshumi lane; lezisukela kuDavida ziye ekuthunjelweni eBhabhiloni ziyizizukulwana ezilitshumi lane; lezisukela ekuthunjelweni eBhabhiloni ziye kuKristu ziyizizukulwana ezilitshumi lane.
Ngakho ukuzalwa kukaJesu Kristu kwaba nje.
Kodwa uJosefa indoda yakhe engolungileyo.
Kwathi esanakana lezizinto, khangela, ingilosi yeNkosi yabonakala kuye ephutsheni, yathi: Josefa, ndodana kaDavida, ungesabi ukumthatha uMariya umkakho. Ngoba lokho akukhulelweyo kungoMoya oNgcwele;
njalo uzazala indodana.
Konke lokhu-ke kwenzeka ukuze kugcwaliseke okwakhulunywa yiNkosi ngomprofethi ukuthi:
Khangela, intombi izathatha isisu ibelethe indodana, njalo bazabiza ibizo layo ngokuthinguEmanuweli, okuyikuthi ngokuphendulelwa, uNkulunkulu ulathi.
Kwathi uJosefa esephapheme ebuthongweni wenza njengalokho ingilosi yeNkosi imlayile, wasethatha umkakhe;
kodwa kazange amazi waze.
Kwathi uJesu esezelwe eBhethelehema yeJudiya, ensukwini zikaHerodi inkosi,
zisithi: Ungaphi ozelwe eyinkosi yamaJuda, njalo sesize ukumkhonza.
Ngakho uHerodi inkosi esezwile wakhathazeka, leJerusalema yonke kanye laye.
Esebuthanisile bonke abapristi abakhulu lababhali babantu.
Basebesithi kuye: EBhethelehema yeJudiya; ngoba kulotshiwe ngokunjalo ngumprofethi ukuthi:
Lawe, Bhethelehema lizwe lakoJuda, kawusuye omncinyane lakanye phakathi kwababusi bakoJuda; ngoba kuzavela kuwe umbusi, ozakwelusa abantu bami uIsrayeli.
Khona uHerodi, esezibizile izazi ensitha, wabuzisisa kuzo isikhathi sokubonakala kwenkanyezi.
Wasezithuma eBhethelehema wathi: Hambani libuzisise ngomntwana; kuzakuthi nxa limtholile, libike kimi, ukuze lami ngiye ngimkhonze.
Kwathi seziyizwile inkosi zasuka zahamba; njalo khangela, inkanyezi, ezayibona empumalanga, yahamba phambi kwazo, yaze yafika yema phezu kwalapho usane olwalukhona.
Zathi ukuyibona inkanyezi zathokoza ngentokozo enkulu kakhulu.
Zasezingena endlini, zabona usane kanye loMariya unina, zawela phansi zalukhonza, zavula impahla zazo eziligugu zalukhunga ngezipho.
Kwathi sezilayiwe nguNkulunkulu ephutsheni ukuthi zingabuyeli kuHerodi, zasuka zabuyela elizweni lakizo ngenye indlela.

Kwathi sezisukile, khangela, ingilosi yeNkosi yabonakala kuJosefa ephutsheni, isithi: Vuka uthathe usane lonina, ubusubalekela eGibhithe, ube khona ngize ngikutshele; ngoba uHerodi uzaludinga usane, ukuze alubulale.
Wavuka-ke wathatha usane lonina ebusuku wasuka waya eGibhithe,
wasehlala khona kwaze kwaba yikufa kukaHerodi; ukuze kugcwaliswe okwakhulunywa yiNkosi ngomprofethi isithi: Ngiyibizile indodana yami iphume eGibhithe.

Kwathi uHerodi, esebonile ukuthi uphicwe yizazi, wathukuthela kakhulu, wathuma wabulala abantwana bonke ababeseBhethelehema lemingceleni yayo yonke, kusukela eminyakeni emibili langaphansi, njengesikhathi abebuzisise ngaso kuzazi.
Kwasekugcwaliseka okwakhulunywa nguJeremiya umprofethi, ukuthi:
Kwezwakala ilizwi eRama, ukukhala lokulila lokudabuka okukhulu, uRasheli elil el a abantwana bakhe, njalo engavumi ukududuzwa, ngoba benga se kho.
Kodwa kwathi esefile uHerodi, khangela ingilosi yeNkosi yabonakala ephutsheni kuJosefa eGibhithe,
isithi: Vuka uthathe umntwana omncinyane lonina, ubususiya elizweni lakoIsrayeli; ngoba sebefile ababedinga umphefumulo womntwana.
Wavuka-ke wathatha umntwana omncinyane lonina wasefika elizweni lakoIsrayeli.
Kodwa esezwile ukuthi uAkelawu usebusa eJudiya esikhundleni sikaHerodi uyise, wesaba ukuya khona; kodwa esexwayisiwe nguNkulunkulu ephutsheni, wasuka waya kungxenye zeGalili,
wasefika wahlala emzini othiwa yiNazaretha.
Ngalezonsuku kwasekufika uJohane uMbhabhathizi
esithi: Phendukani; ngoba umbuso wamazulu ususondele.
Ngoba nguye okwakhulunywa ngaye nguIsaya umprofethi, esithi: Ilizwi lomemezayo enkangala.
Njalo uJohane lo wayelesembatho sakhe soboya bekamela, lozwezwe lwesikhumba ekhalweni lwakhe.
Kwasekuphumela kuye iJerusalema leJudiya yonke lelizwe lonke elizingelezele iJodani;
basebebhabhathizwa nguye.
Kwathi ebona abanengi babaFarisi labaSadusi besiza ekubhabhathizeni kwakhe, wathi kubo: Nzalo yezinyoka?
Ngakho thelani izithelo ezifanele ukuphenduka;
njalo lingacabangi ukutsho phakathi kwenu; ngoba ngithi kini: UNkulunkulu ulamandla okumvusela uAbrahama abantwana kulawa amatshe.
Lakhathesi ihloka selibekiwe empandeni zezihlahla; ngakho sonke isihlahla esingatheli isithelo esihle siyaganyulwa siphoselwe emlilweni.
Mina ngilibhabhathiza ngamanzi kubesekuphendukeni;
okhomane lwakhe lokwela lusesandleni sakhe, njalo uzathanyelisisa isibuya sakhe.
Khona uJesu wafika eJodani kuJohane, ukuze abhabhathizwe nguye.
Kodwa uJohane wayemalela esithi: Mina ngiswela ukubhabhathizwa nguwe, kanti wena uza kimi?
Kodwa uJesu ephendula wathi kuye: Vuma khathesi; ngoba kusifanele ukuthi sigcwalise ngokunjalo ukulunga konke. Wasemvumela.
UJesu esebhabhathiziwe wahle wakhuphuka emanzini; njalo khangela, amazulu amvulekela, wasebona uMoya kaNkulunkulu esehla kungathi lijuba esiza phezu kwakhe.
Njalo khangela, ilizwi livela emazulwini.
Khona uJesu wakhokhelelwa.
Esezile ukudla insuku ezingamatshumi amane lobusuku obungamatshumi amane, ekucineni walamba.
Kwasekusiza kuye umlingi wathi: Uba uyiNdodana kaNkulunkulu, tshono ukuthi lamatshe abe yizinkwa.
Kodwa yena waphendula wathi: Kulotshiwe ukuthi: Umuntu kayikuphila ngesinkwa sodwa, kodwa ngalo lonke ilizwi eliphuma emlonyeni kaNkulunkulu.
Udiyabhola wasemthatha,
wasesithi kuye: Uba uyiNdodana kaNkulunkulu.
UJesu wathi kuye: Kulotshiwe futhi ukuthi: Ungayilingi iNkosi uNkulunkulu wakho.
Udiyabhola wabuya wamusa entabeni ende kakhulu, wamtshengisa imibuso yonke yomhlaba lokukhazimula kwayo,
wathi kuye: Zonke lezizinto ngizakunika zona, uba uwela phansi ungikhonza.
UJesu wasesithi kuye: Suka, Sathane.
Udiyabhola wasemyekela; njalo khangela, kwafika ingilosi zasezimsebenzela.
Kwathi uJesu esezwile ukuthi uJohane;
wasesuka eNazaretha;
ukuze kugcwaliseke okwakhulunywa ngumprofethi uIsaya, ukuthi:
Ilizwe lakoZebuloni lelizwe lakoNafithali,
abantu ababehlezi emnyameni babonile ukukhanya okukhulu, lababehlezi elizweni lethunzini lokufa ukukhanya kuphumele kubo.
Kusukela kulesosikhathi uJesu waqala ukutshumayela lokuthi.
Kwathi uJesu ehambahamba, loAndreya umfowabo, bephosela imbule olwandle; ngoba babengabagoli benhlanzi.
Wasesithi kubo: Ngilandelani, njalo ngizalenza libe ngabagoli babantu.
Bahle-ke batshiya amambule bamlandela.
Eseqhubeke esuka lapho, wabona ezinye izelamani ezimbili, uJakobe okaZebediya loJohane umfowabo, besemkhunjini kanye loZebediya uyise, belungisa amambule abo; wasebabiza.
Njalo bahle batshiya umkhumbi loyise bamlandela.
UJesu wasebhoda iGalili yonke, efundisa emasinagogeni abo.
Indumela yakhe yasiphumela kuyo yonke iSiriya, lezigoga; wasebasilisa.
Amaxuku amanengi asemlandela evela eGalili.
Kwathi ebona amaxuku wenyukela entabeni;
wasevula umlomo wakhe, wabafundisa, wathi:
Babusisiwe.
Babusisiwe abalilayo; ngoba bona bazaduduzwa.
Babusisiwe abamnene; ngoba bona bazakudla ilifa lomhlaba.
Babusisiwe abalambela labomela ukulunga; ngoba bona bazasuthiswa.
Babusisiwe abalesihawu; ngoba bona bazahawukelwa.
Babusisiwe abamhlophe ngenhliziyo.
Babusisiwe abalamulayo; ngoba bona bazathiwa ngabantwana bakaNkulunkulu.
Babusisiwe abazingelwayo ngenxa yokulunga; ngoba umbuso wamazulu ungowabo.
Lina libusisiwe, nxa belithuka belizingela, bekhuluma okubi konke bemelana lani beqamba amanga, ngenxa yami;
thokozani lithabe kakhulu, ngoba umvuzo wenu mkhulu emazulwini.
Lina lilitshwayi lomhlaba; kodwa uba itshwayi seliduma lizatshwaywa ngani? Kalisasizi lutho, ngaphandle kokulahlwa phandle beselinyathelwa ngabantu.
Lina liyikukhanya komhlaba; umuzi omiswe phezu kwentaba ungesitheke;
njalo kabalumathisi isibane basibeke ngaphansi kwesitsha, kodwa phezu kwesiqobane sesibane, besesibakhanyisela bonke abasendlini.
Ngokunjalo kakukhanye ukukhanya kwenu phambi kwabantu, ukuze babone imisebenzi yenu emihle.
Lingacabangi ukuthi ngize ukuchitha umlayo kumbe abaprofethi; angizanga ukuchitha kodwa ukugcwalisa.
Ngoba ngiqinisile ngithi kini: Kuze kudlule izulu lomhlaba, kakusoze kudlule ibadlana libe linye kumbe ichatshana libe linye lomlayo kuze kwenzeke konke.
Ngakho owephula owodwa kulimilayo emincinyane, afundise abantu ngokunjalo, uzathiwa ngomncinyane embusweni wamazulu; kodwa oyenzayo ayifundise, lowo uzathiwa mkhulu embusweni wamazulu.
Ngoba ngithi kini: Ngaphandle kokuthi ukulunga kwenu kwedlule okwababhali lokwabaFarisi, kalisoze lingene embusweni wamazulu.
Lizwile ukuthi kwathiwa kwabasendulo: Ungabulali; laloba ngubani obulalayo, uzakuba lecala lokugwetshwa;
kodwa mina ngithi kini: Wonke othukuthelela umfowabo kungelasizatho uzakuba lecala lokugwetshwa.
Ngakho uba uletha umnikelo wakho elathini, ubusukhumbula ulapho ukuthi umfowenu ulolutho olumelana lawe,
tshiya lapho umnikelo wakho phambi kwelathi, uhambe, uqale ubuyisane lomfowenu, ubusuzonikela umnikelo wakho.
Phangisa uzwane laye omangalelane lawe, ubusuphoselwa entolongweni.
Ngiqinisile ngithi kuwe: Kawusoze uphume khona, uze ubhadale indibilitshi yokucina.
Lizwile ukuthi kwathiwa kwabasendulo.
Kodwa mina ngithi kini: Wonke okhangela owesifazana ukumkhanuka usefebile laye enhliziyweni yakhe.
Njalo uba ilihlo lakho lokunene likukhubekisa.
Njalo uba isandla sakho sokunene sikukhubekisa, siqume usilahlele khatshana lawe.
Kwathiwa-ke: Loba ngubani owala umkakhe, kumele amnike incwadi yesehlukaniso;
kodwa mina ngithi kini: Loba ngubani owala umkakhe, ngaphandle kodaba lokufeba, umenza afebe, njalo loba ngubani omthathayo owaliweyo uyafeba.
Lizwile futhi ukuthi kwathiwa kwabasendulo.
Kodwa mina ngithi kini: Lingafungi lakanye;
loba ngomhlaba, ngoba uyisenabelo senyawo zakhe;
njalo ungafungi ngekhanda lakho, ngoba ungelwenze unwele lalunye lube mhlophe kumbe lube mnyama.
Kodwa ilizwi lenu kalibe ngelokuthi: Yebo yebo, hatshi hatshi; kodwa okudlula lokho kuvela komubi.
Lizwile ukuthi kwathiwa: Ilihlo ngelihlo, lezinyo ngezinyo;
kodwa mina ngithi kini;
lalowo ofuna ukukumangalela lokuthatha isigqoko sakho, mtshiyele lesembatho;
laloba ngubani okubamba ngamandla ukuthi uhambe imayili libe linye, hamba laye abe mabili.
Mnike ocela kuwe.
Lizwile ukuthi kwathiwa: Wothanda umakhelwane wakho;
kodwa mina ngithi kini: Thandani izitha zenu, libabusise abaliqalekisayo, libaphathe kuhle abalizondayo;
ukuze libe ngabantwana bakaYihlo osemazulwini, ngoba yena uphumisa ilanga lakhe phezu kwababi labahle, anise izulu phezu kwabalungileyo labangalunganga.
Ngoba aluba lithanda labo abalithandayo, lilomvuzo bani?
Futhi uba libingelela abafowenu bodwa, lenzani okukhulu okwedlula okwabanye? Kabenzi njalo labathelisi yini?
Ngakho lina banini ngabapheleleyo.
Qaphelani ukuthi umsebenzi wenu womusa; nxa kunge njalo, alilamvuzo kuYihlo osemazulwini.
Ngakho nxa usenza umsebenzi womusa, ungakhalisi uphondo phambi kwakho.
Kodwa wena nxa usenza umsebenzi womusa isandlasakho sokhohlo kasingakwazi esikwenzayo esokunene sakho,
ukuze umsebenzi wakho womusa ube sekusithekeni; njalo uYihlo obona ekusithekeni, yena uzakuvuza obala.
Lalapho likhuleka, lingabi njengabazenzisi, ngoba bathanda ukukhuleka bemi emasinagogeni lemahlanganweni endlela, ukuze babonwe ngabantu; ngiqinisile ngithi kini: Sebewemukele umvuzo wabo.
Kodwa wena nxa ukhuleka, ngena.
Njalo uba likhuleka lingaphindaphindi.
Ngakho lingafanani labo; ngoba uYihlo uyakwazi elikuswelayo, lingakaceli kuye.
Ngakho lina khulekani ngokunje: Baba wethu osemazulwini;
umbuso wakho kawuze;
siphe lamuhla ukudla kwethu kwensuku zonke;
njalo usithethelele amacala ethu, njengalokhu lathi sibathethelela abalamacala kithi;
njalo ungasingenisi ekulingweni.
Ngoba uba lithethelela abantu iziphambeko zabo, uYihlo osezulwini uzalithethelela lani.
Kodwa uba lingathetheleli abantu iziphambeko zabo, loYihlo kayikulithethelela iziphambeko zenu.
Futhi nxa lizila ukudla.
Kodwa wena nxa uzila ukudla gcoba ikhanda lakho, ugeze ubuso bakho,
ukuze ungabonakali ebantwini ukuthi uzilile ukudla, kodwa kuYihlo osekusithekeni; njalo uYihlo obona ekusithekeni uzakuvuza obala.
Lingazibekeli impahla eziligugu emhlabeni, lapho inundu lokuthomba okona khona, lalapho amasela afohlela khona ebe;
kodwa zibekeleni izinto eziligugu ezulwini, lapho inundu lokuthomba okungoni khona.
Ngoba lapho okukhona impahla yenu eligugu, lenhliziyo yenu izakuba lapho.
Isibane somzimba yilihlo;
kodwa uba ilihlo lakho lilibi, umzimba wakho wonke uzakuba lobumnyama!
Kakho ongakhonza amakhosi amabili; ngoba uzazonda enye, athande enye; kumbe uzabambelela kwenye, adelele enye.
Ngakho ngithi kini?
Khangelani inyoni zezulu, ukuthi kazihlanyeli njalo kazivuni, kazibutheli eziphaleni; kanti uYihlo osezulwini uyazondla; lina kalizidluli kakhulu yini?
Njalo nguwuphi kini ngokuphisekela ongengezelela ingalo ibenye ebudeni bakhe?
Langezembatho liphisekelani? Qaphelisani imiduze yeganga, ukuthi ikhula njani; kayitshikatshiki, kayiphothi;
kodwa ngithi kini: LoSolomoni ebucwazicwazini bakhe bonke wayengembathiswanga njengomunye wayo.
Njalo uba uNkulunkulu esembathisa ngokunjalo utshani beganga, obukhona lamuhla, kuthi kusasa buphoswe eziko, kayikule mbathisakakhulu yini, lina abokholo oluncinyane?
Ngakho lingaphisekeli lutho, lisithi: Sizakudlani? Kumbe: Sizanathani? Loba: Sizakwembathani?
Ngoba zonke lezizinto izizwe ziyazidinga; ngoba uYihlo osezulwini uyazi ukuthi liyaziswela zonke lezizinto.
Kodwa dingani kuqala umbuso kaNkulunkulu lokulunga kwakhe, njalo zonke lezizinto zizakwengezelelwa kini.
Ngakho lingaphisekeli ikusasa; ngoba ikusasa izaziphisekela yona; bulwanele usuku obalo ububi.
Lingehluleli, ukuze lingehlulelwa,
ngoba lizakwahlulelwa ngokwehlulela elehlulela ngakho.
Kanti ukhangelelani ucezwana oluselihlweni lomfowenu, kodwa ungalunanzeleli ugodo olukwelakho ilihlo?
Kumbe ungatsho njani kumfowenu ukuthi: Kahle ngikhuphe ucezwana oluselihlweni lakho; khangela kanti ugodo luselihlweni lakho?
Mzenzisi, qala ukhuphe ugodo elihlweni lakho, khona-ke uzabona kuhle ukukhupha ucezwana elihlweni lomfowenu.
Linganiki izinja okungcwele; lingaphoseli amapharele enu phambi kwezingulube, hlezi ziwanyathele ngenyawo zazo.
Celani; dingani, lizathola; qoqodani, lizavulelwa.
Ngoba wonke ocelayo uyemukela, loqoqodayo uzavulelwa.
Kumbe nguwuphi kini ongathi, nxa indodana yakhe icela isinkwa, ayinike ilitshe?
Uba-ke icela inhlanzi, ayinike inyoka yini?
Ngakho uba lina, elingababi, likwazi ukupha abantwana benu izipho ezinhle, uYihlo osemazulwini uzabapha kakhulu kangakanani izinto ezinhle abacela kuye?
Ngakho konke elithanda ukuthi abantu bakwenze kini, kwenzeni lani ngokunjalo kubo.
Ngenani ngesango elincinyane; ngoba isango likhulu, lendlela ibanzi eya ekubhujisweni, njalo banengi abangena ngalo;
ngoba isango lincinyane, lendlela ilukhonjwana eya empilweni, njalo balutshwana abayitholayo.
Kodwa nanzelelani abaprofethi bamanga.
Lizabazi ngezithelo zabo; bayazikha yini izithelo zevini emeveni, kumbe imikhiwa ekhuleni oluhlabayo?
Ngokunjalo sonke isihlahla esihle siyathela izithelo ezinhle; kodwa isihlahla esibi siyathela izithelo ezimbi;
isihlahla esihle singethele izithelo ezimbi, lesihlahla esibi singethele izithelo ezinhle.
Sonke isihlahla esingatheli isithelo esihle siyaganyulwa siphoselwe emlilweni.
Ngakho-ke lizabazi ngezithelo zabo.
Kakusibo bonke abatshoyo kimi ukuthi: Nkosi, Nkosi, abazangena embusweni wamazulu.
Abanengi bazakuthi kimi ngalolosuku: Nkosi, Nkosi, kasiprofethanga yini ngelakho ibizo?
Njalo khona ngizakutsho obala kubo ukuthi: Angizanga ngilazi; sukani kimi lina benzi bobubi.
Ngakho wonke owezwayo la amazwi ami njalo awenze;
laselisina izulu, kwasekufika impophoma, kwasekuvunguza imimoya yayitshaya leyondlu; kodwa kayiwanga; ngoba yayisekelwe phezu kwedwala.
Njalo wonke owezwayo la amazwi ami njalo angawenzi, uzafananiswa lendoda eyisithutha, eyakha indlu yayo phezu kwetshebetshebe;
laselisina izulu, kwasekufika impophoma, kwasekuvunguza imimoya yayitshaya leyondlu; yawa; kwaba kukhulu ukuwa kwayo.
Kwasekusithi uJesu eseqedile lawomazwi amaxuku ababaza ngemfundiso yakhe;
ngoba wabafundisa njengolamandla, njalo kungenjengababhali.
Kwathi esehlile entabeni, amlandela amaxuku amakhulu;
njalo khangela, umlephero weza wamkhonza wathi.
UJesu waseselula isandla, wamthinta, wathi: Ngiyathanda, hlambuluka. Njalo ubulephero bakhe bahle bahlanjululwa.
UJesu wasesithi kuye: Khangela ungatsheli muntu.
Kwathi uJesu esengenile eKapenawume, kweza kuye induna yekhulu imncenga,
yasisithi: Nkosi, inceku yami ilele endlini iyisigoga, isebuhlungwini obukhulu.
UJesu wasesithi kuye: Mina ngizakuza ngiyisilise.
Induna yekhulu yasiphendula yathi: Nkosi, kangifanele ukuthi ungene ngaphansi kophahla lwami; kodwa kuphela khuluma ilizwi, njalo inceku yami izasiliswa.
Ngoba lami ngingumuntu ongaphansi kwamandla, ngilamabutho ngaphansi kwami; njalo ngithi kuleli: Hamba, beselihamba; lakwelinye: Woza, beselisiza; lencekwini yami: Yenza lokhu, njalo ikwenze.
Kwathi uJesu esezwile wamangala, wathi kwabalandelayo: Ngiqinisile ngithi kini: Angitholanga ukholo olungaka ngitsho lakoIsrayeli.
Njalo ngithi kini: Abanengi bazakuza bevela empumalanga lentshonalanga;
kodwa abantwana bombuso.
UJesu wasesithi enduneni yekhulu: Hamba, futhi kakube kuwe njengoba ukholiwe. Inceku yakhe yasisiliswa ngalelohola.
Kwathi uJesu engene endlini kaPetro.
Wasebamba isandla sakhe, njalo uqhuqho lwamyekela; wasesukuma, wabancedisa.
Kwathi sekuhlwile baletha kuye abanengi ababengenwe ngamadimoni; wasekhupha omoya ngelizwi, wasilisa bonke abagulayo;
ukuze kugcwaliseke okwakhulunywa nguIsaya umprofethi ukuthi: Yena wathatha ubuthakathaka bethu, wazithwala izifo zethu.
Kwathi uJesu ebona amaxuku amakhulu emhanqile, walaya ukuthi bachaphele ngaphetsheya.
Kwasekusondela umbhali othile wathi kuye: Mfundisi, ngizakulandela loba kungaphi lapho oya khona.
UJesu wasesithi kuye: Amakhanka alemilindi, lenyoni zezulu izidleke; kodwa iNdodana yomuntu kayila lapho engaqamelisa ikhanda khona.
Omunye wabafundi bakhe wasesithi kuye: Nkosi, ngivumela ukuthi ngiqale ngiyengcwaba ubaba.
Kodwa uJesu wathi kuye: Ngilandela, uyekele abafileyo bangcwabe ababo abafileyo.
Kwathi esengenile emkhunjini, abafundi bakhe bamlandela.
Njalo khangela, kwavuka isiphepho esikhulu olwandle, okungangokuthi umkhumbi wagutshuzelwa ngamagagasi; kodwa yena wayelele.
Basebesondela abafundi bakhe bamvusa, besithi: Nkosi, sisindise, siyabhubha!
Wasesithi kubo: Lesabelani, lina abokholo oluncinyane.
Kodwa abantu bamangala, besithi: Ngonjani lo, ukuthi lemimoya lolwandle kumlalele?
Kwathi esefikile ngaphetsheya elizweni lamaGergesi;
njalo khangela, bamemeza besithi: Silani lawe? Uze lapha yini ukusihlupha kungakafiki isikhathi?
Kwakukhona khatshana labo umhlambi wengulube ezinengi usidla.
Amadimoni asemncenga, esithi: Uba usikhupha, sivumela ukuthi sihambe singene emhlanjini wengulube.
Wasesithi kuwo: Hambani. Esephumile angena emhlanjini wengulube; futhi khangela, umhlambi wonke wengulube waphaphatheka eliweni usiya olwandle, wafela emanzini.
Abazelusayo basebebaleka, basebesiya emzini babika konke, lezin dabazababengenwe ngamadimoni.
Njalo khangela, umuzi wonke waphuma ukumhlangabeza uJesu; bathi bembona, bancenga ukuthi asuke emikhawulweni yakibo.
Wasengena emkhunjini.
Futhi khangela, baletha kuye umuntu oyisigoga elele ehlakeni.
Njalo khangela, abanye bababhali bakhulumela ngaphakathi bathi: Lo uyahlambaza.
Njalo uJesu ebona imicabango yabo wathi: Linakanelani okubi enhliziyweni zenu?
Ngoba yikuphi okulula, ukuthi: Uthethelelwe izono zakho; kumbe ukuthi: Sukuma uhambe?
Kodwa ukuze lazi ukuthi iNdodana yomuntu ilamandla emhlabeni okuthethelela izono (wasesithi koyisigoga): Sukuma uthathe uhlaka lwakho, uye endlini yakho.
Wasesukuma waya endlini yakhe.
Kwathi amaxuku esebonile, amangala, adumisa uNkulunkulu, onike abantu amandla anje.
Esedlula lapho uJesu wabona umuntu, wathi kuye: Ngilandela. Wasesukuma wamlandela.
Kwasekusithi ehlezi ekudleni endlini, khangela-ke, abathelisi abanengi lezoni beza bahlala ekudleni loJesu labafundi bakhe.
AbaFarisi sebebonile bathi kubafundi bakhe: Kungani umfundisi wenu esidla labathelisi lezoni?
Kwathi uJesu esizwa wathi kubo: Abaphilileyo kabadingi melaphi, kodwa abagulayo.
Kodwa hambani lifunde ukuthi kutshoni.
Khona kwafika kuye abafundi bakaJohane?
UJesu wasesithi kubo.
Futhi kakho obekela isichibi selembu elingakafinyeli esembathweni esidala; ngoba lokho okubekelwe kuso kuzadabuka esembathweni, besesiqhela isikhala.

Njalo kabatheli iwayini elitsha emigodleni emidala; uba-ke kungenjalo imigodla iyadabuka, lewayini lichitheke, lemigodla yonakale; kodwa iwayini elitsha balifaka emigodleni emitsha, besekulondolozeka kokubili.
Kwathi esakhuluma lezizinto kubo.
Wasesukuma uJesu wamlandela, labafundi bakhe.
Njalo khangela, owesifazana owayelomopho okweminyaka elitshumi lambili, wasondela ngemuva kwakhe, wathinta umphetho wesembatho sakhe.
Ngoba wathi ngaphakathi kwakhe: Aluba ngithinta nje isembatho sakhe, ngizasindiswa.
Kodwa uJesu etshibilika embona, wathi: Mana isibindi, ndodakazi; ukholo lwakho lukusindisile. Owesifazana wasesila kusukela ngalelohola.
UJesu wasefika endlini yomphathi, wabona abakhalisa imihlanga lexuku liphithizela,
wathi kubo: Dedani; ngoba intombazana kayifanga.
Kodwa ixuku selikhutshiwe, wangena wabamba isandla sayo, intombazana yasivuka.
Indumela yalokho yasiphumela kulelolizwe lonke.
Kwathi uJesu esedlula lapho, iziphofu ezimbili zamlandela, zimemeza zisithi!
Esengenile endlini, iziphofu zeza kuye; uJesu wasesithi kuzo: Liyakholwa yini ukuthi ngingakwenza lokhu? Zathi kuye: Yebo, Nkosi.
Wasethinta amehlo azo.
Asevulwa amehlo azo; uJesu wasezilayisisa kakhulu wathi.
Kodwa zaphuma.
Kwathi ekuphumeni kwazo, khangela, baletha kuye umuntu oyisimungulu owayengenwe lidimoni;
kwathi idimoni selikhutshiwe, isimungulu sakhuluma; amaxuku asemangala, athi: Kakuzanga kubonwe okunje koIsrayeli.
Kodwa abaFarisi bathi: Ukhupha amadimoni ngenkosi yamadimoni.
UJesu wasebhoda emizini yonke lemizaneni.
Kwathi ebona amaxuku, waba lesihelo ngawo.
Wasesithi kubafundi bakhe: Isibili isivuno sikhulu, kodwa izisebenzi zinlutshwana;
ngakho ncengani iNkosi yesivuno.
Wasebizela kuye abafundi bakhe abalitshumi lambili, wabanika amandla phezu kwabomoya abangcolileyo, ukuthi babakhuphe, lokuthi belaphe sonke isifo lobuthakathaka bonke.
Njalo amabizo abaphostoli abalitshumi lambili yiwo la;
uFiliphu, loBartolomewu; uTomasi, loMathewu umthelisi; uJakobe okaAlfewu, loLabewu othiwa njalo nguTadewu;
uSimoni umKhanani.
Laba abalitshumi lambili uJesu wabathuma, wabalaya, esithi: Lingahambi ngendlela yabezizwe;
kodwa yanini ikakhulu.
Futhi ekuhambeni kwenu tshumayelani, lisithi.
Silisani abagulayo, lihlambulule amalephero, livuse abafileyo, likhuphe amadimoni. Lemukeliswe ngesihle, phanini ngesihle.
Lingazithatheli igolide, loba isiliva,
loba isikhwama sendlela, loba izigqoko ezimbili, loba amanyathela, loba udondolo.
Lakuwuphi umuzi kumbe umzana elingena kuwo, buzani ukuthi ngubani ofaneleyo kuwo; lihlale khona, lize lisuke.
Njalo nxa lingena endlini, liyibingelele.
Njalo uba indlu ifanele, ukuthula kwenu kakube phezu kwayo; kodwa uba ingafanele.
Njalo loba ngubani ongalemukeliyo kumbe ongalaleli amazwi enu, nxa liphuma kuleyondlu kumbe kulowomuzi, thintithani uthuli lwenyawo zenu.
Ngiqinisile ngithi kini: Kuzakuba ngcono kulizwe leSodoma leleGomora ngosuku lwesigwebo, kulakulowomuzi.
Khangelani, mina ngiyalithuma njengezimvu phakathi kwezimpisi, libe msulwa njengamajuba.
Kodwa limukani abantu; ngoba bazalinikela;
njalo lizalethwa laphambi kwababusi lamakhosi ngenxa yami.
Kodwa nxa belinikela, lingakhathaleli ukuthi lizakhuluma njani kumbe into bani;
ngoba kakusini elikhulumayo, kodwa ng uMoya kaYihlo okhuluma phakathi kwenu.
Futhi umfowabo uzanikela umfowabo ekufeni, loyise umntwana; labantwana bazavukela abazali, bababulale.
Njalo lizazondwa yibo bonke ngenxa yebizo lami.
Kodwa nxa belizingela kulo umuzi.
Umfundi kaphezu komfundisi, lenceku kayiphezu kwenkosi yayo.
Kumanele umfundi ukuthi abe njengomfundisi wakhe, lenceku njengenkosi yayo, kakhulu kangakanani labo abendlu yakhe?
Ngakho lingabesabi; ngoba kakukho okufihliweyo, okungayikubonakaliswa; lokuthukuziweyo, okungayikwaziwa.
Lokho engikutsho kini emnyameni, kukhulumeni ekukhanyeni; lalokho elikuzwa endlebeni, kumemezeleni phezu kwezimpahla.
Njalo lingabesabi ababulala umzimba, kodwa bengelamandla okubulala umphefumulo.
Kazithengiswa yini intaka ezimbili ngendibilitshi? Kodwa kakuyikuwa emhlabathini lanye yazo, ngaphandle kukaYihlo.
Kodwa lezenu inwele zekhanda zibaliwe zonke.
Ngakho lingesabi; lina liyazidlula intaka ezinengi.
Ngakho wonke ozangivuma phambi kwabantu.
Kodwa loba ngubani ongiphika phambi kwabantu.
Lingacabangi ukuthi ngize ukuletha ukuthula emhlabeni; angizanga ukuletha ukuthula, kodwa inkemba.
Ngoba ngize ukwehlukanisa umuntu loyise, lendodakazi lonina, lomalokazana loninazala;
lezitha zomuntu ngabendlu yakhe.
Othanda uyise kumbe unina kulami kangifanele; lothanda indodana kumbe indodakazi kulami kangifanele;
longathathi isiphambano sakhe njalo angilandele, kangifanele.
Lowo othola impilo yakhe uzalahlekelwa yiyo; lolahlekelwa yimpilo yakhe ngenxa yami uzayithola.
Owemukela lina wemukela mina.
Owemukela umprofethi ebizweni lomprofethi uzazuza umvuzo womprofethi; lowemukela olungileyo ebizweni lolungileyo uzazuza umvuzo wolungileyo.
Njalo loba ngubani ozanathisa omunye walababancinyane inkezo nje yamanziaqandayo ebizweni lomfundi, ngiqinisile ngithi kini: Kasoze alahlekelwa ngumvuzo wakhe.
Kwasekusithi uJesu eseqedile ukulaya abafundi bakhe abalitshumi lambili, wasuka lapho ukuyafundisa lokutshumayela emizini yabo.
Kwathi uJohane,
wathi kuye: Wena unguye ozayo yini, kumbe silindele omunye?
UJesu wasephendula wathi kubo: Hambani limtshele uJohane izinto elizizwayo lelizibonayo:
Iziphofu zibuye zibone;
njalo ubusisiwe loba ngubani ongakhubekiyo ngami.
Kwathi bona besuka uJesu waqala ukukhuluma emaxukwini ngoJohane wathi: Laphuma laya enkangala ukuyabonani? Umhlanga onyikinywa ngumoya yini?
Kanti laphumela ukuyabonani? Umuntu owembethe izembatho ezibuthakathaka yini? Khangelani, abembethe ezibuthakathaka basezindlini zamakhosi.
Pho laphumela ukuyabonani;
ngoba lo nguye okulotshwe ngaye ukuthi: Khangela, mina ngiyathuma isithunywa sami phambi kobuso bakho, esizalungisa indlela yakho phambi kwakho.
Ngiqinisile ngithi kini: Kakuvelanga phakathi kwabazelwe ngabesifazana omkhulu kuloJohane uMbhabhathizi. Kodwa omncinyane embusweni wamazulu mkhulu kulaye.
Njalo kusukela ensukwini zikaJohane uMbhabhathizi kuze kube khathesi umbuso wamazulu uphathwa ngodlakela, labalodlakela bawuthatha ngamandla.
Ngoba abaprofethi bonke lomlayo baprofetha kwaze kwaba nguJohane;
njalo uba livuma uku kw emukela, lo unguElija obezakuza.
Olendlebe zokuzwa, akezwe.
Kodwa ngizasifananisa lani lesisizukulwana? Sifanana labantwana abahlezi emamakethe,
besithi: Salitshayela umhlanga, kodwa kalisinanga; salililela, kodwa kalikhalanga.
Ngoba uJohane wafika engadli, basebesithi: Uledimoni.
INdodana yomuntu yafika isidla inatha, basebesithi: Khangelani, umuntu oligovu lesinathi sewayini, umngane wabathelisi.
Waseqala ukusola imizi okwakwenziwe phakathi kwayo ubunengi bemisebenzi yakhe yamandla, ngoba ingaphendukanga, wathi:
Maye kuwe, Korazini.
Kodwa ngithi kini: Kuzakuba ngcono.
Lawe, Kapenawume, ophakanyiselwe ezulwini.
Kodwa ngithi kini: Kuzakuba ngcono kulizwe leSodoma ngosuku lwesigwebo, kulakuwe.
Ngalesosikhathi uJesu, kodwa wazembulela izingane;
yebo Baba, ngoba ngokunjalo kwaba kuhle phambi kwakho.
Konke kwanikelwa kimi nguBaba; njalo kakho oyaziyo iNdodana, ngaphandle kukaYise; kakho futhi omaziyo uYise ngaphandle kweNdodana, njalo loba ngubani iNdodana ethanda ukumembulela.
Wozani kimi lonke elikhatheleyo.
Thathani ijogwe lami lilibekephezu kwenu;
ngoba ijogwe lami libutshelezi, lomthwalo wami ulula.
Ngalesosikhathi uJesu wadabula emasimini amabele ngesabatha; futhi abafundi bakhe babelambile.
Kodwa abaFarisi be ku bona bathi kuye: Khangela, abafundi bakho benza okungavunyelwanga ukwenziwa ngesabatha.
Kodwa wathi kubo: Kalifundanga yini uDavida akwenzayo, mhla elambile yena lababelaye;
ukuthi wangena njani endlini kaNkulunkulu, wadla izinkwa zokubukiswa, ayengavunyelwa ukuzidla, ngitsho lababelaye?
Ingabe kalifundanga yini emlayweni, ukuthi ngamasabatha abapristi bayalona isabatha ethempelini, bangabi lacala?
Kodwa ngithi kini: Kukhona lapha omkhulu kulethempeli.
Kodwa aluba belisazi ukuthi kutshoni ukuthi: Ngifisa isihawu hatshi umhlatshelo, ngabe kalibalahlanga abangelacala.
Ngoba iNdodana yomuntu iyiNkosi leyesabatha.
Futhi wasuka lapho wangena esinagogeni labo;
njalo khangela, kwakukhona umuntu olesandla esitshwabheneyo; basebembuza besithi: Kuvunyelwe yini ukusilisa ngamasabatha? ukuze bambeke icala.
Kodwa wathi kubo: Nguwuphi umuntu phakathi kwenu, elemvu eyodwa, futhi uba yona iwele emgodini ngesabatha, ongayikuyibamba a yi khuphule?
Umuntu uyedlula-ke kangakanani imvu! Ngakho kuvunyelwe ukwenza okuhle ngamasabatha.
Wasesithi kumuntu: Yelula isandla sakho. Wase s elula, sasesisiliswa saphila njengesinye.
Basebephuma abaFarisi becebisana ngaye, ukuthi bangambulala njani.
Kodwa uJesu esekwazi wasuka lapho.
Wasebalayisisa ukuthi bangamvezi;
ukuze kugcwaliseke okwakhulunywa nguIsaya umprofethi, ukuthi:
Khangela, inceku yami engiyikhethileyo; othandekayo wami othokoza ngaye umphefumulo wami; ngizabeka uMoya wami phezu kwakhe, njalo uzatshumayela ukwahlulela kwabezizwe.
Kayikubangisa, kayikumemeza, njalo kakho ozalizwa ilizwi lakhe ezindleleni.
Umhlanga ofecekileyo kayikuwephula, lentambo yesibane ethunqayo kayikuyicitsha, aze aphumelelise ukwahlulela.
Lezizwe zizathemba ebizweni lakhe.
Kwasekulethwa kuye ongenwe lidimoni, ey isiphofu lesimungulu; wasemsilisa, kwaze kwathi isiphofu esiy isimungulu sakhuluma njalo sabona.
Asemangala amaxuku wonke athi?
Kodwa abaFarisi sebezwile bathi: Lumuntu kakhuphi amadimoni, ngaphandle ngoBhelezebhule inkosi yamadimoni.
Kodwa uJesu, eseyazi imicabango yabo, wathi kubo: Wonke umbuso owehlukene umelene lawo ngokwawo uyachitheka; lawo wonke umuzi kumbe indlu eyehlukene imelene layo ngokwayo ingeze yema.
Njalo uba uSathane ekhupha uSathane, wehlukene emelene laye ngokwakhe; pho umbuso wakhe uzakuma njani?
Futhi uba mina ngikhupha amadimoni ngoBhelezebhule, amadodana enu akhupha ngobani? Ngakho wona azakuba ngabagwebi benu.
Kodwa uba mina ngikhupha amadimoni ngoMoya kaNkulunkulu, umbuso kaNkulunkulu usufikile kini.
Kumbe umuntu angangena njani endlini yesiqhwaga aphange impahla yaso, ngaphandle kokuthi asibophe kuqala isiqhwaga.
Ongelami, umelene lami, longabuthi lami, uyachithiza.
Ngakho ngithi kini: Abantu bazathethelelwa sonke isono lokuhlambaza.
Lalowo okhuluma ilizwi elimelana leNdodana yomuntu; kodwa lowo okhuluma emelana loMoya oyiNgcwele, kayikuthethelelwa, kungeyisikho kulesisikhathi loba kwesizayo.
Loba yenzani isihlahla sibe ngesilungileyo, lesithelo saso sibe ngesilungileyo, kumbe lenze isihlahla sibe sibi, lesithelo saso sibe sibi.
Nzalo yezinyoka, lingakhuluma njani izinto ezinhle, libabi? Ngoba umlomo ukhuluma ngokugcwala kwenhliziyo.
Umuntu olungileyo ukhupha izinto ezilungileyo kokuligugu elilungileyo lenhliziyo; lomuntu omubi ukhupha izinto ezimbi kokuligugu elibi.
Kodwa ngithi kini: Lonke ilizwi eliyize abalikhulumayo abantu, bazaziphendulela ngalo ngosuku lokwahlulela.
Ngoba ngamazwi akho uzalungisiswa, langamazwi akho uzalahlwa.
Abanye bababhali labaFarisi basebephendula, bathi: Mfundisi, sifuna ukubona isibonakaliso esivela kuwe.
Kodwa waphendula wathi kubo: Isizukulwana esibi.
Ngoba njengalokhu uJona waba sesiswini sensikabayitshiye insuku ezintathu lobusuku obuthathu, ngokunjalo iNdodana yomuntu izakuba semathunjini omhlaba insuku ezintathu lobusuku obuthathu.
Amadoda eNineve.
Indlovukazi yeningizimu izasukuma ekugwetshweni kanye lalesisizukulwana.
Kodwa nxa umoya ongcolileyo esephumile emuntwini, uyahamba adabule indawo ezomileyo, edinga ukuphumula, kodwa enga ku tholi.
Abesesithi: Ngizabuyela endlini yami engaphuma kuyo; njalo esefikile ayifice ize, ithanyelwe, njalo ilungisiwe.
Abesehamba athathe kanye laye abanye omoya abayisikhombisa ababi kulaye uqobo, besebengena bahlale khona.
Kwathi esakhuluma emaxukwini, khangela, unina labafowabo bema ngaphandle, bedinga ukukhuluma laye.
Omunye wasesithi kuye: Khangela, unyoko labafowenu bemi phandle, badinga ukukhuluma lawe.
Kodwa waphendula wathi komtshelileyo: Ngubani umama? Labafowethu ngobani?
Waseselulela isandla sakhe kubafundi bakhe wathi: Khangelani, umama labafowethu.
Ngoba loba ngubani owenza intando.
Kwathi ngalolosuku uJesu waphuma endlini.
Kwasekubuthana kuye amaxuku amakhulu.
Wasekhuluma labo izinto ezinengi ngemifanekiso, wathi: Khangelani, kwaphuma umhlanyeli ukuyahlanyela.
Kwathi ekuhlanyeleni kwakhe, enye inhlanyeloyawela eceleni kwendlela; kwasekufika inyoni, zayidla zayiqeda.
Kodwa enye yawela emhlabathini olamatshe, lapho eyayingelamhlabathi omnengi khona; futhi yahle yamila, ngoba kwakungelakutshona komhlabathi;
kwathi ekuphumeni kwelanga yahangulwa; njalo ngoba yayingelampande yabuna.
Kodwa enye yawela emeveni; ameva asekhula ayiminyanisa.
Kodwa enye yawela emhlabathini omuhle, yathela isithelo.
Olendlebe zokuzwa, akezwe.
Kwasekufika abafundi bathi kuye: Ukhulumelani kubo ngemifanekiso?
Wasephendula wathi kubo: Ngoba kuphiwe kini ukwazi imfihlo zombuso wamazulu, kodwa bona kabakunikwanga.
Ngoba loba ngubani olakho uzaphiwa, abe lokwengezelelweyo; kodwa lowo ongelakho, uzakwemukwa.
Ngakho ngikhuluma labo ngemifanekiso, ngoba bebona kababoni, njalo besizwa kabezwa, futhi kabaqedisisi.
Kubo besekugcwaliseka isiprofetho sikaIsaya, esithi: Ukuzwa lizakuzwa, kodwa kalisoze liqedisise; lokubona lizabona, kodwa kalisoze libonisise;
ngoba inhliziyo yalababantu seyaba lukhuni.
Kodwa abusisiwe amehlo enu.
Ngoba ngiqinisile ngithi kini: Abaprofethi abanengi labalungileyo babethanda ukubona izinto elizibonayo, kodwa kaba zi bonanga; lokuzwa izinto elizizwayo kodwa kaba zi zwanga.
Ngakho lina zwanini umfanekiso womhlanyeli.
Kuthi wonke ozwayo ilizwi lombuso kodwa engaqedisisi.
Kodwa ohlanyelwe emhlabathini olamatshe, nguye olizwayo ilizwi, ahle alemukele ngentokozo;
kodwa kalampande phakathi kwakhe.
Lohlanyelwe emeveni, nguye olizwayo ilizwi, kodwa impisekelo yalumhlaba lenkohliso.
Kodwa ohlanyelwe emhlabathini omuhle, nguye olizwayo ilizwi aliqedisise; athele izithelo, aveze, omunye ikhulu, lomunye amatshumi ayisithupha, lomunye amatshumi amathathu.
Wabeka phambi kwabo omunye umfanekiso, esithi: Umbuso wamazulu ufananiswa lomuntu owahlanyela inhlanyelo enhle ensimini yakhe.
Kodwa abantu besalele, kwafika isitha sakhe sahlanyela umfaba phakathi kwamabele, sahamba.
Kodwa kwathi selumilile usungulo lwathela isithelo, lomfaba wasubonakala.
Zasezisondela inceku zomninimuzi zathi kuye: Nkosi, kawuhlanyelanga yini inhlanyelo enhle ensimini yakho? Pho iwuthethe ngaphi umfaba?
Wasesithi kuzo: Umuntu oyisitha ukwenzile lokhu. Inceku zasezisithi kuye: Uthanda ukuthi siyewubutha yini?
Kodwa wathi: Hatshi, hlezi, ekubutheni kwenu umfaba, lisiphune amabele kanye lawo.
