Yekelani kukhule kokubili ndawonye kuze kube yisivuno; langesikhathi sokuvuna ngizakuthi kwabavunayo: Buthani kuqala umfaba, liwubophe izinyanda ukuze liwutshise.
Wasebabekela omunye umfanekiso, esithi: Umbuso wamazulu unjengohlamvu lwemasitedi, aluthatha umuntu waluhlanyela ensimini yakhe;
lona kambe luncinyane kulazo zonke inhlamvu; kodwa nxa selukhulile.
Wabatshela omunye umfanekiso, wathi: Umbuso wamazulu unjengemvubelo.
Lezizinto zonke uJesu wazikhuluma emaxukwini ngemifanekiso, futhi ngaphandle komfanekiso kakhulumanga kubo;
ukuze kugcwaliseke okwakhulunywa ngumprofethi.
Kwathi uJesu esewayekele amaxuku ahamba wangena endlini.
Wasephendula wathi kibo: Ohlanyela inhlanyelo enhle yiNdodana yomuntu;
lensimu ngumhlaba;
lesitha esawuhlanyelayo ngudiyabhola; labavunayo bazingilosi.
Ngakho-ke njengalokhu umfaba uyabuthwa utshiswe emlilweni.
INdodana yomuntu izathuma ingilosi zayo, besezibutha zikhuphe embusweni wayo konke okukhubekisayo lalabo abenza okubi,
besezibaphosela.
Khona abalungileyo bezakhanya njengelanga.
Futhi umbuso wamazulu unjengempahla eligugu efihliweyo ensimini, okuthi umuntu eseyificile wa yi fihla.
Futhi umbuso wamazulu unjengomuntu ongumthengi odinga amapharele amahle;
esethole elinye ipharele eliligugu kakhulu.
Futhi umbuso wamazulu unjengembule elaphoswa olwandle, laselibutha zonke inhlobo;
lona, lithe seligcwele, balidonsela ekhunjini, bahlala phansi, babuthela ezilungileyo ezitsheni, kodwa ezimbi bazilahlela ngaphandle.
Kuzakuba njalo ekupheleni kwesikhathi,
besezibaphosela esithandweni somlilo; lapho kuzakuba khona ukukhala lokugedla amazinyo.
UJesu wathi kubo: Seliziqedisisile zonke lezizinto yini? Bathi kuye: Yebo, Nkosi.
Wasesithi kubo: Ngakho wonke umbhali okutsha lokudala.
Kwasekusithi uJesu eseqedile limifanekiso, wasuka lapho.
Wathi esefikile?
Lo kayisiyo yini oJakobe loJose loSimoni loJudasi?
Labodadewabo kabakho yini bonke kithi? Pho, zivela ngaphi zonke lezizinto kuye?
Basebekhubeka ngaye.
Njalo kenzanga lapho imisebenzi yamandla eminengi.
Ngalesosikhathi uHerodi,
wasesithi ezincekwini zakhe, kungakho-ke imisebenzi yamandla isebenza kuye.
Ngoba uHerodi wayembambile uJohane wambopha wamfaka entolongweni;
ngoba uJohane wayethe kuye: Kawuvunyelwa ukuba laye.
Njalo efuna ukumbulala.
Kodwa kwathi kugcinwa usuku lokuzalwa kukaHerodi, indodakazi kaHerodiyasi yagida phakathi kwabo, yamthokozisa uHerodi.
Ngakho wathembisa ngesifungo ukuyinika loba yini ezayicela.
Kodwa yona, isilayiwe ngunina, yathi ikhanda likaJohane uMbhabhathizi.
Inkosi yasisiba losizi, kodwa ngenxa yezifungo langalabo ababehlezi layo ekudleni yalaya ukuthi inikwe.
Yasithuma yamquma uJohane ikhanda entolongweni.
Ikhanda lakhe laselilethwa ngomganu, lanikwa intombi; yona yasi l isa kunina.
Kwasekusiza abafundi bakhe bathatha isidumbu, basingcwaba; basebesuka bambikela uJesu.
UJesu esezwile.
UJesu esephumile wabona ixuku elikhulu, waba lesihelo ngabo.
Kwathi sekuhlwile abafundi bakhe beza kuye, bathi: Lindawo iyinkangala, lesikhathi sesihambile.
Kodwa uJesu wathi kubo: Kakuswelekanga ukuthi bahambe; banikeni lina ukuthi badle.
Kodwa bathi kuye: Kasila lapha ngaphandle kwezinkwa ezinhlanu lenhlanzi ezimbili.
Wasesithi: Ziletheni lapha kimi.
Waselaya amaxuku ukuthi ahlale phansi etshanini, wathatha izinkwa ezinhlanu lenhlanzi ezimbili.
Basebesidla bonke, basutha; badobha imvuthu ezazisele, izitsha ezigcweleyo ezilitshumi lambili.
Lalabo abasebedlile babengamadoda angaba zinkulungwane ezinhlanu, ngaphandle kwabesifazana labantwana.
Njalo uJesu wahle wacindezela abafundi bakhe ukuthi bangene emkhunjini, njalo bamqalele ukuya ngaphetsheya, esayekela amaxuku ahambe.
Kwathi eseyekele amaxuku ahamba, wenyukela entabeni eyedwa ukuze akhuleke; kwathi sekuhlwile, wayeyedwa lapho.
Kodwa umkhumbi wawusuphakathi kolwandle, utshukunyiswa ngamagagasi; ngoba umoya wawuphambene labo.
Kwathi ngesikhathi somlindo wesine wobusuku uJesu weza kubo, ehamba phezu kolwandle.
Kodwa kwathi abafundi bembona ehamba phezu kolwandle bethuka, bathi: Lithonga. Basebekhala ngokwesaba.
Kodwa uJesu wahle wakhuluma labo, wathi: Manini isibindi; yimi; lingesabi.
UPetro wasemphendula wathi: Nkosi, uba kunguwe, ngilaya ukuthi ngize kuwe phezu kwamanzi.
Wasesithi: Woza. UPetro wasesehla emkhunjini wahamba phezu kwamanzi, ukuze aye kuJesu.
Kodwa ebona umoya olamandla wesaba; wathi eseqala ukutshona wakhala, wathi: Nkosi, ngisindisa!
Njalo uJesu wahle welula isandla, wambamba, wathi kuye: Wena olokukholwa okuncinyane, uthandabuzelani?
Sebengenile emkhunjini, umoya wathula.
Abasemkhunjini basebesiza bamkhonza bathi.
Kwathi sebechaphile bafika elizweni leGenesaretha.
Esemazi amadoda akuleyondawo athumela ilizwikuso sonke lesosigaba esizingelezeleyo, aletha kuye bonke abagulayo.
Basebemncenga, ukuthi bathinte nje umphetho wesembatho sakhe.
Kwasekufika kuJesu ababhali labaFarisi ababevela eJerusalema, bathi:
Kungani abafundi bakho besephula isiko? Ngoba kabagezi izandla zabo, nxa besidla isinkwa.
Kodwa waphendula wathi kubo: Lani-ke kungani lisephula umlayo kaNkulunkulu ngenxa yesiko lenu?
Ngoba uNkulunkulu walaya, wathi: Hlonipha uyihlo lonyoko;
kodwa lina lithi: Loba ngubani othi kuyise kumbe kunina: Ku ngumnikelo, loba yini evela kimi ingakusiza,
njalo engasoze amhloniphe uyise kumbe unina; ngalokho lenza umlayo kaNkulunkulu.
Bazenzisi, uIsaya waprofetha kuhle ngani, esithi:
Lababantu basondela kimi ngomlomo wabo, langendebe bangidumise; kodwa inhliziyo yabo ikhatshana lami.
Kodwa bangikhonza ngeze, befundisa izimfundiso eziy imilayo yabantu.
Esebizele kuye ixuku, wathi kilo: Lalelani futhi liqedisise.
Kakusikho okungena emlonyeni okungcolisa umuntu; kodwa okuphuma emlonyeni, yikho okungcolisa umuntu.
Abafundi bakhe basebesondela bathi kuye: Uyazi yini ukuthi abaFarisi bathe ukulizwa lelilizwi bakhubeka?
Kodwa waphendula wathi: Sonke isihlahlakazana, uBaba osezulwini angasihlanyelanga, sizasitshunwa.
Bayekeleni; bangabakhokheli beziphofu abayiziphofu.
UPetro wasephendula wathi kuye: Sichasisele lumfanekiso.
UJesu wasesithi: Kanti lani lisengabangelakuqedisisa?
Lilokhe lingaqedisisi yini, ukuthi konke okungena emlonyeni kuya esiswini, futhi kuyelahlelwa ngaphandle?
Kodwa izinto eziphuma emlonyeni zivela enhliziyweni.
Ngoba enhliziyweni kuvela imicabango emibi, ukubulala, ubufebe, ukuphinga, ukweba, ukufakaza amanga, ukuhlambaza;
yizo lezozinto ezimngcolisayo umuntu.
UJesu wasesuka lapho, waya kungxenye zeTire lezeSidoni.
Njalo khangela, owesifazana ong umKhanani ovela kuleyomikhawulo, wakhala kuye esithi: Nkosi.
Kodwa kamphendulanga nga lizwi. Basebesondela kuye abafundi bakhe bamncenga, bathi: Mxotshe, ngoba uyakhala ngemva kwethu.
Kodwa waphendula wathi: Kangithunywanga, ngaphandle kuzo izimvu ezilahlekileyo zendlu yakoIsrayeli.
Kodwa weza wamkhonza wathi: Nkosi, ngisize.
Kodwa waphendula wathi: Kakukuhle ukuthatha isinkwa sabantwana, loku si phosela izinjana.
Kodwa yena wathi: Yebo, Nkosi, kodwa lezinjana ziyadla okwemvuthuluka eziwa etafuleni labaninizo.
UJesu wasephendula wathi kuye: O mama, lukhulu ukholo lwakho! Kakube kuwe njengokuthanda kwakho. Indodakazi yakhe yasisila kusukela kulelohola.
UJesu wasesuka lapho weza eduzane kolwandle lweGalili; wenyukela entabeni wahlala phansi khona.
Kwasekusiza kuye amaxuku amakhulu, izingini, labanye abanengi, basebebaphosela enyaweni zikaJesu, wasebasilisa;
aze amangala amaxuku.

UJesu wasebizela kuye abafundi bakhe wathi: Ngilesihelo ngexuku, ngoba sebelami insuku ezintathu, bengelalutho lokudla; njalo kangithandi ukuthi ngibayekele bahambe bengadlanga, hlezi bayathe endleleni.
Abafundi bakhe basebesithi kuye: Siza zuzangaphi enkangala izinkwa ezinengi kangaka, ukuthi zisuthise ixuku elikhulu kangaka?
UJesu wasesithi kubo: Lilezinkwa ezingaki? Basebesithi: Eziyisikhombisa, lenhlanzana ezinlutshwana.
Waselaya amaxuku ukuthi ahlale phansi emhlabathini.
Wasethatha izinkwa eziyisikhombisa lenhlanzi, esebongile wa zi hlephula, wa zi nika abafundi bakhe, labafundi ixuku.
Basebesidla bonke basutha; basebedobha imvuthu ezazisele, izitsha eziyisikhombisa zigcwele.
Lalabo abadlayo babengamadoda azinkulungwane ezine, ngaphandle kwabesifazana labantwana.
Eseyekele amaxuku ahamba.
AbaFarisi labaSadusi.
Kodwa waphendula wathi kubo: Kusihlwa lithi: Umkhathi muhle; ngoba isibhakabhaka sibomvu;
lekuseni lithi: Umkhathi mubi lamuhla; ngoba isibhakabhaka sibomvu sinyukubele. Bazenzisi, liyakwazi ukwehlukanisa umumo wesibhakabhaka; kodwa izibonakaliso zezikhathi lingeke yini?
Isizukulwana esibi lesifebayo sidinga isibonakaliso; kodwa kasiyikunikwa isibonakaliso, ngaphandle kwesibonakaliso sikaJona umprofethi. Wasebatshiya, wahamba.
Sebefikile ngaphetsheya abafundi bakhe babekhohliwe ukuthatha izinkwa.
UJesu wasesithi kubo: Nanzelelani liqaphele.
Basebezindlisana besithi: Ngoba singathathanga izinkwa.
UJesu esekwazi wathi kubo: Lina abokholo oluncinyane?
Kalikaqedisisi yini, futhi kalikhumbuli izinkwa ezinhlanu zenkulungwane ezinhlanu?
Futhi lezinkwa eziyisikhombisa zenkulungwane ezine, lokuthi labutha izitsha ezingaki?
Kaliqedisisi njani, ukuthi bekungemayelana lesinkwa ebengi ku khuluma kini ukuthiliqaphele imvubelo yabaFarisi labaSadusi?
Basebeqedisisa ukuthi katshongo ukuthi baqaphele imvubelo yezinkwa.
Kwathi uJesu esefikile kungxenye zeKesariya yeFiliphu wababuza abafundi bakhe, esithi: Abantu bathi, mina, iNdodana yomuntu, ngingubani?
Basebesithi: Abanye bathi: NguJohane uMbhabhathizi.
Wathi kubo: Lina-ke lithi ngingubani?
USimoni Petro wasephendula wathi: Wena unguKristu, iNdodana.
UJesu wasephendula wathi kuye: Ubusisiwe.
Lami-ke ngiyakutshela, ukuthi wena unguPetro.
Futhi ngizakunika izihluthulelo zombuso wamazulu.
Wasebalayisisa abafundi ukuthi bangatsheli muntu ukuthi yena unguJesu onguKristu.
Kusukela kulesosikhathi uJesu waqala ukubatshengisa abafundi bakhe.
UPetro wasesiya laye eceleni waqala ukumkhuza esithi: Kakungabi kuwe, Nkosi; lokhu kakusoze kwenziwa kuwe.
Kodwa yena watshibilika wathi kuPetro: Suka ngemva kwami, Sathane.
UJesu wasesithi kubafundi bakhe: Uba umuntu ethanda ukuza ngemva kwami, kazidele, athathe isiphambano sakhe, angilandele.
Ngoba loba ngubani othanda ukusindisa impilo yakhe izamlahlekela; kodwa loba ngubani olahlekelwa yimpilo yakhe ngenxa yami uzayithola;
ngoba kuzamsizani umuntu nxa ezuza umhlaba wonke?
Ngoba iNdodana yomuntu izakuza ngenkazimulo kaYise.
Ngiqinisile ngithi kini: Bakhona abanye kwabemiyo lapha, abangasoze bezwe ukufa.
Lemva kwensuku eziyisithupha uJesu wathatha.
Waseguqulwa isimo phambi kwabo, njalo ubuso bakhe bakhanya njengelanga, lezembatho zakhe zaba mhlophe njengokukhanya.
Futhi khangela, kwasekubonakala kubo uMozisi loElija, bekhuluma laye.
UPetro wasephendula wathi kuJesu: Nkosi, kuhle ukuthi sibe lapha.
Kwathi esakhuluma, khangela, iyezi elikhanyayo labasibekela; futhi khangela, ilizwi laphuma eyezini.
Sebezwile abafundi.
Kodwa uJesu weza wabathinta wathi.
Sebephakamisile amehlo abo, kababonanga muntu, ngaphandle kukaJesu yedwa.
Sebesehla entabeni.
Abafundi bakhe basebembuza bathi: Pho batsholoni ababhali ukuthi uElija ufanele ukufika kuqala?
UJesu wasephendula wathi kubo: UElija uzafika kuqala isibili, uzabuyisela zonke izinto;
kodwa ngitsho kini ukuthi uElija sewafika, kodwa kabamazanga.
Abafundi basebeqedisisa ukuthi wakhuluma labo ngoJohane uMbhabhathizi.
Kwathi sebefikile exukwini, kweza kuye umuntu:
Nkosi, akuhawukele indodana yami, ngoba ilesithuthwane iyahlupheka kakhulu; ngoba iwele kanengi emlilweni, futhi kanengi emanzini.
Njalo ngiyilethe kubafundi bakho, kodwa bebengelakho ukuyisilisa.
UJesu wasephendula wathi: O sizukulwana esingelakholo lesonakeleyo? Mletheni kimi lapha.
UJesu waselikhuza, idimoni laseliphuma kuyo, umntwana wasesila kusukela kulelohola.
Abafundi basebesiza kuJesu bebodwa bathi: Kungani thina sehlulekile ukulikhupha?
UJesu wasesithi kubo: Kungenxa yokungakholwa kwenu.
Kodwa loluhlobo kaluphumi.
Besahlezi eGalili, uJesu wathi kubo: INdodana yomuntu izanikelwa ezandleni zabantu,
njalo bazayibulala, kodwa ngosuku lwesithathu izavuswa.
Kwathi sebefikile eKapenawume?
Wathi: Yebo. Esengenile endlini, uJesu wamandulela wathi? Kumadodana abo yini, kumbe kwabezizwe?
UPetro wathi kuye: Kwabezizwe. UJesu wathi kuye: Ngakho-ke amadodana akhululekile.
Kodwa-ke ukuze singabakhubekisi.
Ngalesosikhathi abafundi beza kuJesu, bathi: Kanti ngubani omkhulu embusweni wamazulu?
UJesu wasebizela kuye umntwana omncane wammisa phakathi kwabo,
wathi: Ngiqinisile ngithi kini: Ngaphandle kokuthi liphenduke libe njengabantwana abancane, kalisoze lingene embusweni wamazulu.
Ngakho lowo ozazithoba njengalumntwana omncane, nguye omkhulu embusweni wamazulu.
Njalo loba ngubani owemukela abe munye umntwana omncane onje ebizweni lami, wemukela mina.
Kodwa loba ngubani.
Maye kuwo umhlaba ngenxa yezikhubekiso!
Njalo.
Futhi uba ilihlo lakho.
Qaphelani lingadeleli omunye walaba abancinyane.
Ngoba iNdodana yomuntu ize ukusindisa.
Licabangani? Uba umuntu othile elezimvu ezilikhulu, besekulahleka enye yazo, kazitshiyi yini ezingamatshumi ayisificamunwemunye lasificamunwemunye, ahambe ezintabeni ukuyadinga elahlekileyo?
Futhi uba kungenzakala ukuthi ayithole, ngiqinisile ngithi kini: Uthokoza ngayo kakhulu kulalezo ezingamatshumi ayisificamunwemunye lasificamunwemunye ezingalahlekanga.
Ngokunjalo kayisiyo intando kaYihlo osemazulwini.
Kodwa nxa umfowenu ekona, hamba umsole phakathi kwakho laye lilodwa;
kodwa uba enga ku zwa, thatha abe munye kumbe babe babili kanye lawe futhi, ukuze lonke ilizwi liqiniswe ngomlomo wabafakazi ababili kumbe abathathu;
njalo nxa esala ukubezwa bona, tshela ibandla; uba esala ukuzwa lalo ibandla.
Ngiqinisile ngithi kini: Konke elizakubopha emhlabeni, kuzakuba kubotshiwe ezulwini; njalo konke elizakukhulula emhlabeni, kuzakuba kukhululiwe ezulwini.
Njalo ngithi kini: Uba ababili benu bevumelana emhlabeni loba ngaluphi ulutho abalucelayo.
Ngoba lapho ababili kumbe abathathu ababuthene khona ebizweni lami, ngikhona lapho phakathi kwabo.
UPetro wasemsondelela wathi: Nkosi, umfowethu uzangona kangaki, njalo ngimthethelela?
UJesu wathi kuye: Kangitsho kuwe ukuthikuze kube kasikhombisa, kodwa kuze kube ngamatshumi ayisikhombisa aphindwe kasikhombisa.
Ngakho umbuso wamazulu ufananiswa lomuntu oy inkosi, owayethanda ukulandiselana lenceku zakhe.
Kwathi eseqalile ukulandisa, kwalethwa kuye enye elomlandu kuyo wamathalenta azinkulungwane ezilitshumi.
Kodwa njengoba yayingelalutho lokuhlawula, inkosi yayo yalaya ukuthi ithengiswe.
Ngakho inceku yawa phansi imkhothamela, yathi: Nkosi, ngibekezelela, futhi ngizakuhlawula konke.
Inkosi yaleyonceku yasisiba lesihelo yayikhulula, yayixolela umlandu.
Kodwa yaphuma leyonceku yathola omunye oyinceku kanye layo, olomlandu kuyo wabodenariyo abalikhulu, yambamba ya m khama, yathi: Ngihlawula okufaneleyo.
Ngakho oyinceku kanye layo wawa phansi ezinyaweni zayo wayincenga, wathi: Ungibekezelele, futhi ngizakuhlawula konke.
Kodwa yona kayivumanga, kodwa yasuka yayiphosela entolongweni, ize iwuhlawule umlandu.
Kwathi abayizinceku kanye layo bebona izinto ezazenzakele badabuka kakhulu; beza babikela inkosi yabo konke okwakwenzekile.
Inkosi yayo yasiyibizela kiyo yathi kiyo: Wena nceku embi, ngakuxolela wonke lowomlandu, ngoba wangincenga;
ngabe lawe kawumhawukelanga yini omunye oyinceku kanye lawe, njengoba lami ngakuhawukela?
Inkosi yayo yasithukuthela yayinikela kubahlukuluzi, ize ihlawule konke okufaneleyo kuyo.
Uzakwenza njalo kini laye uBaba osezulwini, uba lingathetheleli lowo lalowo umfowenu iziphambeko zabo ngenhliziyo zenu.
Kwasekusithi uJesu eseqedile lawomazwi.
Amaxuku amakhulu asemlandela, wasewasilisa lapho.
Basebesiza kuye abaFarisi bemlinga, bathi kuye: Kuvunyelwe yini endodeni ukuthi yale umkayo ngaso sonke isizatho?
Wasephendula wathi kubo: Kalifundanga yini ukuthi owa ba dabula kusukela ekuqaleni wabenza owesilisa lowesifazana?
Wasesithi: Ngenxa yalokhu indoda izatshiya uyise lonina, inamathele kumkayo; labo ababili bazakuba nyamanye.
Ngakho kabasebabili, kodwa sebe nyamanye. Ngakho lokho uNkulunkulu akuhlanganisileyo kakungabi lamuntu okwehlukanisayo.
Bathi kuye: Pho uMozisi walayelani ukunika incwadi yesehlukaniso, lokumala?
Wathi kubo: Ngenxa yobulukhuni benhliziyo zenu uMozisi walivumela ukwala omkenu; kodwa kusukela ekuqaleni kwakungenjalo.
Kodwa ngithi kini: Loba ngubani owala umkakhe, ngaphandle kokufeba, abesethatha omunye, uyafeba; futhi othatha owaliweyo uyafeba.
Abafundi bathi kuye: Uba udaba lomuntu lomfazi lunjalo, akusizi ukuthatha.
Kodwa wathi kubo: Kakusibo bonke.
Ngoba kukhona abathenwa, abazalwa benjalo kusukela esiswini sikanina; njalo kukhona abathenwa, abathenwa ngabantu.
Khona kwalethwa kuye abantwana abancane, ukuze abeke izandla zakhephezu kwabo, akhuleke; kodwa abafundi babakhuza.
Kodwa uJesu wathi: Vumelani abantwana abancane, lingabenqabeli ukuza kimi; ngoba umbuso wamazulu ungowabanje.
Wasebeka izandla phezu kwabo, wasuka lapho.
Njalo khangela, kwasondela omunye wathi kuye: Mfundisi olungileyo, ngizakwenzani okulungileyo, ukuze ngibe lempilo elaphakade?
Wasesithi kuye: Ungibizelani ngokuthi olungileyo? Kakho olungileyo, ngaphandle koyedwa, uNkulunkulu.
Wathi kuye: Yiyiphi? UJesu wasesithi: Ungabulali; ungafebi; ungebi; ungafakazi amanga;
hlonipha uyihlo lonyoko.
Ijaha lathi kuye: Konke lokhu ngikugcinile kusukela ebutsheni bami; ngisaswelani?
UJesu wathi kulo: Uba uthanda ukuphelela; njalo uze lapha, ungilandele.
Kodwa selizwile lelilizwi ijaha lasuka lidanile; ngoba lalilempahla ezinengi.
UJesu wasesithi kubafundi bakhe: Ngiqinisile ngithi kini: Onothileyo uzangena ngokulukhuni embusweni wamazulu.
Njalo futhi ngithi kini: Kulula ukuthi.
Sebezwile abafundi bakhe bamangala kakhulu, bathi: Pho kungasindiswa bani?
Kodwa uJesu wa ba khangela wathi kibo: Kubantu kakulakwenzeka.
Khona uPetro waphendula wathi kuye: Khangela, thina sitshiye konke sakulandela; pho sizazuzani?
UJesu wasesithi kubo: Ngiqinisile ngithi kini: Lina elingilandeleyo, ekuvuselelweni lapho iNdodana yomuntu isihlezi esihlalweni sobukhosi senkazimulo yayo.

Laye wonke otshiye izindlu, kumbe abafowabo, kumbe odadewabo, kumbe uyise, kumbe unina, kumbe umkakhe, kumbe abantwana, kumbe amasimu, ngenxa yebizo lami, uzakwemukela ngekhulu, adle ilifa lempilo elaphakade.
Kodwa abanengi abokuqala bazakuba ngabokucina.
Ngoba umbuso wamazulu ufanana lomuntu ongumninindlu;
esevumelene lezisebenzi ngodenariyo ngosuku, wazithuma esivinini sakhe.
Wasephuma sekungaba lihola lesithathu, wabona abanye bemi emdangeni bengenzi lutho;
lakulabo wathi: Yanini lani esivinini; njalo loba yini efaneleyo ngizalinika yona. Bahamba-ke.
Wabuya waphuma sekungaba lihola lesithupha langelesificamunwemunye, wenza njalo.
Kwathi sekungaba lihola letshumi lanye waphuma, wathola abanye bemi bengenzi lutho, wathi kubo: Limeleni lapha usuku lonke lingenzi lutho?
Bathi kuye: Ngoba akulamuntu osiqatshileyo. Wathi kubo: Yanini lani esivinini, njalo lizakwemukela loba kuyini okufaneleyo.
Kwathi sekuntambama umninisivini wathi enduneni yakhe.
Kuthe befika aba qatshwangehola letshumi lanye ngulowo lalowo wemukela udenariyo.
Njalo sebezile abokuqala bacabanga ukuthi bazakwemukela okungaphezulu; kodwa labo bemukela udenariyo ngamunye.
Kwathi be ye mukela bamsola umninindlu,
besithi: Labo abokucina basebenze ihola elilodwa, kodwa ubalinganise lathi.
Kodwa ephendula wathi komunye wabo: Mngane, angikoni; kanti kawuvumelananga lami ngodenariyo?
Thatha okwakho uhambe; ngiyathanda ukumnika lowokucina njengawe.
Kumbe angivunyelwa yini ukwenza engikuthandayo ngezinto zami?
Kunjalo-ke abokucina bazakuba ngabokuqala, labokuqala ngabokucina.
Kwathi uJesu:
Khangelani, senyukela eJerusalema,
bayinikele.
Kwasekusiza kuye unina.
Wasesithi kuye: Ufunani? Wathi kuye: Tshono ukuthi la amadodana ami amabili ahlale, lenye ngakwesokhohlo, embusweni wakho.
Kodwa uJesu waphendula wathi: Kalikwazi elikucelayo. Linganatha yini inkezo engizayinatha mina? Bathi kuye: Singa kwenza.
Wasesithi kubo: Ngeqiniso lizayinatha inkezo yami, libhabhathizwe ngobhabhathizo mina engizabhabhathizwa ngalo.
Kwathi sebezwile abalitshumi, bathukuthela ngezelamani ezimbili.
Kodwa uJesu wababizela kuye wathi: Liyazi ukuthi ababusi bezizwe.
Kodwa akuyikuba njalo phakathi kwenu; kodwa loba ngubani othanda ukuba ngomkhulu phakathi kwenu;
njalo loba ngubani othanda ukuba ngowokuqala phakathi kwenu kabe yisisebenzi senu;
njengalokhu iNdodana yomuntu kayizanga ukukhonzwa, kodwa ukukhonza.
Kwathi.
Njalo khangela, iziphofu ezimbili zihlezi endleleni, sezizwile ukuthi uJesu uyadlula, zamemeza, zathi: Sihawukele, Nkosi, Ndodana kaDavida!
Ixuku laselizikhuza ukuthi zithule, kodwa zamemeza kakhulu, zisithi: Sihawukele, Nkosi, Ndodana kaDavida!
UJesu wasesima wazibiza, wathi: Lifuna ukuthi ngilenzeleni?
Zathi kuye: Nkosi, ukuthi amehlo ethu avuleke.
UJesu esesiba lesihelo wathinta amehlo azo; njalo amehlo azo ahle abuya abona, zasezimlandela.
Kwathi-ke sebesondele eJerusalema, khona uJesu wathuma abafundi ababili,
esithi kubo: Hambani liye emzaneni okhangelene lani, lizahle libone ubabhemi ekhulekiwe, lethole lilaye; li ba khulule, li ba lethe kimi.
Futhi uba umuntu ekhuluma ulutho kini, lizakuthi: INkosi iyabaswela; njalo uzahle abathumele.
Njalo konke lokhu kwenzeka, ukuze kugcwaliseke okwakhulunywa ngumprofethi, ukuthi:
Tshelani indodakazi yeSiyoni ukuthi.
Abafundi bahamba-ke, benza njengalokhu uJesu wayebalayile,
baletha ubabhemi lethole, babeka izembatho zabo phezu kwabo, ba m hlalisa phezu kwazo.
Lenengi lexuku lendlala ezalo izembatho endleleni.
Lamaxuku ayehamba phambili lababelandela bamemeza, besithi: Hosana kuyo iNdodana kaDavida!
Esengenile eJerusalema?
Amaxuku asesithi: Lo nguJesu umprofethi.
UJesu wasengena ethempelini likaNkulunkulu, wabaxotsha bonke ababethengisa lababethenga ethempelini.
Wasesithi kubo: Kulotshiwe ukuthi: Indlu yami izabizwa ngokuthi yindlu yomkhuleko.
Kwasekufika kuye iziphofu leziqhuli ethempelini; wasezisilisa.
Kodwa abapristi abakhulu lababhali sebebonile izimangaliso azenzayo, labantwana bememeza ethempelini, besithi: Hosana eNdodaneni kaDavida! bathukuthela,
basebesithi kuye: Uyakuzwa lokhu yini abakutshoyo laba? UJesu wasesithi kubo: Yebo; alikaze lifunde yini ukuthi: Emlonyeni?
Wasebatshiya waphuma phandle komuzi esiya eBethani, walala khona.
Kwathi ebuyela emzini ekuseni, walamba;
kwathi ebona umkhiwa othile endleleni, wasondela kuwo, kodwa katholanga lutho kuwo ngaphandle kwamahlamvu wodwa; wathi kuwo: Kakungabe kusavela isithelo kuwe lanini. Njalo umkhiwa wahle wabuna.
Kwathi bebona lokhuabafundi bakhe bamangala, besithi: Umkhiwa uhle wabuna njani?
UJesu wasephendula wathi kubo: Ngiqinisile ngithi kini: Uba lilokholo.
Njalo konke loba kuyini elikucelayo emkhulekweni, likholwa, lizakwemukela.
Kwathi esengenile ethempelini, abapristi abakhulu labadala babantu basondela kuye esafundisa?
UJesu wasephendula wathi kubo: Lami ngizalibuza umbuzo ube munye; uba lingitshela lokhu, lami ngizalitshela ukuthi ngenza lezizinto ngaliphi igunya:
Ubhabhathizo lukaJohane lwavela ngaphi? Ezulwini kumbe ebantwini? Basebezindlisana, besithi: Uba sisithi: Ezulwini, uzakuthi kithi: Pho kalikholwanga kuye ngani?
Kodwa uba sisithi: Ebantwini, siyesaba ixuku.
Basebemphendula uJesu bathi: Kasazi. Wasesithi kubo: Lami kangilitsheli ukuthi ngenza lezizinto ngaliphi igunya.
Kanti licabangani.
Kodwa yaphendula yathi: Angifuni. Kodwa emva kwalokho yaphenduka, yahamba.
Wasesiya kweyesibili watsho ngokunjalo. Yona-ke yaphendula yathi: Ngiya hamba, nkosi. Kodwa kayiyanga.
Yiyiphi kulawo amabili eyenza intando kayise? Bathi kuye: Eyokuqala. UJesu wathi kubo: Ngiqinisile ngithi kini: Abathelisi.
Ngoba uJohane wafika kini ngendlela yokulunga, kalikholwanga kuye.
Zwanini omunye umfanekiso. Kwakukhona umuntu othile ongumninimuzi.
Kwathi sekusondele isikhathi sezithelo, wathuma inceku zakhe kubalimi, ukuze zemukele izithelo zakhe.
Abalimi basebezibamba inceku zakhe, enye bayitshaya.
Wabuya wathuma ezinye inceku ezinengi kulezokuqala; basebesenza njalo kulezo.
Ekucineni wasethuma indodana yakhe kubo, esithi: Bazayihlonipha indodana yami.
Kodwa abalimi sebeyibonile indodana bakhulumisana besithi: Le yindlalifa.
Basebeyibamba.
Ngakho mhla kufika umninisivini, uzabenzani abalimi labo?
Bathi kuye: Uzababhubhisa kakubi labo ababi.
UJesu wathi kubo: Alikaze lifunde yini emibhalweni ukuthi: Ilitshe abakhi abalalayo, yilo eseliyinhloko yengonsi; lokhu yikwenza kweNkosi; njalo kuyamangalisa emehlweni ethu?
Ngakho ngithi kini: Lizakwemukwa umbuso kaNkulunkulu, unikwe isizwe esithela izithelo zawo.
Lalowo owela phezu kwalelilitshe uzaphahlazwa.
Kwathi abapristi abakhulu labaFarisi sebezwile imifanekiso yakhe bazi ukuthi ubekhuluma ngabo.
Kwathi sebedinga ukumbamba.
UJesu wasephendula wabuya wakhuluma labo ngemifanekiso, wathi:
Umbuso wamazulu ufananiswa lomuntu oy inkosi;
wasethuma inceku zakhe ukuthi zibize abanxusiweyo emtshadweni, kodwa kabavumanga ukubuya.
Wabuya wathuma ezinye inceku, izinto zonke sezilungile; wozani emtshadweni.
Kodwa kabananzanga, bazihambela, omunye ensimini yakhe, omunye ekuthengiselaneni kwakhe;
abaseleyo basebezibamba inceku zakhe ba zi phatha kubi ba zi bulala.
Kodwa kwathi inkosi ikuzwa lokhoyathukuthela, yathuma amabutho ayo yabhubhisa labobabulali, yatshisa umuzi wabo.
Yasisithi encekwini zayo: Umtshado usulungile, kodwa abanxusiweyo bebengafanelanga.
Ngakho yanini emahlanganweni ezindlela, njalo bonke elingabathola, libabizele emtshadweni.
Lezonceku zaseziphuma zaya ezindleleni zabutha bonke ezabatholayo, ababi kanye labalungileyo; indlu yomtshado yasigcwala ngabahleziyo.
Kwathi inkosi ingena ukukhangela ababehlezi ekudleni yabona khona umuntu owayengembathanga;
yasisithi kuye: Mngane, ungene njani lapha ungelasembatho somtshado.
Inkosi yasisithi ezincekwini.
Ngoba banengi ababiziweyo, kodwa balutshwana abakhethiweyo.
Khona-ke abaFarisi basuka, bacebisana ngokuthi bangamthiya njani ekukhulumeni.
Basebethuma kuye abafundi babo kanye labakaHerodi.
Ngakho sitshele, wena ucabangani? Kuvunyelwe yini ukuthela?
Kodwa uJesu ebazi ububi babo wathi?
Ngitshengisani imali yokuthela. Basebemlethela udenariyo.
Wasesithi kubo: Ngokabani lumfanekiso lalumbhalo?
Bathi: NgokaKesari. Wasesithi kubo: Ngakho mnikeni uKesari izinto zikaKesari; loNkulunkulu izinto zikaNkulunkulu.
Kwathi sebezwile bamangala; bamtshiya bahamba.
Ngalolosuku kweza kuye abaSadusi, basebembuza,
besithi: Mfundisi, uMozisi wathi: Uba umuntu esifa engelabantwana, umfowabo uzamthatha umkakhe, amvusele umfowabo inzalo.
Kwakukhona phakathi kwethu izelamani eziyisikhombisa; owokuqala wasethatha umfazi wafa; futhi engelanzalo, watshiya umkakhe kumfowabo.
Kwaba njalo lowesibili, lowesithathu, kwaze kwaba kowesikhombisa.
Kwathi emva kwabo bonke kwafa lomfazi.
Ngakho ekuvukeni kwabafileyo, uzakuba ngumkabani kwabayisikhombisa? Ngoba bonke babelaye.
Kodwa uJesu waphendula wathi kubo: Liduhile, lingayazi imibhalo;
ngoba ekuvukeni kwabafileyo kabathathani, kabendiswa, kodwa banjengengilosi zikaNkulunkulu ezulwini.
Kodwa mayelana lokuvuka okwabafileyo, kalifundanga yini okwakhulunywa kini nguNkulunkulu, esithi:
Mina nginguNkulunkulu kaAbrahama, loNkulunkulu kaIsaka, loNkulunkulu kaJakobe? UNkulunkulu kayisuye uNkulunkulu wabafileyo, kodwa owabaphilayo.
Kwathi amaxuku ekuzwa amangala kakhulu ngokufundisa kwakhe.
Kwathi abaFarisi, sebezwile ukuthi uJesu ubaqume umlomo, babuthana ndawonye.
Lomunye wabo, isazumthetho, wa m buza:
Mfundisi, yiwuphi umlayo omkhulu emthethweni?
UJesu wasesithi kuye: Wothanda iNkosi uNkulunkulu wakho, ngenhliziyo yakho yonke, langomphefumulo wakho wonke, langengqondo yakho yonke;
yiwo lowo umlayo owokuqala lomkhulu.
Lowesibili ufanana lawo uthi: Wothanda umakhelwane wakho njengalokhu uzi thanda wena.
Kuleyomilayo emibili kumisiwe umthetho wonke labaprofethi.
Kwathi sebebuthene abaFarisi, uJesu wababuza,
esithi: Licabangani ngoKristu? Uyindodana kabani.
Wathi kubo: Pho uDavida wambiza njani ekuMoya ngokuthiyiNkosi, esithi:
INkosi yathi eNkosini yami: Hlala ngakwesokunene sami, ngize ngenze izitha zakho zibe yisenabelo senyawo zakho?
Ngakho uba uDavida embiza ngokuthi yiNkosi, uyiNdodana yakhe njani?
Njalo kwakungekho owayengamphendula ilizwi.
Khona uJesu wakhuluma emaxukwini lakubafundi bakhe,
esithi: Ababhali labaFarisi bahlezi esihlalweni sikaMozisi;
ngakho konke lokhu abalitshela khona ukuthi likugcine, ku gcineni li kw enze; kodwa lingenzi njengokwemisebenzi yabo.
Ngoba bayabopha imithwalo enzima njalo elukhuni ukuthwalwa, ba yi beke emahlombe abantu, kodwa kabafuni ukuyisusa ngomunwe wabo.
Njalo imisebenzi yabo yonke bayenza ukuze babonwe ngabantu;
bathanda izihlalo zabahloniphekayo ekudleni kwantambama,
lokubingelelwa emidangeni.
Kodwa lina kalingabizwa ngokuthiRabi; njalo lina lonke lingabazalwane.
Futhi lingabizi muntu emhlabeni ngokuthinguyihlo;
kalingabizwa ngokuthi ling abafundisi.
Kodwa omkhulu kini.
Lalowo oziphakamisayo, uzathotshiswa; lalowo ozithobayo, uzaphakanyiswa.
Kodwa maye kini, babhali labaFarisi, bazenzisi.
Maye kini, babhali labaFarisi, bazenzisi, ngoba lidla izindlu zabafelokazi, langokuzenzisa lenza imikhuleko emide; ngakho lizakwemukela ukulahlwa okukhulu.
Maye kini, babhali labaFarisi, bazenzisi, ngoba libhoda ulwandle lomhlaba ukuthi lenze abe munye ophendukela kumaJuda.
Maye kini, bakhokheli abayiziphofu.
Zithutha leziphofu?
Njalo: Loba ngubani ofunga ngelathi, akulutho; kodwa loba ngubani ofunga ngomnikelo ophezu kwalo, ulomlandu.
Zithutha leziphofu! Ngoba yikuphi okukhulu?
Ngakho ofunga ngelathi ufunga ngalo langakho konke okuphezu kwalo;
lofunga ngethempeli ufunga ngalo langaye ohlala kulo;
lofunga ngezulu ufunga ngesihlalo sobukhosi sikaNkulunkulu langaye ohlala phezu kwaso.
Maye kini, babhali labaFarisi, bazenzisi, ngoba lithela okwetshumi kwetshwayi leganga ledile lekhumini.
Bakhokheli abayiziphofu.
Maye kini, babhali labaFarisi, bazenzisi, ngoba lihlambulula ingaphandle.
MFarisi oyisiphofu! Hlambulula kuqala ingaphakathi yenkezo leyomganu, ukuze kuhlambuluke lengaphandle yakho.
Maye kini, babhali labaFarisi, bazenzisi.
Kunjalo lani ngaphandle libonakala ebantwini lilungile, kanti ngaphakathi ligcwele ukuzenzisa lobubi.
Maye kini, babhali labaFarisi, bazenzisi, ngoba lakha amangcwaba abaprofethi,
lithi: Uba besikhona ensukwini zabobaba bethu, besingayikuhlanganyela labo egazini labaprofethi.
Kunjalo liyazifakazela lina ukuthi lingamadodana alabo ababulala abaprofethi;
lina-ke gcwalisani!
Zinyoka, nzalo yamabululu?
Ngakho, khangelani, mina ngithuma kini abaprofethi labahlakaniphileyo;
ukuze kwehlele phezu kwenu igazi lonke elilungileyo elachithwa emhlabeni.
Ngiqinisile ngithi kini: Zonke lezizinto zizakwehlela phezu kwalesisizukulwana.
Jerusalema, Jerusalema.
Khangelani, indlu yenu itshiyiwe kini ilunxiwa.
Ngoba ngithi kini: Kalisoze langibona kusukela khathesi, lize lithi: Ubusisiwe ozayo ebizweni leNkosi.
UJesu wasephuma; basebesondela abafundi bakhe ukumtshengisa izakhiwo zethempeli.
UJesu wasesithi kubo: Kaliziboni yini zonke lezizinto? Ngiqinisile ngithi kini: Akusoze kutshiywe lapha ilitshe elilodwa phezu kwelitshe, elingasoze lidilizelwe phansi.
Kwathi esehlezi entabeni yeMihlwathi?
UJesu wasephendula wathi kubo: Qaphelani, kungabi khona oliduhisayo;
ngoba abanengi bazakuza ngebizo lami, besithi: Mina nginguKristu.
Njalo lizakuzwa ngezimpi lamahungahunga ezimpi; nanzelelani, lingethuki; ngoba konke lokhukufanele kwenzeke; kodwa ukuphela kakukabi khona.
Ngoba isizwe sizavukela isizwe;
kodwa zonke lezizinto ziyikuqala kwemihelo.
Lapho-ke bazalinikela.
Njalo ngalesosikhathi abanengi bazakhubeka, banikelane, bazondane.
Futhi kuzavuka abaprofethi bamanga abanengi.
Njalo ngenxa yokwanda kobubi, uthando lwabanengi luzaphola;
kodwa ophikelelayo kuze kube sekupheleni, nguye ozasindiswa.
Njalo lelivangeli lombuso.
Ngakho nxa libona amanyala encithakalo, akhulunywa nguDaniyeli umprofethi,
khona labo abaseJudiya kababalekele ezintabeni;
ophezu kophahla angehli ukuthatha ulutho endlini yakhe;
losemasimini angabuyeli emuva uku ya thatha izembatho zakhe.
Kodwa maye kwabakhulelweyo labamunyisayo ngalezonsuku!
Kodwa khulekani ukuthi ukubaleka kwenu kungabi sebusika, loba ngesabatha.
Ngoba ngalesosikhathi kuzakuba khona ukuhlupheka okukhulu.
Uba-ke lezonsuku bezingafinyezwanga, bekungesindiswe nyama.
Ngalesosikhathi nxa umuntu esithi kini: Khangelani, nangu uKristu, kumbe nanguya, lingakholwa.
Ngoba kuzavuka okristu bamanga labaprofethi bamanga.
Khangelani, sengilitshelile ngaphambili.
Ngakho uba bengathi kini.
Ngoba njengalokhu umbane ubaneka empumalanga ukhanye lentshonalanga, kuzakuba njalo lokufika kweNdodana yomuntu.
Ngoba loba ngaphi lapho okukhona isidumbu.
Njalo masinyane emva kokuhlupheka kwalezonsuku.
Khona-ke sizabonakala.
Njalo izathuma izingilosi zayo.
Kodwa fundani umfanekiso emkhiweni; nxa khathesi ugatsha lwawo selusiba buthakathaka, njalo luhlume amahlamvu, liyazi ukuthi ihlobo seliseduze;
ngokunjalo lani, nxa libona lezizinto zonke, yazini ukuthi kuseduze kuseminyango.
Ngiqinisile ngithi kini: Lesisizukulwana asisoze sidlule, kuze kwenzeke zonke lezizinto.
Kuzadlula izulu lomhlaba.
Kodwa lolosuku lehola.
Kodwa njengensuku zikaNowa, kuzakuba njalo ukufika kweNdodana yomuntu.
Ngoba njengakulezonsuku ezaziphambili kukazamcolo,
njalo babengazi, kwaze kwafika uzamcolo wasebasusa bonke, kuzakuba njalo lokufika kweNdodana yomuntu.
Ngalesosikhathi kuzakuba khona ababili ensimini; omunye athathwe, lomunye atshiywe;
kuzakuthi abesifazanaababili bechola elitsheni; omunye athathwe, lomunye atshiywe.
Ngakho lindani.
Kodwa yazini lokhu.
Ngakho lani hlalani lilungile.
Pho ngubani?
Ibusisiwe leyonceku, okuzakuthi inkosi yayo nxa ifika izayifica isenza njalo.
Ngiqinisile ngithi kini: Izayibeka phezu kwakho konke elakho.
Kodwa nxa leyonceku embi isithi enhliziyweni yayo: Inkosi yami iphuzile ukubuya,
njalo ibisiqala ukutshaya abayizinceku kanye layo, lokudla lokunatha lezidakwa,
inkosi yaleyonceku izafika ngosuku enga yi lindele ngalo, langehola engalaziyo,
izayiquma phakathi, izanika isabelo sayo labazenzisi.
Ngalesosikhathi umbuso wamazulu uzafananiswa lentombi ezilitshumi.
Njalo ezinhlanu zazo.
Eziyizithutha zathatha izibane zazo, kazithathanga amafutha kanye lazo;
kodwa ezihlakaniphileyo zathatha amafutha ezitsheni kanye lezibane zazo.
Kwathi umyeni esephuzile.
Kodwa phakathi kobusuku kwamenyezwa: Khangelani, umyeni uyeza, phumani liyemhlangabeza!
Zasezivuka lezontombi zonke, zalungisa izibane zazo.
Eziyizithutha zasezisithi: Sipheni okwamafutha enu, ngoba izibane zethu ziyacitsha.
Kodwa ezihlakaniphileyo zaphendula.
Kwathi zisiyathenga, weza umyeni. Ezasezilungile zasezingena laye.
Kwathi emva kwalokho zafika lalezontombi ezinye, zathi: Nkosi, Nkosi, sivulele!
Kodwa yena waphendula wathi: Ngiqinisile ngithi kini: Angilazi lina.
Ngakho lindani.
Ngoba;
kwathi enye wayinika amathalenta amahlanu, lenye amabili, lenye lalinye, kwaba yileyo laleyo.
Leyo eyayemukele amathalenta amahlanu yasihamba yathengiselana ngawo, yenza amanye amathalenta amahlanu.
Ngokunjalo laleyo e la mabili, layo yazuza amanye amabili.
Kodwa leyo eyayemukele elilodwa yasuka yagebha emhlabathini yayifihla imali yenkosi yayo.
Kwathi emva kwesikhathi eside inkosi yalezozinceku yafika, yasilandiselana lazo.
Kwasekusiza eyayemukele amathalenta amahlanu yaletha amanye amathalenta amahlanu, yathi: Nkosi, wanginika amathalenta amahlanu; khangela, ngizuzile amanye amathalenta amahlanu phezu kwawo.
Inkosi yayo yasisithi kiyo: Kuhle, nceku elungileyo lethembekileyo, ubuthembekile ezintweni ezinlutshwana.
Kwasekusiza laleyo eyayemukele amathalenta amabili yathi: Nkosi, wanginika amathalenta amabili; khangela, ngizuzile amanye amathalenta amabili phezu kwawo.
Inkosi yayo yathi kiyo: Kuhle, nceku elungileyo lethembekileyo, ubuthembekile ezintweni ezinlutshwana, ngizakubeka phezu kwezinengi; ngena entokozweni yenkosi yakho.
Kodwa kweza laleyo eyayemukele ithalenta elilodwa yathi: Nkosi, bengikwazi wena;
ngasengisesaba, ngasuka ngalifihla ithalenta lakho emhlabathini; khangela, ulokwakho.
Kodwa inkosi yayo yaphendula yathi kiyo: Nceku embi lelivila, ubusazi ukuthi ngivuna lapho engingahlanyelanga khona, njalo ngibutha lapho engingahlakazanga khona;
ngakho ngabe ubekile imali yami ebhanga, njalo ekufikeni kwami ngabe ngemukele okwami lenzuzo.
Ngakho mthatheleni ithalenta, li li nike yena olamathalenta alitshumi.
Ngoba wonke olakho uzaphiwa, uzakwengezelelwa; kodwa ongelakho uzathathelwa lalokho alakho.
Laleyonceku engasizi lutho iphoseleni emnyameni ongaphandle.
Njalo nxa isiza iNdodana yomuntu ngobukhosi bayo,
kuzabuthelwa phambi kwayo izizwe zonke;
ibisibeka izimvu ngakwesokunene sayo, kodwa imbuzi ngakwesokhohlo.
Khona-ke iNkosi.
Ngoba ngangilambile, langinika ukudla; ngangomile, langinathisa;
ngangize, langigqokisa.
Khona abalungileyo bezayiphendula, besithi: Nkosi, sakubona nini ulambile, njalo sa ku nika ukudla, kumbe womile, njalo sa ku nathisa?
Njalo sakubona nini ungowemzini, futhi sa kw emukela, kumbe uze, futhi sa ku gqokisa?
Njalo sakubona nini ugula, loba usentolongweni, njalo seza kuwe?
Futhi iNkosi izaphendula ithi kubo.
Ngalesosikhathi izakuthi njalo kubo abangakwesokhohlo: Sukani kimi, lina eliqalekisiweyo.
Ngoba ngangilambile, kodwa kalinginikanga ukudla; ngangomile, kodwa kalinginathisanga;
ngangingowemzini, kodwa kalingemukelanga; ngangi ze, kodwa kalingigqokisanga; ngangi gula, ngangi sentolongweni, kodwa kalizanga ukungibona.
Khona lalaba bezamphendula, besithi: Nkosi, sakubona nini ulambile, loba womile, loba ungowemzini, loba uze, loba ugula, loba usentolongweni, kodwa kasakusiza?
Isizabaphendula, ithi: Ngiqinisile ngithi kini: Njengoba linga kw enzanga komunye walaba abancinyane, kali kw enzanga lakimi.
Lalaba bazakuya ekujezisweni okulaphakade.
Kwasekusithi uJesu eseqedile wonke lamazwi, wathi kubafundi bakhe:
Liyazi ukuthi emva kwensuku ezimbili kuzakuba liphasika, leNdodana yomuntu izanikelwa ukuze ibethelwe.
Kwasekubuthana abapristi abakhulu lababhali labadala babantu,
basebecebisana ukuthi bambambe uJesu ngobuqili ba m bulale.
Kodwa bathi: Kungabi ngomkhosi, hlezi kube khona isiphithiphithi ebantwini.
Kwathi uJesu,
kwafika kuye owesifazana ephethe umfuma we-alibasta ulamagcobo aligugu elikhulu.
Kodwa abafundi bebona lokhubathukuthela, bathi: Ngokwani ukumotsha lokhu?
Ngoba la amagcobo angathengiswa ngokunengi, besekunikwa abayanga.
Kodwa uJesu ekwazi wathi kubo: Limhluphelani owesifazana? Ngoba wenzile umsebenzi omuhle kimi;
ngoba abayanga lihlala lilabo.
Ngoba ngokuthululela la amagcobo emzimbeni wami, u kw enzele umngcwabo wami.
Ngiqinisile ngithi kini: Loba ngaphi emhlabeni wonke lapho okuzatshunyayelwa khona lelivangeli, lalokho akwenzileyo kuzakhulunywa ngakho, kube yisikhumbuzo ngaye.
Omunye wabalitshumi lambili, wasesiya kubapristi abakhulu,
wathi: Lizanginikani, mina-ke ngizamnikela kini? Basebevumelana laye.
Njalo kusukela lapho wadinga ithuba elihle lokumnikela.
Kwathi, besithi kuye: Uthanda ukuthi sikulungisele ngaphi ukuthi udle iphasika?
Wasesithi: Hambani liye emzini kusibanibani.
Benza-ke abafundi njengoba uJesu ebalayile, basebelungisa iphasika.
Kwathi ifika intambama.
Bathi besidla wathi: Ngiqinisile ngithi kini: Omunye wenu uzanginikela.
Basebedabuka kakhulu baqala ukuthi kuye ngamunye wabo: Nkosi, yimi yini?
Wasephendula wathi: Ofaka isandla sakhekanye lami emganwini, nguye ozanginikela.
Sibili iNdodana yomuntu.
Wasephendula uJudasi owamnikelayo wathi: Rabi, yimi yini.
Kwathi besidla, uJesu wathatha isinkwa.
Wasethatha inkezo, wabonga, wabanika, esithi: Nathani lonke kuyo;
ngoba lokhu.
Kodwa ngithi kini: Kusukela khathesi kangiyikunatha okwalesisithelo sevini, kuze kufikelolosuku lapho ngizasinatha lani sisitsha.
Kwathi sebehlabele ingoma yokudumisa.
UJesu wasesithi kubo: Lina lonke lizakhubeka ngami ngalobubusuku.
Kodwa emva kokuvuswa kwami, ngizalandulela ukuya eGalili.
Kodwa uPetro waphendula wathi kuye: Lanxa bonke bezakhubeka ngawe, mina angisoze ngikhubeke.
UJesu wathi kuye: Ngiqinisile ngithi kuwe: Ngalobubusuku.
UPetro wathi kuye: Loba kudingeka ngife lawe, angisoze ngikuphike. Basebesitsho njalo bonke abafundi.
UJesu wasefika labo endaweni.
Wasethatha kanye laye uPetro lamadodana amabili kaZebediya.
Wasesithi kubo: Umphefumulo wami udabukile kakhulu kuze kube sekufeni.
Waseqhubeka ibangana, wawa ngobuso bakhe wakhuleka wathi.
Wasesiza kubafundi, wabafica belele?
Lindani likhuleke, ukuze lingangeni ekulingweni.
Wabuya wasuka ngokwesibili wakhuleka, wathi: Baba.
Wasebuya wabafica futhi belele, ngoba amehlo abo ayenzima.
Wasebatshiya wahamba futhi wakhuleka ngokwesithathu, esitsho wona lawomazwi.
Wasesiza kubafundi bakhe, wathi kubo: Qhubekani lilele liphumule; khangelani, isikhathi sesisondele, futhi iNdodana yomuntu iyanikelwa ezandleni zezoni.
Sukumani, sihambe; khangelani, onginikelayo useduze.
Kwathi esakhuluma, khangela, kwafika uJudasi, omunye wabalitshumi lambili.
Laye omnikelayo wayebanike isiboniso, esithi: Lowo engizamanga, nguye; limbambe.
Njalo wahle wasondela kuJesu wathi: Mpilo enhle, Rabi.
UJesu wasesithi kuye: Mngane, ulandeni? Basebesondela bamdumela uJesu ngezandla, bambamba.
Futhi khangela, omunye walabo ababeloJesu.
UJesu wasesithi kuye: Buyisela inkemba yakho endaweni yayo; ngoba bonke ababamba inkemba bazabhubha ngenkemba.
Kumbe ucabanga ukuthi ngingemcele uBaba yini khathesi, futhi anginike amabutho amakhulu ezingilosi?
Pho ingagcwaliseka njani imibhalo, ukuthi kumele ukuthi kube njalo?
Ngalelohola uJesu wathi emaxukwini: Liphume njengokuyamelana lomphangi.
Kodwa konke lokhu kwenzakele, ukuze kugcwaliseke imibhalo yabaprofethi.
Lababembambile uJesu ba m qhuba.
Kodwa uPetro wamlandela ekhatshana, kwaze kwaba segumeni lompristi omkhulu.
Njalo abapristi abakhulu labadala lomphakathi wonke badinga ubufakazi bamanga obumelana loJesu, ukuze bambulale,
kodwa kaba bu tholanga; lanxa kwavela abafakazi abanengi bamanga,
bathi: Lo wathi: Ngilakho ukudiliza ithempeli likaNkulunkulu.
Kwasekusukuma umpristi omkhulu wathi kuye: Kawuphenduli lutho yini? Bafakazani laba okumelana lawe?
Kodwa uJesu wathula.
UJesu wathi kuye: Utshilo wena.
Umpristi omkhulu wasedabula izembatho zakhe, wathi: Usehlambazile; sisadingelani abafakazi? Khangelani, khathesi seliyizwile inhlamba yakhe;
licabangani? Basebephendula besithi: Ulecala.
Basebemkhafulela amathe ebusweni,
bathi: Profetha kithi, Kristu, ngubani okutshayileyo?
UPetro wayesehlezi ngaphandle.
Kodwa waphika phambi kwabo bonke, wathi: Kangikwazi lokho okutshoyo.
Kwathi esephuma esiya esangweni.
Wasebuya ephika ngesifungo esithi: Kangimazi lumuntu.
Kwathi emva kwesikhatshana.
Waseqala ukuqalekisa lokufunga esithi: Kangimazi lumuntu. Njalo lahle lakhala iqhude.
UPetro wasekhumbula ilizwi likaJesu esithi kuye.
Kwathi sekusile, bonke abapristi abakhulu labadala babantu;
sebembophile ba m qhuba.
Kwathi uJudasi owamnikelayo esebonile ukuthi ulahliwe,
wathi: Ngonile nginikele igazi elingelacala. Kodwa bona bathi: Kulani lathi? Zibonele wena.
Wasephosela inhlamvu zesiliva ethempelini, wasuka; wayaziphanyeka.
Abapristi abakhulu basebethatha inhlamvu zesiliva bathi: Kakuvunyelwa ukuzifaka emnikelweni, ngoba ziyintengo yegazi.
Basebecebisana bathenga ngazo isiqinti sombumbi, sibe ngesokungcwaba abezizwe.
Ngakho lesosiqinti sathiwa yisiqinti segazi.
Kwasekugcwaliseka okwakhulunywa ngumprofethi uJeremiya, esithi: Basebethatha inhlamvu zesiliva ezingamatshumi amathathu, intengo yalowo owalinganiswayo, abantwana bakoIsrayeli abamlinganisayo;
basebebapha zona ngensimu yombumbi.
UJesu wasesima phambi kombusi; umbusi wasembuza, wathi: Wena uyiNkosi yamaJuda yini.
Kwathi nxa esemangalelwe ngabapristi abakhulu labadala, kaphendulanga lutho.
UPilatu wasesithi kuye: Kawuzwa yini izinto ezingaka abazifakaza ngawe?
Kodwa kamphendulanga lakwelilodwa ilizwi, waze wamangala kakhulu umbusi.
Futhi ngomkhosi umbusi wayejwayele ukukhululela ixuku.
Njalo ngalesosikhathi babelesibotshwa esidumileyo, esithiwa nguBarabasi.
Ngakho sebebuthene, uPilatu wathi kubo: Lithanda ukuthi ngilikhululele bani, uBarabasi, kumbe uJesu othiwa nguKristu?
Ngoba wayekwazi ukuthi bamnikele ngomona.
Kwathi esehlezi esihlalweni sokwahlulela.
Kodwa abapristi abakhulu labadala bancengana lamaxuku ukuthi acele uBarabasi, ambhubhise uJesu.
Wasephendula umbusi wathi kubo: Lithanda ukuthi ngilikhululele bani kulaba ababili? Basebesithi: UBarabasi.
UPilatu wathi kubo: Pho ngimenzeni uJesu othiwa nguKristu? Bonke bathi kuye: Kabethelwe.
Umbusi wasesithi: Ngoba wenze bubi bani? Kodwa bamemeza kakhulu, bathi: Kabethelwe!
Kwathi uPilatu esebonile ukuthi kakusizi lutho, kodwa kwasekuqala kulalokhu ukuba lesiphithiphithi.
Bonke abantu basebephendula bathi: Igazi lakhe kalibephezu kwethu laphezu kwabantwana bethu.
Wasebakhululela uBarabasi; kodwa esemtshaye ngesiswepu uJesu wa m nikela ukuthi abethelwe.
Abebutho bombusi basebemngenisa uJesu endlini yombusi;
bamhlubula, bamgqokisa isembatho esibomvu,
sebelukile umqhele wameva, bamethesa wonaekhanda, bamphathisalomhlanga esandleni sakhe sokunene; baguqa phambi kwakhe!
Bamkhafulela amathe, bathatha umhlanga, batshaya ikhanda lakhe.
Sebemklolodele.
Kwathi sebephuma.
Sebefikile endaweni ethiwa yiGolgotha,
bamnika iviniga.
Futhi sebembethele, babelana izembatho zakhe, benza inkatho yokuphosa.
Njalo sebehlala phansi bamlinda khona.
Babeka ngaphezu kwekhanda lakhe incwadiyecala lakhe ilotshiwe ukuthi.
Kwasekubethelwa abaphangi ababili.
Labadlulayo,
besithi: Wena odiliza ithempeli ulakhe ngensuku ezintathu, zisindise.
Langokunjalo labapristi abakhulu labo bekloloda kanye lababhali labadala bathi:
Wasindisa abanye, yena angezisindise. Uba eyiNkosi yakoIsrayeli, kehle khathesi esiphambanweni, futhi sizamkholwa.
Wathemba kuNkulunkulu; kamkhulule khathesi, uba emthanda.
Labaphangi.
Njalo kusukela ngehola lesithupha kwaba lobumnyama emhlabeni wonke kwaze kwaba lihola lesificamunwemunye;
sekungaba lihola lesificamunwemunye?
Njalo abanye kwababemi khona besizwa bathi: Lo ubiza uElija.
Njalo omunye wabo wahle wagijima, wathatha uzipho, wa lu gcwalisa ngeviniga.
Kodwa abanye bathi: Yekelani sibone ukuthi uElija uzakuza amsindise.
UJesu wasebuya ememeza ngelizwi elikhulu.
Futhi khangela, iveyili lethempeli ladatshulwa incezuezimbili laqala phezulu lisiya phansi;
lamangcwaba avuleka; lezidumbu ezinengi zabangcwele abasebelele zavuswa;
sebephumile emangcwabeni emva kokuvuka kwakhe bangena emzini ongcwele, babonakala kwabanengi.
Kwathi induna yekhulu lalabo ababelayo belinde uJesu.
Kwakukhona lapho abesifazana abanengi bebukele;
okwakukhona phakathi kwabo oMariya Magadalena.
Kwathi sekuhlwile;
yena waya kuPilatu, wacela isidumbu sikaJesu. UPilatu waselaya ukuthi isidumbu a sinikwe.
UJosefa wasethatha isidumbu wasigoqela ngelembu elicolekileyo elihlambulukileyo,
wasibeka engcwabeni lakhe elitsha.
Futhi kwakukhona lapho uMariya Magadalena.
Langosuku olulandelayo, olulandela olwamalungiselelo, abapristi abakhulu labaFarisi babuthana kuPilatu,
besithi: Nkosi, siyakhumbula ukuthi lowomkhohlisi esaphila wathi.

Ngakho laya ukuthi ingcwaba liqiniswe kuze kube lusuku lwesithathu; hlezi abafundi bakhe bafike ebusuku bamebe, besebesithi ebantwini: Uvukile kwabafileyo; kuthi inkohliso yokucina ibembi kuleyokuqala.
UPilatu wasesithi kubo: Lilabalindi; hambani, li li qinise njengokubona kwenu.
Bahamba-ke baliqinisa ingcwaba.
Kwathi ekupheleni kwesabatha.
Futhi khangela, kwaba khona ukuzamazama komhlaba okukhulu.
Lokubonakala kwayo kwakunjengombane.
Abalindi basebethuthumela ngokuyesaba, baba njengabafileyo.
Kodwa ingilosi yaphendula yathi kwabesifazana: Lingesabi lina; ngoba ngiyazi ukuthi lidinga uJesu obebethelwe;
kakho lapha; ngoba uvukile, njengokutsho kwakhe; wozani libone indawo lapho iNkosi ebilele khona.
Hambani masinyane litshele abafundi bakhe ukuthi uvukile kwabafileyo; lizambona khona; khangelani, sengilitshelile.
Basebephuma engcwabeni ngokuphangisa belokwesaba lentokozo enkulu.
Kwathi besiyatshela abafundi bakhe, futhi khangela, uJesu wabahlangabeza, wathi: Mpilo enhle.
UJesu wasesithi kubo: Lingesabi.
Kwathi sebehamba, khangela, abanye kubalindi baya emzini babikela abapristi abakhulu konke okwenzakeleyo.
Sebebuthene labadala, benza icebo, banika abebutho imali enengi,
besithi: Kalibokuthi: Abafundi bakhe beze ebusuku bameba silele thina.
Futhi uba lokhu kuzwakala kumbusi.
Basebethatha imali benza njengalokhu ababekufundisiwe. Lalelilizwi landa phakathi kwamaJuda.
Kwathi abafundi abalitshumi lanye baya eGalili, entabeni uJesu;
sebembonile bamkhonza.
UJesu wasesondela wakhuluma labo, esithi: Wonke amandla aphiwe mina ezulwini lemhlabeni;
ngakho hambani;
libafundise ukugcina konke engililaye khona; futhi khangelani, mina ngilani.
Ukuqala kwevangeli likaJesu Kristu, iNdodana kaNkulunkulu;
njengokulotshiweyo kubaprofethi.
Ilizwi lomemezayo enkangala, lithi: Lungisani indlela yeNkosi; qondisani izindledlana zayo.
Kweza uJohane ebhabhathiza enkangala, etshumayela ubhabhathizo lokuphenduka kukho ukuthethelelwa kwezono,
kwaphumela kuye ilizwe lonke leJudiya, labo abeJerusalema, basebebhabhathizwa bonke nguye emfuleni iJodani, bevuma izono zabo.
Futhi uJohane wayembethe uboya bekamela, elozwezwe lwesikhumba ekhalweni lwakhe, wayesidla intethe loluju lweganga.
Watshumayela, esithi: Olamandla kulami uyeza emva kwami, engingafanele ukukhothama ngithukulule umchilo wamanyathela akhe.
Mina isibili ngilibhabhathize ngamanzi; kodwa yena uzalibhabhathiza ngoMoya oNgcwele.
Kwasekusithi ngalezonsuku, wabhabhathizwa nguJohane eJodani.
Wenela ukukhuphuka emanzini, wabona amazulu eqhekezeka, loMoya kungathi lijuba esehlela phezu kwakhe;
kwasekusiza ilizwi livela emazulwini, lathi: Wena uyiNdodana yami ethandekayo, engithokoza ngayo.
Njalo uMoya.
Wayekhona-ke lapho enkangala insuku ezingamatshumi amane elingwa nguSathane, wayelezilo, ingilosi zasezimnceda.
Kwathi emva kokunikelwa kukaJohane,
wasesithi: Isikhathi sigcwalisekile.
Kwathi ehambahamba elwandle lweGalili wabona uSimoni loAndreya umfowabo, bephosela imbule olwandle; ngoba babengabagoli benhlanzi.
UJesu wasesithi kubo: Ngilandelani, ngizalenza libe ngabagoli babantu.
Njalo bahle batshiya amambule abo, bamlandela.
Eseqhubeke ibangana esuka lapho, wabona uJakobe okaZebediya, loJohane umfowabo, labo babesemkhunjini belungisa amambule abo.
Njalo wahle wababiza; basebetshiya uyise uZebediya emkhunjini leziqatshwa, basuka bamlandela.
Basebengena eKapenawume.
Basebebabaza ngemfundiso yakhe.
Futhi kwakukhona esinagogeni labo umuntu owayelomoya ongcolileyo, wasememeza,
wathi: Yekela, silani lawe, Jesu weNazaretha? Uze ukusibhubhisa yini.
UJesu wasemkhuza.
Futhi umoya ongcolileyo emhlukuluza ekhala ngelizwi elikhulu, waphuma kuye.
Basebemangala bonke, baze babuzana, bathi: Kuyini lokhu? Yimfundiso bani entsha le, ukuthi ngamandla uyalaya labomoya abangcolileyo, futhi bamlalele.
Njalo yahle yaphuma indumela yakhe esigabeni sonke seGalili esizingelezeleyo.
Njalo bahle baphuma.
Futhi uninazala kaSimoni wayelele eloqhuqho, njalo bahle bamtshela ngaye;
wasesondela, wabamba isandla sakhe wamvusa; futhi uqhuqho lwahle lwamyekela, wabasebenzela.
Kwathi sekuhlwile, ilanga selitshona, baletha kuye bonke abagulayo lababengenwe ngamadimoni;
njalo umuzi wonke wawubuthene emnyango.
Wasesilisa abanengi ababegula izifo ezitshiyeneyo, wakhupha amadimoni amanengi, ngoba ayemazi.
Njalo ekuseni kusesemnyama kakhulu wavuka waphuma.
USimoni lababelaye basebemdingisisa;
sebemtholile bathi kuye: Bonke bayakudinga.
Wasesithi kubo: Asiye emizini eseduze, ukuze ngitshumayele lakhona; ngoba ngiphumele lokhu.
Wasetshumayela emasinagogeni abo kulo lonke eleGalili, ekhupha amadimoni.
Kwasekufika kuye umlephero, emncenga, esithi kuye: Aluba uthanda, ungangihlambulula.
UJesu wasesiba lesihelo, welula isandla, wamthinta, wathi kuye: Ngiyathanda, hlambuluka;
esekhulumile bahle basuka ubulephero kuye, wahlanjululwa.
Wasemlayisisa, wahle wamyekela wahamba,
esithi kuye: Khangela ungatsheli muntu ulutho; kodwa hamba, uziveze kumpristi, unikele ngokuhlanjululwa kwakho lokho uMozisi akulayayo, kube yibufakazi kubo.
Kodwa yena esephumile waqala ukutshumayela kakhulu.
Njalo wabuya wangena eKapenawume.
Njalo kwahle kwabuthana abanengi, akwazabe kusaba lendawo ya bo, ngitsho langasemnyango; wasekhuluma ilizwi kubo.
Basebesiza kuye, beletha oyisigoga, ethwelwe ngabane.
Babengelakusondela kuye ngenxa yexuku, bavula.
Njalo uJesu ebona ukholo lwabo wathi koyisigoga: Mntwana, izono zakho uzithethelelwe.
Kodwa abanye bababhali ababehlezi lapho, banakana enhliziyweni zabo, bathi:
Ukhulumelani inhlamba enje lo? Ngubani ongathethelela izono ngaphandle koyedwa, uNkulunkulu?
Njalo khonokho ekwazi uJesu emoyeni wakhe ukuthi babenakana njalo phakathi kwabo, wathi kubo: Linakanelani izinto lezi enhliziyweni zenu?
Yikuphi okulula, ukuthi koyisigoga: Izono zakhouzithethelelwe, kumbe ukuthi: Sukuma, uthathe icansi lakho, uhambe?
Kodwa ukuze lazi ukuthi iNdodana yomuntu ilamandla okuthethelela izono emhlabeni (wathi koyisigoga):
Ngithi kuwe: Sukuma uthathe icansi lakho, uye endlini yakho.
Njalo wahle wasukuma, wathatha icansi, waphuma phambi kwabo bonke; baze bamangala bonke, bamdumisa uNkulunkulu, besithi: Kasizange sikubone okunje.
Wasebuya esiya elwandle, ixuku lonke laselisiza kuye, wasebafundisa.
Esedlula wabona uLevi okaAlfewu ehlezi endlini yokuthelisela, wasesithi kuye: Ngilandela. Wasesukuma wamlandela.
Kwasekusithi ehlezi endlini yakhe, labathelisi abanengi lezoni bahlala ekudleni loJesu labafundi bakhe; ngoba babebanengi, njalo bemlandela.
Kwathi ababhali labaFarisi, bembona esidla labathelisi lezoni, bathi kubafundi bakhe: Kungani esidla enatha labathelisi lezoni?
Kwathi uJesu esezwile wathi kubo: Abaphilileyo kabadingi melaphi, kodwa labo abagulayo. Kangizanga ukubiza abalungileyo, kodwa izoni zize ekuphendukeni.
Njalo abafundi bakaJohane lababaFarisi babezila ukudla; basebesiza bathi kuye: Kungani abafundi bakaJohane lababaFarisi bezila ukudla, kodwa abafundi bakho bengazili ukudla?
UJesu wasesithi kubo: Amadodana endlu yomthimba angazila yini ukudla, umyeni eselawo? Angezile, ingqe ngesikhathi umyeni eselawo;
kodwa zizafika insuku lapho umyeni azasuswa kuwo, njalo khona azazila ukudla ngalezonsuku.
Futhi kakho othungela isichibi selembu elingakafinyeli esembathweni esidala; uba-ke kungenjalo okubekelweyo kudabuke kiso, okutsha kwesidala, kuqhele ukudabuka.

Futhi kakho othela iwayini elitsha emigodleni emidala; uba-ke kungenjalo iwayini elitsha lidabula imigodla, lichitheke iwayini lemigodla yonakale; kodwa iwayini elitsha limele lifakwe emigodleni emitsha.
Kwasekusithi edabula emasimini amabele ngesabatha.
AbaFarisi basebesithi kuye: Khangela, kungani besenza lokho okungavunyelwayo ngesabatha?
Yena wasesithi kubo: Kalizange libale yini uDavida akwenzayo, mhla eswele, elambile, yena lababelaye?
Ukuthi wayangena njani endlini kaNkulunkulu esikhathini uAbhiyatha engumpristi omkhulu, wadla izinkwa zokubukiswa ezingavunyelwa ukudliwa ngaphandle kwabapristi, wabanika lababelaye?
Wasesithi kubo: Isabatha lenziwa ngenxa yomuntu, njalo umuntu ke nzi wanga ngenxa yesabatha;
ngakho iNdodana yomuntu iyiNkosi leyesabatha.
Wasebuya engena.
Basebemqaphela ukuthi uzamsilisa ngesabatha.
Wasesithi kumuntu olesandla esitshwabheneyo: Sukuma uye phakathi.
Wathi kubo: Kuvunyelwe yini ngamasabatha ukwenza okulungileyo, kumbe ukwenza okubi? Ukusindisa impilo, kumbe ukubulala? Kodwa bathula.
Wasebathalaza ngokuthukuthela, edabukile ngobulukhuni benhliziyo yabo, wathi kumuntu: Yelula isandla sakho. Waselula, isandla sakhe sasesisiliswa saphila njengesinye.
Basebephuma abaFarisi bahle bacebisana labakaHerodi bemelane laye, ukuthi bangambulala njani.
Kodwa uJesu wasuka wahamba labafundi bakhe ngaselwandle, leJudiya;
leJerusalema, ixuku elikhulu, selizwile izinto ezinkulu abezenza, leza kuye.
Wasetshela abafundi bakhe ukuthi umkolo umlindele ngenxa yexuku, ukuze lingamcindezeli.
Ngoba wayesilisa abanengi, baze bawela phezu kwakhe bonke abalezifo.
Futhi omoya abangcolileyo, bembona, babesiwa phansi phambi kwakhe.
Wasebalayisisa kakhulu ukuthi bangamvezi.
Wasesenyukela entabeni, wabizela kuye labo ayebafuna yena; basebesiza kuye.
Wasemisa abalitshumi lambili, ukuze babe laye, lokuze abathume ukuyatshumayela,
futhi babe lamandla okwelapha imikhuhlane, lawokukhupha amadimoni.
LoSimoni wamutha ibizo lokuthinguPetro;
loJakobe okaZebediya, loJohane umfowabo kaJakobe; wabatha amabizo wathingoBowanegesi, okuyikuthi, amadodana omdumo;
loAndreya, loFiliphu, loBartolomewu, loMathewu, loTomasi, loJakobe okaAlfewu, loTadewu, loSimoni umKhanani,
loJudasi uIskariyothi, laye owamnikelayo.
Ixuku laselibuthana futhi, kwaze kwathi bona abasazange benelise lokudla isinkwa.
Kwathi abakibo sebezwile lokhubaphuma ukuyambamba; ngoba bathi.
Lababhali abavela eJerusalema bathi.
Wasebabizela kuye, wathi kubo ngemifanekiso: USathane angakhupha njani uSathane?
Futhi uba umbuso wehlukene umelene lawo ngokwawo, lowombuso ungeme.
Lendlu uba yehlukene imelana layo ngokwayo, leyondlu ingeme.
LoSathane uba ezivukela yena, ahlukane, angeme, kodwa uyaphela.
Kakho ongangena endlini yesiqhwaga, aphange impahla yaso, uba engasibophi isiqhwaga kuqala, abesephanga indlu yaso.
Ngiqinisile ngithi kini: Zonke izono zizathethelelwa kubantwana babantu, lezinhlamba loba ziphi abahlambaza ngazo;
kodwa loba ngubani ohlambaza emelene loMoya oyiNgcwele, kalakuthethelelwa lanini, kodwa ulecala lokulahlwa okulaphakade;
ngoba bathi: Ulomoya ongcolileyo.
Kwasekufika.
Njalo ixuku lalihlezi limphahlile; basebesithi kuye: Khangela, unyoko labafowenu baphandle bayakudinga.
Wasebaphendula wathi: Ngubani umama kumbe abafowethu?
Wasethalaza labo ababehlezi bemphahlile, wathi: Khangelani umama labafowethu.
Ngoba loba ngubani owenza intando kaNkulunkulu, nguye ongumfowethu lodadewethu lomama.
Wasebuya waqala ukufundisa ngaselwandle; kwasekubuthana kuye ixuku elikhulu.
Wasebafundisa izinto ezinengi ngemifanekiso, lekufundiseni kwakhe wathi kubo:
Lalelani; khangelani, kwaphuma umhlanyeli ukuyahlanyela.
Kwasekusithi ekuhlanyeleni, enye yawela eceleni kwendlela, kwasekufika inyoni zezulu zayidla zayiqeda.
Kodwa enye yawela emhlabathini olamatshe, lapho eyayingelamhlabathi omnengi khona; futhi yahle yamila, ngoba yayingelakutshona komhlabathi;
kwathi ekuphumeni kwelanga yahangulwa yabuna ngoba yayingelampande.
Enye yasiwela emeveni, ameva asekhula, ayiminyanisa, futhi ayithelanga isithelo.
Njalo enye yawela emhlabathini omuhle; yathela isithelo esakhulayo sanda, yazala enye amatshumi amathathu, lenye amatshumi ayisithupha, lenye ikhulu.
Wasesithi kubo: Olendlebe zokuzwa, akezwe.
Kwathi eseyedwa, labo ababemphahlile kanye labalitshumi lambili bambuza ngomfanekiso.
Wasesithi kubo: Kuphiwe kini ukwazi imfihlo yombuso kaNkulunkulu; kodwa labo abangaphandle benzelwa izinto zonke ngemifanekiso;
ukuze bebona babone, bangabonisisi; njalo besizwa bezwe, bangaqedisisi; hlezi loba nini baphenduke, bathethelelwe izono zabo.
Wasesithi kubo: Kaliwazi lumfanekiso yini? Pho lizayazi njani imifanekiso yonke?
Umhlanyeli uhlanyela ilizwi.
Njalo abaseceleni kwendlela, yilabo lapho okuhlanyelwa khona ilizwi, futhi nxa belizwa, uSathane ahle afike alisuse ilizwi elihlanyelwe enhliziyweni zabo.
Lalabo ngokunjalo abahlanyelwe emhlabathini olamatshe, abathi, lapho besizwa ilizwi, bahle balemukele ngentokozo,
njalo kabalampande phakathi kwabo, kodwa bahlala okwesikhathi; kuthi sekufika inkathazo kumbe ukuzingelwa ngenxa yelizwi, bahle bakhubeke.
Lalaba yilabo abahlanyelwe emeveni, abalizwayo ilizwi,
kodwa impisekelo yalumhlaba, lenkohliso yenotho, lenkanuko yezinye izinto kungene kuminyanise ilizwi, futhi ibe ingasatheli.
Lalaba yilabo abahlanyelwe emhlabathini omuhle, abathi belizwile ilizwi, ba le mukele, bathele, enye amatshumi amathathu, lenye amatshumi ayisithupha, lenye ikhulu.
Wasesithi kubo: Kanti isibane silethwa ukuze sibekwe ngaphansi kwesitsha kumbe ngaphansi kombheda? Angithi ukuze sibekwe esiqobaneni sesibane?
Ngoba kakukho okufihliweyo okungayikubonakaliswa; akukho okwenzeka kube yimfihlo, kodwa ukuze kube sobala.
Nxa umuntu elendlebe zokuzwa akezwe.
Wasesithi kubo: Qaphelisani elikuzwayo.
Ngoba loba ngubani olakho, uzaphiwa; kodwa loba ngubani ongelakho, uzakwemukwa lalokho alakho.
Wasesithi: Unjalo umbuso kaNkulunkulu, njengokuba nxa umuntu ephosa inhlanyelo emhlabathini,
njalo alale abesevuka ebusuku lemini, lenhlanyelo imile njalo ikhule, yena kakwazi ukuthi njani.
Ngoba umhlabathi uyathela ngokwawo, kuqala usungulo, kulandele isikhwebu, kulandele amabele apheleleyo esikhwetshini.
Kodwa nxa sesivuthiwe isithelo, uhle athumeze isikela.
Wathi futhi: Sizawufananisa lani umbuso kaNkulunkulu? Kumbe sizawufananisa ngomfanekiso bani?
Unjengohlamvu lwemasitedi, oluthi nxa seluhlanyelwe emhlabathini, luncinyane kulazo zonke inhlamvu ezisemhlabeni;
njalo nxa seluhlanyelwe, lukhule, lube lukhulu lwedlule izilimo zonke, lwenze ingatsha ezinkulu, kuze kuthi inyoni zezulu zingakhela ngaphansi komthunzi wazo.
Waselikhuluma kubo ilizwi ngemifanekiso eminengi enjalo;
kodwa ngaphandle komfanekiso kakhulumanga kubo.
Ngalolosuku sekuhlwile, wasesithi kubo: Asichapheleni ngaphetsheya.
Sebeyekele ixuku lahamba. Futhi leminye imikolo yayilaye.
Kwasekuvuka isiphepho esikhulu somoya; lamagagasi aphoseka emkhunjini, waze wagcwala khathesi.
Njalo yena wayengemuva emkhunjini elele emqamelweni; basebemvusa, bathi kuye: Mfundisi, kawukhathali yini ukuthi siyabhubha?
Wasevuka wakhuza umoya, wathi kulo ulwandle: Thula, uthi zwi! Umoya wasuqamuka, kwasekusiba khona ukuthula okukhulu.
Wasesithi kubo: Kungani lisesaba kangaka? Kalilakholo ngani?
Basebesesaba ngokwesaba okukhulu, bathi omunye komunye: Kanti ungubani lo, ukuthi lomoya lolwandle kumlalele?
Basebefika ngaphetsheya kolwandle, elizweni lamaGadarene.
Esephumile emkhunjini, wahle wamhlangabeza umuntu ovela emangcwabeni elomoya ongcolileyo,
owayehlala emangcwabeni; njalo kwakungelamuntu owayengambopha ngitsho langamaketane,
ngoba wayebotshiwe kanengi ngezibopho langamaketane, kodwa amaketane ayeqanyulwa nguye, lezibopho zaqanyuqanyulwa; njalo kwakungekho owayengamthambisa;
langezikhathi zonke, ebusuku lemini, wayesezintabeni lemangcwabeni eklabalala ezisika ngamatshe.
Kwathi ebona uJesu ekhatshana, wagijima wamkhonza,
wamemeza ngelizwi elikhulu esithi: Ngilani lawe, Jesu, Ndodana kaNkulunkulu oPhezukonke.
Ngoba wathi kuye: Phuma emuntwini, moya ongcolileyo.
Wasembuza wathi: Ibizo lakho ungubani? Wasephendula, wathi: Ibizo lami nginguLegiyoni, ngoba sibanengi.
Wasemncenga kakhulu, ukuthi angabaxotsheli ngaphandle kwelizwe.
Kwakukhona lapho ngasezintabeni umhlambi omkhulu wengulube usidla;
lamadimoni wonke amncenga, athi: Sithume engulubeni, singene kuzo.
Njalo uJesu wahle wawavumela. Omoya abangcolileyo basebephuma bangena ezingulubeni; umhlambi wasuphaphatheka eliweni usiya olwandle; njalo zazingaba zinkulungwane ezimbili; zaminzwa olwandle.
Abazelusayo ingulube basebebaleka, bayabika emzini lemaphandleni. Basebephuma ukubona ukuthi kuyini okwenzakeleyo;
bafika kuJesu, bambona obengenwe ngamadimoni ehlezi egqokile; basebesesaba.
Labo ababekubonile babatshela ukuthi kwenzeke njani kowayengenwe ngamadimoni, langengulube.
Basebeqala ukumncenga ukuthi asuke elizweni lakibo.
Wathi engena emkhunjini, owayengenwe ngamadimoni wamncenga, ukuthi abe laye.
Kodwa uJesu kamvumelanga, kodwa wathi kuye: Hamba uye ekhaya kwabakini, ubatshele ukuthi iNkosi ikwenzele okungakanani, ikuhawukele.
Wasesuka ehamba waqala ukutshumayela eDikapolisi ukuthi uJesu umenzele okungakanani; basebemangala bonke.
UJesu esebuye wachaphela ngaphetsheya ngomkhumbi, kwabuthana kuye ixuku elikhulu, futhi wayengasolwandle.
Njalo khangela, kwafika; embona, wawa phansi enyaweni zakhe,
wamncenga kakhulu, esithi: Indodakazi yami encane isiphela; ngiyakuncengaukuthi ubuye ubeke izandla phezu kwayo, ukuze isindiswe, njalo izaphila.
Wasehamba laye; ixuku elikhulu laselimlandela, lamminyezela.
Njalo owesifazana othile owayelomopho wegazi okweminyaka elitshumi lambili,
ehluphekile kakhulu kubelaphi abanengi, echithile konke ayelakho, engasizakalanga, kodwa kulokhu kumqinela,
esezwile ngoJesu, weza exukwini ngemuva, wathinta isembatho sakhe;
ngoba wathi: Aluba ngithinta izembatho zakhe nje, ngizasindiswa.
Futhi wahle woma umthombo wegazi lakhe, wasesizwa emzimbeni ukuthi usilile esifweni.
Njalo uJesu wahle wazi phakathi kwakhe ukuthi amandla aphumile kuye, watshibilika esexukwini, wathi: Ngubani othinte izembatho zami?
Abafundi bakhe basebesithi kuye: Uyabona ixuku likuminyezela, kodwa uthi: Ngubani ongithintileyo?
Wasethalaza ukuthi ambone owenze lokhu.
Kodwa owesifazana esesaba ethuthumela, ekwazi okwenzekileyo kuye, weza wawa phambi kwakhe, wamtshela iqiniso lonke.
Wasesithi kuye: Ndodakazi, ukholo lwakho lukusindisile; hamba ngokuthula, siliswa esifweni sakho.
Esakhuluma, kwafika aba nyebomphathi wesinagoge?
Kwahle kwathi uJesu esizwa ilizwi elikhulunywayo wathi kumphathi wesinagoge.
Futhi kavumelanga muntu ukuthi amlandele, ngaphandle kukaPetro loJakobe.
Bafika-ke endlini yomphathi wesinagoge, wabona isiphithiphithi, labakhalayo labalilayo kakhulu,
esengenile wathi kubo: Liphithizelelani, likhala? Umntwana omncane kafanga, kodwa ulele.
Basebemhleka usulu. Kodwa yena, esebakhuphile bonke, wathatha uyise womntwana omncane lonina lalabo ababelaye, wangena lapho okwakulele khona umntwana omncane.
Wabamba isandla somntwana omncane, wathi kuye: "Thalitha, kumi".
Njalo yahle yavuka intombazana encane, yahamba, ngoba yayileminyaka elitshumi lambili; basebesanganiseka ngokusanganiseka okukhulu.
Wasebalayisisa kakhulu ukuthi lokhu kungaziwa muntu; wathi kayinikwe ukudla.
Wasesuka lapho, waya emzini wakibo; abafundi bakhe basebemlandela.

Sekufike isabatha, waqala ukufundisa esinagogeni; labanengi aba mu zwayo bamangala, bathi: Zivela ngaphi lezizinto kuye? Njalo yinhlakanipho bani ayinikiweyo, ukuthi lalimisebenzi yamandla enje yenziwe ngezandla zakhe?
Lo kayisuye umbazi yini, indodana kaMariya, lomfowabo kaJakobe loJose loJudasi loSimoni? Labodadewabo kabakho yini lapha kithi? Basebekhubeka ngaye.
Kodwa uJesu wathi kubo: Umprofethi kasweli ukudunyiswa, ngaphandle kwelizweni lakibo, lezihlotsheni zakhe lendlini yakwabo.
Futhi wayengelakho ukwenza lowodwa umsebenzi wamandla lapho.
Wasemangala ngokungakholwa kwabo.
Wasebizela kuye abalitshumi lambili.
Wabalaya ukuthi bangaphathi lutho lwendlela, ngaphandle kodondolo kuphela; lasikhwama, lasinkwa, lamali ezwezweni;
kodwa bafake amanyathela; futhi bangembathi izembatho ezimbili.
Wasesithi kubo: Lapho elingena khona endlini, hlalani kiyo lize liphume khona.

Njalo loba ngobani abangayikulemukela, kumbe balizwe, nxa liphuma lapho, thintithani uthuli olungaphansi kwenyawo zenu kube yibufakazi kubo. Ngiqinisile ngithi kini: Kuzakuba lula eSodoma kumbe laseGomora ngosuku lwesigwebo, kulakulowomuzi.
Sebephumile batshumayela ukuthi baphenduke;
bakhupha amadimoni amanengi, bagcoba abanengi abagulayo ngamagcobo.
Inkosi uHerodi, ngoba ibizo lakhe laba sobala, wasesithi: UJohane owabhabhathizayo uvukile kwabafileyo, futhi kungakho lamandla esebenza kuye.
Abanye bathi: UnguElija; labanye bathi: Ungumprofethi, kumbe u njengomunye wabaprofethi.
Kodwa uHerodi esizwa wathi: Lo nguJohane, mina engamquma ikhanda; yena uvukile kwabafileyo.
Ngoba yena uHerodi wayethumele wambamba uJohane, wambopha entolongweni, ngenxa kaHerodiyasi umkaFiliphu umfowabo, ngoba wayemthethe.
Ngoba uJohane wayethe kuHerodi: Kawuvunyelwa ukuba lomkamfowenu.
UHerodiyasi wasembambela inhliziyo, wafuna ukumbulala; kodwa kenelisanga;
ngoba uHerodi wayemesaba uJohane, esazi ukuthi uyindoda elungileyo lengcwele, wamlondoloza; lalapho emuzwa, wenza izinto ezinengi.
Kwathi selufikile usuku oluhle, uHerodi ngelanga lakhe lokuzalwa wenzela izikhulu zakhe ukudla kwantambama,
kwathi indodakazi kaHerodiyasi lo isingenile yagida, yamkholisa uHerodi lalabo ababehlezi ekudleni laye, inkosi yathi entombini: Cela kimi loba kuyini okuthandayo, njalo ngizakupha;
wafunga kuyo esithi: Loba kuyini ongakucela kimi, ngizakunika.
Yasiphuma isithi kunina: Ngizacelani? Yena wasesithi: Ikhanda likaJohane uMbhabhathizi.
Njalo yahle yangena enkosini ngokuphangisa, yacela, yathi: Ngifuna ukuthi unginike khathesinje emganwini ikhanda likaJohane uMbhabhathizi.
Inkosi yasidabuka kakhulu, kodwangenxa yezifungo langalabo ababehlezi layo ekudleni.
Njalo inkosi yahle yathuma ibutho yalaya ukuthi kulethwe ikhanda lakhe. Wasehamba wamquma ikhanda entolongweni,
waletha ikhanda lakhe ngomganu, walinika intombi; intombi yasilinika unina.
Kwathi abafundi bakhe sebezwile beza, bathatha isidumbu sakhe, basibeka engcwabeni.
Abaphostoli basebebuthana kuJesu, bambikela konke, lababekwenzile kanye lababekufundisile.
Wasesithi kubo: Wozani lina lodwa endaweni eyinkangala.
Bakhuphuka ngomkhumbi.
Amaxuku asebabona besuka, labanengi bamazi, bagijimela khona ndawonye ngenyawo bevela emizini yonke, basebebadlula, bahlangana kuye.
Kwathi uJesu esephuma wabona ixuku elikhulu, waba lesihelo ngabo.
Kwathi isikhathi sesihambile, abafundi bakhe beza kuye bathi: Lindawo iyinkangala, lesikhathi sesihambile;
bayekele, ukuze baye ezigabeni ezizingelezeleyo lemizaneni bazithengele izinkwa. Ngoba bengelalutho abangaludla.
Wasephendula wathi kubo: Banikeni lina ukuthi badle. Basebesithi kuye?
Wasesithi kubo: Lilezinkwa ezingaki? Hambani liyebona. Sebesazi bathi: Zinhlanu, lenhlanzi ezimbili.
Wasebalaya ukuthi babahlalise bonke phansi ngezigaba ngezigaba etshanini obuluhlaza.
Basebehlala phansi ngamaviyo ngamaviyo, ngamakhulu langamatshumi amahlanu.

Wasethatha izinkwa ezinhlanu lenhlanzi ezimbili, ekhangela phezulu ezulwini, wabonga, wazihlephula izinkwa, wa zi nika abafundi bakhe ukuthi ba zi beke phambi kwabo; lenhlanzi ezimbili wazabela bonke.
Basebesidla bonke, basutha.
Basebedobha izitsha ezilitshumi lambili ezagcwala imvuthu ezazisele, l okuseleyokwenhlanzi.
Lalabo abadlayo izinkwa, babengaba ngamadoda azinkulungwane ezinhlanu.
Njalo wahle wacindezela abafundi bakhe, yena esayekela ixuku lihamba.
Esebavalelisile, wasuka waya entabeni.
Sekuhlwile, umkhumbi wawuphakathi kolwandle, futhi yena wayeyedwa emhlabathini.
Wababona behlupheka kakhulu ekugwedleni, ngoba umoya wawuphambene labo, wasesiza kubo sokungaba yisikhathi somlindo wesine wobusuku, ehamba phezu kolwandle; wasefuna ukubadlula.
Sebembonile ehamba phezu kolwandle, basebecabanga ukuthi lithonga, bakhala kakhulu;
ngoba bambona bonke, bethuka. Kodwa wahle wakhuluma labo, wathi kubo: Manini isibindi; yimi, lingesabi.
Wasesenyukela kubo emkhunjini, umoya wasuthula; basebesanganiseka kakhulu okwedlula amalawulo ngaphakathi, bamangala.
Ngoba babengaqedisisanga ngezinkwa.
Kwathi sebechaphile bafika elizweni leGenesaretha, babophela umkhumbi ekhunjini.
Bathi sebephumile emkhunjini, bahle bamazi,
bagijimela kuso sonke lesosigaba esizingelezeleyo, baqala ukubhoda bethwala abagulayo ngamathala bebasa lapho abebesizwa ukuthi ukhona.
Njalo loba ngaphi angena khona emizaneni loba emizini, loba emaphandleni, babeka abagulayo emidangeni, bamncenga ukuthi bathinte umphetho wesembatho sakhe nje; njalo bonke abamthintayo basindiswa.
Kwasekubuthana kuye abaFarisi, labanye bababhali, ababevela eJerusalema;
sebebonile ukuthi abanye babafundi bakhe badla izinkwa ngezandla ezingcolileyo, okuyikuthi ezingagezwanga, basola.
Ngoba abaFarisi lamaJuda bonke kabadli, ngaphandle kokuthi bagezisise izandla zabo, belondoloza isiko labadala.
Nxa be vela emdangeni, kabadli, ngaphandle kokuthi bageze.
Emva kwalokhu abaFarisi lababhali bambuza bathi: Kungani abafundi bakho bengahambi ngesiko labadala, kodwa badla isinkwa ngezandla ezingahlanjwanga?
Kodwa waphendula wathi kubo: UIsaya waprofetha kuhle ngani lina bazenzisi, njengokulotshiweyo ukuthi: Lesisizwe singidumisa ngezindebe, kodwa inhliziyo yabo ikhatshana lami.
Kodwa zingikhonza ngeze, zifundisa izimfundiso eziy imilayo yabantu.
Ngoba liyekela umlayo kaNkulunkulu, ligcine isiko labantu, ukugezisa imbiza lenkezo.
Wasesithi kubo: Liyachitha kuhle umlayo kaNkulunkulu, ukuze lilondoloze isiko lenu.
Ngoba uMozisi wathi: Hlonipha uyihlo lonyoko;
kodwa lina lithi: Aluba umuntu esithi kuyise kumbe kunina: Lokho obungasizwa yimi ngakho, "liKhobane", okuyikuthi umnikelo kuNkulunkulu;
kalisamvumeli ukwenzela uyise kumbe unina ulutho,
lilenza ize ilizwi likaNkulunkulu ngesiko lenu eliliqhubayo; lezinto ezinengi ezinjalo liyazenza.
Esebizile kuye ixuku lonke, wathi kilo: Ngilalelani lonke, liqedisise.
Kalukho ulutho olungaphandle komuntu olungamngcolisa lungena kuye; kodwa izinto eziphuma kuye, yizo lezo ezingcolisa umuntu.
Uba ekhona olendlebe zokuzwa akezwe.
Esengenile endlini evela exukwini.
Wasesithi kubo: Ngokunjalo lani lingabangelakuqedisisa yini? Kaliqedisisi yini ukuthi konke okungaphandle okungena emuntwini kungemngcolise?
Ngoba kakungeni enhliziyweni yakhe, kodwa esiswini; kuphumela ngaphandle, kuhlambulula ukudla konke.
Wasesithi: Okuphumayo emuntwini, yikho okungcolisa umuntu.
Ngoba kuphuma ngaphakathi enhliziyweni yabantu imicabango emibi, ukuphinga, ukufeba, ukubulala,
ukweba, ubuhwaba;
zonke lezizinto ezimbi zivela ngaphakathi, zimngcolise umuntu.
Wasesukuma lapho waya emikhawulweni yeTire leSidoni. Wangena endlini, engathandi ukuthi umuntu akwazi, kodwa wayengelakufihlakala.
Ngoba owesifazana, olentombazana yakhe elomoya ongcolileyo, esezwile ngaye, weza wawa phansi enyaweni zakhe;
njalo owesifazana wayengumGriki, engumSirofenike ngokuzalwa; wasemncenga ukuthi akhuphe idimoni endodakazini yakhe.
Kodwa uJesu wathi kuye: Ake kusuthe abantwana kuqala; ngoba kakukuhle ukuthatha isinkwa sabantwana sisiphosele izinjana.
Kodwa waphendula wathi kuye: Yebo, Nkosi; kodwa lezinjana ezingaphansi kwetafula ziyadla imvuthuluka yabantwana.
Wasesithi kuye: Ngenxa yalokhukutsho hamba-ke; idimoni liphumile endodakazini yakho.
Wasesuka waya endlini yakhe, wafica idimoni seliphumile, lendodakazi ilele embhedeni.
Wasebuya wasuka.
Basebeletha kuye isacuthe esigagasayo.
Wasesikhupha exukwini saba sodwa, wafaka iminwe yakhe endlebeni zaso,
ekhangela phezulu ezulwini!
Njalo zahle zavulwa indlebe zaso; yasithukululwa intambo yolimi lwaso, sasesikhuluma saqonda.
Wasebalaya ukuthi bangatsheli muntu.
Basebemangala kakhulukazi sibili, bathi: Uzenzile kuhle izinto zonke; wenza kokubili izacuthe ukuthi zizwe, lezimungulu ukuthi zikhulume.
Ngalezonsuku kwakukhona ixuku elikhulu kakhulu, njalo lalingelakho okokudla, uJesu wabizela kuye abafundi bakhe wathi kubo:
Ngilesihelo ngexuku; ngoba sebehlezi lami insuku ezintathu, bengelalutho lokudla;
njalo uba ngibayekela baye emakhaya abo bengadlanga, bazayatha endleleni; ngoba abanye babo bavela khatshana.
Abafundi bakhe basebemphendula bathi: Zingavela ngaphi izinkwa umuntu angasuthisa ngazo laba lapha enkangala?
Wasebabuza wathi: Lilezinkwa ezingaki? Basebesithi: Eziyisikhombisa.
Waselaya ixuku ukuthi lihlale phansi emhlabathini; wasethatha izinkwa eziyisikhombisa, esebongile wa zi hlephula wa zi nika abafundi bakhe, ukuthi babeke phambi kwabo; basebebeka phambi kwexuku.
Njalo babelenhlanzana ezinlutshwana; esebusisile wathi bazibeke lazo phambi kwabo.
Basebesidla, basutha; basebedobha imvuthu ezazisele, izitsha eziyisikhombisa.
Lababedlile babengaba zinkulungwane ezine; wasebayekela bahamba.
Njalo wahle wangena.
AbaFarisi basebephuma, baqala ukuphikisana laye, befunisisa kuye isibonakaliso esivela ezulwini, bemlinga.
Wasebubula kakhulu emoyeni wakhe wathi: Lesisizukulwana sidingelani isibonakaliso? Ngiqinisile ngithi kini: Qiniso akulasibonakaliso esizanikwa kulesisizukulwana.
Wasebatshiya, wangena emkhunjini futhi, wasuka waya ngaphetsheya.
Njalo abafundi babekhohliwe ukuthatha izinkwa, bengela luthoemkhunjini ngaphandle kwesinkwa esisodwa.
Wasebalaya, wathi: Nanzelelani, liqaphele imvubelo yabaFarisi.
Basebezindlisana, besithi: Ngoba kasilazinkwa.
UJesu esekwazi wathi kubo: Kungani likhulumisana ngokuthi kalilazinkwa? Lokhe lilenhliziyo ezilukhuni yini?
Lilamehlo kaliboni yini? Futhi lilendlebe kalizwa yini? Njalo kalikhumbuli yini?
Mhla ngahlephulela abazinkulungwane ezinhlanu izinkwa ezinhlanu, ladobha izitsha ezingaki ezigcwele imvuthu? Bathi kuye: Ezilitshumi lambili.
Njalo mhla ziyisikhombisa kwabazinkulungwane ezine, ladobha izitsha ezingaki ezigcwele imvuthu? Basebesithi: Eziyisikhombisa.
Wasesithi kubo: Yinindaba lingaqedisisi?
Wasefika eBhethisayida.
Wasesibamba isiphofu ngesandla, wasikhuphela ngaphandle komzana, wasibuza ukuthi ngabe sibona ulutho.
Sasesikhangela phezulu sathi: Ngibona abantu behambahamba kungathi yizihlahla.
Emva kwalokhu wabuya wabeka izandla zakhephezu kwamehlo aso, wasenza sakhangela phezulu; sasesisiliswa, sabona bonke ngokucacileyo.
Wasesithuma endlini yaso, wathi: Ungangeni emzaneni.
UJesu wasephuma labafundi bakhe baya emizaneni yeKesariya yeFiliphu; besendleleni wababuza abafundi bakhe, wathi kubo: Abantu bathi ngingubani?
Basebephendula bathi: UJohane uMbhabhathizi; labanye: UElija; labanye: Omunye wabaprofethi.
Yena wasesithi kubo: Lina-ke lithi ngingubani? UPetro wasephendula wathi kuye: Wena unguKristu.
Wasebalayisisa.
Waseqala ukubafundisa.
Waselikhuluma lelilizwi obala. UPetro wasemthatha waqala ukumkhuza.
Kodwa etshibilika, wabona abafundi bakhe, wamkhuza uPetro, wathi: Suka ngemva kwami, Sathane; ngoba kawucabangi ngezinto zikaNkulunkulu, kodwa ngezabantu.
Kwathi esebizele kuye ixuku kanye labafundi bakhe, wathi kubo: Uba umuntu ethanda ukuza ngemva kwami, kazidele, athathe isiphambano sakhe, angilandele.
Ngoba loba ngubani othanda ukusindisa impilo yakhe, izamlahlekela; kodwa loba ngubani olahlekelwa yimpilo yakhe ngenxa yami levangeli, yena uzayisindisa.
Ngoba kuzamsizani umuntu, nxa ezuza umhlaba wonke, kodwa alahlekelwe ngumphefumulo wakhe?
Kumbe umuntu uzanikani kube lihlawulo lomphefumulo wakhe?
Ngoba loba ngubani olenhloni ngami langamazwi ami.
Wasesithi kubo: Ngiqinisile ngithi kini: Bakhona abanye kwabemiyo lapha, abangasoze bezwe ukufa, baze babone umbuso kaNkulunkulu usufikile ngamandla.
Emva kwensuku eziyisithupha uJesu wasethatha uPetro loJakobe loJohane, wasebakhuphulela entabeni ende ebehlukanisa bodwa; waseguqulwa isimo phambi kwabo;
lezembatho zakhe zacwazimula, zaba mhlophe nke njengeliqhwa elikhithikileyo, kakulamcoli welembu emhlabeni ongazenza zibe mhlophe kangako.
Kwasekubonakala kubo uElija eloMozisi, njalo bekhuluma loJesu.
UPetro wasephendula wathi kuJesu: Rabi, kuhle ukuthi sibe lapha; futhi asakhe amadumba amathathu, elinye ngelakho, lelinye ngelikaMozisi, lelinye ngelikaElija.
Ngoba wayengakwazi angakutsho; ngoba babesesaba kakhulu.
Kwasekufika iyezi labasibekela; kwaba lelizwi elivela eyezini, lisithi: Lo uyiNdodana yami ethandekayo; zwanini yona.
Njalo bahle bathalaza, kababe besabona muntu, kodwa uJesu yedwa elabo.
Kwathi besehla entabeni.
Njalo bazigcinela lelilizwi, bebuzana ukuthi kutshoni ukuvuka okwabafileyo.
Basebembuza, besithi: Batsholoni ababhali ukuthi uElija ufanele ukufika kuqala?
Wasephendula, wathi kubo: UElija ufika kuqala isibili, abuyisele zonke izinto; njalo kubhalwe njani ngeNdodana yomuntu.
Kodwa ngitsho kini ukuthi uElija laye sewafika, basebesenza kuye konke abakuthandayo, njengokulotshiweyo ngaye.
Kwathi efika kubafundi, wabona ixuku elikhulu libahanqile.
Lahle lathi ukumbona ixuku lonke laselimangala, lagijimela ku yelambingelela.
Wasebabuza ababhali wathi: Liphikisana ngani labo?
Omunye wexuku wasephendula wathi: Mfundisi, ngilethe kuwe indodana yami, elomoya oyisimungulu;
kuthi loba ngaphi oyibamba khona, uyidabule; ikhihlize amagwebu, igedle amazinyo ayo, yome qha; njalo ngikhulume labafundi bakho ukuthi bawukhuphe, kodwa behluleka.
Wasemphendula wathi: O sizukulwana esingelakholo, koze kube nini ngilani? Koze kube nini ngilibekezelela? Iletheni kimi.
Basebeyiletha kuye; kwathi umbona, umoya wahle wayihlukuza; yawela emhlabathini.
Wasebuza uyise wathi: Kulesikhathi esingakanani, lokhu kwenzeka kiyo? Wasesithi: Kusukela ebuntwaneni.
Futhi uyiphosele kanengi emlilweni lemanzini, ukuze uyibhubhise; kodwa nxa kukhona ongakwenza, sihawukele, usisize.
UJesu wasesithi kuye: Nxa usenelisa ukukholwa, zonke izinto ziyenzeka kokholwayo.
Njalo uyise womntwana wahle wamemeza ngezinyembezi wathi: Ngiyakholwa, Nkosi, siza ukungakholwa kwami.
Kwathi uJesu esebona ukuthi ixuku ligijima kanyekanye ndawonye, wakhuza umoya ongcolileyo, esithi kuwo: Wena moya oyisimungulu loyisacuthe, mina ngiyakulaya: Phuma kuye, ungabe usangena kuye.
Usumemezile, wayihlukuza kakhulu, waphuma; yasisiba njengofileyo, kwaze kwathi abanengi bathi isifile.
Kodwa uJesu wayibamba ngesandla, wayiphakamisa; yasisukuma.
