Wathi esengenile endlini, abafundi bakhe bambuza bebodwa bathi: Kungani thina sehlulekile ukuwukhupha?
Wasesithi kubo: Loluhlobo lungeke luphume ngalutho, ngaphandle komkhuleko lokuzila ukudla.
Basebesuka lapho badabula eGalili; wayengathandi ukuthi loba ngubani akwazi,
ngoba wayefundisa abafundi bakhe, esithi kubo: INdodana yomuntu izanikelwa ezandleni zabantu, njalo bazayibulala; isibulewe izavuka ngosuku lwesithathu.
Kodwa kabaqedisisanga lumutsho, besaba ukumbuza.
Wasefika eKapenawume?
Kodwa bathula; ngoba endleleni babephikisene ngokuthi ngubani omkhulu.
Wasehlala phansi wabiza abalitshumi lambili, wathi kubo: Uba umuntu ethanda ukuba ngowokuqala, uzakuba ngowokucina kubo bonke.
Wasethatha umntwana omncane, wammisa phakathi kwabo:
Loba ngubani owemukela omunye wabantwana abancane abanje ebizweni lami, wemukela mina; njalo loba ngubani owemukela mina, kemukeli mina, kodwa yena ongithumileyo.
UJohane wasemphendula, wathi: Mfundisi, sabona omunye ongasilandeliyo.
Kodwa uJesu wathi: Lingamenqabeli; ngoba kakho owenza umsebenzi wamandla ebizweni lami, njalo olamandla okukhuluma kubi ngami masinyane;
ngoba ongamelani lathi, ungowethu.
Ngoba loba ngubani ozalinathisa inkezo yamanzi ngebizo lami, ngoba lingabakaKristu, ngiqinisile ngithi kini: Kasoze alahlekelwa ngumvuzo wakhe.
Futhi loba ngubani okhubekisa omunye walaba abancinyane abakholwa kimi, kungcono kuye ukuthi ilitshe lokuchola ligaxwe entanyeni yakhe, abesephoselwa olwandle.
Njalo uba isandla sakho sikukhubekisa, siqume; kungcono kuwe ukungena ekuphileni uyingini,
lapho impethu yabo engafi khona, lomlilo ongacitshi khona.
Njalo uba unyawo lwakho lukukhubekisa, luqume,
lapho impethu yabo engafi khona, lomlilo ongacitshi khona.
Njalo uba ilihlo lakho likukhubekisa, likhuphe; kungcono kuwe ukungena embusweni kaNkulunkulu ulelihlo elilodwa,
lapho impethu yabo engafi khona, lomlilo ongacitshi khona.
Ngoba wonke uzatshwaywa ngomlilo.
Itshwayi lihle.
Wasesukuma lapho weza emingceleni yeJudiya edabula ngaphetsheya kweJodani; amaxuku asebuya abuthana kuye.
Kwasekusiza kuye abaFarisi bambuza ukuthi: Kuvunyelwe yini ukuthi indoda yale umka yo? bemlinga.
Wasephendula wathi kubo: UMozisi walilayani?
Basebesithi: UMozisi wavuma ukubhala incwadi yesehlukaniso, loku m ala.
UJesu wasephendula wathi kubo: Ngenxa yobulukhuni benhliziyo yenu walibhalela lumlayo;
kodwa kusukela ekuqaleni kokudaliweyo, uNkulunkulu wabenza owesilisa lowesifazana.
Ngenxa yalokhu indoda izatshiya uyise lonina, inamathele kumkayo,
njalo labo ababili bazakuba nyamanye. Ngakho kabasebabili, kodwa ba nyamanye.
Ngakho lokho uNkulunkulu akuhlanganisileyo, kakungabi lamuntu okwehlukanisayo.
Endlini abafundi bakhe basebebuya bembuza ngalokhu.
Wasesithi kubo: Loba ngubani owala umkakhe athathe omunye, uyafeba kuye;
lomfazi uba esala indoda yakhe endele kwenye, uyafeba.
Basebeletha abantwana abancane kuye ukuze ababambe; kodwa abafundi bakhe babakhuza aba ba lethayo.
Kodwa uJesu e ku bona wathukuthela, wathi kubo: Vumelani abantwana abancane beze kimi.
Ngiqinisile ngithi kini: Loba ngubani ongemukeli umbuso kaNkulunkulu njengomntwana omncane, kasoze angene kuwo.
Njalo ebagona, ebeka izandla zakhephezu kwabo, wababusisa.
Esephumele endleleni, omunye wa m gijimela?
UJesu wasesithi kuye: Ungibizelani ngokuthi olungileyo? Kakho olungileyo, ngaphandle koyedwa, uNkulunkulu.
Uyayazi imilayo ethi: Ungafebi, ungabulali, ungebi, ungafakazi amanga.
Wasephendula wathi kuye: Mfundisi, lezizinto zonke ngizigcinile kusukela ebutsheni bami.
Njalo uJesu emkhangela wamthanda.
Kodwa edanile ngalelilizwi wasuka wahamba edabukile; ngoba wayelempahla ezinengi.
UJesu wasethalaza wathi kubafundi bakhe: Kuzakuba lukhuni kangakanani kwabalenotho ukungena embusweni kaNkulunkulu.
Abafundi basebemangala ngamazwi akhe. Kodwa uJesu ephendula futhi wathi kubo: Bantwana, kulukhuni kangakanani kwabathembela enothweni ukungena embusweni kaNkulunkulu;
kulula ukuthi ikamela lithutshe entunjeni yenalithi, kulokuthi umuntu onothileyo angene embusweni kaNkulunkulu.
Basebemangala kakhulukazi, bekhulumisana bathi: Pho kungasindiswa bani?
UJesu wasebakhangela wathi: Kubantu kakulakwenzeka, kodwa kaku njalokuNkulunkulu; ngoba zonke izinto ziyenzeka kuNkulunkulu.
UPetro waseqala ukuthi kuye: Khangela, thina sitshiye konke, sakulandela.

UJesu wasephendula wathi: Ngiqinisile ngithi kini: Kakukho muntu otshiye indlu, kumbe abafowabo, kumbe odadewabo, kumbe uyise, kumbe unina, kumbe umka khe, kumbe abantwana, kumbe amasimu, ngenxa yami levangeli,
ongayikwemukela ngokwekhulu khathesi ngalesisikhathi, izindlu labafowabo labodadewabo labonina labantwana lamasimu.
Kodwa abanengi abokuqala bazakuba ngabokucina, labokucina ngabokuqala.
Njalo besendleleni benyukela eJerusalema. Wasethatha futhi abalitshumi lambili, waqala ukubatshela izinto ezazizakwenzakala kuye
ukuthi: Khangelani, senyukela eJerusalema, futhi iNdodana yomuntu izanikelwa kubapristi abakhulu lakubabhali, njalo bazayigwebela ukufa, bayinikele kwabezizwe,
bazayiyangisa, bayitshaye ngesiswepu, bayikhafulele amathe, bayibulale; njalo ngosuku lwesithathu izabuya ivuke ekufeni.
Kwasekusiza kuye uJakobe loJohane, besithi: Mfundisi, sithanda ukuthi usenzele loba yini esizayicela.
Wasesithi kubo: Lithanda ukuthi ngilenzeleni?
Basebesithi kuye: Siphe ukuthi sihlale omunye ngakwesokunene sakho lomunye ngakwesokhohlo sakho ebukhosini bakho.
Kodwa uJesu wathi kubo: Kalikwazi elikucelayo. Linganatha yini inkezo engiyinathayo mina, njalo libhabhathizwe ngobhabhathizo engibhabhathizwa ngalo mina?
Basebesithi kuye: Singa kwenza. Kodwa uJesu wathi kubo: Isibili inkezo engiyinathayo mina lizayinatha; lizabhabhathizwa ngobhabhathizo engibhabhathizwa ngalo mina;
kodwa ukuhlala ngakwesokunene sami langakwesokhohlo sami kayisikho okwami uku ku pha, kodwa kungo kwalabo abakulungiselweyo.
Kwathi sebezwile abalitshumi baqala ukuthukuthela ngoJakobe loJohane.
Kodwa uJesu wababizela kuye wathi kubo: Liyazi ukuthi labo okuthiwa babusa izizwe bazibusa ngobulukhuni; lezikhulu zazo zisebenzisa amandla phezu kwazo.
Kodwa akuyikuba njalo phakathi kwenu; kodwa loba ngubani othanda ukuba ngomkhulu phakathi kwenu, kabe yisisebenzi senu;
njalo loba ngubani othanda ukuba ngowokuqala phakathi kwenu, kabe yisisebenzi sabo bonke.
Ngoba leNdodana yomuntu kayizanga ukukhonzwa, kodwa ukukhonza, lokunika impilo yayo ibe lihlawulo labanengi.
Basebefika eJeriko wayehlezi endleleni ephanza.
Kwathi esezwile ukuthi nguJesu weNazaretha, waqala ukumemeza lokuthi: Jesu Ndodana kaDavida, akungihawukele!
Abanengi basebemkhuza ukuthi athule; kodwa wamemeza kakhulukazi, esithi: Ndodana kaDavida, akungihawukele!
UJesu esima wasesithi kabizwe; basebesibiza isiphofu, besithi kuso: Mana isibindi; sukuma, uyakubiza.
Sasesilahla isembatho saso sasukuma seza kuJesu.
UJesu wasephendula wathi kuso: Ufuna ukuthi ngikwenzeleni? Isiphofu sasesisithi kuye: Raboni, ukuthi ngibuye ngibone.
UJesu wasesithi kuso: Hamba; ukholo lwakho.
Kwathi besondela eJerusalema, entabeni yeMihlwathi, wathuma ababili kubafundi bakhe,
wathi kubo: Hambani liye emzaneni okhangelene lani; lizahle lithi lingena kuwo lifice ithole likababhemi likhulekiwe.
Njalo uba umuntu esithi kini: Likwenzelani lokhu? Lithi: INkosi iyaliswela; njalo uzahle alithumele lapha.
Bahamba-ke bafica ithole likhulekiwe lisesangweni ngaphandle, endleleni; basebelikhulula.
Labanye kwababemi khona bathi kubo: Lenzani likhulula ithole?
Basebesitsho kubo njengoba uJesu elayile; basebebayekela bahamba.
Basebeliletha ithole kuJesu, baphosela izembatho zabo phezu kwalo, wasehlala phezu kwalo.
Labanengi bendlala izembatho zabo endleleni; labanye bagamula izingatsha lamahlamvu ezihlahleni, bakwendlala endleleni.
Lalabo ababehamba phambili lababelandela bamemeza, besithi: Hosana! Ubusisiwe ozayo ebizweni leNkosi;
ubusisiwe umbuso kababa wethu uDavida, ozayo ebizweni leNkosi. Hosana kweliphezulu!
UJesu wasengena eJerusalema, lethempelini.
Lakusisa.
Ebona umkhiwa ukhatshana, ulamahlamvu, wasondela ukuthi mhlawumbe angathola ulutho kuwo; njalo efika kuwo, katholanga lutho ngaphandle kwamahlamvu; ngoba kwakungesiso isikhathi somkhiwa.
UJesu ekhuluma wathi kuwo: Kakungabi kusadla muntu isithelo kuwe kuze kube nininini. Labafundi bakhe ba ku zwa.

Basebefika eJerusalema; uJesu wasengena ethempelini waqala ukuxotsha labo ababethengisa lababethenga ethempelini; wasegenqula amatafula ababentshintshelana imali, lezihlalo zalabo ababethengisa amajuba;
wayengavumeli ukuthi umuntu athwale impahla adabule ethempelini.
Wasefundisa, wathi kubo: Kakulotshiwe yini ukuthi: Indlu yami izabizwa ngokuthi yindlu yomkhuleko yezizwe zonke.
Ababhali labapristi abakhulu basebe ku zwa, badinga ukuthi bangambulala njani.
Sekusihlwa, waphuma phandle komuzi.
Ekuseni kakhulu besedlula, babona umkhiwa womile kusukela empandeni.
UPetro wasekhumbula wathi kuye: Rabi, khangela, umkhiwa owuqalekisileyo womile.
UJesu wasephendula wathi kubo: Banini lokholo kuNkulunkulu.

Ngoba ngiqinisile ngithi kini: Loba ngubani ozakuthi kulintaba: Phakanyiswa, uphoselwe olwandle; njalo engathandabuzi enhliziyweni yakhe, kodwa ekholwa ukuthi akutshoyo kuyenzeka, kuzakwenzeka kuye loba yini akutshoyo.
Ngakho ngithi kini: Konke loba yini elikucelayo likhuleka, kholwani ukuthi liyakwemukela, njalo lizakuba layo.
Njalo nxa limi likhuleka.
Kodwa uba lina lingathetheleli, loYihlo osemazulwini kayikulithethelela iziphambeko zenu.
Basebebuya bafika eJerusalema; kwathi ehambahamba ethempelini, abapristi abakhulu lababhali labadala beza kuye,
bathi kuye: Izinto lezi uzenza ngaliphi igunya; njalo ngubani okunike leligunya lokuthi wenze lezizinto?
UJesu wasephendula wathi kubo: Lami ngizalibuza umbuzo ube munye, njalo lingiphendule, khona ngizalitshela ukuthi ngenza lezizinto ngaliphi igunya.
Ubhabhathizo lukaJohane lwavela ezulwini, kumbe ebantwini? Ngiphendulani.
Basebezindlisana, besithi: Uba sisithi: Ezulwini, uzakuthi: Pho kalikholwanga kuye ngani?
Kodwa uba sisithi: Ebantwini; besaba abantu; ngoba bonke babemphatha uJohane, ngokuthi ungumprofethi ngeqiniso.
Basebephendula bathi kuJesu: Kasazi. UJesu wasephendula wathi kubo: Lami kangilitsheli ukuthi ngenza lezizinto ngaliphi igunya.
Waseqala ukukhuluma labo ngemifanekiso wathi: Umuntu wahlanyela isivini, wasibiyela ngothango, wagebha isikhamelo, wakha umphotshongo, wasiqatshisa kubalimi, waya kwelinye ilizwe.
Kwathi sekuyisikhathi esifaneleyo wathuma inceku kubalimi, ukuze yemukele kubalimi okwesithelo sesivini.
Kodwa ba yi bamba bayitshaya, ba yi mukisa ize.
Wasebuya ethuma kubo enye inceku; laleyo bayitshaya ngamatshe ba yi limaza ekhanda, ba yi xotsha isi thelwe inhloni.
Wasebuya ethuma enye; yona basebeyibulala; lezinye ezinengi, ezinye bazitshaya, lezinye bazibulala.
Ngakho eseselendodana eyodwa ethandekayo kuye, ekucineni wayithuma kubo layo, esithi: Bazayihlonipha indodana yami.
Kodwa labobalimi bakhulumisana besithi: Le yindlalifa; wozani, siyibulale, lelifa lizakuba ngelethu.
Basebe yi bamba bayibulala, ba yi phosela ngaphandle kwesivini.
Ngakho uzakwenzani umninisivini? Uzakuza ababhubhise abalimi, anikele isivini kwabanye.
Kalibalanga yini lumbhalo othi: Ilitshe abakhi abalalayo, yilo eseliyinhloko yengonsi;
lokhu kwenziwe yiNkosi, njalo kuyisimanga emehlweni ethu?
Basebedinga ukumbamba, kodwa besaba ixuku; ngoba babesazi ukuthi wayekhuluma lumfanekiso emelane labo.
Basebethuma kuye abanye babaFarisi labakaHerodi.

Basebesiza bathi kuye: Mfundisi, siyazi ukuthi wena uqotho, njalo kawukhathali ngomuntu; ngoba kawunanzi isimo somuntu, kodwa ufundisa indlela kaNkulunkulu ngeqiniso: Kuvunyelwe yini ukuthela kuKesari kumbe hatshi?
Sithele, kumbe singatheli? Kodwa ekwazi ukuzenzisa kwabo wathi kubo: Lingilingelani? Lethani kimi udenariyo, ukuze ngibone.
Basebeletha. Wasesithi kubo: Ngokabani lumfanekiso lalumbhalo? Basebesithi kuye: NgokaKesari.
UJesu wasephendula wathi kubo: Mnikeni uKesari okukaKesari, loNkulunkulu okukaNkulunkulu. Basebemangala ngaye.
Basebesiza kuye abaSadusi, abathi kakukho ukuvuka kwabafileyo; bambuza, bathi:
Mfundisi, uMozisi wasibhalela, ukuthi: Uba umfowabo womuntu esifa, atshiye umka khe, engatshiyi bantwana, umfowabo kamthathe umkakhe, amvusele umfowabo inzalo;
kwakulezelamani eziyisikhombisa; owokuqala wasethatha umfazi, wafa engatshiyanga inzalo;
lowesibili wamthatha, wafa, laye engatshiyanga inzalo; lowesithathu kwaba njalo;
lalaba boyisikhombisa bamthatha, kabatshiyanga inzalo. Ekucineni kwabo bonke kwafa lomfazi.
Ngakho ekuvukeni kwabafileyo, mhla bevukayo, uzakuba ngumkabani kubo; lokhu abayisikhombisa babelaye engumkabo?
UJesu wasephendula wathi kubo: Kaliduhanga yini ngalokhu, ngoba lingayazi imibhalo, loba amandla kaNkulunkulu?
Ngoba mhla bevukayo ekufeni, kabathathani, njalo kabendiswa, kodwa banjengengilosi ezisemazulwini.
Kodwa mayelana labafileyo, ukuthi bayavuswa, kalifundanga yini egwalweni lukaMozisi, ukuthi uNkulunkulu esihlahleni wakhuluma njani kuye?
Kayisuye uNkulunkulu wabafileyo, kodwa uNkulunkulu wabaphilayo; ngakho lina liduhile kakhulu.
Wasefika omunye wababhali, esezwile bebuzana, esebonile ukuthi ubaphendule kuhle, wambuza wathi: Yiwuphi umlayo wokuqala kuyo yonke?
UJesu wasemphendula wathi: Owokuqala kuyo yonke imilayo ngowokuthi: Zwana, Israyeli: INkosi uNkulunkulu wethu, iNkosi yinye;
njalo wothanda iNkosi uNkulunkulu wakho ngenhliziyo yakho yonke, langomphefumulo wakho wonke, langengqondo yakho yonke, langamandla akho wonke. Yilo umlayo owokuqala.
Lowesibili uyafanana, yilo: Wothanda umakhelwane wakho njengalokhu uzi thanda wena. Kawukho omunye umlayo omkhulu kulale.
Umbhali wasesithi kuye: Kuhle, Mfundisi, utsho okuqotho ukuthi kuloNkulunkulu oyedwa, langaphandle kwakhe kakho omunye;
lokumthanda ngenhliziyo yonke.
UJesu esembona ukuthi uphendule ngenhlakanipho, wathi kuye: Kawukhatshana lombuso kaNkulunkulu.
UJesu, wasephendula wathi: Batsho njani ababhali ukuthi uKristu uyindodana kaDavida?
Ngoba uDavida uqobo lwakhe ngoMoya oyiNgcwele wathi: INkosi yathi eNkosini yami: Hlala ngakwesokunene sami, ngize ngibeke izitha zakho zibe yisenabelo senyawo zakho.
Ngakho uDavida uqobo lwakhe umbiza ngokuthiyiNkosi; pho uyindodana yakhe njani? Lexuku elikhulu lamuzwa ngokuthokoza.
Wasesithi kubo ekufundiseni kwakhe,
lezihlalo eziqakathekileyo emasinagogeni;
abadla izindlu zabafelokazi, bekhuleka isikhathieside ngokuzenzisa; laba bazakwemukela ukulahlwa okukhulu.
UJesu wasehlala phansi; labanothileyo abanengi baphosela okunengi.
Kwasekufika umfelokazi othile ongumyanga waphosela inhlamvana ezimbili ezincane zemali, ezenza indibilitshi.
Wasebizela kuye abafundi bakhe, wathi kubo: Ngiqinisile ngithi kini: Lumfelokazi ongumyanga uphosele okwedlula bonke;
ngoba bonke baphosele kokunengi kwabo; kodwa yena ebuyangeni bakhe.
Kwathi ephuma ethempelini, omunye wabafundi bakhe wathi kuye: Mfundisi, khangela, amatshe anjani lezakhiwo ezinjani!
UJesu wasephendula wathi kuye: Uyabona lezizakhiwo ezinkulu yini? Akusoze kutshiywe ilitshe phezu kwelitshe, elingasoze lidilizelwe phansi.
Esehlezi entabeni yeMihlwathi maqondana lethempeli, uPetro loJakobe loJohane loAndreya bambuza bebodwa,
bathi: Sitshele, lezizinto zizakuba nini? Lesibonakaliso siyini lapho sezizapheleliswa lezizinto zonke?
UJesu ebaphendula waseqala ukuthi: Qaphelani kungabi khona oliduhisayo.
Ngoba abanengi bazakuza ngebizo lami, besithi: Mina ngingu ye; futhi baduhise abanengi.
Kodwa nxa lisizwa ngezimpi lamahungahunga ezimpi, lingethuki; ngoba kufanele kwenzeke; kodwa ukuphela kakukabi khona.
Ngoba isizwe sizavukela isizwe, lombuso u vuk ele umbuso; njalo kuzakuba khona ukuzamazama komhlaba indawo ngendawo, njalo kuzakuba khona indlala lezinhlupheko; lezizinto ziyikuqala kwemihelo.
Kodwa ziqapheleni lina.
Kodwa ivangeli limele ukutshunyayelwa kuqala kuzo zonke izizwe.
Kodwa nxa be li donsa belinikela, lingakhathaleli ngaphambili elizakukhuluma, linganakani; kodwa loba yini elizayinikwa ngalelohola, ikhulumeni; ngoba kakusini elikhulumayo, kodwa uMoya oyiNgcwele.
Futhi umfowabo uzanikela umfowabo ekufeni, loyise umntwana; labantwana bazavukela abazali, besebebabulala;
njalo lizazondwa yibo bonke ngenxa yebizo lami; kodwa ophikelelayo kuze kube sekupheleni, nguye ozasindiswa.
Kodwa nxa libona amanyala encithakalo, akhulunywa nguDaniyeli umprofethi, emi lapho angafanele khona (ofundayo kaqedisise), khona labo abaseJudiya kababalekele ezintabeni;
lophezu kophahla lwendlu angehleli endlini, angangeni ukuthatha ulutho endlini yakhe;
losemasimini angabuyeli emuva, ukuyathatha isembatho sakhe.
Kodwa maye kwabakhulelweyo labamunyisayo ngalezonsuku!
Kodwa khulekani ukuthi ukubaleka kwenu kungabi sebusika.
Ngoba nga lezonsuku kuzakuba khona ukuhlupheka, okungazanga kube khona kusukela ekuqaleni kokudaliweyo uNkulunkulu akudalayo kuze kube khathesi, lokungasoze kwaba khona.
Njalo uba iNkosi ibingazifinyezanga lezonsuku, bekungesindiswe nyama; kodwa ngenxa yabakhethiweyo, ebakhethileyo, izifinyezile insuku.
Langalesosikhathi nxa umuntu esithi kini: Khangelani, nangu uKristu; kumbe: Khangelani, ulaphayana; lingakholwa;
ngoba kuzavuka okristu bamanga labaprofethi bamanga, besebesenza izibonakaliso lezimangaliso, ukuduhisa, nxa kungenzeka, labakhethiweyo.
Kodwa qaphelani lina; khangelani, se ngilitshelile konke ngaphambili.
Kodwa ngalezonsuku, emva kwalokhokuhlupheka, ilanga lizafiphazwa, lenyanga kayiyikupha ukukhanya kwayo,
lenkanyezi zezulu zizabe zisiwa, lamandla asemazulwini azazanyazanyiswa.
Khona-ke bezabona iNdodana yomuntu isiza emayezini ilamandla amakhulu lenkazimulo,
khona-ke izathuma ingilosi zayo, ibisiqoqa abakhethiweyo bayo emimoyeni yomine, kusukela emkhawulweni womhlaba kuze kube semkhawulweni wezulu.
Fundani-ke umfanekiso emkhiweni; nxa ugatsha lwawo selusiba buthakathaka luhlume amahlamvu, liyazi ukuthi ihlobo seliseduze;
ngokunjalo lani, nxa libona lezizinto zisenzeka, yazini ukuthi kuseduze kuseminyango.
Ngiqinisile ngithi kini: Lesisizukulwana asisoze sidlule, zize zenzeke izinto zonke lezi.
Kuzadlula izulu lomhlaba; kodwa amazwi ami awasoze adlule.
Kodwa lolosuku lalelohola kakho owaziyo ngakho, ngitsho lengilosi ezisezulwini.
Qaphelani.
Njengomuntu owasuka elizweni lakibo watshiya indlu yakhe, wanika inceku zakhe amandla, kuleyo laleyo umsebenzi wayo.
Ngakho lindani;
hlezi ifike ilijume, ilifice lilele.
Lalokhu engikutsho kini ngikutsho kubo bonke: Lindani.
Kwathi emva kwensuku ezimbili kwaba khona iphasika l omkhosi wesinkwa esingelamvubelo; abapristi abakhulu lababhali basebedinga ukuthi bangambamba njani ngobuqili ba m bulale;
kodwa bathi: Kungabi ngomkhosi, hlezi kube lesiphithiphithi sabantu.

Kwathi eseBethani, endlini kaSimoni umlephero, ehlezi ekudleni, kwafika owesifazana ephethe umfuma we-alibasta wamagcobo awenadi uqobo aligugu elikhulu; wasephahlaza umfuma we-alibasta, wa wa thela ekhanda lakhe.
Kwakukhona abanye abathukuthelayo ngaphakathi kwabo, besithi: Kwenzelwani ukumotshwa kwalamagcobo?
Ngoba la abengathengiswa ngemaliedlula odenariyo abangamakhulu amathathu, besekunikwa abayanga. Basebemsola.
Kodwa uJesu wathi: Myekeleni; limhluphelani? Wenze umsebenzi omuhle kimi.
Ngoba abayanga lihlala lilabo, futhi uba lithanda lingabenzela okuhle; kodwa mina kalihlali lilami.
Yena wenzile abengakwenza; uqalile ngaphambili ukuwugcobela ukungcwatshwa umzimba wami.
Ngiqinisile ngithi kini: Loba ngaphi emhlabeni wonke lapho okuzatshunyayelwa khona lelivangeli, lalokhu akwenzileyo kuzakhulunywa ngakho kube yisikhumbuzo ngaye.
UJudasi Iskariyothi, omunye wabalitshumi lambili, wasesiya kubapristi abakhulu, ukuze amnikele kubo.
Futhi sebezwile bathokoza, bathembisa ukumnika imali; wasedinga ukuthi angamnikela njani kuhle.
Kwathi ngosuku lokuqala lwesinkwa esingelamvubelo, ababehlaba ngalo iphasika, abafundi bakhe bathi kuye: Uthanda ukuthi siyelungisa ngaphi ukuze udle iphasika?
Wasethuma ababili kubafundi bakhe, wathi kubo: Hambani liye emzini, njalo umuntu uzahlangana lani ethwele imbiza yamanzi; limlandele,
njalo loba kungaphi azangena khona, kalibokuthi kumninindlu: UMfundisi uthi: Ingaphi indlu yezihambi, lapho engingadlela khona iphasika labafundi bami?
Futhi yena uzalitshengisa indlu enkulu ephezulu eyendlelweyo elungisiweyo; silungiseleni khona.
Abafundi bakhe basebephuma, bangena emzini, bathola kunjengokutsho kwakhe kubo; basebelungisa iphasika.
Kwathi sekukusihlwa wafika labalitshumi lambili.
Sebehlezi besidla, uJesu wathi: Ngiqinisile ngithi kini: Omunye wenu, odla lami, uzanginikela.
Basebeqala ukudabuka, bathi kuye ngamunye ngamunye: Yimi yini? Lomunye: Yimi yini?
Kodwa waphendula wathi kubo: Ng omunye wabalitshumi lambili, otsheba kanye lami emganwini.
Sibili iNdodana yomuntu ihamba, njengokulotshiweyo ngayo; kodwa maye kulowomuntu enikelwa nguye iNdodana yomuntu! Bekungakuhle kuye aluba lowomuntu wayengazalwanga.
Kwathi besidla, uJesu wathatha isinkwa, wa si busisa wa si hlephula, wabanika, wathi: Thathani, lidle; lokhu kungumzimba wami.
Wasethatha inkezo, esebongile wabanika; basebenatha kuyo bonke.
Wasesithi kubo: Leli ligazi lami, elesivumelwano esitsha, elichithelwa abanengi.
Ngiqinisile ngithi kini: Angisayikunatha okwesithelo sevini, kuze kufikelolosuku engizasinatha ngalo sisitsha embusweni kaNkulunkulu.
Kwathi sebehlabele ingoma yokudumisa baphuma baya entabeni yeMihlwathi.
UJesu wasesithi kubo: Lonke lizakhubeka ngami ngalobubusuku; ngoba kulotshiwe ukuthi: Ngizatshaya umelusi, izimvu besezihlakazeka.
Kodwa emva kokuvuswa kwami, ngizalandulela ukuya eGalili.
Kodwa uPetro wathi kuye: Lanxa bonke bezakhubeka, kodwa hatshi mina.
UJesu wasesithi kuye: Ngiqinisile ngithi kuwe: Lamuhla ngalobubusuku, lingakakhali kabili iqhude, uzangiphika kathathu.
Kodwa waqinisa ngamandla esithi: Loba kudingeka ngife lawe, angisoze ngikuphike. Basebesitsho njalo labo bonke.
Basebefika endaweni ebizo layo yiGetsemane; wasesithi kubafundi bakhe: Hlalani phansi lapha, ngisa ya khuleka.
Wasethatha kanye laye uPetro loJakobe loJohane, waseqala ukudatshulwa sibili lokukhathazeka kakhulu.
Wasesithi kubo: Umphefumulo wami udabukile kakhulu kuze kube sekufeni; hlalani lapha lilinde.
Waseqhubeka ibangana, wawela emhlabathini, wakhuleka ukuthi, uba kungenzeka, kudlule kuye lelihola.
Wasesithi: Abha, Baba.
Wasesiza, wabafica belele, wathi kuPetro: Simoni, ulele yini? Ubungelinde yini ihola libe linye?
Lindani likhuleke, ukuze lingangeni ekulingweni. Umoya uyavuma-ke, kodwa inyama ibuthakathaka.
Wasebuya wahamba wa ya khuleka, esitsho wona lawomazwi.
Wasebuya wabafica futhi belele; ngoba amehlo abo ayenzima, kodwa babengazi ukuthi bazamphendula bathi ni.
Wasesiza ngokwesithathu, wathi kubo: Qhubekani lilele-ke liphumule. Kwanele; ihola selifikile; khangelani, iNdodana yomuntu iyanikelwa ezandleni zezoni.
Sukumani, sihambe; khangelani, onginikelayo useduze.
Kwathi esakhuluma, wahle wafika uJudasi, omunye wabalitshumi lambili, njalo elexuku elikhulu elilezinkemba lezinduku, livela kubapristi abakhulu lababhali labadala.
Lomnikelayo wayebanike isiboniso, esithi: Lowo engizamanga, nguye; limbambe, li m qhube li m qinise.
Esefikile, wahle wasondela kuye wathi: Rabi, Rabi! Wasemanga.
Basebemdumela, bambamba.
Lomunye kwababemi khona wakhokha inkemba wagadla inceku yompristi omkhulu, waquma indlebe yayo.
UJesu wasephendula wathi kubo: Liphume njengokuyamelana lomphangi yini lilezinkemba lezinduku ukuzangibamba?
Bengilani insuku ngensuku ethempelini ngifundisa, kodwa kalingibambanga; kodwa lokhu kwenzekeukuze kugcwaliseke imibhalo.
Bonke basebemtshiya babaleka.
Lejaha elithile lamlandela, lembethe ilembu elicolekileyo emzimbenionqunu. Aselibamba amajaha;
laselitshiya ilembu elicolekileyo lababalekela linqunu.
Basebemqhuba uJesu bamusakumpristi omkhulu; basebebuthana kuye abapristi abakhulu bonke labadala lababhali.
UPetro wasemlandela ekhatshana waze waba phakathi kweguma lompristi omkhulu; wayehlezi kanye lezinceku, esotha umlilo.
Labapristi abakhulu lomphakathi wonke badinga ubufakazi ngoJesu, ukuze bambulale; kodwa kababutholanga.
Ngoba abanengi bafakaza amanga ngaye, kodwa lobubufakazi kabuvumelananga.
Kwasekusukuma abanye bafakaza amanga amelana laye besithi:
Thina samuzwa esithi: Mina ngizadiliza lelithempeli ngensuku ezintathu.
Loba kunjalo ubufakazi babo kabuvumelananga.
Kwasekusukuma umpristi omkhulu phakathi kwabowambuza uJesu, esithi: Kawuphenduli lutho yini? Bafakazani laba okumelana lawe?
Kodwa wathula, kaphendulanga lutho. Umpristi omkhulu wabuya wambuza, wathi kuye: Wena unguKristu, iNdodana yoBusisiweyo yini?
UJesu wasesithi: Mina nginguye. Njalo lizabona iNdodana yomuntu ihlezi ngakwesokunene samandla, isiza ngamayezi ezulu.
Umpristi omkhulu wasedabula izembatho zakhe wathi: Sisaswelelani abafakazi?
Liyizwile inhlamba; licabangani? Bonke basebemlahla ukuthi ulecala lokufa.
Abanye basebeqala ukumkhafulela amathe, lokumgubuzela ubuso, lokumdutshuza.
UPetro esegumeni ngaphansi;
isibona uPetro esotha, yamkhangela yathi: Lawe ubulomNazaretha, uJesu.
Kodwa waphika, wathi: Kangikwazi, futhi kangikuqedisisi okutshoyo. Wasephuma phandle, waya entubeni; laselikhala iqhude.
Njalo incekukazi encane imbona yabuya yaqala ukutsho kwababemi khona ukuthi: Lo ungo munyewabo.
Kodwa wabuya waphika. Kwathi emva kwesikhatshana futhi labo ababemi khona bathi kuPetro: Ngeqiniso ungo munyewabo; ngoba lawe ungumGalili.
Waseqala ukuqalekisa lokufunga esithi: Kangimazi lumuntu elimtshoyo.
Iqhude laselikhala ngokwesibili. UPetro wasekhumbula ilizwi uJesu ayelitshilo kuye lokuthi: Lingakakhali kabili iqhude, uzangiphika kathathu. Esenakane ngalokhu wakhala.
Kwathi khonokho ekuseni kakhulu abapristi abakhulu benza umhlangano kanye labadala lababhali.
UPilatu wasembuza wathi: Wena uyiNkosi yamaJuda yini? Wasemphendula wathi kuye: Uyatsho wena.
Abapristi abakhulu basebemmangalela ngezinto ezinengi; kodwa yena kaphendulanga lutho.
UPilatu wasebuya embuza, wathi: Kawuphenduli lutho yini? Khangela, zingaki izinto abazifakazayo ezimelana lawe.
Kodwa uJesu kabesaphendula lutho, waze wamangala uPilatu.
Langomkhosi wayebakhululela isibotshwa esisodwa, loba yisiphi abasicelayo.
Kwakukhona umuntuothiwa nguBarabasi, owayebotshiwe lalabo ababevukele umbuso laye, ababebulele ekuvukeleni umbuso.
Ixuku laselimemeza laqala ukucela ukuthi alenzele njengezikhathi zonke.
UPilatu wasebaphendula, wathi: Lithanda ukuthi ngilikhululele iNkosi yamaJuda yini?
Ngoba wayekwazi ukuthi ngomona abapristi abakhulu bamnikele.
Kodwa abapristi abakhulu bavusa ixuku, ukuthi kungcono alikhululele uBarabasi.
UPilatu wasephendula wathi futhi kubo: Pho lifuna ngimenzeni lo elithi uyiNkosi yamaJuda?
Basebememeza futhi bathi: Mbethele!
Kodwa uPilatu wathi kubo: Ngoba wenze ububi bani? Kodwa bamemeza kakhulu bathi: Mbethele!
Khona uPilatu ethanda ukukholisa ixuku, wabakhululela uBarabasi; kodwa wamnikela uJesu, ese m tshaye ngesiswepu, ukuthi abethelwe.
Abebutho basebemngenisa,
bamgqokisa okuyibubende, sebeluke umqhele wameva bamethesa,
baqala ukumbingelela besithi: Bayethe, Nkosi yamaJuda!
Batshaya ikhanda lakhe ngomhlanga, bamkhafulela amathe, baguqa ngamadolo bamkhonza.
Sebemklolodele, bamhlubula okuyibubende, bamgqokisa ezakhe izembatho. Basebemusa phandle ukuze bambethele.
Babamba ngamandla omunye owayesedlula othiwanguSimoni umKurene, evela emaphandleni, uyise kaAleksandro, ukuthi athwale isiphambano sakhe.
Basebemusa endaweni.
Basebemnika iwayini lixutshaniswe lenhlaka ukuthi alinathe; kodwa kalemukelanga.
Sebembethele, babelana izembatho zakhe, benza inkatho yokuphosa ngazo, ukuthi ngamunye uzathathani.
Kwakulihola lesithathu, njalo bambethela.
Futhi kwakulombhalo wecala lakhe elalibhalwe phezulu usithi: INKOSI YAMAJUDA.
Njalo babethela kanye laye abaphangi ababili, omunye ngakwesokunene lomunye ngakwesokhohlo sakhe.
Wasugcwaliseka umbhalo othi: Futhi wabalwa kanye lezoni.
Labedlulayo bamhlambaza, benikina amakhanda abo, besithi: Hiya, wena odiliza ithempeli, ulakhe ngensuku ezintathu,
zisindise, wehle esiphambanweni.
Langokunjalo abapristi abakhulu labo bakloloda kanye lababhali bathi omunye komunye: Wasindisa abanye, angezisindise yena.
UKristu iNkosi yakoIsrayeli kehle khathesi esiphambanweni, ukuze sibone sikholwe. Lababebethelwe kanye laye bamklolodela.
Kwathi sekufike ihola lesithupha, kwaba khona ubumnyama phezu komhlaba wonke kwaze kwaba lihola lesificamunwemunye.
Ngehola lesificamunwemunye uJesu wamemeza ngelizwi elikhulu, wathi, "Eloyi, Eloyi, lama sabaktani?" Okuyikuthi ngokuphendulelwa: Nkulunkulu wami, Nkulunkulu wami, ungitshiyeleni?
Labanye kwababemi khona besizwa bathi: Khangelani, ubiza uElija.
Wasegijima omunye, wagcwalisa uzipho ngeviniga, waluhloma emhlangeni, wamnika ukuthi anathe, esithi: Yekelani, sibone uba uElija uzakuza amethule.
UJesu wasememeza ngelizwi elikhulu waphefumula okokucina.
Leveyili lethempeli ladatshulwa laba zincezuezimbili laqala phezulu lisiya phansi.
Kwathi induna yekhulu eyayimi maqondana laye ibona ukuthi ukhale njalo, waphefumula okokucina, yathi: Ngeqiniso lumuntu ubeyiNdodana kaNkulunkulu.
Kwakukhona labesifazana bebukele bekhatshana, okwakukhona phakathi kwabo loMariya Magadalena, loMariya unina kaJakobe omncinyane lokaJose, loSalome,
(labo ababemlandela, eseseGalili, bemncedisa), labanye abesifazana abanengi abenyukela eJerusalema laye.
Kwathi sekuhlwile,
wafika uJosefa owayevela eArimathiya, ilunga; wangena ngesibindi kuPilatu, wacela isidumbu sikaJesu.
UPilatu wasemangala ngokuthi usefile; wabizela kuye induna yekhulu, wayibuza ukuthi kambe sekuyisikhathi efile.
Esazisiwe yinduna yekhulu, wamnika uJosefa isidumbu.
Wasethenga ilembu elicolekileyo, wamethula, wamgoqela ngelembu elicolekileyo, wambeka engcwabeni elaligujwe edwaleni; wagiqela ilitshe emnyango wengcwaba.
Futhi uMariya Magadalena loMariya uninakaJose babona lapho ayebekwa khona.
Isabatha selidlulile.
Kwathi ekuseni kakhulu ngo sukulokuqala lweviki beza engcwabeni.
Basebekhulumisana besithi: Ngubani ozasigiqela ilitshe lisuke emnyango wengcwaba?
Futhi bathi ukukhangela babona ilitshe seligiqwe lasuswa; ngoba lalilikhulu kakhulu.
Kuthe bengena engcwabeni.
Kodwa lathi kubo: Lingesabi; lidinga uJesu umNazaretha obebethelwe; uvukile, kakho lapha; khangelani, indawo lapho abebembeke khona.
Kodwa hambani, litshele abafundi bakhe loPetro ukuthi uzalandulela ukuya eGalili.
Basebephuma ngokuphangisa babaleka engcwabeni; futhi ukuqhuqha lokwethuka kwababamba; futhi kabakhulumanga lutho emuntwini, ngoba babesesaba.
Kwathi uJesuesevukile ekuseni kakhulu ngolokuqala lweviki.
Yena wasuka wababikela labo ababelaye.
Labo sebezwile ukuthi uyaphila lokuthi ubonwe nguye, kabakholwanga.
Njalo emva kwalezizinto wabonakala ngesinye isimo.
Labo bahamba babikela abanye; lalabo kababakholwanga.
Emva kwalokhu wabonakala kwabalitshumi lanye.
Wasesithi kubo: Hambani liye emhlabeni wonke.
Lowo okholwayo.
Lalezizibonakaliso zizabalandela abakholwayo;
bazadobha izinyoka; uba benatha loba yikuphi okubulalayo.
Ngakho iNkosi, emva kokuthi isikhulumile labo.
Bona basebephuma batshumayela endaweni zonke, iNkosi isebenza la bo. Ameni.
Njengoba abanengi sebebeke izandla ukubeka ngendlela efaneleyo ukulandiswa kwezinto eziqiniseke ngokupheleleyo phakathi kwethu,
njengalokhu basinika,
kukhanye kukuhle lakimi,
ukuze wazi iqiniso ngalezozinto.
Ensukwini zikaHerodi inkosi yeJudiya kwakukhona umpristi othile othiwa nguZakariya; lomkakhe wayevela kumadodakazi kaAroni, lebizo lakhe linguElizabethi.
Njalo babelungile bobabili phambi kukaNkulunkulu.
Njalo babengelamntwana, ngoba uElizabethi wayeyinyumba.
Kwasekusithi esenza inkonzo yobupristi phambi kukaNkulunkulu esesimisweni seqembu lakibo,
ngomkhuba wenkonzo yobupristi.
Njalo ixuku lonke labantu.
Ingilosi yeNkosi yasibonakala kuye.
Kwathi uZakariya e yi bona waqhuqha, lokwesaba kwawela phezu kwakhe.
Kodwa ingilosi yathi kuye: Ungesabi Zakariya; ngoba umkhuleko wakho uzwakele, lomkakho uElizabethi uzakuzalela indodana, njalo uzakuthi ibizo layo nguJohane.
Futhi uzakuba lenjabulo lentokozo, labanengi bazakujabulela ukuzalwa kwakhe.
Ngoba uzakuba mkhulu phambi kweNkosi, iwayini kanye lokunathwayo okulamandla.
Labanengi kubantwana bakoIsrayeli uzabaphendulela eNkosini uNkulunkulu wabo;
njalo yena uzahamba phambi kwayo emoyeni lemandleni kaElija.
UZakariya wasesithi kuyo ingilosi: Ngizakwazi ngani lokhu.
Ingilosi yasiphendula yathi kuye: NginguGabriyeli.
Njalo khangela, uzakuba yisimungulu njalo wehluleke ukukhuluma, kuze kube lusuku okuzakwenzeka ngalolezizinto, ngenxa yokuthi ungakholwanga amazwi ami, azagcwaliseka ngesikhathi sawo.
Labantu babemlindele uZakariya; bamangala ngokuphuza kwakhe ethempelini.
Kuthe esephuma wehluleka ukukhuluma labo; njalo bazi ukuthi ubone umbono ethempelini.
Kwasekusithi seziphelile insuku.
Kwathi emva kwalezonsuku uElizabethi umkakhe wathatha isisu, wazifihla okwezinyanga ezinhlanu, esithi:
Yenze kanje kimi iNkosi ensukwini eya ngi khangela ngazo.
Kwathi ngenyanga yesithupha,
entombini eyayigane indoda, ebizo layo lalinguJosefa; lebizo lentombi linguMariya.
Ingilosi yasingena kuye yathi: Ekuhle, wena othandiweyo.
Kwathi ese yi bonile wethuswa kakhulu yilizwi layo.
Ingilosi yasisithi kuye: Ungesabi, Mariya; ngoba uthole uthando kuNkulunkulu.
Njalo khangela, uzathatha isisu, uzale indodana.
Yena uzakuba mkhulu, uzabizwa ngokuthiyiNdodana yoPhezukonke,
njalo uzabusa phezu kwendlu kaJakobe kuze kube nininini, langombuso wakhe kawuzukuba lokuphela.
UMariya wasesithi kuyo ingilosi: Lokhu kungenzeka njani, njengoba ngingazi indoda?
Ingilosi yasiphendula yathi kuye: UMoya oNgcwele uzakuza phezu kwakho.
Njalo khangela, isinini sakho uElizabethi, laye ukhulelwe yindodana ebudaleni bakhe.
Ngoba kuNkulunkulu kakulalutho oluzakwehlula.
UMariya wasesithi: Khangela, incekukazi yeNkosi; kakube kimi njengelizwi lakho. Ingilosi yasisuka kuye.
Ngalezonsuku uMariya wasesukuma waya ezintabeni,
wangena endlini kaZakariya, wabingelela uElizabethi.
Kwasekusithi uElizabethi ezwe ukubingelela kukaMariya, inkonyane yeqa esiswini sakhe; loElizabethi wagcwaliswa ngoMoya oNgcwele,
wamemeza ngelizwi elikhulu, wathi: Ubusisiwe wena phakathi kwabesifazana, njalo sibusisiwe isithelo sesizalo sakho!
Kanti kuvela ngaphi lokhu kimi?
Ngoba khangela, kuthe ilizwi lokubingelela kwakho lifika endlebeni zami, umntwana weqa esiswini sami ngokuthokoza.
Futhi ubusisiwe.
UMariya wasesithi: Umphefumulo wami,
lomoya wami uyathokoza,
ngoba ukhangele ubuphansi bencekukazi yakhe.
Ngoba yena olamandla ungenzele,
lesihawu sakhe sikusizukulwana ngesizukulwana kulabo abamesabayo.
Wenzile amandla ngengalo yakhe.
Wehlisile.
Abalambileyo ubasuthise ngezinto ezinhle.
Umsizile uIsrayeli inceku yakhe,
njengoba watsho kubobaba bethu, kuAbrahama, lenzalweni yakhe kuze kube nininini.
UMariya wasehlala laye okungaba zinyanga ezintathu, wasebuyela endlini yakhe.
Isikhathi sikaElizabethi sokuthi abelethe sesiphelele, wasebeletha indodana.
Abakhelene laye.
Kwasekusithi ngosuku lwesificaminwembili, beza uku za soka usane.
Kodwa unina waphendula wathi: Hatshi bo, kodwa luzathiwa nguJohane.
Basebesithi kuye: Kakho ezihlotsheni zakho obizwa ngalelibizo.
Basebeqhweba uyise, ukuthi angathanda ukuthi lubizwe ngokuthini.
Wasecela into yokubhalela, wabhala, esithi: NguJohane ibizo lalo; basebemangala bonke.
Njalo wahle wavulwa umlomo wakhe.
Lokwesaba kwehlela phezu kwabo bonke abakhelene labo,
labo bonke aba zi zwayo ba zi londoloza ezinhliziyweni zabo.
LoZakariya uyise wagcwaliswa ngoMoya oNgcwele, waprofetha, esithi:
Ibusisiwe iNkosi,
yasivusela uphondo losindiso endlini kaDavida inceku yayo,
njengalokho yakhuluma ngomlomo wabaprofethi bayo abangcwele,
isikhulula ezitheni zethu, lesandleni sabo bonke abasizondayo;
ukwenzela obaba bethu,
isifungo eyasifunga kubaba wethu uAbrahama,
ukusinika, ukuthi sesikhululiwe esandleni sezitha zethu, siyikhonze si ngelakwesaba
ngobungcwele langokulunga phambi kwayo.
Lawe-ke, sane, uzabizwa ngokuthiu ngumprofethi;
lokunika isizwe sayo ulwazi losindiso ngothethelelo lwezono zabo,
ngesihelo sikaNkulunkulu wethu, okuthi ngaso ukusa kwaphezulu kusethekelele,
ukubakhanyisela.
Wakhula-ke umntwana omncane, waqina emoyeni.
Kwasekusithi ngalezonsuku, isimiso saphuma kuKesari uAgastasi.
Lokhukubhalwa kwakungokokuqala.
Bonke basebesiya ukuze ba ye bhalwa, ngulowo lalowo emzini wakibo.
LoJosefa laye wenyuka,
uku ya bhalwa kanye loMariya umkakhe ayemganile, owayezithwele.
Kwasekusithi belapho, zaseziphelela insuku zokubeletha kwakhe.
Wasebeletha indodana yakhe eyingqabutho.
Njalo kwakukhona kulelolizwe abelusi ababehlala egangeni futhi belinde umhlambi wabo ebusuku.
Njalo khangela, ingilosi yeNkosi yema eduze kwabo.
Ingilosi yasisithi kubo: Lingesabi; ngoba khangelani, ngitshumayela indaba ezinhle kini ezentokozo enkulu, ezakuba kubantu bonke;
ngoba lizalelwe lamuhla.
Njalo lokhu kuzakuba yisibonakaliso kini.
Njalo kwahle kwaba khona kanye lengilosi ixuku, lisithi:
Udumo kalube kuNkulunkulu.
Kwasekusithi, ingilosi sezisukile kubo zisiya ezulwini, abantu, abangabelusi, bakhulumisana besithi: Ake siye eBhethelehema, sibone leyonto eyenzakeleyo, iNkosi esazise yona.
Basebesiza ngokuphangisa, bathola oMariya loJosefa, losane lulele emkolweni.
Sebebonile basebesazisa indawoezizingelezeleyo ngelizwi ababelitshelwe mayelana lalo umntwana omncane.
Labo bonke aba ku zwayo bamangala ngezinto ezazikhulunywe ngabelusi kubo.
Kodwa uMariya.
Basebebuyela abelusi, bemdumisa.
Kwathi seziphelile insuku eziyisificaminwembili zokuthi umntwana omncane asokwe.
Kwathi seziphelele insuku zokuhlanjululwa kwakhe ngokomlayo kaMozisi
(njengokulotshiweyo emlayweni weNkosi ukuthi konke okwesilisa okuvula isibeletho kuzathiwa kungcwele eNkosini)
lokuthi banikele umhlatshelo njengokutshiwo emlayweni weNkosi, amajuba amabili kumbe amaphuphu amabili enkwilimba.
Njalo khangela, kwakukhona eJerusalema umuntu, obizo lakhe linguSimeyoni, njalo lumuntu wayelungile ekhuthele ekukhonzeni, loMoya oNgcwele wayephezu kwakhe.
Futhi kwakubonakalisiwe kuye nguMoya oyiNgcwele.
Wasengena ethempelini ngoMoya,
yena wasemthatha wamphatha engalweni zakhe, wabonga uNkulunkulu, wathi:
Nkosi;
ngoba amehlo ami alubonile usindiso lwakho
olulungisileyo phambi kobuso babantu bonke;
ukukhanya kokwembulela abezizwe.
UJosefa lonina basebemangala ngezinto ezatshiwo ngaye.
USimeyoni wasebabusisa, wathi kuMariya unina: Khangela, lo umiselwe;
futhi lawe, inkemba izadabula owakho umphefumulo.
Njalo kwakukhona uAna umprofethikazi, indodakazi kaFanuweli, owesizwe sikaAsheri, ebehlale lendoda iminyaka eyisikhombisa kusukela ebuntombini bakhe,
njalo wayengumfelokazi owayengaba leminyaka engamatshumi ayisificaminwembili lane, engasuki ethempelini, ekhonza.
Laye efika ngalelohola wadumisa uNkulunkulu, wakhuluma ngaye kubo bonke ababelindele.
Kwathi sebeqedile konke okungokomlayo weNkosi, babuyela eGalili.
Lomntwana omncane wakhula, waqina emoyeni, wagcwala inhlakanipho; lomusa kaNkulunkulu wawuphezu kwakhe.
Njalo abazali bakhe babesiya eJerusalema iminyaka yonke.
Kwathi eseleminyaka elitshumi lambili, sebenyukele eJerusalema njengomkhuba womkhosi,
njalo seziphelile insuku, ekubuyeleni kwabo, umntwana uJesu wasala eJerusalema; njalo uJosefa lonina bengazi;
kodwa becabanga ukuthi wayesexukwini endleleni, bahamba uhambo losuku, bamdinga phakathi kwezinini;
kodwa bengamtholi, babuyela eJerusalema, bemdinga.
Kwasekusithi emva kwensuku ezintathu, bamthola ethempelini, ehlezi phakathi.
Njalo bonke ababemuzwa.
Kwathi bembona bamangala.
Wasesithi kubo: Ku ngani lingidinga? Belingakwazi yini ukuthi kumele ukuthi ngibe sezintweni zikaBaba?
Kodwa bona kabaliqedisisanga ilizwi alikhuluma kibo.
Wasesehla labo, weza eNazaretha.
UJesu waseqhubeka enhlakanipheni.
Kwathi ngomnyaka wetshumi lanhlanu wokubusa kukaTiberiyosi uKesari,
uAnasi.
Wasesiza esigabeni sonke seJodani esizingelezeleyo, etshumayela ubhabhathizo lokuphenduka kube yikuthethelelwa kwezono;
njengokulotshiweyo egwalweni lwamazwi kaIsaya umprofethi, ukuthi: Ilizwi lomemezayo enkangala lithi: Lungisani indlela yeNkosi; qondisani indledlana zayo.
Sonke isigodi sizagqitshwa, layo yonke intaba loqaqa kuzakwehliswa; njalo kuzaqondiswa amazombazombe, lamaxhakaxhaka ezindlela azalungiswa;
layo yonke inyama.
Ngakho wathi emaxukwini aphumela ukubhabhathizwa nguye: Nzalo yezinyoka, ngubani olixwayise ukubalekela ulaka oluzayo?
Ngakho thelani izithelo ezifanele ukuphenduka; njalo lingaqali ukuthi phakathi kwenu.
Lakhathesi lehloka selibekiwe empandeni zezihlahla; ngakho sonke isihlahla esingatheli isithelo esihle siyaganyulwa siphoselwe emlilweni.
Amaxuku asembuza, athi: Pho thina sizakwenzani?
Wasephendula wathi kubo: Olezembatho ezimbili, kamuphe ongelaso; lolokudla kenze njalo.
Kwasekufika labathelisi ukuze babhabhathizwe?
Wasesithi kubo: Lingabizi okwedlula elikumiselweyo.
Lamabutho lawo ambuza, athi: Thina-ke sizakwenzani.
Kwathi abantu belindile, futhi bonke bezibuza enhliziyweni zabo ngoJohane, ukuthi kambe yena angaba enguKristu,

uJohane waphendula, esithi kubo bonke: Mina-ke ngilibhabhathiza ngamanzi; kodwa uyeza olamandla kulami, engingafanele ukuthukulula umchilo wamanyathela akhe; yena uzalibhabhathiza ngoMoya oNgcwele langomlilo;
okhomane lwakhe lokwela lusesandleni sakhe, njalo uzahlambululisisa isibuya sakhe, abesebuthela amabele esiphaleni sakhe, kodwa amakhoba uzawatshisa ngomlilo ongacitshekiyo.
Langokulaya ngezinye izinto ezinengi, watshumayela ivangeli ebantwini.
Kodwa, langakho konke okubi ayekwenzile uHerodi,
wengezelela lalokhu phezu kwakho konke, ukuthi wamvalela uJohane entolongweni.
Kwasekusithi sebebhabhathiziwe bonke abantu, laye uJesu esebhabhathiziwe, izulu lavulwa,
uMoya oyiNgcwele wasesehlela phezu kwakhe elesimo somzimba onjengowejuba, lelizwi lavela ezulwini, lisithi: Wena uyiNdodana yami ethandekayo, ngithokoza ngawe.
Yena uJesu waseqala ukuba leminyaka engaba ngamatshumi amathathu, kaEli,
kaMathati, kaLevi, kaMeliki, kaJanayi, kaJosefa,
kaMatathiya, kaAmosi, kaNahume, kaEseli, kaNagayi,
kaMahati, kaMatathiya, kaSemeyini, kaJosefa, kaJuda,
kaJohana, kaResa, kaNeri,
kaMeliki, kaAdi, kaKosamu, kaElimodamu, kaEri,
kaJose, kaEliyezeri, kaJorima, kaMathati, kaLevi,
kaSimeyoni, kaJuda, kaJosefa, kaJonanu, kaEliyakhimi,
kaMeleya, kaMena, kaMathata, kaNathani,
kaJese, kaObedi, kaBowosi, kaSalimoni, kaNashoni,
kaAminadaba, kaAramu, kaEsiromu, kaFaresi, kaJuda,
kaJakobe, kaIsaka, kaAbrahama, kaThara, kaNahori,
kaSarugi, kaRagawu, kaFaleki, kaEberi, kaSala,
kaKayinani, kaArpakishadi, kaShemu, kaNowe, kaLameki,
kaMethusala, kaEnoki, kaJaredi, kaMaleleyeli, kaKayinani,
kaEnosi, kaSeti, kaAdamu.
Kwathi uJesu egcwele uMoya oNgcwele,
walingwa ngudiyabhola insuku ezingamatshumi amane. Njalo kadlanga lutho ngalezonsuku; kwathi seziphelile, ekucineni walamba.
Udiyabhola wasesithi kuye: Uba uyiNdodana kaNkulunkulu, tshono kulelilitshe ukuthi libe yisinkwa.
UJesu wasemphendula, wathi: Kulotshiwe, ukuthi umuntu kayikuphila ngesinkwa sodwa, kodwa ngalo lonke ilizwi likaNkulunkulu.
Udiyabhola wasemkhokhelela entabeni ende.
Udiyabhola wasesithi kuye: Amandla wonke la lobukhosi bayo ngizakunika.
Ngakho wena uba ukhonza phambi kwami, konke kuzakuba ngokwakho.
UJesu wasemphendula wathi: Suka ngemva kwami, Sathane; ngoba kulotshiwe ukuthi: Uzakhothamela eNkosini uNkulunkulu wakho, njalo umkhonze yena yedwa.
Wasemkhokhelela eJerusalema, wammisa engqongeni yethempeli, wasesithi kuye: Uba uyiNdodana kaNkulunkulu, ziwisele phansi usuka lapha;
ngoba kulotshiwe ukuthi: Uzalaya ingilosi zakhe ngawe, ukukulondoloza;
lokuthi: Zizakuphatha ngezandla, hlezi loba nini ukhube unyawo lwakho elitsheni.
UJesu wasephendula wathi kuye: Kuthiwa: Ungayilingi iNkosi uNkulunkulu wakho.
Udiyabhola eseqedile ukulinga konke, wasuka kuye kwaze kwaba ngesinyeisikhathi.
UJesu wasebuyela.
Yena wasefundisa emasinagogeni abo.
Wasefika.
Wasenikwa ugwalo lomprofethi uIsaya, wayithola indawo okubhalwe kuyo ukuthi:
UMoya weNkosi uphezu kwami, ngakho ingigcobile ukuthi ngitshumayele ivangeli kubayanga; ingithumile ukusilisa abadabukileyo enhliziyweni; ukumemezela ukukhululwa kwabathunjiweyo,
ukumemezela.
Waselugoqa ugwalo.
Waseqala ukuthi kubo: Lamuhla lumbhalo ugcwalisekile endlebeni zenu.
Labo bonke bafakaza ngaye, bamangala ngamazwi omusa aphuma emlonyeni wakhe?
Wasesithi kubo: Isibili lizakutsho kimi lesisaga: Melaphi, zelaphe wena.
Wathi-ke: Ngiqinisile ngithi kini: Kakho umprofethi.
Kodwa ngeqiniso ngithi kini: Abafelokazi abanengi;
kodwa uElija kathunyelwanga lakomunye wabo, ngaphandle kweSarepita.
Futhi amalephero amanengi.
Kwathi bonke ababesesinagogeni bagcwala ulaka, bezizwa lezizinto,
basebesukuma, bamkhuphela ngaphandle komuzi, bamqhubela eliweni lentaba umuzi wabo owawakhiwe phezu kwayo, ukuze bamphosele phansi eliweni.
Kodwa yena edabula phakathi kwabo wahamba.
Wasesehlela eKapenawume umuzi weGalili; njalo wayebafundisa ngamasabatha.
Basebebabaza ngemfundiso yakhe.
Futhi kwakukhona esinagogeni umuntu owayelomoya wedimoni ongcolileyo, wasememeza ngelizwi elikhulu
wathi: Yekela! Silani lawe, Jesu mNazaretha? Uze ukusibhubhisa yini? Ngiyakwazi wena ukuthi ungubani: ONgcwele kaNkulunkulu.
UJesu wasemkhuza, esithi: Thula, uphume kuye! Ledimoni selimwisele phakathi laphuma kuye, lingamlimazanga.
Kwasekubafikela bonke ukumangala, bakhulumisana, besithi: Yilizwi bani leli, ukuthi ngegunya langamandla uyalaya omoya abangcolileyo, baphume?
Yasiphuma indumela yakhe kuyo yonke indawo yesigaba esizingelezeleyo.
Wasesukuma; njalo uninazala kaSimoni wayebanjwe luqhuqho olukhulu; basebemcelela kuye.
Wasemengama, wakhuza uqhuqho, khona lwamyekela; njalo wahle wasukuma wabasebenzela.
Kwathi ekutshoneni kwelanga, bonke ababelababegula izifo ezitshiyeneyo babaletha kuye.
Kwasekuphuma lamadimoni kwabanengi ukuthi akhulume, ngoba ayemazi ukuthi unguKristu.
Kwathi sekusile, waphuma waya endaweni eyinkangala.
Kodwa wathi kuwo: Ngimele ukutshumayela ivangeli lombuso kaNkulunkulu lakweminye imizi; ngoba ngithunyelwe lokho.
Wayesetshumayela emasinagogeni eGalili.
Kwasekusithi ixuku selimminyezele ukuzwa ilizwi likaNkulunkulu;
wabona imikhumbi emibili imi eceleni kwechibi; kodwa abagoli benhlanzi babephumile kiyo behlambulula amambule.
Wasengena komunye wemikhumbi, ongokaSimoni, wamcela ukuthi asuke kancinyane emhlabathini.
Kwathi eseqedile ukukhuluma, wathi kuSimoni: Ngena enzikini, lehlise amambule enu ukuze libambe.
USimoni wasephendula wathi kuye: Nkosi.
Kwathi sebekwenzile lokho, babamba inkithinkithi enkulu yenhlanzi. Laselidabuka imbule labo.
Basebeqhweba ababehlanganyele labo.
Kuthe uSimoni Petro ebona, wawela emadolweni kaJesu.
Ngoba ukumangala kwakumbambile, labo bonke ababelaye, ngokubanjwa kwenhlanzi ababezibambile;
ngokufananayo-ke loJakobe loJohane, amadodana kaZebediya, ababehlanganyele loSimoni. UJesu wasesithi kuSimoni: Ungesabi; kusukela khathesi uzagola abantu.
Kwathi sebeyifikisile imikhumbi emhlabathini, batshiya konke, bamlandela.
Kwasekusithi, esekomunye wemizi, khangela-ke, indoda egcwele ubulephero; yathi ibona uJesu, yawa ngobuso, yamncenga, isithi: Nkosi, aluba uthanda, ungangihlambulula.
Waseselula isandla, wayithinta, esithi: Ngiyathanda, hlambuluka. Njalo bahle basuka ubulephero kuyo.
Yena waseyilaya ukuthi ingatsheli muntu; wathi: Kodwa hamba uziveze kumpristi, unikelele ukuhlanjululwa kwakho, njengoba uMozisi walaya, kube yibufakazi kubo.
Kodwa kwayilapho ukukhuluma ngaye kwanda kakhulu; lamaxuku amanengi abuthana ukulalela, lokusiliswa nguye ezifweni zawo.
Kodwa yena waphumela enkangala.
Kwasekusithi ngolunye lwezinsuku, yena wayefundisa; njalo kwakuhlezi abaFarisi labafundisi bomlayo, abavela kuyo yonke imizana yeGalili leJudiya leJerusalema; lamandla eNkosi aye khonaukubasilisa.
Njalo khangela, amadoda ethwele ngohlaka umuntu owayeyisigoga; njalo adinga ukumngenisa a m beke phambi kwakhe;
kodwa engatholi indlela yokumngenisa ngenxa yexuku.
Kwathi ebona ukholo lwawo, wathi kuye: Ndoda, izono zakho uzithethelelwe.
Ababhali labaFarisi basebeqala ukunakana, besithi: Ungubani lo okhuluma inhlamba?
Kwathi uJesu esazi ukunakana kwabo waphendula wathi kubo: Linakanani enhliziyweni zenu?
Yikuphi okulula, ukuthi: Izono zakho uzithethelelwe; kumbe ukuthi: Sukuma uhambe?
Kodwa ukuze lazi ukuthi iNdodana yomuntu ilamandla okuthethelela izono emhlabeni (wathi koyisigoga): Ngithi kuwe: Sukuma, uthathe ithala lakho, uye endlini yakho.
Njalo wahle wasukuma phambi kwabo, wathatha lokhu ayelele kukho, wasuka waya endlini yakhe.
Lokusanganiseka kwababamba bonke, basebedumisa uNkulunkulu, besithi: Sibone izimanga lamuhla.
Njalo emva kwalezizinto waphuma, wabona umthelisi, uLevi ngebizo, ehlezi endlini yokuthelisela, wathi kuye: Ngilandela.
Wasetshiya konke, wasukuma wamlandela.
ULevi wasemenzela.
Ababhali babo labaFarisi basebesola kubafundi bakhe, besithi: Kungani lisidla linatha labathelisi lezoni?
UJesu wasephendula wathi kubo: Abaphilayo kabasweli melaphi, kodwa abagulayo.
Kangizanga ukubiza abalungileyo, kodwa izoni zize ekuphendukeni.
Basebesithi; kodwa abakho bayadla banathe?
Kodwa wathi kubo: Kambe, lingabazilisa ukudla yini abantwana bendlu yomthimba, umyeni eselabo?
Kodwa zizafika insuku, lapho umyeni ezasuswa kubo, khona bezazila ukudla ngalezonsuku.
Wasebatshela futhi umfanekiso wokuthi: Kakho obekela isichibi sesembatho esitsha esembathweni esidala; uba kungenjalo, esitsha laso siyadabula, lesichibi sesitsha asihambelani lesidala.
Futhi kakho ofaka iwayini elitsha emigodleni emidala; uba-ke kungenjalo, iwayini elitsha lizadabula imigodla, lichitheke lona, lemigodla yonakale.
Kodwa iwayini elitsha limele lifakwe emigodleni emitsha, njalo kokubili kulondolozeke.
Njalo kakho othi esenathe iwayinielidala ahle afise elitsha; ngoba uthi: Elidala lingcono.
Kwasekusithi, abafundi bakhe bakha izikhwebu, badla, be zi hlikihla ngezandla.
Kodwa abathile babaFarisi bathi kubo: Lenzelani okungavunyelwa ukwenziwa ngensuku zesabatha?
UJesu wasebaphendula, wathi: Alifundanga lalokho yini, uDavida akwenzayo, mhla elambile yena lababelaye,
ukuthi wayangena njani endlini kaNkulunkulu, wathatha izinkwa zokubukiswa, wasesidla, wanika lalabo ababelaye; ezingavunyelwa ukudliwa ngaphandle kwabapristi bodwa?
Wasesithi kubo: INdodana yomuntu iyiNkosi leyesabatha.
Kwasekusithi langelinye isabatha wangena esinagogeni, wafundisa.
Ababhali labaFarisi basebemqaphela, ukuthi uzasilisa ngesabatha yini; ukuze bathole oko kumbeka icala.
Kodwa wayazi imicabango yabo, wathi kumuntu olesandla esitshwabheneyo: Sukuma, ume phakathi. Wasukuma-ke wema.
UJesu wasesithi kubo: Ngizalibuza ulutho: Kuvunyelwe yini ngamasabatha ukwenza okulungileyo kumbe ukwenza okubi? Ukusindisa impilo kumbe ukuchitha?
Wasebathalaza bonke, wathi kumuntu: Yelula isandla sakho. Wasesenza njalo. Isandla sakhe sasesisiliswa saphila njengesinye.
Basebegcwala ubuhlanya.
Kwasekusithi ngalezonsuku waphuma waya entabeni ukuyakhuleka.
Kwathi sekusile, wabizela kuye abafundi bakhe;
uSimoni laye ambiza ngokuthi nguPetro, loAndreya umfowabo, uJakobe loJohane, uFiliphu loBartolomewu,
uMathewu loTomasi, uJakobe okaAlfewu, loSimoni owayethiwa ngumZelothi,
uJudasi.
Wasesehla labo, wema esigcawini, lexuku labafundi bakhe, ababezile ukumuzwa, lokusiliswa ezifweni zabo;
lalabo ababekhathazwa ngomoya abangcolileyo, basebesiliswa.
Lexuku lonke ladinga ukumthinta.
Yena wasephakamisela amehlo akhe kubafundi bakhe wathi: Libusisiwe, bayanga, ngoba umbuso kaNkulunkulu ungowenu.
Libusisiwe, lina elilambileyo khathesi, ngoba lizasuthiswa. Libusisiwe, lina elikhalayo khathesi, ngoba lizahleka.
Libusisiwe, nxa abantu belizonda, njalo nxa belehlukanisa, belithuka, belahla ibizo lenu ngokungathi libi, ngenxa yeNdodana yomuntu.
Thokozani ngalolosuku leqe ngokuthokoza; ngoba khangelani, umvuzo wenu mkhulu ezulwini; ngoba oyise benza njalo kubaprofethi.
Kodwa maye kini.
Maye kini, lina elisuthiyo! Ngoba lizalamba.
Maye kini, nxa abantu bonke bekhuluma kuhle ngani.
Kodwa ngithi kini elizwayo: Thandani izitha zenu, lenze okuhle kwabalizondayo,
libusise abaliqalekisayo, libakhulekele abaliphatha kubi.
Okutshaya esihlathini, mnike lesinye; lokwemuka isembatho sakho, ungali lesigqoko sakho.
Kodwa mnike wonke ocela kuwe; lokwemuka okwakho, ungabuyi u ku bize kuye.
Njalo njengalokho lithanda ukuthi abantu benze kini, lani yenzani njalo kubo.
Njalo uba lithanda labo abalithandayo.
Njalo uba lisenza okuhle kulabo abenza okuhle kini, yikubongwa bani elilakho? Ngoba lezoni zenza okufananayo.
Futhi uba liseboleka labo elithemba ukwemukela kubo, yikubongwa bani elilakho? Ngoba lezoni zeboleka izoni, ukuze zemukele izinto ezifananayo.
Kodwa thandani izitha zenu.
Ngakho banini lesihawu.
Lingahluleli, njalo alisoze lahlulelwe;
phanini, lani lizaphiwa. Ngoba ngalesosilinganiso elilinganisa ngaso lizalinganiselwa ngaso futhi.
Wasebatshela umfanekiso wokuthi: Kambe isiphofu singakhokhela isiphofu yini? Kabayikuwela bobabili emgodini yini?
Umfundi kamkhulu kulomfundisi wakhe.
Njalo ukhangelelani ucezwana oluselihlweni lomfowenu, kodwa ungalunanzeleli ugodo olukwelakho ilihlo?

Kumbe ungatsho njani kumfowenu ukuthi: Mfowethu, kahle ngikhuphe ucezwana oluselihlweni lakho, wena ungaluboni ugodo oluselihlweni lakho? Mzenzisi, qala ukhuphe ugodo elihlweni lakho, khona-ke uzabona kuhle ukukhupha ucezwana oluselihlweni lomfowenu.
Ngoba kayisiso isihlahla esihle esithela isithelo esibi; futhi kayisiso isihlahla esibi esithela isithelo esihle.
Ngoba yileso laleso isihlahla saziwa ngesaso isithelo. Ngoba kabaseli imikhiwa emeveni, futhi kakukhiwa isithelo sevini evikaneni.
Umuntu olungileyo uveza okulungileyo kokuligugu elilungileyo lenhliziyo yakhe, lomuntu omubi uveza okubi kokuligugu elibi lenhliziyo yakhe.
Kodwa lingibizelani ngokuthi: Nkosi, Nkosi, kodwa lingazenzi izinto engizitshoyo?
Wonke oza kimi awezwe amazwi ami njalo awenze, ngizalitshengisa ukuthi ufanana lobani;

ufanana lomuntu owakha indlu, wagebha watshonisa, wabeka isisekelo phezu kwedwala; kwathi ekufikeni kwempophoma, umfula watshaya kuleyondlu, kodwa wawungelamandla okuyinyikinya; ngoba yayisekelwe phezu kwedwala.
Kodwa owezwayo njalo angawenzi unjengomuntu owakha indlu emhlabathini ingelasisekelo.
Kwathi eseqedile amazwi akhe wonke endlebeni zabantu, wangena eKapenawume.
Njalo inceku yenduna yekhulu ethile, eyayiligugu kuyo, yayigula isizakufa.
Kwathi isizwile ngoJesu, yathuma kuye abadala bamaJuda.
Kwathi bona, sebefikile kuJesu, bamncenga kakhulu, besithi: Yona kufanele ukuthi uyenzele lokhu;
ngoba iyasithanda isizwe sakithi, njalo yiyo eyasakhela isinagoge.
UJesu wasehamba labo. Kwathi engasekhatshana lendlu, induna yekhulu yathuma abangane kuye, isithi kuye: Nkosi, ungazikhathazi; ngoba kangifanele ukuthi ungene ngaphansi kophahla lwami;
yikho kangizibonanga ngifanele ukuza kuwe; kodwa khuluma ngelizwi, njalo inceku yami izasiliswa.
Ngoba lami ngingumuntu obekwe ngaphansi kwamandla, ngilamabutho ngaphansi kwami, njalo ngithi kuleli: Hamba, njalo lihambe; lakwelinye: Woza, njalo lize; lencekwini yami: Yenza lokhu, njalo ikwenze.
Kwathi uJesu ezizwa lezizinto wamangala ngayo, watshibilika, wathi exukwini elimlandelayo: Ngithi kini, angitholanga ukholo olungaka ngitsho lakoIsrayeli.
Kwathi ababethunyiwe sebebuyele endlini bafica inceku eyayigula isisilile.
Kwasekusithi nge langaelilandelayo, waya emzini othiwa yiNayini; abafundi bakhe abanengi basebehamba laye, lexuku elikhulu.
Kwathi esesondela esangweni lomuzi, njalo khangela, kwakulofileyo ethwelwe kuphunywa, indodana engeyodwa kanina, futhi yena engumfelokazi; lexuku elikhulu lomuzi lalilaye.
INkosi imbona, yasisiba lesihelo ngaye, yathi kuye: Ungakhali.
Yasondela yathinta ithala; aba li thweleyo basebesima!
Ofileyo wasevuka wahlala waqala ukukhuluma. Yasimnika unina.
Ukwesaba kwasekubabamba bonke.
Le indumela ngaye yasiphumela kuyo yonke iJudiya, lakuso sonke isigaba esizingelezeleyo.
Abafundi bakaJohane basebembikela ngazo zonke lezizinto.
UJohane wasebizela kuye ababili abathile kubafundi bakhe wa ba thuma kuJesu, esithi: Wena unguye ozayo yini, kumbe silindele omunye?
Lamadoda esefikile kuye athi: UJohane uMbhabhathizi usithumile kuwe, esithi: Wena unguye ozayo yini, kumbe silindele omunye?
Langalelohola wasilisa abanengi ezifweni lemikhuhlaneni lakubomoya ababi.

UJesu wasephendula wathi kubo: Hambani limtshele uJohane izinto elizibonileyo lelizizwileyo: Ukuthi iziphofu zibuye zibone, iziqhuli ziyahamba, amalephero ayahlanjululwa, izacuthe ziyezwa, abafileyo bayavuswa, abayanga bayatshunyayezwa ivangeli;
njalo ubusisiwe loba ngubani ongakhubekiyo ngami.
Kwathi sezihambile izithunywa zikaJohane, waqala ukukhuluma lamaxuku ngoJohane esithi: Laphuma laya enkangala ukuyabonani? Umhlanga onyikinywa ngumoya yini?
Kanti laphumela ukuyabonani? Umuntu owembethe izembatho ezicolekileyo yini? Khangelani, abe mbetheezikhazimulayo baphila mnandi basezindlini zamakhosi.
Pho laphumela ukuyabonani? Umprofethi yini? Yebo, ngithi kini: Loba odlula kakhulu umprofethi.
Lo nguye okubhalwe ngaye ukuthi: Khangela, mina ngiyathuma isithunywa sami phambi kobuso bakho, esizalungisa indlela yakho phambi kwakho.
Ngoba ngithi kini: Phakathi kwabazelwe ngabesifazana kakho umprofethi omkhulu kuloJohane uMbhabhathizi; kodwa omncinyane embusweni kaNkulunkulu mkhulu kulaye.
Labantu bonke bekuzwa, labathelisi, bathi ulungile uNkulunkulu;
kodwa abaFarisi lezazumthetho bemelene labo, ngoba bengabhabhathizwanga nguye.
Yasisithi iNkosi: Pho-ke abantu balesisizukulwana ngizabafananisa lani? Kanti bafanana lani?
Banjengabantwana abancane abahlezi emakethe bememezana besithi: Silitshayele umhlanga, kodwa kalisinanga; silililele, kodwa kalikhalanga.
Ngoba uJohane uMbhabhathizi wafika engadli isinkwa njalo enganathi iwayini, laselisithi: Uledimoni;
iNdodana yomuntu ifikile isidla, inatha, laselisithi: Khangelani, umuntu oligovu lesinathi sewayini, umngane wabathelisi lezoni.
Kodwa inhlakanipho ithiwa ilungile ngabantwana bayo bonke.
Omunye wabaFarisi wasemcela ukuthi adle laye; esengenile endlini yomFarisi wahlala ekudleni.
Njalo khangela, owesifazana kulowomuzi, owayeyisoni, esekwazi ukuthi uJesu uhlezi ekudleni endlini yomFarisi, waletha umfuma we-alibasta owamagcobo,
wasesima eceleni kwenyawo zakhe ngemva kwakheekhala, waqala ukuthambisa inyawo zakhe ngenyembezi, wa ze sula ngenwele zekhanda lakhe, wanga inyawo zakhe, wa zi gcoba ngamagcobo.
Kuthe umFarisi obemnxusile e ku bona wakhulumela ngaphakathi kwakhe wathi: Lo, ngabe uyamazi ukuthi ungubani lokuthi unjani lo owesifazana omthintayo, ngoba uyisoni.
UJesu wasephendula wathi kuye: Simoni, ngilengizakukhuluma lawe. Yena wasesithi: Khuluma, Mfundisi.
Kwakukhona ababili ababelezikwelede kumkweledisi othile; omunye wayelomlandu wabodenariyo abangamakhulu amahlanu, lomunye abangamatshumi amahlanu.
Kwathi bengelakho okokuhlawula ngakho, wabaxolela bobabili. Kambe nguwuphi kubo, tshono, ozamthanda okwedlulisileyo?
USimoni wasephendula wathi: Ngicabanga ngulowo amxolela okwedlulisileyo. Wathi kuye: Wahlulele ngokuqonda.
Wasetshibilikela kowesifazana, wathi kuSimoni: Uyambona lo owesifazana yini? Ngingene endlini yakho, amanzi enyaweni zami kawu ngi nikanga.
Kawunganganga; kodwa yena, lokhu ngingenile, kayekelanga ukwanga inyawo zami.
Ngamagcobo ikhanda lami kawuligcobanga; kodwa yena ugcobile inyawo zami ngamakha.
Ngenxa yalokhu, ngithi kuwe: Izono zakhe ezinengi zithethelelwe, ngoba uthandile kakhulu; kodwa lowo othethelelwa kancinyane, uthanda kancinyane.
Wasesithi kuye: Zithethelelwe izono zakho.
Ababehlezi laye ekudleni basebeqala ukukhulumisana bodwa besithi: Ngubani lo othethelela lezono?
Wasesithi kowesifazana: Ukholo.
Kwasekusithi emva kwalokho, yena wadabula imizi lemizana, ememezela lokutshumayela indaba ezinhle zombuso kaNkulunkulu; labalitshumi lambili babelaye,
labesifazana abathile ababesiliswe kubomoya ababi lemikhuhlaneni,
loJowana umkaKuza.
Kwathi sekubuthene ixuku elikhulu, njalo bevela emizini ngemizi besiza kuye, wakhuluma ngomfanekiso
wathi: Umhlanyeli waphuma ukuyahlanyela inhlanyelo yakhe; kwathi ekuhlanyeleni kwakhe, enye yawela eceleni kwendlela; yasinyathelwa ngenyawo, lenyoni zezulu zayidla zayiqeda.
Lenye yawela edwaleni, kwathi ekukhuleni yabuna, ngoba yaswela ubumanzi.
Lenye yawela phakathi kwameva, ameva asemila layo ayiminyanisa.
Lenye yawela emhlabathini omuhle, yakhula yathela ikhulu. Esetshilo lezizinto wamemeza wathi: Olendlebe zokuzwa akezwe.
Abafundi bakhe basebembuza besithi: Ungaba yini lumfanekiso?
Wasesithi: Kuphiwe kini ukwazi imfihlo zombuso kaNkulunkulu; kodwa kwabanye ngemifanekiso, ukuze bebona bangaboni, njalo besizwa bangaqedisisi.
Lomfanekiso uyilokhu: Inhlanyelo iyilizwi likaNkulunkulu.
Labaseceleni kwendlela yilabo abathi sebezwile, besekufika udiyabhola alisuse ilizwi enhliziyweni zabo, ukuze bangakholwa basindiswe.
Labasedwaleni yilabo, abathi belizwile, balemukele ilizwi ngentokozo, kodwa laba kabalampande, abakholwa okwesikhathi, kuthi ngesikhathi sokulingwa bawe.
Lewele phakathi kwameva, yilabo abathi sebezwile, bahambe baminyaniswe yikukhathalela lenotho lenkanuko yempilo, njalo bangatheli izithelo ezivuthiweyo.
Kodwa esemhlabathini omuhle, yilabo abathi belizwile ilizwi ba li londoloze enhliziyweni enhle lelungileyo, bathela izithelo ngokubekezela.
Njalo kakho othi eselumathise isibane, kumbe asibeke ngaphansi kombheda, kodwa usibeka esiqobaneni sesibane, ukuze abangenayo babone ukukhanya.
Ngoba kakukho okufihliweyo, okungasoze kube sobala; lokuthukuziweyo, okungayikwaziwa lokungayikulethwa obala.
Ngakho qaphelisani ukuthi lizwa njani.
Kwasekufika kuye unina labafowabo, kodwa abazange bamfinyelele ngenxa yexuku.
Wasebikelwa ngabanyeabathi: Unyoko labafowenu bemi phandle, bafuna ukukubona.
Kodwa waphendula wathi kubo: Umama labafowethu yilabo, abalizwayo ilizwi likaNkulunkulu balenze.
Kwasekusithi ngolunye lwezinsuku, wangena emkhunjini yena labafundi bakhe; basuka-ke.
Kwathi behamba ngomkhumbi, walala ubuthongo; isiphepho esikhulu somoya sasesisehlela phansi echibini.
Basebesondela bamvusa, besithi: Nkosi, nkosi, siyabhubha.
Wasesithi kubo: Lungaphi ukholo lwenu? Basebesesaba bamangala, bakhulumisana besithi: Kambe ungubani lo, ukuthi alaye ngitsho imimoya lamanzi, njalo kumlalele?
Basebesiya ngomkhumbi elizweni lamaGadarene, eliqondene leGalili.
Kwathi esephumele emhlabathini, yamhlangabeza indoda ethile ivela emzini, njalo ingembathi isembatho, ingahlali endlini, kodwa emangcwabeni.
Yathi imbona uJesu, yamemeza, yawa phansi phambi kwakhe, yathi ngelizwi elikhulu: Ngilani lawe, Jesu, Ndodana kaNkulunkulu oPhezukonke? Ngiyakuncenga, ungangihluphi.

Ngoba walaya umoya ongcolileyo ukuthi aphume ku lowo muntu; ngoba wayesembambe okwezikhathi ezinengi, walindwa ebotshiwe ngamaketane lezibopho, kodwa eseqamule izibopho waqhutshelwa enkangala lidimoni.
UJesu wasembuza, wathi: Ungubani ibizo lakho? Wasesithi: NguLegiyoni; ngoba amadimoni amanengi ayengene kuye.
Asemncenga ukuthi angawalayi ukuya emgodini ongelamkhawulo.
Kwakukhona lapho umhlambi wengulube ezinengi usidla entabeni; asemncenga ukuthi awavumele angene kuzo. Wasewavumela.
Kwathi amadimoni esephumile kulowomuntu angena engulubeni; umhlambi wasuphaphatheka usuka eliweni usiya echibini, waminzwa.
Kwathi ababe z elusile bebona okwenzakeleyo babaleka, basuka bayabika emzini, lemaphandleni.
Basebephuma ukuyabona okwenzakeleyo; bafika kuJesu, bamfica umuntu okwakuphume kuye amadimoni; basebesesaba.
Basebebatshela lalabo ababebonile ukuthi usindiswe njani owayengenwe ngamadimoni.
Ixuku lonke lesigaba samaGadarene waphindela emuva.
Kodwa indoda. Kodwa uJesu wayiyekela yahamba, esithi:
Buyela endlini yakho, ulandise ukuthi kungakanani uNkulunkulu akwenze kuwe. Wasesuka wahamba, etshumayela phakathi komuzi wonke ukuthi kungakanani uJesu ayekwenzile kuye.
Kwasekusithi ekubuyeni kukaJesu.
Njalo khangela, kwafika indoda, uJayirosi ngebizo, yona ingumphathi wesinagoge, yasisiwa phansi enyaweni zikaJesu yamncenga ukuthi angene endlini yayo;
ngoba yayilendodakazi eyodwa ezelweyo eyayingaba leminyaka elitshumi lambili, njalo yona yayisisifa. Kwathi esahamba amaxuku amcindezela.
Lowesifazana owayelomopho wegazi okweminyaka elitshumi lambili, echithe konke okwempilo yakhe kubelaphi engelakusiliswa langubani,
wasondela ngemva kwakhe, wathinta umphetho wesembatho sakhe; njalo wahle wakhawula umopho wegazi lakhe.
UJesu wasesithi: Ngubani ongithintileyo? Kwathi lapho bephika bonke, uPetro wathi lababelaye: Nkosi, ixuku likuminyanisile li ku cindezele, kodwa uthi: Ngubani ongithintileyo?
Kodwa uJesu wathi: Ukhona ongithintileyo; ngoba mina ngazile ukuthi amandla aphumile kimi.
Kwathi owesifazana ebona ukuthi kafihlakalanga, weza ethuthumela, wawa phambi kwakhe, walandisa phambi kwabantu bonke ukuthi umthinte ngesizatho bani, lokuthi uhle wasila njani.
Wasesithi kuye: Mana isibindi, ndodakazi, ukholo lwakho lukusindisile.
Esakhuluma, kwafika umuntu evela endliniyomphathi wesinagoge, wathi kuye: Indodakazi yakho isifile; ungamhluphi uMfundisi.
Kodwa uJesu esizwa, wamphendula, wathi: Ungesabi; kholwa kuphela, njalo izasindiswa.
Futhi esengenile endlini, kavumanga ukuthi kungene muntu, ngaphandle kukaPetro loJakobe loJohane, loyise wendodakazi lonina.
Njalo bakhala bonke, beyililela. Kodwa wathi: Lingakhali; kayifanga, kodwa ilele.
Basebemhleka usulu, besazi ukuthi ifile.
Kodwa yena esebakhuphele phandle bonke, wabamba isandla sayo, wamemeza, esithi: Ndodakazi, vuka!
Wasubuya umoya wayo, yasivuka khona lapho; waselaya ukuthi kayiphiwe ukudla.
Abazali bayo basebemangala kakhulu.
Wasebizela ndawonye abafundi bakhe abalitshumi lambili.
Wasebathuma uku ya tshumayela umbuso kaNkulunkulu, lokusilisa abagulayo,
wasesithi kubo: Lingaphathi lutho lwendlela; lodondolo, lesikhwama, lomphako, lemali, njalo lingabi lezigqoko ezimbili ngamunye.
Lakuyiphi indlu elingena kuyo, hlalani lapho, lalapho lisuke.
Labo bonke abangalemukeliyo, nxa lisuka kulowomuzi, thintithani ngitsho uthuli enyaweni zenu kube yibufakazi obumelana labo.
Basuka-ke bahamba bedabula imizana, betshumayela ivangeli besilisa endaweni zonke.
UHerodi umtetrarki, ngoba kwatshiwo ngabanye ukuthi uJohane uvukile kwabafileyo;
langabanye ukuthi uElija ubonakele; langabanye ukuthi kuvukile omunye wabaprofethi abadala.
Kodwa uHerodi wathi: UJohane ngamquma ikhanda mina; kodwa ngubani lo, mina engizwa ngaye izinto ezinje? Wasefunisisa ukumbona.
Abaphostoli.
Kwathi amaxuku esekwazi, amlandela; wasewemukela, wakhuluma lawo ngombuso kaNkulunkulu.
Ilanga laseliqala ukutshona; ngoba lapha sisendaweni eyinkangala.
Kodwa wathi kubo: Banikeni lina bona ukuthi badle. Bathi-ke: Asilakho okwedlula izinkwa ezinhlanu lenhlanzi ezimbili, ngaphandle kokuthi thina siyebathengela ukudla bonke lababantu.
Ngoba kwakukhona amadoda angaba zinkulungwane ezinhlanu. Wasesithi kubafundi bakhe: Bahlaliseni phansi ngezigaba ngamatshumi amahlanu.
Basebesenza njalo, babahlalisa phansi bonke.
Wasezithatha izinkwa ezinhlanu lenhlanzi ezimbili, wakhangela phezulu ezulwini, wazibusisa, wa zi hlephula, wa zi nika abafundi ukuthi babeke phambi kwexuku.
Basebesidla basutha bonke; kwadojwa imvuthu ezazisele kubo, izitsha ezilitshumi lambili.
Kwasekusithi ekhuleka yedwa, abafundi babelaye; wasebabuza, esithi: Amaxuku athi ngingubani?
Basebephendula bathi: UJohane uMbhabhathizi; kodwa abanye bathi: UElija; kodwa abanye bathi: Kuvukile umprofethi othile wabadala.
Wasesithi kubo: Lina-ke lithi ngingubani? UPetro wasephendula wathi: UKristu kaNkulunkulu.
Esebaxwayisisile,
esithi.
Wasesithi kubo bonke: Uba umuntu ethanda ukuza ngemva kwami, kazidele, athathe isiphambano sakhe.
Ngoba loba ngubani othanda ukusindisa impilo yakhe, izamlahlekela; kodwa loba ngubani olahlekelwa yimpilo yakhe ngenxa yami, yena uzayisindisa.
Ngoba kuzamsizani umuntu, uba ezuza umhlaba wonke, kodwa yena uqobo lwakhe azone kumbe alahleke?
Ngoba loba ngubani olenhloni ngami langamazwi ami, iNdodana yomuntu izakuba lenhloni ngaye, nxa isiza enkazimulweni yayo lekaBaba leyengilosi ezingcwele.
Kodwa ngilitshela ngeqiniso: Bakhona abanye kwabemiyo lapha, abangasoze bezwe ukufa, baze babone umbuso kaNkulunkulu.
Kwasekusithi.
Kwasekusithi ekukhulekeni kwakhe, isimo sobuso bakhe saphenduka, lesembatho sakhe saba mhlophe, sacwazimula.
Njalo khangela, akhuluma laye amadoda amabili, ayengoMozisi loElija;
abonakala ngenkazimulo.
Kodwa uPetro lababelaye babesindwe yibuthongo, lamadoda amabili ayemi laye.
Kwasekusithi, ekwehlukaneni kwawo laye.
Kwathi ekhuluma lezizinto, kwafika iyezi labasibekela; basebesesaba ekungeneni kwabo eyezini.
Kwasekuphuma ilizwi eyezini, lisithi: Lo uyiNdodana yami ethandekayo; zwanini yona.
Kwathi ilizwi selifikile, uJesu waficwa eyedwa. Kodwa bona bathula, kabaze batshela muntu ngalezonsuku okunye kwalezozinto abazibonileyo.
Kwasekusithi ngelanga elilandelayo, sebehlile.
Njalo khangela, indoda exukwini yamemeza, isithi: Mfundisi, ngiyakuncenga, bona indodana yami;
njalo khangela, umoya uyayibamba, futhi ihle iklabalale.
Njalo ngincenge abafundi bakho ukuthi bawukhuphe, kodwa abenelisanga.
UJesu wasephendula wathi: O sizukulwana esingelakholo lesonakeleyo, kuzaze kube nini ngilani, ngilibekezelela? Ilethe lapha indodana yakho.
Kuthe iseza, idimoni layidabula la yi hlukuza; kodwa uJesu wawukhuza umoya ongcolileyo, wamsilisa umntwana, wambuyisela kuyise.
Bonke basebemangaliswa kakhulu yibukhulu bukaNkulunkulu. Kwathi bemangele bonke ngazo zonke izinto uJesu azenzileyo, wathi kubafundi bakhe:
Fakani lina endlebeni zenu lamazwi: Ngoba iNdodana yomuntu izanikelwa ezandleni zabantu.
Kodwa kabaqedisisanga lumutsho, njalo wawufihlakele kubo, ukuze bangawuzwisisi; basebesesaba ukumbuza ngalumutsho.
Kwasekungena.
Kwathi uJesu ebona ukunakana kwenhliziyo yabo, wathatha umntwana omncane, wammisa phansi kwakhe,
wasesithi kubo: Loba ngubani owemukela lumntwana omncane ebizweni lami wemukela mina; njalo loba ngubani owemukela mina wemukela ongithumileyo.
UJohane wasephendula wathi: Nkosi, sabona omunye ekhupha amadimoni ngebizo lakho, sasesimenqabela, ngoba engalandeli kanye lathi.
Kodwa uJesu wathi kuye: Linga m enqabeli, ngoba ongamelani lathi ungakithi.
Kwathi seziphelelisiwe insuku,
wasethuma izithunywa phambi kobuso bakhe, ukuze zimlungisele.
Kodwa kawamemukelanga.
Kwathi abafundi bakhe uJakobe loJohane?
Kodwa watshibilika wabakhuza, esithi: Alazi ukuthi lina lingabomoya onjani.
Ngoba iNdodana yomuntu kayizanga ukuthi ibhubhise imiphefumulo yabantu, kodwa uku yi sindisa. Basebesedlulela komunye umzana.
Kwasekusithi behamba endleleni, umuntuothile wathi kuye: Nkosi, ngizakulandela loba ngaphi lapho oya khona.
UJesu wasesithi kuye: Amakhanka alemilindi, lenyoni zezulu zile zidleke; kodwa iNdodana yomuntu kayilalapho engaqamelisa ikhanda khona.
Wasesithi komunye: Ngilandela. Kodwa yena wathi: Nkosi, ngivumela ukuthi ngiyengcwaba ubaba kuqala.
Kodwa uJesu wathi kuye: Yekela abafileyo bangcwabe ababo abafileyo; kodwa wena hamba utshumayele umbuso kaNkulunkulu.
Lomunye wasesithi: Ngizakulandela, Nkosi.
Kodwa uJesu wathi kuye: Kakho othi esebeke isandla sakhe ekhubeni, akhangele kokusemuva.
Njalo emva kwalezizinto iNkosi yamisa njalo abanye.
Ngakho yathi kubo: Isibili isivuno sikhulu, kodwa izisebenzi zinlutshwana. Ngakho ncengani eNkosini yesivuno, ukuze ithume izisebenzi esivunweni sayo.
Hambani; khangelani, mina ngiyalithuma linjengezimvana phakathi kwezimpisi.
Lingaphathi.
Njalo lakuyiphi indlu elingena kuyo, qalani lithi: Ukuthula kakubekulindlu.
Njalo uba kukhona lapho indodana yokuthula, ukuthula kwenu kuzahlala phezu kwayo; kodwa uba kunge njalo, kuzabuyela kini.
Hlalani-ke kuleyondlu, lidle linathe izinto ezivela kibo; ngoba isisebenzi sifanele umvuzo waso. Lingayi endlini lendlini.
Lakuwuphi umuzi elingena kuwo, besebelemukela, dlanini okubekwa phambi kwenu,
lisilise abagulayo abakuwo.
Kodwa lakuwuphi umuzi elingena kuwo, futhi bengalemukeli, phumelani endleleni zawo, lithi:
Lothuli lomuzi wenu olusinamatheleyo siyaluthintithela kini.
Njalo ngithi kini: Kuzakuba lula eSodoma ngalolosuku, kulakulowomuzi.
Maye kuwe, Korazini! Maye kuwe, Bhethisayida! Ngoba uba kwakwenziwe eTire leSidoni imisebenzi yamandla eyenziwe kini.
Kodwa kuzakuba lula eTire leSidoni ekugwetshweni, kulakini.
Lawe, Kapenawume, ophakanyiselwe ezulwini, uzaphoselwa phansi esihogweni.
Olizwayo lina uyangizwa mina.
Babuya-ke abangamatshumi ayisikhombisa ngentokozo.
Wasesithi kubo: Ngabona uSathane njengombane.
Khangelani, ngilinika amandla okunyathela phezu kwezinyoka labofezela, laphezu kwamandla wonke esitha; njalo akusoze kube lalutho olungalilimaza.
Kodwa lingathokozi ngalokho ukuthi omoya bayazehlisela ngaphansi kwenu.
Ngalelohola uJesu.
Konke kwanikelwa kimi nguBaba; njalo kakho owaziyo ukuthi iNdodana ingubani, ngaphandle kukaBaba, lokuthi uBaba ungubani, ngaphandle kweNdodana, njalo loba ngubani iNdodana ethanda ukumembulela.
Wasephendukela kubafundi bebodwa wathi: Abusisiwe amehlo abona elikubonayo.
Ngoba ngithi kini: Abaprofethi abanengi lamakhosi babethanda ukubona izinto elizibonayo lina, kodwa kaba zi bonanga; lokuzwa izinto elizizwayo, kodwa kaba zi zwanga.
Njalo khangela, isazumthetho esithile?
Wasesithi kuso: Kubhalweni emlayweni? Uwubala njani?
Sasesiphendula sathi: Wothanda iNkosi uNkulunkulu wakho, ngenhliziyo yakho yonke, langomphefumulo wakho wonke, langamandla akho wonke, langengqondo yakho yonke.
Wasesithi kuso: Uphendule ngokuqonda; yenza lokhu, futhi uzaphila.
Kodwa sona sithanda ukuzilungisisa sathi kuJesu: Kanti ngubani umakhelwane wami?
UJesu wasephendula wathi: Umuntu othile wehla evela eJerusalema, njalo bamhlubula impahla ba m tshaya imivimvinya basuka bahamba, ba m tshiya ephosukufa.
Umpristi othile waseqabuka esehla ngaleyondlela.
Langokunjalo lomLevi nxa wayesekulindawo, wafika e m bona, wadlula eceleni.
Kodwa umSamariya othile owayehamba wafika lapho ayekhona, njalo kwathi embona waba lesihelo,
waya kuyewabopha amanxeba akhe; wamkhweza phezu kweyakhe inyamazana, wamusa endlini yezihambi, wamlondoloza.
Kusisa esehamba, wakhupha odenariyo ababili wa ba nika umninindlu, wathi kuye: Umlondoloze; njalo loba yini ozakuchitha okwedlula lokhu, mina ngizabuyisela kuwe ekubuyeni kwami.
Pho, nguwuphi kulaba abathathu ocabanga ukuthi wayengumakhelwane walowo owatheleka phakathi kwabaphangi?
Wasesithi: Ngulowo owamenzela isihawu. Ngakho uJesu wathi kuye: Hamba, lawe wenze njalo.
Kwasekusithi ekuhambeni kwabo, yena wangena emzaneni othile; lowesifazana othile, uMarta.
Njalo lo wayelodadewabo othiwa nguMariya, walizwa ilizwi lakhe.
Kodwa uMarta wayephazanyiswa yikusebenza okunengi; weza eduze wasesithi: Nkosi, kawukhathali yini ukuthi udadewethu ungitshiye ukuthi ngisebenze ngedwa? Ngakho umtshele ukuthi angisize.
Kodwa uJesu waphendula wathi kuye: Marta, Marta;
kodwa yinye into edingekayo.
Kwasekusithi ekhuleka endaweni ethile, eseqedile, omunye wabafundi bakhe wathi kuye: Nkosi, sifundise ukukhuleka, njengoJohane laye wafundisa abafundi bakhe.
Wasesithi kubo: Nxa likhuleka, libokuthi: Baba wethu osemazulwini, kalihlonitshwe ibizo lakho. Umbuso wakho kawuze. Intando yakho kayenziwe, lemhlabeni njengezulwini.
Siphe usuku ngosuku ukudla kwethu kwensuku zonke.
Njalo usithethelele amacala ethu, ngoba lathi sibathethelela bonke abalamacala kithi. Njalo ungasingenisi ekulingweni, kodwa usikhulule ebubini.
Wasesithi kubo: Nguwuphi kini olomngane, futhi aye kuye phakathi kobusuku, athi kuye: Mngane, ngeboleka izinkwa ezintathu,
ngoba kufike kimi umngane wami evela ekuhambeni, kodwa kangilalutho engingalubeka phambi kwakhe;
longaphakathi aphendule athi: Ungangihluphi; umnyango usuvaliwe, labantwana bami abancane balami embhedeni; kangingeke ngivuke ngikunike.
Ngithi kini: Loba engazukuvuka amnike, ngoba engumngane wakhe, kodwa ngenxa yokuphikelela kwakhe uzavuka amnike konke akuswelayo.
Mina-ke ngithi kini: Celani, lizaphiwa; dingani, lizathola; qoqodani, lizavulelwa.
Ngoba wonke ocelayo uyemukela; lodingayo uyathola; loqoqodayo uyavulelwa.
Kambe, nguwuphi kini onguyise ongathi indodana icela isinkwa, ayinike ilitshe? Loba-ke inhlanzi, ayinike inyoka endaweni yenhlanzi yini?
Uba-ke icela iqanda, ayinike ufezela yini?
Ngakho uba lina elingababi likwazi ukupha abantwana benu izipho ezinhle, kakhulu kangakanani uBaba osezulwini.
Wayesekhupha idimoni, elaliyisimungulu. Kwasekusithi, seliphumile idimoni, wakhuluma oyisimungulu; amaxuku asemangala.
Kodwa abanye babo bathi: Ukhupha amadimoni ngoBhelezebhule inkosi yamadimoni.
Labanye be m linga.
Kodwa yena eyazi imicabango yabo wathi kubo: Wonke umbuso owehlukene umelene lawo ngokwawo uyachitheka; njalo indlu emelene lendlu iyadilika.
Njalo uba uSathane laye ehlukene emelane laye ngokwakhe, umbuso wakhe uzakuma njani? Ngoba lithi, ngikhupha amadimoni ngoBhelezebhule.
Njalo uba mina ngikhupha amadimoni ngoBhelezebhule, amadodana enu akhupha ngobani? Ngakho wona azakuba ngabagwebi benu.
Kodwa uba ngikhupha amadimoni ngomunwe kaNkulunkulu, isibili umbuso kaNkulunkulu usufikile kini.
Uba isiqhwaga sihlomile silinda owaso umuzi, impahla yaso isekuthuleni;
kodwa nxa olamandla kulaso e si sukela asinqobe, uyasemuka izikhali zaso ebesithembele kuzo, abesesaba impango yaso.
Ongelami umelene lami.
Nxa umoya ongcolileyo esephumile emuntwini, uyahamba adabule indawo ezomileyo, edinga ukuphumula; kodwa engakutholi athi: Ngizabuyela endlini yami engaphuma kuyo;
njalo esefikile ayifice ithanyelwe njalo ilungisiwe.
Abesehamba azithathele abanye omoya abayisikhombisa ababi kulaye uqobo, bangene bahlale lapho; njalo ukucina kwalowomuntu kube kubi kulokuqala.
Kwasekusithi ekhuluma lezizinto, owesifazana othile exukwini waphakamisa ilizwi, wathi kuye.
Kodwa yena wathi: Kodwa ikakhulu.
Kwathi sekubuthene amaxuku eminyene, waqala ukuthi: Lesi isizukulwana sibi; sidinga isibonakaliso, kodwa kasiyikunikwa isibonakaliso, ngaphandle kwesibonakaliso sikaJona umprofethi.
Ngoba njengalokhu uJona waba yisibonakaliso kwabeNineve, leNdodana yomuntu izakuba njalo kulesisizukulwana.

Indlovukazi yeningizimu izasukuma ekugwetshweni kanye lamadoda alesisizukulwana, iwalahle; ngoba yavela emikhawulweni yomhlaba uku zaku zwa inhlakanipho kaSolomoni, njalo khangelani, omkhulu kuloSolomoni ulapha.
Amadoda eNineve azasukuma ekugwetshweni kanye lalesisizukulwana, asilahle; ngoba aphenduka ngokutshumayela kukaJona, njalo khangelani, omkhulu kuloJona ulapha.
Futhi kakho othi eselumathise isibane asibeke ekusithekeni, loba ngaphansi kwesitsha, kodwa phezu kwesiqobane sesibane.
Isibane somzimba yilihlo; ngakho nxa ilihlo lakho liphilile, lomzimba wakho wonke ugcwele ukukhanya.
Ngakho qaphela ukuthi ukukhanya okukuwe kungabi ngumnyama.
Ngakho uba umzimba wakho wonke ugcwele ukukhanya, ungelandawo emnyama, uzakhanya wonke, njengesibane sikukhanyisa ngokukhanya.
Kwathi esakhuluma, umFarisi othile wamcela ukuthi adle laye; wasengena wahlala ekudleni.
Kwathi umFarisi ebona lokhuwamangala ukuthi kazange aqale ageze.
Yasisithi iNkosi kuye: Khathesi lina baFarisi lihlambulula ingaphandle yenkezo leyesitsha.
Zithutha, yena owenza ingaphandle kayenzanga yini lengaphakathi?
Kodwa phanini zibe yizipho lezozinto ezingaphakathi.
Kodwa maye kini baFarisi.
Maye kini baFarisi! Ngoba lithanda izihlalo zabahloniphekayo emasinagogeni.
Maye kini, babhali labaFarisi, bazenzisi! Ngoba lifanana lamangcwaba angabonakaliyo, labantu abahamba phezu kwawo bengawazi.
Omunye wezazumthetho wasephendula wathi kuye: Mfundisi, ngokutsho lezizinto uyasithuka lathi.
Kodwa wathi: Maye lakini zazumthetho.
Maye kini! Ngoba lakha amangcwaba abaprofethi, njalo oyihlo bababulala.
Ngalokhu-ke lifakaza.
Ngalokhu-ke inhlakanipho kaNkulunkulu yathi;
ukuze kubizwe kulesisizukulwana igazi labaprofethi bonke elachithwa kusukela ekusekelweni komhlaba,
kusukela egazini likaAbela kuze kufike egazini likaZakariya owabulawa phakathi laphakathi kwelathi lendlu kaNkulunkulu; yebo, ngithi kini: Lizabizwa kulesisizukulwana.
Maye kini zazumthetho, labangenayo labavimbela.
Kwathi ekhuluma lezizinto kubo, ababhali labaFarisi baqala uku m ngxamela kakhulukazi, lokumbuzisisa ngezinto ezinengi,
bemthiya.
Kusenjalo sezibuthene izigidi zexuku, baze banyathelana, waqala ukukhuluma labafundi bakhe kuqala.
Njalo kakukho okumbomboziweyo, okungayikwembulwa, lokufihliweyo, okungayikwaziwa.
Ngakho loba yini eliyikhuluma emnyameni izazwakala ekukhanyeni; lelikukhulume endlebeni ezindlini zensitha.
Njalo ngithi kini bangane bami: Lingabesabi ababulala umzimba, njalo emva kwalokho bengelakho ukwenza olunye ulutho.
Kodwa ngizalitshengisa elifanele ukumesaba: Mesabeni lowo othi esebulele abe lamandla okuphosela esihogweni; yebo, ngithi kini: Mesabeni yena.
Kazithengiswa yini intaka ezinhlanu ngendibilitshi ezimbili? Kakukhohlakali lanye yazo phambi kukaNkulunkulu.
Kanti lenwele zekhanda lenu zibaliwe zonke. Ngakho lingesabi; liyazedlula intaka ezinengi.
