Njalo ngithi kini: Wonke loba ngubani ongivuma phambi kwabantu, iNdodana yomuntu layo izamvuma phambi kwengilosi zikaNkulunkulu;
kodwa ongiphika phambi kwabantu uzaphikwa phambi kwengilosi zikaNkulunkulu.
Laye wonke okhuluma ilizwi elimelana leNdodana yomuntu, uzathethelelwa; kodwa lowo ohlambaza uMoya oNgcwele kayikuthethelelwa.
Njalo nxa belisa emasinagogeni;
ngoba uMoya oNgcwele uzalifundisa ngalelohola izinto e li fanele ukuzikhuluma.
Futhi omunye wexuku wathi kuye: Mfundisi, akutshele umfowethu abelane lami ilifa.
Kodwa wathi kuye: Ndoda?
Wasesithi kubo: Nanzelelani liqaphele ubuhwaba, ngoba impilo yomuntu kayikho ebunengini bezinto alazo.
Wasebatshela umfanekiso, esithi: Insimu yomuntu othile onothileyo yathela kakhulu;
wasenakana ngaphakathi kwakhe?
Wasesithi: Ngizakwenza lokhu; ngizadiliza iziphala zami, ngakhe ezinkulu,
besengisithi kumphefumulo wami: Mphefumulo, ulempahla ezinengi ezibekelwe iminyaka eminengi; phumula, udle, unathe.
Kodwa uNkulunkulu wathi kuye: Siphukuphuku?
Kunjalo-ke kozibekela inotho.
Wasesithi kubafundi bakhe: Ngakho ngithi kini: Lingakhathaleli impilo yenu, ukuthi lizakudlani; loba umzimba, ukuthi lizakwembathani.
Impilo yedlula ukudla, lomzimba isembatho.
Qaphelisisani amawabayi, ukuthi kawahlanyeli, njalo kawavuni inyoni?
Njalo nguwuphi kini ongathingokuphiseka engezelele ingalo ibenye?
Ngakho nxa lingelamandla okwenza into encinyane, liphisekelani ngokunye?
Qaphelisani imiduze ukuthi ikhula njani; kayitshikatshiki, kayiphothi, kodwa ngithi kini: LoSolomoni ebucwazicwazini bakhe bonke wayengembathiswanga njengomunye wayo.
Njalo uba uNkulunkulu esembathisa ngokunjalo utshani obukhona lamuhla egangeni, kuthi kusasa buphoswa eziko, uza l embathisangokukhulu kangakanani, lina abokholo oluncinyane?
Lani-ke lingadingi elizakudla lelizakunatha; njalo lingakhathazeki.
Ngoba konke lokhu izizwe zomhlaba ziyakudinga; kodwa uYihlo uyazi ukuthi liyaziswela lezizinto.
Kodwa dingani umbuso kaNkulunkulu, njalo zonke lezizinto zizakwengezelelwa kini.
Lingesabi.
Thengisani impahla zenu;
ngoba lapho okukhona impahla yenu eligugu, izakuba khona lapho lenhliziyo yenu.
Inkalo zenu kazihlale zibotshiwe;
lani libe njengabantu abalindele inkosi yabo, lapho izabuya ivela emtshadweni, ukuze, nxa ifika iqoqoda, bahle bayivulele.
Zibusisiwe lezozinceku.
Njalo nxa ifika ngomlindo wesibili, zibusisiwe lezozinceku.
Kodwa yazini lokhu, ukuthi uba umninindlu ebelazi ihola isela elizafika ngalo, futhi ubengayikuvuma ukuthi indlu yakhe ifohlelwe.
Ngakho lani-ke hlalani lilungile.
UPetro wasesithi kuye: Nkosi, uwutshela thina lumfanekiso?
INkosi yasisithi: Pho ngubani umphathi wezinceku othembekileyo lohlakaniphileyo, inkosi ezambeka phezu kwabendlu yayo, ukuze a ba nike isabelo sabosokudla ngesikhathi esifaneleyo?
Ibusisiwe leyonceku, okuzakuthi inkosi yayo nxa ifika iyifice isenza njalo.
Ngiqinisile ngithi kini: Izayibeka phezu kwakho konke elakho.
Kodwa nxa leyonceku isithi enhliziyweni yayo: Inkosi yami iphuzile ukubuya; njalo ibisiqala ukutshaya izinceku lezincekukazi, lokudla lokunatha lokudakwa,
inkosi yaleyonceku izafika ngosuku enga yi lindele ngalo, langehola engalaziyo; izayiquma phakathi, izanika isabelo sayo lalabo abangathembekanga.
Laleyonceku ebisazi intando yenkosi yayo.
Kodwa leyo.
Ngize ukuphosela umlilo emhlabeni?
Kodwa ngilobhabhathizo engizabhabhathizwa ngalo.
Licabanga ukuthi ngize ukunika ukuthula emhlabeni yini.
Ngoba kusukela khathesi abahlanu endlini yinye bazakwehlukana, abathathu bamelane lababili, lababili bamelane labathathu,
bazakwehlukana, uyise amelane lendodana, lendodana imelane loyise; unina amelane lendodakazi, lendodakazi imelane lonina; uninazala amelane lomalokazana wakhe, lomalokazana amelane loninazala.
Wasesithi lemaxukwini: Nxa libona iyezi, lihle lithi: Izulu liyabuya; futhi kube njalo.
Njalo nxa libonaumoya weningizimu uphephetha, lithi: Lizatshisa; besekusenzakala.
Bazenzisi! Liyakwazi ukuhlola umumo wesibhakabhaka lowomhlaba; kodwa lesisikhathi kungani lingasihloli?
Pho, kungani ukuthi lingahluleli lani lina uqobo lwenu okulungileyo?
Ngoba nxa usiya, endleleni yenza ubungcono ukuthi ukhululwe kuye; hlezi akudonsele kumahluleli, lomahluleli akunikele epholiseni, lepholisa likuphosele entolongweni.
Ngithi kuwe, kawusoze waphuma khona, uze ubhadale lenhlamvu encane yemali yokucina.
Njalo ngalesosikhathi kwaba khona abathile abamtshela ngamaGalili, igazi lawo uPilatu alixubanisa lemihlatshelo yawo.
UJesu wasephendula wathi kubo: Licabanga ukuthi amaGalili la ayeyizoni yini kulawo wonke amaGalili, ngoba ahlupheka izinto ezinje?
Hatshi bo, ngithi kini: Kodwa uba lingaphenduki, lizabhubha ngokunjalo lonke.
Lalabo abalitshumi lesificaminwembili, owawela phezu kwabo umphotshongo eSilowama wababulala, licabanga ukuthi bona babebabi yini kulabantu bonke ababehlala eJerusalema?
Hatshi bo, ngithi kini: Kodwa uba lingaphenduki, lizabhubha ngokunjalo lonke.
Wasekhuluma lumfanekiso wathi: Umuntuothile wayelomkhiwa owawuhlanyelwe esivinini sakhe; wafika edinga isithelo kuwo, kodwa ka si tholanga.
Wasesithi kuso isisebenzi sesivini: Khangela, sekuyiminyaka emithathu ngisiza ngidinga isithelo emkhiweni, kodwa nginga si tholi; ugamule; yini ukuthi wone ngitsho umhlabathi?
Sasesiphendula sathi kuye: Nkosi, ake uwuyekele langalumnyaka, ngize ngigebhe ngiwugombolozele, ngithele umquba;
njalo uba uthela isithelo, kuhle.
Futhi wayefundisa kwelinye lamasinagoge ngesabatha;
njalo khangela, kwakukhona owesifazana owayelomoya wobuthakathaka iminyaka elitshumi leyisificaminwembili.
Kwathi uJesu embona wa m bizela kuye, wathi kuye: Mama, ukhululwe ebuthakathakeni bakho.
Wasebeka izandla phezu kwakhe.
Kodwa umphathi wesinagoge.
Ngakho iNkosi yamphendula, yathi: Mzenzisi?
Lalo, oyindodakazi kaAbrahama?
Kwathi esitsho lezizinto, bayangeka bonke ababephikisana laye; lexuku lonke lathokoza ngezinto zonke ezilodumo ezenziwe nguye.
Wasesithi: Umbuso kaNkulunkulu unjengani? Futhi ngizawufananisa lani?
Unjengohlamvu lwemasitedi, umuntu aluthatha wa lu phosa esivandeni sakhe; lwaselumila, lwaba yisihlahla esikhulu, lenyoni zezulu zakhele engatsheni zaso.
Wasebuya wathi: Ngizawufananisa lani umbuso kaNkulunkulu?
Unjengemvubelo, ayithathayo owesifazana wayifaka ezilinganisweni ezintathu zempuphu, kwaze kwabila konke.
Wasehamba edabula imizi lemizana efundisa.
Omunye wasesithi kuye: Nkosi, balutshwana yini abasindiswayo? Wasesithi kubo:
Zamani kakhulu ukungena ngesango elincinyane; ngoba abanengi, ngithi kini, bazadinga ukungena, kodwa bazakwehluleka.
Emva kokuthi umninindlu;
lapho lizaqala ukuthi: Sadla sanatha phambi kwakho.
Kodwa uzakuthi: Ngithi kini: Kangilazi lapho elivela khona.
Lapho kuzakuba khona ukukhala lokugedla amazinyo.
Futhi bazakuza.
Njalo khangelani, bakhona abokucina abazakuba ngabokuqala, njalo bakhona abokuqala abazakuba ngabokucina.
Ngelanga elifananayo kwafika abaFarisi abathile, bathi kuye: Phuma usuke lapha.
Wasesithi kubo: Hambani lilitshele lelokhanka: Khangela, ngiyakhupha amadimoni ngenza izelapho lamuhla lakusasa, langelesithathu ngipheleliswe.
Kodwa kumele ukuthi ngihambe lamuhla lakusasa.
Jerusalema, Jerusalema, wena obulala abaprofethi, lobakhanda ngamatshe labo abathunywe kuwe! Bengithanda kangakanani ukubuthela ndawonye abantwana bakho.
Khangelani, indlu yenu itshiywe kini ilunxiwa.
Kwasekusithi ekungeneni kwakhe ngesabatha endlini yomunye wabakhulu kubaFarisi ukuthi adle isinkwa.
Njalo khangela, kwakukhona umuntu othile phambi kwakhe owayelombizankulu.
UJesu wasephendula?
Kodwa bathula. Wase m bamba wamsilisa wa m yekela ukuthi ahambe.
Wasebaphendula esithi?
Abasazange babuyisele impendulo kuye ngalezizinto.
Wasekhuluma umfanekiso kubo abanxusiweyo, wathi kubo:
Nxa unxusiwe ngumuntu emtshadweni; hlezi kukhona omkhulu kulawe onxusiweyo nguye,
futhi okunxusileyo wena laye eze athi kuwe: Mxekele lo; khona uzaqala ukuhlala endaweni esekucineni usulenhloni.
Kodwa nxa unxusiwe, hamba uhlale endaweni esekucineni.
Ngoba wonke oziphakamisayo uzathotshiswa, lozithobayo uzaphakanyiswa.

Wasesithi lakulowo owayemnxusile: Nxa usenza ukudla kwemini loba ukudla kwantambama, unganxusi abangane bakho, loba abafowenu, loba izihlobo zakho, loba omakhelwane abanothileyo; hlezi labo babuye bakunxuse, futhi ukwenananiswa kwenziwe kuwe.
Kodwa nxa usenza idili, nxusa abayanga, izilima, iziqhuli, iziphofu;
njalo uzabusiswa, ngoba abalalutho lokukwenanisa.
Kwathi omunye kwababehlezi laye ekudleni esezwile lezizinto wathi kuye: Ubusisiwe lowo ozakudla isinkwa embusweni kaNkulunkulu.
Kodwa wathi kuye: Umuntu othile wenza ukudla kwantambama okukhulu, wanxusa abanengi.
Ngesikhathi sokudla kwantambama wasethuma inceku yakhe ukuthi ithi kwabanxusiweyo: Wozani, ngoba sekulungisiwe konke.
Kodwa bonke baqala omunye lomunye ukuzixolisela.
Lomunye wathi: Sengithenge izipane ezinhlanu zenkabi, ngiya ukuzilinga; ngiyakuncenga, akungixolisele.
Lomunye wathi: Sengithethe umfazi, ngakho ngingeze ngeza.

Isibuyile leyonceku yayibikela lezizinto inkosi yayo. Wasethukuthela umninindlu wathi encekwini yakhe: Phuma ngokuphangisa uye emigwaqweni lendleleni zomuzi, ulethe abayanga lezilima leziqhuli leziphofu ubangenise lapha.
Inceku yasisithi: Nkosi, sekwenziwe njengokulaya kwakho, njalo indawo isesekhona.
Yasisithi inkosi encekwini: Phuma uye ezindleleni lezintangweni u ba cindezele ba ngene, ukuze igcwaliswe indlu yami.
Ngoba ngithi kini: Kakho kulamadoda ayenxusiwe ozakuzwa ukudla kwami kwantambama.
Kwakuhamba laye amaxuku amanengi; wasetshibilika wathi kuwo:
Uba umuntu esiza kimi.
Njalo loba ngubani.
Ngoba nguwuphi kini, othi efuna ukwakha umphotshongo, ongaqali ahlale phansi, abale indleko, ukuthi ulakho yini okokuqedisa?
Ukuze hlezi, kuthi esebekile isisekelo kodwa angabi lamandla okuqeda, bonke abakubonayo baqale ukumhleka,
besithi: Lumuntu waqala ukwakha, kodwa kabanga lamandla okuqeda.
Loba yiyiphi inkosi ezakuya empini imelene lenye inkosi engaqali ihlale phansi inakane ngokuthi ilamandla yini ngenkulungwane ezilitshumi okuhlangabezana laleyo?
Kodwa uba kunge njalo, ingathi isekhatshana leyo, ithume amanxusa icele okokuthula.
Ngakho kunjalo wonke kini ongadeli konke alakho, angeke aba ngumfundi wami.
Itshwayi lihle?
Kalifanele lamhlabathi ledundulu lomquba.
Kwasekusondela kuye bonke.
AbaFarisi lababhali basebesola besithi: Lo wemukela izoni, adle lazo.
Wasebatshela lumfanekiso, esithi:
Nguwuphi umuntu kini ongathi elezimvu ezilikhulu?
Njalo athi ese yi tholile a ye tshate ethokoza.
Esefikile ekhaya, abizele ndawonye abangane labomakhelwane, esithi kubo: Thokozani lami, ngoba ngithole imvu yami ebilahlekile.
Ngithi kini: Ngokunjalo kuzakuba khona intokozo ezulwini ngesoni esisodwa esiphendukayo, kulabalungileyo abangamatshumi ayisificamunwemunye lasificamunwemunye, abangasweli ukuphenduka.
Loba nguwuphi umfazi othi elenhlamvu zesiliva ezilitshumi, uba elahlekelwa luhlamvu olulodwa lwesiliva, angalumathisi isibane, athanyele indlu, adingisise aze a lu thole?
Njalo nxa ese lu tholile ubizela ndawonye abangane labomakhelwane, athi: Thokozani lami, ngoba sengilutholile uhlamvu lwesiliva ebengilahlekelwe yilo.
Ngokunjalo, ngithi kini, ikhona intokozo phambi kwezingilosi zikaNkulunkulu ngesoni esisodwa esiphendukayo.
Wasesithi: Umuntu othile wayelamadodana amabili;
encinyane yawo yasisithi kuyise: Baba, nginika isabelo sempahla.
Njalo kungelansuku ezinengi emva kwalokhu indodana encinyane yabutha konke yasuka yahamba yaya elizweni elikhatshana, njalo lapho yachitha khona impahla yayo, iphila okobuhlanya.
Yathi isichithile konke, kwavela indlala enkulu kulelolizwe, yona yasiqala ukuswela.
Yasisuka yazihlanganisa lesinye sezakhamizi zalelolizwe; njalo sayithuma emasimini aso ukuze yeluse izingulube.
Yasifisa ukugcwalisa isisu sayo ngamakhasi ingulube eziwadlayo; njalo kwakungelamuntu oyinika ulutho.
Kwathi ingqondoyayo isibuyile yathi: Zingaki izisebenzi zikababa eziqatshiweyo ezilezinkwa ezinengi kakhulu, kanti mina ngiyafa yindlala;
ngizasukuma ngiye kubaba, ngithi kuye: Baba, ngonile ezulwini, laphambi kwakho;
njalo; ngenza ngibe njengomunye wezisebenzi zakho eziqatshiweyo.
Yasisukuma yaya kuyise. Kodwa kuthe isesekhatshana, uyise wayibona, waba lesihelo.
Indodana yasisithi kuye: Baba, ngonile ezulwini.
Kodwa uyise wathi ezincekwini zakhe: Khuphani lilethe isembatho esihle kakhulu liyigqokise;
lilethe ithole elinonisiweyo;
ngoba indodana yami le ibifile, isibuye yaphila; ibilahlekile, itholiwe.
Kodwa indodana yakhe endala yayisensimini; yathi isiza isondela endlini, yezwa ukuhlabelela lokusina.
Yasibizela kuyo omunye wezinceku, yabuza ukuthi zitshoni lezizinto.
Yasisithi kuyo: Umfowenu ufikile; loyihlo uhlabile ithole elinonisiweyo, ngoba ememukele ephila.
Kodwa yathukuthela, ayizange ifune ukungena; ngakho uyise waphuma wayincenga.
Kodwa yaphendula yathi kuyise: Khangela, iminyaka engaka ngikusebenzela, kangizange ngeqe umlayo wakho, kodwa kawuzange unginike lazinyane lembuzi.
Kodwa kuthe isifikile lindodana yakho eyachitha impahla yakho lezifebe, wayihlabela.
Wasesithi kuyo: Ndodana, wena uhlezi ulami.
Kodwa bekufanele ukuthi sijabule sithokoze.
Wasekhuluma futhi kubafundi bakhe esithi: Kwakukhona umuntu othile onothileyo, owayelomphathi; lalo wayemangalelwe kuye njengochitha impahla yakhe.
Wasembiza wathi kuye: Kuyini lokhu engikuzwayo ngawe? Landisa ngobuphathi bakho; ngoba ungebe usaba ngumphathi.
Umphathi wasesithi ngaphakathi kwakhe: Ngizakwenzani, lokhu inkosi yami isingemuka ubuphathi? Kangilamandla okugebha, ngilenhloni zokuphanza.
Ngiyakwazi engizakwenza, ukuze nxa sengikhutshiwe ebuphathini, bangemukele ezindlini zabo.
Wasebabizela kuye ngamunye abalemilandu enkosini yakhe, wathi kowokuqala: Ulomlandu ongakanani enkosini yami?
Wasesithi yena: Izilinganiso ezilikhulu zamagcobo. Wasesithi kuye: Thatha incwadi yakho, uhlale phansi ubhale masinya amatshumi amahlanu.
Wasesithi komunye: Wena-ke ulomlandu ongakanani? Wasesithi: Izilinganiso ezilikhulu zamabele. Wasesithi kuye: Thatha incwadi yakho, ubhale amatshumi ayisificaminwembili.
Inkosi yasimbabaza umphathi.
Lami ngithi kini: Zenzeleni lina abangane.
Othembekileyo kokuncinyanyana uthembekile lakokukhulu, longathembekanga kokuncinyanyana kathembekanga lakokukhulu.
Ngakho uba lingathembekanga kuMamona ongalunganga, ngubani ozaliphathisa into eqotho?
Futhi uba lingathembekanga kokomunye, ngubani ozalinika okungokwenu?
Kayikho inceku engakhonza amakhosi amabili.
Njalo labaFarisi ababethanda imali bazizwa zonke lezizinto.
Kodwa wathi kubo: Lina yini elizilungisisayo phambi kwabantu.
Umlayo labaprofethi kukhonakuze kube nguJohane; kusukela lapho ivangeli lombuso kaNkulunkulu liyatshunyayelwa.
Kodwa kulula ukuthi kudlule izulu lomhlaba, kulokuthi kuwe ichatshana elilodwa lomlayo.
Wonke owala umkakhe athathe omunye uyafeba; njalo wonke othatha owaliwe yindoda uyafeba.
Kwakukhona umuntu othile onothileyo, owayegqoka eziyibubende.
Kwakukhona futhi umuntu othile ongumyanga othiwa nguLazaro,
wafisa ukusuthiswa; kanti lezinja zazisiza zikhothe izilonda zakhe.
Kwasekusithi ongumyanga wafa, wathwalelwa zingilosi; lesinothi laso safa, sangcwatshwa.
Sisesihogweni.
Sona sasesimemeza sisithi: Baba Abrahama, ngihawukela.
Kodwa uAbrahama wathi: Ndodana, khumbula ukuthi wemukela okuhle, njalo wena uyahlupheka.
Langaphezu kwakho konke lokhu, kubekiwe phakathi kwethu lani igebe elikhulu, ukuze kuthi abafuna ukuchapha besuka ngapha beze ngakini bangekwenze, labangapho bangechaphele ngakithi.
Sasesisithi: Ngakho ngiyakuncenga, baba, ukuthi umthume endlini kababa,
ngoba ngilabafowethu abahlanu, ukuze abaxwayise.
UAbrahama wathi: BaloMozisi labaprofethi; kabezwe bona.
Sona sasesisithi: Hatshi bo, baba Abrahama; kodwa uba omunye kwabafileyo esiya kubo, bazaphenduka.
Kodwa wathi kuso: Uba bengalaleli.
Wasesithi kubafundi!
Kungaba ngcono kuye ukuthi ilitshe lokuchola elikhulu ligaxwe entanyeni yakhe, abesephoselwa olwandle.
Zinanzeleleni lina; futhi nxa ephenduka, mthethelele.
Njalo loba ekona kuze kube kasikhombisa ngosuku, abesebuya kuwe kasikhombisa ngosuku, esithi: Ngiyaphenduka; uzamthethelela.
Abaphostoli basebesithi eNkosini.
INkosi yasisithi: Uba lilokholo olungangohlamvu lwemasitedi.
Kodwa nguwuphi kini olenceku elimayo kumbe eyelusayo, ohle athi kiyo ingena ivela ensimini: Sondela, uhlale ekudleni?
Kodwa kazukutsho yini kuyo ukuthi: Lungisa engingakudla?
Uyayibonga yini leyonceku, ngoba yenze izinto ezilayiweyo? Angicabangi.
Kunjalo-ke lani, nxa selikwenzile konke elikulayiweyo, kalibokuthi: Sizinceku ezingasizi lutho, ngoba senze lokhu ebesifanele ukukwenza.
Kwasekusithi esahamba esiya eJerusalema.
Esangena emzaneni othile, amadoda alitshumi alobulephero amhlangabeza, ema khatshana;
wona asephakamisa ilizwi, esithi: Jesu, Nkosi, sihawukele!
Futhi kuthe e wa bona wathi kuwo: Hambani liyeziveza kubapristi. Kwasekusithi ekusukeni kwawo, ahlanjululwa.
Futhi omunye wawo, esebonile ukuthi usilisiwe, wabuyela, edumisa uNkulunkulu ngelizwi elikhulu;
wasesiwa ngobuso enyaweni zakhe.
Kodwa uJesu waphendula wathi: Kakuhlanjululwanga yini abalitshumi? Bangaphi pho abayisificamunwemunye?
Akuficakalanga ababuya ukunika uNkulunkulu udumo, ngaphandle kwalo owezizweni.
Wasesithi kuye: Sukuma uhambe; ukholo lwakho.
Kwathi ebuzwa ngabaFarisi, ukuthi umbuso kaNkulunkulu uzakuza nini;
njalo kabayikutsho ukuthi: Khangelani nanku, kumbe: Khangelani nankuya. Ngoba khangelani, umbuso kaNkulunkulu uphakathi kwenu.
Wasesithi kubafundi: Kuzafika insuku lapho elizafisa.
Njalo bazakuthi kini.
Ngoba njengombane ophazimayo ukhanyisa kusukela kokunye ukucinangaphansi kwezulu kusiya kokunye ukucinangaphansi kwezulu.
Kodwa kuqala imele ihlupheke izinto ezinengi njalo ilahlwe yilesisizukulwana.
Futhi njengoba kwenzeka ensukwini zikaNowa, kuzakuba njalo lensukwini zeNdodana yomuntu.
Babesidla, benatha, bethatha, besendiswa, kwaze kwaba lusuku uNowa angena ngalo emkhunjini, kwasekufika uzamcolo, wababhubhisa bonke.
Ngokufananayo futhi njengoba kwenzeka ensukwini zikaLothi; babesidla, benatha, bethenga, bethengisa, behlanyela, besakha;
kodwa ngosuku uLothi aphuma ngalo eSodoma, kwana umlilo lesibabule kuvela ezulwini, kwababhubhisa bonke;
kuzakuba njalo ngosuku ezakwembulwa ngalo iNdodana yomuntu.
Ngalolosuku, lowo ophezu kophahla lwendlu, lempahla zakhe zisendlini, angehli uku ya zithatha; losensimini ngokunjalo angabuyeli ezintweni ezisemuva.
Khumbulani umkaLothi.
Loba ngubani odinga ukusindisa impilo yakhe izamlahlekela.
Ngithi kini: Ngalobobusuku kuzakuba khona ababili embhedeni munye; omunye uzasuswa, lomunye atshiywe.
Kuzakuba khona abesifazanaababili bechola ndawonye; omunye uzasuswa, lomunye atshiywe.
Kuzakuba khona ababili ensimini; omunye uzasuswa, lomunye atshiywe.
Basebephendula bathi kuye: Ngaphi, Nkosi? Wasesithi kubo: Lapho okukhona isidumbu, ku lapho amanqe azabuthana khona.
Wasebatshela lomfanekiso esenzela ukuthi bafanele ukukhuleka isikhathi sonke,
wathi: Kwakukhona emzini othile umahluleli othile, owayengesabi uNkulunkulu, njalo engahloniphi muntu;
kwakukhona futhi kulowomuzi umfelokazi othile, njalo wayefika kuye, esithi: Ngiphindiselele esitheni sami.
Kodwa kavumanga okwesikhathi; kodwa emva kwalezizinto wathi ngaphakathi kwakhe: Lanxa ngingamesabi uNkulunkulu, ngingahloniphi muntu,
kodwa ngoba lumfelokazi engikhathaza, ngizamphindiselela.
INkosi yasisithi: Zwanini umahluleli ongalunganga akutshoyo.
Kanti uNkulunkulu?
Ngithi kini, uzahle enze. Kodwa-ke nxa iNdodana yomuntu ifika, izathola ukholo yini emhlabeni?
Wasekhuluma lumfanekiso lakwabathile ukuthi balungile, futhi bedelela abanye, wathi:
Abantu ababili benyukela ethempelini ukuyakhuleka; omunye engumFarisi.
UmFarisi wema wazikhulekela kanje wathi: Nkulunkulu, ngiyakubonga ukuthi kanginjengabanye abantu.
Ngizila ukudla kabili ngeviki.
Kodwa umthelisi emi khatshana.
Ngithi kini: Lo wehlela endlini yakhe.
Basebeletha kuye lensane, ukuze azibambe; kodwa abafundi be ku bona babakhuza.
Kodwa uJesu wazibizela kuye wathi: Vumelani abantwana abancane beze kimi, lingabenqabeli, ngoba umbuso kaNkulunkulu ungowabanje.
Ngiqinisile ngithi kini: Loba ngubani ongemukeli umbuso kaNkulunkulu njengomntwana omncane, kasoze angene kuwo.
Umbusi wasembuza, esithi: Mfundisi olungileyo, ngenzeni ukuze ngidle ilifa lempilo elaphakade?
Kodwa uJesu wathi kuye: Ungibizelani ngokuthiolungileyo? Kakho olungileyo, ngaphandle koyedwa, uNkulunkulu.
Uyayazi imilayo ethi: Ungafebi, ungabulali, ungebi, ungafakazi amanga, hlonipha uyihlo lonyoko.
Yena wasesithi: Konke lokhu ngikugcinile kusukela ebutsheni bami.
Kodwa uJesu esizwa lezizinto wathi kuye: Usaswele ulutho olulodwa; thengisa konke olakho, wabele abayanga, njalo uzakuba lempahla eligugu ezulwini; njalo uze lapha ungilandele.
Kodwa yena esizwa lezizinto wadana kakhulu; ngoba wayenothile kakhulu.
Kwathi uJesu ebona ukuthi usedane kakhulu wathi: Abalenotho bazangena ngokulukhuni kangakanani embusweni kaNkulunkulu.
Ngoba kulula ukuthi ikamela lingene ngentunja yenalithi, kulokuthi umuntu onothileyo angene embusweni kaNkulunkulu.
Aba ku zwayo basebesithi: Pho kungasindiswa bani?
Kodwa yena wathi: Izinto ezingenzekiyo ebantwini ziyenzeka kuNkulunkulu.
UPetro wasesithi: Khangela, thina sitshiye konke, sakulandela.
Wasesithi kubo: Ngiqinisile ngithi kini: Kakho umuntu otshiye indlu, kumbe abazali, kumbe abafowabo, kumbe umka khe, kumbe abantwana, ngenxa yombuso kaNkulunkulu,
ongayikwemukela okuphindwe kanengi.
Wasezithathela abalitshumi lambili, wathi kubo: Khangelani, senyukela eJerusalema.
Ngoba izanikelwa kwabezizwe, iyangiswe,
ba yi tshaye ngesiswepu bayibulale; njalo ngosuku lwesithathu izabuya ivuke.
Kodwa bona kabaqedisisanga lutho ngalezizinto.
Kwasekusithi esesondela siphanza;
sathi sisizwa ixuku lisedlula, sabuza ukuthi kuyini lokho.
Basebesitshela bathi: UJesu weNazaretha uyedlula.
Sasesimemeza, sisithi: Jesu, Ndodana kaDavida, ngihawukela!
Ababehamba phambili basebesikhuza ukuthi sithule; kodwa samemeza kakhulukazi, sisithi: Ndodana kaDavida, ngihawukele!
UJesu wema-ke walaya ukuthi silethwe kuye; sathi sesisondele wasibuza,
esithi: Ufuna ukuthi ngikwenzeleni? Sasesisithi: Nkosi, ukuthi ngibuye ngibone.
UJesu wasesithi kuso: Buya ubone! Ukholo lwakho lukusindisile.
Njalo sahle sabuya sabona, samlandela, sidumisa uNkulunkulu.
Wathi uJesuengena, wadabula eJeriko.
Njalo khangela, kwakukhona indoda eyayithiwa nguZakewu ngebizo; owayeyinduna yabathelisi, njalo wayenothile;
wadinga ukubona uJesu ukuthi ungubani.
Wasegijimela phambili wakhwela emkhiweni wesikhamore ukuze ambone; ngoba wayezadlula ngaleyo ndlela.
Kwathi uJesu efika kuleyondawo, wakhangela phezulu wambona, wathi kuye: Zakewu, phangisa wehle; ngoba lamuhla ngimele ukuhlala endlini yakho.
Wasephangisa wehla, wamemukela ethokoza.
Futhi bonke be ku bona basola.
Kodwa uZakewu wema wathi eNkosini: Khangela, ingxenye yempahla yami, Nkosi, ngiyipha abayanga; kuthi uba ngimthathele umuntu.
UJesu wasesithi kuye: Lamuhla usindiso lufikile kulindlu, ngoba.
Ngoba iNdodana yomuntu.
Kwathi besizwa lezizinto, wengezelela watsho umfanekiso, ngoba wayeseduze leJerusalema.
Wasesithi-ke: Umuntu.
Wasebiza inceku zakhe ezilitshumi, wazinika impondo ezilitshumi, wathi kuzo: Sebenzani ngemali ngize ngibuye.
Kodwa izakhamizi zakhe zamzonda, zathuma amanxusa emva kwakhe, zisithi: Kasithandi ukuthi lo asibuse.
Kwasekusithi esebuyile esewemukele umbuso, wathi azibizelwe kuye lezozinceku, ayezinike imali, ukuze azi ukuthi yileyo laleyo izuzeni ngokuthengiselana.
Kweza-ke eyokuqala, yathi: Nkosi, impondo yakho izuze impondo ezilitshumi.
Wasesithi kuyo: Kuhle, nceku elungileyo.
Kwasekusiza eyesibili, yathi: Nkosi, impondo yakho yenze impondo ezinhlanu.
Wasesithi lakuyo: Lawe woba phezu kwemizi emihlanu.
Kwasekusiza enye, isithi: Nkosi, khangela impondo yakho, engayibeka elenjini;
ngoba bengikwesaba, ngoba ungumuntu olukhuni; uthatha lokho ongakubekanga, futhi uvune lokho ongakuhlanyelanga.
Wasesithi kuyo: Ngizakugweba ngoku vela emlonyeni wakho, nceku embi ukuthi mina ngingumuntu olukhuni, othatha lokho engingakubekanga, futhi avune lokho engingakuhlanyelanga;
ngakho kungani ungafakanga imali yami ebhanga?
Wasesithi kulabo ababemi khona: Memukeni impondo, li yi nike lowo olempondo ezilitshumi.
Kodwa bathi kuye: Nkosi, lowo ulempondo ezilitshumi.
Ngoba ngithi kini: Wonke olakho uzaphiwa; kodwa lowo ongelakho, uzakwemukwa lalokho alakho.
Kodwa lezozitha zami, ebezingathandi ukuthi ngizibuse.
Esetshilo lezizinto, wahamba phambili.
Kwasekusithi esondela eBetfage leBethani entabeni okuthiwa ngeyeMihlwathi, wathuma ababili kubafundi bakhe,
esithi: Hambani liye emzaneni okhangelene lani; lizakuthi lingena kuwo lifice ithole likababhemi libotshiwe, okungazanga kuhlale kulo muntu; lilikhulule li li lethe.
Uba umuntu elibuza esithi: Li li khululelani? Lizakutsho njalo kuye ukuthi: INkosi iyaliswela.
Ababethunyiwe bahamba-ke bafica kunjengoba ebatshelile.
Kuthe besalikhulula ithole, abaninilo bathi kubo: Lilikhululelani ithole?
Bona basebesithi: INkosi iyaliswela.
Basebeliletha kuJesu; baphosela izembatho zabo phezu kwethole likababhemi, bamkhweza uJesu kulo.
Kwathi ehamba, bendlala izembatho zabo phansi endleleni.
Kwathi khathesi esesondela ekwehleni kwentaba yeMihlwathi, ixuku lonke labafundi laqala ukuthokoza lokudumisa uNkulunkulu ngelizwi elikhulu,
lisithi: Ibusisiwe inkosi ezayo ebizweni leNkosi.
Labanye babaFarisi ababesexukwini bathi kuye: Mfundisi, khuza abafundi bakho.
Wasephendula wathi kubo: Ngithi kini, uba bethula laba, amatshe azamemeza.
Kwathi esondela, ewubona umuzi,
esithi: Kungathi ngabe wazi lawe, ngitsho ngalolusuku lwakho, izinto zokuthula kwakho; kodwa-ke khathesi zifihlakele emehlweni akho.
Ngoba insuku zizakwehlela phezu kwakho, lapho izitha zakho zizakwakhela umthangala,
zikudilizele phansi wena labantwana bakho.
Wasengena ethempelini, waqala ukuxotsha abathengisayo kulo, labathengayo,
esithi kubo: Kulotshiwe ukuthi: Indlu yami yindlu yomkhuleko.
Njalo wayefundisa ethempelini insuku zonke lenduna zabantu badinga ukumbulala;
kodwa kabatholanga abangakwenza, ngoba abantu bonke banamathela kuye be m lalela.
Kwasekusithi ngolunye lwalezonsuku, efundisa abantu ethempelini etshumayela ivangeli, ba m fikela abapristi abakhulu lababhali kanye labadala,
basebekhuluma laye, besithi: Sitshele, ukuthi izinto lezi uzenza ngaliphi igunya, kumbe ngubani okunike leligunya?
Wasephendula wathi kubo: Lami ngizalibuza umbuzo ube munye, njalo lingitshele:
Ubhabhathizo lukaJohane lwavela ezulwini, kumbe ebantwini?
Basebezindlisana, besithi: Uba sisithi: Ezulwini; uzakuthi: Kungani-ke lingamkholwanga?
Kodwa uba sisithi: Ebantwini; abantu bonke bazasikhanda ngamatshe.
Basebephendula ngokuthikabazi lapho o lwa vela khona.
UJesu wasesithi kubo: Lami kangilitsheli ukuthi ngenza lezizinto ngaliphi igunya.
Waseqala ukutshela abantu lumfanekiso, esithi: Umuntu othile wahlanyela isivini, wasiqatshisa kubalimi;
kwathi ngesikhathi esifaneleyo wathuma inceku kubalimi, ukuze bayinike okwesithelo sesivini; kodwa abalimi bayitshaya ba yi thumeza ize.
Wasethuma njalo enye inceku; layo bayitshaya ba yi yangisa, ba yi thumeza ize.
Wasephinda ethuma leyesithathu; layo leyo ba yi limaza ba yi phosela ngaphandle.
Umninisivini wasesithi: Ngizakwenza njani? Ngizathuma indodana yami ethandekayo; mhlawumbe bebona yona baza yi hlonipha.
Kodwa abalimi beyibona bazindlisana, besithi: Le yindlalifa; wozani, siyibulale, ukuze ilifa libe ngelethu.
Bayiphosela ngaphandle kwesivini, ba yi bulala. Kambe uzakwenzani kubo umninisivini?
Uzakuza, ababhubhise labobalimi, anikele isivini kwabanye. Be ku zwa basebesithi: Akungabi njalo!
Kodwa wabakhangela wathi?
Wonke owela phezu kwalelolitshe, uzaphahlazwa; kodwa loba ngubani eliwela phezu kwakhe, lizamchoboza.
Abapristi abakhulu lababhali basebedinga ukumbamba ngezandla ngalelohola, kodwa besaba abantu; ngoba baqedisisa ukuthi wayekhuluma lumfanekiso emelane labo.
Basebe m qaphela.
Bambuza-ke, besithi: Mfundisi, siyazi ukuthi wena ukhuluma ufundise ngokuqondileyo, kawemukeli buso, kodwa ufundisa indlela kaNkulunkulu ngeqiniso.
Sivunyelwe yini ukuthela kuKesari, kumbe hatshi?
Kodwa wabubona ubuqili babo, wathi kubo: Lingilingelani?
Ngitshengisani udenariyo; ulomfanekiso lombhalo kabani? Basebephendula besithi: OkaKesari.
Wasesithi kubo: Ngakho nikani uKesari okukaKesari, loNkulunkulu okukaNkulunkulu.
Basebesehluleka ukumbamba ngelizwi lakhephambi kwabantu; basebemangaliswa yimpendulo yakhe, bathula.
Kwasekusiza kuye abathile babaSadusi, abaphika besithi kakukho ukuvuka kwabafileyo, bambuza,
besithi: Mfundisi, uMozisi wasibhalela ukuthi: Uba kusifa umfowabo womuntu elomkakhe, lo abesesifa engelamntwana, umfowabo kamthathe umfazi, abesemvusela inzalo umfowabo.
Ngakho kwakulezelamani eziyisikhombisa; owokuqala wasethatha umfazi, wafa engelamntwana;
lowesibili wamthatha umfazi, laye lo wafa engelamntwana;
lowesithathu wamthatha. Kwaba njalo-ke lakwabayisikhombisa; abatshiyanga abantwana, bafa.
Ekucineni kwabo bonke kwafa lomfazi.
Ngakho ekuvukeni kwabafileyo, uzafika abe ngumkabani kubo? Ngoba abayisikhombisa babelaye engumkabo.
UJesu wasephendula wathi kubo: Abantwana balumhlaba bayathatha, bendiswe;
kodwa labo okuzathiwa bafanele ukuzuza lowomhlaba lokuvuka okwabafileyo kabathathani, kabendiswa;
ngoba bengelakuphinda bafe; ngoba banjengezingilosi, njalo bangabantwana bakaNkulunkulu, bengabantwana bokuvuka.
Kodwa ukuthi abafileyo bayavuswa, loMozisi wakutshengisa esihlahleni.
Futhi kayisuye uNkulunkulu wabafileyo, kodwa owabaphilayo; ngoba bonke baphilela yena.
Abathile bababhali basebephendula bathi: Mfundisi, ukhulume kuhle.
Njalo kababanga lesibindi sokuphinda bambuze ulutho.
Wasesithi kubo: Batsho njani ukuthi uKristu uyiNdodana kaDavida?
Ngoba uDavida uqobo lwakhe uthi encwadini yeziHlabelelo: INkosi yathi eNkosini yami: Hlala ngakwesokunene sami,
ngize ngenze izitha zakho zibe yisenabelo senyawo zakho.
Ngakho uDavida umbiza ngokuthi yiNkosi, pho uyindodana yakhe njani?
Kwathi besalalele abantu bonke, wathi kubafundi bakhe:
Xwayani ababhali abathanda ukuhamba bembethe izembatho ezinde, njalo bethanda ukubingelelwa emidangeni, lezihlalo zabahloniphekayo ezilayelweni;
abadla izindlu zabafelokazi, bekhuleka isikhathieside ngokuzenzisa. Laba bazakwemukela ukulahlwa okukhulu.
Wathi ephakamisa amehlo wabona abanothileyo.
Wabona lomfelokazi othile ongumyanga ephosela khona inhlamvana ezincane ezimbili zemali.
Wathi: Ngiqinisile ngithi kini: Lumfelokazi ongumyanga uphosele okwedlula okwabo bonke;
ngoba bonke laba baphosele kokunengi kwabo eminikelweni kaNkulunkulu, kodwa yena ebuyangeni bakhe uphosele konke alakho abephila ngakho.
Abanye besakhuluma ngethempeli, ukuthi liceciswe ngamatshe amahle langezipho, wathi:
Lezizinto elizibonayo, kuzafika insuku okungayikutshiywa ngazo ilitshe phezu kwelitshe, elingayikudilizelwa phansi.
Basebembuza, besithi: Mfundisi, pho lezizinto zizakuba nini? Lesibonakaliso siyini, lapho sekuzakwenzeka lezizinto?
Wasesithi: Qaphelani ukuthi lingaduhiswa; ngoba abanengi bazakuza ebizweni lami.
Njalo nxa lisizwa ngezimpi langeziphithiphithi.
Wasesithi kubo: Isizwe sizavukela isizwe, lombuso u vuk ele umbuso;
njalo kuzakuba khona ukuzamazama komhlaba okukhulu indawo ngendawo lezindlala labomatshayabhuqe bezifo; kube khona lezinto ezesabekayo lezibonakaliso ezinkulu ezivela ezulwini.
Kodwa ngaphambi kwakho konke lokhu bazalibamba ngezandla zabo, ba li zingele.
Njalo lokhukuzaphenduka kini kube yibufakazi.
Ngakho kubekeni enhliziyweni zenu;
ngoba mina ngizalinika umlomo lenhlakanipho, abangekuphike, bamelane lakho, bonke abayizitha zenu.
Njalo lizanikelwa langabazali labafowenu lezihlobo labangane, njalo bazabulala abanyebenu.
Njalo lizazondwa yibo bonke ngenxa yebizo lami.
Kodwa kakuyikulahleka ngitsho unwele lwekhanda lenu.
Ekubekezeleni kwenu.
Kodwa nxa libona iJerusalema ihanqwe ngamabutho.
Ngalesosikhathi abaseJudiya kababalekele ezintabeni; labaphakathi kwayo baphume; labasemaphandleni.
Ngoba lezi zinsuku zempindiselo.
Kodwa maye kwabakhulelweyo labamunyisayo ngalezonsuku! Ngoba kuzakuba khona ukuhlupheka okukhulu emhlabeni, lolaka kulesisizwe.
Njalo bazakuwa ngobukhali benkemba, bathunjelwe ezizweni zonke.
Kuzakuba khona izibonakaliso elangeni lenyangeni lezinkanyezini; lemhlabeni usizi lwezizwe ngokudideka; kudume ulwandle lamagagasi,
abantu baphele amandla ngenxa yokwesaba langokubona lokho okuzayo emhlabeni; ngoba amandla amazulu azazanyazanyiswa.
Khona-ke bezayibona iNdodana yomuntu isiza eyezini ilamandla lenkazimulo enkulu.
Njalo nxa kuqala ukwenzeka lezizinto, manini liqonde njalo liphakamise amakhanda enu.
Wasebatshela umfanekiso: Khangelani umkhiwa lazo zonke izihlahla;
nxa sezihluma, liyazibonela lani likwazi ukuthi ihlobo selisondele.
Ngokunjalo lani, nxa libona lezizinto zisenzeka, yazini ukuthi umbuso kaNkulunkulu useduze.
Ngiqinisile ngithi kini: Lesisizukulwana asisoze sidlule, kuze kwenzeke zonke izinto.
Kuzadlula izulu lomhlaba, kodwa amazwi ami kawasoze adlule.
Njalo ziqapheleni;
ngoba luzafika njengomjibila phezu kwabo bonke abahlezi ebusweni bomhlaba wonke.
Ngakho lindani ngezikhathi zonke.
Njalo wayefundisa.
Lekuseni kakhulu abantu bonke babesiza kuye.
Kwasekusondela umkhosi wesinkwa esingelamvubelo, othiwa liphasika.
Abapristi abakhulu lababhali basebedinga ukuthi bangambulala njani; ngoba babesesaba abantu.
USathane, owayengowenani labalitshumi lambili.
Wasesuka wayakhuluma labapristi abakhulu lezinduna ngokuthi angamnikela njani kubo.
Basebethokoza, basebevumelana ukumnika imali.
Yena wasevuma, njalo wadinga ithuba elihle lokumnikela kubo lingekho ixuku.
Lwaselufika usuku lwesinkwa esingelamvubelo, okwakumele kuhlatshwe ngalo iphasika.
Wasethuma uPetro loJohane, esithi: Hambani li ye silungisela iphasika, ukuze sidle.
Basebesithi kuye: Uthanda ukuthi silungise ngaphi?
Wasesithi kubo: Khangelani, kuzakuthi selingenile emzini, umuntu uzahlangana lani ethwele imbiza yamanzi; limlandele endlini azangena kuyo.
Beselisithi kumninindlu: Uthi uMfundisi kuwe: Ingaphi indlu yezihambi, lapho engingadlela khona iphasika labafundi bami?
Yena-ke uzalitshengisa indlu enkulu ephezulu eyendlelweyo; lilungise khona.
Bahamba-ke bafica njengokutsho kwakhe kubo; basebelungisa iphasika.
Kwathi selifikile ihola, wahlala phansi.
Wasesithi kubo: Ngokunxwanela nginxwanele ukudla lani leliphasika ngingakahlupheki;
ngoba ngithi kini: Kangisoze ngidle futhi kulo, lize ligcwaliseke.
Wasethatha inkezo, esebongile wathi: Thathani lokhu, beselisabelana;
ngoba ngithi kini: Kangisoze nginathe okwesithelo sevini, kuze kufike umbuso kaNkulunkulu.
Wasethatha isinkwa.
Ngokunjalo lenkezo emva kokudla, esithi: Inkezo le iyisivumelwano esitsha egazini lami, elichithelwa lina.
Kodwa khangelani, isandla songinikelayo silami etafuleni.
Ngoba isibili iNdodana yomuntu ihamba; kodwa maye kulowomuntu enikelwa nguye!
Bona basebeqala ukubuzana ukuthi kambe ngubani kubo ozakwenza lokho.
Kwavela lokuphikisana phakathi kwabo.
Wasesithi kubo: Amakhosi abezizwe azibusa ngobulukhuni, leziphathamandla zazo zithiwa ngabasizi.
Kodwa lina kakungabi njalo; kodwa omkhulu phakathi kwenu, longumkhokheli njengosebenzayo.
Ngoba nguwuphi omkhulu.
Lina-ke liyibo ababehlezi lami ezilingweni zami;
njalo mina ngilimisele,
ukuthi lidle linathe etafuleni lami embusweni wami.
INkosi yasisithi: Simoni, Simoni, khangela, uSathane ulifunisisile;
kodwa mina ngikukhulekele.
Kodwa wathi kuye: Nkosi, lentolongweni.
Kodwa yena wathi: Ngiyakutshela, Petro, iqhude kaliyikukhala lamuhla, ungakaphiki kathathu ukuthi uyangazi.
Wasesithi kubo: Mhla ngilithuma, laswela yini ulutho? Basebesithi: Kakulalutho.
Wasesithi kubo: Kodwa khathesi lowo olomxhaka ka wu thathe, ngokunjalo lesikhwama; lalowo ongelakho, athengise isembatho sakhe, athenge inkemba.
Ngoba ngithi kini, kusamele kugcwaliseke kimi lokhu okulotshiweyo, ukuthi: Wabalwa kanye lezoni.
Basebesithi: Nkosi, khangela, nanzi inkemba ezimbili. Wasesithi kubo: Kwanele.
Wasephuma; labafundi bakhe bamlandela.
Esefikile kuleyondawo, wathi kubo.
Yena wasemonyuka kubo okungaba libangalokuphosa ilitshe, waguqa phansi ngamadolo wakhuleka,
esithi: Baba, uba uthanda, susa linkezo kimi; kodwa-ke kungenziwa intando yami, kodwa eyakho.
Kwabonakala kuye ingilosi evela ezulwini imqinisa.
Esesesizini olunzima, wakhuleka kakhulu. Njalo izithukuthuku zakhe zaba njengamathonsi egazi zawela emhlabathini.
Esesukumile emkhulekweni, weza kubafundi bakhe, wabafica belele ngenxa yokudabuka,
wasesithi kubo: Lilaleleni? Vukani likhuleke, ukuze lingangeni ekulingweni.
Kwathi esakhuluma, khangela, ixuku, lalowo okuthiwa nguJudasi, omunye wabalitshumi lambili, ehamba phambi kwabo, wasesondela kuJesu ukumanga.
Kodwa uJesu wathi kuye: Judasi, uyayinikela yini iNdodana yomuntu ngokuyanga?
Kwathi labo ababengakuye sebebona okuzakwenzeka bathi kuye: Nkosi, sigadle yini ngenkemba?
Omunye wabo wasegadla inceku yompristi omkhulu, waquma indlebe yayo yokunene.
Kodwa uJesu waphendula wathi: Yekelani kuze kube yilokhu. Wasethinta indlebe yayo, wayisilisa.
UJesu wasesithi kubapristi abakhulu lezinduna zethempeli labadala ababeze kuye: Liphume njengokuyamelana lomphangi yini lilezinkemba lezinduku?
Nxa bengilani insuku ngensuku ethempelini, kalelulanga izandla ukumelana lami; kodwa leli lihola lenu.
Sebembambile ba m qhuba, bamusa endlini yompristi omkhulu.
Sebebasile umlilo, sebehlezi phansi ndawonye, uPetro wahlala phakathi kwabo.
Kodwa incekukazi ethile imbona ehlezi emlilweni, yamjolozela, yathi: Lumuntu laye ube laye.
Kodwa wamphika, wathi: Mama, kangimazi.
Emva kwesikhatshana omunye: Lawe ungomunye wabo. Kodwa uPetro wathi: Ndoda, kangisu ye.
Sekungaba kwedlule ihola elilodwa, omunye waqinisa, esithi: Isibili laye ube laye; ngoba futhi ungumGalili.
Kodwa uPetro wathi: Ndoda, kangazi ukuthi uthini. Njalo khonokho esakhuluma lakhala iqhude.
INkosi yasiphenduka yamkhangela uPetro.
UPetro wasephuma phandle wakhala ngokubabayo.
Lamadoda ayembambile uJesu.
Amembesa, amtshaya ubuso, asembuza, esithi: Profetha! Ngubani okutshayileyo?
Akhuluma lezinye izinto ezinengi kuye ehlambaza.
Kwathi sekusile, bathi:
Uba unguKristu, sitshele. Wasesithi kubo: Uba ngilitshela, kalisoze likholwe;
njalo uba lami ngilibuza, kalisoze lingiphendule, loba li ngi khulule.
Kusukela khathesi iNdodana yomuntu izahlala ngakwesokunene samandla kaNkulunkulu.
Basebesithi bonke: Kanti uyiNdodana kaNkulunkulu.
Basebesithi: Pho sisafunelani ubufakazi? Ngoba sesizizwele uqobo lwethu emlonyeni wakhe.
Kwasekusukuma ixuku labo lonke, lamusa kuPilatu.
Baqala ukummangalela, besithi: Simficile lo eduhisa isizwe.
UPilatu wasembuza? Wasemphendula wathi: Uyatsho wena.
Wasesithi uPilatu kubapristi abakhulu lemaxukwini: Kangitholi cala kulumuntu.
Kodwa baqinisa, besithi: Udunga abantu, efundisa kuyo yonke iJudiya.
Lapho uPilatu esizwa kuthiwaiGalili wabuza ukuthi lumuntu ungumGalili yini.
Kwathi esezwile ukuthi ungowombuso kaHerodi.
Kwathi uHerodi embona uJesu wathokoza kakhulu; ngoba wayekade ethanda ukumbona.
Wambuza ngamazwi amanengi; kodwa yena kamphendulanga lutho.
Abapristi abakhulu lababhali babemi, bemmangalela ngamandla.
UHerodi lamabutho akhe.
Ngalolosuku uHerodi kanye loPilatu baba ngabangane omunye komunye; ngoba ngaphambi kwalokhu babelobutha phakathi kwabo.
UPilatu wasebizela ndawonye abapristi abakhulu lababusi labantu,
wathi kubo: Limlethile kimi lumuntu;
hatshi ngitsho loHerodi; ngoba ngilithumeze kuye, njalo khangelani, kakulalutho olufanele ukufa olwenziwe nguye.
Ngakho ngizamtshaya ngi m khulule.
Kwakufanele ukuthi abakhululele abe munye ngomkhosi.
Bamemeza bonke kanyekanye besithi: Msuse lo, usikhululele uBarabasi
(owayephoselwe entolongweni ngenxa yomvukela othile owenzeka phakathi komuzi langenxa yokubulala).
Ngakho uPilatu wabuya wakhuluma labo, efuna ukumkhulula uJesu.
Kodwa bamemeza, besithi: Bethela, mbethele!
Wasesithi kubo ngokwesithathu: Ngoba lo enze bubi bani.
Kodwa baqinisa ngamazwi amakhulu, befuna ukuthi abethelwe; lamazwi abo lawabapristi abakhulu aphumelela.
UPilatu wasequma ukuthi kwenziwe isicelo sabo.
Wasebakhululela lowo ababemcelile owayephoselwe entolongweni ngenxa yomvukela lokubulala.
Kwathi sebemqhuba, babamba uSimoni othile umKurene owayevela emaphandleni, bamethesa isiphambano, ukuthi asi thwale ngemva kukaJesu.
Laselimlandela ixuku elikhulu labantu, labesifazana labo ababekhala bemlilela.
Kodwa uJesu ephendukela kubo wathi: Madodakazi eJerusalema, lingangikhaleli mina, kodwa zikhaleleni lina labantwana benu,
ngoba khangelani, ziyeza insuku abazakutsho ngazo ukuthi: Zibusisiwe inyumba, lezizalo ezingazalanga, lamabele angamunyisanga.
Khona bezaqalisa ukuthi ezintabeni: Welani phezu kwethu; lemaqaqeni: Sisibekeleni.
Ngoba uba besenza lezizinto esihlahleni esimanzi?
Kwaqhutshwa labanye abenzi bobubi ababili.
Sebefikile endaweni ethiwa luKhakhayi, bambethela khona.
UJesu wasesithi: Baba.
Labantu bema babukela.
Labebutho bamklolodela,
besithi: Uba wena uyiNkosi yamaJuda, zisindise wena.
Kwakukhona lombhalo ngaphezu kwakhe.
Lomunye wabenzi bobubi ababelengisiwe.
Kodwa omunye waphendula emkhuza, esithi: Wena kawumesabi yini uNkulunkulu, lokhu lawe ukulokhukulahlwa?
Thina kambe kusilungele, ngoba semukela okulingene ukwenza kwethu; kodwa lo kenzanga lutho olungafanelanga.
Wasesithi kuJesu: Ungikhumbule, Nkosi, lapha ufika embusweni wakho.
UJesu wasesithi kuye: Ngiqinisile ngithi kuwe: Lamuhla uzakuba lami eParadise.
Kwakungaba lihola lesithupha, kwaba khona ubumnyama phezu komhlaba wonke kwaze kwaba lihola lesificamunwemunye,
futhi ilanga lalifiphaziwe.
UJesu wasememeza ngelizwi elikhulu esithi.
Kwathi induna yekhulu isibonile okwenzekileyo, isithi: Isibili lumuntu ubelungile.
Lamaxuku wonke ayebuthene ukubukela lokho, sebebonile izinto ezenzekileyo, babuyela bezitshaya izifuba.
Bonke abazana laye, bema khatshana, bebona lezizinto.
Njalo khangela, indoda ethiwa nguJosefa;
yena wayengavumelananga lecebo lesenzo sabo; waye vela eArimathiya umuzi wamaJuda, laye ngokwakhe;
lowo wasuka waya kuPilatu wacela isidumbu sikaJesu.
Wasesethula wasigoqela ngelembu elicolekileyo, wasibeka engcwabeni elaligujwe edwaleni, lapho okwakungazanga kubekwe khona umuntu.
Kwakulusuku lwamalungiselelo, lesabatha.
Labesifazana, ababeze laye bevela eGalili.
Basebebuyela emuva balungisa amakha lamagcobo.
Kodwa ngo sukulokuqala lweviki.
Bafica ilitshe ligiqiwe lasuswa engcwabeni.
Kuthe bengena kabasitholanga isidumbu seNkosi uJesu.
Kwasekusithi bedidekile kakhulu ngalokhu;
njalo besesaba, bakhothamisa ubuso emhlabathini, athi kubo: Lidingelani ophilayo kwabafileyo?
Kakho lapha, kodwa uvukile; khumbulani ukuthi wakhuluma njani kini, eseseGalili,
esithi: INdodana yomuntu imele ukunikelwa ezandleni zabantu abayizoni, ibethelwe.
Basebewakhumbula amazwi akhe.
Sebebuyile bevela engcwabeni, babika konke lokhu kwabalitshumi lanye lakubo bonke abanye.
KwakunguMariya Magadalena.
Kodwa amazwi abo akhanya kibo njengokukhuluma okuyize, futhi kabaze bawakholwa.
Kodwa uPetro wasukuma wagijimela engcwabeni.
Futhi khangela, ngalona lolosuku ababili babo babehamba besiya emzaneni, obizo lawo yiEmawusi.
Njalo bona babekhulumisana ngazo zonke lezizinto ezenzekileyo.
Kwasekusithi bekhulumisana bebuzana, uJesu uqobo wasondela wahamba kanye labo,
kodwa amehlo abo ayebanjiwe ukuze bangamazi.
Wasesithi kubo: Ngamazwi bani la elikhulumisana ngawo lihamba, lidanile?
Omunye, obizo lakhe linguKleyopha, wasephendula wathi kuye: Wena nguwe wedwa isihambi eJerusalema, njalo esingaziyo yini izinto ezenzekileyo phakathi kwayo kulezinsuku?
Wasesithi kubo: Yizinto bani? Basebesithi kuye: Ezimayelana loJesu weNazaretha, obeyindoda umprofethi;
lokuthi abapristi abakhulu.
Kodwa thina besithemba ukuthi nguye obezakhulula uIsrayeli. Kodwa-ke phezu kwakho konke lokhu lamuhla lusuku lwesithathu selokhu lezizinto zenzakele.
Kodwa njalo abesifazana abathile abangakithi basimangalisile;
kuthe bengasitholi isidumbu sakhe.
Labathile abebelathi baya engcwabeni, bafica kunjalo njengokutsho kwabesifazana labo; kodwa yena kabambonanga.
Yena wasesithi kubo: O lina elingelakuqedisisa elilenhliziyo ezivilaphela ukukholwa konke lokho abaprofethi abalitshela khona!
UKristu ubengamele yini ukuthi ahlupheke ngalezizinto, abesengena ebukhosini bakhe?
Esesusela.
Basebesondela emzaneni ababesiya kuwo; yena wasesenza angathi uyedlula.
Kodwa bamcindezela, besithi: Hlala lathi, ngoba sekuzakuhlwa. Wangena-ke ukuze ahlale labo.
Kwasekusithi ehlezi ekudleni labo, wathatha isinkwa wa si busisa, wa si hlephuna wabanika.
Amehlo abo asevuleka.
Basebekhulumisana besithi: Kambe inhliziyo zethu bezingavuthi yini phakathi kwethu?
Basebesukuma ngalelohola, babuyela eJerusalema, bafica abalitshumi lanye bebuthene ndawonye,
besithi: Isibili iNkosi ivukile, ibonwe nguSimoni.
Basebelandisa okw enzekileyoendleleni, lokuthi yaziwa njani yibo ekuhlephuneni isinkwa.
Besakhuluma lezizinto.
Kodwa batshaywa luvalo besaba.
Wasesithi kubo: Likhathazekelani, njalo kuvukelani imicabango enhliziyweni zenu?
Khangelani izandla zami lenyawo zami, ukuthi yimi uqobo; ngibambani libone.
Esekutshilo lokho wabatshengisa izandla lenyawo zakhe.
Kodwa belokhu bengakholwa?
Bamnika iqatha lenhlanzi eyosiweyo, lohlanga lwenyosi.
Wase ku thatha wa ku dla phambi kwabo.
Wasesithi kubo: Yila amazwi, engawakhuluma kini ngiseselani okuthi.
Wasevula ingqondo yabo, ukuze baqedisise imibhalo;
wasesithi kubo: Kulotshiwe kanje, njalo uKristu kumele ahlupheke kanje,
njalo kutshunyayelwe ebizweni lakhe ukuphenduka lothethelelo lwezono.
Lina-ke lingabafakazi balezizinto.
Futhi khangelani, mina ngiyathumela kini isithembiso sikaBaba; kodwa lina hlalani emzini weJerusalema.
Wasebakhokhela ephuma phandle baze bafika eBethani; ephakamisa izandla zakhe wababusisa.
Kwasekusithi esababusisa, wehlukana labo, wenyukiselwa ezulwini.
Basebemkhonza;
baqhubeka besethempelini. Ameni.
Ekuqaleni.
Yena lo wayeloNkulunkulu ekuqaleni.
Zonke izinto zenziwa ngaye, njalo ngaphandle kwakhe kakulalutho lolulodwa olwenziwayo lolo olwenziweyo.
Impilo yayikuye,
lokukhanya kukhanya.
Kwavela umuntu ethunywe nguNkulunkulu;
yena lo wezela ubufakazi, ukuze afakaze ngokukhanya, ukuze bonke bakholwe ngaye.
Yena wayengayisikho ukukhanya, kodwa ukuze afakaze ngokukhanya.
Kwakuyikukhanya okuqotho.

Lalesisaziso abanengi bamaJuda basifunda, ngoba indawo lapho uJesu ayebethelwe khona yayiseduze lomuzi.
Abapristi abakhulu bamaJuda basebesithi kuPilatu: Ungabhali ukuthi: INkosi yamaJuda; kodwa ukuthi lo wathi: NgiyiNkosi yamaJuda.
UPilatu waphendula wathi: Engikubhalileyo, ngikubhalile.
Kwathi abebutho, sebembethele uJesu, selukiwe sonke kusukela phezulu.

Ngakho bakhulumisana besithi: Kasingasidabuli, kodwa asisenzele inkatho, ukuthi sizakuba ngesikabani; ukuze kugcwaliseke umbhalo othi: Babelana izembatho zami, benza inkatho yokuphosa ngesigqoko sami. Azenza-ke lezizinto amabutho.
Kwakumi esiphambanweni sikaJesu unina, lodadewabo kanina.
Ngakho uJesu ebona unina, lomfundi amthandayo bemi khona.
Emva kwalokho wathi kumfundi: Khangela unyoko. Kusukela ngalelohola lowomfundi wamthatha wamusa kwakhe.
Emva kwalokhu uJesu ekwazi ukuthi konke kwasekuphelile, ukuze kugcwaliseke umbhalo, wathi: Ngomile.
Kwakubekwe isitsha sigcwele iviniga.
Kwathi-ke uJesu elemukele iviniga, wathi: Kuphelile.
Ngakho amaJuda, ngoba kwakungamalungiselelo), acela uPilatu ukuthi yephulwe imilenze yabo, njalo basuswe.
Ngakho abebutho beza, bephula imilenze yowokuqala leyomunye ababebethelwe laye;
kodwa sebefika kuJesu, kwathi bebona ukuthi wayesefile, kabayephulanga imilenze yakhe;
kodwa omunye webutho wamgwaza ngomkhonto ehlangothini, njalo kwahle kwaphuma igazi lamanzi.
Yena owabonayo ufakazile, njalo ubufakazi bakhe buqinisile, yena-ke uyazi ukuthi ukhuluma okuliqiniso, ukuze lina likholwe.
Ngoba lezizinto zenzeka ukuze kugcwaliseke umbhalo othi: Kakuyikwephulwa thambo lakhe.
Njalo lomunye umbhalo uthi: Bazamkhangela abamgwazileyo.
Kwathi emva kwalezizinto uJosefa weArimathiya, wacela kuPilatu ukuthi asuse isidumbu sikaJesu; futhi uPilatu wavuma. Ngakho weza wasisusa isidumbu sikaJesu.
Kwasekusiza loNikodima.
Basebesithatha isidumbu sikaJesu, basibopha ngamalembu acolekileyo kanye lamakha.
Njalo kwakukhona kuleyondawo ayebethelwe khona isivande, lesivandeni kwakulengcwaba elitsha, okwakungazange kubekwe muntu kulo.
Basebembeka lapho uJesu ngenxa yamalungiselelo amaJuda, ngoba ingcwaba laliseduze.
Kwathi ngolokuqala lweviki uMariya Magadalena wafika engcwabeni ekuseni kakhulu, kusesemnyama.
Ngakho wagijima weza kuSimoni Petro lakomunye umfundi uJesu ayemthanda, wathi kubo: Bayisusile iNkosi engcwabeni, njalo kasazi lapho abayibeke khona.
Ngakho uPetro waphuma lomunye umfundi, bafika engcwabeni.
Basebegijima bobabili kanyekanye; omunye umfundi wasegijima phambili ngesiqubu kuloPetro, wafika kuqala engcwabeni.
Kwathi ekhothama elunguza.
USimoni Petro wasefika emlandela, wangena engcwabeni, wabona amalembu acolekileyo endlelwe,
lelembu lobuso elalisekhanda lakhe, lingabekwanga lamalembu acolekileyo, kodwa lendluliwe lisendaweni yalolodwa.
Ngakho wasengena laye omunye umfundi owayefike kuqala engcwabeni, wabona, wakholwa;
ngoba babengakaqedisisi.
Basebesuka futhi abafundi baya kibo.
Kodwa uMariya wema engcwabeni phandle ekhala,
wasebona ingilosi ezimbili zembetheezimhlophe zihlezi, enye isemakhanda, lenye ingasenyaweni, lapho isidumbu sikaJesu ebesilele khona.
Zona zasezisithi kuye: Mama, ukhalelani? Wathi kuzo: Ngoba bayithethe iNkosi yami, njalo kangazi lapho abayibeke khona.
Kwathi esetshilo lezizinto watshibilika, wabona uJesu emi.
UJesu wathi kuye: Mama, ukhalelani? Udinga bani.
UJesu wathi kuye: Mariya! Yena watshibilika wathi kuye: Raboni! okuyikuthi: Mfundisi.
UJesu wathi kuye: Ungangibambi, ngoba kangikenyukeli kuBaba.
UMariya Magadalena weza wababikela abafundi ukuthi uyibonile iNkosi, njalo imtshele lezizinto.
Kwathi kusihlwa ngalolosuku, olokuqala lweviki.
Njalo esetshilo lokhu wabatshengisa izandla zakhelohlangothi lwakhe.
UJesu wasebuya esithi kubo: Ukuthula kakubekini.
Kwathi esetshilo lokhu waphephetha phezu kwabowathi kubo: Yemukelani uMoya oNgcwele.
Loba ngobani elithethelela izono zabo, bathethelelwe; loba ngobani elibamba ezabo, zibanjiwe.
Kodwa uTomasi, omunye wabalitshumi lambili, othiwa nguDidimusi, wayengekho labo mhla uJesu efika.

Ngakho abanye abafundi bathi kuye: Siyibonile iNkosi. Kodwa yena wathi kubo: Uba ngingaboni ezandleni zayo amanxeba ezipikili, njalo ngifake umunwe wami enxebeni lezipikili, njalo ngibeke izandla zami ehlangothini lwayo, kangisoze ngikholwe.
Njalo emva kwensuku eziyisificaminwembili abafundi bakhe babephakathi futhi, loTomasi elabo. UJesu wafika.
Wasesithi kuTomasi: Letha umunwe wakho lapha, ubone izandla zami; njalo letha isandla sakho, u si fake ehlangothini lwami; njalo ungabi ngongakholwayo, kodwa okholwayo.
UTomasi wasephendula, wathi kuye: Nkosi yami loNkulunkulu wami!
UJesu wathi kuye: Ngoba usungibonile, Tomasi, ukholiwe; babusisiwe abangabonanga.
Njalo, ezingalotshwanga kulolugwalo.
Kodwa lezi zilotshiwe, ukuze likholwe ukuthi uJesu unguKristu.
Emva kwalezizinto uJesu wabuya wazibonakalisa; njalo wazibonakalisa ngalindlela.
Babendawonye oSimoni Petro, loTomasi othiwa nguDidimusi.
USimoni Petro wathi kubo: Ngiyagola inhlanzi. Bathi kuye: Lathi sizahamba lawe. Basebephuma bahle bangena emkhunjini.
Kwathi sekusemadabukakusa uJesu wema ekhunjini.
Ngakho uJesu wathi kubo: Bantwana, lilokudla yini.
Wasesithi kubo: Phosani imbule ehlangothini lokunene lomkhumbi, njalo lizathola. Basebephosa, njalo babengaselakho ukulidonsa ngenxa yobunengi benhlanzi.
Ngakho lowomfundi uJesu ayemthanda wathi kuPetro), waseziphosela olwandle.
Kodwa abanye abafundi beza ngomkolo, bedonsa imbule lenhlanzi, ngoba babengekhatshana lomhlabathi, kodwa kungaba zingalo ezingamakhulu amabili.
Kwathi sebekhuphukele emhlabathini, babona umlilo wamalahle.
UJesu wathi kubo: Lethani ezi nyezezinhlanzi elisanda kuzibamba.
USimoni Petro wasekhwela, wahudulela imbule emhlabathini, ligcwele inhlanzi ezinkulu, ikhulu lamatshumi amahlanu lantathu; njalo lanxa zazinengi kangaka, imbule kalidabukanga.
UJesu wathi kubo: Wozani. Kodwa kakho kubafundi owaba lesibindi sokumbuza ukuthi: Ungubani wena? besazi ukuthi yiNkosi.
UJesu wasesiza.
Lokhu sekungokwesithathu uJesu ebonakaliswa.
Sebedlile? Wathi kuye: Yebo Nkosi; wena uyazi ukuthi ngiyakuthanda. Wathi kuye: Phana amawundlu ami ukudla.
Wabuya wathi kuye ngokwesibili: Simoni kaJona, uyangithanda yini.
Wathi kuye ngokwesithathu: Simoni kaJona, uyangithanda yini. UJesu wathi kuye: Phana izimvu zami ukudla.
Ngiqinisile, ngiqinisile, ngithi kuwe.
Lalokhu wakutsho, etshengisa indlela yokufa.
UPetro etshibilika wabona umfundi uJesu amthandayo elandela?
Kwathi uPetro embona wathi kuJesu: Nkosi, lo-ke?
UJesu wathi kuye: Uba ngithanda ukuthi ahlale.
Ngakho lelilizwi laphumela kubazalwane, ukuthi lowomfundi kayikufa; kanti uJesu katshongo kuye ukuthi kayikufa; kodwa wathi: Uba ngithanda ukuthi ahlale ngize ngifike, ulani lakho?
Nguye lowomfundi ofakaza ngalezizinto, lozibhalileyo; njalo siyazi.
Njalo zikhona lezinye izinto ezinengi uJesu azenzayo, uba bezilotshiwe zonke ngazinye.
Umbiko wokuqala ngawenza, Teyofilu, ngakho konke uJesu aqala kokubili ukukwenza lokukufundisa,
kwaze kwaba lusuku enyuswa ngalo;
wazibonakalisa futhi kubo.
Kwathi ehlangene labo, wabalaya ukuthi bangasuki eJerusalema;
ngoba ngeqiniso uJohane wabhabhathiza ngamanzi.
Kwathi sebebuthene bambuza bathi: Nkosi, uzabuyisela umbuso kuIsrayeli kulesisikhathi yini?
Wasesithi kubo: Kakusikho okwenu;
kodwa lizakwemukela amandla.
Kwathi esetshilo lezizinto, wenyuswa bekhangele, leyezi lamsusa emehlweni abo.
Bathi besajolozele ezulwini, esenyuka,
njalo athi: Madoda maGalili, limeleni lijolozele ezulwini.
Basebebuyela eJerusalema.
Kwathi sebengenile, benyukela endlini ephezulu.
Bonke laba baphikelela.
Kwathi ngalezonsuku uPetro wasukuma phakathi kwabafundi, kwakulexuku labantu ndawonye elalingaba likhulu lamatshumi amabili, wathi:
Madoda bazalwane, kwakumele ukuthi lumbhalo ugcwaliswe, uMoya oyiNgcwele awukhuluma ngaphambili ngomlomo kaDavida ngoJudasi,
ngoba wayebalwe kanye lathi.
Lo-ke wathenga isiqinti.
Njalo kwaziwa yibo bonke abakhileyo eJerusalema, saze sabizwa lesosiqinti ngolimi lwakibo ngokuthiiAkeldama.
Ngoba kulotshiwe egwalweni lweziHlabelelo ukuthi: Umuzi wakhe kawube lunxiwa, njalo kungabi khona ohlala kuwo.
Ngakho kumele ukuthi kulawomadoda ayehamba lathi kuso sonke isikhathi lapho iNkosi uJesu yayingena njalo iphuma phakathi kwethu,
kusukela ebhabhathizweni lukaJohane.
Basebemisa ababili, uJosefa othiwa nguBarsaba, othiwa futhi nguJustusi.
Basebekhuleka, omkhethileyo
ukwemukela isabelo kulinkonzo.
Basebebapha inkatho yabo; lenkatho yadla uMathiyasi, wasebalwa kanye labaphostoli abalitshumi lanye.
Kwathi selugcwalisekile.
Kwahle kwezwakala-ke umdumo ovela ezulwini,
kwasekubonakala kubo inlimi ezehlukanisiweyo kungathi ngezomlilo, zasezihlala phezu kwalowo lalowo wabo.
Basebegcwaliswa bonke ngoMoya oNgcwele.
Kwakuhlala-ke eJerusalema amaJuda, amadoda aqotho, avela kuso sonke isizwe salezo ezingaphansi kwezulu.
Kwathi sekulalo umdumo, ixuku labuthana ndawonye lasanganiseka, ngoba ngulowo lalowo wabezwa bekhuluma ngolimi lwakibo.
Basebemangala kakhulu bonke bababaza?
Kungani, pho, thina sibezwa ngamunye wabo ngolimi lwakithi esazalwa lalo?
AmaPathiya lamaMede,
abeFrigiya,
amaKrete.
Bonke basebemangala kakhulu?
Kodwa abanye bahleka usulu bathi: Basuthi iwayini elitsha.
Kodwa uPetro emi labalitshumi lanye.
Ngoba laba kabadakwanga, njengoba lina licabanga;
kodwa lokhu yikho okwakhulunywa ngumprofethi uJoweli:
Njalo kuzakuthi ensukwini zokucina, utsho uNkulunkulu;
njalo laphezu kwenceku zami laphezu kwencekukazi zami ngalezonsuku ngizathulula okoMoya wami, njalo zizaprofetha.
Njalo ngizaveza izimangaliso ezulwini phezulu;
ilanga lizaphendulwa umnyama, lenyanga igazi, lungakafiki usuku lweNkosi olukhulu loludumisekayo;
kuzakuthi, wonke obiza ibizo leNkosi uzasindiswa.
Madoda maIsrayeli, zwanini la amazwi: UJesu weNazaretha,
yena lo esenikelwe;
yena uNkulunkulu wamvusa.
Ngoba uDavida uthi ngaye: Ngangibona iNkosi phambi kwami njalonjalo; ngoba ingakwesokunene sami, ukuze nginganyikinyeki;
ngakho inhliziyo yami yajabula, lolimi lwami lwathokoza; ngitsho lenyama yami izahlala ethembeni;
ngoba kawuyikutshiya umphefumulo wami esihogweni, kawuyikunikela oNgcwele wakho ukuthi abone ukubola.
Wangazisa indlela zempilo; uzangigcwalisa ngenjabulo ebusweni bakho.
Madoda bazalwane, ake ngikhulume kini ngokusobala ngokhokho uDavida.
Yena-ke engumprofethi, ekwazi ukuthi uNkulunkulu wafunga ngesifungo kuye,
ebonile ngaphambili wakhuluma ngokuvuka kukaKristu, ukuthi umphefumulo wakhe kawutshiywanga, lenyama yakhe kayikubonanga ukubola.
UJesu lo uNkulunkulu wamvusa.
Ngakho ephakanyiswe ngakwesokunene sikaNkulunkulu khathesi.
Ngoba uDavida kenyukelanga, kodwa yena uqobo lwakhe uthi: INkosi yathi eNkosini yami: Hlala ngakwesokunene sami,
ngize ngenze izitha zakho zibe yisenabelo senyawo zakho.
Ngakho indlu kaIsrayeli yonke kayazi isibili, ukuthi uNkulunkulu umenzile kokubili.
Sebekuzwa lokhubahlabeka enhliziyweni?
UPetro wasesithi kubo: Phendukani.
Ngoba isithembiso ngesenu, lesabantwana benu.
Langamanye amazwi amanengi wafakaza wakhuthaza wathi.
Ngakho abalemukelayo ilizwi lakhe ngokuthokoza babhabhathizwa.
Basebephikelela ekufundiseni kwabaphostoli lebudlelwaneni, lekuhlephuleni isinkwa lemikhulekweni.
Lokwesaba kwehlela phezu kwayo yonke imiphefumulo.
Njalo bonke abakholwayo babendawonye,
basebethengisa izinto lempahla zabo.
Insuku ngensuku basebephikelela,
bedumisa uNkulunkulu.
UPetro loJohane.
Kwasekuthwalwa indoda ethile eyayiyisiqhuli kusukela esizalweni sikanina.
Eyathi ibona uPetro loJohane sebezangena ethempelini, yacela isipho.
UPetro waseyijolozela eloJohane, wathi: Sikhangele!
Yasibananzelela, ilindele ukuthi izakwemukela ulutho kubo.
UPetro wasesithi: Isiliva legolide kangilakho; kodwa lokho engilakho, ngikunika khona; ebizweni likaJesu Kristu umNazaretha, sukuma uhambe.
Waseyibamba ngesandla sokunene wa yi sukumisa; njalo kwahle kwaqiniswa inyawo lenqagala zayo.
Yasisithi lothu yema yasihamba.
Njalo bonke abantu bayibona ihamba, idumisa uNkulunkulu;
basebeyazi ukuthi yiyo.
Kwathi isiqhuli esasisilisiwe sibambelele kuPetro loJohane, bemangala kakhulu.
Kwathi uPetro e ku bona lokhowaphendula ebantwini wathi: Madoda maIsrayeli?
UNkulunkulu kaAbrahama lokaIsaka lokaJakobe, uNkulunkulu wabobaba bethu.
Kodwa lina lamphika oNgcwele,
labulala uMqali.
Njalo ngokholo ebizweni lakhe.
Njalo khathesi, bazalwane, ngiyazi ukuthi la k wenza ngokungazi.
Kodwa uNkulunkulu wagcwalisa ngalindlela ngomlomo wabaprofethi bakhe bonke, ukuthi uKristu uzahlupheka.
Ngakho phendukani, ukuze kufike izikhathi zokukhudumala ezivela ebusweni beNkosi,
njalo ithume lo owamenyezelwa kini phambili, uJesu Kristu;
okumele ukuthi izulu limemukele.
Ngoba uMozisi wathi kubobaba: INkosi uNkulunkulu wenu izalivusela umprofethi kubazalwane benu onjengami.
Njalo kuzakuthi, wonke umphefumulo, loba ngubani ongayikumlalela lowomprofethi, uzachithwa ebantwini.
Njalo labaprofethi bonke.
Lina lingabantwana babaprofethi.
UNkulunkulu.
Kwathi besakhuluma ebantwini, abapristi lenduna yethempeli labaSadusi babafikela,
benengekile ngoba babefundisa abantu.
Babadumela ngezandla.
Kodwa abanengi abalizwayo ilizwi bakholwa; lenani lamadoda lalingaba zinkulungwane ezinhlanu.
Kwasekusithi kusisa kwabuthana ababusi labadala lababhali babo eJerusalema,
loAnasi umpristi omkhulu.
Sebebamise phakathi, babuza: Lokhu lina likwenze ngawaphi amandla kumbe ngaliphi ibizo?
Khona uPetro egcwaliswe nguMoya oNgcwele wathi kubo,
nxa thina sibuzwa lamuhla ngomsebenzi omuhle emuntwini obuthakathaka emzimbeni;
kakwaziwe yini lonke laso sonke isizwe sakoIsrayeli, ukuthi ngebizo likaJesu Kristu umNazaretha, ngaye lo umi lapha phambi kwenu esesilile.
Yena lo uyilitshe.
Njalo kalukho usindiso komunye; ngoba kalikho lelinye ibizo ngaphansi kwezulu elinikiweyo phakathi kwabantu, esimele sisindiswe ngalo.
Kwathi bebona isibindi sikaPetro loJohane,
kodwa bebona umuntu osilisiweyo emi labo, babengelakuphika lutho.
Kodwa sebebalayile ukuthi baphume phandle emphakathini, bacebisana bodwa,
besithi: Sizabenzani lababantu;
kodwa ukuze kungabe kusanda phakathi kwabantu, asibaqonqosele ukuthi bangabe besakhuluma lamuntu ngalelibizo.
Basebebabiza, babalaya ukuthi bangakhulumi lakanye njalo bangafundisi ngebizo likaJesu.
Kodwa uPetro loJohane babaphendula bathi: Yehlukanisani ukuthi kulungile phambi kukaNkulunkulu ukulalela lina kuloNkulunkulu.
Ngoba thina izinto esizibonileyo lesizizwileyo.
Kwathi sebe ba qonqosele futhi, babayekela bahamba; bengatholi lutho lokuthi bangabajezisa njani, ngenxa yabantu.
Ngoba umuntu wayeleminyaka edlula amatshumi amane esenziwa kuye lesisibonakaliso seselapho.
Kwathi sebeyekelwe basuka baya kwabakibo, bababikela konke abapristi abakhulu labadala abakutshiloyo kubo.
Kwathi bona sebezwile baphakamisela ilizwi nganhliziyonye kuNkulunkulu;
owathi ngomlomo wenceku yakho uDavida: Kungani abezizwe bexokozela, labantu banakane okuyize?
Amakhosi omhlaba ema, lababusi bahlangana ndawonye ukumelana leNkosi;
ngoba isibili bahlangana ndawonye bemelane,
ukwenza konke isandla sakho lecebo lakho elakumisa phambili ukuthi kwenzeke.
Njalo ngalesisikhathi, Nkosi, khangela ukusonga kwabo,
ngokuthi welule isandla sakho ukusilisa, lokuthi kwenziwe izibonakaliso lezimangaliso.
Kwathi sebekhulekile kwazanyazanyiswa indawo ababebuthene kuyo.
Lexuku labakholwayo lalinhliziyo nye.
Langamandla amakhulu.
Ngoba kwakungekho futhi oswelayo phakathi kwabo; ngoba bonke ababelemihlaba kumbe izindlu, bathengisa baletha intengo zalokho okuthengisiweyo,
ba yi beka enyaweni zabaphostoli.
Kwathi uJose owabizwa ngabaphostoli ngokuthi nguBarnabasi,
elesiqinti, wa si thengisa.
Kodwa indoda ethile uAnaniya ngebizo, loSafira umkakhe, bathengisa impahla,
yagodla entengweni, lomkakhe ekwazi.
Kodwa uPetro wathi: Ananiya, kungani uSathane?
Sisekhona besingesiso esakho, sesithengisiwe besingekho emandleni akho yini? Kungani ukuthi ubeke lesisenzo enhliziyweni yakho.
Kwathi uAnaniya esizwa lamazwi, wawela phansi waphela.
Lamajaha asuka.
Kwasekusithi sekungaba ngamahola amathathu kwedlule, lomkakhe wangena engakwazi okwenzakeleyo.
UPetro wasemphendula wathi: Ngitshele ukuthi isiqinti lisithengise ngokungaka. Wasesithi: Yebo, ngokungaka.
UPetro wasesithi kuye: Kungani ukuthi livumelane ukulinga.
Njalo wahle wawela phansi enyaweni zakhe.
Lokwesaba okukhulu kwehlela phezu kwebandla lonke, lakubo bonke abazizwayo lezizinto.
Njalo ngezandla zabaphostoli.
Kodwa kwabanye kwakungekho olesibindi sokuzihlanganisa labo;
njalo abakholwayo bengezelelwa banda eNkosini, amaxuku womabili amadoda labesifazana;
baze bathwalela phandle emigwaqweni abagulayo, basebe ba beka ezinhlakeni lemacansini, ukuze kuthi lapho uPetro esiza ngitsho isithunzi sibasibekele abanye babo.
Njalo lamaxuku avela emizini ezingelezeleyo babuthana ndawonye eJerusalema, beletha abagulayo.
Kwasekusukuma umpristi omkhulu labo bonke ababelaye, bagcwala umona,
babadumela abaphostoli ngezandla zabo.
Kodwa ebusuku ingilosi yeNkosi:
Hambani, njalo lime likhulume ethempelini ebantwini.
Kwathi sebezwile, bangena ethempelini labo bonke abadala babantwana bakoIsrayeli, bathumela entolongweni ukubaletha.
Kodwa kwathi abancedisi befika kababaficanga entolongweni; babuyela emuva babika,
besithi: Intolongo siyifice ivaliwe konke kuqinile, labalindi bemi phandle phambi kweminyango; kodwa sesivulile, phakathi kasificanga muntu.
Njalo kwathi umpristi lenduna yethempeli labapristi abakhulu bezwe lamazwi.
Kwasekufika omunye wabatshela wathi: Khangelani, amadoda ebeliwafake entolongweni ami ethempelini afundisa abantu.
Yasihamba induna.
Sebebalethile ba ba misa phambi komphakathi. Umpristi omkhulu wasebabuza,
esithi: Kasililayisisanga.
Kodwa uPetro labaphostoli baphendula bathi: Kumele ukulalela uNkulunkulu kulabantu.
UNkulunkulu wabobaba.
Yena lo, uNkulunkulu wamphakamisa ngesandla sakhe sokunene.
Njalo thina singabafakazi bakhe balezizinto, njalo loMoya oyiNgcwele.
Kwathi sebezwile lokhubathukuthela kakhulu.
Kwasekusukuma umFarisi othile emphakathini.
Wasesithi kubo: Madoda maIsrayeli, ziqapheleni mayelana lalababantu, elizakwenza.
Ngoba ngaphambi kwalezinsuku kwasuka uTewuda, esithi yena ngokwakhe ungumuntu, lahlanganyela laye inani lamadoda angaba ngamakhulu amane; wabulawa, labo bonke ababemlalela bachitheka baphela.
Emva kwakhe kwasuka uJudasi umGalili ensukwini zokubalwa, wadonsela abantu abanengi ngemva kwakhe; laye wabhubha, lalabo bonke ababemlalela bachitheka.
Njalo khathesi ngithi kini: Dedani kulababantu, libayekele; ngoba uba lelicebo kumbe lumsebenzi ungowabantu, uzachitheka;
kodwa uba ungokaNkulunkulu, lingeke lawuchitha, hlezi lificwe ngitsho lingabalwayo loNkulunkulu.
Basebemlalela; sebebabizele kubo abaphostoli.
Ngakho basuka ebusweni bomphakathi.
Njalo insuku zonke, ethempelini.
Kwathi ngalezonsuku, abafundi sebandile.
Abalitshumi lambili basebebizela kubo ixuku labafundi, bathi: Kakulunganga ukuthi thina sitshiye ilizwi likaNkulunkulu.
Ngakho, bazalwane, khangelani phakathi kwenu amadoda ayisikhombisa, esingawamisa phezu kwale inswelo.
Kodwa thina sizaphikelela emkhulekweni.
Lalelilizwi lalithokozisa lonke ixuku; basebekhetha uStefane, indoda egcwele ukholo loMoya oNgcwele,
ababamisa phambi kwabaphostoli; sebekhulekile.
Lelizwi likaNkulunkulu landa, lenani labafundi lakhula kakhulu sibili eJerusalema.
Kwathi uStefane egcwele ukholo lamandla wenza izimangaliso lezibonakaliso ezinkulu phakathi kwabantu.
Kwasekusukuma abanye abesinagoge elithiwa ngelabaKhululwa, labeKurene, baphikisana loStefane.
Kodwa babengelamandla okumelana lenhlakanipho loMoya ayekhuluma ngawo.
Basebefumbathisa amadoda athi: Simzwile ekhuluma amazwi ayinhlamba amelana loMozisi loNkulunkulu.
Basebevusa abantu labadala lababhali, basebe m fikela,
basebemisa abafakazi bamanga;
ngoba simzwile esithi, uJesu lo weNazaretha uzadiliza lindawo.
Bonke ababehlezi emphakathini.
Umpristi omkhulu wasesithi: Kambe lezizinto zinjalo?
Wasesithi: Madoda, bazalwane labobaba, lalelani,
wasesithi kuye: Phuma elizweni lakini lezihlotsheni zakho, uze elizweni engizakutshengisa lona.
Wasesuka elizweni lamaKhaladiya wahlala eHarani;
kodwa kamnikanga ilifa kilo, hatshi lanyathela.
UNkulunkulu wasekhuluma kanje esithi inzalo yakhe izakuba yisihambi elizweni lemzini, bazayenza isigqili baza yi phatha kubi;
kodwa lesosizwe, abazakuba yizigqili kuso, ngizasigweba mina, kutsho uNkulunkulu; njalo emva kwalezizinto bazaphuma, bangikhonze kulindawo.
Wasemnika isivumelwano sokusoka.
Okhokho,
wasemkhulula kuzo zonke inhlupheko zakhe, wamnika umusa lenhlakanipho phambi kukaFaro inkosi yeGibhithe; wasembeka ukuba ngumbusi phezu kweGibhithe lowendlu yakhe yonke.
Kwasekufika indlala elizweni lonke leGibhithe leleKhanani, lokuhlupheka okukhulu; labobaba bethu kabatholanga ukudla.
Kodwa uJakobe esezwile ukuthi kukhona amabele eGibhithe, wathuma obaba bethu okokuqala.
Kwathi ngokwesibili.
UJosefa wasethumela wabizela kuye uyise uJakobe.
UJakobe wasesehlela eGibhithe;
basebethwalelwa.
Kwathi sesisondele isikhathi sesithembiso uNkulunkulu ayesifunge kuAbrahama,
kwaze kwavela enye inkosi, eyayingamazi uJosefa.
Yona yasiphatha ngobuqili isizukulu sakithi, yabahlupha obaba bethu.
Ngalesosikhathi kwazalwa uMozisi.
Eselahliwe, indodakazi kaFaro yamdobha, yazondlela yena ukuthi abe yindodana.
Njalo uMozisi wafundiswa kuyo yonke inhlakanipho yamaGibhithe.
Kwathi eselesikhathi seminyaka engamatshumi amane agcweleyo, kwafika enhliziyweni yakhe.
Kwathi ebona omunye ephathwa kubi, wa m vikela wamlamulela ohlutshwayo, watshaya umGibhithe;
njalo wayethemba ukuthi abafowabo bazaqedisisa ukuthi uNkulunkulu ubanika inkululeko ngesandla sakhe; kodwa kabaqedisisanga.
Njalo ngosuku olulandelayo wazibonakalisa kibo ababesilwa, wabalamula ngamandla, esithi: Madoda, lingabazalwane; liphathanelani kubi?
Kodwa lowo owayemona umakhelwane wamsunduza, esithi: Ubekwe ngubani ukuba ngumbusi lomahluleli phezu kwethu?
Usufuna ukungibulala yini, njengoba ubulele umGibhithe izolo?
Ngalelilizwi uMozisi wasebaleka, waba ngowemzini elizweni leMadiyani.
Kwathi sekugcwaliseke iminyaka engamatshumi amane, kwabonakala kuye enkangala.
Kwathi uMozisi esebonile wamangala ngalowombono; esasondela ukuthi akhangelisise, ilizwi leNkosi lafika kuye lisithi:
Mina nginguNkulunkulu waboyihlo, uNkulunkulu kaAbrahama loNkulunkulu kaIsaka loNkulunkulu kaJakobe.
INkosi yasisithi kuye: Khulula amanyathela enyaweni zakho; ngoba indawo omi kiyo ingumhlabathi ongcwele.
Ngikubonile lokukubona ukuhlutshwa kwabantu bami abaseGibhithe, njalo ngizwile ukububula kwabo; sengehlile ukuthi ngibakhulule; khathesi-ke woza, ngizakuthuma eGibhithe.
UMozisi lo abamalayo besithi: Ubekwe ngubani ukuba ngumbusi lomahluleli? nguye uNkulunkulu amthumayo ukuba ngumbusi lomkhululi ngesandla sengilosi eyabonakala kuye esihlahleni.
Yena wabakhupha.
Nguye lowo uMozisi owathi kubantwana bakoIsrayeli: INkosi uNkulunkulu wenu uzalivusela umprofethi kubazalwane benu onjengami; lizamuzwa yena.
Nguye lowo, ukuze asinike;
yena obaba bethu abangavumanga ukumlalela, kodwa ba m sunduzela eceleni, basebebuyela eGibhithe ngenhliziyo zabo,
besithi kuAroni: Senzele onkulunkulu abazahamba phambi kwethu; ngoba uMozisi lo, owasikhupha elizweni iGibhithe, kasazi ukuthi wehlelwe yini.
Basebesenza ithole ngalezonsuku.
Kodwa uNkulunkulu wafulathela?
Njalo lathatha ithabhanekele likaMoloki lenkanyezi kankulunkulu wenu uRefani, imifanekiso elayenza ukuthi liyikhonze.
Obaba bethu babelalo ithabhanekele lobufakazi enkangala;
okwathi futhi obaba bethu sebelemukele balingenisa kanye;
owathola umusa phambi kukaNkulunkulu.
Kodwa uSolomoni wamakhela indlu.
Kodwa, njengokutsho komprofethi ukuthi:
Izulu kimi liyisihlalo sobukhosi, lomhlaba uyisenabelo senyawo zami; lizangakhela indlu enjani, kutsho iNkosi; kumbe yiyiphi indawo yami yokuphumula?
Isandla sami kasizenzanga yini zonke lezizinto?
Lina ntamo zilukhuni.
Nguwuphi owabaprofethi oyihlo abangamzingelanga;
elemukela umlayo ngokuqoqa kwezingilosi.
Bathi sebezwile lezizinto, bahlabeka enhliziyweni zabo.
Kodwa yena egcwele uMoya oNgcwele,
wasesithi: Khangelani, ngibona amazulu evulekile.
Kodwa bamemeza ngelizwi elikhulu, bavala indlebe zabo, batheleka phezu kwakhe bengqondonye;
basebemkhuphela ngaphandle komuzi.
Bamkhanda ngamatshe uStefane.
Waseguqa ngamadolo, wamemeza ngelizwi elikhulu.
Njalo uSawuli, ngaphandle kwabaphostoli.
Amadoda akholwayo.
Kodwa uSawuli walichitha ibandla, engena izindlu ngezindlu.
Ngakho abahlakazekileyo badabula ilizwe, betshumayela ilizwi.
UFiliphu wasesehlela emzini weSamariya, watshumayela kubo uKristu.
Amaxuku aselalela nganhliziyonye okwakhulunywa nguFiliphu, esizwa njalo ebona izibonakaliso azenzayo.
Ngoba kwabanengi ababelabomoya abangcolileyo.
Kwaba khona intokozo enkulu kulowomuzi.
Njalo indoda ethile, uSimoni ngebizo, e yayikade isenza imilingo;
abayilalelayo bonke kusukela kwabancinyane kuze kube kwabakhulu.
Basebemlalela.
Kodwa kwathi sebekholwe uFiliphu etshumayela indaba ezinhle zezinto ngombuso kaNkulunkulu langebizo likaJesu Kristu, babhabhathizwa bonke amadoda labafazi.
LoSimoni laye wakholwa, njalo esebhabhathiziwe wanamathela kuFiliphu.
Kwathi abaphostoli abaseJerusalema bezwe ukuthi iSamariya ilemukele ilizwi likaNkulunkulu;
abathi sebehlile babakhulekela, ukuze bamemukele uMoya oNgcwele;
ngoba wayengakehleli lakoyedwa wabo.
Basebebeka izandla phezu kwabo
Njalo uSimoni esebonile ukuthi ngokubekwa kwezandla zabaphostoli uyaphiwa uMoya oyiNgcwele, waletha imali kubo,
esithi: Ngiphani lami lawomandla, ukuze kuthi loba ngubani engibeka izandla zami phezu kwakhe, emukele uMoya oNgcwele.
Kodwa uPetro wathi kuye: Isiliva sakho kanye lawe kakube sekubhubheni.
Ngoba kawulasabelo lelifa.
Ngakho phenduka kulobububi bakho, njalo ucele iNkosi, ukuthi uba kungenzeka uthethelelwe umnakano wenhliziyo yakho.
Ngoba ngibona ukuthi usenyongweni ebabayo.
USimoni wasephendula esithi: Ngikhulekelani lina eNkosini, ukuze ngingehlelwa ngolunye lwalezizinto elizikhulumileyo.
Ngakho kuthe sebefakazile bekhulumile ilizwi leNkosi, babuyela eJerusalema.
Ingilosi yeNkosi yasikhuluma; yona iyinkangala.
Wasesukuma ehamba; njalo khangela umuntu weEthiyophiya, eyayifikile eJerusalema ukukhonza,
yayisibuyela ihlezi enqoleni yayo, ibala kumprofethi uIsaya.
UMoya wasesithi kuFiliphu: Sondela uhambe lalinqola.
UFiliphu wasegijimela ku yowayizwa ibala umprofethi uIsaya, wathi: Kambe uyaqedisisa yini lezizinto ozifundayo?
Yasisithi: Kambe ngingakwenelisa njani, ngaphandle kokuthiomunye angiqondise.
Lesehlukwana sombhalo eyayisifunda yilesi: Walethwa ekuhlatshweni njengemvu; lanjengewundlu lithule phambi komgundi walo, ngokunjalo kawuvuli umlomo wakhe.
Ekuthotshisweni kwakhe ukwahlulelwa kwakhe kwasuswa, njalo ngubani ongalandisa nge sizukulwana sakhe? Ngoba impilo yakhe iyasuswa emhlabeni.
Umthenwa wasephendula uFiliphu wathi: Ngiyakubuza, umprofethi ukhuluma lokhu ngobani? Ngaye ngokwakhe, kumbe ngomunye yini?
UFiliphu wasevula umlomo wakhe.
Kwathi besahamba endleleni, bafika emanzini athile; lomthenwa wathi: Khangela, nankaamanzi; kuyini okungivimbela ukuthi ngibhabhathizwe?
UFiliphu wasesithi: Uba ukholwa ngenhliziyo yonke.
Waselaya ukuthi inqola ime; basebesehlela emanzini bobabili, uFiliphu lomthenwa; wasembhabhathiza.
Kwathi sebekhuphukile emanzini, uMoya weNkosi wamhluthuna uFiliphu; njalo umthenwa kazabe esambona.
Kodwa uFiliphu waficwa eAzotu.
Kwathi uSawuli,
wacela kuye incwadi zokuya eDamaseko kumasinagoge, ukuze kuthi uba ethola abanye baleyondlela, amadoda kanye labafazi, a ba lethe eJerusalema bebotshiwe.
Kwathi ekuhambeni; njalo kwahle kwamphazimela inhlangothi zonke ukukhanya okuvela ezulwini;
njalo ewela emhlabathini, wezwa ilizwi lisithi kuye?
Wasesithi: Ungubani, Nkosi? INkosi yasisithi: Mina nginguJesu omzingelayo; kulukhuni kuwe ukukhahlelana lezincijo.
Ethuthumela njalo emangala wathi: Nkosi, uthanda ukuthi ngenzeni.
Lamadoda ayehamba laye ayemi engelakukhuluma.
USawuli wasevuka emhlabathini; kwathi esevule amehlo akhe, kabonanga muntu. Basebe m bamba ngesandla, bamusa eDamaseko.
Wasesiba lensuku ezintathu engaboni, njalo engadli futhi enganathi.
Kwakukhona eDamaseko: Ananiya! Wasesithi: Khangela ngi lapha, Nkosi.
INkosi yasisi thikuye: Sukuma uye endleleni ethiwa iQondile, udinge endlini kaJudasi umuntu, uSawuli ngebizo, weTarsu; ngoba khangela uyakhuleka,
njalo ubonile ngombono umuntu, uAnaniya ngebizo, engena.
Kodwa uAnaniya waphendula wathi: Nkosi, ngizwile ngabanengi ngalindoda, kungakanani okubi akwenzileyo;
lalapha ulamandla avela kubapristi abakhulu, okubopha bonke labo ababiza ibizo lakho.
Kodwa iNkosi yathi kuye: Hamba, ngoba lowo uyisitsha sami esikhethiweyo, labantwana bakoIsrayeli;
ngoba mina ngizamtshengisa ukuthi umele ukuhlupheka kangakanani ngenxa yebizo lami.
UAnaniya wasesuka.
Kwahle kwawa emehlweni akhe kwangathi zinkwethu, wahle wabuye wabona, njalo esukuma wabhabhathizwa,
njalo esedlile wathola amandla. USawuli wasehlala labafundi ababeseDamaseko insuku ezithile.
Wahle-ke watshumayela uKristu emasinagogeni, ukuthi yena uyiNdodana kaNkulunkulu.
Njalo bonke abezwayo basanganiseka bathi: Lo kayisuye yini owachitha?
Kodwa uSawuli waqiniswa kakhulu, waphithizelisa amaJuda akhileyo eDamaseko, eqinisa ukuthi lo unguye uKristu.
Kwathi sezigcwalisiwe insuku ezinengi, amaJuda enza icebo ndawonye ukuthi ambulale;
kodwa iqhinga lawo laziwa nguSawuli;
kodwa abafundi bamthatha ebusuku, ba m ehlisela emthangaleni.
Kwathi uSawuli esefikile eJerusalema, wazama ukuzihlanganisa labafundi; kodwa bonke bamesaba, bengakholwa ukuthi ungumfundi.
Kodwa uBarnabasi wamthatha
Wasehlala labo,
wasekhuluma ngesibindi ngebizo leNkosi uJesu.
Kodwa abazalwane sebekwazi.
Ngakho amabandla kuyo yonke iJudiya leGalili.
Kwasekusithi uPetro edabula indawo zonke.
Wasefica khona umuntu othile uEneya ngebizo, owayeselele ecansini iminyaka eyisificaminwembili, eyisigoga.
UPetro wasesithi kuye: Eneya, uJesu Kristu uyakusilisa; sukuma uzendlalele icansi. Njalo wahle wasukuma.
Basebembona bonke abakhileyo eLida.
Kwakukhona eJopha umfundikazi othile, uTabitha ngebizo.
Kwasekusithi kulezonsuku wagula wafa; sebemgezisile ba m lalisa endlini ephezulu.
Njalo njengoba iLida yayiseduze leJopha.
UPetro wasesukuma wahamba labo; okwathi esefikile ba m thatha ba m usa endlini ephezulu, labafelokazi bonke bema laye bekhala bemtshengisa izembatho lezigqoko uDorkasi ayezenzile eselabo.
Kodwa uPetro esebakhuphele phandle bonke! Wasevula amehlo akhe; wabona uPetro, walulama.
Wamelulela isandla, wamsukumisa; esebize abangcwele labafelokazi, wa ba nika ephila.
Kwasekusaziwa kuyo yonke iJopha.
Kwenzeka ukuthi ahlale eJopha insuku ezinengi loSimoni othile umtshuki wezikhumba.
Kwakukhona eKesariya indoda ethile ngebizo nguKorneliyu,
eqotho;
yabona, yasisithi kuyo: Korneliyu!
Waseyijolozela.
Khathesi-ke thuma amadoda eJopha, ubize uSimoni othiwa futhi nguPetro;
yena ungenisile kuSimoni othile umtshuki wezikhumba, ondlu yakhe iselwandle.
Kwathi ingilosi ebikhuluma loKorneliyu isihambile, wabiza ababili kwabendlu yakhe,
njalo eselandisile konke kubo, wabathuma eJopha.
Njalo kusisa bona besahamba sebesondela emzini, uPetro wenyukela;
waselamba kakhulu, wafuna ukudla; kwathi bona besamlungisela, ukuhlehliswa kwengqondo kwamehlela,
wasebona izulu livulekile, lesitsha esithile sehlela kuye, njengelembu elikhulu, libotshwe ngamasondo amane, lisehliselwa emhlabeni;
okwakukhona kulo izidalwazonke ezilenyawo ezine zomhlaba lezeganga lezihuquzelayo lenyoni zezulu.
Kwasekufika ilizwi kuye lathi: Sukuma, Petro, hlaba udle.
Kodwa uPetro wathi: Hatshi bo, Nkosi; ngoba kangizake ngidle loba yini.
Ilizwi laphinda ngokwesibili kuye: Izinto uNkulunkulu azihlambululileyo, wena ungatsho ukuthi zingcolile.
Njalo lokhu kwenzeka kwaze kwaba kathathu; lesitsha sabuya saphakanyiselwa ezulwini.
Kwathi uPetro esadidekile ngaphakathi kwakhe,
esememezile abuza ukuthi uSimoni, othiwa futhi nguPetro, ungenisile lapha yini.
Kwathi uPetro esanakana ngombono, uMoya wathi kuye: Khangela, amadoda amathathu ayakudinga.
Ngakho sukuma wehle, uhambe lawo; ngoba yimi engiwathumileyo.
UPetro wasesehlela emadodeni avela kuKorneliyu ayethunywe kuye, wathi: Khangelani, yimi elimdingayo; yisizatho bani elize ngaso?
Basebesithi: UKorneliyu induna yekhulu, indoda elungileyo lemesabayo uNkulunkulu.
Ngakho esebabizele phakathi wa ba ngenisa. Njalo kusisa uPetro waphuma wahamba labo, labanye.
Ngosuku olulandelayo basebengena eKesariya. LoKorneliyu wayebalindele, esebizele ndawonye izihlobo zakhe labangane abazwana laye.
Kwathi sekwenzakele ukuthi uPetro angene, uKorneliyu wamhlangabeza, ewela enyaweni zakhe.
Kodwa uPetro emphakamisa, wathi: Sukuma; lami ngokwami ngingumuntu.
Njalo esakhuluma layo wangena, wafica abanengi bebuthene,
wasesithi kubo: Lina liyazi ukuthi kakuvunyelwa emuntwini ongumJuda;
ngakho-ke ngizile ngingaphikisanga nxa ngibizwa. Ngakho ngiyabuza, ukuthi ungibizele sizatho bani?
UKorneliyu wasesithi: Ngensuku ezine ezidlulileyo,
yasisithi: Korneliyu, umkhuleko wakho uzwakele, lemisebenzi yakho yomusa ikhunjulwe phambi kukaNkulunkulu.
Ngakho thumela eJopha, ubusubiza uSimoni othiwa futhi nguPetro; yena ungenisile endlini kaSimoni umtshuki wezikhumba ngaselwandle; ozakuthi angabuya akutshele.
Ngakho ngahle ngathumela kuwe; njalo wena wenze kuhle ukuthi ufike. Ngakho khathesi sesikhona sonke phambi kukaNkulunkulu ukuze sizwe konke okulayelwe nguNkulunkulu.
Kwathi uPetro evula umlomo, wathi;
kodwa kuso sonke isizwe.
Ilizwi alithumela kubantwana bakoIsrayeli, ngevangeli etshumayela ukuthula ngoJesu Kristu).
Lina liyalazi ilizwi elamenyezelwa eJudiya yonke, kusukela eGalili, emva kobhabhathizo uJohane alutshumayelayo;
uJesu weNazaretha, ukuthi uNkulunkulu wamgcoba njani ngoMoya oNgcwele langamandla.
Lathi singabafakazi bezinto zonke azenzayo elizweni lamaJuda leJerusalema.
Yena uNkulunkulu wamvusa ngosuku lwesithathu, wasemnika ukuze abonakale,
kungeyisikho kubo bonke abantu.
Wasesilaya ukuthi sitshumayele ebantwini.
Ngaye bonke abaprofethi bafakaza.
Kwathi uPetro esakhuluma lawomazwi, uMoya oyiNgcwele wehlela phezu kwabo bonke abalizwayo ilizwi.
Labokusoka abakholwayo basanganiseka;
ngoba babezwa bekhuluma ngendimi, bekhulisa uNkulunkulu:
Ukhona yini ongala lamanzi, ukuthi laba bangabhabhathizwa?
Waselaya ukuthi babhabhathizwe. Basebemcela ukuthi ahlale insuku ezithile.
Abaphostoli labazalwane ababeseJudiya basebesizwa ukuthi abezizwe labo balemukele ilizwi likaNkulunkulu.
Kwathi uPetro esenyukele eJerusalema,
besithi: Ungene emadodeni angasokanga, wadla lawo.
