Kodwa uPetro eqala wabalandisela:
Mina ngangisemzini weJopha ngikhuleka, kwehla isitsha esithile, sinjengelembu elikhulu sisehliswa ngamasondo amane sivela ezulwini, sasesifika kimi;
okwathi sengilikhangelisisile ngaqaphelisa, ngasengibona inyamazana ezilenyawo ezine zomhlaba lezeganga lezihuquzelayo lenyoni zezulu.
Ngasengisizwa ilizwi lisithi kimi: Sukuma, Petro, hlaba udle.
Kodwa ngathi: Hatshi bo Nkosi; ngoba loba yini engahlambulukanga kumbe engcolileyo kayizake ingene emlonyeni wami.
Kodwa ilizwi langiphendula ngokwesibili livela ezulwini lathi: Izinto uNkulunkulu azihlambululileyo, wena ungatsho ukuthi zingcolile.
Lokhu-ke kwenzeka kathathu, njalo konke kwabuye kwadonselwa phezulu ezulwini.
Njalo khangela, ngasona lesosikhathi amadoda amathathu ema phambi kwendlu engangikuyo, ethunyiwe kimi evela eKesariya.
UMoya wasesithi kimi ngihambe lawo, ngingathandabuzi; lalababazalwane abayisithupha labo bahamba lami, sasesingena endlini yendoda;
yasisibikela ukuthi yayibone njani ingilosi imi endlini yayo, isithi kuyo: Thumela amadoda eJopha, ubize uSimoni, othiwa nguPetro,
ozakutshela amazwi.
Kwathi ngisaqala ukukhuluma, uMoya oyiNgcwele wehlela phezu kwabo.
Ngakhumbula ilizwi leNkosi.
Ngakho nxa uNkulunkulu?
Njalo bathi sebezizwile lezizinto bathula, bamdumisa uNkulunkulu.
Labo-ke abahlakazeka ngokuhlupheka, bengalikhulumi ilizwi lakoyedwa ngaphandle kumaJuda kuphela.
Kodwa kwakukhona abanye kubo, amadoda amaKuprosi.
Lesandla seNkosi sasilabo.
Zasezizwakala indaba ngabo endlebeni zebandla elaliseJerusalema;
kwathi esefikile esebona umusa kaNkulunkulu wathokoza;
ngoba wayeyindoda elungileyo.
UBarnabasi wasesiya eTarsu ukuze adinge uSawuli,
kwathi esemtholile wamletha eAntiyoki.
Kwathi ngalezonsuku kwafika eAntiyoki bevela eJerusalema.
Kwasekusukuma omunye wabo othiwa nguAgabusi.
Labafundi bazimisela ukuthi ngulowo lalowo wabo athumele njengamandla alowo lalowo;
abakwenzayo-ke.
Ngalesosikhathi uHerodi inkosi.
Wasebulala uJakobe.
Esebonile ukuthi lokhu kuyawathokozisa amaJuda;
esembambile laye wa m faka entolongweni.
Ngakho uPetro wagcinwa entolongweni; kodwa umkhuleko oqhubekayo wenziwa libandla ngaye kuNkulunkulu.
Kwathi uHerodi esezamkhupha, ngalobobusuku uPetro wayelele phakathi kwabebutho ababili; labalindi phambi komnyango babegcine intolongo.
Njalo khangela, ingilosi yeNkosi yema. Asesiwa amaketane akhe ezandleni zakhe.
Ingilosi yasisithi kuye: Bhinca, ubophe amanyathela akho. Wasesenza njalo. Yasisithi kuye: Yembatha isembatho sakho, ungilandele.
Wasephuma wayilandela; njalo wayengazi ukuthi kuliqiniso okwenziwa yingilosi, kodwa wayecabanga ukuthi.
Njalo sebedlulile abalindi bokuqala labesibili, bafika esangweni lensimbi, elokuya emzini, elabavulekela ngokwalo; basebephuma bahamba umgwaqo waba munye; njalo ingilosi yahle yamtshiya.
Kwathi uPetro, eseqaqabukile.
Kwathi esenanzelele.
Kwathi uPetro eseqoqodile esivalweni sesango, uRoda ngebizo,
kwathi isilazi ilizwi likaPetro, kayivulanga isango.
Kodwa bathi kuyo: Uyahlanya. Kodwa yaqinisisa ukuthi kunjalo.
Kodwa uPetro waqhubeka eqoqoda; sebevulile bambona, basanganiseka.
Wasebaqhweba ngesandla ukuze bathule, wabalandisela ukuthi iNkosi imkhuphe njani entolongweni. Wasephuma waya kwenye indawo.
Sekusile, kwaba khona isiphithiphithi esingesincinyane phakathi kwebutho, ukuthi wayesehlelwe yini uPetro.
Kwathi uHerodi esemdingile enga m tholi.
Njalo uHerodi.
Njalo ngosuku olumisiweyo uHerodi wembatha isembatho sobukhosi, wenza inkulumo kubo.
Abantu basebememeza besithi: Y ilizwi likaNkulunkulu njalo kayisilo elomuntu.
Njalo yahle yamtshaya ingilosi yeNkosi; wasedliwa zimpethu, waphela.
Kodwa ilizwi likaNkulunkulu lakhula landa.
UBarnabasi.
Kwakukhona eAntiyoki.
Kwathi bekhonza iNkosi.
Sebezile ukudla.
Bona-ke sebethunyiwe nguMoya oyiNgcwele.
Kwathi sebefikile eSalamisi, batshumayela ilizwi likaNkulunkulu emasinagogeni amaJuda.
Kwathi sebedabule isihlenge bafika ePhafosi,
owayelombusi uSergiyu Pawuli, indoda ehlakaniphileyo. Lo wabizela kuye uBarnabasi loSawuli edinga ukuzwa ilizwi likaNkulunkulu.
Kodwa isanuse, uElimasi, ngoba liphendulelwa njalo ibizo lakhe, waphikisana labo.
Kodwa uSawuli, onguPawuli futhi, egcwele uMoya oNgcwele
wathi: O wena ogcwele inkohliso yonke lobuqili bonke?
Njalo khathesi khangela, isandla seNkosi si phezu kwakho, njalo uzakuba yisiphofu.
Ngalesosikhathi umbusi wabona okwenziweyo wakholwa, edidwa yimfundiso yeNkosi.
UPawuli lababelaye.
Kodwa bona bedabula besuka ePerga, bahlala phansi.
Kwathi sekufundwe umlayo, khulumani.
Kwathi uPawuli esukuma, njalo eqhweba ngesandla.
UNkulunkulu walesisizwe sakoIsrayeli.
Wasebekezelela isimilo sabo okungaba yisikhathi seminyaka engamatshumi amane enkangala.
Njalo esechithile izizwe eziyisikhombisa elizweni leKhanani.
Lemva kwalezizinto, okungaba ngokweminyaka engamakhulu amane lamatshumi amahlanu.
Njalo kusukela lapho bacela inkosi, okweminyaka engamatshumi amane.
Njalo esemkhuphile.
Enzalweni yalu muntu;
engakafiki yena uJohane wayesetshumayele kuqala.
UJohane esegcwalise uhambo lwakhe.
Madoda bazalwane, bantwana bohlanga lukaAbrahama, lalabo phakathi kwenu abesaba uNkulunkulu.
Ngoba labo abahlala eJerusalema lababusi babo;
njalo bengatholi lacala lokufa, bacela kuPilatu ukuthi abulawe.
Kwathi sebeqedile konke okulotshiweyo ngaye, ba m lalisa engcwabeni.
Kodwa uNkulunkulu wamvusa kwabafileyo;
owabonwa insuku ezinengi yilabo.
Lathi sitshumayela indaba ezinhle kini zesithembiso esenziwa kubobaba,
ukuthi uNkulunkulu usigcwalisile sona kithi, abantwana babo, emvusile uJesu.
Njalo ngokuthi wamvusa kwabafileyo.
Ngakho njalo kwenye indawouthi: Kawuyikunikela ongcwele wakho abone ukubola;
ngoba uDavida, esekhonze esakhe isizukulwana ngecebo likaNkulunkulu walala;
kodwa lowo uNkulunkulu amvusayo, kakubonanga ukubola.
Ngakho kakwaziwe yini, madoda bazalwane, ukuthi ngalowo kutshunyayelwa kini;
njalo kulo wonke okholwayo.
Ngakho bonani ukuthi kalehlelwa yilokhu okwakhulunywa kubaprofethi, okokuthi:
Khangelani, zideleli, njalo limangale, litshabalale; ngoba mina ngenza umsebenzi ensukwini zenu, umsebenzi elingayikuwukholwa, nxa umuntu elilandisela.
Kwathi ekuphumeni kwamaJuda esinagogeni.
Kwathi abe sinagoge sebephumile, abanengi kumaJuda labakhonzayo.
Kwathi ngesabatha elilandelayo babuthana kwaphose kwaba ngumuzi wonke ukuzwa ilizwi likaNkulunkulu.
Kodwa amaJuda ebona amaxuku agcwaliswa ngomona, aphikisa izinto ezakhulunywa nguPawuli.
Kodwa uPawuli loBarnabasi bekhuluma ngesibindi.
Ngoba iNkosi isilayile ngokunjalo yathi: Ngikumisile ube yikukhanya kwabezizwe, ube ngowosindiso kuze kube semkhawulweni womhlaba.
Kwathi abezizwe be ku zwa bathokoza, basebelidumisa ilizwi leNkosi, basebekholwa ngobunengi obungangobalabo ababemiselwe impilo elaphakade;
lelizwi leNkosi lasatshalaliswa elizweni lonke.
Kodwa amaJuda avusa.
Kodwa babathintithela uthuli lwenyawo zabo.
Njalo abafundi bagcwaliswa ngentokozo.
Kwasekusithi eIkoniyuma, basebekhuluma njalo kwaze kwakholwa ixuku elikhulu lamaJuda kanye lamaGriki.
Kodwa amaJuda angakholwayo.
Ngakho bahlala isikhathi eside bekhuluma ngesibindi beseNkosini.
Kodwa ixuku lomuzi lehlukaniswa phakathi; abanye basebesiba lamaJuda.
Kwathi sekulokuhlasela kwabezizwe lamaJuda kanye lababusi babo, okoku ba phatha kubi lokubakhanda ngamatshe,
sebe kw azi, lelizweni elizingelezeleyo;
lakhona batshumayela ivangeli.
Njalo eListra.
Yona yamuzwa uPawuli ekhuluma; yena eyijolozela,
wathi ngelizwi elikhulu: Sukuma, ume ngenyawo zakho uqonde. Yasisukuma yathi lothu yahamba.
Kwathi amaxuku, ebona uPawuli akwenzileyo, aphakamisa amazwi awo.
UBarnabasi basebembiza ngokuthinguZewusi, loPawuli ngokuthinguHermesi, ngoba yena wayengumkhokheli wokukhuluma.
Njalo umpristi kaZewusi owayephambi komuzi wabo, waletha izinkabi lemigaxo emasangweni.
Kodwa abaphostoli
besithi: Madoda, lizenzelani lezizinto;
owathi ezizukulwaneni ezidlulileyo wayekela.
Loba kunjalo kayekelanga yena ukuthi angabi lobufakazi.
Njalo bekhuluma lezizinto, bawayekelisa kalukhuni amaxuku ukuthi angabahlabeli.
Kodwa kwafika amaJuda, a m hudulela ngaphandle komuzi, ecabanga ukuthi ufile.
Kodwa kwathi abafundi bembuthanela, wasukuma wangena emzini; kusisa wasuka loBarnabasi baya eDerbe.
Njalo sebetshumayele ivangeli kulowomuzi, sebezuzile abafundi abanengi, babuyela eListra,
beqinisa imiphefumulo yabafundi.
Kwathi sebebabekele.
Basebedabula iPisidiya baya ePamfiliya.
Sebekhulumile ilizwi ePerga, behlela eAtaliya;
basuka lapho ngomkhumbi baya eAntiyoki.
Kwathi sebefikile bahlanganisa ibandla, balandisa konke uNkulunkulu ayekwenzile labo.
Basebehlala lapho okwesikhathi esingesifitshane labafundi.
Kwasekusehla abathile bevela eJudiya.
Ngakho kwathi sekulokuphambana lokuphikisana okungekuncinyane ngoPawuli loBarnabasi bemelane labo, ngaloludaba lwempikisano.
Ngakho, kwathi sebephelekezelwe libandla.
Kwathi sebefikile eJerusalema, bemukelwa libandla labaphostoli.
Kodwa kwasukuma abanye abakholwayo abangabehlelo labaFarisi, besithi: Kufanele uku ba soka, lokubalaya bagcine umlayo kaMozisi.
Kwasekubuthana abaphostoli labadala ndawonye ukuze baluhlole loludaba.
Kwathi sebephikisene kakhulu.
Njalo uNkulunkulu umazi wenhliziyo;
futhi kehlukanisanga phakathi kwethu labo.
Pho-ke limlingelani uNkulunkulu?
Kodwa sikholwa ukuthi sisindiswa ngomusa weNkosi uJesu Kristu, ngandlelanye labo.
Ixuku lonke laselithula; laselisizwa uBarnabasi loPawuli belandisa ukuthi.
Kwathi bona sebeqedile ukukhuluma, uJakobe waphendula wathi: Madoda bazalwane, ngilalelani:
USimeyoni.
Njalo amazwi abaprofethi ayavumelana lalokhu, njengoba kulotshiwe ukuthi:
Emva kwalezizinto ngizabuya, ngilakhe futhi ithabhanekele likaDavida eliwileyo; njalo ngizakwakha okudilikileyo kwalo, njalo ngilimise;
ukuze abaseleyo babantu bayidinge iNkosi, labezizwe bonke ibizo lami elibizwa phezu kwabo, itsho iNkosi eyenza lezizinto zonke.
Kwaziwa kuNkulunkulu imisebenzi yonke yakhe kusukela ephakadeni.
Ngakho mina ngiquma ukuthi;
kodwa sibabhalele ukuthi bazile amanyala ezithombe.
Ngoba uMozisi ulabo kusukela ezizukulwaneni zendulo abamtshumayelayo umuzi ngomuzi, efundwa emasinagogeni isabatha ngesabatha.
Kwasekubonakala kukuhle kubaphostoli lakubadala,
basebebhala lokhu ngesandla sabo ukuthi: Abaphostoli labadala;
njengoba sizwile ukuthi abathile abaphume kithi balikhathazile ngamazwi, bedunga imiphefumulo yenu, besithi lisokwe lilonde umthetho, bona singabalayanga;
kwabonakala kukuhle kithi singqondonye, ukuthi siwakhethe amadoda si wa thume kini, kanye labathandekayo bethu uBarnabasi loPawuli,
abantu abanikele impilo yabo ngenxa yebizo leNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu.
Ngakho sithumile uJudasi loSilasi, abazakuthi langomlomo balandise ngokufananayo.
Ngoba kwabonakala kukuhle kuMoya oNgcwele, lakithi, ukuthi singalethesi umthwalo omkhulu, ngaphandle kwalezizinto ezifunekayo:
Ukuthi lizile okuhlatshelwe izithombe.
Ngakho sebebakhululile beza eAntiyoki; futhi sebelihlanganisile ixuku, ba li nika incwadi.
Kwathi sebefundile, bathokoza ngenduduzo.
UJudasi kanye loSilasi.
Sebehlale isikhathi, bayekelwa bahamba ngokuthula ngabazalwane baya kubaphostoli,
kodwa kwabonakala kukuhle kuSilasi ukuthi asale khona.
UPawuli loBarnabasi.
Emva kwensuku ezithile uPawuli wasesithi kuBarnabasi: Ake sibuye sihambele abazalwane bethu emizini yonke, lapho esatshumayela khona ilizwi leNkosi, ukuthi bahlezi njani.
UBarnabasi wasehlosa ukuthatha uJohane, othiwa nguMarko, ahambe labo.
Kodwa uPawuli wacabanga ukuthi kufanele ukuthi bangamthathi ahambe labo lowo owabatshiya ePamfiliya, kaze aya labo emsebenzini.
Kwasekuvela ukuphikisana okukhulu, baze behlukana phakathi; uBarnabasi.
Kodwa uPawuli wakhetha uSilasi.
Wasedabula iSiriya leKilikhiya.
Wasefika eDerbe;
owayenconywa ngabazalwane.
Lo uPawuli wathanda ukuthi aphume laye, wasemthatha wa m soka.
Njalo bedabula imizi, babanika izimiso ukuzilondoloza.
Ngakho amabandla aqiniswa ekholweni, njalo anda ngenani insuku ngensuku.
Sebedabule eFrigiya,
sebefikile maqondana leMisiya bazama ukuya eBithiniya; kodwa uMoya kabavumelanga;
basebeyiceza iMisiya behlela eTrowasi.
Kwasekubonakala umbono kuPawuli ebusuku, imncenga isithi: Chaphela eMakedoniya, usisize.
Kwathi esewubonile umbono.
Ngakho sasuka eTrowasi,
sasuka lapho saya eFiliphi.
Njalo ngosuku lwesabatha saphumela ngaphandle komuzi eceleni komfula, lapho okwakufanele kwenzelwe umkhuleko khona; sasesihlala phansi sakhuluma labesifazana ababebuthene ndawonye.
Lowesifazana othile uLidiya ngebizo, ongumthengisikazi wamalembu ayibubende owemzini weTiyathira.
Kuthe esebhabhathiziwe, lendlu yakhe.
Kwasekusithi sisiya emkhulekweni.
Lo walandela uPawuli lathi, ememeza esithi: Lababantu bazinceku.
Lalokhu yakwenza insuku ezinengi. Kwathi uPawuli.
Amakhosi akhe esebonile,
esebalethile ezinduneni athi, bengamaJuda,
batshumayela imikhuba esingavunyelwa ukuyemukela siyenze.
Lexuku labelekelela, lenduna zabadabulela izembatho zabo.
Sebebatshayile imivimvinya eminengi ba ba phosela entolongweni;
yena, emukele umlayo onjalo, wabaphosela entolongweni ephakathi.
Kwathi sekungaba phakathi kobusuku behlabela amahubo endumiso kuNkulunkulu, lezibotshwa zazibezwa;
njalo kwahle kwaba khona ukuzamazama komhlaba okukhulu, kwaze kwanyikinyeka izisekelo zentolongo.
Kwathi umlindintolongo ephaphama, esebona iminyango yentolongo ivulekile, wakhokha inkemba, ezimisele ukuzibulala, ecabanga ukuthi izibotshwa zibalekile.
Kodwa uPawuli wamemeza ngelizwi elikhulu esithi: Ungazilimazi; ngoba silapha sonke.
Wasecela isibane waphoseka phakathi, njalo wasethuthumela,
njalo esebakhuphela phandle wathi: Makhosi, kumele ngenzeni ukuze ngisindiswe?
Basebesithi: Kholwa eNkosini uJesu Kristu, njalo uzasindiswa wena.
Basebekhuluma kuye ilizwi leNkosi, lakulabo bonke ababesendlini yakhe.
Wasebathatha ngalelohola lobusuku wa ba gezisa amanxeba.
Wasebasa endlini yakhe wabeka itafula lokudlaphambi kwabo, wasethokoza lendlu yakhe yonke bekholwa kuNkulunkulu.
Kwathi sekusile, induna zathuma amapholisa zisithi: Khulula labobantu.
Umlindintolongo wasebikela uPawuli lamazwi.
Kodwa uPawuli wathi kuwo: Basitshayile obala singalahlwanga licala, basebe si phosela entolongweni, njalo khathesi ngensitha sebesiphosela phandle yini? Hatshi bo! Kodwa kumele beze bona basikhuphe.
Amapholisa azibikela izinduna lamazwi zisizwa ukuthi bangamaRoma,
njalo zeza zabancenga, njalo za ba khupha.
Basebephuma entolongweni bangena koLidiya.
Kwathi sebedabule iAmfipholi leApoloniya, bafika eThesalonika, lapho okwakukhona isinagoge lamaJuda;
njalo njengomkhuba kaPawuli wangena kuwo okwamasabatha amathathu,
evula etshengisa, mina engimtshumayela kini, unguKristu.
Labanye babo bakholwa, bazihlanganisa loPawuli.
Kodwa amaJuda angakholwayo, edinga ukubakhuphela ebantwini;
kwathi engabatholi, adonsela uJasoni labazalwane abathile kubaphathi bomuzi,
uJasoni abemukeleyo.
Asedunga ixuku labaphathi bomuzi besizwa lezizinto.
Kwathi sebethethe isibambiso kuJasoni lakwabanye, abakhulula.
Njalo abazalwane.
Lawo ayekhaliphile kulalawo aweThesalonika.
Ngakho amanengi kuwo akholwa, lakwabesifazana abahloniphekayo abangamaGriki lakwabesilisa abangabalutshwana.
Kodwa kwathi amaJuda eThesalonika esekwazi ukuthi ilizwi likaNkulunkulu liyatshunyayelwa nguPawuli leBeriya, eza lakhona enyakazelisa amaxuku.
Njalo ngalesosikhathi abazalwane bahle bamthuma uPawuli kungathi uya elwandle basala khona.
Lalabo ababephelekezela uPawuli.
Kwathi uPawuli esabalindele eAtene, umoya wakhe wakhathazeka phakathi kwakhe, ebona umuzi ugcwele izithombe.
Ngakho waphikisana, lasemdangeni insuku zonke lalabo ahlangana labo.

Labathile kuzo izazi zamaEpikuri lamaStoyiki baphikisana laye. Labanye bathi: Uwumane lolu lufuna ukuthini? Kodwa abanye bathi: Kungathi ungotshumayela onkulunkulu bezizweni; ngoba ngevangeli watshumayela kibo uJesu.
Basebemthatha, bamusa eAreyopagu besithi: Singazi yini ukuthi iyini limfundiso entsha oyifundisayo?
Ngoba uletha indaba ezimangalisayo ezithile endlebeni zethu; ngakho sifisa ukwazi ukuthi lezizinto ziyini.
Ngoba bonke abeAtene lezethekeli ezihlala khona babechitha isikhathi kungeyisikho ngolutho olunye, ngaphandle kokutshela lokuzwa into entsha.
Kwathi uPawuli esima phakathi kweAreyopagu, wathi: Madoda maAtene, ngiyabona ukuthi ezintweni zonke kungathi lilenkolelo enkulu.
Ngoba ngithe ngidabula ngikhangela izinto zenu elizikhonzayo, ngasengifica ilathi elilotshwe ukuthi: KUNKULUNKULU ONGAZIWAYO.
UNkulunkulu owenza umhlaba lakho konke okukuwo,
futhi kakhonzwa ngezandla zabantu, njengo swela ulutho;
njalo wazenza zonke izizwe zabantu zivela egazini linye, ukuthi zihlale ebusweni bonke bomhlaba, wazimisela izikhathi eziqunyiweyo ngaphambili;
ukuze zidinge iNkosi, ukuthi mhlawumbe sibili zimuzwe zi m thole, njalo kanti kakhatshana kulowo lalowo wethu.
Ngoba kuye siphila njalo sihamba futhi sikhona.
Ngakho lokhu siyinzalo kaNkulunkulu, kakufanele ukuthi sinakane ukuthi ubuNkulunkulu bunjengegolide kumbe isiliva loba ilitshe, okubazwe ngeminwe langokunakana kwabantu.
Ngakho izikhathi zokungazi uNkulunkulu kazinanzanga;
ngoba umisile usuku, azakwahlulela.
Kwathi besizwa ngokuvuka okwabafileyo.
Langokunjalo uPawuli waphuma phakathi kwabo.
Kodwa amadoda athile anamathela kuye, akholwa; phakathi kwawo kwakukhona loDiyonisiyu umAreyopagu, lowesifazana obizo lakhe nguDamari, labanye kanye labo.
Emva kwalezizinto uPawuli wasuka eAtene weza eKorinte.
Wasefica umJuda othile uAkwila kokuthi wonke amaJuda kawasuke eRoma, waya kubo;
njalo ngoba babelomsebenzi ofananayo, wahlala kibo wasebenza; ngoba babengabenzi bamathente ngomsebenzi.
Wasetshumayela, wancenga amaJuda lamaGriki.
Kwathi uSilasi loTimothi.
Kwathi emelana laye ehlambaza.
Wasesuka lapho waya endlini yomunye obizo lakhe nguJustusi, okhonza uNkulunkulu, ondlu yakhe yayiseduze lesinagoge.
Kodwa uKrispusi.
INkosi yasisithi kuPawuli ebusuku: Ungesabi, kodwa khuluma njalo ungathuli;
ngoba mina ngilawe, njalo kakho ozakuhlasela ukukwenzela okubi; ngoba ngilabantu abanengi kulumuzi.
Njalo wahlala umnyaka lenyanga eziyisithupha, efundisa ilizwi likaNkulunkulu phakathi kwabo.
Kwathi uGaliyo engumbusi,
esithi: Lo uncenga abantu ukuthi bakhonze uNkulunkulu ngokuphambene lomlayo.
Kodwa kwathi uPawuli esezavula umlomo;
kodwa uba kuyikuphikisana ngelizwi lamabizo, ziboneleni lina; ngoba mina kangithandi ukuba ngumahluleli walezizinto.
Wasewaxotsha esihlalweni sokwahlulela.
Wonke amaGriki asebamba uSostenesi. Njalo uGaliyo kaze azinanza lezizinto.
Kwathi uPawuli esahlezi insuku ezinengi, wavalelisa abazalwane.
Sebefikile eEfesu.
Sebemcelile ukuthi ahlale isikhathi esidanyana labo, kavumanga;
kodwa wabavalelisa,
njalo esefikile eKesariya.
Njalo esechithe isikhathi esithile, wasuka, wadabula ngokulandelana ilizwe leGalathiya.
Kwathi umJuda othile uApolosi ngebizo, elamandla emibhalweni.
Lo wayefundisiwe indlela yeNkosi, njalo evutha emoyeni;
lo waseqala ukukhuluma ngesibindi esinagogeni.
Kwathi esethanda ukuchaphela eAkaya;
ngoba waphikisa ngamandla.
Kwasekusithi, uApolosi esedabule indawo eziphakemeyo; wasefica abafundi abathile
wathi kubo: Lamemukela yini uMoya oNgcwele mhla likholwayo? Basebesithi kuye: Kodwa kasizanga sizwe ngitsho ukuthi kukhona uMoya oNgcwele.
Wasesithi kubo: Pho labhabhathizelwa kukuphi? Basebesithi: Kubhabhathizo lukaJohane.
Kodwa uPawuli wathi: UJohane wabhabhathiza ubhabhathizo lokuphenduka.
Lalabo abezwayo babhabhathizwa ebizweni leNkosi uJesu.
Wathi uPawuli esebeke izandla phezu kwabo.
Njalo wonke amadoda ayengaba litshumi lambili.
Wasengena esinagogeni.
Kodwa kwathi abanye besiba lukhuni bengakholwa, bekhuluma kubi nga leyo ndlela phambi kwabantu.
Lalokhu kwenzeka okweminyaka emibili, amaJuda kanye lamaGriki.
UNkulunkulu wasesenza,
kwaze kwathi lakwabagulayo kwasiwa izifinyo kumbe amafasikoti.
Kwathi abanye kumihambuma yamaJuda, izanuse.
Njalo kwakukhona amadodana ayisikhombisa athile kaSikeva umJuda umpristi omkhulu akwenzayo lokho.
Kodwa umoya omubi waphendula wathi: UJesu ngiyamazi, loPawuli ngiyazi ngaye; kodwa lina lingobani?
Lowomuntu okwakukuye umoya omubi waseseqela phezu kwabo, njalo wabehlula, wabanqoba, baze babaleka kuleyondlu benqunu belimele.
Lokhu kwasekusaziwa yibo bonke abakhileyo eEfesu; njalo lakhuliswa ibizo leNkosi uJesu.
Labanengi balabo abakholwayo beza, bevuma, bememezela izenzo zabo.
Labanengi balabo ababesenza amasalamusi baletha ingwalo ndawonye bazitshisa phambi kwabo bonke; basebebala intengo yazo, bathola izinkulungwane ezingamatshumi amahlanu zesiliva.
Ngokunjalo ilizwi leNkosi lakhula ngamandla lanqoba.
Kwathi lezizinto seziphelile, uPawuli wazimisela emoyeni.
Esethume eMakedoniya.
Kodwa ngalesosikhathi kwasuka isiphithiphithi esingesincinyane.
Ngoba umuntu othile onguDemetriyu ngebizo, umkhandi wesiliva, owenza amathempel anaesiliva kaDiyana, waletha kuzingcwethi inzuzo engencinyane;
owabaqoqayo bona, lezisebenzi zezinto ezifananayo, wathi: Madoda, liyazi ukuthi inotho yethu ivela kulumsebenzi.
Njalo liyabona liyezwa ukuthi kungeyisikho eEfesu.

Njalo kayisikho lokhu kuphela ukuthi sisengozini yokuthi le ingxenye ifike ekutheni ingahlonitshwa, kodwa lethempeli likankulunkulukazi omkhulu uDiyana lizathiwa liyinto engesilutho, njalo lobukhulukazi bakhe buzakwehliswa, elimkhonzayo yonke iAsiya.
Kwathi be ku zwa bagcwala intukuthelo, bamemeza besithi: Mkhulu uDiyana wamaEfesu!
Njalo umuzi wonke wagcwala isiphithiphithi.
Kwathi uPawuli efuna ukungena exukwini, abafundi kabamvumelanga.
Njalo labanye bababusi beAsiya, ababengabangane bakhe, bathuma kuye, be m ncenga ukuthi angazinikeli endaweni yokudlalela.
Ngakho abanye bamemeza okunye labanye okunye; ngoba umhlangano wawusanganisekile, njalo inengi labo lalingazi ukuthi libuthene lapho ngenxa yani.
Basebemusa phambili uAleksandro esuka exukwini.
Kodwa bathi sebekwazi ukuthi ungumJuda, kwaba lelizwi elilodwa livela kubo bonke okungaba ngamahola amabili limemeza lisithi: Mkhulu uDiyana wamaEfesu!

Njalo kwathi umabhalane eselithulisile ixuku wathi: Madoda eEfesu, kanti kukhona yini umuntu ongaziyo ukuthi umuzi weEfesu ungumlondolozi wethempeli likankulunkulukazi omkhulu uDiyana lowento eyawa ivela kuZewusi?
Ngakho njengoba lezizinto zingephikwe, kufanele lithule.
Ngoba lilethe lamadoda, angeyisibo abaphangi bamathempeli langahlambazi unkulunkulukazi wenu.
Ngakho uba uDemetriyu lezingcwethi kanye laye belodaba ngomuntu, amalanga okuthonisa amacala ayagcinwa, bakhona lababusi.
Kodwa uba lidinga ulutho ngezinye izinto, kuzalungiswa emhlanganweni osemthethweni.
Ngoba futhi sisengozini yokumangalelwa ngomvukela ngenxa yalamuhla, kungelambangela esingalandisa ngayo ngalesisiphithiphithi.
Njalo esetshilo lokho, wawuchitha umhlangano.
Kwathi sesiphelile isiyaluyalu, uPawuli wabizela kuye abafundi.
Kwathi esedabule lezongxenye, esebakhuthazile ngamazwi amanengi, wafika eGriki,
kwathi esehlale khonainyanga ezintathu, selenziwe iqhinga ngaye.
Wasemphelekezela kwaze kwaba seAsiya uSopatheri.
Laba sebehambe phambili basilindela.
Kodwa thina sasuka ngomkhumbi eFiliphi.
Kwathi ngo sukulokuqala lweviki, uPawuli watshumayela kubo, elungele ukusuka kusisa, waseselula ilizwi kwaze kwaba phakathi kobusuku.
Njalo kwakukhona izibane ezinengi.
Kwakuhlezi ewindini ijaha elithile ngebizo linguYutikusi, elajunywa yibuthongo obukhulu, laselidojwa lifile.
Kodwa uPawuli wehla waziphosela phezu kwalo.
Esenyukile njalo esehlephule isinkwa wadla, waxoxa labo isikhathi eside kwaze kwasa, ngokunjalo wahamba.
Basebemletha umfana ephila, basebeduduzwa hatshi lakancane.
Kodwa thina, sesihambe phambili ukuya emkhunjini, sasuka ngomkhumbi saya eAsosi, lapho siqonde ukumkhweza uPawuli; ngoba wayemisile ngokunjalo, yena ebezahamba ngenyawo.
Njalo esehlangene lathi eAsosi, samkhweza safika eMithilene,
sasuka lapho ngomkhumbi, kusisa safika maqondana leKiyosi; langomhlomunye sasondela eSamosi; sasesihlala eTrogiliumu, ngolulandelayo.
Ngoba uPawuli wayezimisele ukuyiceza iEfesu ngomkhumbi.
Kwathi eseMilethu wathumela eEfesu wabizela kuye abadala bebandla.
Kwathi sebefikile kuye, wathi kubo: Liyazi lina, ukuthi kusukela osukwini lokuqala lokufika kwami eAsiya, ngangihlezi njani isikhathi sonke phakathi kwenu,
ngakhonza iNkosi ngokuthobeka konke langezinyembezi ezinengi langezilingo ezangehlela ngamaqhinga amaJuda;
ukuthi angigodlanga lutho ngayo olusizayo,
ngifakaza kumaJuda kanye lakumaGriki.
Lakhathesi khangelani, mina ngiya eJerusalema ngibotshwe nguMoya, ngingakwazi okuzangehlela phakathi kwayo,
ngaphandle kokuthi uMoya oyiNgcwele uyangifakazela emizini yonke.
Kodwa angikhathaleli lutho lwalezizinto.
Njalo khathesi khangelani, mina ngiyazi ukuthi kalisayikubona ubuso bami lina lonke.
Ngakho ngiyafakaza kini ngalolusuku lwalamuhla, ukuthi mina ngimsulwa egazini labo bonke;
ngoba kangigodlanga ukuthi ngilitshumayeze.
Ziqapheleni-ke lina.
Ngoba mina ngiyazi lokhu, ukuthi emva kokuhamba kwami kuzangena impisi eziphangayo phakathi kwenu, zingawuyekeli umhlambi;
laphakathi kwenu kuzavela amadoda.
Ngakho lindani.
Lakhathesi, bazalwane, ngilinikela kuNkulunkulu.
Kangihawukelanga isiliva.
Lina-ke uqobo lwenu liyazi ukuthi lezizandla zasebenzela inswelo zami.
Kukho konke ngilitshengisile, ukuthi kumele ukuthi sisize ababuthakathaka, sikhumbule amazwi eNkosi uJesu, ukuthi yena wathi: Kubusisekile kakhulu ukupha kulokwemukela.
Njalo esetshilo lezizinto, waguqa ngamadolo akhe, wakhuleka labo bonke.
Kwaba khona ukukhala kakhulu kwabo bonke; basebewela entanyeni kaPawuli bamanga,
belosizi kakhulu ngelizwi alitshoyo.
Kwasekusithi sisuka ngomkhumbi sesehlukene labo, sahamba ngendlela eqondileyo safika eKosi, lango sukuolulandelayo eRodesi, sasuka lapho sayaePathara;
sasesithola lapho umkhumbi ochaphela eFenekiya, sangena sahamba ngomkhumbi.
Kwathi sesiqhamuka eKuprosi.
Sesibatholile abafundi.
Kwathi sekwenzakele ukuthi siqede insuku, sasuka sahamba, njalo bonke basiphelekezela kanye labomkabo labantwana kwaze kwaba ngaphandle komuzi,
sesivalelisene, sangena emkhunjini.
Kodwa thina, sesiqedile uhambo ngomkhumbi sisuka eTire sahlala labo usuku lwaba lunye.
Kusisa thina esasiloPawuli sasuka, sahlala laye.
Yena-ke wayelamadodakazi amane, intombi, eziprofethayo.
Kwathi sesihlezi insuku ezinengi, kwehla umprofethi othile,
wasefika kithi, wathatha uzwezwe lukaPawuli: Indoda olungolwayo loluzwezwe, amaJuda eJerusalema azayibopha kanje, njalo a yi nikele ezandleni zabezizwe.
Sesizizwile lezizinto, samncenga thina kanye lalabo ababelapho, ukuthi angenyukeli eJerusalema.
Kodwa uPawuli waphendula esithi: Lenzani likhala lidabula inhliziyo yami? Ngoba mina sengilungele, kungeyisikho ukubotshwa kuphela, kodwa lokufa eJerusalema ngenxa yebizo leNkosi uJesu.
Kwathi engancengeki, sathula sathi: Kayenziwe intando yeNkosi.
Emva kwalezinsuku sasesilungiselela.
L abathilebabafundi, ebesizangenisa kuye.
Njalo sesifikile eJerusalema, abazalwane.
Kusisa uPawuli wangena lathi kuJakobe.
Kwathi esebabingelele, wabalandisela ngakunye ngakunye.
Kwathi sebe ku zwile, bayidumisa iNkosi;
njalo sebetsheliwe ngawe.
Pho-ke kuyini? Isibili kufanele ukuthi ixuku libuthane; ngoba bazakuzwa ukuthi usufikile.
Ngakho yenza lokhu esikutsho kuwe; silamadoda amane abalesifungo phezu kwawo;
athathe kanye lawe, uzihlambulule kanye lawo.
Kodwa mayelana labezizwe abakholwayo thina sesibhalile, saquma sathibangagcini lutho olunjalo, ngaphandle kokuthi kabazile okuhlatshelwe izithombe, legazi, lokukhanyiweyo, lokufeba.
UPawuli wasewathatha amadoda, kusisa wahlanjululwa kanye lawo.
Kwathi sezizaphela insuku eziyisikhombisa,
amemeza athi: Madoda maIsrayeli, sizani! Nguye lumuntu ofundisa bonke endaweni zonke okuphambene lesizwe, lomlayo.
Ngoba ayebonile ngaphambili uTrofimu emzini elaye, amkhumbulela ukuthi uPawuli umngenisile ethempelini.
Lomuzi wonke wanyakazela, labantu bagijimela ndawonye, bamdumela uPawuli bamhudulela ngaphandle kwethempeli; leminyango yahle yavalwa.
Kuthe besafuna ukumbulala, ilizwi lafika enduneni enkulu;
eyahle yathatha amabutho lezinduna zekhulu, yagijimela kubo.
Induna enkulu yasisondela, yabuza ukuthi ungubani, lokuthi wenzeni.
Abanye exukwini bememeza okunye labanye okunye; kodwa ingelakulazi iqiniso ngenxa yomsindo, yalaya ukuthi asiwe enkambeni yamabutho.
Kwathi esefikile ezikhwelweni, kwenzeka ukuthi athwalwe ngamabutho ngenxa yokufutheka kwexuku;
ngoba ixuku labantu lalandela limemeza lisithi: Msuseni!
Kwathi uPawuli esezangeniswa enkambeni yamabutho: Kuvunyelwe yini ukuthi ngikhulume ulutho kuwe? Yona yasisithi: Uyasazi isiGriki yini?
Kanti kawusuye yini lowomGibhithe?
Kodwa uPawuli wathi: Mina ngingumuntu ongumJuda, weTarsu yeKilikhiya, isakhamuzi somuzi ongadelelekanga; ngiyakuncenga, ngivumela ngikhulume ebantwini.
Kwathi esemvumele, uPawuli wema ezikhwelweni:
Madoda, bazalwane, labobaba, zwanini ukuziphendulela kwami khathesi kini.
Sebezwile ukuthi ukhuluma labo ngolimi lwamaHebheru, bathula kakhulu, wasesithi:
Mina ngiyindoda engumJuda;
eyazingela leyondlela,
njengoba lompristi omkhulu engifakazela, lomphakathi wonke wabadala, ngaya eDamaseko, ukuthi lababekhona lapho ngibalethe eJerusalema bebotshiwe, ukuze bajeziswe.
Kwasekusithi ngisahamba sengisondela eDamaseko, sekungaba yimini enkulu, kwahle kwakhanya ukukhanya okukhulu okuvela ezulwini kungizingelezela.
Ngasengiwela phansi, ngasengisizwa ilizwi lisithi kimi: Sawuli, Sawuli, ungizingelelani?
Mina ngasengiphendula ngathi: Ungubani, Nkosi? Wasesithi kimi: NginguJesu weNazaretha wena omzingelayo.
Lalabo ababelami bakubona ukukhanya, njalo basebesesaba, kodwa kabalizwanga ilizwi elakhuluma lami.
Ngasengisithi: Ngenzeni, Nkosi? INkosi yasisithi kimi: Sukuma uye eDamaseko; njalo uzatshelwa khona ngazo zonke izinto ozimiselwe ukuthi uzenze.
Njengoba ngangingaboni ngenxa yenkazimulo yalokhokukhanya, ngakhokhelwa ngesandla yilabo ababelami, ngafika eDamaseko.
Njalo uAnaniya othile,
weza kimi wasesima phansi kwami wathi kimi: Sawuli mzalwane, buya ubone. Njalo mina ngalesosikhathi ngasengimbona.
Wasesithi: UNkulunkulu wabobaba bethu,
ngoba uzakuba ngumfakazi wakhe.
Khathesi-ke, usalindeleni? Sukuma ubhabhathizwe.
Kwasekusithi kimi sengibuyele eJerusalema,
ngasengimbona wathi kimi: Phangisa uphume ngesiqubu eJerusalema.
Ngasengisithi: Nkosi, bayazi bona ukuthi mina ngangibafaka entolongweni;
njalo mhla kuchithwa igazi likaStefane umfakazi wakho.
Wasesithi kimi: Hamba, ngoba mina ngizakuthuma.
Bamlalela kwaze kwafika kulelolizwi, baphakamisa ilizwi labo!
Kwathi besamemeza, baphosa izembatho, baphosa uthuli emoyeni,
induna enkulu yalaya ukuthi angeniswe enkambeni yamabutho, ukuze yazi ukuthi kungasizatho bani bememeza ngokunjalo ngaye.
Kwathi sebemelulele phambili ngemichilo, uPawuli wathi enduneni yekhulu eyayimi lapho: Kuvunyelwe kini yini ukutshaya ngesiswepu umuntu ongumRoma?
Induna yekhulu isizwile yasondela yatshela induna enkulu isithi: Nanzelela osuzakwenza; ngoba lumuntu ungumRoma.
Induna enkulu yasifika yathi kuye: Ngitshele, wena ungumRoma yini? Yena wathi: Yebo.
Induna enkulu yasiphendula yathi: Mina lelilungelo lokuba yisakhamuzi ngalizuza ngemali enkulu. UPawuli wasesithi: Kodwa lami ngazalwa lalo.
Ngakho labo abasebezamhlola bahle basuka kuye. Lenduna enkulu layo yesaba, isisazi ukuthi ungumRoma, lokuthi ibimbophile.
Kwathi kusisa ifuna ukwazi iqiniso, ukuthi kungani emangalelwa ngamaJuda, yamkhulula kuzibopho.
UPawuli wasewujolozela, kuze kube lamuhla.
Kodwa uAnaniya umpristi omkhulu.
UPawuli wasesithi kuye: UNkulunkulu uzakutshaya, mduli oconjwe waba mhlophe?
Lababemi lapho bathi: Uyamthuka umpristi omkhulu kaNkulunkulu yini?
UPawuli wasesithi: Bengingazi, bazalwane, ukuthi ungumpristi omkhulu.
Kwathi uPawuli esekwazi ukuthi enye ingxenye yabo ingabaSadusi.
Kwathi esetshilo lokhu, kwavela ukuphikisana kwabaFarisi labaSadusi, lexuku ladabuka phakathi;
ngoba abaSadusi.
Kwasekuvela ukumemeza okukhulu; kwathi ababhali behlelo labaFarisi basukuma baphika kakhulu besithi: Kasitholi bubi kulumuntu.
Kwathi sekuvele ukuphikisana okukhulu, induna enkulu yesaba ukuthi uPawuli uzadatshulwa yibo, yalaya amabutho.
Njalo ngobusuku obulandelayo iNkosi yema phansi kwakhe.
Kwathi sekusile, abanye bamaJuda benza iqhinga, bazibopha ngesiqalekiso, besithi kabayikudla lokunatha baze bambulale uPawuli.
Njalo babengaphezu kwamatshumi amane abenza lesisifungo ndawonye;
abaya kubapristi abakhulu labadala bathi: Sizibophe ngesiqalekiso esikhulu, sokuthi kasiyikudla lutho size simbulale uPawuli.
Ngakho khathesi lina kanye lomphakathi.
Kodwa indodana kadadewabo kaPawuli yezwa ngokumcathamela, yeza yangena enkambeni yamabutho, yamtshela uPawuli.
UPawuli wasebizela kuye enye yezinduna zekhulu wathi: Sana lelijaha enduneni enkulu; ngoba lilento elizayitshela yona.
Yasilithatha-ke yalisa enduneni enkulu, yasisithi: UPawuli isibotshwa ungibizele kuye wacela ukuthi ngilethe lelijaha kuwe, lilento elizakutshela yona.
Induna enkulu yasilithatha ngesandla, yasibuyela eceleni bebodwa, yabuza: Kuyini ozongitshela khona?
Laselisithi: AmaJuda avumelene ukucela kuwe.
Ngakho wena ungavunyiswa yiwo; ngoba amadoda adlula amatshumi amane kuwo amcathamele ngokuthi angadli anganathi aze ambulale; lakhathesi alungile elindele isithembiso sakho.
Ngakho induna enkulu yasiliyekela ijaha lahamba, i li laya isithi: Ungatsheli muntu ukuthi ungibikele lezizinto.

Yasibizela kuyo induna zekhulu ezithile ezimbili, yathi: Lungisani abebutho abangamakhulu amabili ukuze bahambe baze bayefika eKesariya, labagadi bamabhiza abangamatshumi ayisikhombisa, labemikhonto abangamakhulu amabili, kusukela ngehola lesithathu lobusuku;
lungisani lezinyamazana, ukuze ligadise uPawuli limfikise ephephile kumbusi uFelike;
wabhala incwadi imumethe lokhu:
Klawudiyosi Lisiya kumhlekazi.
Lindoda ibibanjwe ngamaJuda, njalo ibisizabulawa yiwo.
Ngathi ngifuna ukuthi ngazi isizatho ayimangalela ngaso;
engathi ngithola ukuthi imangalelwe loba izibopho.
Kwathi sekuvelile kimi.
Abebutho-ke, njengokulaywa kwabo, bamthatha uPawuli, bamusa eAntipatri ngobusuku.
Njalo kusisa, batshiya abagadi bamabhiza ukuthi bahambe laye;
okwathi sebefikile eKesariya, bammisa loPawuli phambi kwakhe.
Kwathi umbusi eseyifundile incwadi,
wathi: Ngizakuzwa, sebefikile labamangaleli bakho.
Kwathi emva kwensuku ezinhlanu.
Kwathi esebiziwe, uTertulo waqala uku m cala esithi: Ukuthula okukhulu sikuzuzile ngawe, lemisebenzi emihle yenzakele kulesisizwe ngokunakekela kwakho,
ngazo zonke indlela lakuzo zonke indawo siyakwemukela, ngakho konke ukubonga.
Kodwa ukuze ngingakubambeleli kakhulu, ngiyakuncenga ukuthi ngomusa wakho usizwe ngokufitshane.
Ngoba lindoda siyifice iyinkathazo, njalo ingeyenza umvukela phakathi kwamaJuda wonke;
eyake yazama lokungcolisa ithempeli,
kodwa kwafika uLisiya induna enkulu wa m thatha ngodlakela olukhulu ezandleni zethu,
elaya abamangaleli bakhe ukuthi beze kuwe; ongathi, ngoku m buzisisa wena uqobo, ungaba lakho ukwazi kuye ngazo zonke izinto thina esimmangalela ngazo.
LamaJuda lawo avuma, esithi lezizinto zinjalo.
UPawuli wasephendula, umbusi esemqhwebile ukuthi akhulume,
njengoba ungakubona ukuthi kaku ka dluli insuku ezilitshumi lambili;
njalo kabangificanga ethempelini ngiphikisana lomuntu loba ngivusa isiphithiphithi exukwini, loba emasinagogeni, loba emzini.
Futhi bangeke baqinise ngezinto abangimangalela ngazo khathesi.
Kodwa ngiyavuma kuwe lokhu, ukuthi ngendlela abayibiza ngokuthi;
ngilethemba kuNkulunkulu.
Njalo kulokho mina ngiyazama, ukuthi ngibe lesazela.
Kwathi emva;
ngikulezizinto;
afanele ukuba khona lapha phambi kwakho a ngi cale uba elolutho ngami;
kumbe bona ngokwabo kabatsho, ukuthi baficani okungalunganga kimi, mhla ngimi phambi komphakathi,
ngaphandle kwalelolizwi elilodwa, engalimemeza ngimi phakathi kwabo ngisithi: Ngokuvuka okwabafileyo mina ngiyehlulelwa yini lamuhla.
Kwathi uFelike wabadlulisela phambili, esezwile lezizinto esazi ngokupheleleyo;
waselaya induna yekhulu ukuthi agcinwe uPawuli, lokuthi abe lenkululeko.
Kwathi emva kwensuku ezithile, uFelike weza loDrusila umkakhe engumJudakazi, wathumela ukubiza uPawuli, wamuzwa mayelana lokholo kuKristu.
Kwathi esakhuluma ngokulunga langokuzithiba;
njalo ngesikhathi esifananayo wayethemba futhi ukuthi uzanikwa imali nguPawuli, ukuze amkhulule; ngakho wayehlezi embizela kuye ekhuluma laye.
Kodwa sekugcwaliseke iminyaka emibili, uFelike wemukela omlandelayo uPorkiyu uFestusi; uFelike efisa ukuthokozisa amaJuda wamtshiya uPawuli ebotshiwe.
Ngakho kwathi uFestusi esengenile emkhonweni,
labapristi abakhulu bammangalela uPawuli kuye, bemncenga,
bacela ukwenzelwa umusa omelane laye, ukuthi amthume eJerusalema.
Kodwa uFestusi waphendula ngokuthi uPawuli ugciniwe eKesariya, lokuthi laye ngokwakhe uzakuya khonangokuphangisa.
Wathi: Ngakho labo abenelisayo phakathi kwenu kabehle kanye lami; uba kukhona ulutho olubi ngaleyondoda, bayimangalele.
Kwathi esehlale phakathi kwabo insuku ezedlula itshumi, wehlela walaya ukuthi uPawuli alethwe.
Kwathi esefikile, amaJuda ayehlile evela eJerusalema ema e m hanqile,
yena eziphendulela wathi.
Kodwa uFestusi ethanda ukuthabisa amaJuda, wahlulelwe khona ngalezizinto phambi kwami?
Kodwa uPawuli wathi: Ngimi phambi kwesihlalo sokwahlulela sikaKesari.
Ngoba uba ngonile ngenze ulutho olufanele ukufa, kangali ukufa.
Khona uFestusi esekhulume lomphakathi waphendula wathi: Ulidlulisele kuKesari? Uzakuya kuKesari.
Kwathi sekudlule insuku ezithile, uAgripha inkosi loBernike bafika eKesariya, ukuze babingelele uFestusi.
Kwathi sebehlezi khona insuku ezinengi, uFestusi wayilandisela inkosi izindaba zikaPawuli,
kwathi ngiseJerusalema.
Engabaphendula ngathi: Kakusiwo umkhuba wamaRoma ukumnikela umuntu ekufeni.
Ngakho sebebuthene lapha, kangizange ngiphuze; ngo sukuolulandelayo, ngalaya ukuthi indoda ilethwe;
leyo aba yi mangalelayo sebemi kabavezanga cala ngayo ngezinto mina ebengizicabangela,
kodwa babelokuphikisana okuthile laye, langothile uJesu owafayo, uPawuli othi ngaye uyaphila.
Kuthe mina ngisadidekile ngombuzo onje, ngathi, angathanda yini ukuya eJerusalema, ayekwahlulelwa khona ngalezozinto.
Kodwa kwathi uPawuli eselidlulisele phambili ukuthi agcinelwe ukuhlolwa yinkosi enkulu, ngalaya ukuthi agcinwe, ngize ngimthume kuKesari.
UAgripha wasesithi kuFestusi: Lami bengithanda ukuthi ngimuzwe lumuntu. Yena wathi: Kusasa uzamuzwa.
Ngakho kusisa, kwathi uAgripha loBernike befika ngokuzibonakalisa okukhulu lamadoda ayizikhulu zomuzi, uFestusi waselaya ukuthi uPawuli alethwe.
UFestusi wasesithi: Nkosi Agripha, lani lonke madoda elikhona lapha kanye lathi, liyambona lo elangicela ngaye.
Kodwa mina ngathola ukuthi kenzanga lutho olufanele ukufa, ngaquma ukumthuma.
Okungaye kangilalutho oluqinileyo engingalubhalela inkosi. Ngakho ngimlethile phambi kwenu, ikakhulu phambi kwakho, nkosi Agripha, ukuze kuthi esehloliwe ngibe lakho engingakubhala.
Ngoba ngibona kungaqondanga ukuthuma isibotshwa, kungatshengiswanga lamacala amelene laso.
UAgripha wasesithi kuPawuli: Uvunyelwe ukuzikhulumela. UPawuli waseselula isandla, waziphendulela wathi:
Kukho konke engimangalelwa ngakho ngamaJuda;
ikakhulu ngoba uyawazi wonke amasiko lokuphikisana phakathi kwamaJuda; ngakho ngiyakuncenga, ukuthi ungizwe ngesineke.
Ngakho ukuhamba kwami konke kusukela ebutsheni, okwakuqala esizweni sakithi eJerusalema, wonke amaJuda ayakwazi,
ayangazi phambili kusukela ekuqaleni.
Lakhathesi ngimi ngithonisiswa ngenxa yethemba,
ezithemba ukufinyelela kuso izizwe zakithi ezilitshumi lambili.
Kungani kukhunjulwa ukuthi ku yintoengakholekiyo kini, nxa uNkulunkulu evusa abafileyo?
Ngakho lami ngokwami ngangicabanga ukuthi ngangifanele ukwenza izinto ezinengi eziphambene lebizo likaJesu weNazaretha;
lami engakwenza eJerusalema.
Lemasinagogeni wonke ngabajezisa kanengi, nga ba bamba ngamandla ukuthi bahlambaze, nga ba zingela baze bafika emizini yabezizwe.
Okungazo lami ngisiya eDamaseko ngamandla langokuthunywa ngabapristi abakhulu,
emini enkulu, nkosi, ngabona endleleni ukukhanya kuvela ezulwini, kudlula ukukhanya kwelanga, kwakhanya kwangizingelezela lalabo ababehamba lami.
Kwathi sonke sesiwele phansi emhlabathini, ngezwa ilizwi likhuluma lami lisithi ngolimi lwesiHebheru: Sawuli, Sawuli, ungizingelelani? Kulukhuni kuwe ukukhahlelana lezincijo.
Mina ngasengisithi: Ungubani, Nkosi? Wasesithi: Mina nginguJesu omzingelayo.
Kodwa sukuma, njalo ume ngenyawo zakho; ngoba ngibonakelele lokho kuwe, ukuthi ngikumise,
ngikophula ebantwini lakwabezizwe, engikuthuma kubo khathesi,
ukuvula amehlo abo.
Ngakho, nkosi Agripha, kangalanga ukulalela umbono wezulwini;
kodwa ngatshumayela kuqala kwabaseDamaseko.
Ngenxa yalezizinto amaJuda angibamba ethempelini, azama uku ngi bulala.
Ngakho ngizuzile usizo oluvela kuNkulunkulu, kuze kube lamuhla ngimi ngifakaza kubo bonke abancinyane labakhulu ukuthi zizakwenzeka,
ukuthi uKristu umele ukuhlupheka.
Kwathi esaziphendulela lezizinto.
Kodwa wathi: Kangihlanyi.
Ngoba inkosi iyazi ngalezizinto, engikhuluma ngesibindi lakuyo; ngoba ngileqiniso lokuthi akukho okunye kwalezizinto okufihlakeleyo kuyo; ngoba lokhu kakwenziwanga engonsini.
Nkosi Agripha, uyakholwa abaprofethi yini? Ngiyazi ukuthi uyakholwa.
UAgripha wasesithi kuPawuli: Usuphose wangiqinisekisa ukuthi ngibe ngumKristu.

UPawuli wasesithi: Bengingafisa kuNkulunkulu ukuthi, loba ngokulutshwana loba ngokunengi kungabi nguwe wedwa, kodwa labo bonke abangizwayo lamuhla, babe ngabanje njengoba nginjalo lami, ngaphandle kwalezizibopho.
Kwathi esekhulume lezizinto, yasukuma inkosi, lombusi;
kwathi sebephumile bakhulumisana, besithi: Lumuntu kenzi lutho olufanele ukufa kumbe ukubotshwa.
UAgripha wasesithi kuFestusi: Lumuntu ubengakhululwa.
Kwathi sekuqunyiwe ukuthi siye eIthaliya ngomkhumbi.
Sasesingena emkhunjini weAdramithiyu, obusuzakuya endaweni zeAsiya.
Lakusisa safika eSidoni.
Sasesisuka lapho ngomkhumbi, ngoba imimoya yayiphambene lathi,
kwathi sesidabule ulwandle olungaseKilikhiya lePamfiliya, safika eMira yeLikhiya.
Lapho-ke induna yekhulu yathola umkhumbi weAleksandriya oya eIthaliya, yasikhweza kuwo.
Sasesihamba kancinyane okwensuku ezinengi, safika nzima maqondana leKinidu, umoya ungasivumeli maqondana leSalamone;
sasesiyigudla kanzima safika endaweni ethile ethiwa yiMathekwamahle; okwakuseduze layo umuzi iLaseya.
Kwathi sekudlule isikhathi esikhulu, njalo sekuyingozi ukuhamba ngomkhumbi, ngoba lezilo lokudla laseledlule, uPawuli wa be luleka
esithi kubo: Madoda, ngiyabona ukuthi uhambo luzakuba lengozi, kungeyisiwo owempahla lomkhumbi kuphela kodwa lowempilo zethu.
Kodwa induna yekhulu yakholwa induna yomkhumbi lomnikazi wawo kulezinto ezazitshiwo nguPawuli.

Kwathi njengoba itheku lalingalungelanga ukuhlalwa ebusika, inengi labo lacebisa ukuthi kusukwe lalapho, mhlawumbe kwenzeke ukuthi bafike eFenikisi bahlale khonaebusika, itheku leKrete elikhangele eningizimuntshonalanga lenyakathontshonalanga.
Njalo kuthe umoya weningizimu usuphephetha buthakathaka, banakana ukuthi sebekuzuzile lokho ababekuqondile, sebephakamise ingwegwesagudla eKrete.
Kodwa kungabanga yisikhathi eside umoya oyisivunguzane, othiwa iYurakilidoni, wawutshaya;
umkhumbi wasubanjwa, wehluleka ukukhangelana lomoya, sasesiwuyekela undenda.
Sathi sesigudla phansi kwesihlengana esithile esithiwa yiKlawuda, senelisa kalukhuni ukuwubamba umkolo;
abasebewuphanyekile, basebenzisa izincediso, sabopha ngamagoda sizingelezela umkhumbi; basebesesaba ukuthi bazaphoseka emhlabathiniweSirti, behlisa iseyili, ngokunjalo basebendenda.
Kuthe ukuthi siphoswe kakhulu yisiphepho, ngo lu landelayo baphosa impahla;
kwathi ngolwesithathu salahla izikhali zomkhumbi ngezandla zethu uqobo.
Kwathi kungelalanga njalo kungelankanyezi ezibonakalayo insuku ezinengi, lesiphepho esingesincinyane si qinisa, kusukela lapho laseliphela ithemba lonke lokuthi sizasinda.
Kwathi sekuyisikhathi eside bengasadli, uPawuli wasesukuma phakathi kwabo, wathi: Madoda, ngabe la lalela mina.
Khathesi-ke sengileluleka ukuthi lime isibindi; ngoba kakusoze kulahleke impilo leyodwa kini, ngaphandle komkhumbi.
Ngoba,
yathi: Ungesabi Pawuli; ngoba umele ukuma phambi kukaKesari; njalo khangela, uNkulunkulu ukuphile bonke labo abahamba ngomkhumbi lawe.
Ngakho manini isibindi madoda.
Kodwa kumele.
Kwathi sekufike ubusuku betshumi lane, sasindenda sizula olwandle lweAdriya, phakathi kobusuku, abomkhumbi bakhumbula ukuthi umhlabathi othile ususondela kibo;
basebephosa intambo yokulinganisa bathola amafathome angamatshumi amabili; sebeqhubekile kancinyane baphosa intambo yokulinganisa futhi, bathola amafathome alitshumi lanhlanu;
njalo sesaba ukuthi mhlawumbe singatshayeka emadwaleni, basebephosela ingwegwe ezine ngemva komkhumbi, bafisa ukuthi kuse.
Abomkhumbi sebezama ukubaleka emkhunjini, basebesehlisela olwandle umkolo,
uPawuli wathi enduneni yekhulu lakwabebutho: Uba laba bengahlali emkhunjini, lingesindiswe lina.
Abebutho basebequma amagoda omkolo.
Kwasekusithi sekuzakusa, uPawuli wa ba ncenga bonke ukuthi bathathe ukudla, esithi: Lamuhla kulusuku lwetshumi lane lilindile lihlezi lingadli, lingathathi lutho.
Ngakho ngiyalincenga ukuthi lithathe ukudla; ngoba lokhu ngokosindiso lwenu; ngoba kakuyikuwa komunye unwele lwekhanda lenu.
Kwathi esetshilo lezizinto, esethethe isinkwa, wabonga uNkulunkulu phambi kwabo bonke; wa si hlephula waqala ukudla.
Basebesima isibindi bonke njalo bona bathatha ukudla.
Njalo thina sonke esasisemkhunjini sasiyimiphefumulo engamakhulu amabili lamatshumi ayisikhombisa lesithupha.
Njalo sebesuthi ukudla baphungula umkhumbi, baphosela amabele olwandle.
Kwathi sekusile, kabalazanga ilizwe; kodwa babona itheku elithile lilokhumbi, abamisa ukuthi baqhubele umkhumbi kulo, uba kungenzeka.
Basebequma ingwegwe ba zi yekela olwandle.

Basebefika bengananzelele endaweni lapho ulwandle olwaluhlangana khona bawuqhubela umkhumbi esihlabathini; njalo isihloko somkhumbi sagxumekeka sahlala singanyikinyeki, kodwa ingemuva yomkhumbi yephulwa ngamandla amagagasi.
Labebutho babeqonde ukubulala izibotshwa, hlezi ezinye zibaleke ngokuntshezela khatshana.
Kodwa induna yekhulu, ifisa ukusindisa uPawuli, yabavimbela kunjongo yabo, yasilaya ukuthi labo abakwaziyo ukuntsheza baziphosele olwandle kuqala, baye emhlabathini;
labaseleyo, abanye ngamapulanka, labanye ngezinye zezinto zomkhumbi. Ngokunjalo-ke kwenzeka ukuthi bonke bafike emhlabathini besindile.
Kwathi sebesindile, basebesizwa ukuthi.
Labalelolizwe; ngoba babasa umlilo, basemukela sonke, ngenxa yezulu elaseliqalisile, langenxa yomqando.
UPawuli wasetheza umnyaba wenkuni, wa zi beka emlilweni, kwaphuma inyoka ngenxa yokutshisa, yanamathela esandleni sakhe.
Kwathi abalelolizwe bebona isilo silenga esandleni sakhe.
Yena-ke wasithintithela emlilweni isilo, akaze aba lengozi.
Basebelindela ukuthi uzavuvuka lokuthi awele phansi ahle afe; kwathi sebelinde isikhathieside, basebebona ukuthi kakulalutho olubi olwenzakala kuye.
Kubomakhelwane baleyondawo kwakulamasimu esikhulu sesihlenge, uPubliyo ngebizo; owasemukela wasingenisa kuhle insuku ezintathu.
Kwasekusithi uyise kaPubliyo wayelele ebanjwe luqhuqho lesisu segazi; angena kuye uPawuli, wakhuleka.
Ngakho lokho sekwenzakele, beza labanye ababesesihlengeni ababelezifo basebesiliswa;
abasidumisa langodumo olukhulu, njalo mhla sisukayo ngomkhumbi, ba s ethesa izinto ezidingekayo.
Kwathi emva kwenyanga ezintathu sasuka ngomkhumbi weAleksandriya, owawuhlezi ebusika esihlengeni, ulophawu oluthiwangoDiyosikuroyi.
Sasesifika eSirakhuse sahlala insuku ezintathu;
sasuka lapho sahamba ngokubhoda sayafika eRegiyuma, sekudlule usuku olulodwa kwafika umoya weningizimu, safika ePuthiyoli ngosuku lwesibili;
lapho esafica khona abazalwane, sacelwa ukuhlala labo insuku eziyisikhombisa; ngokunjalo saya-ke eRoma.
Njalo besuka lapho abazalwane sebezwile izinto ngathi, beza ukusihlangabeza baze bafika eApiyi Foruma leNdlini zeZihambi eziNtathu; okwathi uPawuli ebabona, wabonga uNkulunkulu, wema isibindi.
Sathi sesifike eRoma, induna yekhulu yanikela izibotshwa enduneni yabalindi; kodwa uPawuli wavunyelwa ukuhlala yedwa, lowebutho omlindayo.
Kwasekusithi emva kwensuku ezintathu;
wona esengihlolile.
Kodwa amaJuda ala, ngacindezeleka ukulidlulisela kuKesari, kungeyisikho ukuthi ngilolutho olokumangalela isizwe sakithi.
Ngakho ngenxa yalesisizatho ngilibizele lapha ukuthi ngi li bone ngikhulume lani; ngoba ngenxa yethemba.
Basebesithi kuye: Thina kasemukelanga izincwadi ngawe ezivela eJudiya, futhi loba ngubani wabazalwane, esefikile, kabikanga kumbe akhulume lutho olubi ngawe.
Kodwa sifisa ukuzwa izinto ozinakanayo wena; ngoba mayelana lalobububhazuka.
Njalo kwathi sebemmisele usuku, abanengi beza kuye endlini yezihambi; owabachasisela.
Abanye basebekholwa izinto azitshoyo, kodwa abanye kabakholwanga.
Kwasekusithi bengezwanani bodwa basuka bahamba, uPawuli esekhulume ilizwi laba linye lokuthi: Wayekhulume kuhle uMoya oyiNgcwele ngoIsaya umprofethi kubobaba bethu,
esithi: Hamba uye kulesisizwe ubususithi: Ngokuzwa lizakuzwa, njalo kalisoze liqedisise; lokubona lizabona, njalo kalisoze libonisise;

ngoba inhliziyo yalesisizwe seyaba buthundu, njalo bezwa kanzima ngendlebe, lamehlo abo bawacimezile; hlezi babone ngamehlo, njalo bezwe ngendlebe, futhi baqedisise ngenhliziyo, njalo baphenduke, besengibasilisa.
Ngakho kakwaziwe kini, ukuthi usindiso lukaNkulunkulu.
Njalo kwathi esetshilo lezizinto, amaJuda asuka, elokuphikisana okukhulu phakathi kwawo.
UPawuli wasehlala iminyaka emibili egcweleyo endlini yakhe uqobo ayeyiqatshile, wemukela bonke abangena kuye,
watshumayela umbuso kaNkulunkulu, njalo wafundisa ngeNkosi uJesu Kristu.
UPawuli, inceku kaJesu Kristu, ebizelwe ukubangumphostoli
(alithembisa ngaphambili),
mayelana leNdodana yakhe, eyavela,
eyabonakaliswa ukuba yiNdodana kaNkulunkulu ngamandla, ngokuvuka okwabafileyo, uJesu Kristu iNkosi yethu;
esemukela ngaye umusa,
elikuzo lani, babiziweyo bakaJesu Kristu:
Kibo bonke abaseRoma, abathandiweyo bakaNkulunkulu, ababizelwe ukubangabangcwele.
Kuqala-ke ngibonga uNkulunkulu wami ngoJesu Kristu ngani lonke.
Ngoba uNkulunkulu ungumfakazi wami, ukuthi kangiyekeli ukulikhumbula,
ngesikhathi sonke emikhulekweni yami ekucineni.
Ngoba ngilangatha ukulibona, ukuze ngiliphe,
okuyikuthi, siduduzeke ndawonye phakathi kwenu ngokholo olukomunye lomunye, olwenu kanye lolwami.
Kanti angithandi ukuthi kungaziwa kini, bazalwane, ukuthi ngazimisela kanengi ukuza kini laphakathi kwenu, lanjengaphakathi kwezinye izizwe.
Ngilomlandu kumaGriki, kwabahlakaniphileyo kanye lakwabangahlakaniphanga;
ngokunjalo njengokukimi ngilungele ukutshumayela ivangeli lakini abaseRoma.
Ngoba kangilanhloni ngevangeli likaKristu.
Ngoba ukulunga kukaNkulunkulu.
Ngoba ulaka lukaNkulunkulu luyabonakaliswa luvela ezulwini phezu kwakho konke ukungakhonzi uNkulunkulu lokungalungi kwabantu abavimbela iqiniso ngokungalungi;
ngoba.
Ngoba okungabonwayo kwakhe, selokhu kwadatshulwa umhlaba;
ngoba kuthe bemazi uNkulunkulu, kaba m dumisanga njengoNkulunkulu kaba m bonga, kodwa baba.
Bezitshaya abahlakaniphileyo baba yizithutha,
lenkazimulo kaNkulunkulu ongabhubhiyo bayiphendulela.
Ngalokho-ke uNkulunkulu wabanikela emanyaleni, enkanukweni zenhliziyo zabo;
abaphendulela iqiniso likaNkulunkulu.
Ngenxa yalokho uNkulunkulu wabanikela;
langokunjalo labesilisa bayekela ukwenza kwemvelo kowesifazana, batsha ngokukhanukana kwabo, abesilisa labesilisa benza okulihlazo, bemukeliswa phakathi kwabo umvuzo ofanele ukuduha kwabo.
Njalo njengalokhu bengavumanga ukuba lolwazi ngoNkulunkulu;
begcwaliswe konke ukungalungi, ukuphinga, ububi,
abanyeyayo,
abangelangqondo, abephula izithembiso;
abathi besazi umlayo wokulunga kaNkulunkulu.
Ngakho kawulakuzilandulela.
Njalo siyazi ukuthi ukwahlulela kukaNkulunkulu kungokweqiniso phezu kwalabo abenza izinto ezinjalo.
Njalo ucabanga lokho yini, O muntu owahlulela abenza izinto ezinjalo, lawe uzenza lezozinto, ukuthi wena uzaphepha ukwahlulela kukaNkulunkulu?
Kumbe uyayeyisa yini inotho yomusa wakhe?
Kodwa ngobulukhuni bakho lenhliziyo yakho engaphendukiyo uzibekela ulaka,
ozavuza lowo lalowo ngokwemisebenzi yakhe;
impilo elaphakade lokungabhubhi;
kodwa intukuthelo lolaka,
usizi;
kodwa inkazimulo lokuthula kuye wonke owenza okuhle, kumJuda kuqala lakumGriki;
ngoba kakukho ukubandlulula umuntu kuNkulunkulu.
Ngoba bonke abonileyo bengelamlayo, bazabhubha labo bengelamlayo;
ngoba kakusibo abezwayo umlayo abalungileyo phambi kukaNkulunkulu.
Ngoba nxa abezizwe abangelawo umlayo besenza ngokwemvelo okungokomlayo, bona, bengelawo umlayo, bangumlayo wabo ngokwabo;
ababonakalisa ukuthi umsebenzi womlayo ulotshiwe enhliziyweni zabo; isazela sabo siyafakaza laso, lemicabango yaboi ba sole omunye komunye kumbe njalo i ba vikele omunye komunye,
ngosuku uNkulunkulu azakwahlulela ngalo imfihlo zabantu.
Khangela wena ubizwa ngokuthiungumJuda,
usazi intando yakhe,
njalo uzithembile wena ukuthi ungumholi weziphofu, ukukhanya kwabasemnyameni,
umeluleki wezithutha, umfundisi wensane, ulesimo.
Ngakho wena ofundisa omunye, kawuzifundisi yini? Wena otshumayela ukuthi ungebi, uyeba yini?
Wena othi ungafebi, uyafeba yini?
Wena ozincoma ngomlayo, udumaza uNkulunkulu ngokweqa umlayo yini?
Ngoba ibizo likaNkulunkulu liyahlanjazwa, njengoba kulotshiwe.
Ngoba isibili ukusoka kuyasiza, uba usenza umlayo; kodwa uba ungumeqi womlayo, ukusoka kwakho sekuyikungasoki.
Ngakho uba ukungasoki?
Lokungasoki ngemvelo, egcwalisa umlayo, kunge kugwebe yini?
Ngoba kayisuye umJuda o nguyengokusobala, njalo kakusikho ukusoka okusobala enyameni;
kodwa yena ungumJuda o nguyengasese.
Pho-ke yibuphi ubungcono bomJuda, kumbe luyini usizo lokusoka?
Kukhulu ngendlela yonke; ngoba kuqala-ke ukuthi.
Ngoba kuyini uba abanye bengakholwanga?
Phinde.
Kodwa uba ukungalungi kwethu kubonakalisa ukulunga kukaNkulunkulu, sizakuthini? Kambe uNkulunkulu kalunganga yini owehlisela ulaka.)
Phinde?
Ngoba uba iqiniso likaNkulunkulu landisile kakhulu?
Njalo kungenjengalokhu sigconwa, lanjengoba abanye bathi thina sithi: Kasenze izinto ezimbi ukuze kuvele okuhle? Abakulahlwa kwabo kuba ngokokulunga.
Pho-ke? Singcono yini,
njengokulotshiweyo ukuthi: Kakho olungileyo, kakho loyedwa;
kakho oqedisisayo, kakho odinga uNkulunkulu;
bonke baphambukile, kabasizi lutho bonkana; kakho owenza okuhle, kakho ngitsho loyedwa;
umphimbo wabo ulingcwaba elivulekileyo; bakhohlisa ngenlimi zabo;
omlomo wabo ugcwele ukuqalekisa lokubaba;
inyawo zabo ziphangisela ukuchitha igazi;
incithakalo losizi kusendleleni zabo,
njalo indlela yokuthula kabayazanga;
ukwesaba uNkulunkulu kakukho phambi kwamehlo abo.
Njalo siyazi ukuthi konke okutshoyo umlayo, ukukhuluma kibo abangaphansi komlayo;
ngoba.
Kodwa khathesi-ke sekubonakalisiwe ukulunga kukaNkulunkulu;
ngitsho ukulunga kukaNkulunkulu ngokholo lukaJesu Kristu kibo bonke laphezu kwabo bonke abakholwayo;
ngoba bonke bonile basilele enkazimulweni kaNkulunkulu,
balungisiswa ngesihle;
uNkulunkulu;
ukuze kube yisibonakaliso sokulunga kwakhe kulesisikhathi, ukuze abe ngolungileyo lokuthi uyamlungisisa ongowokholo lukaJesu.
Ngakho kungaphi ukuzincoma? Kuvalelwe phandle. Ngomthetho bani? Hatshi bo, kodwa ngomthetho wokholo.
Ngakho siphetha ngokuthi.
Kambe u nguNkulunkulu wamaJuda kuphela? Njalo kayisuye lowabezizwe yini? Yebo lowabezizwe;
lokhu uNkulunkulu emunye.
Ngakho siyawenza umlayo ube yize ngokholo yini? Phinde.
Pho-ke sizakuthi uAbrahama ubaba wethu wazuzani ngokwenyama?
Ngoba uba uAbrahama walungisiswa ngemisebenzi.
Ngoba umbhalo uthini? Uthi: Kodwa uAbrahama wakholwa kuNkulunkulu, kwasekubalelwa kuye ukuthi yikulunga.
Kodwa kulowo osebenzayo kabalelwa iholo.
Kodwa kulowo ongasebenziyo, kodwa ekholwa kuye olungisisa oweyisa uNkulunkulu, ukholo lwakhe.
Njengoba laye uDavida ekhuluma ngokubusiswa komuntu, uNkulunkulu ambalela ukulunga esithi:
Babusisiwe abaziphambeko zabo zithethelelwe labazono zabo zisitshekelwe.
Ubusisiwe umuntu iNkosi engasoze yambalela isono.
Ngakho lokhukubusiswa kuphezu kokusoka? Ngoba sithi: Ukholo lwabalelwa kuAbrahama ukuthi luyikulunga.
Pho lwabalelwa njani? Lapho esekusokeni yini, kumbe ekungasokini? Kungekho ekusokeni, kodwa ekungasokini.
Wasesemukela isibonakaliso sokusoka; ukuze abe nguyise wabo bonke abakholwayo lanxa b engasokanga, ukuze ukulunga kubalelwe lakibo;
loyise wokusoka kulabo abangeyisibo bokusoka kuphela, kodwa futhi abahamba ezinyathelweni zokholo lukababa wethu uAbrahama aye lalo engakasokwa.
Ngoba kasingomlayo isithembiso kuAbrahama kumbe kunzalo yakhe, ukuthi uzakuba yindlalifa yomhlaba, kodwa ngokulunga kokholo.
Ngoba uba labo abomlayo beyizindlalifa;
ngoba umlayo ubanga ulaka.
Ngakho ku ngokholo, ukuze kube ngokomusa,
(njengokulotshiweyo ukuthi: Ngikumisile ukuthi ube nguyise wezizwe ezinengi.
Owathi emelane lethemba wakholwa ngethemba, ukuze abe nguyise wezizwe ezinengi, njengalokho okwatshiwoyo ukuthi: Izakuba njalo inzalo yakho.
Njalo kabanga buthakathaka ekholweni, kanakananga umzimba wakhe uqobo owawusufile;
njalo kathandabuzanga ngesithembiso sikaNkulunkulu ngokungakholwa, kodwa waqiniswa ekholweni, enika uNkulunkulu udumo,
njalo eqinisekile ngokupheleleyo ukuthi lokho ayekuthembisile, ulamandla ngitsho okukwenza.
Ngalokho-ke kwabalelwa kuye ukuthi yikulunga.
Kakubhalwanga-ke ngenxa yakhe yedwa, ukuthi kwabalelwa kuye;
kodwa langenxa yethu, esizabalelwa khona,
owanikelwa ngenxa yeziphambeko zethu.
Ngakho sesilungisisiwe ngokholo,
okungaye njalo silokungena ngokholo kulumusa.
Kakusikho lokhu -ke kuphela,
lokubekezela ukuqina;
lethemba kalidanisi.
Ngoba sisebuthakathaka, ngesikhathi esifaneleyo uKristu wafela abeyisa uNkulunkulu.
Ngoba kunzima ukuthi umuntu afele olungileyo; kodwa mhlawumbe kungaba khona ngitsho olesibindi sokufela olungileyo.
Kodwa uNkulunkulu uqinisa.
Ngakho kakhulu-ke, lokhu sesilungisisiwe khathesi ngegazi lakhe.
Ngoba uba, lapho siseyizitha;
njalo kakusikho lokhukuphela.
Ngakho, njengalokhu ngamuntu munye isono sangena emhlabeni, ngoba bonke bonile;
ngoba kuze ku fikeumlayo isono sasikhona emhlabeni,
kanti ukufa kwabusa kusukela kuAdamu kusiya kuMozisi, laphezu kwalabo ababengonanga okufanana lokweqa kukaAdamu.
Kodwa kungenjengesiphambeko, sinjalo lesipho somusa. Ngoba uba ngesiphambeko soyedwa abanengi bafa.
Futhi isipho kasinjengoyedwa owonayo; ngoba isigwebo sa singesisodwa ngasekulahlweni, kodwa isipho somusa ngeseziphambeko ezinengi ngasekulungisisweni.
Ngoba uba ngesiphambeko so muntuoyedwa ukufa kwabusa ngalowo oyedwa, ikakhulu bona abemukela ubunengi bomusa lobesipho sokulunga bazabusa empilweni ngalowo oyedwa, uJesu Kristu.
Ngakho njengoba ngesiphambeko sinye isigwebo sabakubo bonke abantu ukuya ekulahlweni.
Ngoba njengoba ngokungalaleli komuntu munye abanengi benziwa izoni.
Kodwa umlayo;
ukuze njengoba isono sabusa ekufeni, ngokunjalo lomusa ubuse ngokulunga.
Ngakho sizakuthini? Sizahlala yini esonweni?
Phinde?
Kalazi yini ukuthi thina sonke esabhabhathizelwa?
Ngakho sangcwatshwa kanye laye ngobhabhathizo ekufeni.
Ngoba uba;
sisazi lokhu, ukuthi umuntu wethu omdala;
ngoba ofileyo.
Njalo uba sifile kanye loKristu, siyakholwa ukuthi sizaphila futhi kanye laye;
sisazi ukuthi uKristu esevusiwe kwabafileyo kasafi futhi; ukufa kungeke kusabusa phezu kwakhe.
Ngoba lokhu wafa, wafela isono.
Ngokunjalo lani zinakaneni sibili lifile esonweni.
Ngakho kakumelanga isono sibuse emzimbeni wenu ofayo, lize lilalele inkanuko zawo;
njalo linganikeli izitho zenu zibe yizikhali zokungalungi esonweni;
ngoba isono kasiyikubusa phezu kwenu.
Pho-ke? Sizakona yini!
Kalazi yini ukuthi lowo elizinikela kuye ukuze libe yizigqili zoku m lalela, liyizigqili zakhe elimlalelayo, loba ezesono kube yikufa, loba ezokulalela kube yikulunga?
Kodwa kabongwe uNkulunkulu, ukuthi lina lake laba yizigqili zesono;
njalo likhululiwe esonweni.
Ngikhuluma ngokwabantu.
Ngoba lapho liyizigqili zesono, lalikhululekile ekulungeni.
Ngakho sithelobani elilaso ezintweni ngalesosikhathi eselilenhloni ngazo.
Kodwa khathesi-ke selikhululiwe esonweni, njalo selenziwe izigqili kuNkulunkulu, lilesithelo senu kube yibungcwele, lokucina kuyimpilo elaphakade.
Ngoba inkokhelo yesono.
Kalazi yini, bazalwane (ngoba ngikhuluma lalabo abawaziyo umlayo), ukuthi umlayo ubusa umuntu selokhu esaphila?
Ngoba umfazi owendileyo ubotshelwe ngomlayo endodeni ephilayo; kodwa uba indoda isifile, ukhululiwe emlayweni wendoda.
Ngakho uba indoda isaphila, uzathiwa yisifebe uba esiba ngowenye indoda; kodwa uba indoda isifile, ukhululekile emlayweni, ukuze angabi yisifebe uba esiba ngowenye indoda.
Ngakho, bazalwane bami, selenziwe lafa lani emlayweni.
Ngoba sathi sisenyameni, inkanuko zesono ezingomlayo zasebenza ezithweni zethu.
Kodwa khathesi-ke sesikhululiwe emthethweni, sifile mayelana lalokho esasibanjwe yikho, ukuze sikhonze ngobutsha bomoya, njalo kungeyisikho ngobudala bokulotshiweyo.
Pho-ke sizakuthini? Umthetho uyisono yini? Phinde.
Kodwa isono, sizuze.
Mina-ke ngake ngaphila ngaphandle komlayo, njalo ngafa mina;
njalo umthetho ongowempilo, wona waficwa yimi ungowokufa;
ngoba isono, sizuze ithuba ngomthetho.
Ngakho umthetho ungcwele, lomlayo ungcwele.
Ngakho okulungileyo kwaba yikufa kimi yini? Phinde! Kodwa isono, ukuze sibonakaliswe ukuthi siyisono, sisebenza ukufa kimi ngokulungileyo; ukuze isono ngomthetho sibe yikonakala okukhulu kakhulu.
Ngoba siyazi ukuthi umthetho ungowomoya.
Ngoba lokhu engikwenzayo, angivumelani lakho; ngoba kakusikho engikuthandayo, lokho engikwenzayo; kodwa lokho engikuzondayo, yikho engikwenzayo.
Uba ngisenza lokho engingakuthandiyo, ngiyawuvumela umthetho ukuthi ulungile.
Kodwa khathesi-ke kakuseyimi engikwenzayo, kodwa yisono esihlala kimi.
Ngoba ngiyazi ukuthi kimi, lokhu kuyikuthi enyameni yami, kakuhlali okuhle.
Ngoba okuhle engikuthandayo, kangikwenzi; kodwa okubi engingakuthandiyo, yikho engikwenzayo.
Kodwa uba ngisenza lokho mina engingakuthandiyo, kakuseyimi engikwenzayo, kodwa yisono esihlala kimi.
Ngakho ngithola umthetho wokuthi lapho ngithanda ukwenza okuhle, okubi kukhona kimi.
Ngoba ngiyathokoza emthethweni kaNkulunkulu;
kodwa ngibona ezithweni zami.
Mina muntu olusizi! Ngubani ozangikhulula kulumzimba walokhukufa?
Ngiyabonga uNkulunkulu ngoJesu Kristu iNkosi yethu. Ngalokho-ke mina ngokwami ngikhonza umthetho kaNkulunkulu ngengqondo, kodwa ngenyama umthetho wesono.
Ngakho khathesi kakukho ukulahlwa kibo abakuKristu Jesu, abangahambi ngokwenyama, kodwa ngokoMoya.
Ngoba umthetho woMoya wempilo kuKristu Jesu.
Ngoba lokho umthetho owawungekwenze, njalo kusenzelwa isono, walahla isono enyameni;
ukuze ukulunga komthetho kugcwaliswe kithi.
Ngoba bona abangokwenyama.
Ngoba ukuzindla kwenyama kuyikufa; kodwa ukuzindla kukaMoya kuyimpilo lokuthula;
ngoba ukuzindla kwenyama kuyibutha kuNkulunkulu; ngoba kakuzehliseli ngaphansi komthetho kaNkulunkulu, ngoba kungekwenze;
lalabo abasenyameni kabalakumthokozisa uNkulunkulu.
Lina-ke alisenyameni, kodwa likuMoya, uba phela.
Uba-ke uKristu ekini, umzimba ufile ngenxa yesono, kodwa umoya uyimpilo ngenxa yokulunga.
Njalo uba uMoya walowo owavusa uJesu kwabafileyo ehlala kini.
Ngakho, bazalwane, silomlandu, kungeyisikho enyameni, ukuthi siphile ngokwenyama;
ngoba uba liphila ngokwenyama, lizakufa.
Ngoba bonke abakhokhelwa nguMoya kaNkulunkulu, bona bangabantwana bakaNkulunkulu.
Ngoba kalemukelanga!
UMoya uqobo ufakazelana kanye lomoya wethu;
njalo uba sing abantwana, siyi zindlalifa.
Ngoba ngithi.
Ngoba ukulangatha kokudaliweyo.
Ngoba okudaliweyo kwehliselwa
lokuthi lalokho okudaliweyo kuzakhululwa ebugqilini.
Ngoba siyazi ukuthi konke okudaliweyo.
Kakusikho lokhu kuphela, kodwa lathi uqobo lwethu.
Ngoba sisindiswa ngethemba; kodwa ithemba elibonwayo kayisilo ithemba; ngoba lokho umuntu akubonayo, ukuthembelani futhi?
Kodwa uba sithemba lokho esingakuboniyo, si ku lindela ngokubekezela.
Ngokunjalo loMoya uyasiza ubuthakathaka bethu; ngoba kasikwazi esikukhulekelayo njengokufaneleyo;
yena-ke ohlola izinhliziyo.
Njalo siyazi ukuthi izinto zonke zisebenziselana.
Ngoba labo abazi ngaphambili;
lalabo abamisayo ngaphambili.
Pho-ke sizakuthini kulezizinto? Uba uNkulunkulu engowethu, ngubani omelana lathi?
Yena ongazange ayigodle eyakhe iNdodana?
Ngubani ozababeka icala;
ngubani olahlayo.
Ngubani ozasehlukanisa lothando lukaKristu? Ukuhlupheka, kumbe ingozi, kumbe inkemba yini?
Njengokulotshiweyo ukuthi: Ngenxa yakho.
Kanti kulezizinto zonke sedlula abanqobi.
Ngoba ngileqiniso ukuthi kayisikho ukufa lempilo lezingilosi
lobude.
Ngikhuluma iqiniso kuKristu,
ukuthi ngilokudabuka okukhulu, lobuhlungu obungapheliyo enhliziyweni yami.
Ngoba ngingafisa ukuthi;
abangamaIsrayeli,
abangababo obaba.
Kodwa kakunjengokuthi ilizwi likaNkulunkulu lehlulekile;
njalo kungesikuthi ngoba bayinzalo kaAbrahama, bonke bangabantwana.
Lokhu kutsho ukuthi, kakusibo abantwana benyama, bona bangabantwana bakaNkulunkulu; kodwa abantwana besithembiso bathiwa yinzalo.
Ngoba ilizwi lesithembiso yileli elokuthi: Ngalesisikhathi ngizafika, njalo uSara uzakuba lendodana.
Kakusikho lokhu kuphela, kodwa loRebeka esekhulelwe ngomunye, ubaba wethu uIsaka;
ngoba abantwanabengakazalwa, bengakenzi okuhle loba okubi,
kwatshiwo kuye ukuthi: Omkhulu uzakhonza omncinyane,
njengokulotshiweyo ukuthi: UJakobe ngamthanda.
Pho-ke sizakuthini? Kukhona ukungalungi kuNkulunkulu yini!
Ngoba uthi kuMozisi: Ngizakuba lomusa kwengilomusa kuye, njalo ngimhawukele engimhawukelayo.
Ngakho ka ku sikho kothandayo, njalo ka ku sikho kogijimayo, kodwa ngo kukaNkulunkulu olesihawu.
Ngoba umbhalo uthi kuFaro: Ngakuphakamisela khona lokho, ukuze ngibonakalise amandla ami ngawe, njalo ukuze ibizo lami litshunyayelwe emhlabeni wonke.
Ngakho uhawukela lowo athanda ukumhawukela; njalo amenze abe lukhuni lowo athanda ukumenza lukhuni.
Ngakho uzakuthi kimi: Usasolelani? Ngoba ngubani ongamelana lentando yakhe?
Hatshi bo?
Kumbe umbumbi?
Njalo uba uNkulunkulu ethanda ukubonakalisa ulaka lwakhe, lokwazisa amandla akhe, wathwala ngokubekezela okukhulu;
njalo ukuze azise inotho yenkazimulo,
azibizileyo lazo, esiyizothina?
Njengalokhu akutsho lakuHoseya: Abangeyisibo abantu bami ngizababiza ngokuthingabantu bami; lowayengathandwa ngokuthingothandekayo;
njalo kuzakuthi, endaweni lapho okwathiwa khona kibo: Kalisibo abantu bami.
LoIsaya umemeza ngoIsrayeli esithi: Lanxa inani labantwana bakoIsrayeli lingangetshebetshebe lolwandle;
ngoba uzaqeda isenzo a si qume ngokulunga; ngoba iNkosi izakwenza isenzo siqunywe ngokuphangisa emhlabeni.
Njalo njengoba uIsaya watsho ngaphambili ukuthi: Uba iNkosi yamabandla ibingasitshiyelanga inzalo.
Pho sizakuthini? Ukuthi abezizwe;
kodwa uIsrayeli, edingisisa umlayo wokulunga.
Ngani? Ngoba kaba dingisis anga ngokholo, kodwa ngokungathi ngemisebenzi yomlayo; ngoba bakhubeka,
njengokulotshiweyo ukuthi: Khangela ngibeka eSiyoni.
Bazalwane, isifiso senhliziyo yami, lomkhuleko kuNkulunkulu ngenxa kaIsrayeli yikuthi ba sindiswe.
Ngoba ngiyabafakazela ukuthi balokutshisekela uNkulunkulu;
ngoba bengakwazi ukulunga kukaNkulunkulu.
Ngoba uKristu uyisiphetho somlayo ekulungeni kuye wonke okholwayo.
Ngoba uMozisi ubhala ngo kulunga okungokomlayo, ukuthi umuntu owenza lezizinto uzaphila ngazo.
Kodwa ukulunga okungokholo kukhuluma kanje? Lokhu kuyikuthi ukumehlisa uKristu;
kumbe ukuthi: Ngubani ozakwehlela ekujuleni? Lokhu kuyikuthi ukumkhuphula uKristu kwabafileyo.
Kodwa kuthini? Ilizwi liseduze lawe, emlonyeni wakho lenhliziyweni yakho; leli yilizwi lokholo esilitshumayelayo;
ukuthi uba uvuma ngomlomo wakho iNkosi uJesu;
ngoba ngenhliziyo omunyeuyakholwa kube yikulunga, langomlomo uyavuma kube lusindiso.
Ngoba umbhalo uthi: Wonke okholwa kuye kayikuyangeka.
Ngoba kakukho umehluko phakathi komJuda lomGriki.
Ngoba wonke loba ngubani.
Ngakho bazayibiza njani abangakholwanga kuyo? Futhi bazakholwa njani kuyo abangezwanga ngayo? Futhi bazakuzwa njani bengelamtshumayeli?
Njalo bazatshumayela njani uba bengathunywanga!
Kodwa kabalilalelanga bonke ivangeli?
Ngakho ukholo luvela ekuzweni.
Kodwa ngithi: Kabezwanga yini? Yebo sibili.
Kodwa ngithi: UIsrayeli kaqedisisanga yini? Kuqala uMozisi uthi: Mina ngizalivusela umona nga boaba ngesiso isizwe.
LoIsaya ulesibindi uthi: Ngaficwa yilabo abangangidinganga, ngabonakala kibo abangabuzanga ngami.
Kodwa kuIsrayeli uthi: Usuku lonke ngelulela izandla zami kubantu abangalaleliyo labalenkani.
Ngakho ngithi: UNkulunkulu ubalahlile yini abantu bakhe.
UNkulunkulu kabalahlanga abantu bakhe, esithi:
Nkosi, babulele abaprofethi bakho, badilizile amalathi akho; mina-ke ngisele ngedwa, sebedinga umphefumulo wami.
Kodwa impendulo kaNkulunkulu yathini kuye? Yathi: Ngizitshiyele amadoda azinkulungwane eziyisikhombisa, angaguqanga ngedolo kuBhali.
Kunjalo-ke kukhona langalesisikhathi insali ngokukhetha komusa.
Kodwa uba kungomusa, kakusayi ngemisebenzi; uba kungenjalo umusa kawuseyiwo umusa. Kodwa aluba kusiya ngemisebenzi, akusengumusa; uba kungenjalo umsebenzi kawusengumsebenzi.
Pho-ke? Lokhu uIsrayeli ayekudinga, lokho kakutholanga, kodwa abakhethiweyo bakuthola, labanye benziwa baba lukhuni;
njengokulotshiweyo ukuthi: UNkulunkulu wabanika umoya wobuthongo obukhulu.
LoDavida uthi: Itafula labo libe ngumjibila lesifu, lesikhubekiso, lempindiselo kibo;
amehlo abo kafiphazwe ukuze bangaboni, njalo ugobise umhlana wabo njalonjalo.
Ngakho ngithi: Bakhubeka ukuze bawe yini? Phinde.
Kodwa uba isiphambeko sabo siyinotho yomhlaba, lokwehluleka kwabo kuyinotho yabezizwe, kakhulu kangakanani ukugcwala kwabo?
Ngoba ngikhuluma lani bezizwe, njengalokho mina ngingumphostoli wabezizwe; ngikhulisa inkonzo yami;
ukuthi mhlawumbe ngibavusele umona abe nyama yami.
Ngoba uba ukulahlwa kwabo kuyikubuyiswa komhlaba, ku nga ba yini ukwemukelwa, ngaphandle kokuthi kuyimpilo kwabafileyo?
Njalo uba izithelo zokuqala zingcwele.
Kodwa uba kwephulwe ezinye ingatsha,
ungazincomi phezu kwengatsha; kodwa uba uzincoma phezu kwazo, kayisuwe othwele impande, kodwa impande wena.
Uzakuthi-ke: Ingatsha zephulwa, ukuze mina ngixhunyelwe.
Kulungile; zephulwa ngokungakholwa, wena-ke umi ngokholo;
ngoba uba uNkulunkulu engayekelanga ingatsha zemvelo, hlezi lawe kayikukuyekela.
Khangela-ke ububele lobukhali bukaNkulunkulu; ubukhali, kulabo abawayo; kodwa kuwe, ububele, uba uhlala ebubeleni.
Lalabo futhi, uba bengahlali ekungakholweni, bazaxhunyelwa, ngoba uNkulunkulu ulamandla okubuya abaxhume.

Ngoba uba wena waqunywa emhlwathini weganga ngemvelo, wasuxhunyelelwa ngokuphambene lemvelo emhlwathini ohlanyelweyo, kakhulu kangakanani labo, aba zingatshangemvelo, bazaxhunyelelwa esihlahleni sakibo somhlwathi?
Ngoba ngithanda ukuthi lingabi ngabangaziyo, bazalwane, ngalimfihlo;
ngokunjalo-ke uIsrayeli wonke uzasindiswa;
njalo yilesi isivumelwano sami kibo, lapho ngizasusa izono zabo.
Ngokwevangeli bayizitha ngenxa yenu; kodwa ngokukhetha bangabathandiweyo ngenxa yabobaba;
ngoba izipho zomusa lokubiza kukaNkulunkulu.
Ngoba njengalokhu lani kade lingamlaleli uNkulunkulu, kodwa khathesi selihawukelwe ngenxa yokungalaleli kwabo;
ngokunjalo lalabo khathesi kabalalelanga, ukuze ngesihawu senu bahawukelwe labo;
ngoba uNkulunkulu ubavalele bonke ekungalalelini, ukuze abe lesihawu kibo bonke.
Yeka ukujula kwenotho!
Ngoba ngubani owazi ingqondo yeNkosi? Kumbe ngubani owaba ngumeluleki wayo?
Kumbe ngubani owamnika kuqala, njalo kubuyiselwe kuye?
Ngoba konke kuvela kuye.
Ngakho, bazalwane, ngiyalincenga ukuthi, ngezihawu zikaNkulunkulu.
Njalo lingalingisi.
Ngoba ngomusa engiwuphiweyo.
Ngoba njengoba silezitho ezinengi emzimbeni munye, kodwa izitho zonke kazilamsebenzi ofananayo;
kunjalo thina esibanengi.
Njalo silezipho ezehlukeneyo, asiprofethengokwesilinganiso sokholo;
kumbe yikukhonza;
kumbe olayayo.
Uthando.
Thandanani kakhulu ngothando lobuzalwane; ekuhloniphaneni phathani abanye ngcono kulani;
lingabi ngamavila;
lithokoza ethembeni; libekezela ekuhluphekeni;
yabelani kunswelo zabangcwele.
Babusiseni abalizingelayo; busisani, lingaqalekisi.
Thokozani labathokozayo.
Kalibe lenhliziyonye komunye lomunye.
Lingaphindiseli muntu okubi ngokubi.
Uba kungenzeka, ng okukini.
Bathandiweyo, lingaziphindiseli.
Ngakho nxa isitha sakho silambile, siphe ukudla; nxa somile, sinathise; ngoba ngokwenza lokho, usibekela amalahle avuthayo phezu kwekhanda laso.
Unganqotshwa ngokubi, kodwa nqoba okubi ngokuhle.
Wonke umphefumulo.
Ngakho omelana lamandla, umelana lesimiso sikaNkulunkulu.
Ngoba ababusi kabesabeki emisebenzini emihle;
ngoba uyinceku kaNkulunkulu ukuze kube kuhle kuwe. Kodwa nxa usenza okubi, yesaba; ngoba inkemba kayiphatheli ize. Ngoba uyinceku kaNkulunkulu, ungumphindiseli wolaka kulowo owenza okubi.
Ngakho kumele ukuthi uzehlise, kungabi ngenxa yolaka kuphela.
Ngoba ngenxa yalokho lithela lomthelo; ngoba bayizinceku zikaNkulunkulu, ezikhuthalela khona lokho.
Ngakho phanini bonke okufaneleyo.
Lingabi lamlandu kumuntu, ngaphandle kowokuthandana; ngoba othanda omunye, ugcwalisile umlayo.
Ngoba lokhu ukuthi: Ungafebi, ungabulali, ungebi, ungafakazi amanga.
Uthando kalwenzi okubi kumakhelwane; ngakho uthando luyikugcwaliseka komlayo.
Njalo lokhu, lisazi isikhathi.
Ubusuku budlulile, usuku selusondele.
Asihambe ngokufaneleyo, njengasemini.
